āryamañjuśriye kumārabhūtāya namaḥ /
yo 'ntadvayāvāsavidhūtavāsaḥ saṃbuddhadhīsāgaralabdhajanmā 		dbu ma rtsa ba'i 'grel pa tshigs gsal ba zhes bya ba /
'phags pa [dd] 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la phyag 'tshal lo /
gang zhig mtha' gnyis gnas la gnas bsal zhing /
rdzogs sangs rgyas blo rgya mtshor skye ba brnyes /
saddharmatoyasya gabhīrabhāvaṃ yathānubuddhaṃ kṛpayā jagāda dam chos mdzod kyi zab mo nyid ji ltar /
rjes su rtogs bzhin thugs rjes ston par mdzad /
yasya darśanatejāṃsi paravādimatendhanam gang gis lta ba'i me dag gis /
da dung phas rgol gzhung lugs kyi /
dahantyadyāpi lokasya mānasāni tamāṃsi ca /
yasyāsamajñānavacaḥśaraughā nighnanti niḥśeṣabhavārisenām 		bud shing dang ni 'jig rten gyi /
yid kyi mun rnams 'joms par mdzad /
gang gi gnyis med ye shes gsung mda'i tshogs /
tridhāturājyaśriyamādadhānā vineyalokasya sadevakasya lha dang bcas pa'i gdul bya'i 'jig rten la /
khams gsum dag tu rgyal thabs legs mdzad pas /
nāgārjunāya praṇipatya tasmai tatkārikāṇāṃ vivṛtiṃ kariṣye srid pa'i dgra sde ma lus 'joms mdzad pa'i /
klu sgrub de la phyag 'tshal nas ni de'i /
tshig le'ur byas pa'i 'grel pa sla ba dang /
uttānasatprakriyavākyanaddhāṃ tarkānilāvyākulitāṃ prasannām sdeb legs ngag gis sbyar zhing rtog ge yi /
rlung gis ma dkrugs rab tu gsal bar bya /
tatra 'na svato nāpi parato na dvābhyām'; ityādi vakṣyamāṇaṃ śāstram /
tasya kāni saṃbandhābhidhānaprayojanāni iti praśne, madhyamakāvatāravihitavidhinā advayajñānālaṃkṛtaṃ mahākaruṇopāyapuraḥsaraṃ prathamacittotpādaṃ tathāgatajñānotpattihetumādiṃ kṛtvā yāvadācāryanāgārjunasya viditāviparītaprajñāpāramitānīteḥ karuṇayā parāvabodhārthaṃ śāstrapraṇayanam, ityeṣa tāvacchāstrasya saṃbandhaḥ 		de la bdag las ma yin gzhan las min /
zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni 'chad par 'gyur ba'i bstan bcos so /
de'i 'brel pa dang brjod par bya ba dang dgos pa'i dgos pa dag gang yin zhes 'dri na /
dbu ma la 'jug pa las bstan pa'i tshul gyis sems bskyed pa dang po gnyis su med pa'i ye shes kyis brgyan pa /
snying rje chen po sngon du 'gro ba /
de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes 'byung ba'i rgyur gyur pa thog mar mdzad nas /
mthar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul phyin ci ma log pa thugs su chud par gyur pa'i slob dpon klu sgrub kyis gzhan khong du chud par bya ba'i phyir snying rjes bstan bcos mdzad de zhes bya ba 'di ni re zhig bstan bcos kyi 'brel pa yin no /
yacchāsti vaḥ kleśaripūnaśeṣānsaṃtrāyate durgatito bhavācca /
tacchāsanāttrāṇaguṇācca śāstrametadvayaṃ cānyamateṣu nāsti 		slob dpon rang nyid 'chad par 'gyur ba'i bstan bcos mtha' dag gi brjod par bya ba'i don dgos pa dang bcas pa ston zhing /
iti /
svayameva cācāryo vakṣyamāṇasakalaśāstrābhidheyārtha saprayojanamupadarśayan, tadaviparītasaṃprakāśatvena māhātmyamudbhāvya tatsvabhāvāvyatirekavartine paramagurave tathāgatāya śāstrapraṇayananimittakaṃ praṇāmaṃ kartukāma āha /
anirodhamanutpādamanucchedamaśāśvatam 		de phyin ci ma log par ston par mdzad pa nyid kyi sgo nas che ba'i bdag nyid brjod nas de'i ngo bo dang tha mi dad par bzhugs pa'i bla ma dam pa /
de bzhin gshegs pa la bstan bcos rtsom pa'i rgyu can gyi phyag mdzad par bzhed pas /
gang gis rten cing 'brel par 'byung /
'gag pa med pa skye med pa /
anekārthamanānārthamanāgamamanirgamam /
yaḥ pratītyasamutpādam /
ityādi /
tadatrānirodhādyaṣṭaviśeṣaṇaviśiṣṭaḥ pratītyasamutpādaḥ śāstrābhidheyārthaḥ 		chad pa med pa rtag med pa /
'ong ba med pa 'gro med pa /
tha dad don min don gcig min /
spros pa nyer zhi zhi zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs so /
de la rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba 'gag pa med pa la sogs pa khyad par brgyad kyis khyad par du byas pa ni /
sarvaprapañcopaśamaśivalakṣaṇaṃ nirvāṇaṃ śāstrasya prayojanaṃ nirdiṣṭam /
taṃ vande vadatāṃ varam 		bstan bcos kyi brjod par bya ba yin zhing mya ngan las 'das pa spros pa thams cad nye bar zhi zhing zhi ba'i mtshan nyid can ni bstan bcos kyi dgos par bstan la /
smra rnams kyi /
dam pa de la phyag 'tshal lo /
ityanena praṇāmaḥ /
ityeṣa tāvacchokadvayasya samudāyārthaḥ 		zhes bya ba 'dis ni phyag 'tshal ba bstan te /
de ltar na 'di ni re zhig tshigs su bcad pa gnyis kyi spyi'i don yin no /
avayavārthastu vibhajyate /
tatra niruddhirnirodhaḥ /
kṣaṇabhaṅgo nirodha ityucyate 		yan lag gi don yang rnam par dbye bar bya ste /
de la pra ti ni phrad pa'i don to /
utpādanamutpādaḥ ai ti ni 'gro ba'i don to /
ātmabhāvonmajjanamityarthaḥ /
ucchittirucchedaḥ 		l+yab kyi mtha' can pra ti tya'i sgra ni phrad pa ste ltos pa la 'jug pa yin te /
prabandhavicchittirityarthaḥ /
śāśvato nityaḥ 		skad kyi byings ni nye bar bsgyur bas yongs su bsgyur ba'i phyir ro /
sarvakāle sthāṇurityarthaḥ nye bar bsgyur ba'i dbang gis na /
ekaścāsāvarthaścetyekārtho 'bhinnārthaḥ /
na pṛthagityarthaḥ 		skad byings don ni yongs bsgyur te /
gang g'a'i chu ni mngar mod kyi /
nānārtho bhinnārthaḥ /
pṛthagityarthaḥ 		rgya mtsho chu yis ji bzhin no /
zhes bshad do /
āgatirāgamaḥ, viprakṛṣṭadeśāvasthitānāṃ saṃnikṛṣṭadeśāgamanam sa mud gong na yod pa'i p'a ta ni 'byung ba'i don can yin pas sa mud p'a ta'i sgra ni 'byung ba la 'jug go /
nirgatirnirgamaḥ, saṃnikṛṣṭadeśāvasthitānāṃ viprakṛṣṭadeśagamanam /
etirgatyarthaḥ, pratiḥ prāptyarthaḥ 		de'i phyir dngos po rnams kyi 'byung ba rgyu dang rkyen la ltos pa ni rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'i don to /
upasargavaśena dhātvarthavipariṇāmāt gzhan dag pra ti ni zlos pa'i don to /
upasargeṇa dhātvartho balādanyatra nīyate ai ti ni 'gro ba ste chas pa dang 'jig pa'o /
gaṅgāsalilamādhuryaṃ sāgareṇa yathāmbhasā /
pratītyaśabdo 'tra lyabantaḥ prāptāvapekṣāyāṃ vartate 		ai tya ni 'gro bar rung ba dag go zhes de ltar ai tya'i sgra de la phan pa'i mtha' can du bye brag tu bshad nas /
samutpūrvaḥ padiḥ prādurbhāvārtha iti samutpādaśabdaḥ prādurbhāve vartate /
tataśca hetupratyayāpekṣo bhāvānāmutpādaḥ pratītyasamutpādārthaḥ /
apare tu bruvate /
itirgamanaṃ vināśaḥ /
itau sādhava ityāḥ /
pratirvīpsārthaḥ /
ityevaṃ taddhitāntamityaśabdaṃ vyutpādya prati prati ityānāṃ vināśināṃ samutpāda iti varṇayanti /
teṣāṃ "pratītyasamutpādaṃ vo bhikṣavo deśayiṣyāmi", "yaḥ pratītyasamutpādaṃ paśyati sa dharma paśyati" ityevamādau viṣaye vīpsārthasya saṃbhavāt samāsasadbhāvācca syājjyāyasī vyutpattiḥ /
iha tu "cakṣuḥ pratītya rūpāṇi ca utpadyate cakṣurvijñānam" ityevamādau viṣaye sākṣādaṅgīkṛtārthaviśeṣe cakṣuḥ pratītyeti pratītyaśabda ekacakṣurindriyahetukāyāmapyekavijñānotpattāvabhīṣṭāyāṃ kuto vīpsārthatā? prāptyarthastvanaṅgīkṛtārthaviśeṣe 'pi pratītyaśabde saṃbhavati /
prāpya saṃbhavaḥ, pratītya samutpāda iti 		so so so sor 'gro zhing 'jig pa dang ldan pa rnams kyi 'byung ba ni rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba'o zhes brjod par byed do /
de dag gi ltar na dge slong dag khyed la rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba bstan par bya yis /
sus rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba mthong ba des chos mthong ngo zhes bya ba de lta bu la sogs pa'i yul la ni zlos pa'i don srid pa'i phyir dang tshig bsdu ba yod pa'i phyir bye brag tu bshad pa legs par 'gyur na /
mig dang gzugs la brten nas mig gi rnam par shes pa 'byung ngo zhes bya ba 'di lta bu la sogs pa'i yul 'dir ni mig dang gzugs la brten nas zhes don gyi khyad par dngos su zhal gyis bzhes shing /
mig gi dbang po gcig gi rgyu can gyi rnam par shes pa gcig kyang skye bar bzhed pa na brten nas zhes bya ba'i sgra la zlos pa'i don nyid yod par ga la 'gyur /
phrad pa'i don ni phrad nas 'byung ba ni rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'o zhes don gyi khyad par zhal gyis ma bzhes pa'i rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'i sgra la yang yod pa yin la /
aṅgīkṛtārthaviśeṣe 'pi saṃbhavati /
cakṣuḥ pratītya, cakṣuḥ prāpya, cakṣū rūpaṃ cāpekṣyeti vyākhyānāt /
taddhitānte cetyaśabde "cakṣuḥ pratītya rūpāṇi ca utpadyate cakṣurvijñānam" ityatra pratītyaśabdasyāvyayatvābhāvāt samāsāsadbhāvācca vibhaktiśrutau satyāṃ cakṣuḥ pratītya vijñānaṃ rūpāṇi ca iti nipātaḥ syāt /
na caitadevam 		don gyi khyad par zhal gyis bzhes pa la yang yod pa yin te /
mig dang gzugs la brten nas mig dang gzugs phrad cing mig dang gzugs la ltos nas zhes bshad pa'i phyir ro /
ai tya'i sgra de la phan pa'i mtha' can yin na ni mig dang gzugs la brten nas mig gi rnam par shes pa 'byung ngo zhes bya ba 'dir pra ti tya'i sgra mi zad par ma yin pa'i phyir dang tshig bsdu ba yod pa ma yin pa'i phyir rnam par dbye ba thos par 'gyur ba yin dang mig dang gzug la brten pa rnam par shes pa zhes bya bar 'don par 'gyur ba zhig na /
'di ni de lta bu yang ma yin pas /
ityavyayasyaiva lyabantasya vyutpattirabhyupeyā l+yab kyi mtha' can mi zad pa kho nar bye brag tu bshad pa khas blang bar bya'o /
yastu /
"vīpsārthatvātpratyupasargasya, eteḥ prāptyarthatvāt, samutpādaśabdasya ca saṃbhavārtha tvāt, tāṃstān pratyayān pratītya samutpādaḥ prāpya saṃbhava ityeke 		gang zhig kha cig na re rten cing zhes bya ba'i nye bar bsgyur ba ni zlos pa'i don yin pa'i phyir dang 'brel pa zhes bya ba phrad pa'i don yin pa'i phyir dang 'byung ba zhes bya ba'i sgra ni skye ba'i don yin pa'i phyir rkyen de dang de la brten nas 'byung ba ste phrad nas 'byung ba'o zhe'o /
prati prati vināśināmutpādaḥ pratītyasamutpāda ityanye" /
iti paravyākhyānamanūdya dūṣaṇamabhidhatte, tasya parapakṣānuvādākauśalatvameva tāvatsaṃbhāvyate 		gzhan dag na re so so so sor 'jig pa dang ldan pa rnams kyi 'byung ba ni rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba'o zhe'o zhes gzhan gyi bshad pa rjes su brjod nas sun 'byin par byed pa de ni /
re zhig gzhan gyi phyogs rjes su brjod pa la mi mkhas pa nyid do snyam mo /
ci'i phyir zhe na /
kiṃ kāraṇam? yo hi prāptyarthaṃ pratītyaśabdaṃ vyācaṣṭe, nāsau pratiṃ vīpsārthaṃ vyācaṣṭe, nāpyetiṃ prāptyartham, kiṃ tarhi pratiṃ prāptyartham, samuditaṃ ca pratītyaśabdaṃ prāptāveva varṇayati gang zhig rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'i sgra phrad pa'i don can du 'chad pa des ni rten cing zhes bya ba zlos pa'i don du ma yin zhing 'brel par zhes bya ba phrad pa'i don du yang ma yin no /
'o na ci zhe na rten cing ni phrad pa'i don yin zhing /
'brel par 'gro ba'i don yin la /
tshogs pa rten cing 'brel ba'i sgra ni phrad pa nyid yin par 'chad par byed do /
tena idānīṃ prāpya saṃbhavaḥ pratītyasamutpāda ityevaṃ vyutpāditena pratītyasamutpādaśabdena yadi niravaśeṣasaṃbhavipadārthaparāmarśo vivakṣitaḥ, tadā tāṃ tāṃ hetupratyayasāmagrīṃ prāpya saṃbhava pratītya samutpāda iti vīpsāsaṃbandhaḥ kriyate des na da ni phrad nas 'byung ba ni rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'o zhes de ltar bshad par gyur pa'i rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'i sgras gal te dngos po srid tshad ma lus pa 'dzin par brjod par 'dod pa de'i tshe ni /
rgyu dang rkyen gyi tshogs pa de dang de phrad nas 'byung ba ni rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba'o zhes zlos pa dang 'brel par byed la /
atha viśeṣaparāmarśaḥ, tadā cakṣuḥ prāpya rūpāṇi ceti na vīpsāyāḥ saṃbandha iti 'on te bye brag 'dzin pa de'i tshe ni mig dang gzugs la brten nas zhes zlos pa dang 'brel pa ma yin no /
evaṃ tāvadanuvādākauśalamācāryasya /
etadvā ayuktam 		de ltar na re zhig slob dpon ni rjes su brjod pa la mi mkhas so /
kiṃ ca /
ayuktametat "cakṣuḥ pratītya rūpāṇi ca utpadyate cakṣurvijñānam" iti, atrārthadvayāsaṃbhavāt iti yaduktaṃ dūṣaṇam, tadapi nopapadyate 		de yang mi rung ste mig dang gzugs la brten nas mig gi rnam par shes pa 'byung zhes gsungs pa 'di la don gnyi ga med pa'i phyir ro zhes sun 'byin smras pa gang yin pa de yang mi 'thad do /
ci'i phyir zhe na /
kiṃ kāraṇam? kathamanenaiva tatprāpteḥ saṃbhava iti yuktyanupādānena pratijñāmātratvāt /
athāyamabhiprāyaḥ syāt arūpitvādvijñānasya cakṣuṣā prāptirnāsti, rūpiṇāmeva tatprāptidarśanāditi, etadapi na yuktam, 'prāptaphalo 'yaṃ bhikṣuḥ'; ityatrāpi prāptyabhyupagamāt /
prāpyaśabdasya ca apekṣyaśabdaparyāyatvāt 		ji ltar med ces bya ba'i rigs pa ma bkod pas /
dam bca' ba tsam yin pa'i phyir ro /
'on te rnam par shes pa ni gzugs can ma yin pa'i phyir mig dang phrad pa yod pa ma yin te /
gzugs can rnams kho na la de dang phrad pa mthong ba'i phyir ro snyam pa'i bsam pa 'di yin na ni /
de yang mi rigs te /
dge slong 'di ni 'bras bu thob pa yin no zhes bya ba 'di la phrad pa khas blangs pa'i phyir dang phrad nas zhes bya ba'i sgra yang ltos nas zhes bya ba'i sgra'i rnam grangs yin pa'i phyir dang rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba zhes bya ba'i sgra ni /
de dang de rten gang 'byung ba /
prāptyarthasyaiva ācāryāryanāgārjunena pratītyaśabdasya /
tattatprāpya yadutpannaṃ notpannaṃ tatsvabhāvataḥ 		rang gi dngos por de ma skyes /
zhes slob dpon klu sgrub kyis kyang phrad nas zhes bya ba'i don nyid du zhal gyis bzhes pa'i phyir ro /
ityabhyupagamāt /
tato dūṣaṇamapi nopapadyate ityapare 		des na skyon yang mi 'thad do zhes gzhan dag zer ro /
gang yang 'o na gang yin zhe na /
'di yod pas 'di 'byung la /
yaccāpi svamataṃ vyavasthāpitam /
"kiṃ tarhi, asmin sati idaṃ bhavati, asyotpādādidamutpadyate, iti idaṃpratyayatārthaḥ pratītyasamutpādārtha iti", tadapi nopapadyate, pratītyasamutpādaśabdayoḥ pratyekamarthaviśeṣānabhidhānāt, tadvyutpādasya ca vivakṣitatvāt 		'di skyes pa'i phyir 'di skye ba ste zhes bya ba rkyen 'di dang ldan pa nyid kyi don ni rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'i don to zhes rang gi lugs rnam par gzhag pa de yang 'thad pa ma yin te /
rten cing 'brel bar zhes bya ba dang 'byung ba zhes bya ba'i sgra gnyis re re la don gyi khyad par ma brjod pa'i phyir la de bye brag tu bshad pa yang brjod par 'dod pa'i phyir ro /
athāpi rūḍhiśabdaṃ pratītyasamutpādaśabdamabhyupetya araṇyetilakādivadevamucyate, tadapi nopapannam, avayavārthānugatasyaiva pratītyasamutpādasya ācāryeṇa ci ste yang dgon pa'i thig le zhes bya ba la sogs pa ltar rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba'i sgra ni gting tshugs pa'i sgrar khas blangs nas de skad du brjod do zhe na /
de yang mi 'thad de /
tattatprāpya yadutpannaṃ notpannaṃ tatsvabhāvataḥ rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'i sgra ni slob dpon gyis /
de dang de brten gang 'byung ba /
ityabhyupagamāt /
atha /
asminsatīdaṃ bhavati hrasve dīrghaṃ yathā sati /
iti vyākhyāyamānena nanu tadevābhyupagataṃ bhavati, hrasvaṃ pratītya, hrasvaṃ prāpya, hrasvamapekṣya dīrghaṃ bhavatīti /
tataśca yadeva dūṣyate tadevābhyupagamyate iti na yujyate 		rang gi dngos por de ma skyes /
zhes yan lag gi don dang rjes su 'brel pa nyid du zhal gyis bzhes pa'i phyir ro /
ci ste /
'di yod na ni 'di 'byung ste /
thung ngu yod na ring po bzhin /
zhes bya bas 'chad par byed pas ni thung ngu dang phrad cing thung ngu la brten te /
thung ngu la ltos nas ring par 'gyur ro zhes de nyid khas blangs par 'gyur ro /
de'i phyir gang zhig sun 'byin pa de nyid khas blangs par rigs pa ma yin no /
ityalaṃ prasaṅgena /
tadevaṃ hetupratyayāpekṣaṃ bhāvānāmutpādaṃ paridīpayatā bhagavatā ahetvekahetuviṣamahetusaṃbhūtatvaṃ svaparobhayakṛtatvaṃ ca bhāvānāṃ niṣiddhaṃ bhavati, tanniṣedhācca sāṃvṛtānāṃ padārthānāṃ yathāvasthitaṃ sāṃvṛtaṃ svarūpamudbhāvitaṃ bhavati 		shin tu spros pas chog go /
de'i phyir de ltar na 'dir bcom ldan 'das kyis dngos po rnams kyi 'byung ba rgyu dang rkyen la ltos pa yongs su gsal bar mdzad pa na /
dngos po rnams rgyu med pa nyid dang rgyu gcig pu nyid dang mi mthun pa'i rgyu las byung ba nyid dang rang dang gzhan dang gnyi gas byas pa nyid bkag par 'gyur la /
de dag bkag pas ni dngos po kun rdzob pa rnams kyi rang gi ngo bo kun rdzob pa ji ltar gnas pa bzhin gsungs par 'gyur ro /
sa evedānīṃ sāṃvṛtaḥ pratītyasamutpādaḥ svabhāvenānutpannatvād āryajñānāpekṣayā nāsminnirodho vidyate yāvannāsminnirgamo vidyate ityanirodhādibhiraṣṭābhirviśe ṣaṇairviśiṣyate /
yathā ca nirodhādayo na santi pratītyasamutpādasya tathā sakalaśāstreṇa pratipādayiṣyati /
anantaviśeṣaṇasaṃbhave 'pi pratītyasamutpādasya aṣṭānāmevopādānameṣāṃ prādhānyena vivādāṅgabhūtatvāt /
yathāvasthitapratītyasamutpādadarśane sati āryāṇāmabhidheyādilakṣaṇasya prapañcasya sarvathoparamāt, prapañcānāmupaśamo 'sminniti sa eva pratītyasamutpādaḥ prapaḥcopaśama ityucyate /
cittacaittānāṃ ca tasminnapravṛttau jḥānajḥeyavyavahāranivṛttau jātijarāmaraṇādiniravaśeṣopadravarahitatvāt śivaḥ /
yathābhihitaviśeṣaṇasya pratītyasamutpādasya deśanākriyayā īpsitatamatvāt karmaṇā nirdeśaḥ /
anirodhamanutpādamanucchedamaśāśvatam /
anekārthamanānārthamanāgamamanirgamam /
yaḥ pratītyasamutpādaṃ prapañcopaśamaṃ śivam /
deśayāmāsa saṃbuddhastaṃ vande vadatāṃ varam /
yathopavarṇitapratītyasamutpādāvagamācca tathāgatasyaivaikasyāviparītārthavāditvaṃ paśyan sarvaparapravādāṃśca bālapralāpānivāvetya atīva prasādānugata ācāryo bhūyo bhagavantaṃ viśeṣayati 		da ni rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba kun rdzob pa de nyid rang bzhin gyis ma skyes pa nyid kyi phyir 'phags pa'i ye shes la ltos nas 'di la 'gag pa yod pa ma yin pa nas /
'di la don gcig pu yod pa ma yin pa zhes bya ba'i bar 'gag pa med pa la sogs pa khyad par brgyad kyis khyad par du byed de /
'gag pas na 'gag pa ste /
skad cig mar 'jig pa la 'gag pa zhes brjod do /
skye bas na skye ba ste bdag nyid kyi dngos por red pa'o /
chad pas na chad pa ste rgyun chad pa zhes bya ba'i don to /
rtag pa na ther zug pa ste dus thams cad du gnas pa zhes bya ba'i don to /
'ong bas na 'ong ba ste yul ring po na gnas pa rnams yul nye bar 'ong ba'o /
'grogs na 'gro ba ste /
yul nye ba na gnas pa rnams yul ring por 'gro ba'o /
tha dad pa'i don ni don tha dad pa ste /
don so so bzhes bya ba'i tha tshig go /
don yang de yin la gcig kyang de yin pas na don gcig ste /
don tha mi dad cing so so ma yin zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go /
rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba la ji ltar 'gag pa la sogs pa med pa de ltar ni bstan bcos mtha' dag gis ston par 'gyur ro /
rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba la khyad par mtha' yas pa yod du zin kyang brgyad dag gcig kho na nye bar bkod pa ni 'di dag kho na gtsor rtsod pa'i yan lag tu gyur pa'i phyir ro /
rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba ji ltar gnas pa bzhin du 'phags pa rnams kyis gzigs na /
brjod bya dang rjod byed dang mtshan nyid dang mtshon bya la sogs pa'i spros pa rnams rnam pa thams cad du bzlog pa'i phyir /
'dir spros pa dag nye bar zhi bas rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba de nyid spros pa nyer zhi zhes bya'o /
'di la sems dang sems las byung ba'i 'jug pa yang med pa dang shes pa dang shes bya'i tha snyad log pa'i sgo nas skye ba dang rga ba dang na ba dang 'chi ba la sogs pa'i nye bar 'tshe ba ma lus pa dang bral ba'i phyir na zhi pa'o /
ji skad bstan pa'i khyad par can gyis rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba ni bstan par bya ba'i sgo nas 'dod pa dam pa yin pa'i phyir las su bstan te /
gang gis rten cing 'brel par 'byung /
'gag pa med pa skye med pa /
chad pa med pa rtag med pa /
'ong ba med pa 'gro med pa /
tha dad don min don gcig min /
spros pa nyer zhi zhi bstan pa /
rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas smra rnams kyi /
dam pa de la phyag 'tshal lo /
zhes bya ba'o /
rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba ji skad bstan pa thugs su chud pa'i phyir /
de bzhin gshegs pa nyag gcig don phyin ci ma log par gsung ba nyid du gzigs shing pha rol po'i smra ba thams cad byis pa rtol thabs smra ba dang 'dra bar thugs su chud de /
de nas slob dpon shin tu dad pa dang ldan par gyur pas slar yang bcom ldan 'das la khyad par du mdzad pa ni /
vadatāṃ varamiti /
atra ca nirodhasya pūrvaṃ prativedhaḥ utpādanirodhayoḥ paurvāparyāvasthāyāḥ siddhayabhāvaṃ dyotayitum 		smra rnams kyi dam pa zhes bya'o /
'dir 'gag pa sngar bkag pa ni skye ba dang 'gag pa dag la snga phyi'i rnam par gzhag pa med par bstan pa'i phyir te /
vakṣyati hi /
pūrvaṃ jātiryadi bhavejjarāmaraṇamuttaram 		gal te skye ba sngar gyur la /
rga shi phyi ma yin na ni /
skye ba rga shi med pa dang /
nirjarāmaraṇā jātirbhavejjāyeta cāmṛtaḥ /
iti 		ma shi bar yang skye bar 'gyur /
zhes 'chad par 'gyur ro /
tasmānnāyaṃ niyamo yat pūrvamutpādena bhavitavyaṃ paścānnirodheneti de'i phyir skye ba ni sngar 'gyur la /
rga shi ni phyis so zhes bya ba'i nges pa gang yin pa 'di med do /
idānīmanirodhādiviśiṣṭapratītyasamutpādapratipipādayiṣayā utpādapratiṣedhena nirodhādi pratiṣedhasaukarya manyamāna ācāryaḥ prathamamevotpādaprativedhamārabhate da ni slob dpon rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba 'gag pa med pa la sogs pas khyad par du 'phags par gyur pa bstan par bzhed nas /
skye ba bkag pas 'gag pa la sogs pa dgag pa sla bar dgongs shing thog mar skye ba dgag pa rtsom pa mdzad do /
utpādo hi paraiḥ parikalpyamānaḥ svato vā parikalpyeta, parataḥ, ubhayataḥ, ahetuto vā parikalpyeta skye ba yang gzhan gyis brtags pa na bdag gam gzhan nam gnyi ga 'am rgyu med pa zhig las rtog grang na /
thams cad du 'thad pa ma yin no snyam du nges par mdzad nas bshad pa /
sarvathā ca nopapadyata iti niścityāha bdag las ma yin gzhan las min /
gnyis las ma yin rgyu med min /
na svato nāpi parato na dvābhyāṃ nāpyahetutaḥ dngos po gang dag gang na yang /
skye ba nam yang yod ma yin /
utpannā jātu vidyante bhāvāḥ kvacana kecana de la gang dag ces bya ba'i sgra ni rten pa'i tshig ste /
tatra jātviti kadācidityarthaḥ su dag ces bya ba'i sgra'i rnam grangs so /
kvacanaśabda ādhāravacanaḥ kvacicchabdaparyāyaḥ kecanaśabda ādheyavacanaḥ kecicchabdaparyāyaḥ gang na yang zhes bya ba'i sgra ni rten gyi tshig ste /
'ga' zhig na yang zhes bya ba'i sgra'i rnam grangs so /
tataścaivaṃ saṃbandhaḥ /
naiva svata utpannā jātu vidyante bhāvāḥ, kvacana, kecana 		nam yang zhes bya ba ni gzhan yang zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go /
de'i phyir bdag las dngos po gang dag gang na yang skye ba nam yang yod pa ma yin no zhes de ltar sbyar bar bya'o /
evaṃ pratijñātrayamapi yojyam /
nanu ca /
naiva svata utpannā ityavadhāryamāṇe parata utpannā ityaniṣṭaṃ prāpnoti 		de bzhin du dam bca' ba gsum po la yang sbyar bar bya'o /
gal te bdag las skye ba ma yin pa nyid do zhes bya bar nges par gzung ba na /
na prāpnoti prasajyapratiṣedhasya vivakṣitatvāt, parato 'pyutpādasya pratiṣetsyamānatvāt gzhan las skye'o zhes mi 'dod pa nyid du 'gyur ba ma yin nam zhe na ma yin te /
med par dgag pa brjod par 'dod pa'i phyir dang gzhan las skye ba yang 'gog par 'gyur ba'i phyir ro /
yayā copapattyā svata utpādo na saṃbhavati, sā /
tasmāddhi tasya bhavane na guṇo 'sti kaścij 		'thad pa gang gis bdag las skye bar mi 'gyur ba de ni /
de las de ni 'byung na yon tan 'ga' yang yod ma yin /
jātasya janma punareva ca naiva yuktam skyes par gyur pa slar yang skye bar rigs pa 'ang ma yin nyid /
ityādinā madhyamakāvatārādidvāreṇāvaseyā ces bya ba la sogs pas dbu ma la 'jug pa la sogs pa'i sgo nas nges par bya'o /
ācāryabuddhapālitastvāha /
na svata utpadyante bhāvāḥ, tadutpādavaiyarthyāt, atiprasaṅgadoṣācca /
na hi svātmanā vidyamānānāṃ padārthānāṃ punarutpāde prayojanamasti 		slob dpon sangs rgyas bskyangs kyis kyang /
dngos po rnams bdag las skye ba med de /
de dag gi skye ba don med pa nyid du 'gyur ba'i phyir dang shin tu thal bar 'gyur ba'i phyir ro /
dngos po bdag gi bdag nyid du yod pa rnams la ni yang skye ba la dgos pa med do /
atha sannapi jāyeta, na kadācinna jāyeta iti ci ste yod kyang skye na nam yang mi skye bar mi 'gyur ro zhes gsungs so /
atraike dūṣaṇamāhuḥ /
tadayuktam, hetudṛṣṭāntānabhidhānātparoktadoṣāparihārācca 		'di la kha cig gis de ni rigs pa ma yin te /
gtan tshigs dang dpe ma brjod pa'i phyir dang gzhan gyis smras pa'i nyes pa ma bsal ba'i phyir ro /
prasaṅga vākyatvācca prakṛtārthaviparyayeṇa viparītārthasādhyataddharmavyaktau parasmādutpannābhāvājanmasāphalyāt janmaniro(bo?)dhācceti kṛtāntavirodhaḥ syāt /
sarvametaddūṣaṇamayujyamānaṃ vayaṃ paśyāmaḥ 		thal bar 'gyur ba'i tshig yin pa'i phyir skabs kyi don las bzlog pas bsgrub par bya ba dang de'i chos bzlog pa'i don mngon pas dngos po rnams gzhan las skye bar 'gyur ba dang skye ba 'bras bu dang bcas pa nyid du 'gyur ba dang skye ba thug pa yod par 'gyur pa'i phyir grub pa'i mtha' dang 'gal bar 'gyur ro zhes skyon smra ste /
kathaṃ kṛtvā? tatra yattāvaduktaṃ hetudṛṣṭāntānabhidhānāditi, tadayuktam skyon 'di dag thams cad ni rigs pa ma yin par kho bo cag gis mthong ngo /
ji ltar zhe na /
kiṃ kāraṇam? yasmātparaḥ svata utpattimabhyupagacchan, pṛcchayate /
svata iti hetutvena tadeva cotpadyate iti? na ca vidyamānasya punarutpattau prayojanaṃ paśyāmaḥ, anavasthāṃ ca paśyāmaḥ 		de la re zhig gtan tshigs dang dpe ma brjod pa'i phyir dang zhes gang smra ba de ni mi rigs so /
ci'i phyir zhe na /
gang gi phyir bdag las zhes bya ba ni yod pa rgyu nyid dang de nyid skye'o zhes smras pa yin la /
yod pa ni yang skye ba la dgos pa ma mthong zhing /
thug pa med par yang mthong la /
na ca tvayā utpannasya punarutpāda iṣyate 'navasthā cāpyaniṣṭeti khyod kyis skyes pa slar yang skye bar mi 'dod cing /
thug pa med par yang mi 'dod do /
tasmānnirupapattika eva tvadvādaḥ svābhyupagamavirodhaśceti /
kimiti codite paronābhyupaiti yato hetudṛṣṭāntopādānasāphalyaṃ syāt? atha svābhyupagamavirodhacodanayāpi paro na nivartate, tadā nirlajjatayā hetudṛṣṭāntābhyāmapi naiva nivarteta 		de'i phyir khyed cag gi rtsod pa ni 'thad pa dang bral ba dang rang gis khas blangs pa dang 'gal ba yin no zhes pha rol po bdag las skye bar 'dod pa la 'dri bar byed pa yin te /
gang las gtan tshigs dang dpe bkod pa 'bras bu dang bcas par 'gyur ba 'di dag tsam zhig gis brtsad pa na ci pha rol po khas len par mi byed dam /
'on te pha rol po rang gi khas blangs pa dang 'gal bas brtsad pas kyang mi ldog na ni /
de'i tshe ngo tsha med pa nyid kyis gtan tshigs dang dpe gnyis kyis kyang ldog par mi 'gyur ba nyid do /
na conmattakena sahāsmākaṃ vivāda iti kho bo cag ni smyon pa dang lhan cig rtsod pa yang ma yin no /
tasmātsarvathā priyānumānatāmevātmanaḥ ācāryaḥ prakaṭayati asthāne 'pyanumānaṃ praveśayan de'i phyir slob dpon ni gnas ma yin par yang rjes su dpag pa tshang bar byed pa na /
bdag nyid rjes su dpag pa la dga' ba nyid mngon par byed pa yin no /
na ca mādhyamikasya sataḥ svatantramanumānaṃ kartuṃ yuktaṃ pakṣāntarābhyupagamābhāvāt /
tathoktamāryadevena 		dbu ma pa yin na ni rang gi rgyud kyi rjes su dpag par bya ba rigs pa yang ma yin te /
phyogs gzhan khas blangs pa med pa'i phyir ro /
de skad du yang 'phags pa'i lhas /
sadasatsadasacceti yasya pakṣo na vidyate yod dang med dang yod med ces /
phyogs ni gang la 'ang yod min pa /
upālambhaścireṇāpi tasya vaktuṃ na śakyate de la yun ni ring po na'ang /
klan ka brjod par nus ma yin /
vigrahavyāvartanyāṃ coktam zhes bshad do /
rtsod pa bzlog pa las kyang /
yadi kācana pratijñā syānme tata eva me bhaveddoṣaḥ gal te ngas dam bcas 'ga' yod /
des na nga la skyon de yod /
nāsti ca mama pratijñā tasmānnaivāsti me doṣaḥ nga la dam bca' med pas na /
nga la skyon med kho na yin /
yadi kiṃcidupalameyaṃ pravartayeyaṃ nivartayeyaṃ vā gal te mngon sum la sogs pa'i /
don gyis 'ga' zhig dmigs na ni /
pratyakṣādibhirarthaistadabhāvānme 'nupālambhaḥ sgrub pa 'ang bzlog par bya na de /
med phyir nga la klan ka med /
iti /
yadā caivaṃ svatantrānumānānabhidhāyitvaṃ mādhyamikasya, tadā kutaḥ "nādhyātmikānyāyatanāni svata utpannāni" iti svatantrā pratijñā yasyāṃ sāṃkhyāḥ pratyavasthāpyante /
ko 'rya pratijñārthaḥ kiṃ kāryātmakatvātsvata uta kāraṇātmakatvāditi 		ces gsungs so /
gang gi tshe de ltar dbu ma pas rang gi rgyud kyi rjes su dpag pa mi brjod pa nyid yin par de'i tshe /
gang la grangs can pa dag gis /
dam bca' ba'i don 'di gang yin /
ci bdag las zhes bya ba 'bras bu'i bdag nyid las sam /
'on te rgyu'i bdag nyid las yin grang /
de las cir 'gyur /
gal te 'bras bu'i bdag nyid las yin na ni grub pa la sgrub pa yin la /
rgyu'i bdag nyid las yin na ni 'gal ba'i don nyid du 'gyur te /
kiṃ cātaḥ? kāryātmakāccet siddha sādhanam, kāraṇātmakāccet viruddhārthatā, kāraṇātmanā vidyamānasyaiva sarvasyotpattimata utpādāditi /
kuto 'smākaṃ vidyamānatvāditi heturyasya siddhasādhanaṃ viruddhārthatā vā syāt, yasya siddhasādhanasya yasyāśca viruddhārthatāyāḥ parihārārthaṃ yatnaṃ kariṣyāmaḥ /
tasmātparoktadoṣāprasaṅgādeva tatparihāraḥ ācāryabuddhapālitena na varṇanīyaḥ /
athāpi syāt /
mādhyamikānāṃ pakṣahetudṛṣṭāntānāmasiddheḥ svatantrānumānānabhidhāyitvāt svata utpattipratiṣedhapratijñātārthasādhanaṃ mā bhūdubhayasiddhena vānumānena parapratijñānirākaraṇam 		skye ba dang ldan pa thams cad ni rgyu'i bdag nyid du yod pa kho na skye ba'i phyir ro /
zhes bya bar gang la grangs can pa dag gis phyir zlog par byed par 'gyur la /
nang gi skye mched rnams dag las skye ba med de zhes bya ba'i rang gi rgyud kyi dam bca' ba lta ga la yod /
kho bo cag la ni gang zhig grub pa la sgrub pa nyid dam /
'gal ba'i don nyid du 'gyur zhing /
grub pa la sgrub pa nyid gang yin pa dang 'gal ba'i don nyid gang yin pa spang bar bya ba'i phyir 'bad pa byed par 'gyur ba yod pa'i phyir zhes bya ba'i gtan tshigs kyang ga la yod /
de'i phyir gzhan gyis smras pa'i nyes par thal bar mi 'gyur ba nyid kyi phyir slob dpon sangs rgyas bskyangs kyis de'i lan brjod par bya ba ma yin no /
ci ste yang dbu ma pa rnams kyi ltar na phyogs dang gtan tshigs dang dpe dag ma grub pas rang gi rgyud kyi rjes su dpag pa ma brjod pa nyid kyi phyir bdag las skye ba dgag pa'i dam bca' ba'i don sgrub pa dang gnyi ga la grub pa'i rjes su dpag pas gzhan gyi dam bca' bsal bar ma gyur mod /
parapratijñāyāstu svata evānumānavirodhacodanayā svata eva pakṣahetudṛṣṭāntadoṣarahitaiḥ pakṣādibhirbhavitavyam gzhan gyi dam bca' ba la rang gi rjes su dpag pas 'gal ba brjod par ni bya dgos pas /
rang nyid la phyogs la sogs pa dang gtan tshigs dpe'i skyon dang bral ba dag yod par bya dgos so /
tataśca tadanabhidhānāt taddoṣāparihārācca sa eva doṣa iti de'i phyir de ma brjod pa'i phyir dang de'i nyes pa ma bsal ba'i phyir nyes pa de nyid du 'gyur ro snyam na /
ucyate /
naitadevam /
kiṃ kāraṇam? yasmād yo hi yamarthaṃ pratijānīte, tena svaniścayavadanyeṣāṃ niścayotpādanecchayā yayā upapattyā asāvartho 'dhigataḥ saivopapattiḥ parasmai upadeṣṭavyā 		bshad par bya ste /
de ni de ltar ma yin no /
ci'i phyir zhe na /
gang gi phyir don gang zhig gang gis dam bcas pa des ni rang nyid kyis nges pa bzhin du gzhan dag la nges pa bskyed par 'dod pas /
don 'di'i 'thad pa gang gi sgo nas khong du chud pa'i 'thad pa de nyid gzhan la bsnyad par bya dgos so /
tasmādeṣa tāvannyāyaḥ /
yatpareṇaiva svābhyupagatapratijñātārthasādhanamupādeyam /
na cāyaṃ (cānena?) paraṃ prati 		de'i phyir rang gis khas blangs pa'i dam bcas pa'i don gyi sgrub par byed pa ni pha rol po kho nas nye bar dgod par bya ba gang yin pa 'di ni re zhig lugs ma yin no /
'di ni gzhan la gtan tshigs kyang ma yin no /
hetudṛṣṭāntāsaṃbhavāt pratijñānusāratayaiva kevalaṃ svapratijñātārthasādhanamupādatta iti nirupapattikapakṣābhyupagamāt svātmānamevāyaṃ kevalaṃ visaṃvādayan na śaknoti pareṣāṃ niścayamādhātumiti /
idamevāsya spaṣṭataraṃ dūṣaṇaṃ yaduta svapratijñātārthasādhanāsāmarthyamiti kimatrānumānabādhodbhāvanayā prayojanam? athāpyavaśyaṃ svato 'numānavirodhadoṣa udbhāvanīyaḥ, so 'pyudbhāvita evācāryabuddhapālitena 		gtan tshigs dang dpe med pa'i phyir rang gi dam bca' ba'i don gyi sgrub par byed pa ni khas 'ches pa'i rjes su 'brangs pa 'ba' zhig nye bar bkod pa yin te /
de'i phyir 'thad pa dang bral ba'i phyogs khas blangs pas 'di ni bdag nyid kho na la slu bar byed pas gzhan la nges pa bskyed par mi nus so /
zhes bya bar gang rang gi dam bca' ba'i don gyi sgrub par byed pa la nus pa med pa 'di nyid 'di'i sun 'byin pa ches gsal po yin te /
'dir rjes su dpag pas gnod pa brjod pa la dgos pa go ci zhig yod /
ci ste yang rang gi rjes su dpag pas 'gal ba gdon mi za bar brjod par bya ba yin no zhe na /
de yang slob dpon sangs rgyas bskyangs kyis brjod pa nyid yin no /
ji ltar zhe na /
gang gi phyir des ni 'di skad du bshad pa yin te /
dngos po rnams bdag las skye ba med de /
kathamiti cet, na svata utpadyante bhāvāḥ, tadutpādavaiyarthyāditi vacanāt, atra hi tadityanena svātmanā vidyamānasya parāmarśaḥ de dag gi skye ba don med pa nyid du 'gyur ba'i phyir dang zhes bshad pa'i phyir ro /
de la de dag ces bya ba 'dis ni rang gi bdag nyid du yod pa 'dzin pa yin no /
kasmāditi cet, tathā hi tasya saṃgraheṇoktavākyasyaitadvivaraṇavākyam, na hi svātmanā vidyamānānāṃ punarutpāde prayojanamiti /
anena ca vākyena sādhyasādhanadharmānugatasya paraprasiddhasya sādharmyadṛṣṭāntasyopādānam /
tatra svātmanā vidyamānasyetyanena hetuparāmarśaḥ 		ci'i phyir zhe na /
'di ltar rang gi bdag nyid du yod pa dag la ni yang skye ba la dgos pa med do zhes bya ba 'di ni mdor bzhag pa'i ngag de'i 'grel pa'i ngag yin la ngag 'dis ni chos mthun pa'i dpe gzhan la rab tu grags pa bsgrub par bya ba dang sgrub par byed pa'i chos dang ldan pa nye bar gzung ba yin no /
de la rang gi bdag nyid du yod pa zhes bya ba 'dis ni gtan tshigs 'dzin pa yin no /
utpādavayarthyādityanena sādhyadharmaparāmarśaḥ /
tatra yathā /
anityaḥ śabdaḥ kṛtakatvāt 		skye ba don med pa nyid du 'gyur ba'i phyir dang zhes bya ba 'dis ni bsgrub par bya ba'i chos 'dzin pa yin no /
de la ji ltar sgra mi rtag ste /
byas pa mi rtag pa'i phyir ro /
kṛtakatvamanityaṃ dṛṣṭaṃ yathā ghaṭaḥ /
tathā ca kṛtakaḥ śabdaḥ 		byas pa ni mi rtag par mthong ste /
dper na bum pa bzhin no /
de bzhin du sgra yang byas pa yin te /
tasmātkṛtakatvādanitya iti kṛtakatvamatra upanayābhivyakto hetuḥ de'i phyir byas pa nyid kyi phyir mi rtag pa yin no zhes 'dir nye bar sbyar bas gsal bar byas pa'i byas pa gtan tshigs yin pa de bzhin du /
evamihāpi /
na svata utpadyante bhāvāḥ, svātmanā vidyamānānāṃ punarutpādavaiyarthyāt /
iha hi svātmanā vidyamānaṃ puro 'vasthitaṃ ghaṭādikaṃ punarutpādānapekṣaṃ dṛṣṭam, tathā ca mṛtpiṇḍādyavasthāyāmapi yadi svātmanā vidyamānaṃ ghaṭādikamiti manyase, tadāpi tasya svātmanā vidyamānasya nāstyutpāda iti /
evaṃ svātmanā vidyamānatvena upanayābhivyaktena punarutpādapratiṣedhāvyabhicāriṇā hetunā svata eva sāṃkhyasyānumānavirodhodbhāvanamanuṣṭhitameveti 		'dir yang dngos po rnams bdag las skye ba med de /
rang gi bdag nyid du yod pa la yang skye ba don med pa nyid du 'gyur ba'i phyir ro /
'di na ji ltar bum pa la sogs pa mdun na gnas shing gsal ba rang gi bdag nyid du yod pa ni yang skye ba la mi ltos par mthong ba de bzhin du /
'jim pa'i gong bu la sogs pa'i gnas skabs na yang gal te rang gi bdag nyid du yod pa'i bum pa la sogs pa yod do snyam du sems na ni de'i tshe yang rang gi bdag nyid du yod pa de la skye ba yod pa ma yin no /
de ltar na gtan tshigs nye bar sbyar bas gsal bar byas pa /
yang skye ba dgag pa la mi 'khrul pa /
rang gi bdag nyid du yod pa nyid kyis grangs can la rang nyid kyis rjes su dpag pas 'gal ba brjod pa mdzad pa yin te /
tatkimucyate tadayuktaṃ hetudṛṣṭāntānabhidhānāditi? des na de ni rigs pa ma yin te /
gtan tshigs dang dpe ma brjod pa'i phyir dang zhes ci ste rjod par byed /
na ca kevalaṃ hetudṛṣṭāntānabhidhānaṃ na saṃbhavati, paroktadoṣāparihāradoṣo na saṃbhavati gtan tshigs dang dpe ma brjod pa ma yin pa 'ga' zhig tu ma zad kyi /
gzhan gyis smras pa'i nyes pa ma bsal ba yang ma yin no /
kathaṃ kṛtvā? sāṃkhyā hi naiva abhivyaktarūpasya puro 'vasthitasya ghaṭasya punarabhivyaktimicchanti /
tasyaiva ca iha dṛṣṭāntatvenopādānam, siddharūpatvāt /
anabhivyaktarūpasya ca śaktirūpāpannasya utpattipratiṣedhaviśiṣṭasādhyatvāt kutaḥ siddhasādhanapakṣadoṣāśaṅkā, kuto vā hetorviruddhārthatāśaṅketi 		ci ltar zhe na /
grangs can pa dag mdun na gnas pa'i bum pa mngon par gsal ba'i rang bzhin can ni yang mngon par gsal bar mi 'dod cing /
de nyid 'dir dpe nyid du grub pa'i ngo bo yin pa'i phyir la /
nus pa'i ngo bor gyur cing mngon par gsal ba'i rang bzhin ma yin pa skye ba bkag pas khyad par du byas pa ni bsgrub par bya ba yin pa nyid kyi phyir grub pa la sgrub pa'i phyogs kyi skyon nyid du dogs pa 'am /
gtan tshigs 'gal ba'i don nyid du dogs pa ga la yod /
tasmātsvato 'numānavirodhacodanāyāmapi yathopavarṇitadoṣābhāvātparoktadoṣāparihārāsaṃbhava eva de'i phyir rang gi rjes su dpag pas 'gal ba brjod pa na yang ji skad smras pa'i nyes pa brjod pa med pa'i phyir /
gzhan gyis smras pa'i nyes pa ma bsal ba med pa nyid de /
ityasaṃbaddhamevaitaddūṣaṇamiti vijñeyam de'i phyir sun 'byin pa 'di dag ni 'brel pa med pa nyid do zhes shes par bya'o /
ghaṭādikamityādiśabdena niravaśeṣotpitsupadārthasaṃgrahasya vivakṣitatvādanaikāntikatāpi paiṭādibhirnaiva saṃbhavati bum pa la sogs pa zhes bya ba sogs pa'i sgras ni skye bar 'dod pa'i dngos po ma lus pa bsdu bar 'dod pa'i phyir snam bu la sogs pa dag gis ma nges par 'gyur ba yang ma yin no /
athavā /
ayamanyaḥ prayogamārgaḥ 		yang na sbyor ba 'di ni tshul gzhan yin te /
puruṣavyatiriktāḥ padārthāḥ svata utpattivādinaḥ /
tata eva na svata utpadyante /
svātmanā vidyamānatvāt 		rang las skye bar smra ba'i skyes bu las tha dad pa'i don rnams ni bdag nyid las skye ba med de /
rang gi bdag nyid du yod pa'i phyir /
puruṣavat /
itīdamudāharaṇamudāhāryam /
yadyapi ca abhivyaktivādina utpādapratiṣedho na bādhakaḥ, tathāpi abhivyaktāvutpādaśabdaṃ nipātya pūrvaṃ paścācca anupalabdhyupalabdhisādharmyeṇa utpādaśabdenābhivyakterevābhidhānādayaṃ pratiṣedho na abādhakaḥ /
kathaṃ punarayaṃ yathoktārthābhidhānaṃ vinā vyastavicāro labhyata iti cet, taducyate 		skyes bu bzhin no zhes dper brjod pa 'di nyid dper brjod par bya'o /
gal te yang skye ba bkag pas mngon par gsal bar smra ba la gnod par byed pa ma yin pa de lta na yang skye ba'i sgra mngon par gsal ba la btags nas sngon dang phyi mar ma dmigs pa dang dmigs par chos mthun pas skye ba'i sgras mngon par gsal ba nyid brjod pa'i phyir /
'di bkag pas gnod par byed pa ma yin no /
yang ji skad smras pa'i don gyi rjod par byed pa med par rnam par dpyod pa 'di lta bu 'di ji ltar rnyed ce na /
atha vākyāni kṛtāni, tāni mahārthatvādyathoditamarthaṃ saṃgṛhya pravṛttāni bshad par bya ste /
don gyi ngag 'di dag ni don chen po can yin pas ji skad smras pa'i don bsdus nas 'jug pa yin la /
tāni ca vyākhyāyamānāni yathoktamarthātmānaṃ prasūyanta iti nātra kiṃcidanupāttaṃ saṃbhāvyate de dag kyang bshad na ji skad smras pa'i don gyi bdag nyid 'byin par byed pa yin pas /
'dir ma bstan pa cung zad kyang mi srid do /
prasaṅgaviparītena cārthena parasyaiva saṃbandho nāsmākam thal bar 'gyur ba bzlog pa'i don dang yang pha rol po nyid 'brel pa yin gyi /
kho bo cag ni ma yin te /
svapratijñāyā abhāvāt rang la dam bca' ba med pa'i phyir ro /
tataśca siddhāntavirodhāsaṃbhavaḥ de'i phyir kho bo cag la grub pa'i mtha' dang 'gal ba ga la yod /
parasya ca yāvadbahavo doṣāḥ prasaṅgaviparītāpattyā āpadyante, tāvadasmābhirabhīṣyata eveti thal ba las bzlog pa bsgrubs pas pha rol po la nyes pa mang po ci tsam du 'gyur ba de tsam kho bo cag mngon par 'dod pa kho na yin pas /
kuto nu khalu aviparītācāryanāgārjunamatānusāriṇaḥ ācāryabuddhapālitasya sāvakāśavacanābhidhāyitvam, yato 'sya paro 'vakāśaṃ labheta? niḥsvabhāvabhāvavādinā sasvabhāvabhāvavādinaḥ prasaṅge āpa(pā?)dyamāne kutaḥ prasaṅgaviparītārthaprasaṅgitā? na hi śabdāḥ dāṇḍapāśikā iva vaktāramasvatantrayanti, kiṃ tarhi satyāṃ śaktau vakturvivakṣāmanuvidhīyante gang las 'di la gzhan gyis glags rnyed par 'gyur ba slob dpon klu sgrub kyi lugs phyin ci ma log pa'i rjes su 'brang ba slob dpon sangs rgyas bskyangs la glags dang bcas pa'i tshig gsung pa nyid ga la yod /
rang bzhin med par smra bas rang bzhin dang bcas par smra ba la thal ba bsgrubs pa na thal ba las bzlog pa'i don can du thal bar ga la 'gyur te /
sgra rnams ni dbyug pa dang zhags pa can bzhin du smra ba po rang dbang med par byed pa ma yin no /
tataśca parapratijñāpratiṣedhamātraphalatvātprasaṅgāpādanasya nāsti prasaṅgaviparītārthāpattiḥ 'o na ci zhe na nus pa yod na smra ba po'i brjod par 'dod pa'i rjes su byed pa yin no /
de'i phyir thal ba sgrub pa ni pha rol po'i dam bca' la 'gog pa tsam gyi 'bras bu can yin pa'i phyir thal ba las /
tathā ca ācāryo bhūyasā prasaṅgāpattimukhenaiva parapakṣaṃ nirākaroti sma zlog pa'i don du 'gyur ba yod pa ma yin no /
de ltar yang slob dpon ni /
tadyathā /
nākāśaṃ vidyate kiṃcitpūrvamākāśalakṣaṇāt 		nam mkha'i mtshan nyid snga rol na /
nam mkha' cung zad yod ma yin /
alakṣaṇaṃ prasajyeta syātpūrvaṃ yadi lakṣaṇāt gal te mtshan las sngar gyur na /
mtshan nyid med par thal bar 'gyur /
rūpakāraṇanirmukte rūpe rūpaṃ prasajyate /
āhetukaṃ na cāstyarthaḥ kaścidāhetukaḥ kvacit 		zhes bya ba dang de bzhin du /
gzugs kyi rgyu ni ma gtogs par /
gzugs ni gzugs kyi rgyu med par /
thal bar 'gyur te don gang yang /
rgyu med pa ni gang na'ang med /
ces bya ba dang /
bhāvastāvanna nirvāṇaṃ jarāmaraṇalakṣaṇam de bzhin du /
mya ngan 'das pa dngos po min /
prasajyetāsti bhāvo hi na jarāmaraṇaṃ vinā rga shi'i mtshan nyid thal bar 'gyur /
rga dang 'chi ba med pa yin /
ityādinā /
atha arthavākyatvādācāryavākyānāṃ mahārthatve sati anekaprayoniṣpattihetutvaṃ parikalpyate, ācāryabuddhapālitavyākhyānānyapi kimiti na tathaiva parikalpyante? /
atha syāt 		dngos po yod pa ma yin no /
zhes bya ba la sogs pas phal cher thal ba sgrub pa kho na'i sgo nas gzhan gyi phyogs sel bar mdzad do /
ci skye slob dpon gyi ngag rnams ni don gyi ngag yin pa'i phyir don chen po nyid yin pas sbyor ba du ma'i rgyu nyid du rtogs na ni /
vṛttikārāṇāmeṣa nyāyaḥ, yatprayogavākyavistarābhidhānaṃ kartavyamiti, etadapi nāsti, vigrahavyāvartanyā vṛttiṃ kurvatāpyācāryeṇa prayogavākyānabhidhānāt slob dpon sangs rgyas bskyangs kyi ngag dag kyang ci'i phyir de ltar yongs su mi rtog /
'on te sbyor ba'i ngag rgyas par rjod par byed pa gang yin pa 'di ni 'grel pa mkhan po rnams kyi lugs yin no zhe na /
api ca /
ātmanastarkaśāstrātikauśalamātramāviścikīrṣayā aṅgīkṛtamadhyamakadarśanasyāpi yatsvatantraprayogavākyābhidhānaṃ tadatitarāmanekadoṣasamudāyāspadamasya tārkikasyopalakṣyate 		de yang yod pa ma yin te /
rtsod pa bzlog pa'i 'grel pa mdzad pa na /
slob dpon gyis kyang sbyor ba'i ngag ma gsungs pa'i phyir ro /
gzhan yang rtog ge ba 'dis bdag nyid rtog ge'i bstan bcos la shin tu mkhas pa tsam zhig bstan par 'dod pas /
dbu ma pa'i lta ba khas len bzhin du yang rang rgyud kyi sbyor ba'i ngag brjod pa gang yin pa de ni ches shin tu nyes pa du ma'i tshogs kyi gnas su rtogs te /
kathaṃ kṛtvā? tatra yattāvadevamuktam /
atra prayogavākyaṃ bhavati 		ji ltar zhe na /
de la re zhig gang 'di skad du 'dir sbyor ba'i tshig tu 'gyur ba ni /
na paramārthataḥ ādhyātmikānyāyatanāni svata utpannāni, vidyamānatvāt, caitanyavaditi /
kimartha punaratra paramārthata iti viśeṣaṇamupādīyate? lokasaṃvṛtyābhyupagatasya utpādasya apratiṣidhyamānatvāt, pratiṣedhe ca abhyupetabādhāprasaṅgāditi cet, naitadyuktam /
saṃvṛtyāpi svata utpattyanabhyupagamāt 		don dam par na nang gi skye mched rnams bdag las skye ba med par nges te /
yod pa'i phyir dper na shes pa yod pa nyid bzhin no zhes smras pa yin no /
'dir don dam pa zhes bya ba'i khyad par ci'i phyir nye bar bkod pa yin /
gal te 'jig rten gyi kun rdzob tu skye bar khas blangs pa dgag par bya ba ma yin pa'i phyir dang 'gog na yang khas blangs pas gnod par thal bar 'gyur ba'i phyir ro zhe na /
yathoktaṃ sūtre 'di ni rigs pa ma yin te /
"sa cāyaṃ bījahetuko 'ṅkura utpadyamāno na svayaṃkṛto na parakṛto nobhayakṛto nāpyahetusamutpanno niśvarakālāṇuprakṛtisvabhāvasaṃbhūtaḥ" iti bdag las skye ba ni kun rdzob tu yang khas ma blangs pa'i phyir ro /
ji skad du mdo las sa bon gyi rgyu las byung ba'i myu gu de yang skye ba na /
bdag gis ma byas /
gzhan gyis ma byas /
tathā /
bījasya sato yathāṅkuro na ca yo bīju sa caiva aṅkuro /
na ca anyu tato na caiva tadevamanucchedaaśāśvatadharmatā /
ihāpi vakṣyati /
pratītya yadyadbhavati na hi tāvattadeva tat /
na cānyadapi tattasmānnocchinnaṃ nāpi śāśvatam 		gnyi gas ma byas /
dbang phyug gis ma byas /
dus kyis ma bsgyur /
rdul phra rab las ma byung /
rang bzhin las ma byung /
ngo bo nyid las ma byung /
rgyu med pa las ma skyes zhes gsungs pa dang de bzhin du /
sa bon yod na myu gu ji bzhin te /
sa bon gang yin myu gu de nyid min /
de las gzhan min de yang ma yin te /
de ltar rtag min chad min chos nyid do /
zhes gsungs pa dang 'di nyid las kyang /
gang la brten te gang 'byung ba /
de ni re zhig de nyid min /
de las gzhan pa 'ang ma yin te /
de phyir chad min rtag ma yin /
iti /
paramatāpekṣaṃ viśeṣaṇamiti cet, tadayuktam 		zhes 'chad do /
gzhan gyi lugs la ltos te khyad par du byas so zhe na /
de yang rigs pa ma yin te /
saṃvṛtyāpi tadīyavyavasthānabhyupagamāt /
satyadvayāviparītadarśanaparibhraṣṭā eva hi tīrthikā yāvadubhayathāpi niṣidhyante tāvad guṇa eva saṃbhāvyata iti 		de dag gi rnam par gzhag pa ni kun rdzob tu yang khas blangs pa med pa'i phyir ro /
bden pa gnyis phyin ci ma log par mthong ba las nyams pa'i mu stegs pa dag ji srid du gnyi ga'i sgo nas 'gog pa de srid du yon tan nyid yin par rtogs so /
evaṃ paramatāpekṣamapi viśeṣaṇābhidhānaṃ na yujyate de ltar na gzhan gyi gzhung la ltos te khyad par brjod pa yang rigs pa ma yin no /
na cāpi lokaḥ svatautpattiṃ pratipannaḥ, yatastadapekṣayāpi viśeṣaṇasāphalyaṃ syāt gang las de la ltos nas kyang khyad par 'bras bu dang bcas par 'gyur ba 'jig rten las kyang bdag las skye bar mi rtogs te /
loko hi svataḥ parata ityevamādikaṃ vicāramanavatārya kāraṇātkāryamutpadyate ityetāvanmātraṃ pratipannaḥ 'jig rten pas ni bdag dang gzhan las zhes bya ba de lta bu la sogs pa'i rnam par spyod pa 'jug pa med par byas nas /
rgyu las 'bras bu 'byung ngo zhes bya ba 'di tsam zhig rtogs pa yin no /
evamācāryo 'pi vyavasthāpayāmāsa slob dpon yang de ltar rnam par gzhag pa mdzad pa yin te /
iti sarvathā viśeṣaṇavaiphalyameva niścīyate /
api ca 		de'i phyir rnam pa thams cad du khyad par don med pa nyid do zhes bya bar nges so /
yadi saṃvṛtyā utpattipratiṣedhanirācikīrṣuṇā viśeṣaṇametadupādīyate, tadā svato 'siddhādhāre pakṣadoṣaḥ, āśrayāsiddhau vā hetudoṣaḥ syāt gzhan yang gal te kun rdzob tu skye ba dgag par 'dod nas khyad par 'di 'god par byed na ni de'i tshe /
rang la gzhi ma grub pa'i phyogs kyi nyes pa'am /
gzhi ma grub pa'i gtan tshigs kyi skyon du 'gyur te /
rang gis don dam par mig la sogs pa'i skye mched rnams khas ma blangs pa'i phyir ro /
paramārthataḥ svataścakṣurādyāyatanānāmanabhyupagamāt /
saṃvṛtyā cakṣurādisadbhāvādadoṣa iti cet, paramārthata ityetattarhi kasya viśeṣaṇam? sāṃvṛtānāṃ cakṣurādīnāṃ paramārthata utpattipratiṣedhād utpattipratiṣedhaviśeṣaṇe paramārthagrahaṇamiti cet, evaṃ tarhi evameva vaktavyaṃ syāt /
sāṃvṛtānāṃ cakṣurādīnāṃ paramārthato nāstyutpattiriti /
na caivamucyate 		gal te kun rdzob tu mig la sogs pa yod pa'i phyir nyes pa med do zhe na /
'o na don dam par zhes bya ba 'di gang gi khyad par yin /
gal te mig la sogs pa kun rdzob pa rnams don dam par skye ba 'gog pa'i phyir /
don dam pa smos pa ni skye ba 'gog pa'i khyad par yin no zhe na /
de lta na ni 'on mig la sogs pa kun rdzob pa rnams don dam par skye ba yod pa ma yin te zhes de skad brjod par bya bar 'gyur na /
de skad du yang ma smras so /
ucyamāne 'pi parairvastusatāmeva cakṣurādīnāmabhyupagamāt, prajñaptisatāmanabhyupagamāt parato 'siddhādhāraḥ pakṣadoṣaḥ syāditi na yuktametat smra na yang pha rol po dag gis mig la sogs pa rnams rdzas su yod pa nyid du khas blangs pa'i phyir dang brtags par yod par khas ma blangs pa'i phyir /
atha syāt /
yathā anityaḥ śabda iti dharmadharmisāmānyameva gṛhyate na viśeṣaḥ, viśeṣagrahaṇe hi sati anumānānumeyavyavahārābhāvaḥ syāt 		gzhan la gzhi ma grub pa'i phyogs kyi skyon du 'gyur bas 'di ni mi rigs so /
ci ste ji ltar sgra mi rtag ces bya ba la chos dang chos can gnyis spyi nyid gzung ba yin gyi /
tathā hi /
yadi cāturmahābhautikaḥ śabdo gṛhyate, sa parasyāsiddhaḥ /
athākāśaguṇo gṛhyate, sa bauddhasya svato 'siddhaḥ /
tathā vaiśeṣikasya śabdānityatāṃ pratijānānasya yadi kāryaḥ śabdo gṛhyate, sa parato 'siddhaḥ 		khyad par ni ma yin te /
khyad par 'dzin na ni rjes su dpag pa dang rjes su dpag par bya ba'i tha snyad med par 'gyur ro /
'di ltar gal te 'byung ba chen po bzhi las gyur pa'i sgra 'dzin na ni de pha rol po la ma grub po /
'on te nam mkha'i yon tan 'dzin na ni de rang nyid sangs rgyas pa la ma grub pa yin no /
de bzhin du bye brag pa sgra mi rtag par dam 'cha' ba na yang /
byas pa'i sgra 'dzin na de gzhan la ma grub po /
atha vyaṅgayaḥ, sa svato 'siddhaḥ 'on te mngon par gsal bar byas pa yin na ni de rang la ma grub pa yin no /
evaṃ yathāsaṃbhavaṃ vināśo 'pi yadi sahetukaḥ, sa bauddhasya svato 'siddhaḥ de bzhin du ci rigs par 'jig pa yang gal te rgyu dang bcas pa yin na ni /
de sangs rgyas pa rang la ma grub pa yin la /
atha nirhetukaḥ, sa parasyāsiddha iti /
tasmād yathātra dharmadharmisāmānyamātrameva gṛhyate, evamihāpi dharmimātramutsṛṣṭaviśeṣaṇaṃ grahīṣyata iti cet, naitadevam 		'on te rgyu med pa yin na ni de pha rol po la ma grub pa yin no /
de'i phyir ji ltar 'dir chos dang chos can spyi tsam zhig 'dzin pa de bzhin du /
'dir yang khyad par dor ba'i chos can tsam zhig 'dzin par 'gyur ro zhe na /
yasmād yadaivotpādapratiṣedho 'tra sādhyadharmo 'bhipretaḥ, tadaiva dharmiṇastadādhārasya viparyāsamātrāsāditātmabhāvasya pracyutiḥ svayamevānenāṅgīkṛtā de ni de ltar yang ma yin te /
'di ltar gang gi tshe 'dir skye ba bkag pa bsgrub par bya ba'i chos su 'dod pa'i de'i tshe de kho nar de'i rten chos can phyin ci log tsam gyis bdag gi dngos po rnyed pa ni nyams par 'gyur bar 'dis rang nyid kyis khas blangs pa nyid do /
bhinnau hi viparyāsāviparyāsau /
tadyadā viparyāsena asatsattvena gṛhyate, taimirikeṇeva keśādi, tadā kutaḥ sadbhūtapadārthaleśasyāpyupalabdhiḥ? yadā ca aviparyāsādabhūtaṃ nādhyāropitaṃ vitaimirikeṇeva keśādi, tadā kuto 'sadbhūtapadārthaleśasyāpyupalabdhiḥ, yena tadānīṃ saṃvṛtiḥ syāt? ata evoktamācāryapādaiḥ 		phyin ci log dang phyin ci ma log pa dag ni tha dad pa yin no /
de'i phyir /
gang gi tshe rab rib can gyis skra shad la sogs pa ltar phyin ci log gis yod pa ma yin pa yod pa nyid du 'dzin pa de'i tshe ni yod par gyur pa'i don cha tsam yang dmigs par ga la 'gyur /
gang gi tshe rab rib can ma yin pas skra shad la sogs pa ltar phyin ci ma log pas yang dag pa ma yin pa sgro mi 'dogs pa de'i tshe na yang gang gis na de'i tshe na kun rdzob tu 'gyur ba yod pa ma yin par gyur pa'i don cha tsam yang dmigs pa ga la yod /
de nyid kyi phyir slob dpon gyi zhal snga nas kyang /
yadi kiṃcidupalameyaṃ pravartayeyaṃ nivartayeyaṃ vā gal te mngon sum la sogs pa'i /
don gyis 'ga' zhig dmigs na ni /
pratyakṣādibhirarthaistadabhāvānme 'nupālambhaḥ sgrub par ma bzlog par bya na de /
med phyir nga la klan ka med /
iti /
yataścaivaṃ bhinnau viparyāsāviparyāsau, ato viduṣāmaviparītāvasthāyāṃ viparītasyāsaṃbhavātkutaḥ sāṃvṛtaṃ cakṣuḥ yasya dharmitvaṃ syāt? iti na vyāvartate 'siddhādhāre pakṣadoṣaḥ, āśrayāsiddho vā hetudoṣaḥ 		ces gsungs so /
gang gi phyir de ltar phyin ci log pa dang phyin ci ma log pa dag tha dad pa de'i phyir phyin ci ma log pa'i gnas skabs na phyin ci log yod pa ma yin pa'i phyir na /
gang zhig chos can nyid du 'gyur ba mig kun rdzob pa lta ga la yod /
ityaparihāra evāyam /
nidarśanasyāpi nāsti sāmyam /
tatra hi śabdasāmānyamanityatāsāmānyaṃ ca avivakṣitaviśeṣaṃ dvayorapi saṃvidyate /
na tvevaṃ cakṣuḥ sāmānyaṃ śūnyatāśūnyatāvādibhyāṃ saṃvṛtyā aṅgīkṛtaṃ nāpi paramārthataḥ 		de'i phyir gzhi ma grub pa'i phyogs kyi skyon dang gzhi ma grub pa'i gtan tshigs kyi skyon ldog pa med pa nyid pas 'di lan ma yin pa nyid do /
dpe la yang 'dra ba yod pa ma yin no /
der ni sgra'i spyi dang mi rtag pa nyid kyi spyi khyad par brjod par mi 'dod pa gnyi ga la yang yod na /
da bzhin du mig gi spyi ni stong pa nyid dang stong pa nyid ma yin par smra ba dag gis kun rdzob tu yang khas ma blangs la /
iti nāsti nidarśanasya sāmyam don dam par yang ma yin pas dpe la yang 'dra ba yod pa ma yin no /
yaścāyamasiddhādhārapakṣadoṣodbhāvane vidhiḥ, eṣa eva sattvādityasya hetorasiddhārthatodbhāvane 'pi yojyaḥ gzhi ma grub pa'i phyogs kyi nyes pa brjod pa'i tshul gang yin pa 'di nyid ni /
yod pa'i phyir zhes bya ba'i gtan tshigs 'di la ma grub pa'i skyon brjod pa la yang sbyar bar bya'o /
itthaṃ caitadevam, yatsvayamaṣyanenāyaṃ yathokto 'rtho 'bhyupagatastārkikeṇa de lta bu de ni 'di ltar yin te /
gang gi phyir ji skad bsnyad pa'i don 'di ni rtog ge ba 'dis rang nyid kyis khas blangs pa yin no /
ji ltar zhe na /
santyevādhyātmikāyatanotpādakā hetvādayaḥ, tathā tathāgatena nirdeśāt nang gi skye mched rnams skyed par byed pa rgyu la sogs pa ni yod pa 'o na yin te /
de ltar de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs pa'i phyir ro /
yaddhi yathā tathāgatenāsti nirdiṣṭaṃ tattathā, tadyathā śāntaṃ nirvāṇamiti /
asya paropakṣiptasya sādhanasyedaṃ dūṣaṇamabhihitamanena 		gang de bzhin gshegs pas ji skad gsungs pa de ni de bzhin te /
dper na mya ngan las 'das pa ni zhi ba'o zhes bya ba bzhin no zhes bya ba gzhan gyis bkod pa'i sgrub byed 'di la /
ko hi bhavatāmabhipreto 'tra hetvarthaḥ? saṃvṛtyā tathā tathāgatena nirdeśāt, uta paramārthata iti? saṃvṛtyā cet, svato hetorasiddhārthatā 'dir khyod kyi gtan tshigs kyi don du 'dod pa gang yin de bzhin gshegs pas kun rdzob tu de skad gsungs pa'i phyir ram /
'on te don dam par gsungs pa'i phyir /
gal te kun rdzob tu yin na ni rang la gtan tshigs kyi don ma grub pa nyid do /
paramārthataścet, 'on te don dam par ni /
na sannāsanna sadasaddharmo nirvartate yadā gang tshe chos ni yod pa dang /
med dang yod med mi 'grub pas /
sadasadubhayātmakakāryapratyayatvanirākaraṇāt, tadā de'i tshe 'bras bu yod pa dang med pa dang gnyi ga'i bdag nyid kyi rkyen bsal ba'i phyir /
kathaṃ nirvartako heturevaṃ sati hi yujyate ji ltar sgrub byed rgyu zhes bya /
de lta yin na mi rigs so /
naivāsau nirvartako heturiti vākyārthaḥ de ni sgrub par byed pa'i rgyu ma yin pa kho na'o zhes bya ba ni dag gi don to /
tataśca paramārthato nirvartyanirvartakatvāsiddheḥ asiddhārthatā viruddhārthatā vā hetoriti de'i phyir don dam par bsgrub par bya ba dang sgrub par byed pa nyid ma grub pa'i phyir /
gtan tshigs ma grub pa'i don nyid dang 'gal ba'i don nyid do zhes 'dis skyon 'di smras pa yin no /
yataścaivaṃ svayamevāmunā nyāyena hetorasiddhiraṅgīkṛtānena, tasmātsarveṣvevānumāneṣu vastu dharmopanyastahetukeṣu svata evaṃ hetvādīnāmasiddhatvāt sarvāṇyeva sādhanāni vyāhanyante gang gi phyir de ltar 'dis rang nyid kyi tshul 'dis gtan tshigs ma grub par khas blangs pa de'i phyir /
dngos po'i chos gtan tshigs su bkod pa'i rjes su dpag pa thams cad la gtan tshigs la sogs par rang la ma grub pa'i phyir sgrub par byed pa thams cad rnam par 'jig par 'gyur ro /
tadyathā /
na paramārthataḥ parebhyastatpratyayebhyaḥ ādhyātmikāyatanajanma, paratvāt, tadyathā paṭasya /
athavā 		'di lta ste /
don dam par na nang gi skye mched rnams de dag gi rkyen gzhan dag las skye ba med de /
gzhan yin pa'i phyir dper na bum pa bzhin no /
na pare paramārthena vivakṣitāḥ cakṣurādyādhyātmikāyatananirvartakāḥ pratyayā iti pratīyante, paratvāt, tadyathā tantvādaya iti yang na don dam par gzhan gyis brjod par 'dod pa'i mig la sogs pa nang gi skye mched 'grub par byed pa dag rkyen ma yin par nges te /
gzhan yin pa'i phyir /
paratvādikamatra svata evāsiddham /
yathā cānena /
utpannā eva ādhyātmikā bhāvāḥ, tadviṣayiviśiṣṭavyavahārakaraṇāt /
ityasya parābhihitasya hetorasiddhārthatāmudbhāvayiṣuṇā idamuktam, atha samāhitasya yoginaḥ prajñācakṣuṣā bhāvayāthātmyaṃ paśyataḥ utpādagatyādayaḥ santi paramārthata iti sādhyate, tadā tadviṣayiviśiṣṭavyavahārakaraṇāditi hetorasiddhārthatā, gaterapyutpādaniṣedhādeva niṣedhāditi 		dper na sna lam la sogs pa bzhin no zhes bya ba 'dir gzhan nyid ces bya ba la sogs pa rang nyid la ma grub pa yin no /
ji ltar 'dis nang gi skye mched rnams skyes pa kho na yin te /
de dag gi yul dang ldan pa'i tha snyad khyad par can byed pa'i phyir ro /
zhes gzhan gyis brjod pa'i gtan tshigs 'di la ma grub par brjod par 'dod pas /
'di skad du 'on te don dam par rnal 'byor pa mnyam par gzhag pa'i shes rab kyi mig gis dngos po rnams kyi yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin nyid mthong ba'i skye ba dang 'gro ba la sogs pa dag yod par bsgrubs na ni /
de'i tshe de dag gi yul dang ldan pa'i tha snyad khyad par can byed pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba'i gtan tshigs ma grub pa'i don nyid do /
evaṃ svakṛtasādhane 'pi paramārthato 'gataṃ naiva gamyate, adhvatvāt, gatādhvavaditi adhvatvahetoḥ svata evāsiddhārthatā yojyā 'gro ba yang skye ba bkag pa kho nas bkag pa'i phyir ro zhes smras pa yin te /
de bzhin du rang gis byas pa'i sgrub par byed pa la yang /
don dam par ma song ba la 'gro ba med de /
lam yin pa'i phyir /
song ba'i lam bzhin no /
na paramārthataḥ sabhāgaṃ cakṣū rūpaṃ paśyati, cakṣurindriyatvāt, tadyathā tatsabhāgam zhes bya ba'i gtan tshigs lam nyid rang nyid lam grub pa'i don nyid du sbyar bar bya la /
don dam par brten pa dang bcas pa'i mig ni gzugs la lta bar mi byed de /
tathā /
na cakṣuḥ prekṣate rūpam, bhautikatvāt, rūpavat /
kharasvabhāvā na mahī, bhūtatvāt, tadyathānirlaḥ, ityādiṣu hetvādyasiddhiḥ svata eva yojyā /
sattvāditi cāyaṃ hetuḥ parato 'naikāntikaḥ /
kiṃ sattvāt caitanyavannādhyātmikānyāyatanāni svata utpadyantām, utāho ghaṭādivat svata utpadyantāmiti ghaṭādīnāṃ sādhyasamatvānnānaikāntikateti cet, naitadevam, tathānabhidhānāt 		mig gi dbang po yin pa'i phyir /
dper na de dang mtshungs pa bzhin no zhes bya ba dang de bzhin du mig ni gzugs la lta bar mi byed do /
'byung ba las gyur pa nyid kyi phyir /
dper na gzugs bzhin no zhes bya ba dang sa ni sra ba'i ngo bo ma yin te /
'byung ba yin pa'i phyir /
dper na rlung bzhin no /
zhes bya ba la sogs pa dag tu yang gtan tshigs la sogs pa rang nyid la grub pa sbyar bar bya'o /
yod pa'i phyir zhes bya ba'i gtan tshigs 'di yang pha rol po'i ltar na /
ci nang gi skye mched rnams yod pa'i phyir shes pa yod pa ltar bdag las mi skye ba zhig gam /
'on te bum pa la sogs pa bzhin du bdag las skye ba zhig yin zhes ma nges pa yin no /
gal te bum pa la sogs pa yang bsgrub byar mtshungs pa'i phyir ma nges pa nyid ma yin no zhe na /
de ni de ltar ma yin te /
de skad du ma smras pa'i phyir ro /
nanu ca yathā parakīyeṣvanumāneṣu dūṣaṇamuktam, evaṃ svānumāneṣvapi yathoktadūṣaṇaprasaṅge sati sa eva asiddhādhārāsiddhahetvādidoṣaḥ prāpnoti, tataśca yaḥ ubhayordoṣaḥ, na tenaikaścodyo bhavatīti sarvametaddūṣaṇamayuktaṃ jāyata iti gal te gzhan gyi rjes su dpag pa dag la skyon ji skad du smras pa de bzhin du rang gi rjes su dpag pa la yang ji skad smras pa'i nyes par thal bas gzhi ma grub pa dang gtan tshigs ma grub pa la sogs pa'i skyon de nyid du 'gyur ba ma yin nam /
de'i phyir gang gnyi ga la skyon du 'gyur ba des ni gcig la brgal bar mi bya ste /
des na skyon 'di dag thams cad mi rigs par 'gyur ro zhe na /
ucyate /
svatantramanumānaṃ bruvatāmayaṃ doṣo jāyate 		brjod par bya ste /
rang gi rgyud kyi rjes su dpag pa smra ba dag la nyes pa 'dir 'gyur gyi /
na vayaṃ svatantramanumānaṃ prayuñjmamahe parapratijñāniṣedhaphalatvādasmadanumānānām /
tathā hi 		kho bo cag ni rang rgyud kyi rjes su dpag pa mi sbyor te /
rjes su dpag pa dag ni gzhan gyi dam bca' ba 'gog pa tsam gyi 'bras bu can yin pa'i phyir ro /
paraḥ cakṣuḥ paśyatīti pratipannaḥ /
sa tatprasiddhenaivānumānena nirākriyate /
cakṣuṣaḥ svātmādarśanadharmamicchasi, paradarśanadharmāvinābhāvitvaṃ cāṅgīkṛtam, tasmād yatra yatra svātmādarśanaṃ tatra tatra paradarśanamapi nāsti, tadyathā ghaṭe, asti ca cakṣuṣaḥ svātmādarśanam, tasmāt paradarśanamapyasya naivāsti /
tataśca svātmādarśanaviruddhaṃ nīlādiparadarśanaṃ svaprasiddhenaivānumānena virudhyata iti etāvanmātramasmadanūmānairudbhāvyata iti kuto 'smatpakṣe yathoktadoṣāvatāraḥ, yataḥ samānadoṣatā syāt? 		'di ltar gzhan mig lta'o zhes bya bar rtog pa de ni mig la rang gi bdag nyid mi lta ba'i chos kyang 'dod la /
gzhan la lta ba'i chos med na mi 'byung ba nyid du yang khas blangs pa yin te /
de'i phyir gang dang gang la rang gi bdag nyid lta ba med pa de dang de la ni gzhan la lta ba yang yod pa ma yin te /
dper na bum pa bzhin no /
mig la yang rang gi bdag nyid mi lta ba yod pa yin te /
de'i phyir gzhan lta ba yang 'di la med do /
de'i phyir rang gi bdag nyid mi lta ba dang 'gal bar sngon po la sogs pa gzhan la lta ba rang la grags pa'i rjes su dpag pa dang 'gal ba yin no /
zhes de la grub pa'i rjes su dpag pas sel bar byed pa yin no /
gang gi phyir rjes su dpag pa dag gis 'di tsam zhig brjod par bya ba yin pas /
kiṃ punaḥ /
anyataraprasiddhenāpyanumānenāstyanumānabādhā /
asti, sā ca svaprasiddhenaiva hetunā, na paraprasiddhena, lokata evaṃ dṛṣṭatvāt /
kadāciddhi loke arthipratyarthibhyāṃ pramāṇīkṛtasya sākṣiṇo vacanena jayo bhavati parājayo vā, kadācit svavacanena 		gang las nyes pa mtshungs par 'gyur ba /
kho bo cag gi phyogs la ji skad bsnyad pa'i skyon 'dug pa gal yong yang ci gang yang rung ba la grub pa'i rjes su dpag pa'i sgo nas kyang rjes su dpag pas gnod pa yod dam zhe na /
yod de de yang rang nyid la grub pa'i gtan tshigs nyid kyis yin gyi /
gzhan la grub pas ni ma yin te /
'jig rten nyid du mthong ba'i phyir ro /
'jig rten na ni res 'ga' dbang po'i rgol ba dang phyir rgol gnyis kyi tshad mar byas pa'i tshig gis rgyal ba 'am pham par 'gyur la /
res 'ga' ni rang gi tshig kho nas 'gyur gyi /
paravacanena tu na jayo nāpi parājayaḥ gzhan gyi tshig gis ni rgyal ba 'am pham par 'gyur ba ma yin no /
yathā ca loke, tathā nyāye 'pi 'jig rten na ji ltar yin pa de bzhin du rigs pa la yang yin te /
laukikasyaiva vyavahārasya nyāyaśāstre prastutatvāt 'jig rten pa'i tha snyad kho na rigs pa'i bstan bcos su skabs su bab pa yin pa'i phyir ro /
ata eva kaiściduktam /
na parataḥ prasiddhibalādanumānabādhā, paraprasiddhereva nirācikīrṣitatvāditi /
yastu manyate /
ya eva ubhayaniścitavādī, sa pramāṇaṃ dūṣaṇaṃ vā, nānyataraprasiddhasaṃdigdhavācī iti, tenāpi laukikīṃ vyavasthāmanurudhyamānena anumāne yathokta eva nyāyo 'bhyupeyaḥ 		de nyid kyi phyir 'ga' zhig gis gzhan la grags pa'i dbang gis ni rjes su dpag pa'i gnod pa ma yin te /
gzhan la grags pa nyid dgag par 'dod pa'i phyir ro zhes bshad do /
gang zhig gang gnyi ga la nges par brjod pa de ni sgrub pa 'am sun 'byin pa yin gyi /
gang yang rung ba la grub pa 'am the tshom za ba smra ba ni ma yin no snyam du sems pa des kyang 'jig rten gyi tha snyad kyi rnam par gzhag pa la brten nas rjes su dpag pa la ji skad smras pa'i tshul 'di nyid khas blang bar bya'o /
'di ltar lung gis gnod pa ni gnyi ga la grub pa'i lung kho na'i sgo nas ma yin te /
tathā hi nobhayaprasiddhena vā āgamena bādhā, kiṃ tarhi svaprasiddhenāpi /
svārthānumāne tu sarvatra svaprasiddhireva garīyasī, nobhayaprasiddhiḥ 		'o na ci zhe na /
rang la grub pa'i sgo nas kyang yin no /
rang gi don gyi rjes su dpag pa ni thams cad du rang la grub pa nyid brling ba yin gyi /
gnyi ga la grub pa ni ma yin no /
ata eva tarkalakṣaṇābhidhānaṃ niṣprayojanam, yathāsvaprasiddhayā upapattyā buddhaistadanabhijñavineyajanānugrahāt de nyid kyi phyir rtog ge'i mtshan nyid brjod pa ni dgos pa med pa yin te /
sangs rgyas rnams kyis rang la ji ltar grags pa'i 'thad pas de kho na mi shes pa'i gdul bya'i skye bo la phan btags pa'i phyir ro /
ityalaṃ prasaṅgena shin tu spros pas chog go /
prakṛtameva vyākhyāsyāmaḥ dkyus ma nyid bshad par bya'o /
parato 'pi notpadyante bhāvāḥ dngos po rnams ni gzhan las skye ba yang ma yin te /
parābhāvādeva etacca gzhan med pa'i phyir ro /
'di yang /
na hi svabhāvo bhāvānāṃ pratyayādiṣu vidyate dngos po rnams kyi rang bzhin ni /
rkyen la sogs la yod ma yin /
ityatra pratipādayiṣyati zhes bya ba der 'chad par 'gyur ro /
tataśca parābhāvādeva nāpi parata utpadyante /
api ca 		de'i phyir gzhan med pa nyid kyi phyir gzhan las kyang skye ba ma yin no /
anyatpratītya yadi nāma paro 'bhaviṣya gzhan yang gzhan la brten nas gal te gzhan zhig 'byung bar 'gyur na ni /
jjāyeta tarhi bahulaḥ śikhino 'ndhakāraḥ 'o na me lce las kyang mun pa mthug po 'byung 'gyur zhing /
sarvasya janma ca bhavetkhalu sarvataśca thams cad las kyang thams cad skye bar 'gyur te gang gi phyir /
tulyaṃ paratvamakhile 'janake 'pi yasmāt skyed par byed pa ma yin ma lus pa la'ang gzhan nyid mtshungs /
ityādinā [madhyamakāvatārāt] parata utpattipratiṣedho 'vaseyaḥ zhes bya ba la sogs pas gzhan las skye ba dgag pa dbu ma la 'jug pa las nges par bya'o /
ācāryabuddhapālitastu vyācaṣṭe /
na parata utpadyante bhāvāḥ, sarvataḥ sarvasaṃbhavaprasaṅgāt ācāryabhāvaviveko dūṣaṇamāha 		slob dpon sangs rgyas bskyangs ni dngos po rnams gzhan las skye ba med de /
thams cad las kyang thams cad skye bar 'gyur ba'i phyir ro /
zhes rnam par 'chad do /
'di la slob dpon legs ldan byed ni des na de la thal bar 'gyur ba'i ngag yin pa'i phyir /
tadatra prasaṅgavākyatvāt sādhyasādhanaviparyayaṃ kṛtvā, svataḥ ubhayataḥ ahetuto vā utpadyante bhāvāḥ, kutaścitkasyacidutpatteḥ, iti prākpakṣavirodhaḥ bsgrub par bya ba dang sgrub par byed pa bzlog par byas na /
dngos po rnams bdag gam gnyis sam rgyu med pa las skye bar 'gyur ba dang 'ga' zhig las 'ga' zhig skye bar 'gyur ba'i phyir phyogs gong ma dang 'gal par 'gyur ro /
anyathā sarvataḥ sarvasaṃbhavaprasaṅgāt ityasya sādhanadūṣaṇānantaḥpātitvādasaṃgatārthametat [iti] gzhan du na yang thams cad las thams cad las skye bar 'gyur ba'i phyir ro /
de bas na de la sgrub pa dang sun 'byin pa nyid med pa'i phyir /
de ni don 'brel pa med pa yin te zhes sun 'byin smra'o /
etadapyasaṃgatārtham /
pūrvameva pratipāditatvād dūṣaṇāntaḥpātitvācca parapratijñātārthadūṣaṇeneti yatkiṃcidetaditi na punaryatna āsthīyate 		'di yang don 'brel pa med pa ma yin te /
gong kho nar bstan zin pa'i phyir dang gzhan gyis dam bcas pa'i don sun 'byin par byed pa yin dang sun 'byin pa nyid kyang yin pa'i phyir 'di ni gyi na'o /
des na slar yang 'bad par mi bya'o /
dvābhyāmapi nopajāyante bhāvāḥ, ubhayapakṣābhihitadoṣaprasaṅgāt pratyekamutpādāsāmarthyācca dngos po rnams ni gnyi ga las skye ba yang ma yin te /
phyogs gnyi ga la smras pa'i nyis par thal ba'i phyir dang re re la skyed par byed pa'i nus pa med pa'i phyir ro /
vakṣyati hi /
syādubhābhyāṃ kṛtaṃ duḥkhaṃ syādekaikakṛtaṃ yadi 		gal te re res byas 'gyur na /
sdug bsngal gnyi gas byas par 'gyur /
iti /
ahetuto 'pi notpadyante 		zhes 'chad par 'gyur ro /
rgyu med pa las kyang mi skye ste /
hetāvasati kāryaṃ ca kāraṇaṃ ca na vidyate rgyu med na ni 'bras bu dang /
rgyu yang 'thad par mi 'gyur ro /
iti vakṣyamāṇadoṣaprasaṅgāt, /
gṛhyeta naiva ca jagadyadi hetuśūnyaṃ 		zhes bya ba la sogs pas 'chad par 'gyur ba'i skyon du thal bar 'gyur ba'i phyir dang gal te rgyu yis stong na 'gro ba 'di dag gzung bya min /
syādyadvadeva gaganotpalavarṇagandhau ji ltar nam mkha'i autpala yi dri dang kha dog bzhin /
ityādidoṣaprasaṅgācca /
ācāryabuddhapālitastvāha /
ahetuto notpadyante bhāvāḥ, sadā ca sarvataśca sarvasaṃbhavaprasaṅgāt /
atrācāryabhāvaviveko dūṣaṇamāha /
atrāpi prasaṅgavākyatvāt yadi viparītasādhyasādhanavyaktivākyārtha iṣyate, tadā etaduktaṃ bhavati 		zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i nyes par thal bar 'gyur ba'i phyir ro /
slob dpon sangs rgyas bskyangs ni dngos po rnams rgyu med pa las kyang skye ba med de /
rtag tu thams cad las thams cad skye bar thal bar 'gyur ro zhes 'chad do /
'di la yang slob dpon legs ldan byed /
de la yang thal bar 'gyur ba'i ngag yin pa'i phyir /
gal te bsgrub par bya ba dang sgrub par byed pa bzlog pa gsal ba ngag gi don du mngon par 'dod na /
de'i tshe 'di skad du /
hetuta utpadyante bhāvāḥ, kadācit kutaścit kasyacidutpatteḥ, ārambhasāphalyācca dngos po rnams rgyu las skye bar 'gyur ba dang lan 'ga' kha cig las kha cig skye bar 'gyur ba dang rtsom pa 'bras bu dang bcas pa nyid du 'gyur ba'i phyir ro /
seyaṃ vyākhyā na yuktā prāguktadoṣāditi zhes bstan par 'gyur na /
bshad pa de ni mi rigs te /
tadetadayuktam, pūrvoditaparihārādityapare /
yaccāpi īśvarādīnāmupasaṃgrahārtham, tadāpi na yuktam /
īśvarādīnāṃ svaparobhayapakṣeṣu yathābhyupagamamantarbhāvāditi /
tasmāt prasādhitametannāstyutpāda iti 		sngar smras pa'i skyon du thal bar 'gyur ba'i phyir ro /
zhes sun 'byin pa smra'o /
gzhan dag na re 'di ni mi rigs te sngar lan btab zin pa'i phyir ro zhe'o /
gang yang dbang phyug la sogs pa nye bar bsdu pa'i phyir yin no zhes bya ba de yang rigs pa ma yin te /
dbang phyug la sogs pa rnams ni khas blangs pa ji lta ba bzhin du bdag dang gzhan dang gnyi ga'i phyogs dag tu 'du bya'i phyir ro /
de'i phyir skye ba yod pa ma yin no zhes bya ba 'di bsgrubs pa yin la /
utpādāsaṃbhavācca siddho 'nutpādādiviśiṣṭa pratītyasamutpāda iti skye ba yod pa ma yin pas /
rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba skye ba med pa la sogs pas khyad par du byas pa grub pa yin no /
atrāha /
yadyevamanutpādādiviśiṣṭaḥ pratītyasamutpādo vyavasthito bhavadbhiḥ, yattarhi bhagavatoktam 		'dir smras pa gal te de ltar rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba skye ba med pa la sogs pas khyad par du byas pa rnam par gzhag na ni /
avidyāpratyayāḥ saṃskārā avidyānirodhātsaṃskāranirodha iti, tathā 'o na bcom ldan 'das kyis ma rig pa'i rkyen gyis 'du byed rnams skye ba dang ma rig pa 'gags pas 'du byed 'gag ces bya ba dang de bzhin du /
anityāśca te (bata?) saṃskārā utpādavyayadharmiṇaḥ kye ma 'du byed rnams mi rtag /
skye zhing 'jig pa'i chos can yin /
skye nas 'jig par 'gyur ba ste /
utpadya hi nirudhyante teṣāṃ vyupaśamaḥ sukhaḥ /
tathā /
utpādādvā tathāgatānāmanutpādādvā tathāgatānāṃ sthitaivaiṣā dharmāṇāṃ dharmatā, eko dharmaḥ sattvasthitaye yaduta catvāra āhārāḥ, dvau dharmau lokaṃ pālayato hrīścāpatrāpyaṃ cetyādi, tathā 		de dag nye bar zhi ba bde /
zhes bya ba dang de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa rnams byung yang rung /
de bzhin gshegs pa rnams ma byung yang rung /
chos rnams kyi chos nyid 'di ni gnas pa kho na ste zhes bya ba dang sems can gnas par byed pa'i chos ni gcig ste /
gang tsas bzhi'o /
'jig rten skyong bar byed pa'i chos ni gnyis te /
ngo tsha shes pa dang khrel yod pa'o zhes bya ba la sogs pa dang de bzhin du 'jig rten pha rol nas 'dir 'ongs so /
paralokādihāgamanamihalokācca paralokagamanamiti, evaṃ nirodhādiviśiṣṭaḥ pratītyasamutpādo deśito bhagavatā, sa kathaṃ na ni (vi?) rudhyata iti? yata evaṃ nirodhādayaḥ pratītyasamutpādasyopalabhyante, ata evedaṃ madhyamakaśāstraṃ praṇītamācāryeṇa neyanītārthasūtrāntavibhāgopadarśanārtham /
tatra ya ete pratītyasamutpādasyotpādādaya uktāḥ, na te vigatāvidyātimirānāsravaviṣayasvabhāvāpekṣayā, kiṃ tarhi avidyātimiropahatamatinayanajñānaviṣayāpekṣayā 		'jig rten 'di nas 'jig rten pha rol du 'gro'o zhes de ltar rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba 'gag pa la sogs pas khyad par du byas pa bstan pa gang yin pa de ji ltar 'gal bar mi 'gyur zhe na /
gang gi phyir de ltar rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba 'gag pa la sogs pa dag yod par thos par 'gyur ba de nyid kyi phyir slob dpon gyis drang pa dang nges pa dang nges pa'i don gyi mdo sde'i rnam par dbye ba bstan par bya ba'i phyir dbu ma'i bstan bcos 'di mdzad pa yin no /
de la rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'i skye ba la sogs pa dag bstan pa gang yin pa de dag ni ma rig pa'i rab rib dang bral ba dag gi ye shes zag pa med pa'i yul gyi rang bzhin la ltos nas ni ma yin no /
'o na ci zhe na /
ma rig pa'i rab rib kyis blo gros kyi mig nyams par byas pa dag gi shes pa'i yul la ltos nas yin no /
tattvadarśanāpekṣayā tūktaṃ bhagavatā /
etaddhi bhikṣavaḥ paramaṃ satyaṃ yaduta amoṣadharma nirvāṇam, sarvasaṃskārāśca mṛṣā moṣadharmāṇaḥ iti /
tathā 		de kho na nyid gzigs pa la ltos nas ni bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong dag 'di ni bden pa dam pa ste /
'di lta ste /
slu ba med pa'i chos can mya ngan las 'das pa'o /
'du byed thams cad ni brdzun pa slu ba'i chos can no zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs so /
nāstyatra tathatā vā avitathatā vā /
moṣadharmaka mapyetat, pralopadharmakamapyetat, mṛṣāpyetat, māyeyaṃ bālalāpinī iti 		de bzhin du 'di ni de bzhin nyid dam phyin ci ma log pa'i bzhin nyid ni med kyi /
'di dag ni slu bar byad pa'i chos can no /
'di dag ni brdzun pa sgyu ma byis pa 'drid pa'o zhes gsungs so /
tathā /
phenapiṇḍopamaṃ rūpaṃ vedanā budbudopamā 		de bzhin du /
gzugs ni dbu ba rdos pa 'dra /
tshor ba chu yi chu bur bzhin /
marīcisadṛśī saṃjñā saṃskārāḥ kadalīnibhāḥ 'du shes smig rgyu lta bu ste /
'du byed chu shing sdod po 'dra /
māyopamaṃ ca vijñānamuktamādityabandhunā /
iti 		rnam shes sgyu ma lta bu zhes /
nyi ma'i gnyen gyis bka' stsal to /
evaṃ dharmān vīkṣamāṇo bhikṣurārabdhavīryavān /
divā vā yadi vā rātrau saṃprajānan pratismṛtaḥ 		zhes bya ba dang de bzhin du dge slong brtson 'grus brtsams pa dran pa dang shes bzhin dang ldan pa nyin dang mtshan du chos la so sor rtog par byed pa na /
pratividhyetpadaṃ śāntaṃ saṃskāropaśamaṃ śivam 'du byed thams cad ni nye bar zhi pa'i go 'phang zhi ba /
iti /
nirātmakatvācca dharmāṇāmityādi 		chos rnams bdag med pa nyid rtogs par 'gyur ro /
zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs so /
yasyaivaṃ deśanābhiprāyānabhijñatayā saṃdehaḥ syāt de lta bur bstan pa'i dgongs pa mi shes pas /
'dir de kho na'i don can gyi bstan pa ni gang zhig yin /
kā hyatra deśanā tattvārthā, kā nu khalu ābhiprāyikīti, yaścāpi mandabuddhitayā neyārthāṃ deśanāṃ nītārthāmavagacchati, tayorubhayorapi vineyajanayoḥ ācāryo yuktyāgamābhyāṃ saṃśayamithyājñānāpākaraṇārthaṃ śāstramidamārabdhavān dgongs pa can ni 'dir gang zhig yin snyam du gang zhig the tshom du 'gyur ba dang gang zhig blo zhan pa nyid kyis drang ba'i don gyi bstan pa la nges pa'i don du rtogs pa de gnyi ga'i the tshom dang log pa'i shes pa dag rigs pa dang lung gnyis kyi sgo nas bsal bar bya ba'i phyir /
slob dpon gyis 'di brtsams so /
tatra 'na svataḥ'; ityādinā yuktirupavarṇitā de la bdag las ma yin zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni rigs pa gsungs pa yin no /
tanmṛṣā moṣadharma yadbhagavānityabhāṣata bcom ldan 'das kyis chos gang zhig /
slu ba de ni brdzun zhes gsungs /
sarve ca moṣadharmāṇaḥ saṃskārāstena te mṛṣā /
pūrvā prajñāyate koṭirnetyuvāca mahāmuniḥ 		'du byed thams cad slu ba'i chos /
des na de dag brdzun pa yin /
sngon mtha' sngon nam zhes zhus tshe /
saṃsāro 'navarāgro hi nāstyādirnāpi paścimam thub pa chen pos min zhes gsungs /
'khor ba thog ma mtha' med de /
kātyāyanāvavāde ca asti nāstīti cobhayam /
pratiṣiddhaṃ bhagavatā bhāvābhāvavibhāvinā 		de la sngon med phyi ma med /
bcom ldan dngos dang dngos med pa /
mkhyen pas k'a ta ya na yi /
gdams ngag las ni yod pa dang /
med pa gnyi ga 'ang dgag pa mdzad /
ityādinā āgamo varṇitaḥ zhes bya ba la sogs pa lung gsungs pa yin no /
uktaṃ ca āryākṣayamatisūtre /
katame sūtrāntā neyārthāḥ katame nītārthāḥ? ye sūtrāntā mārgavatārāya nirdiṣṭāḥ, ima ucyanteḥ neyārthāḥ 		'phags pa blo gros mi zad pas bstan pa'i mdo las /
nges pa'i don gyi mdo sde ni gang /
drang ba'i don gyi mdo sde ni gang zhe na /
mdo sde gang dag lam la 'jug pa'i phyir bstan pa de dag ni drang ba'i don zhes bya'o /
ye sūtrāntāḥ phalāvatārāya nirdiṣṭāḥ, ima ucyante neyārthāḥ /
yāvad ye sūtrāntāḥ śūnyatānimittāpraṇihitānabhisaṃskārājātānutpādābhāvanirātmaniḥ sattvanirjīvaniḥ pudgalāsvāmikavimokṣamukhā nirdiṣṭāḥ ta ucyante nītārthāḥ /
iyamucyate bhadanta śāradvatīputra nītārthasūtrāntapratiśaraṇatā, na neyārthasūtrāntapratiśaraṇatā iti /
tathā ca āryasamādhirājasūtre /
nītārthasūtrāntaviśeṣa jānati yathopadiṣṭā sugatena śūnyatā /
yasmin punaḥ pudgalasattvapūruṣā neyārthato jānati sarvadharmān 		mdo sde gang dag 'bras bu la 'jug pa'i phyir bstan pa de dag ni nges pa'i don zhes bya'o /
mdo sde gang dag bdag dang sems can dang srog dang 'gro ba dang gso ba dang skyes bu dang gang zag dang shed las skyes dang shed pa dag dang byed pa po dang tshor ba po dang sgra rnam pa sna tshogs su bshad pa dang bdag po med pa la bdag po dang bcas par bstan pa de dag ni drang ba'i don zhes bya'o /
mdo sde gang dag stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma med pa dang smon pa med pa dang mngon par 'du mi byed pa dang ma skyes pa dang ma byung ba dang dngos po med pa dang bdag med pa dang sems can med pa dang srog med pa dang gang zag med pa dang bdag po med pa nas /
rnam par thar pa'i sgo'i bar du bstan pa de dag ni nges pa'i don zhes bya ste /
'di dag ni nges pa'i don gyi mdo sde la rton gyi /
drang ba'i don gyi mdo sde la mi rton pa zhes bya'o zhes gsungs pa dang de bzhin du 'phags pa ting nge 'dzin gyi rgyal po las kyang /
stong pa bde bar gshegs pas bshad pa ltar /
nges don mdo sde dag gi bye brag shes /
gang las sems can gang zag skyes bu bsten /
chos de thams cad drang ba'i don du shes /
zhes gsungs so /
tasmādutpādādideśanāṃ mṛṣārthāṃ pratipādayituṃ pratītyasamutpādānudarśanamārabdhavānācāryaḥ /
nanu ca 		de'i phyir skye ba la sogs pa bstan pa rnams brdzun pa'i don can du bstan pa'i phyir /
slob dpon gyis rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba rdzas su ston pa brtsams so /
utpādādīnāmabhāve sati yadi sarvadharmāṇāṃ mṛṣātvapratipādanārthamidamārabdhavānācāryaḥ nanvevaṃ sati yanmṛṣā na tadastīti na santyakuśalāni karmāṇi, tadabhāvānna santi durgatayaḥ, na santi kuśalāni karmāṇi, tadabhāvānna santi sugatayaḥ, sugatidurgatyasaṃbhavācca nāsti saṃsāraḥ, iti sarvārambhavaiyarthyameva sthāt /
ucyate 		gal te skye ba la sogs pa mi srid pa yin dang chos thams cad brdzun pa nyid du bstan par bya ba'i phyir slob dpon gyis 'di brtsams pa yin no /
de lta na ni gang brdzun pa de ni yod pa ma yin pas mi dge ba'i las dag med par 'gyur la /
de med pas ngan 'gro dag med par 'gyur zhing /
dge ba dang bde 'gro dag kyang med par 'gyur ro /
bde 'gro dang ngan 'gro med pa'i phyir 'khor ba yang yod pa ma yin pas /
rtsom pa thams cad don med pa nyid du 'gyur ba ma yin nam zhe na bshad par bya ste /
saṃvṛtisatyavyapekṣayā lokasya idaṃsatyābhiniveśasya pratipakṣabhāvena mṛṣārthatā bhāvānāṃ pratipādyate 'smābhiḥ kun rdzob kyi bden pa la ltos nas 'di bden par mngon par zhen pa'i 'jig rten pa'i gnyen po nyid du kho bo cag gis dngos po rnams brdzun pa'i don du bstan gyi /
naiva tvāryāḥ kṛtakāryāḥ kiṃcidupalabhante yanmṛṣā amṛṣā vā syāditi /
api ca /
yena hi sarvadharmāṇāṃ mṛṣātvaṃ parijñātaṃ kiṃ tasya karmāṇi santi, saṃsāro vā asti? na cāpyasau kasyaciddharmassya astitvaṃ nāstitvaṃ vopalabhate /
yathoktaṃ bhagavatā āryaratnakūṭasūtre 		gang zhig brdzun pa'am brdzun pa ma yin par 'gyur ba 'phags pa rnams kyis ni cung zad kyang gzigs pa ma yin no /
gzhan yang gang gis chos thams cad brdzun pa'i don can nyid du yongs su mkhyen pa de la ci las yod cing 'khor ba yod dam /
'dis ni chos 'ga' yang yod pa nyid dam med pa nyid du dmigs pa yang ma yin no /
ji skad du bcom ldan 'das kyis 'phags pa don mchog brtsegs pa'i mdo las /
cittaṃ hi kāśyapa parigaveṣyamāṇaṃ na labhyate 'od srungs sems ni kun du btsal na mi rnyed do /
yanna labhyate tannopalabhyate gong ma rnyed pa de ni mi dmigs pa'o /
yannopalabhyate tannaiva atītaṃ na anāgataṃ na pratyutpannam /
yannaivātītaṃ nānāgataṃ na pratyutpannam, tasya nāsti svabhāvaḥ 		gang mi dmigs pa de ni 'das pa yang ma yin /
ma 'ongs pa yang ma yin /
da ltar byung ba yang ma yin no /
gang 'das pa yang ma yin /
ma 'ongs pa yang ma yin /
da ltar byung ba yang ma yin pa de la ni ngo bo nyid med do /
yasya nāsti svabhāvaḥ, tasya nāstyutpādaḥ /
yasya nāstyutpādaḥ, tasya nāsti nirodhaḥ 		gang ngo bo nyid med pa de la 'byung ba med do /
gang 'byung ba med pa de la 'gag pa med do /
iti vistaraḥ /
yastu viparyāsānugamānmṛṣātvaṃ nāvagacchati, pratītya bhāvānā svabhāvamabhiniviśate, sa dharmeṣvidaṃsatyābhiniveśādabhiniviṣṭaḥ san karmāṇyapi karoti, saṃsāre 'pi saṃsarati, viparyāsāvasthitatvānna bhavyo nirvāṇamadhigantum 		zhes rgya cher gsungs pa lta bu'o /
gang dag phyin ci log dang ldan pas chos rnams brdzun pa nyid du khong du mi chud cing /
dngos po rnams rang bzhin yod par rtogs nas mngon par zhen pa de ni chos rnams la 'di bden par mngon par zhen pa nyid kyi sgo nas mngon par zhen par gyur dang las kyang byed cing 'khor ba na yang 'khor bar 'gyur la /
phyin ci log la gnas pas mya ngan las 'das pa thob pa'i skal ba can du yang mi 'gyur ro /
kiṃ punaḥ /
mṛṣāsvabhāvā api padārthāḥ saṃkleśavyavadānanibandhanaṃ bhavanti /
tadyathā māyāyuvatistatsvabhāvānabhijñānām, tathāgatanirmitaśca upacitakuśalamūlānām 		yang ci dngos po brdzun pa'i rang bzhin can rnams kyang kun nas nyon mongs pa dang rnam par byang ba'i rgyur 'gyur ram zhe na /
'gyur te dper na sgyu ma'i na chung ni de'i rang bzhin mngon par mi shes pa rnams kyi kun nas nyon mongs pa'i rgyu yin la /
de bzhin gshegs pa'i sprul pa ni dge ba'i rtsa ba bsags pa rnams kyi rnam par byang ba'i rgyur 'gyur ba bzhin no /
uktaṃ hi dṛḍhādhyāśayaparipṛcchāsūtre lhag pa'i bsam pa bstan pa'i mdo las /
rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste /
tadyathā kulaputra māyākāranāṭake pratyupasthite māyākāranirmitāṃ striyaṃ dṛṣṭvā kaścidrāgaparītacittāḥ parṣacchāradyabhayena utthāyāsanādapakrāmet, so 'pakramya tāmeva striyamaśubhato manasikuryāt, anityato duḥkhataḥ śūnyato 'nātmato manasikuryāt /
iti vistaraḥ /
vinaye ca 		dper na la la zhig gis sgyu ma mkhan gyi rol mo byung ba'i tshe /
sgyu ma mkhan gyis sprul pa'i bud med mthong nas 'dod chags kyis sems dkris nas 'khor gyis 'jigs shing bag tsha ste /
stan las langs nas song ste /
de song nas bud med pa de nyid la /
mi sdug pa dang mi gtsang ba dang mi rtag pa dang sdug bsngal ba dang stong pa dang bdag med par yid la byad na zhes rgyas par gsungs so /
'dul ba las kyang /
yantrakārakāritā yantrayuvatiḥ sadbhūtayuvatiśūnyā sadbhūtayuvatirūpeṇa pratibhāsate, tasya ca citrakārasya kāmarāgāspadībhūtā 'khrul 'khor mkhan gyis byas pa'i 'khrul 'khor gyi na chung ni yang dag par bden pa'i na chung gis stong bzhin du /
ri mo mkhan gyi 'dod pa'i 'dod chags kyi gzhir gyur par bshad de /
tathā mṛṣāsvabhāvā api bhāvā bālānāṃ saṃkleśavyavadānanibandhanaṃ bhavanti /
tathā āryaratnakūṭasūtre 		dpe de bzhin du dngos po brdzun pa'i rang bzhin can rnams kyang byis pa rnams kyi kun nas nyon mongs pa'i rgyu yin no /
de bzhin du 'phags pa dkon mchog brtsegs pa las kyang /
atha khalu tāni pañcamātrāṇi bhikṣuśatāni bhagavato dharmadeśanāmanavatarantyanavagāhamānānyanadhimucyamānāni utthāyāsanebhyaḥ prakrāntāni de nas dge slong bsam gtan thob pa lnga brgya ni bcom ldan 'das kyis chos bstan pa 'di la mi 'jug ste /
ma rtogs ma mos pas stan las langs te dong ngo /
atha bhagavān [tasyāṃ velāyāṃ] yena mārgeṇaite bhikṣavo gacchanti sma, tasmin mārge dvau bhikṣū nirmimīte sma de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong de dag lam gang nas dong ba'i lam der dge slong gnyis shig sprul pa sprul te /
atha tāni pañca bhikṣuśatāni yena [mārgeṇa] tau dvau bhikṣū [nirmitakau] tenopasaṃkrāmanti sma /
upasaṃkramya tāvavocan /
