kutrāyuṣmantau gamiṣyathaḥ? nirmitakāvavocatām /
gamiṣyāva āvāmaraṇyāyataneṣu, tatra dhyānasukhasparśavihārairvihariṣyāvaḥ /
yaṃ hi bhagavān dharmaṃ deśayati, tamāvāṃ nāvatarāvo nāvagāhāvahe nādhimucyāmahe uttrasyāvaḥ saṃtrāsamāpadyāvahe /
atha tāni pañca bhikṣuśatānyetadavocan /
vayamapyāyuṣmanto bhagavato dharmadeśanāṃ nāvatarāmo nāvagāhāmahe nādhimucyāmahe uttrasyāmaḥ saṃtrasyāmaḥ saṃtrāsamāpadyāmahe /
tena vayamaraṇyāyataneṣu dhyānasukhasparśavihārairvihariṣyāmaḥ 		de nas dge slong lnga brgya po de dag dge slong de gnyis lam gang nas dong ba'i lam der dong ste phyin pa dang 'di skad ces smras so /
tshe dang ldan pa dag gar dong /
sprul pa gnyis kyis smras pa /
kho bo cag ni dgon pa'i gnas su bsam gtan gyi bde ba la reg par gnas par bya bar dong ngo /
de ci'i phyir zhe na /
kho bo cag ni bcom ldan 'das kyis chos bstan pa gang yin pa'ang chos bstan pa de la mi 'jug ste /
mi rtogs mi mos shing /
skrag ste kun du dang ngas /
kun du rab tu dang ngas par gyur nas kho bo cag dgon pa'i gnas rnams su bsam gtan gyi bde ba la reg par gnas pa rnams kyis gnas par bya'o /
de nas dge slong lnga brgya po rnams kyis 'di skad ces smras so /
tshe dang ldan pa dag /
kho bo cag kyang bcom ldan 'das kyis chos bstan pa la mi 'jug ste /
ma rtogs ma mos shing skrag ste /
kun du dang ngas kun du rab tu dang ngas par gyur te /
de'i phyir kho bo cag kyang dgon pa'i gnas rnams su bsam gtan gyi bde ba la reg par gnas pa rnams kyis gnas par bya'o /
sprul pa dag gis smras pa /
tshe dang ldan pa dag de'i phyir bdag cag yang dag par 'gro bar bya'o /
rtsod par mi bya'o /
rtsod pa med pa lhur byed pa de ni dge sbyong gi chos so /
tshe dang ldan pa dag gang 'di yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa zhes bya ba gang /
yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gyur ba'i chos de gang /
lus 'di las bdag gam /
nirmitakāvavocatām sems can nam /
srog gam /
tena hi āyuṣmantaḥ saṃgāsyāmo na vivadiṣyāmaḥ skye ba po 'am /
skyes bu'am gang zag gam /
shed las skyes sam /
avivādaparamā hi śramaṇasya dharmāḥ shed bu'am /
gang yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gyur /
kasyāyuṣmantaḥ prahāṇāya pratipannāḥ? tānyavocan gang zad pas yongs su mya ngan las 'da' /
de dag gis smras pa /
rāgadveṣamohānāṃ prahāṇāya vayaṃ pratipannāḥ /
nirmitakāvavocatām 		'dod chags zad zhe sdang zad gti mug zad pas yongs su mya ngan las 'da'o /
sprul pa gnyis kyis smras pa /
tshe dang ldan pa dag /
kiṃ punarāyuṣmatāṃ saṃvidyante rāgadveṣamohā yān kṣapayiṣyatha? tānyavocan 'dod chags dang zhe sdang dang gti mug yod pa yin nam /
ci nam de zad par bya /
de dag gis smras pa /
na te 'dhyātmaṃ na bahirdhā nobhayamantareṇopalabhyante, nāpi te 'parikalpitā utpadyante de dag ni nang na yang med phyi rol na yang med /
gnyi ga med par yang mi dmigs te /
de dag ni yongs su ma brtags pa las kyang mi skye'o /
nirmitakāvavocatām sprul pa gnyis kyis smras pa /
tena hi āyuṣmanto mā kalpayata, [mā vikalpayata] tshe dang ldan pa dag de lta bas na bdag tu ma rtog rnam par ma rtog shig /
yadā cāyuṣmanto na kalpayiṣyatha na vikalpayiṣyatha, tadā na raṃkṣyatha na viraṃkṣyatha tshe dang ldan pa dag nam mi rtog rnam par mi rtog pa de'i tshe chags par mi 'gyur chags pa dang bral bar yang mi 'gyur ro /
yaśca na rakto na viraktaḥ, sa śānta ityucyate chags pa med cing chags pa dang bral ba yang med pa gang yin pa de ni zhi ba zhes bya'o /
śīlamāyuṣmanto na saṃsarati na parinirvāti tshe dang ldan pa dag tshul khrims ni mi 'khor zhing yongs su mya ngan las mi 'da'o /
samādhiḥ prajñā vimuktirvimuktijñānadarśanamāyuṣmanto na saṃsarati na parinirvāti tshe dang ldan pa dag ting nge 'dzin dang shes rab dang rnam par grol ba dang rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba yang mi 'khor zhing yongs su mya ngan las mi 'da'o /
ebhiścāyuṣmanto dharmairnirvāṇaṃ sūcyate tshe dang ldan pa dag /
tshes de dag gis yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar ston na /
ete ca dharmāḥ śūnyāḥ prakṛtiviviktāḥ chos de dag kyang stong pa dpen pa gzung du med pa'o /
prajahītaitāmāyuṣmantaḥ saṃjñāṃ yaduta parinirvāṇamiti tshe dang ldan pa dag 'di lta ste /
mya ngan las 'das pa'i 'du shes spongs shig /
mā ca saṃjñāyāṃ saṃjñā kārṣṭa, mā ca saṃjñāyāṃ saṃjñāṃ parijñāsiṣṭa 'du shes la yang 'du shes su ma byed cing /
'du shes la 'du shes kyis yongs su shes par ma byed cig /
yo hi saṃjñāyāṃ saṃjñāṃ parijānāti, saṃjñā bandhanamevāsya tadbhavati gang 'du shes la 'du shes kyis yongs su shes pa de'i de ni 'du shes la yongs su bcings pa yin no /
tshe dang ldan pa dag /
saṃjñāvedayitanirodhasamāpattimāyuṣmantaḥ samāpadyadhvam khyed 'du shes dang tshor ba 'gog pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa la snyoms par zhugs shig /
saṃjñāvedayitanirodhasamāpattisamāpannasya bhikṣornāstyuttarīkaraṇīyamiti vadāvaḥ tshe dang ldan pa dag /
dge slong 'du shes dang tshor ba 'gog pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa la snyoms par zhugs pa las gong na bya ba med do zhes smra'o /
atha teṣāṃ pañcānāṃ bhikṣuśatānāmanupādāyāśravebhyaścittāni vimuktānyabhūvan chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bshad pa'i tshe dge slong lnga brgya po de dag len pa med par zag pa rnams las sems rnam par grol lo /
tāni vimuktacittāni yena bhagavāṃstenopasaṃkrāntāni /
upasaṃkramya bhagavataḥ pādau śirasābhivandyaikānte nyasīdan 		de dag sems rnam par grol nas bcom ldan 'das gal ba der dong ste lhags pa dang bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te /
phyogs gcig tu 'khod do /
de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis dge slong dag la 'di skad ces smras so /
athāyuṣmān subhūtistān tshe dang ldan pa dag gar dong /
bhikṣūnetadavocat gang nas lhags /
kutrāyuṣmanto gatāḥ kuto vāgatāḥ te 'vocan /
na kvacidgamanāya na kutaścidāgamanāya bhadanta subhūte bhagavatā dharmo deśitaḥ āha 		de dag gis smras pa /
btsun pa rab 'byor gang du yang 'gro ba med pa dang gang nas kyang 'ong ba med pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das kyis chos bstan to /
ko nāmāyuṣmatāṃ śāstā? āhuḥ smras pa tshe dang ldan pa dag khyed kyi ston pa gang yin /
yo notpanno na parinirvāsyati /
āha 		smras pa gang ma skyes shing yongs su mya ngan las mi 'da' ba'o /
kathaṃ yuṣmābhirdharmaḥ śrutaḥ? āhuḥ smras pa khyed kyis ji ltar chos thos /
na bandhanāya na mokṣāya smras pa bcings pa'i phyir yang ma yin /
āha /
kena yūyaṃ vinītāḥ? āhuḥ 		thar pa'i phyir yang ma yin no /
smras pa khyed sus btul /
yasya na kāyo na cittam smras pa su la lus med cing sems med pas so /
āha /
kathaṃ yūyaṃ prayuktāḥ? āhuḥ /
nāvidyāprahāṇāya na vidyotpādanāya /
āha /
kasya yūyaṃ śrāvakāḥ? āhuḥ /
yena na prāptaṃ nābhisaṃbuddham /
āha /
ke yuṣmākaṃ sabrahmacāriṇaḥ? āhuḥ 		smras pa khyed ji ltar brtson /
smras pa ma rig pa spang ba'i phyir yang ma yin rig pa skyed pa'i phyir yang ma yin no /
smras pa khyod ji ltar rnam par grol /
smras pa sbyor ba'i phyir yang ma yin /
spang ba'i phyir yang ma yin no /
smras pa khyed su'i nyan thos /
smras pa gang gis thob pa med cing mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa med pa'i'o /
smras pa khyed kyi tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod pa gang /
ye traidhātuke nopavicaranti /
āha 		smras pa gang khams gsum na mi rgyu ba rnams so /
kiyaccireṇāyuṣmantaḥ parinirvāsyanti āhuḥ smras pa tshe dang ldan pa dag ji srid cig na yongs su mya ngan las 'da' /
yadā tathāgatanirmitāḥ parinirvāsyanti /
āha 		smras pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i sprul pa nam yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba na'o /
kṛtaṃ yuṣmābhiḥ karaṇīyam? āhuḥ smras pa khyod kyis bya ba byas sam /
ahaṃ kāramamakāraparijñānataḥ /
āha /
kṣīṇā yuṣmākaṃ kleśāḥ? āhuḥ 		smras pa ngar 'dzin pa dang nga yir 'dzin pa yongs su shes pas so /
smras pa khyed kyi nyon mongs pa zad dam /
atyantakṣayātsarvadharmāṇām /
āha 		smras pa chos thams cad gtan du zad pa'i phyir ro /
dharṣito yuṣmābhirmāraḥ? āhuḥ smras pa khyed kyis bdud btul lam /
skandhamārānupalambhāt /
āha 		smras pa phung po'i bdud mi dmigs pa'i phyir ro /
dharṣito yuṣmābhirmāraḥ? āhuḥ smras pa khyed kyis ston pa la bsnyen bkur byas sam /
skandhamārānupalambhāt smras pa lus kyis kyang ma byas /
āha /
paricarito yuṣmābhiḥ śāstā? āhuḥ 		ngag gis kyang ma byas /
sems kyis kyang ma byas so /
na kāyena na vācā na manasā /
āha 		smras pa khyod kyis yon gnas kyis sbyangs sam /
viśodhitā yuṣmābhirdakṣiṇīyabhūmiḥ? āhuḥ smras pa 'dzin pa med cing sdud pa med pas so /
agrāhato 'pratigrāhataḥ smras pa khyed 'khor ba las rgal tam /
āha /
uttīrṇo yuṣmābhiḥ saṃsāraḥ? āhuḥ 		smras pa chad pa med cing rtag pa med pa'i phyir ro /
anucchedato 'śāśvatataḥ /
āha 		smras pa khyed yon gnas kyi sar zhugs sam /
pratipannā yuṣmābhirdakṣiṇīyabhūmiḥ? āhuḥ smras pa 'dzin pa thams cad las rnam par grol ba'i phyir ro /
sarvagrāhavinirmuktitaḥ smras pa tshe dang ldan pa dag gar 'gro /
āha /
kiṃgāmina āyuṣmantaḥ? āhuḥ 		smras pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i sprul pa gang du bzhud par ro /
yaṃgāminastathāgatanirmitāḥ de ltar tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis yongs su dris te /
iti hyāyuṣmataḥ subhūteḥ paripṛcchatasteṣāṃ bhikṣūṇāṃ prativisarjayatāṃ tasyāṃ parṣadi aṣṭānāṃ bhikṣuśatānāmanupādāyāśravebhyaścittāni vimuktāni, dvātriṃśataśca prāṇisahasrāṇāṃ virajo vigatamalaṃ dharmacakṣurviśuddham /
iti 		dge slong de dag gis lan btab nas 'khor de'i dge slong brgyad brgya ni len pa med par zag pa rnams las sems rnam par grol lo /
srog chags sum khri nyis stong ni chos rnams la chos kyi mig rdul med cing dri ma dang bral ba rnam par dag go zhes gsungs so /
ityevaṃ mṛṣāsvabhāvābhyāṃ tathāgatanirmitābhyāṃ bhikṣubhyāṃ pañcānāṃ bhikṣuśatānāṃ vyavadānanibandhanaṃ kṛtamiti /
uktaṃ ca āryavajramaṇḍāyāṃ dhāraṇyām 		de ltar na dge slong de bzhin gshegs pa'i sprul pa brdzun pa'i rang bzhin can gnyis kyis dge slong lnga brgya'i rnam par byang ba'i rgyu byas pa yin no /
'phags pa rdo rje snying po las kyang /
'jam dpal 'di lta ste dper na /
tadyathā mañjuśrīḥ kāṇḍaṃ ca pratītya mathanīṃ ca pratītya puruṣasya hastavyāyāmaṃ ca pratītya dhūmaḥ prādurbhavatīti agnirabhinirvartate /
sa cāgnisaṃtāpo na kāṇḍasaṃniśrito na mathanīsaṃniśrito na puruṣahastavyāyāmasaṃniśritaḥ /
evameva mañjuśrīḥ asadviparyāsamohitasya puruṣapudgalasya utpadyate rāgaparidāho dveṣaparidāho mohaparidāhaḥ 		gtsub shing dang gtsub gtan la brten /
mi'i lag pa'i rtsol ba la brten nas du ba 'byung zhing /
me mngon par 'grub ste /
me de yang gtsub shing la yang mi gnas gtsub gtan la yang mi gnas /
mi'i lag pa'i rtsol ba la yang mi gnas so /
'jam dpal de bzhin du med pa las skyes bu gang zag rmongs pa la 'dod chags dang zhe sdang dang gti mug gi yongs su gdung ba 'ang 'byung ste /
sa ca paridāho nādhyātmaṃ na bahirdhā nobhayamantareṇa sthitaḥ yongs su gdung ba de yang nang na yang mi gnas phyi rol na'ang mi gnas /
gnyi ga med par yang mi gnas mod kyi /
api tu mañjuśrīḥ yaducyate moha iti, tatkena kāraṇenocyate moha iti? atyantamukto hi mañjuśrīḥ sarvadharmairmohastenocyate moha iti 'jam dpal 'on kyang gti mug ces bya'o /
de ci'i phyir gti mug ces brjod par bya zhe na /
'jam dpal gti mug ni chos thams cad rab tu grol ba ste /
tathā narakamukhā mañjuśrīḥ sarvadharmā idaṃ dhāraṇīpadam des na gti mug ces bya'o zhes bya ba dang de bzhin du 'jam dpal chos thams cad ni sems can dmyal ba'i sgo ste /
āha /
kathaṃ bhagavannidaṃ dhāraṇīpadam? āha 		'di ni gzungs kyi tshig go /
gsol ba bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na 'di gzungs kyi tshig lags /
narakā mañjuśrīḥ bālapṛgthajanairasadviparyāsaviṭhapitāḥ svavikalpasaṃbhūtāḥ /
āha 		bka' stsal pa 'jam dpal sems can dmyal ba dag ni byis pa so so'i skye bo rnams kyis yod pa ma yin pa la phyin ci log gis bsgrubs shing /
rang gi rnam par rtog pa las byung ba'o /
kutra bhagavannarakāḥ samavasaranti? bhagavānāha /
ākāśasamavasaraṇā mañjuśrīḥ narakāḥ /
tatkiṃ manyase mañjuśrīḥ svavikalpasaṃbhūtā narakā uta svabhāvasaṃbhūtāḥ? āha 		gsol pa bcom ldan 'das sems can dmyal ba dag gang du yang dag par 'du bar 'gyur /
bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
'jam dpal sems can dmyal ba dag ni nam mkhar yang dag par 'du bar 'gyur ro /
'jam dpal de ji snyam du sems /
sems can dmyal ba rang gi rnam par rtog pa las byung ngam /
'on te ngo bo nyid las byung /
svavikalpenaiva bhagavan sarvabālapṛthagjanāṃ narakatiryagyoniyamalokaṃ saṃjānanti gsol pa bcom ldan 'das byis pa so so'i skye bo rnams ni rang gi rnam par rtog pa kho nas sems can dmyal ba dang dud 'gro'i skye gnas dang gshin rje'i 'jig rten du 'du shes te /
te ca asatsamāropeṇa duḥkhāṃ vedanāṃ vedayanti duḥkhamanubhavanti triṣvapyapāyeṣu de dag ma mchis pa la sgro btags pa'i slad du tshor ba sdug bsngal myong zhing /
ngan song gsum du sdug bsngal nyams su myong bar 'gyur lags so /
yathā cāhaṃ bhagavan narakān paśyāmi tathā nārakaṃ duḥkham bcom ldan 'das bdag gis ni ji ltar sems can dmyal ba ma khums pa de bzhin du sems can dmyal ba'i sdug bsngal yang ma khums so /
tadyathā bhagavan kaścideva puruṣaḥ suptaḥ svapnāntaragato narakagatamātmānaṃ saṃjānīte bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste skyes bu la la zhig gnyid kyis log ste rmi lam na bdag nyid sems can dmyal bar ltung bar 'du shes par 'gyur la /
sa tatra kvathitāyāṃ saṃprajvalitāyāmanekapauruṣāyāṃ lohakumbhyāṃ prakṣiptamātmānaṃ saṃjānŌṣyāt des de ni lcags kyi bum pa skyes bu du ma dang ldan pa khol ba 'bar bar bdag nyid bcug par yang 'du shes par 'gyur ro /
sa tatra kharāṃ kaṭukāṃ tŌṣvrāṃ duḥkhāṃ vedanāṃ vedayet des de na sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba drag cing mi bzad la brnag par dka' zhing yid du mi 'ong ba myong bar 'gyur ro /
sa tatra mānasaṃ paridāhaṃ saṃjānŌṣyāt uttraset saṃtrāsamāpadyeta des de na yid kyi gdung ba yongs su myang bar 'gyur /
de de na skrag par 'gyur /
sa tatra pratibuddhaḥ samānaḥ dngangs par 'gyur /
kun tu dngangs par 'gyur ro /
aho duḥkham, aho duḥkham, iti krandet śocet paridevet de de nas sad par 'gyur zhing rlom pa dang bcas pas kyi ma sdug bsngal lo /
atha tasya mitrajñāti sālohitāḥ paripṛccheyuḥ /
kena tatte duḥkhamiti 		kye ma sdug bsngal lo zhes du zhing cho nges 'debs la smre sngags 'don par 'gyur lags so /
sa tān mitrajñātisālohitānevaṃ vadet /
nairayikaṃ duḥkhamanubhūtam /
sa tānākrośet paribhāṣet /
ahaṃ ca nāma nairayikaṃ duḥkhamanubhavāmi /
yūyaṃ ca me uttari paripṛcchatha kenaitattava duḥkhamiti /
atha te mitrajñātisālohitāstaṃ puruṣamevaṃ vadeyuḥ /
mā bhairmoḥ puruṣa 		de nas de la grogs po dang gnyen dang snag gi gnyen mtshams rnams kyis ci zhig gis 'di ltar khyod sdug bsngal bar gyur zhes dris pa dang de grogs po dang gnyen dang snag gi gnyen mtshams de dag la 'di skad du ngas ni sems can dmyal ba'i sdug bsngal nyams su myong ngo zhes smra bar bgyid /
de bdag gis ni sems can dmyal ba'i sdug bsngal nyams su myong na /
khyed cag ci zhig gis 'di ltar khyed sdug bsngal bar gyur zhes 'dri par byed dam zhes de dag la cho nges 'debs par bgyid /
spyo bar bgyid do /
de nas skyes bu de la grogs po dang gnyen dang snag gi gnyen mtshams de dag 'di skad du /
supto hi tvam /
na tvamito gṛhāt kvacinnirgataḥ 		kye skyes bu mi 'jigs shig ma 'jigs shig khyod ni gnyid kyis log pa yin gyi /
tasya punarapi smṛti rutpadyate khyod khyim 'di nas gar yang song ba med do zhes smra bar bgyid do /
supto 'hamabhūvam /
vitathametanmayā parikalpitamiti /
sa punarapi saumanasyaṃ pratilabhate 		de yang bdag ni gnyid kyis log par gyur te /
yang dag pa ma yin pa 'di bdag gis kun du brtags so snyam du de la dran pa skye bar 'gyur zhing /
slar yang de yid bde ba 'thob par 'gyur lags so /
tadyathā bhagavan sa puruṣo 'satsamāropeṇa suptaḥ svapnāntaragato narakagatamātmānaṃ saṃjānīyāt, evameva bhagavan sarvabālapṛthagjanā asadbhāgaparyavanaddhāḥ strīnimittaṃ kalpayanti bcom ldan 'das ji ltar skyes bu gnyid kyis log pa de yod pa ma yin pa la sgro btags nas bdag nyid rmi lam du dmyal bar song bas 'du shes par 'gyur ba de bzhin du /
bcom ldan 'das byis pa so so'i skye bo bden pa ma lags pa'i 'dod chags kyis kun nas bcings pa thams cad bud med la mtshan mar rtog par bgyid do /
te strīnimittaṃ kalpayitvā tābhiḥ sārdhaṃ ramamāṇamātmānaṃ saṃjānanti de dag bud med la mtshan mar brtags nas bdag nyid de dag dang lhan cig rtse zhing dga' bar 'du shes so /
tasya bālapṛthajanasyaivaṃ bhavati byis pa so so'i skye bo de 'di snyam du bdag ni skyes pa'o /
ahaṃ puruṣaḥ, iyaṃ strī, mamaiṣā strī /
tasya tena cchandarāgaparyavasthitena cittena bhogaparyeṣṭiṃ cittaṃ krāmayanti 		'di ni bud med do /
bud med 'di bdag gi'o snyam du 'gyur zhing de 'dun pa'i 'dod chags kyis kun nas dkris pa'i sems des longs spyod tshol bar sems 'jug par 'gyur lags so /
sa tatonidānaṃ kalahavigrahavivādaṃ saṃjanayati de gzhi de las 'thab pa dang rtsod pa dang g yul 'gyed par bgyid cing /
tasya praduṣṭendriyasya vairaṃ saṃjāyate gdug pa'i dbang po dang ldan pa de la khon du 'dzin pa 'byung bar 'gyur lags so /
sa tena saṃjñāviparyāsena kālagataḥ samāno bahūni kalpasahasrāṇi narakeṣu duḥkhāṃ vedanāṃ vedayamānamātmānaṃ saṃjānāti rlom pa dang bcas pa de 'du shes phyin ci log des 'chi ba'i dus bgyis par gyur nas bdag nyid bskal pa stong phrag mang por sems can dmyal ba dag tu sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba myong bar 'du shes so /
tadyathā bhagavan tasya puruṣasya mitrajñātisālohitā evaṃ vadanti /
mā bhaiḥ, mā bhaiḥ, bho puruṣa 		bcom ldan 'das ji ltar skyes bu de la grogs po dang gnyen dang snag gi gnyen mtshams rnams kyis 'di skad du kye skyes bu ma 'jigs shig ma 'jigs shig khyod ni gnyid kyis log pa yin gyi /
supto hi tvam /
na tvamito gṛhyat kutaścinnirgataḥ iti 		khyod khyim 'di nas gar yang song ba med do zhes smra bar bgyid pa de bzhin du /
evameva buddhā bhagavantaścaturviparyāsaviparyastānāṃ sattvānāmevaṃ dharmaṃ deśayanti bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis kyang phyin ci log bzhis phyin ci log tu gyur pa'i sems can rnams la 'di skad du chos bstan te /
nātra strī na puruṣo na sattvo na jīvo na puruṣo na pudgalaḥ 'di la bud med kyang med /
skyes pa yang med /
sems can yang med /
vitathā ime sarvadharmāḥ /
asanta ime sarvadharmāḥ 		sreg kyang med /
gso ba yang med /
gang zag kyang med de /
chos 'di dag thams cad na lag pa /
viṭhapitā ime sarvadharmāḥ chos 'di dag thams cad ni yod pa ma yin pa /
māyopamā ime sarvadharmāḥ chos 'di dag thams cad ni phyin ci log gis bsgrubs pa /
svapnopamā ime sarvadharmāḥ chos 'di dag thams cad ni sgyu ma lta bu /
nirmitopamā ime sarvadharmāḥ /
udakacandropamā ime sarvadharmāḥ 		chos 'di dag thams cad ni rmi lam lta bu /
chos 'di dag thams cad ni sbrul pa lta bu /
iti vistaraḥ /
te imāṃ tathāgatasya dharmadeśanāṃ śrutvā vigatarāgān sarvadharmān paśyanti 		chos 'di dag thams cad ni chu zla lta bu ste zhes rgyas par 'byung ba dang de bzhin du de dag de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos bstan pa thos nas chos thams cad 'dod chags dang bral bar khums so /
vigatamohān sarvadharmān paśyanti asvabhāvānanāvaraṇān chos thams cad zhe sdang dang bral ba dang gti mug dang bral ba dang ngo bo nyid med pa dang sgrib pa med par khums so /
te ākāśasthitena cetasā kālaṃ kurvanti de dag sems nam mkha' la gnas pas 'chi ba'i dus bgyid par 'gyur zhing /
te kālagatāḥ samānā nirupadhiśeṣe nirvāṇadhātau parinirvānti 'chi ba'i dus bgyis ma thag tu phung po lhag ma med pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ste /
evamahaṃ bhagavan narakān paśyāmi /
iti 		bcom ldan 'das de ltar bdag gis sems can dmyal ba khums lags so zhes gsungs so /
uktaṃ ca āryopāliparipṛcchāyām 'phags pa nye ba 'khor gyis zhus pa las kyang /
bhaya darśita nairayikaṃ me sattvasahasra savejita naike sems dmyal 'jigs pa nga yis bstan byas te /
sems can stong phrag du ma skyo byas kyang /
na ca vidyati kaściha sattva yo cyutu gacchati ghoramapāyam gang dag shi 'phos ngan song drag 'gro ba'i /
'gro ba de dag nam yang yod ma yin /
na ca kāraku kāraṇa santi yehi kṛtā asitomaraśastrāḥ gang dag ral gri mda' chen mtshon 'byin pa'i /
gnod pa byed pa yod pa ma yin te /
kalpavaśena tu paśyati tatra kāyi patanti apāyita śastrāḥ rtog pa'i dbang gis ngan song de dag na /
lus la 'bab mthong de na mtshon cha med /
citramanorama sajjitapuṣpāḥ svarṇavimāna jalanti manojñāḥ sna tshogs yid dga' me tog kha bye zhing /
gser gyi khang mchog 'bar ba yid 'ong ba /
teṣvapi kāraku nāstiha kaści te 'pi ca sthāpita kalpavaśena 'di na de la 'ang byed pa 'ga' med do /
de dag rtog pa'i dbang gis gzhag pa yin /
kalpavaśena vikalpitu lokaḥ saṃjñagaheṇa vikalpitu bālaḥ rtog pa'i dbang gis 'jig rten rnam brtags te /
'du shes 'dzin pas byis pa rnam par phye /
so ca gaho agaho asabhūto māyamarīcisamā hi vikalpāḥ 'dzin dang 'dzin med de yang 'byung min te /
yongs su rtog pa sgyu ma smig rgyu bzhin /
tadevamete 'svabhāvā bhāvāḥ svaviparyāsaviṭhapitā bālānāṃ saṃkleśahetavo bhavanti saṃsāre iti sthitam zhes gsungs so /
de'i phyir de ltar na dngos po yod pa ma yin pa'i rang bzhin can phyin ci log gis bzhag pa rnams ni 'khor ba na byis pa rnams kyi kun nas nyon mongs pa'i rgyur 'gyur ro zhes bya bar gnas so /
yathā ca mṛṣāsvabhāvānāṃ padārthānāṃ saṃkleśavyavadānahetutvaṃ tathā madhyamakāvatārādvistareṇāvaseyam dngos po brdzun pa'i rang bzhin can rnams ji ltar kun nas nyon mongs pa dang rnam par byang ba'i rgyu nyid yin pa de ltar ni rgyas par dbu ma la 'jug pa las nges par bya'o /
atrāha /
yadi svataḥ parataḥ ubhayato 'hetutaśca nāsti bhāvānāmutpādaḥ, tatra kathamavidyā pratyayāḥ saṃskārā ityuktaṃ bhagavatā? ucyate 		'dir smras pa /
gal te bdag dang gzhan dang gnyi ga dang rgyu med pa las dngos po rnams skye ba yod pa ma yin na /
ji ltar bcom ldan 'das kyis ma rig pa'i rkyen gyis 'du byed rnams zhes gsungs /
bshad par bya ste /
saṃvṛtireva na tattvam /
kiṃ saṃvṛtervyavasthānaṃ vaktavyam? idaṃpratyayatāmātreṇa saṃvṛteḥ siddhirabhyupagamyate 		'di ni kun rdzob pa yin gyi de kho na nyid ni ma yin no /
ci kun rdzob kyi rnam par gzhag pa brjod par bya ba yin nam zhe na /
rkyen nyid 'di pa tsam gyis kun rdzob grub par khas len gyi /
na tu pakṣacatuṣṭayābhyupagamena sasvabhāvavādaprasaṅgāt, tasya cāyuktatvāt phyogs bzhi khas blangs pa'i sgo nas ni ma yin te /
dngos po rang bzhin dang bcas pa smra bar thal bar 'gyur ba'i phyir dang de yang rigs pa ma yin pa'i phyir ro /
idaṃpratyayatāmātrābhyupagame hi sati hetuphalayoranyonyāpekṣatvānnāsti svābhāvikī siddhiriti nāsti sasvabhāvavādaḥ /
ata evoktam 		rkyen nyid 'di pa tsam zhig khas blangs na ni rgyu dang 'bras bu gnyis phan tshun ltos pa'i phyir /
ngo bo nyid kyis grub pa yod pa ma yin pas dngos po rang bzhin dang bcas par smra bar 'gyur ba ma yin no /
de nyid kyi phyir /
svayaṃ kṛtaṃ parakṛtaṃ dvābhyāṃ kṛtamahetukam sdug bsngal rang gis byas pa dang /
gzhan gyis byas dang gnyi gas byas /
tārkikairiṣyate duḥkhaṃ tvayā tūktaṃ pratītyajam /
ihāpi vakṣyati 		rgyu med rtog ge ba yis 'dod /
khyod kyis brtan nas 'byung bar gsungs /
zhes gsungs so /
'di nyid las kyang /
pratītya kārakaḥ karma taṃ pratītya ca kārakam byed po las la brten byas shing /
las kyang byed po de nyid la /
karma pravartate nānyatpaśyāmaḥ siddhikāraṇam brten nas 'byung ba ma gtogs pa /
grub pa'i rgyu ni ma mthong ngo /
iti /
bhagavatāpyetāvanmātramevoktam /
tatrāyaṃ dharmasaṃketo yadutāsmin satīdaṃ bhavati, asyotpādādidamutpadyate, yaduta avidyā pratyayāḥ saṃskārāḥ, saṃskārapratyayaṃ vijñānamityādi 		zhes 'chad par 'gyur ro /
bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang de la chos kyi brda ni 'di yin te /
'di lta ste 'di yod pas 'di 'byung la /
'di skyes pas 'di skye ste /
gang 'di ma rig pa'i rkyen gyis 'du byed rnams /
'du byed kyi rkyen gyis rnam par shes pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa 'di tsam zhig kho na gsungs so /
atra kecitparicodayanti 'dir 'ga' zhig dag rgol bar byed de /
anutpannā bhāvā iti kimayaṃ pramāṇajo niścaya utāpramāṇajaḥ? tatra yadi pramāṇaja iṣyate, tadedaṃ vaktavyam /
kati pramāṇāni kiṃlakṣaṇāni kiṃviṣayāṇi, kiṃ svata utpannāni kiṃ parata ubhayato 'hetuto veti 		dngos po rnams skye ba med do snyam pa'i nges pa 'di tshad ma las skyes pa zhig gam /
'on te tshad ma ma yin pa las skyes pa zhig yin grang /
de la gal te tshad ma las skyes par 'dod na ni /
tshad ma dag ni du zhig /
mtshan nyid ni gang /
yul dag ni ci zhig /
ci bdag las skyes pa zhig gam /
gzhan nam gnyi ga'am rgyu med pa las yin zhes bya ba 'di brjod par bya'o /
athāpramāṇajaḥ, sa na yuktaḥ, pramāṇādhīnatvātprameyādhigamasya /
anadhigato hyartho na vinā pramāṇairadhigantuṃ śakyata iti pramāṇābhāvādarthādhigamābhāve sati kuto 'yaṃ samyagniścaya iti na yuktametadaniṣpannā bhāvā iti 		'on te tshad ma ma yin pa las skyes pa yin na ni /
de ni mi rigs te /
gzhal bya rtogs pa ni tshad ma la rag las pa'i phyir te /
rtogs par ma gyur pa'i don ni tshad ma med par rtogs par mi nus so /
tshad ma med pas don rtogs pa yang med na ni khyod kyi yang dag pa'i nges pa 'di ga las 'gyur te /
de'i phyir dngos po rnams skye ba med do zhes bya ba 'di ni rigs pa ma yin no /
yato vāyaṃ niścayo bhavato 'nutpannā bhāvā iti bhaviṣyati, tata eva mamāpi sarvabhāvāḥ santīti yang na khyed kyi dngos po rnams skye ba med do zhes bya ba'i nges pa 'di gang las gyur pa 'di nyid las nga'i dngos po thams cad yod pa yin no zhes bya ba yang yin la /
yathā cāyaṃ te niścayaḥ /
anutpannāḥ sarvadharmā iti, tathaiva mamāpi sarvabhāvotpattirbhaviṣyati 		yang ji ltar khyod kyi dngos po thams cad skye ba med do zhes bya ba'i nges pa 'dir 'gyur ba de kho na ltar nga'i dngos po thams cad skye bar yang 'gyur ro /
atha te nāsti niścayo 'nutpannāḥ sarvabhāvā iti, tadā svayamaniścitasya parapratyāyanāsaṃbhavācchāstrārambhavaiyarthyameveti santyapratiṣiddhāḥ sarvabhāvā iti ci ste khyod la dngos po thams cad skye ba med do snyam pa'i nges pa 'di med na ni /
de'i tshe rang nyid kyis kyang ma nges pas gzhan khong du chud par byed pa mi srid pa'i phyir bstan bcos rtsom pa don med pa nyid du 'gyur te /
des na dngos po thams cad bkag pa med par yod pa yin no zhe na /
ucyate /
yadi kaścinniścayo nāmāsmākaṃ syāt, sa pramāṇajo vā syādapramāṇajo vā 		brjod par bya ste /
gal te kho bo cag la nges pa zhes bya ba 'ga' zhig yod par 'gyur na ni /
de tshad ma las skyes pa'am /
tshad ma ma yin pa las skyes pa zhig tu 'gyur na /
na tvasti /
kiṃ kāraṇam? ihāniścayasaṃbhave sati syāttatpratipakṣastadapekṣo niścayaḥ 		yod pa ni ma yin no /
ci'i phyir zhe na /
'dir ma nges pa yod na ni de la ltos shing de'i gnyen por gyur pa'i nges pa yang yod par 'gyur ba zhig na /
yadā tvaniścaya eva tāvadasmākaṃ nāsti, tadā kutastadviruddhāviruddho niścayaḥ syāt saṃbandhyantaranirapekṣatvāt, kharaviṣāṇasya hrasvadīrghatāvat gang gi tshe re zhig kho bo cag la ma nges pa nyid yod pa ma yin pa de'i tshe ni de dang 'gal ba'i nges pa yod par gal 'gyur te /
'brel ba can gzhan la ma ltos pa'i phyir /
yadā caivaṃ niścayasyābhāvaḥ, tadā kasya prasiddhayarthaṃ pramāṇāni parikalpayiṣyāmaḥ? kuto vaiṣāṃ saṃkhyā lakṣaṇaṃ viṣayo vā bhaviṣyati bong bu'i rva'i ring po dang thung ba nyid bzhin no /
gang gi tshe de ltar nges pa med pa de'i tshe ci zhig 'grub par bya ba'i phyir tshad ma dag yongs su rtog par byed /
svataḥ parata ubhayato 'hetuto vā samutpattiriti sarvametanna vaktavyamasmābhiḥ de dag gi grangs dang mtshan nyid dang yul dang bdag gam gzhan nam gnyi ga'am rgyu med pa las skye zhes bya bar yang ga la 'gyur te /
yadyevaṃ niścayo nāsti sarvataḥ, kathaṃ punaridaṃ niścitarūpaṃ vākyamupalabhyate bhavatām 'di dag thams cad ni kho bo cag gis brjod par bya ba ma yin pa zhig go /
gal te de ltar khyod la nges pa yod pa ma yin na /
khyed cag gi dngos po rnams ni /
bdag las ma yin gzhan las min /
na svato nāpi parato na dvābhyāṃ nāpyahetuto bhāvā bhavantīti? ucyate gnyis las ma yin rgyu med min /
zhes bya ba'i nges pa'i rang bzhin gyi ngag 'di ji ltar dmigs zhe na /
niścitamidaṃ vākyaṃ lokasya svaprasiddhayaivopapattyā, nāryāṇām brjod par bya ste /
nges par gyur pa'i ngag 'di ni rang la grub pa'i 'thad pa'i sgo nas 'jig rten la yod kyi /
'phags pa rnams la ni ma yin no /
kiṃ khalu āryāṇāmupapattirnāsti? kenaitaduktamasti vā nāsti veti ci 'phags pa rnams la rigs pa mi mnga' 'am zhe na /
yod pa'am med pa 'di sus smras /
paramārtho hyāryāṇāṃ tūṣṇīṃbhāvaḥ 'phags pa rnams kyi don dam pa ni cang mi gsung ba yin te /
tataḥ kutastatra prapañcasaṃbhavo yadupapattiranupapattirvā syāt? /
yadi hyāryā upapattiṃ na varṇayanti, kena khalvidānīṃ paramārthaṃ lokaṃ bodhayiṣyanti? na khalvāryā lokasaṃvyavahāreṇopapattiṃ varṇayanti, kiṃ tu lokata eva yā prasiddhopapattiḥ, tāṃ parāvabodhārthamabhyupetya tayaiva lokaṃ bodhayanti 		de'i phyir gang la 'thad pa dang 'thad pa ma yin pa mi mnga' bar 'gyur ba de dag la spros pa mnga' bar ga la 'gyur /
gal te 'phags pa rnams 'thad pa gsung bar mi mdzad na /
da ni ci zhig gis 'jig rten pas don dam pa khong du chud par mdzad ce na /
'phags pa rnams ni 'jig rten gyi tha snyad kyis 'thad pa mi gsung gi /
'on kyang 'jig rten kho na la rab tu grags pa'i 'thad pa gang yin pa de dag gzhan rtogs par bya ba'i phyir zhal gyis bzhes nas de nyid kyis 'jig rten khong du chud par mdzad do /
yathaiva hi vidyamānāmapi śarīrāśucitāṃ viparyāsānugatā rāgiṇo nopalabhante, śubhākāraṃ cābhūtamadhyāropya parikliśyante, teṣāṃ vairāgyārthaṃ tathāgatanirmito devo vā śubhasaṃjñayā prāk pracchāditān kāyadoṣānupavarṇayet ji ltar lus la mi gtsang ba nyid yod du zin kyang phyin ci log gi rjes su song ba'i 'dod chags can rnams kyis dmigs par mi 'gyur zhing /
yang dag pa ma yin yang gtsang ba'i rnam par sgro btags nas yongs su nyon mongs par 'gyur ro /
santyasmin kāye keśā ityādinā /
te ca tasyāḥ śubhasaṃjñāyā vimuktā vairāgyamāsādayeyuḥ /
evamihāpyāryaiḥ sarvathāpyanupalabhyamānātmakaṃ bhāvānāmavidyātimiropahatamatinayanatayā viparītaṃ svabhāvamadhyāropya kvacicca kaṃcidviśeṣamatitarāṃ parikliśyanti pṛthagjanāḥ /
tānidānīmāryāḥ tatprasiddhayaivopapattyā paribodhayanti 		de dag 'dod chags dang bral bar bya ba'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa'i sprul pa'am lhas /
lus 'di la skra zhes bya ba la sogs pas sngar gtsang ba'i 'du shes kyis bkab pa'i lus kyi skyon rnams nye bar ston par byed do /
de dag kyang gtsang ba'i 'du shes de dang bral bas 'dod chags dang bral ba thob par 'gyur ba de bzhin du 'di na so so'i skye bo dag kyang ma rig pa'i rab rib kyis blo gros kyi mig nyams pa nyid kyis dngos po rnams kyi rang bzhin phyin ci log /
'phags pa rnams kyis rnam pa thams cad du ma dmigs pa'i bdag nyid can dang 'ga' zhig tu khyad par 'ga' zhig lhag par sgro btags nas chos shin tu nyon mongs par 'gyur te /
yathā vidyamānasya ghaṭasya na mṛdādibhya utpāda ityabhyupetam, evamutpādātpūrvaṃ vidyamānasya vidyamānatvānnāstyutpāda ityavasīyatām de dag da ltar 'phags pa rnams kyis bum pa yod pa 'jim pa la sogs pa dag las skye ba ma yin no zhes khas blangs pa de bzhin du skyes pa'i snga rol nas yod pa la yang skye ba yod pa ma yin te /
yod pa'i phyir ro zhes bya bar nges par gyis shig /
yathā ca parabhūtebhyo jvālāṅgārādibhyo 'ṅkurasyotpattirnāsti iti abhyupetam, evaṃ vivakṣitebhyo 'pi bījādibhyo nāstītyavasīyatām yang ji ltar me dang sol ba la sogs pa gzhan du gyur pa dag las myu gu skye ba yod pa ma yin no zhes bya bar khas blangs pa de bzhin du sa bon la sogs pa brjod par 'dod pa dag las kyang yod pa ma yin no zhes nges par gyis shig /
athāpi syāt /
anubhava eṣo 'smākamiti, etadapyuktam 		ci ste yang 'di ni kho bo cag gis nyams su myong ba yin no snyam na 'di yang mi rigs te /
yasmādanubhava eṣa mṛṣā, anubhavatvāt, taimirikadvicandrādyanubhavavaditi 'di ltar nyams su myong ba ni brdzun pa'i don can yin te /
nyams su myong ba yin pa'i phyir rab rib can gyis zla ba gnyis nyams su myong ba bzhin no /
tataścānubhavasyāpi sādhyasamatvāttena pratyavasthānaṃ na yuktamiti /
tasmādanutpannā bhāvā ityevaṃ tāvadviparītasvarūpādhyāropapratipakṣeṇa prathamaprakaraṇārambhaḥ 		de'i phyir nyams su myong ba yang bsgrub par bya ba dang mtshungs pa nyid yin pa'i phyir des phyir bzlog par rigs pa ma yin no zhes de dag la grags pa nyid kyis khong du chud par mdzad pa yin no /
de'i phyir dngos po rnams skye ba med pa yin no /
de ltar re zhig de'i rang bzhin phyin ci log lhag par sgro btags pa'i gnyen por rab tu byed pa dang po brtsams pa yin no /
idānīṃ kvacidyaḥ kaścidviśeṣo 'dhyāropitaḥ, tadviśeṣāpākaraṇārthaṃ śeṣaprakaraṇārambhaḥ, gantṛgantavyagamanādiko 'pi niravaśeṣo viśeṣo nāsti pratītyasamutpādasyeti pratipādanārtham /
atha syāt 		de nas khyad par 'ga' zhig 'ga' zhig tu sgro btags pa'i khyad par de bsal bar bya ba'i phyir rab tu byed pa lhag ma brtsams pa yin te /
rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba la 'gro ba po dang bgrod par bya ba dang 'gro bar bya ba la sogs pa khyad par ro cog ma lus pa yang yod pa ma yin no zhes bstan par bya ba'i don du'o /
eṣa eva pramāṇapremeyavyavahāro laukiko 'smābhiḥ śāstreṇānuvarṇita iti, tadanuvarṇanasya tarhi phalaṃ vācyam ci ste tshad ma dang gzhal bya'i tha snyad 'jig rten pa 'di nyid kho bo cag gi bstan bcos su brjod pa yin no snyam na /
'o na ni de brjod pa'i dgos pa bsnyad par bya dgos so /
kutārkikaiḥ sa nāśito viparītalakṣaṇābhidhānena, tasyāsmābhiḥ samyaglakṣaṇamuktamiti cet, etadapyayuktam gal te rtog ge pa dag gis mtshan nyid phyin ci log brjod pas /
de brlag par byas pas kho bo cag gis de'i mtshan nyid yang dag par brjod pa yin no zhe na /
yadi hi kutārkikairviparītalakṣaṇapraṇayanātkṛtaṃ lakṣyavaiparītyaṃ lokasya syāt, tadarthaṃ prayatnasāphalyaṃ syāt /
na caitadevam /
iti vyartha evārya prayatna iti 		'di yang mi rigs te /
gal te 'jig rten la rtog ge ngan pas mtshan nyid phyin ci log brjod pas byas pa'i mtshon bya phyin ci log yod par 'gyur na ni de'i don du 'bad pa 'bras bu dang bcas par 'gyur ba zhig na /
de ni de ltar yang ma yin pas 'bad pa 'di don med pa nyid do /
api ca /
yadi pramāṇādhīnaḥ prameyādhigamaḥ, tāni pramāṇāni kena paricchidyanta ityādinā vigrahavyāvartanyāṃ vihito doṣaḥ /
tadaparihārāt samyaglakṣaṇadyotakatvamapi nāsti /
kiṃ ca /
yadi svasāmānyalakṣaṇadvayānurodhena pramāṇadvayamuktaṃ yasya tallakṣaṇadvayam, kiṃ tallakṣyamasti atha nāsti? yadyasti, tadā tadaparaṃ prameyamastīti kathaṃ pramāṇadvayam? atha nāsti lakṣyam, tadā lakṣaṇamapi nirāśrayaṃ nāstīti kathaṃ pramāṇadvayam? vakṣyati hi 		gzhan yang gal te gzhal bya rtogs pa tshad ma la rag las pa yin na tshad ma de dag gang gis yongs su gcod par byed ces bya ba la sogs pa rtsod pa bzlog pa las bshad pa'i skyon de ma spangs pas yang dag pa'i mtshan nyid gsal bar byed pa nyid kyang yod pa ma yin no /
gzhan yang gal te rang dang spyi'i mtshan nyid gnyis kyi dbang gis mtshan ma gnyis smra na ni /
ci mtshan nyid de gnyis gang la yod pa'i mtshan gzhi de yod dam 'on te med /
gal te yod na ni de'i tshe de dag las gzhal bya yod pas ji ltar tshad ma gnyis yin /
'on te mtshan gzhi med na ni de'i tshe rten med pas mtshan nyid kyang yod pa ma yin pas ji ltar tshad ma gnyis su 'gyur te /
lakṣaṇāsaṃpravṛttau ca na lakṣyamupapadyate mtshan nyid 'jug pa ma yin na /
mtshan gzhi 'thad par mi 'gyur ro /
lakṣyasyānupapattau ca lakṣaṇasyāpyasaṃbhavaḥ mtshan gzhi 'thad pa ma yin na /
mtshan nyid kyang ni yod ma yin /
iti /
atha syāt /
na lakṣyate 'neneti lakṣaṇam, kiṃ tarhi 'kṛtyalyuṭo bahulam'; iti karmaṇi lyuṭaṃ kṛtvā lakṣyate taditi lakṣaṇam 		zhes 'chad par 'gyur ro /
ci ste yang 'dis mtshon par byed pas ni mtshan nyid ma yin gyi /
'o na ci zhe na /
byed pa dang lugs ni phal che'o zhes bya bas las la lyu ta byas nas 'di mtshon par bya bas na mtshan nyid yin no snyam na /
evamapi tenaitasya lakṣyamāṇatvāsaṃbhavādyenaitallakṣyate, tasya karaṇasya karmaṇo 'rthāntaratvāt sa eva doṣaḥ de lta na yang de nyid kyis mtshon par bya ba nyid du mi srid pa'i phyir /
gang gis de mtshon par byed pa'i byed pa de dang las tha dad pa yin pa'i phyir nyes pa de nyid du 'gyur ro /
atha syāt /
jñānasya karaṇatvāttasya ca svalakṣaṇāntarbhāvādayamadoṣa iti, ucyate /
iha bhāvānāmanyāsādhāraṇamātmīyaṃ yatsvarūpaṃ tatsvalakṣaṇam, tadyathā pṛthivyāḥ kāṭhinyaṃ vedanāyā viṣayānubhavo vijñānasya viṣayaprativijñaptiḥ 		ci ste shes pa byed pa yin pa'i phyir la /
de yang rang gi mtshan nyid kyi khongs su 'du ba'i phyir nyes pa 'di med do snyam na /
bshad par bya ste /
re zhig 'dir ji ltar des de mtshon par byed pas sa'i sra ba dang tshor ba'i myong ba dang rnam par shes pa'i yul so sor rnam par rig pa ltar bdag nyid kyi rang gi ngo bo gzhan dang thun mong ma yin pa gang yin pa de ni rang gi mtshan nyid yin na /
tena hi tallakṣyata iti kṛtvā prasiddhānugatāṃ ca vyutpattimavadhūya karmasādhanamabhyupagacchati rab tu grags pa dang rjes su 'brel pa'i bye brag tu bshad pa bor nas /
las su sgrub pa khas len zhing rnam par shes pa byed pa'i ngo bor rtogs pas ni /
vijñānasya ca karaṇabhāvaṃ pratipadyamānenetyuktaṃ bhavati svalakṣaṇasyaiva karmatā svalakṣaṇāntarasya karaṇabhāvaśceti rang gi mtshan nyid kho na las nyid yin zhing /
rang gi mtshan nyid gzhan ni byed pa'i ngo bo yin no zhes bya ba 'di smras par 'gyur ro /
tatra yadi vijñānasvalakṣaṇaṃ karaṇam, tasya vyatiriktena karmaṇā bhavitavyamiti sa eva doṣaḥ /
atha syāt 		de la gal te rnam par shes pa'i rang gi mtshan nyid byed pa yin na ni /
de la tha dad par gyur pa'i las shig yod par 'gyur dgos pas nyes pa de nyid du 'gyur ro /
yatpṛthivyādigataṃ kāṭhinyādikaṃ vijñānagamyaṃ tattasya karmāstyeva, tacca svalakṣaṇāvyatiriktamiti ci ste sa la sogs par gtogs pa'i sra ba la sogs pa rnam par shes pas rtogs par bya ba gang yin pa de ni de'i las yin la /
de yang rang gi mtshan nyid las tha dad pa ma yin no snyam na /
evaṃ tarhi vijñānasvalakṣaṇasya karmatvābhāvātprameyatvaṃ na syāt, karmarūpasyaiva svalakṣaṇasya prameyatvāt de lta na ni 'on rnam par shes pa'i rang gi mtshan nyid las ma yin pa'i phyir gzhal bya nyid du mi 'gyur te /
las kyi rang bzhin gyi rang gi mtshan nyid kho na gzhal bya yin pa'i phyir ro /
de'i phyir gzhal bya ni rnam pa gnyis te /
tataśca dvividhaṃ prameyaṃ svalakṣaṇaṃ sāmānyalakṣaṇaṃ ca ityetadviśeṣya vaktavyam rang gi mtshan nyid dang spyi'i mtshan nyid do zhes bya bar /
rang gi mtshan nyid cung zad cig ni gzhal bya yin te /
kiṃcitsvalakṣaṇaṃ prameyaṃ yallakṣyata ityevaṃ vyapadiśyate, kiṃcidaprameyaṃ yallakṣyate 'neneti vyapadiśyata iti mtshon par bya bas na zhes de ltar bsnyad pa gang yin pa'o /
cung zad cig ni gzhal bya ma yin te 'dis mtshon par byed pas na zhes brjod pa gang yin pa'o zhes khyad par 'di tsam zhig brjod par bya dgos so /
atha tadapi karmasādhanaṃ tadā tasyānyena karaṇena bhavitavyam ci ste de yang las su sgrub pa yin na ni /
de'i tshe de la byed pa gzhan zhig yod par bya dgos la /
jñānāntarasya karaṇabhāvaparikalpanāyāmanavasthādoṣaścāpadyate shes pa gzhan zhig byed pa'i ngo bor rtogs na yang thug pa med pa'i skyon du 'gyur ro /
atha manyase /
svasaṃvittirasti, tatastayā svasaṃvityā grahaṇātkarmatāyā satyāmastyeva prameyāntarbhāva iti, ucyate 		ci ste rang rig pa yod de des na rang rig pas des de 'dzin pa'i phyir las nyid yin dang gzhal bya'i khongs su 'du ba yod pa yin no snyam du sems na /
bshad par bya ste /
vistareṇa madhyamakāvatāre svasaṃvittiniṣedhāt svalakṣaṇaṃ svalakṣaṇāntareṇa lakṣyate, tadapi svasaṃvittyā iti na yujyate /
api ca /
tadapi nāma jñānaṃ svalakṣaṇavyatirekeṇāsiddherasaṃbhavāllakṣyābhāve nirāśrayalakṣaṇapravṛttyasaṃbhavāt sarvathā nāstīti kutaḥ svasaṃvittiḥ? tathā coktamāryaratnacūḍaparipṛcchāyām 		dbu ma la 'jug pa las rang rig pa rgyas par bkag pa'i phyir rang gi mtshan nyid ni rang gi mtshan nyid gzhan gyis mtshon par byed pa la /
de yang rang rig pa des mtshon par byed do zhes bya ba ni rigs pa ma yin no /
gzhan yang shes pa de yang mi srid pa'i phyir rang gi mtshan nyid las tha dad par ma grub la /
mtshan gzhi med na rten med pa'i mtshan nyid 'jug pa med pa'i phyir rnam pa thams cad du yod pa ma yin pas rang rig pa ga la yod /
de skad du yang 'phags pa gtsug na rin po ches zhus pa las /
sa cittamasamanupaśyan cittadhārāṃ paryeṣate kutaścittasyotpattiriti /
tasyaivaṃ bhavati /
ālambane sati cittamutpadyate /
tatkimanyadālambanamanyaccittam, atha yadevālambanaṃ tadeva cittam? yadi tāvadanyadālambanamanyaccittam, tadā dvicittatā bhaviṣyati /
atha yadevālambanaṃ tadeva cittam, tatkathaṃ cittena cittaṃ samanupaśyati? na ca cittaṃ cittaṃ samanupaśyati /
tadyathāpi nāma tayaivāsidhārayā saivāsidhārā na śakyate chettum, na tenaivāṅgulyagreṇa tadevāṅgulyagraṃ śakyate spraṣṭum, evameva na tenaiva cittena tadeva cittaṃ śakyaṃ draṣṭum 		de sems yang dag par rjes su ma mthong bas /
sems gang las byung zhes sems kyi rgyun kun du tshol zhing de 'di snyam du sems te /
dmigs pa yod pa las sems 'byung bar 'gyur ro snyam mo /
de yang 'di snyam du sems te /
ci dmigs pa de yang gzhan la sems de yang gzhan nam /
'on te dmigs pa gang yin pa de nyid sems yin /
gal te re zhig dmigs pa yang gzhan la sems kyang gzhan na ni sems de gnyis su 'gyur ro /
'on te dmigs pa gang yin pa de nyid sems yin na ni /
sems kyis sems de ji ltar mthong bar 'gyur te /
sems kyis sems de mthong bar mi rung ngo /
'di lta ste dper na ral gri'i so de nyid kyis ral gri'i so de nyid bcad par mi nus pa dang sor mo'i rtse mo de nyid kyis sor mo'i rtse mo de nyid la reg par mi nus pa de bzhin du /
sems de nyid kyis sems de nyid mthong bar mi nus so snyam nas /
de 'di ltar tshul bzhin rab tu sbyor ba la /
gang sems mi gnas pa /
chad pa ma yin pa /
rtag pa ma yin pa /
ther zug tu mi gnas pa /
rgyu med pa ma yin /
rkyen dang mi 'gal ba de las kyang ma yin pa /
tasyaivaṃ yoniśaḥ prayuktasya yā cittasyānavasthānatā anucchedāśāśvatatā na kūṭasthatā nāhetukī na pratyayaviruddhā na tato nānyato na saiva nānyā /
tāṃ cittadhārāṃ cittalatāṃ cittadharmatāṃ cittānavasthitatāṃ cittāpracāratāṃ cittādṛśyatāṃ cittasvalakṣaṇatāṃ tathā jānāti tathā paśyati yathā tathatāṃ na ca nirodhayati /
tāṃ ca cittavivekatāṃ tathā prajānāti tathā paśyati 		gzhan las kyang ma yin pa /
de nyid kyang ma yin pa gzhan yang ma yin pa'i sems kyi rgyud sems kyi 'khri shing /
sems kyi chos nyid /
sems kyi mi gnas pa dang sems rgyu ba med pa dang sems snang ba med pa dang sems kyi rang gi mtshan nyid de ji ltar de bzhin nyid 'khrug par mi byed pa de ltar shes so /
de ltar mthong ngo /
de bzhin nyid ji lta ba de bzhin du sems de dag dben pa nyid du rab tu shes /
iyaṃ kulaputra [bodhisattvasya] citte cittānupaśyanā smṛtyupasthānamiti /
tadevaṃ nāsti svasaṃvittiḥ 		de bzhin du mthong ba 'di ni rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa'i sems la sems kyi rjes su lta ba'i dran pa nye bar gzhag pa'i spyod pa yongs su dag pa'o zhes gsungs so /
de'i phyir de ltar rang rig pa med la /
tadabhāvāt kiṃ kena lakṣyate? /
kiṃ ca /
bhedena vā tallakṣaṇaṃ lakṣyātsyādabhedena vā? tatra yadi tāvad bhedena, tadā lakṣyād bhinnatvādalakṣaṇavallakṣaṇamapi na lakṣaṇam 		de med pas gang zhig gang gis mtshon par byed /
gzhan yang mtshan nyid de mtshan gzhi las tha dad par 'gyur ram tha mi dad par 'gyur grang /
de la gal te re zhig tha dad pa yin na ni /
de'i tshe mtshan gzhi las tha dad pa'i phyir mtshan nyid ma yin pa bzhin du mtshan nyid kyang mtshan nyid ma yin par 'gyur la /
lakṣaṇācca bhinnatvādalakṣyavallakṣyamapi na lakṣyam mtshan nyid las tha dad pa'i phyir mtshan gzhi yang mtshan gzhi ma yin pa ltar mtshan gzhir mi 'gyur ro /
tathā lakṣyādbhinnatvāllakṣaṇasya lakṣaṇanirapekṣaṃ lakṣyaṃ syāt de bzhin du mtshan nyid mtshan gzhi las tha dad pa'i phyir mtshan gzhi mtshan nyid la ltos pa med par yang 'gyur te /
tataśca na tallakṣyaṃ lakṣaṇanirapekṣatvāt khapuṣpavat /
athābhinne lakṣyalakṣaṇe, tadā lakṣaṇādavyatiriktattvāllakṣaṇasvātmavadvihīyate lakṣyasya lakṣyatā 		de'i phyir de mtshan gzhi ma yin te /
mtshan nyid la ltos pa med pa'i phyir nam mkha'i me tog bzhin no /
ci ste mtshan nyid dang mtshan nyid kyi gzhi dag tha mi dad pa nyid yin na ni /
de'i tshe mtshan nyid las tha mi dad pa'i phyir /
mtshan nyid kyi rang gi bdag nyid bzhin du mtshan gzhi'i mtshan gzhi nyid nyams par 'gyur ro /
lakṣyāccāvyatiriktatvāllakṣyasvātmavallakṣaṇamapi na lakṣaṇasvabhāvam /
yathā coktam 		mtshan gzhi las tha mi dad pa'i phyir mtshan nyid kyang mtshan nyid kyi rang bzhin du mi 'gyur te /
mtshan gzhi'i rang gi bdag nyid bzhin no /
ji skad du /
lakṣyāllakṣaṇamanyaccetsyāttallakṣyamalakṣaṇam mtshan nyid mtshan gzhi las gzhan na /
mtshan gzhi de mtshan med par 'gyur /
tayorabhāvo 'nanyatve vispaṣṭaṃ kathitaṃ tvayā tha dad med na de dag ni /
med par khyod kyis gsal bar bstan /
iti /
na ca vinā tattvānyatvena lakṣyalakṣaṇasiddhau anyā gatirasti 		zhes bshad do /
de nyid dang gzhan nyid las ma gtogs par mtshan gzhi dang mtshan nyid 'grub pa'i thabs gzhan yod pa yang ma yin te /
de skad du /
tathā ca vakṣyati gang dag dngos po gcig pa dang /
ekībhāvena vā siddhirnānābhāvena vā yayoḥ /
na vidyate, tayoḥ siddhiḥ kathaṃ nu khalu vidyate 		dngos po gzhan pa nyid du ni /
'grub par 'gyur ba yod min na /
de gnyis grub pa ji ltar yod /
iti /
athavocyate 		ces 'chad par 'gyur ro /
avācyatayā siddhirbhaviṣyatīti cet, naitadevam ci ste brjod du med pa nyid du 'grub par 'gyur ro zhe na /
de ni 'di ltar ma yin te /
avācyatā hi nāma parasparavibhāgaparijñānābhāve sati bhavati phan tshun rnam par dbye ba yongs su shes pa med pa yin na /
brjod du med pa nyid ces bya bar 'gyur na /
yatra ca vibhāgaparijñānaṃ nāsti, tatra idaṃ lakṣaṇam, idaṃ lakṣyam, iti viśeṣataḥ paricchedāsaṃbhave sati dvayorapyabhāva eveti /
tasmādavācyatayāpi nāsti siddhiḥ 		gang na rnam par dbye ba yongs su shes par 'gyur ba med pa der ni 'di ni mtshan nyid do /
'di ni mtshan gzhi'o zhes khyad par du yongs su gcod pa med pas gnyi ga yang med pa nyid de /
de'i phyir brjod du med pa nyid du yang grub pa med de /
api ca /
yadi jñānaṃ karaṇaṃ viṣayasya paricchede, kaḥ kartā? na ca kartāramantareṇāsti karaṇādīnāṃ saṃbhavaḥ chidikriyāyāmiva 		gzhan yang gal te shes pa byed pa yin na /
yul yongs su gcod pa'i byed pa po gang zhig yin /
byed pa po med par byed pa la sogs pa rnams yod pa yang ma yin te /
gcod pa'i bya ba bzhin no /
ci ste der sems la byed pa po nyid du rtog na /
atha cittasya tatra kartṛtvaṃ parikalpyate, tadapi na yuktam, yasmādarthamātradarśanaṃ cittasya vyāpāraḥ, arthaviśeṣadarśanaṃ caitasānām, de yang rigs pa ma yin te /
'di ltar don tsam lta ba ni sems kyi bya ba yin la don gyi khyad par lta ba ni sems las byung ba rnams kyi bya ba yin te /
tatrārthadṛṣṭirvijñānaṃ tadviśeṣe tu caitasāḥ /
ityabhyupagamāt /
ekasyāṃ hi pradhānakriyāyāṃ sādhyāyāṃ yathāsvaṃ guṇakriyānirvṛttidvāreṇāṅgībhāvopagamāt 		de la don mthong rnam par shes /
de yi khyad par sems las byung /
zhes khas blangs pa'i phyir ro /
byed pa la sogs pa rnams ni bdag nyid ji lta bu'i bya ba phal pa sgrub pa'i sgo nas /
gtso bor gyur pa'i bya ba cig bsgrub par bya ba la yan lag gi ngo bor gyur pa las byed pa la sogs pa nyid du 'gyur na /
karaṇādīnāṃ karaṇāditvam /
na ceha jñānavijñānayorekā pradhānakriyā, kiṃ tarhi, arthamātraparicchittirvijñānasya pradhānakriyā, jñānasya tu arthaviśeṣapariccheda iti nāsti jñānasya karaṇatvaṃ nāpi cittasya kartṛtvam 		'dir ni shes pa rnam par shes pa gnyis la gtso bor gyur pa'i bya ba gcig med do /
'o na ci zhe na /
rnam par shes pa'i gtso bor gyur pa'i bya ba ni don tsam yongs su gcod pa yin la /
don gyi khyad par yongs su gcod pa ni shes pa'i gtso bor gyur pa'i bya ba yin te /
des na shes pa byed pa nyid ma yin la /
tataśca sa eva doṣaḥ sems kyang byed pa po nyid ma yin no /
atha syāt /
anātmānaḥ sarvadharmā ityāgamāt kartuḥ sarvathābhāvāt kartāramantareṇāpi vidyata eva kriyādivyavahāra iti, etadapi nāsti 		de'i phyir nyes pa de nyid du 'gyur ro /
ci ste chos thams cad bdag med pa zhes bya ba'i lung las na /
byed pa po rnam pa thams cad du med pa'i phyir bya ba la sogs pa'i tha snyad ni byed pa po med kyang yod pa nyid do snyam na /
'di yang yod pa ma yin te /
āgamasya samyagarthānavadhāraṇāt lung gi don yang dag par ma bzung ba'i phyir ro /
etadevoktaṃ madhyamakāvatāre 'di yang dbu ma 'jug pa las bstan zin to /
athāpi syāt /
yathā śilāputrakasya śarīram, rāhoḥ śiraḥ, iti śarīraśirovyatiriktaviśeṣaṇāsaṃbhave 'pi viśeṣaṇaviśeṣyabhāvo 'sti, evaṃ pṛthivyāḥ svalakṣaṇamiti svalakṣaṇavyatiriktapṛthivyasaṃbhave 'pi bhaviṣyatīti, naitadevam 		ci ste yang dper na mchi gu'i lus sgra gcan gyi mgo zhes bya ba la /
lus dang mgo las tha dad pa'i khyad par med kyang khyad par dang khyad par gyi gzhi'i dngos po yod pa de bzhin du /
rang gi mtshan nyid las tha dad pa'i sa la sogs pa med kyang sa'i rang gi mtshan nyid ces bya bar 'gyur ro snyam na /
atulyatvāt /
śarīraśiraḥśabdayohi buddhayādipāṇyādivatsahabhāvipadārthāntarasāpekṣatāpravṛttau śarīraśiraḥ śabdamātrālambano buddhayupajananaḥ sahacāripadārthāntarasākāṅkṣa eva vartate, kasya śarīram, kasya śira iti 		de ni de ltar ma yin te /
mi mtshungs pa'i phyir ro /
lus dang mgo'i sgra dag ni blo dang lag pa la sogs pa ltar lhan cig 'byung ba'i dngos po gzhan la ltos pa dang bcas te 'jug pas /
lus dang mgo'i sgra tsam la dmigs pa'i blo skyes pa lta zhig gang gi lus gang gi mgo snyam du lhan cig dpyod pa'i dngos po gzhan la re ba dang bcas pa nyid du 'gyur la /
itaro 'pi viśeṣaṇāntaraḥ saṃbandhanirācikīrṣayā cig shos kyang khyad par gzhan dang 'brel pa bsal bar 'dod pas 'jig rten pa'i brda'i rjes su byed pa /
śilāputrakarāhuviśeṣaṇadhvaninā laukikasaṃketānuvidhāyinā pratikartuḥ kāṅkṣāmapahantīti yuktam /
iha tu kāṭhinyādivyatiriktapṛthivyādyasaṃbhave sati na yukto viśeṣaṇaviśeṣyabhāvaḥ 		khyad par mchi gu dang sgra gcan gyi sgras rtogs pa po'i re ba sel bar byed do zhes bya bar rigs na /
'dir ni sra ba la sogs pa las tha dad pa'i sa la sogs pa med pas khyad par dang khyad par can gyi dngos po mi rigs so /
tīrthikairvyatiriktalakṣyābhyupagamāttadanurodhena viśeṣaṇābhidhānamaduṣṭamiti cet, naitadevam gal te mu stegs pa dag gis mtshan gzhi tha dad par khas blangs pa'i phyir de'i ngor khyad par brjod pa la skyon med do zhe na /
de ni de ltar ma yin te /
na hi tīrthikaparikalpitā yuktividhurāḥ padārthāḥ svasamaye 'bhyupagantuṃ nyāyyāḥ, pramāṇāntarāderapyabhyugamaprasaṅgāt /
api ca 		mu stegs pas kun tu brtags pa'i dngos po rigs pa dang 'gal ba dag ni rang gi gzhung lugs la khas blangs par mi rigs te /
tshad ma gzhan la sogs pa khas blangs par thal bar 'gyur ba'i phyir ro /
pudgalādiprajñaptivat saśarīropādānasya śilāputrakasyopādāturlaukikavyavahārāṅgabhūtasya viśeṣaṇasyāvicāraprasiddhasya sadbhāvāt, śiraupādānasya ca rāhorupādātuḥ sadbhāvādayuktametannidarśanam gzhan yang lus kyi rten can khyad par du byed pa 'jig rten pa'i tha snyad kyi yan lag tu gyur pa ma brtags na grub pa rten pa po mchi gu dang mgo'i rten can brten pa po sgra gcan ni gang zag la sogs par brtags pa ltar yod pa'i phyir dpe 'di rigs pa ma yin no /
śarīraśirovyatiriktasyārthāntarasyāsiddhestanmātrasyopalambhāt siddhameva nidarśanamiti cet, naitadevam gal te de tsam zhig dmigs pas lus dang mgo las tha dad pa'i don gzhan ma grub pa'i phyir dpe grub pa nyid do zhe na /
de ni de ltar ma yin te /
laukike vyavahāre itthaṃ vicārāpravṛtteravicārataśca laukikapadārthānāmastitvāt /
yathaiva hi rūpādivyatirekeṇa vicāryamāṇa ātmā na saṃbhavati, api ca lokasaṃvṛtyā skandhānupādāya asyāstitvam, evaṃ rāhuśilāputrakayorapīti nāsti nidarśanasiddhiḥ /
evaṃ pṛthivyādīnāṃ yadyapi kāṭhinyādivyatiriktaṃ vicāryamāṇaṃ lakṣyaṃ nāsti, lakṣyavyatirekeṇa ca lakṣaṇaṃ nirāśrayam, tathāpi saṃvṛtireveti parasparāpekṣayā tayoḥ siddhayā siddhiṃ vyavasthāpayāṃbabhūvurācāryāḥ 		'jig rten pa'i tha snyad la de ltar rnam par dpyod pa mi 'jug pa'i phyir dang 'jig rten pa'i dngos po rnams ni ma brtags par yod pa'i phyir ro /
ji ltar rnam par dpyad na gzugs la sogs pa las tha dad par bdag med mdo [*mod] kyi /
'on kyang phung po la brten nas 'jig rten gyi kun rdzob tu 'di yod pa nyid yin pa de bzhin du /
sgra gcan dang mchi gu gnyis kyang yin pas dpe grub pa med do /
de bzhin du rnam par dpyad na sa la sogs pa dag la yang sra ba la sogs pa las tha dad pa'i mtshan gzhi med la /
mtshan gzhi las tha dad par rten med pa'i mtshan nyid kyang med mod kyi /
de lta na yang 'di ni kun rdzob tu yod de /
de bas na slob dpon rnams kyis phan tshun ltos pa tsam gyis grub pa'i sgo nas grub par rnam par gzhag pa mdzad do /
avaśyaṃ caitadevamabhyupeyam 'di ni de kho na ltar gdon mi za bar khas blang bar bya ste /
anyathā hi saṃvṛtirupapattyā na viyujyeta, tadeva tattvameva syānna saṃvṛtiḥ /
na ca upapattyā vicāryamāṇānāṃ śilāputrakādīmevāsaṃbhavaḥ, kiṃ tarhi vakṣyamāṇayā yuktyā rūpavedanādīnāmapi nāsti saṃbhava iti teṣāmapi saṃvṛtyā śilāputrakādivannāstitvamāstheyaṃ syāt /
na caitadevamityasadetat 		de lta ma yin na kun rdzob 'thad pa dang ldan pa ma yin nam /
des na 'di de kho na nyid du 'gyur gyi kun rdzob tu mi 'gyur ro /
'thad pas rnam par dpyad pa na mchi gu la sogs pa dag kho na mi srid pa ni ma yin te /
'o na ci zhe na /
'chad par 'gyur ba'i 'thad pas gzugs dang tshor ba la sogs pa rnams kyang yod pa ma yin pas /
de dag kyang mchi gu la sogs pa bzhin du kun rdzob tu yod pa yin pa nyid du khas blangs par 'gyur na /
de ltar yang ma yin pas /
atha syāt /
kimanayā sūkṣmekṣikayā? naiva hi vayaṃ sarvapramāṇaprameyavyavahāraṃ satyamityācakṣmahe, kiṃ tu lokaprasiddhireṣā amunā nyāyena vyavasthāpyata iti /
ucyate /
vayamapyevaṃ brūmaḥ /
kimanayā sūkṣmekṣikayā laukikavyavahāre 'vatārika(ta?)yā? tiṣṭhatu tāvadeṣā viparyāsamātrāsāditātmabhāvasattākā saṃvṛtiḥ mumukṣūṇāṃ mokṣāvāhakakuśalamūlopacayahetuḥ, yāvanna tattvādhigama iti 		'di ni yod pa ma yin no /
brten nas brtags par rnam par gzhag pa 'di yang dbu ma la 'jug pa las rgyas par bstan pas de nyid las yongs su btsal bar bya'o /
ci ste zhib mor dpyad pa 'dis ci zhig bya ste /
kho bo cag tshad ma dang gzhal bya'i tha snyad thams cad bden pa yin no zhes ni mi smra'i /
'on kyang 'jig rten la rab tu grags pa'i tshul 'dis rnam par 'jog par byed par 'gyur ro snyam na /
bshad par bya ste /
dpyad pa zhib mo 'jig rten pa'i tha snyad la bcug pa 'dis ci dgos zhes kho bo cag kyang de skad du smra ste /
kun rdzob phyin ci log tsam gyis bdag gi ngo bo yod par rnyed pa /
thar pa 'dod pa rnams kyi thar pa 'dren par byed pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba sog pa'i rgyur gyur pa 'di ni ji srid de kho na nyid ma rtogs pa de srid du gnas par 'gyur mod /
bhavāṃstu etāṃ saṃvṛtiparamārthasatyavibhāgadurvidagdhabuddhitayā kvacidupapattimavatārya anyāyato nāśayati khyod ni don dam pa dang kun rdzob kyi bden pa la mi mkhas pas la lar 'thad pa bcug nas rigs pa ma yin pa las de 'jig par byed pa yin no /
kho bo ni kun rdzob kyi bden pa rnam par 'jog pa la mkhas pa'i phyir /
so 'haṃ saṃvṛtisatyavyavasthāvaicakṣaṇyāllaukika eva pakṣe sthitvā saṃvṛtyekadeśanirākaraṇopakṣiptopapattyantaramupapattyantareṇa vinivartayan lokavṛddha iva lokacārātparibhraśyamānaṃ bhavantameva nivartayāmi na tu saṃvṛtim 'jig rten pa'i phyogs nyid la gnas te kun rdzob kyi phyogs gcig bsal ba'i phyir bkod pa'i 'thad pa gzhan 'thad pa gzhan gyis zlog par byed cing 'jig rten gyi rgan rabs ltar /
'jig rten gyi chos lugs las nyams pa khyod kho na zlog par byed pa yin gyi kun rdzob ni ma yin no /
tasmād yadi laukiko vyavahāraḥ, tadā avaśyaṃ lakṣaṇavallakṣyeṇāpi bhavitavyam de'i phyir gal te 'jig rten pa'i tha snyad du yin na ni /
de'i tshe mtshan nyid bzhin du mtshan gzhir yang gdon mi za bar 'gyur bar bya dgos te /
tataśca sa eva doṣaḥ de'i phyir nyes pa de nyid du 'gyur ro /
atha paramārthaḥ, tadā lakṣyābhāvāllakṣaṇadvayamapi nāstīti kutaḥ pramāṇadvayam? 'on te don dam par yin na ni de'i tshe mtshan gzhi med pas mtshan nyid gnyis kyang med pas tshad ma gnyis su ga la 'gyur /
atha śabdānāmevaṃ kriyākārakasaṃbandhapūrvikā vyutpattirnāṅgīkriyate, tadidamatikaṣṭam ci ste sgra rnams la bya ba dang byed pa po'i 'brel bar sngon du 'gro ba can gyi bye brag tu bshad pa de lta bu khas len par mi byed do zhe na /
'di ni shin tu dka' ste /
taireva kriyākārakasaṃbandhapravṛttaiḥ śabdairbhavān vyavaharati, śabdārthaṃ kriyākaraṇādikaṃ ca necchatīti aho vata icchāmātrapratibaddhapravṛttito (vṛttiḥ?) bhavataḥ /
yadā caivaṃ prameyadvayamavyavasthitaṃ tadā svasāmānyalakṣaṇāviṣayatvena āgamādīnāṃ pramāṇāntaratvam 		khyod bya ba dang byed pa po'i 'brel bas rab tu zhugs pa'i sgra de dag kho nas tha snyad byed cing /
bya ba dang byed pa po la sogs pa'i sgra'i don yang mi 'dod pas /
ae ma kyi hud khyod ni 'dod pa tsam la rag las te 'jug pa nyid do /
gang gi tshe de ltar gzhal bya gnyis gnas pa med pa de'i tshe lung la sogs pa rang dang spyi'i mtshan nyid kyi yul can ma yin pa nyid kyi sgo nas tshad ma gzhan nyid ma yin pa ma yin no /
kiṃ ca ghaṭaḥ pratyakṣa ityevamādikasya laukikavyavahārasyāsaṃgrahādanāryavyavahārābhyupagamācca avyāpitā lakṣaṇasyeti na yuktametat gzhan yang bum pa mngon sum mo zhes bya ba de lta bu la sogs pa 'jig rten pa'i tha snyad ma bsdus pa'i phyir dang 'phags pa ma yin pa'i tha snyad khas blangs pa'i phyir mtshan nyid ma khyab pa nyid du 'gyur te /
atha syāt /
ghaṭopādānanīlādayaḥ pratyakṣāḥ pratyakṣapramāṇaparicchedyatvāt /
tataśca yathaiva kāraṇe kāryopacāraṃ kṛtvā buddhānāṃ sukha utpāda iti vyapadiśyate, evaṃ pratyakṣanīlādinimittako 'pi ghaṭaḥ kārye kāraṇopacāraṃ kṛtvā pratyakṣa iti vyapadiśyate 		des na 'di ni mi rigs so /
ci ste bum pa'i nye bar len pa sngon po la sogs pa dag ni mngon sum gyi tshad mas yongs su gcad par bya ba yin pa'i phyir mngon sum yin te /
de'i phyir ji ltar rgyu la 'bras bu btags pa byas te /
sangs rgyas rnams ni 'byung ba bde /
zhes bsnyad pa de bzhin du /
sngon po la sogs pa mngon sum du gyur pa'i rgyu can gyi bum pa yang 'bras bu la rgyus btags pa byas nas mngon sum zhes bya bar brjod do snyam na /
naivaṃviṣaye upacāro yuktaḥ /
utpādo hi loke sukhavyatirekeṇopalabdhaḥ, sa ca saṃskṛtalakṣaṇasvabhāvatvādanekaduṣkaraśatahetutvādasukha eva, sa sukha iti vyapadiśyamānaḥ asaṃbaddha evetyevaṃviṣaye yukta upacāraḥ 		rnam pa de lta bu'i yul la ni btags pa mi rigs te /
'byung ba ni 'jig rten na bde ba las tha dad par dmigs la /
de yang 'dus byas kyi mtshan nyid kyi rang bzhin yin pa'i phyir dang dka' ba brgya phrag du ma'i rgyu can yin pa'i phyir bde ba ma yin pa nyid do /
de la bde ba zhes brjod pa na 'brel pa med pa nyid yin pas rnam pa de lta bu'i yul la nye bar btags pa rigs na /
ghaṭaḥ pratyakṣa ityatra tu /
na hi ghaṭo nāma kaścidyo 'pratyakṣaḥ pṛthagupalabdho yasyopacārātpratyakṣatvaṃ syāt 		bum pa mngon sum zhes bya ba 'dir ni gang zhig brtags nas mngon sum nyid du 'gyur ba bum pa zhes bya ba mngon sum ma yin pa logs shig tu dmigs pa yang ma yin no /
nīlādivyatiriktasya ghaṭasyābhāvādaupacārikaṃ pratyakṣatvamiti cet, evamapi sutarāmupacāro na yuktaḥ, upacaryamāṇasyāśrayasyābhāvāt gal te sngon po la sogs pa las tha dad pa'i bum pa med pa'i phyir btags pa'i mngon sum nyid du 'gyur ro zhe na /
de lta na yang ches shin tu btags par mi rigs te /
gzhi gdags bya med pa'i phyir ro /
na hi kharaviṣāṇe taikṣṇyamupacaryate bong bu'i rva la rnon po nye bar 'dogs pa ni rigs pa ma yin no /
api ca /
lokavyavahārāṅgabhūto ghaṭo yadi nīlādivyatirikto nāstīti kṛtvā tasyaupacārikaṃ pratyakṣatvaṃ parikalpyate, nanvevaṃ sati pṛthivyādivyatirekeṇa nīlādikamapi nāstīti nīlāderasyaupacārikaṃ pratyakṣatvaṃ kalpyatām /
yathoktam 		gzhan yang gal te 'jig rten gyi tha snyad kyi yan lag tu gyur pa'i bum pa sngon po la sogs pa las tha dad par gyur pa med pa'i phyir /
de nye bar btags pa pa'i mngon sum nyid du rtogs na ni de lta na ni sngon po la sogs pa yang sa la sogs pa las tha dad pa med pas sngon po la sogs pa yang btags pa pa'i mngon sum nyid du rtogs shig /
ji skad du /
rūpādivyatirekeṇa yathā kumbho na vidyate ji ltar gzugs sogs ma gtogs par /
bum pa yod pa ma yin pa /
vāyvādivyatirekeṇa tathā rūpaṃ na vidyate de bzhin rlung la sogs pa ni /
ma gtogs gzugs kyang yod ma yin /
iti /
tasmādevamādikasya lokavyavahārasya lakṣaṇenāsaṃgrahādavyāpitaiva lakṣaṇasyeti 		zhes bshad do /
de'i phyir de lta bu la sogs pa'i 'jig rten gyi tha snyad ni mtshan nyid kyis ma bsdus pa'i phyir mtshan nyid ma khyab pa nyid do /
tattvavidapekṣayā hi /
pratyakṣatvaṃ ghaṭādīnāṃ nīlādīnāṃ ca neṣyate 		de kho na nyid gzigs pa la ltos nas ni bum pa la sogs pa dang sngon po la sogs pa rnams mngon sum nyid du mi 'dod do /
lokasaṃvṛtyā tvabhyupagantavyameva pratyakṣatvaṃ ghaṭādīnām 'jig rten gyi kun rdzob tu ni bum pa la sogs pa rnams mngon sum nyid du khas blang bar bya ba kho na'o /
yathoktaṃ śatake ji skad du bzhi brgya pa las /
sarva eva ghaṭo 'dṛṣṭo rūpe dṛṣṭe hi jāyate gzugs mthong tshe na bum pa ni /
thams cad kho na mthong mi 'gyur /
brūyātkastattvavinnāma ghaṭaḥ pratyakṣa ityapi bum pa mngon sum zhes bya 'ang /
de nyid rig pa su zhig smra /
etenaiva vicāreṇa sugandhi madhuraṃ mṛdu /
pratiṣedhayitavyāni sarvāṇyuttamabuddhinā 		rnam par dpyad pa 'di nyid kyis /
blo mchog ldan pas dri zhim dang /
mngar dang 'jam pa thams cad dag /
iti /
api ca /
aparokṣārthavācitvātpratyakṣaśabdasya sākṣādabhimukho 'rthaḥ pratyakṣaḥ, pratigatamakṣamasminniti kṛtvā ghaṭanīlādīnāmaparokṣāṇāṃ pratyakṣatvaṃ siddhaṃ bhavati /
tatparicchedakasya jñānasya tṛṇatuṣāgnivat pratyakṣakāraṇatvāt pratyakṣatvaṃ vyapadiśyate 		so sor dgag par bya ba yin /
zhes bshad do /
gzhan yang mngon sum gyi sgra ni lkog tu ma gyur pa'i don gyi rjod par byed pa yin pa'i phyir /
dbang po mngon du phyogs pa'i don ni mngon sum yin no /
'di la dbang po mngon du phyogs pas zhes bya ba nas bum pa dang sngon po la sogs pa lkog tu ma gyur pa rnams mngon sum nyid du grub par 'gyur la /
de yongs su gcod par byed pa'i shes pa ni rtsva dang sog ma'i me bzhin du mngon sum gyi rgyu can yin pa'i phyir mngon sum nyid du rjod par byed do /
yastu akṣamakṣaṃ prati vartata iti pratyakṣaśabdaṃ vyutpādayati, tasya jñānasyendriyāviṣayatvād viṣayaviṣayatvācca na yuktā vyutpattiḥ gang zhig dbang po dang dbang po so so la 'jug pas zhes bya bas mngon sum gyi sgra bye brag tu 'chad par byed pa /
de ltar na ni shes pa ni dbang po'i yul can ma yin pa'i phyir dang yul gyi yul can yin pa'i phyir bye brag tu bshad pa mi rigs par 'gyur te /
prativiṣayaṃ tu syāt pratyarthamiti vā /
atha syāt /
yathā ubhayādhīnāyāmapi vijñānapravṛtau āśrayasya paṭumandatānuvidhānād vijñānānāṃ tadvikāravikāritvādāśrayeṇaivavyapadeśo bhavati cakṣurvijñānamiti, evaṃ yadyapi arthamartha prati vartate, tathāpi akṣamakṣamāśritya vartamānaṃ vijñānamāśrayeṇa vyapadeśāt pratyakṣamiti bhaviṣyati 		yul so so ba 'am don so so ba nyid ces bya bar ni mi 'gyur ro /
ci ste ji ltar rnam par shes pa 'byung ba gnyi ga la rag las pa yin yang rnam par shes pa rnams rten gsal ba dang zhan pa'i rjes su byed pa'i phyir dang de dag gyur na 'gyur ba'i phyir /
mig gi rnam par shes pa zhes rten nyid kyis ston par 'gyur ba de bzhin du /
don dang don so so la 'jug mod kyi de lta na yang dbang po dang dbang po la brten nas 'jug pa'i rnam par shes pa ni rten gyis bstan pas mngon sum nyid du 'gyur te /
dṛṣṭo hi asādhāraṇena vyapadeśo bherīśabdo yavāṅkura iti rnga'i sgra nas kyi myu gu zhes thun mong ma yin pa'i rgyus ston pa ni mthong ba yin no snyam na /
naitatpūrveṇa tulyam /
tatra hi viṣayeṇa vijñāne vyapadiśyamāne rūpavijñānamityevamādinā vijñānaṣaṭkasya bhedo nopadarśitaḥ syāt, manovijñānasya cakṣurādivijñānaiḥ sahaikaviṣayapravṛttatvāt /
tathā hi nīlādivijñānaṣaṭke vijñānamityukte sākāṅkṣa eva pratyayājjāyate kimetadrūpīndriyajaṃ vijñānamāhosvinmānasamiti /
āśrayeṇa tu vyapadeśe manovijñānasya cakṣurādivijñānaviṣaye pravṛttisaṃbhave 'pi parasparabhedaḥ siddho bhavati /
iha tu pramāṇalakṣaṇavivakṣayā kalpanāpoḍhamātrasya pratyakṣatvābhyupagame sati vikalpādeva tadviśeṣatvābhimatatvādasādhāraṇakāraṇena vyapadeśe sati na kiṃcit prayojanamupalakṣyate 		'di ni snga ma dang mi 'dra ba yin te /
der ni gzugs kyi rnam par shes pa zhes bya ba de lta bu la sogs pas yul gyi rnam par shes pa bstan na /
rnam par shes pa drug gi rnam par dbye ba ma bstan par 'gyur te /
yid kyi rnam par shes pa ni mig la sogs pa'i rnam par shes pa dang lhan cig yul gcig la 'dug pa'i phyir ro /
'di ltar sngon po la sogs pa'i rnam par shes pa drug la rnam par shes pa zhes brjod na ni /
ci rnam par shes pa 'di dbang po gzugs can las skyes pa zhig gam /
'on te yid las byung ba zhig ces shes pa re ba dang bcas pa yid du 'gyur la /
rten gyis bstan na ni yid kyi rnam par shes pa mig la sogs pa'i rnam par shes pa'i yul la 'jug pa yin yang phan tshun dbye ba grub par 'gyur ro /
'dir ni tshad ma'i mtshan nyid brjod par 'dod pas rtog pa dang bral ba tsam zhig mngon sum nyid du khas blangs pas rnam par rtog pa las 'di khyad par du mngon par 'dod pa'i phyir /
thun mong ma yin pa'i rgyus bstan pa la dgos pa cung zad kyang ma mthong ngo /
prameyaparatantrāyāṃ ca pramāṇasaṃkhyāpravṛttau prameyākārānukāritāmātratayā ca samāsāditātmabhāvasattākayoḥ pramāṇayoḥ svarūpasya vyavasthāpanānnendriyeṇa vyapadeśaḥ kiṃcidupakarotīti sarvathā viṣayeṇaiva vyapadeśo nyāyyaḥ tshad ma'i grangs su 'jug pa gzhal bya'i gzhan gyi dbang yin pa'i phyir dang gzhal bya'i rnam pa'i rjes su byed pa tsam gyis rang gi ngo bo yod par rnyed pa'i tshad ma dag gi rang gi ngo bo rnam par 'jog pa'i phyir dbang pos bstan pa cung zad kyang mi ma kho bas rnam pa thams cad du yul kho nas bstan par rigs so /
loke pratyakṣaśabdasya prasiddhatvādvivakṣite 'rthe pratyarthaśabdasyāprasiddhatvādāśrayeṇaiva vyutpattirāśrīyata iti cet, ucyate /
astyayaṃ pratyakṣaśabdo loke prasiddhaḥ 		gal te 'jig rten na brjod par 'dod pa'i don la mngon sum gyi sgra rab tu grags pa'i phyir dang don so so zhes bya ba'i sgra ma grags pa'i phyir rten kho nas bye brag tu bshad pa la rten par byed do zhe na /
bshad par bya ste /
mngon sum gyi sgra 'di 'jig rten la grags pa ni yod mod kyi /
sa tu yathā loke, tathā asmābhirucyata eva /
yathāsthitalaukikapadārthatiraskāreṇa tu tadvayutpāde kriyamāṇe prasiddhaśabdatiraskāraḥ prasiddhaḥ syāt, tataśca pratyakṣamityevaṃ na syāt /
ekasya ca cakṣurvijñānasya ekendriyakṣaṇāśrayasya pratyakṣatvaṃ na syād vīpsārthābhāvāt, ekaikasya ca pratyakṣatvābhāve bahūnāmapi na syāt 		de ji ltar 'jig rten na yin pa de ltar ni kho bo cag gis smras pa nyid do /
'jig rten pa'i don ji ltar gnas pa spangs nas de bye brag tu 'chad par byed na ni /
rab tu grags pa'i sgra yang spong bar 'gyur ro /
de'i phyir mngon sum zhes bya ba de ltar mi 'gyur ro /
zlos pa'i don med pa'i phyir dbang po'i skad cig gcig gi rten can mig gi rnam par shes pa gcig mngon sum nyid du yang mi 'gyur la /
kalpanāpoḍhasyaiva ca jñānasya pratyakṣatvābhyupagamāt, tena ca lokasya saṃvyavahārābhāvāt, laukikasya ca pramāṇaprameyavyavahārasya vyākhyātumiṣṭatvād vyarthaiva pratyakṣapramāṇakalpanā saṃjāyate re re la mngon sum nyid med na ni mang po rnams la yang mi 'gyur ro /
rtog pa dang bral ba'i shes pa nyid mngon sum nyid du khas blangs pa'i phyir dang des kyang 'jig rten pa'i tha snyad byed pa med pa'i phyir dang 'jig rten pa'i tshad ma dang gzhal bya'i tha snyad bshad par 'dod pa'i phyir na mngon sum tshad mar rtog pa ni don med pa nyid du 'gyur ro /
cakṣurvijñānasāmaṅgī nīlaṃ jānāti no tu nīlamiti cāgamasya pratyakṣalakṣaṇābhidhānārthasyāprastutatvāt, pañcānāmindriyavijñānānāṃ jaḍatvapratipādakatvācca nāgamādapi kalpanāpoḍhasyaiva vijñānasya pratyakṣatvamiti na yuktametat mig gi rnam par shes pa dang ldan pas sngon po shes kyi sngon po'o snyam du ni ma yin no zhes bya ba'i lung yang mngon sum gyi mtshan nyid brjod pa'i don can gyi skabs ma yin pa nyid kyi phyir dang dbang po'i rnam par shes pa lnga po rnams blun pa nyid du ston par byed pa nyid yin pa'i phyir /
lung las kyang rtog pa dang bral ba'i rnam par shes pa kho na mngon sum nyid ma yin pas 'di ni mi rigs so /
tasmālloke yadi lakṣyaṃ yadi vā svalakṣaṇaṃ sāmānyalakṣaṇaṃ vā, sarvameva sākṣādupalabhyamānatvādaparokṣam, ataḥ pratyakṣaṃ vyavasthāpyate tadviṣayeṇa jñānena saha de'i phyir gal te mtshan gzhi 'am rang gi mtshan nyid dam spyi'i mtshan nyid kyang rung ste /
'jig rten na yod na ni thams cad mngon sum du dmigs par bya ba yin pa'i phyir na lkog tu ma gyur pa yin te /
de'i phyir de'i yul can gyi rnam par shes pa dang lhan cig tu mngon sum nyid du rnam par gzhag go /
dvicandrādīnāṃ tu ataimirikajñānāpekṣayā apratyakṣatvam, taimirikādyapekṣayā tu pratyakṣatvameva zla ba gnyis la sogs pa dag ni rab rib can ma yin pa'i shes pa la ltos nas mngon sum nyid ma yin la /
rab rib can la sogs pa la ltos nas ni mngon sum nyid kho na'o /
parokṣaviṣayaṃ tu jñānaṃ sādhyāvyabhicāriliṅgotpannamanumānam lkog tu gyur pa'i yul can rtags bsgrub par bya ba la mi 'khrul ba las skyes pa'i shes pa ni rjes su dpag pa'o /
sākṣādatīndriyārthavidāmāptānāṃ yadvacanaṃ sa āgamaḥ dbang po las 'das pa'i don mngon sum du rig cing yid ches par gyur pa dag gi tshig gang yin pa de ni lung ngo /
sādṛśyādananubhūtārthadhigama upamānaṃ gauriva gavaya iti yathā 'dra pa las nyams su myong ba'i don rtogs pa ni nye bar 'jal ba ste /
dper na ba man ni ba lang dang 'dra'o snyam pa lta bu'o /
tadevaṃ pramāṇacatuṣṭayāllokasyārthādhigamo vyavasthāpyate de'i phyir de ltar tshad ma bzhi las 'jig rten gyi don rtogs par rnam par 'jog pa yin no /
tāni ca parasparāpekṣayā sidhyanti de dag kyang phan tshun ltos pas 'grub par 'gyur te /
satsu pramāṇeṣu prameyārthāḥ, satsu prameyeṣvartheṣu pramāṇāni tshad ma dag yod na gzhal bya'i don dag tu 'gyur la /
gzhal bya'i don dag yod na tshad ma dag tu 'gyur gyi /
no tu khalu svābhāvikī pramāṇaprameyayoḥ siddhiriti tshad ma dang gzhal bya gnyis ngo bo nyid kyis grub pa ni yod pa ma yin no /
tasmāllaukikamevāstu yathādṛṣṭamityalaṃ prasaṅgena de'i phyir mthong ba ji lta ba bzhin du 'jig rten pa nyid yin la rag ste /
prastutameva vyākhyāsyāmaḥ /
laukika eva darśane sthitvā buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ dharmadeśanā /
atrāhuḥ svayūthyāḥ /
yadidamuktaṃ na svata utpadyante bhāvā iti, tadyuktam, svata utpattivaiyarthyāt 		spros pas chog go /
dkyus ma nyid bshad par bya'o /
'dir rang gi sde pa dag na re /
gang 'di 'di skad du dngos po rnams bdag las skye ba ma yin te /
zhes smras pa de ni rigs te /
rang las skye ba don med pa'i phyir ro /
yaccoktaṃ na dvābhyāmiti, tadapi yuktam, ekāṃśavaikalyāt gang yang gnyi ga la skye ba ma yin te zhes smras pa de yang rigs te /
yan lag gcig ma tshang ba'i phyir ro /
ahetupakṣastu ekāntanikṛṣṭa iti tatpratiṣedho 'pi yuktaḥ rgyu med pa'i phyogs ni shin tu tha chad yin pa'i phyir /
de dgag pa yang rigs na /
yattu khalvidamucyate nāpi parata iti, tadayuktam yasmātparabhūtā eva bhagavatā bhāvānāmutpādakā nirdiṣṭāḥ gang 'di skad du gzhan las skye ba yang ma yin te zhes smras pa de ni rigs pa ma yin te /
gang gi phyir bcom ldan 'das kyis gzhan du gyur pa dag kho na dngos po rnams kyi skyed par byed par bstan pa'i phyir te /
catvāraḥ pratyayā hetuścālambanamanantaram rkyen rnam bzhi ste rgyu dang ni /
dmigs pa dang ni de ma thag /
tathaivādhipateyaṃ ca pratyayo nāsti pañcamaḥ bdag po yang ni de bzhin te /
rkyen lnga pa ni yod ma yin /
tatra nirvartako heturiti lakṣaṇāt, yo hi yasya nirvartako bījabhāvenāvasthitaḥ, sa tasya hetu pratyayaḥ de la sgrub par byed pa ni rgyu yin no zhes bya ba'i mtshan nyid las na gang zhig gang gi sgrub byed sa bon gyi ngo bor gnas pa de ni de'i rgyu'i rkyen no /
utpadyamāno dharmo yenālambanenotpadyate, sa tasyālambanapratyayaḥ dmigs pa gang gis skye bar 'gyur ba'i chos can bskyed pa de ni de'i dmigs pa'i rkyen no /
kāraṇasyānantaro nirodhaḥ kāryasyotpattipratyayaḥ, tadyathā bījasyānantaro nirodho 'ṅkurasyotpādapratyayaḥ rgyu 'gags ma thag pa ni 'bras bu 'byung ba'i rkyen yin te /
dper na sa bon 'gags ma thag pa myu gu 'byung ba'i rkyen yin pa bzhin no /
yasmin sati yadbhavati tattasyādhipateyamiti gang zhig yod pas gang 'byung ba de ni de'i bdag po'o /
ta ete catvāraḥ pratyayāḥ 'di dag ni rkyen bzhi'o /
ye cānye purojātasahajātapaścājjātādayaḥ, te eteṣveva antarbhūtāḥ gzhan gang dag sngar skyes pa dang lhan cig skyes pa dang phyis skye ba la sogs pa de dag ni 'di rnams kyi khongs su 'dus pa yin no /
īśvarādayastu pratyayā eva na saṃbhavantīti, ata evāvadhārayati dbang phyug la sogs pa dag ni rkyen ma yin te /
de nyid kyi phyir /
pratyayo nāsti pañcama iti /
tasmādebhyaḥ parabhūtebhyo bhāvānāmutpattirasti parata utpattiriti 		rkyen lnga pa ni yod ma yin /
zhes nges par gzung ba yin no /
de'i phyir gzhan du gyur pa 'di dag las dngos po rnams skye ba'i phyir gzhan las skye ba yod pa yin no zhes 'dzer to /
atrocyate /
naiva hi bhāvānāṃ parabhūtebhyaḥ pratyayebhya utpattiriti 		de la bshad par bya ste /
dngos po rnams ni rkyen gzhan du gyur pa dag las skye ba ma yin pa nyid de /
yasmāt 'di ltar /
na hi svabhāvo bhāvānāṃ pratyayādiṣu vidyate dngos po rnams kyi rang bzhin ni /
rkyen la sogs la yod ma yin /
avidyamāne svabhāve parabhāvo na vidyate /
iti 		bdag gi dngos po yod min na /
gzhan dngos yod pa ma yin no /
yadi hi hetvādiṣu parabhuteṣu pratyayeṣu samasteṣu vyasteṣu vyastasamasteṣu hetupratyaya sāmagyā anyatra vā kvacid bhāvānāṃ kāryāṇāmutpādātpūrvaṃ sattvaṃ syāt, syāttebhya utpādaḥ gal te 'bras bur gyur ba'i dngos po rnams rgyu la sogs pa'i rkyen gzhan du gyur pa 'dus pa'am so so ba'am 'dus pa dang so so ba dag gam /
rgyu dang rkyen gyi tshogs pa las gzhan 'ga' zhig la yang rung ste /
skyes pa'i snga rol du yod par gyur na ni /
de dag las skye bar 'gyur ba zhig na /
na caivaṃ yadutpādātpūrvaṃ saṃbhavaḥ syāt gang zhig skye ba'i snga rol du yod par 'gyur ba de ltar yang ma yin te /
yadi syāt, gṛhyeta ca, utpādavaiyarthyaṃ ca syāt gal te yod par gyur na ni /
gzung du yod pa'am skye ba don med par 'gyur ro /
tasmānnaṃ cāsti bhāvānāṃ pratyayādiṣu svabhāvaḥ de'i phyir dngos po rnams kyi rang bzhin ni rkyen la sogs pa dag la yod pa ma yin no /
avidyamāne ca svabhāve nāsti parabhāvaḥ bdag gi dngos po yod pa ma yin pa nyid yin na gzhan gyi dngos po yod pa ma yin no /
bhavanaṃ bhāva utpādaḥ, parebhya utpādaḥ parabhāvaḥ, sa na vidyate 'byung bas na dngos po ste skye ba'o /
gzhan gyi dngos po ni gzhan dag las skye ba ste de yod pa ma yin no /
tasmādayuktametat parabhūtebhyo bhāvānā mutpattiriti de'i phyir dngos po rnams gzhan du gyur pa dag las skye bo zhes bya ba 'di rigs pa ma yin no /
athavā bhāvānāṃ kāryāṇāmaṅkurādīnāṃ vījādiṣu pratyayeṣu satsvavikṛtarūpeṣu nāsti svabhāvo nirhetukatvaprasaṅgāt rnam pa gcig tu na rgyu med pa can du thal bar 'gyur ba'i phyir myu gu la sogs pa 'bras bur gyur pa'i dngos po rnams kyi rang bzhin ni /
sa bon la sogs pa rkyen rnam par 'gyur ba med pa'i rang bzhin can dag yod pa na yod pa ma yin no /
tatkimapekṣaṃ paratvaṃ pratyayādīnām? vidyamānayoreva hi maitropagrāhakayoḥ parasparāpekṣaṃ paratvam? na caivaṃ bījāṅkurayoryaugapadyam de'i phyir rkyen la sogs pa rnams ci la ltos nas gzhan nyid du 'gyur te /
byams pa dang nyer sbas dag ni yod pa gnyis kho na phan tshun ltos pa'i gzhan nyid du 'gyur na /
sa bon dang myu gu gnyis ni de ltar cig car ba ma yin no /
de'i phyir 'bras bu rnams kyi bdag gi dngos po yod pa ma yin na /
tasmādavidyamāne svabhāve kāryāṇāṃ parabhāvaḥ paratvaṃ bījādīnāṃ nāstīti paravyapadeśābhāvādeva na parata utpāda iti /
tasmādāgamābhiprāyānabhijñataiva parasya 		sa bon la sogs pa rnams la gzhan gyi dngos po ste gzhan nyid yod pa ma yin no /
de'i phyir gzhan du bsnyad du med pa kho na'i phyir gzhan las skye ba ma yin pas dngos po rnams gzhan las skye'i zhes bya ba 'di ni mi rung ngo /
de'i phyir gzhan gyi lung gi dgongs pa mngon par ma shes pa nyid de /
na hi tathāgatā yuktiviruddhaṃ vākyamudāharanti de bzhin gshegs pa dag ni rigs pa dang 'gal ba'i dag mi gsung la /
āgamasya cābhiprāyaḥ prāgevopavarṇitaḥ /
tadevaṃ pratyayebhya utpādavādini pratiṣiddhe kriyāta utpādavādī manyate 		lung gi dgongs pa yang gong du nye bar bstan zin to /
de'i phyir de ltar rkyen dag las skye bar smra ba bkag pa yin dang bya ba las skye bar smra ba ni /
na cakṣūrūpādayaḥ pratyayāḥ sākṣādvijñānaṃ janayanti mig dang gzugs la sogs pa'i rkyen dag ni dngos su rnam par shes pa skyed par mi byed kyi /
vijñānajanikriyāniṣpādakatvāttu pratyayā ucyante rnam par shes pa skye ba'i bya ba sgrub par byed pa'i phyir rkyen zhes bya la /
sā ca kriyā vijñānaṃ janayati bya ba des kyang rnam par shes pa skyed par byed de /
tasmātpratyayavatī vijñānajanikriyā vijñānajanikā, na pratyayāḥ de'i phyir rnam par shes pa skye ba'i bya ba rkyen dang ldan pa ni rnam par shes pa skyed par byed pa yin gyi rkyen dag ni ma yin te /
dper na /
yathā pacikriyā odanasyeti /
ucyate 		'bras chen gyi 'tshod pa'i bya ba bzhin no snyam du sems so /
bshad pa /
kriyā na pratyayavatī bya ba rkyen dang ldan pa med /
yadi kriyā kācit syāt, sā cakṣurādibhiḥ pratyayaiḥ pratyayavatī vijñānaṃ janayet gal te bya ba 'ga' zhig yod par gyur na ni /
de mig la sogs pa'i rkyen dag gis rkyen dang ldan pas rnam par shes pa skyed par byed pa zhig na /
yod pa ni ma yin no /
na tvasti /
kathaṃ kṛtvā? iha kriyeyamiṣyamāṇā jāte vā vijñāne iṣyate, ajāte vā jāyamāne vā? tatra jāte na yuktā 		ji ltar zhe na /
'dir bya ba 'di 'dod pa na rnam par shes pa skyes zin pa la 'dod dam /
ma skyes pa la 'am skye bzhin pa la yin grang na /
de la skyes zin pa la mi rigs te /
kriyā hi bhāvaniṣpādikā bya ba ni dngos po sgrub par byed pa yin na /
bhāvaścenniṣpannaḥ, kimasya kriyayā? dngos po grub par gyur na ni de la bya bas ci zhig dgos te /
jātasya janma punareva ca naiva yuktam 'di ni skyes par gyur pa slar yang skye bar 'gyur ba rigs pa ma yin nyid /
ityādinā ca madhyamakāvatāre pratipāditametat ces bya ba la sogs pa dbu ma la 'jug pa las bstan pa yin no /
ajāte 'pi na yuktā, ma skyes pa la yang mi rigs te /
kartrā vinā janiriyaṃ na ca yuktarūpā skye ba 'di ni byed pa med par rigs pa'i ngo bo 'ang min /
ityādivacanāt /
jāyamāne 'pi bhāve kriyā na saṃbhavati, jātājātavyatirekeṇa jāyamānābhāvāt /
yathoktam 		zhes bya ba la sogs pa 'byung ba'i phyir ro /
dngos po skye bzhin pa la yang bya ba srid pa ma yin te /
skyes pa dang ma skyes pa las ma gtogs pa'i skye bzhin pa med pa'i phyir ro /
ji skad du /
jāyamānārthajātatvājjāyamāno na jāyate skye bzhin pa ni phyed skyed phyir /
skye bzhin pa ni skye ba min /
atha vā jāyamānatvaṃ sarvasyaiva prasajyate yang na thams cad skye bzhin pa /
nyid ni yin par thal bar 'gyur /
iti /
yataścaivaṃ triṣu kāleṣu janikriyāyā asaṃbhavaḥ, tasmānnāsti sā 		zhes gsungs so /
gang gi phyir /
de ltar dus gsum du skye ba'i bya ba mi srid pa de'i phyir de ni yod pa yang ma yin no /
ata evāha de nyid kyi phyir /
kriyā na pratyayavatī iti /
viśeṣaṇaṃ nāsti vinā viśeṣam /
ityādinā pratipāditametanmadhyamakāvatāre /
na hi vandhyāputro gomānityucyate 		bya ba rkyen dang ldan pa med /
ces gsungs te /
mo gsham gyi bu ba lang dang ldan no zhes ni brjod par bya ba ma yin no /
'di ni khyad par med par khyad par can yod min /
zhes bya ba la sogs pa dbu ma la 'jug pa las bstan pa nyid do /
gal te de lta na /
yadyevam, apratyayavatī tarhi bhaviṣyatīti, etadapyayuktamityāha 'o na rkyen dang mi ldan par 'gyur ro zhe na /
'di yang rigs pa ma yin no zhes bshad pa ni /
nāpratyayavatī kriyā rkyen dang mi ldan bya ba med /
yadā pratyayavatī nāsti, tadā kathamapratyayavatī nirhetukā syāt? na hi tantumayaḥ paṭo na yukta iti vīraṇamayo 'bhyupagamyate gang gi tshe bya ba rkyen dang ldan pa med pa de'i tshe ji ltar rkyen dang mi ldan pa rgyu med pa yod par 'gyur te /
snam bu snal ma'i rang bzhin du mi rigs pas /
'jag ma'i rang bzhin du khas len pa ni ma yin no /
tasmātkriyā na bhāvajanikā de'i phyir bya ba dngos po'i skyed par byed pa ma yin no /
atrāha /
yadyevaṃ kriyāyā asaṃbhavaḥ, pratyayāstarhi janakā bhaviṣyanti bhāvānāmiti 		'dir smras pa /
gal te de ltar bya ba med na /
'o na ni rkyen dag dngos po rnams kyi skyed par byed par 'gyur ro /
ucyate /
pratyayā nākriyāvantaḥ /
yadā kriyā nāsti, tadā kriyārahitā akriyāvanto nirhetukāḥ pratyayāḥ kathaṃ janakāḥ? atha kriyāvanta eva janakā iti, ucyate 		bshad par bya ste /
bya ba mi ldan rkyen ma yin /
gang gi tshe bya ba med pa de'i tshe /
rkyen bya ba dang bral ba dang bya ba dang mi ldan pa rgyu med pa rnams ji ltar skyed par byed pa yin /
ji ste bya ba dang ldan pa dag kho na skyed par byed pa yin no zhe na /
kriyāvantaśca santyuta bshad pa /
bya ba ldan yod 'on te na /
neti prakṛtenābhisaṃbandhaḥ ma yin no zhes skabs dang sbyar ro /
utaśabdo 'vadhāraṇe /
tatra kriyāyā abhāva uktaḥ, kathaṃ kriyāvattvaṃ pratyayānāmiti? yathā ca vijñānajanikriyoktā, evaṃ parikriyādayo 'pi bhāvā uktā veditavyā iti nāsti kriyāto 'pi samutpattirbhāvānāmiti bhavatyutpādābhidhānamarthaśūnyam 		'on te na'i sgra ni nges par gzung ba'o /
de la bya ba med par bshad na /
rkyen rnams ji ltar bya ba dang ldan pa nyid yin na ji ltar rnam par shes pa'i skye ba'i bya ba la brjod pa de bzhin du 'tshod pa'i bya ba la sogs pa'i dngos po dag la yang brjod par rig par bya'o /
des na bya ba las kyang dngos po rnams skye ba med pas skye ba'i rjod par byed pa don gyis stong par 'gyur ro /
atrāha /
kiṃ na etena kriyāvantaḥ pratyayā ityādivicāreṇa? yasmāccakṣurādīn pratītya pratyayān vijñānādayo bhāvā jāyante, tasmāccakṣurādīnāṃ pratyayatvaṃ tebhyaścotpādo vijñānādīnāmiti 		'dir smras pa /
rkyen bya ba dang ldan no zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i rnam par dpyad pa 'dis kho bo cag la ci dgos /
gang gi phyir mig la sogs pa'i rkyen dag la brten nas dngos po rnam par shes pa la sogs pa rnams skye bar 'gyur te /
de'i phyir mig la sogs pa rnams rkyen nyid yin zhing /
rnam par shes pa la sogs pa rnams kyang de dag las skye ba yin no /
etadapyayuktamityāha 'di yang rigs pa ma yin no zhes bshad pa /
utpadyate pratītyemānitīme pratyayāḥ kila 'di dag la brten skye bas na /
de phyir 'di dag rkyen ces grag /
yāvannotpadyata ime tāvannāpratyayāḥ katham ji srid mi skye de srid du /
'di dag rkyen min ji ltar min /
yadi cakṣurādīn pratyayān pratītya vijñānamutpadyate iti asya ime pratyayā ucyante, nanu yāvattadvijñānākhyaṃ kāryaṃ notpadyate tāvadime cakṣurādayaḥ kathaṃ nāpratyayāḥ? apratyayā evetyabhiprāyaḥ na cāpratyayebhya utpattiḥ sikatābhya iva tailasya /
atha matam /
pūrvamapratyayāḥ santaḥ kiṃcidanyaṃ pratyayamapekṣya pratyayatvaṃ pratipadyanta iti, etadapyayuktam 		gal te mig la sogs pa'i rkyen rnams la brten nas rnam par shes pa skye bas na 'di dag de'i rkyen zhes brjod na ni /
ji srid rnam par shes pa zhes bya ba'i 'bras bu de mi skye ba de srid du /
mig la sogs pa 'di dag rkyen ma yin pa ji ltar ma yin te /
rkyen ma yin pa nyid do snyam du dgongs pa'o /
