blta bar bya ba dang lta ba dag ni yod pa nyid de /
tatra /
pratītya mātāpitarau yathoktaḥ putrasaṃbhavaḥ 		de dag gi 'bras bu yod pa'i phyir ro /
de la ji ltar pha dang ma dag la /
brten nas bu ni 'byung bshad pa /
cakṣūrūpe pratītyaivamukto vijñānasaṃbhavaḥ de bzhin mig dang gzugs brten nas /
rnam par shes pa 'byung bar bshad /
iti draṣṭavyaṃ darśanaṃ ca pratītya vijñānamutpadyate ces bya ba la /
blta bar bya ba dang lta ba la brten nas rnam par shes pa 'byung la /
trayāṇāṃ saṃnipātātsāsravasparśaḥ, sparśasahajā vedanā, tatpratyayā tṛṣṇeti gsum 'dus par gyur pa las reg pa zag pa dang bcas pa 'byung zhes /
reg pa dang lhan cig 'byung ba ni tshor ba yin la /
de'i rkyen gyis srid pa yin no /
evaṃ catvāryapi bhavāṅgāni draṣṭavyadarśanahetukāni vidyante de ltar na srid pa'i yan lag bzhi po blta bar bya ba dang lta ba'i rgyu can dag ni yod pa yin te /
tasmātkāryasadbhāvād draṣṭavyadarśane vidyete iti de'i phyir /
de dag gi 'bras bu yod pa'i phyir blta bar bya ba dang lta ba gnyis yod do /
ucyate /
syātāmete, yadi vijñānādicatuṣṭayameva syāt 		brjod par bya ste /
gal te rnam par shes pa la sogs pa bzhi po nyid yod na /
yasmāt /
draṣṭavyadarśanābhāvādvijñānādicatuṣṭayam /
nāstīti 		de gnyis yod par 'gyur na yod pa ni ma yin te /
'di ltar blta bya lta ba med pa'i phyir /
rnam par shes la sogs pa bzhi /
yod min /
iha draṣṭurabhāvād draṣṭavyadarśane api na sta ityuktam 'dir lta ba po med pas blta bar bya ba dang lta ba gnyis kyang med do zhes bshad zin to /
ataḥ kuto vijñānādicatuṣṭayaṃ vijñānasparśavedanātṛṣṇākhyam? tasmānna santi vijñānādīni de'i phyir rnam par shes pa dang reg pa dang tshor ba dang sred pa zhes bya ba rnam par shes pa la sogs pa bzhi po yod par ga la 'gyur /
de'i phyir rnam par shes pa la sogs pa bzhi po rnams med do /
atrāha /
santyevatāni tatkāryasadbhāvāt 		'dir smras pa /
de dag ni yod pa nyid de dag gi 'bras bu yod pa'i phyir ro /
iha tṛṣṇāpratyayamupādānamityādinā upādānabhavajātijarāmaraṇādikaṃ vijñānādicatuṣṭayādutpadyate, tasmātsanti vijñānādīni tatkāryasadbhāvāt 'dir sred pa'i rkyen gyis len pa zhes bya ba la sogs pas len pa dang srid pa dang skye ba dang rga shi la sogs pa ni rnam par shes pa la sogs pa bzhi las skye ste /
de'i phyir rnam par shes pa la sogs pa dag yod de de dag gi 'bras bu yod pa'i phyir ro /
ucyate /
syurupādānādīni yadi vijñānādicatuṣṭayameva syāt 		brjod par bya ste /
gal te rnam par shes pa la sogs pa bzhi po yod na ni len pa la sogs pa dag yod par 'gyur na /
yadā tu draṣṭavyadarśanābhāvādvijñānādicatuṣṭayaṃ naivāsti, tadā gang gi tshe blta bar bya ba dang lta ba med pas rnam par shes pa la sogs pa bzhi po yod pa ma yin pa de'i tshe /
nye bar len la sogs /
upādānādīni bhaviṣyanti punaḥ katham /
na santyupādānādīnītyarthaḥ 		ji lta bur na yod par 'gyur /
nye bar len pa la sogs pa rnams yod par mi 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i don to /
idānīṃ darśanavaccheṣāyatanavyākhyānātideśārthamāha da ni dbang po lhag ma rnams kyi rnam par bshad pa lta ba dang 'dra bar bsgre bar bya ba'i phyir /
vyākhyātaṃ śravaṇaṃ ghrāṇaṃ rasanaṃ sparśanaṃ manaḥ lta bas nyan dang snom pa dang /
myong bar byed dang reg byed yid /
darśanenaiva jānīyācchrotṛśrotavyakādi ca nyan pa po dang mnyan la sogs /
rnam par bshad par shes par bya /
iti /
uktaṃ hi bhagavatā 		zhes bya ba gsungs so /
bcom ldan 'das kyis /
na cakṣuḥ prekṣate rūpaṃ mano dharmānna vetti ca mig gis gzugs rnams mi mthong zhing /
yid kyis chos rnams mi shes te /
etatta paramaṃ satyaṃ yatra loko na gāhate gang du 'jig rten mi 'jug pa /
'di ni bden pa'i mchog yin no /
sāmagryā darśanaṃ yatra prakāśayati nāyakaḥ gang du rkyen tshogs pas mthong ba /
'dren pa rab tu ston mdzad pa'i /
prāhopacārabhūmiṃ tāṃ paramārthasya buddhimān sa de don dam 'dzin pa ni /
nye bar brtags par chub par 'gyur /
iti /
tathā /
cakṣuśca pratītya rūpataḥ cakṣuvijñānamihopajāyate 		zhes bya ba dang de bzhin du /
ming dang gzugs la brten nas ni /
mig gi rnam shes 'dir skye yang /
no cakṣuṣi rūpa niśritaṃ rūpasaṃkrānti na caiva cakṣuṣi gzugs ni mig la brten ma yin /
gzugs ni mig las 'pho ba'ang min /
nairātmya 'śubhāśca dharmime teṣvātmeti śubhāśca kalpitāḥ bdag med mi sdug chos 'di dag /
slar yang bdag dang sdug ces brtags /
viparītamasadvikalpitaṃ cakṣuvijñāna tato 'pi jāyate med la log par brtags pa ste /
de las mig gi rnam shes 'byung /
vijñānanirodhasaṃbhavaṃ vijñānaupādavayaṃ vipaśyati rnam shes 'gag dang 'byung ba las /
rnam shes zad dang 'phel bar 'thong [*'thod?] /
na kahiṃci gataṃ na cāgataṃ śūnya māyopama yogi paśyati 'gar yang 'gro 'ong med stong dang /
sgyu 'drar rnal 'byor pa yis mthong /
zhes gsungs so /
tathācāryopālipṛcchāyām /
sarva sayogi tu paśyati cakṣustatra na paśyati pratyayahīnam 		de bzhin du 'phags pa nye ba 'khor gyis zhus pa las kyang /
mig ni thams cad ldan na mthong 'gyur te /
mig gis gzugs rnams mthong ba gang yin pa'ang /
naiva ca cakṣu prapaśyati rūpaṃ tena sayogaviyogavikalpaḥ mtshan mo rkyen rnams med na mthong mi 'gyur /
de phyir ldan dang bral ba rnam rtog yin /
ālokasamāśrita paśyati cakṣū rūpa manoramacitraviśiṣṭam mig ni snang la brten te yid 'ong dang /
yid du mi 'ong sna tshogs gzugs mthong bas /
yena ca yogasamāśritacakṣustena na paśyati cakṣu kadāci de ltar snang la brten te mthong bas na /
de phyir mig gis nam yang mthong ba med /
yo 'pi ca śrūyati śabdu manojñaḥ so 'pi ca nāntari jātu praviṣṭaḥ yid du 'ong ba'i sgra grag gang yin pa /
de yang nam yang nang du zhugs pa med /
saṃkramaṇaṃ na ca labhyati tasya kalpavaśāttu samucchritu śabdaḥ der 'gro dmigs su yod pa ma yin te /
rtog pa'i dbang gis sgra rnams 'byung ba yin /
iti /
tathā /
gītaṃ na nṛtyamapi vādyarutaṃ na grāhyaṃ svapnopamā hi ratayo 'budhamohanāśca 		zhes gsungs so /
de bzhin du /
glu dang gar dang rol mo'i sgra yang gzung bya min /
rmi lam lta bu mi mkhas rmongs dang chags pa'i rgyu /
saṃkalpalālasa gatā abudhā 'tra nāśaṃ kiṃ kleśadāsa iva bālajano bhavāmi mi mkhas kun du rtog la zhen rnams brlag 'gyur zhing /
skye bo byis pa nyon mongs bran bzhin bdag gyur tam /
iti /
ityācāryacandrakīrtipādoparacitāyāṃ prasannapadāyāṃ madhyamakavṛttau cakṣurādīndriyaparīkṣā nāma tṛtīyaṃ prakaraṇam /
skandhaparīkṣā caturtha prakaraṇam 		zhes gsungs so /
slob dpon zla ba grags pa'i zhal snga nas sbyar ba'i tshig gsal ba las /
dbang po brtag pa zhes bya ba rab tu byed pa gsum pa'i 'grel pa'o /
atrāha /
yadyevaṃ cakṣurādīnīndriyāṇi na santi, na skandhāḥ, apratiṣedhāt tadantargatāni cendriyāṇi, atastānyapi bhaviṣyantīti 		'dir smras pa /
gal te de ltar dbang po rnams med na /
phung po lnga ma bkag pa'i phyir dang dbang po rnams kyang de'i khongs su 'dus pa de'i phyir de rnams kyang yod par 'gyur ro /
ucyate /
syureva, yadi skandhāḥ syuḥ tatra rūpaskandhamadhikṛtyāha 		brjod par bya ste /
gal te phung po rnams yod na de ltar 'gyur ba zhig na de rnams ni med do /
de la gzugs kyi phung po'i dbang du mdzad nas bshad pa /
rūpakāraṇanirmuktaṃ na rūpamupalabhyate gzugs kyi rgyu ni ma gtogs par /
gzugs ni dmigs par mi 'gyur ro /
rūpeṇāpi na nirmuktaṃ dṛśyate rūpakāraṇam gzugs zhes bya ba ma gtogs par /
gzugs kyi rgyu yang mi snang ngo /
tatra rūpaṃ bhautikam de la gzugs ni 'byung ba las gyur pa'o /
tasya kāraṇaṃ catvāri mahābhūtāni de'i rgyu ni 'byung ba chen po bzhi'o /
tadvayatiriktaṃ pṛthagbhūtaṃ rūpaṃ rūpaśabdagandharasaspraṣṭavyākhyaṃ nopalabhyate ghaṭādiva paṭaḥ /
rūpeṇāpi na nirmuktaṃ rūpātpṛthagbhūtaṃ rūpakāraṇamupalabhyate 		de dag las tha dad cing gzhan du gyur pa 'byung ba las gyur pa'i gzugs ni bum pa las snam bu ltar dmigs par mi 'gyur ro /
gzugs zhes bya ba ma gtogs par te /
gzugs las gzhan du gyur pa'i gzugs kyi rgyu yang dmigs par mi 'gyur ro /
tadetatpratijñādvayaṃ prasādhayitukāma āha dam bca' ba 'di gnyis sgrub par bzhed nas bshad pa /
rūpakāraṇanirmukte rūpe rūpaṃ prasajyate gzugs kyi rgyu ni ma gtogs par /
gzugs na gzugs ni rgyu med par /
āhetukaṃ, na cāstyarthaḥ kaścidāhetukaḥ kvacit thal bar 'gyur te don gang yang /
rgyu med pa ni gang na'ang med /
yathā ghaṭādarthāntarabhūtaḥ paṭo na ghaṭahetukaḥ, evaṃ rūpakāraṇacaturmahābhūtavyatirikta bhautikaṃ rūpamiṣyamāṇaṃ na bhūtahetukaṃ syāt /
na cāstyarthaḥ kaścidāhetukaḥ kvacit 		ji ltar bum pa las don gzhan du gyur pa'i snam bu bum pa'i rgyu can ma yin pa de bzhin du /
gzugs kyi rgyu 'byung ba chen po las tha dad par gyur pa 'byung ba las gyur pa'i gzugs 'dod na yang 'byung ba'i rgyu can du mi 'gyur te /
rgyu med pa can du 'gyur na /
don gang zhig rgyu med pa ni gang na yang yod pa ma yin no /
tasmādahetukatvadoṣaprasaṅgānna rūpakāraṇanirmuktaṃ rūpamabhyupetavyamiti de'i phyir rgyu med par thal bar 'gyur ba'i phyir na gzugs kyi rgyu las ma gtogs pa'i gzugs khas blang bar bya ba ma yin no /
idānīṃ rūpeṇāpi vinirmuktaṃ yathā rūpakāraṇaṃ nāsti, tathā pratipādayannāha de ni gzugs las ma gtogs par gzugs kyi rgyu yang ji ltar med pa de ltar bstan pa'i phyir bshad pa /
gal te gzugs ni ma gtogs par /
rūpeṇa tu vinirmuktaṃ yadi syādrūpakāraṇam gzugs kyi rgyu zhig yod na ni /
'bras bu med pa'i rgyur 'gyur te /
yadi kāryarūpavinirmuktaṃ rūpakāraṇaṃ syāt, tadā, yathā ghaṭātkuṇḍaṃ pṛthaksiddhaṃ ghaṭahetukaṃ na bhavati, evaṃ kāryātpṛthagbhūtaṃ kāraṇamiṣyamāṇam gal te 'bras bu'i gzugs ma gtogs pa'i gzugs kyi rgyu zhig yod par gyur na ni de'i tshe ji ltar snam bu las tha dad par grub pa'i 'khar gzhong snam bu'i rgyu can ma yin pa de bzhin du 'bras bu las tha dad par 'dod pa'i rgyu yang rgyu med par 'gyur ro /
akāryakaṃ kāraṇaṃ syāt /
nirhetukaṃ syāt 		rgyu rgyu nyid du bya ba'i rgyu ni 'bras bu 'jug pa yin na /
kāraṇasya hi kāraṇatve kāryapravṛttirhetuḥ, kāryanirapekṣācca kāraṇāt pṛthaksiddhā nāsti kāryapravṛttiḥ tha dad par grub pa nyid kyi phyir 'bras bu la mi ltos pa'i rgyu las ni 'bras bu 'jug pa yod pa ma yin no /
yaccākāryakaṃ kāraṇaṃ tannirhetukatvānnaroragaturagaviṣāṇavannāstyevetyāha 'bras bu med pa'i rgyu gang yin pa de ni rgyu med pa can yin pa'i phyir nam mkha'i me tog ltar med pa nyid yin no zhes bshad pa ni /
nāstyakāryaṃ ca kāraṇam 'bras bu med pa'i rgyu med do /
iti /
atha cedaṃ rūpasya kāraṇamiṣyamāṇaṃ sati vā rūpe kāraṇatveneṣyate 'sati vā? ubhayathā ca nopapadyata ityāha 		zhes bya ba'o /
gzhan yang gzugs kyi rgyu 'di 'dod pa na /
gzugs yod pa na rgyu nyid du 'dod dam /
med pa na 'dod grang na /
gnyi ga ltar yang mi 'thad do zhes bshad pa /
rūpe satyeva rūpasya kāraṇaṃ nopapadyate gzugs yod na yang gzugs kyi ni /
rgyu yang 'thad par mi 'gyur nyid /
rūpe 'satyeva rūpasya kāraṇaṃ nopapadyate /
sati vā saṃvidyamāne rūpe kiṃ rūpakāraṇena prayojanam? asati asaṃvidyamāne rūpe kiṃ kiṃ rūpakāraṇena prayojanam, kasya vā tatkāraṇaṃ parikalpyate? tasmādasatyapi rūpe rūpakāraṇaṃ nopapadyate /
atha syāt 		gzugs med na yang gzugs kyi ni /
rgyu yang 'thad par mi 'gyur nyid /
de la gzugs yod pa na ste bdog pa na ni gzugs kyi rgyus dgos pa ci zhig yod /
med na yang ste gzugs yod pa ma yin na yang gzugs kyi rgyus dgos pa ci zhig yod /
yang na de gang gi rgyu yin par brtag /
de'i phyir gzugs med na yang gzugs kyi rgyu ni 'thad par mi 'gyur ro /
yadyapi evaṃ rūpakāraṇaṃ na saṃbhavati, tathāpi kāryaṃ rūpaṃ saṃvidyate, sadbhāvāt kāraṇamapi bhaviṣyatīti ci ste gal te yang de ltar gzugs kyi rgyu mi srid mod kyi de lta na yang 'bras bu'i gzugs ni yod la /
de yod pa las rgyu yang yod par 'gyur ro snyam na /
syādevam, yadi kāryaṃ rūpaṃ syāt gal te 'bras bu'i gzugs yod na de ltar 'gyur na /
na tvasti /
ysmāt /
niṣkāraṇaṃ punā rūpaṃ naiva naivopapadyate /
rūpakāraṇaṃ yathā nāsti tathoktam 		yod pa yang ma yin te /
gang gi phyir /
rgyu med pa yi gzugs dag ni /
'thad par mi rung rung min nyid /
gzugs kyi rgyu ni ji ltar med pa de ltar bshad zin to /
asati kāraṇe kuto nirhetukaṃ kāryaṃ rūpaṃ bhavet? naiva naivetyanena sāvadhāraṇena pratiṣedhadvayena ahetukatvādasyātyaniṣṭatāṃ darśayati rgyu med na ni 'bras bu'i gzugs rgyu med pa ga la yod /
mi rung rung min nyid ces bya ba nges par gzung ba dang bcas pa'i dgag pa gnyis po 'dis ni rgyu med par smra ba po shin tu tha chad yin par ston par mdzad pa'o /
yataścaivaṃ rūpaṃ sarvathā vicāryamāṇaṃ na saṃbhavati, /
tasmāt 		gang gi phyir /
de ltar gzugs rnam par dpyad pa na rnam pa thams cad du med pa de'i phyir rnal 'byor pa de kho na nyid gzigs pas /
tattvadarśī yogī gzugs kyi rnam par rtog pa ni /
rūpagatān kāṃścinna vikalpān vikalpayet /
sapratighāpratighasanidarśanānidarśanātītānāgatanīlapītādivikalpān rūpālambanānna kāṃścitparikalpayitumarhatītyarthaḥ /
api ca 		'ga' yang rnam par brtag mi bya /
thogs pa dang bcas pa dang thogs pa med pa dang bstan du yod pa dang bstan du med pa dang 'das pa dang ma 'ongs pa dang sngon po dang ser po la sogs pa'i rnam par rtog pa gzugs la dmigs pa 'ga' yang brtag par mi 'os so zhes bya ba'i don to /
gzhan yang 'di gzugs kyi rgyur 'dod pa na /
idaṃ rūpakāraṇamiṣyamāṇaṃ sadṛśaṃ kāryaṃ niṣpādayedasadṛśaṃ vā? ubhayathā ca nopapadyate ityāha 'bras bu 'dra ba 'am mi 'dra ba zhig sgrub par byed grang /
gnyi ga ltar yang mi 'thad do zhes bshad pa /
na kāraṇasya sadṛśaṃ kāryamityupapadyate 'bras bu rgyu dang 'dra ba zhes /
bya ba 'thad pa ma yin te /
na kāraṇasyāsadṛśaṃ kāryamityupapadyate 'bras bu rgyu dang mi 'dra zhes /
bya ba'ang 'thad pa ma yin no /
tatra rūpakāraṇaṃ kaṭhinadravoṣṇataralasvabhāvam de la gzugs kyi rgyu ni sra ba dang gsher ba dang dro ba dang g yo ba'i ngo bo yin la /
bhautikaṃ tu cakṣurādhyātmikaṃ pañcacakṣurvijñānādyāśrayakarūpaprasādātmakam /
bāhyaṃ tu rūpādyāyatanādikaṃ cakṣurvijñānādigrāhyalakṣaṇaṃ na mahābhūtasvabhāvamiti 		'byung ba las gyur pa nang gi bdag nyid mig la sogs pa ni mig gi rnam par shes pa la sogs pa'i rten gzugs dang ba'i bdag nyid can yin zhing /
phyi rol gzugs la sogs pa'i skye mched ni mig gi rnam par shes pa la sogs pas gzung bar bya ba'i mtshan nyid can yin gyi /
ato bhinnalakṣaṇatvānnirvāṇavatkāryakāraṇayoḥ sādṛśyameva nāstīti /
na kāraṇasya sadṛśaṃ kāryamityupapadyate /
na cāpi sadṛśānāṃ śālibījādīnāṃ parasparakāryakāraṇabhāvo dṛṣṭaḥ, ityataḥ 		'byung ba chen po'i rang bzhin can ma yin pa de'i phyir mtshan nyid can tha dad pas mya ngan las 'das pa bzhin du rgyu dang 'bras bu gnyis la 'dra ba nyid yod pa ma yin te /
de'i phyir 'bras bu rgyu dang 'dra ba zhes bya ba 'thad pa ma yin no /
na kāraṇasya sadṛśaṃ kāryamityupapadyate /
tathāpi /
na kāraṇasyāsadṛśaṃ kāryamityupapadyate /
bhinnalakṣaṇatvānnirvāṇavadevetyabhiprāyaḥ /
yathā cedaṃ rūpaṃ vicāryamāṇaṃ sarvathā nopapadyate, evaṃ vedanādayo 'pi, ityatidiśannāha 		s'a lu'i sa bon la sogs pa 'dra bar gyur pa rnams la phan tshun rgyu dang 'bras bu'i dngos po ma mthong ste /
'di'i phyir yang /
'bras bu rgyu dang 'dra ba zhes bya ba 'thad pa ma yin no /
'bras bu rgyu dang mi 'dra ba zhes bya ba yang 'thad pa ma yin te /
mtshan nyid tha dad pa'i phyir mya ngan las 'das pa bzhin no zhes bya bar dgongs pa'o /
ji ltar gzugs 'di rnam par dpyad pa na rnam pa thams cad du mi 'thad pa de bzhin du tshor ba la sogs pa yang yin no zhes bya bar bsgre ba'i phyir bshad pa /
vedanācittasaṃjñānāṃ saṃskārāṇāṃ ca sarvaśaḥ tshor dang 'du shes 'du byed dang /
sems dang dngos po thams cad kyang /
sarveṣāmeva bhāvānāṃ rūpeṇaiva samaḥ kramaḥ rnam pa dag ni thams cad du /
gzugs nyid kyi ni rim pa mtshungs /
vedanādikamapi sarvaṃ rūpavicāreṇaiva samaṃ yojyam /
yathaiva hyekasya dharmasya śūnyatā pratipādayitumiṣṭā mādhyamikena, tathaiva sarvadharmāṇāmapīti 		tshor ba la sogs thams cad kyang gzugs rnam par dpyad pa dang mtshungs par sbyar bar bya'o /
dbu ma pas ni ji ltar chos gcig stong pa nyid du bstan par 'dod pa de bzhin du chos thams cad kyang yin pa de'i phyir /
ataḥ /
vigrahe yaḥ parīhāraṃ kṛte śūnyatayā vadet 		stong pa nyid kyis brtsad byas tshe /
gang zhig lan 'debs smra byed pa /
de yi thams cad lan btab min /
sarvaṃ tasyāparihṛtaṃ samaṃ sādhyena jāyate /
tatra parapakṣadūṣaṇaṃ vigrahaḥ 		bsgrub par bya dang mtshungs par 'gyur /
de la brtsad pa ni gzhan gyi phyogs sun 'byin pa'o /
śūnyatayā kāraṇabhūtayā rūpaṃ niḥsvabhāvamityevaṃ sasvabhāvavāde pratiṣiddhe, yadi paraḥ parihāraṃ brūyāt stong pa nyid rgyur gyur pas gzugs rang bzhin med do zhes bya bas de ltar rang bzhin dang bcas par smra ba bkag pa na /
gal te gzhan lan du tshor ba la sogs pa ni re zhig yod la /
vedanādayastāvatsanti, tadvadrūpamapyastīti, tadetatsarvaṃ tasyāparihṛtaṃ bhavati de bzhin du gzugs kyang yod do zhes smra na /
de'i de lta bu de thams cad ni lan btab pa ma yin te /
yasmādvedanādīnāmapi sadbhāvaḥ sādhyena rūpasadbhāvena samo veditavyaḥ /
yathā rūpaṃ svakāraṇāttattvānyatvena vicāryamāṇamasat, evaṃ sparśapratyayā vedanā, vijñānasahajā saṃjñā, avidyāpratyayāḥ saṃskārāḥ, saṃskārapratyayaṃ ca vijñānaṃ svakāraṇātsparśādeḥ tattvānyatvādinā vicāryamāṇaṃ nāstīti sarvametatsādhyasamaṃ bhavati 		gang gi phyir tshor ba la sogs pa rnams kyi yod pa yang bsgrub bya gzugs kyi yod pa dang mtshungs par rigs par bya'o /
ji ltar gzugs ni rang gi rgyu las de nyid dang gzhan nyid du rnam par dpyad pa na med pa de bzhin du /
reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang rnam par shes pa dang lhan cig 'byung ba'i 'du shes dang ma rig pa'i rkyen gyis 'du byed dang 'du byed kyi rkyen gyis rnam par shes pa yang /
reg pa la sogs pa rang gi rgyu las de nyid dang gzhan nyid du rnam par dpyad na /
yod pa ma yin pas 'di dag thams cad bsgrub par bya ba dang mtshungs pa yin no /
yathā vedanādayaḥ sādhyasamāḥ, evaṃ lakṣyalakṣaṇakāryakāraṇāvayavyavayavādayo 'pi sarva eva padārthāḥ rūpeṇa sādhyena samā iti kutaḥ parasya parīhāra saṃbhavet? sarvaṃ vacanamasya sādhyasamaṃ bhavatīti sarvatra śāstre parīhāreṇa sādhyasamatvaṃ mādhyamikenā grāhaṇīyamityācāryaḥ śikṣayati ji ltar tshor ba la sogs pa dag bsgrub par bya ba dang mtshungs pa de bzhin du mtshan nyid dang mtshan gzhi dang rgyu dang 'bras bu dang yan lag dang yan lag can la sogs pa dngos po thams cad kyang bsgrub par bya ba gzugs dang mtshungs pa yin no /
de'i phyir gzhan gyis lan gdab pa lta yod par ga la 'gyur te 'di'i tshig thams cad bsgrub par bya ba dang mtshungs par 'gyur bas /
bstan bcos su smras pa'i lan thams cad la dbu ma pas bsgrub par bya ba dang mtshungs pa nyid brjod par bya'o zhes slob dpon slob par mdzad do /
yathā ca parapakṣadūṣaṇe vihi 'toyaṃ vidhiḥ, evaṃ vyākhyānakāle 'pītyāha ji ltar gzhan gyi phyogs sun 'byin pa la tshul 'di brjod pa de bzhin du bshad pa byed pa'i tshe na yang yin no zhes bshad pa /
vyākhyāne ya upālambhaṃ kṛte śūnyatayā vadet stong pa nyid kyis bshad byas tshe /
gang zhig skyon 'dogs smra byed pa /
sarvaṃ tasyānupālabdhaṃ samaṃ sādhyena jāyate de yis thams cad skyon btags min /
bsgrub par bya dang mtshungs par 'gyur /
vyākhyānakāle 'pi yaḥ śiṣyadeśīyaścodyamupālambhaṃ kuryāt, tasyāpi taccodyamupālambhākhyaṃ pūrvavatsādhyasamaṃ veditavyam /
yathoktam 		bshad pa byed pa'i dus su yang slob ma lta bu gang zhig rgol bar byed pa de'i tshe brgal ba de yang snga ma bzhin du bsgrub par bya ba dang mtshungs par rig par bya'o /
ji skad du /
bhāvasyaikasya yo draṣṭā draṣṭā sarvasya sa smṛtaḥ dngos po gcig gi lta po gang /
de ni kun gyi lta por brjod /
ekasya śūnyatā yaiva saiva sarvasya śūnyatā gcig gi stong nyid gang yin pa /
de ni kun gyi stong pa nyid /
iti /
āryagaganagañjasamādhisūtre 'pi /
ekena dharmeṇa tu sarvadharmān anugacchate māyamarīcisādṛśān 		ces gsungs pa lta bu'o /
'phags pa nam mkha' mdzod kyi ting nge 'dzin gyi mdo las kyang /
chos gcig gis ni chos rnams thams cad sgyu ma dang /
smig rgyu dang 'dra gzung byar med cing gsog dang ni /
agrāhyatucchānalikānaśāśvatān so bodhimaṇḍaṃ nacireṇa gacchati brdzun zhing ther zug min par rjes su rtogs gyur pa /
de ni ring por mi thogs byang chub snying por 'gro /
iti /
samādhirājasūtre 'pi /
yatha ñāta tayātmasaṃjña tathaiva sarvatra peṣitā buddhiḥ 		zhes gsungs so de bzhin du ting nge 'dzin gyi rgyal po'i mdo las kyang /
ji ltar khyod kyis bdag gi 'du shes ni /
shes pa de bzhin kun la blos sbyar bya /
sarve ca tatsvabhāvā dharma viśuddhā gaganakalpāḥ chos rnams thams cad de yi ngo bo nyid /
rnam par dag pa nam mkha' lta bu yin /
ekena sarvaṃ jānāti sarvamekena paśyati gcig gis kyang ni thams cad shes /
gcig gis kyang ni thams cad mthong /
kiyadbahu pi bhāvetvā na tasyotpadyate madaḥ ji snyed mang po bshad byas kyang /
de la dregs pa skye ba med /
iti /
ityācāryacandrakīrtipādoparacittāyāṃ prasannapadāyāṃ madhyamakavṛttau skandhaparīkṣā nāma caturtha prakaraṇam 		ces gsungs so /
slob dpon zla ba grags pa'i zhal snga nas sbyar ba'i tshig gsal ba las /
phung po brtag pa zhes bya ba rab tu byed pa bzhi pa'i 'grel pa'o /
dhātuparīkṣā pañcamaṃ prakaraṇam /
atrāha /
dhātavaḥ santi pratiṣedhābhāvāt /
uktaṃ ca bhagavatā 		'dir smras pa khams rnams ni yod de /
bkag pa ma byas pa'i phyir ro /
bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang /
ṣaḍdhāturayaṃ mahārāja puruṣapudgala ityādi /
tataśca pravacanapāṭhāddhātuvatskandhāyatanānyeva santīti 		rgyal po chen po skyes bu gang zag 'di ni khams drug pa'o zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs so /
de'i phyir gsung rab 'don pa las na khams bzhin du phung po dang skye mched kyang yod do /
ucyate /
syuḥ skandhāyatanāni yadi dhātava eva syuḥ 		brjod par bya ste /
gal te khams rnams nyid yod na phung po dang skye mched rnams yod par 'gyur na de dag ni med do /
kathamityāha ji ltar zhe na bshad pa /
nākāśaṃ vidyate kiṃcitpūrvamākāśalakṣaṇāt nam mkha'i mtshan nyid snga rol na /
nam mkha' cung zad yod ma yin /
alakṣaṇaṃ prasajyeta syātpūrvaṃ yadi lakṣaṇāt gal te mtshan las sngar gyur na /
mtshan nyid med par thal bar 'gyur /
tatra ṣaḍ dhātava uktāḥ pṛthivyaptejovāyvākāśavijñānākhyāḥ /
tatrākāśamadhikṛtyocyate dūṣaṇaṃ svarūpanirūpaṇāt /
ihākāśasyānāvaraṇaṃ lakṣaṇamucyate 		de la khams drug gsungs pa ni /
sa dang chu dang me dang rlung dang nam mkha' dang rnam par shes pa zhes bya ba rnams so /
de la nam mkha'i dbang du byas nas sun dbyung ba brjod par bya ste /
'dir nam mkha'i mtshan nyid ni sgrib pa med pa zhes bya la /
yad yasmātpūrvamākāśamanāvaraṇa lakṣaṇāllakṣyaṃ syāt, tatra lakṣaṇapravartanādanāvaraṇalakṣaṇātpūrvaṃ nākāśaṃ lakṣyarūpamiti gal te sgrib pa med pa'i mtshan nyid 'di las sngar mtshan gzhi nam mkha' yod par gyur na /
de la mtshan nyid 'jug par 'gyur na /
mtshan nyid sgrib pa med pa'i snga rol du nam mkha' yod pa yang ma yin no /
yadā caivam gang gi tshe de ltar /
nākāśaṃ vidyate kiṃcitpūrvamākāśalakṣaṇāt /
alakṣaṇaṃ prasajyeta syātpūrvaṃ yadi lakṣaṇāt /
tathāhi alakṣaṇaṃ pravartatām 		nam mkha'i mtshan nyid snga rol na /
nam mkha' cung zad yod ma yin pa de'i tshe gang du mtshan nyid 'jug par 'gyur /
de med na nam mkha'i me tog ltar nam mkha' med do zhes bshad pa /
gal te mtshan las sngar gyur na /
mtshan nyid med par thal bar 'gyur /
tadabhāve khapuṣpavannāstyākāśamityāha /
alakṣaṇo na kaścicca bhāvaḥ saṃvidyate kvacit /
iti /
atrāha 		mtshan nyid med pa'i dngos po ni /
'ga' yang gang na'ang yod ma yin /
'dir smras pa /
re zhig mtshan nyid 'jug pa ni yod la /
lakṣaṇapravṛttirlakṣye bhavet, tatsadbhāvāllakṣyamapyastīti de yang mtshan gzhi la yin pas /
de yod pas na mtshan gzhi yang yod do /
etadapi nāsti 'di yang yod pa ma yin te /
yasmāt 'di ltar /
asatyalakṣaṇe bhāve kramatāṃ kuha lakṣaṇam mtshan nyid med pa'i dngos med na /
mtshan nyid gang du 'jug par 'gyur /
lakṣaṇātpūrvamalakṣaṇo bhāvo nāstītyuktam mtshan nyid kyi snga rol na mtshan nyid med pa'i dngos po med do zhes bshad zin to /
tataśca asati asaṃvidyamāne alakṣaṇe lakṣaṇarahite bhāve kuha idānīṃ lakṣaṇaṃpravartatāmiti nāsti lakṣaṇapravṛttiḥ de'i phyir mtshan nyid med pa'i dngos po med cing mi bdog na /
da ni mtshan nyid gang du 'jug par 'gyur te /
des na mtshan nyid 'jug pa med do /
api ca gzhan yang /
idaṃ lakṣaṇaṃ pravartamānaṃ salakṣaṇe vā pravarteta alakṣaṇe vā? ubhayathā ca nopapadyata ityāha mtshan nyid la 'jug pa na mtshan nyid dang bcas pa'am /
mtshan nyid med pa la 'jug par 'gyur ba zhig na /
gnyi ga ltar yang mi 'thad do zhes bshad pa /
nālakṣaṇe lakṣaṇasya pravṛttirna salakṣaṇe mtshan nyid med la mtshan nyid ni /
mi 'jug mtshan nyid bcas la min /
salakṣaṇālakṣaṇābhyāṃ nāpyanyatra pravartate mtshan bcas mtshan nyid med pa las /
gzhan la'ang 'jug par mi 'gyur ro /
tatra alakṣaṇe kharaviṣāṇavanna lakṣaṇapravṛttiḥ de la mtshan nyid med pa la ni mtshan nyid 'jug pa ma yin te /
bong bu'i rva la bya ba bzhin no /
salakṣaṇe 'pi bhāve na lakṣaṇapravṛttirūpapadyate prayojanābhāvāt mtshan nyid dang bcas pa'i dngos po la yang mtshan nyid 'jug pa mi 'thad de dgos pa med pa'i phyir ro /
kiṃ hi lakṣaṇavataḥ prasiddhasya bhāvasya punarlakṣaṇakṛtyaṃ syāt? ityanavasthā atiprasaṅgaścaivaṃ syāt mtshan nyid dang ldan par grub pa la slar yang mtshan nyid dang ldan pas bya ba ci yod na /
de ltar na thug pa med par thal bar yang 'gyur ro /
na hyasau kadācinna salakṣaṇaḥ syāditi sadaiva lakṣaṇapravṛttiḥ prasajyeta 'di ni nam yang mtshan nyid dang bcas pa ma yin par mi 'gyur bas /
rtag tu mtshan nyid 'jug par thal bar 'gyur na /
na caitadiṣṭam /
tasmātsalakṣaṇe 'pi bhāve na lakṣaṇapravṛttiparupadyate prayojanābhāvāt /
tatraivaṃ syāt /
salakṣaṇālakṣaṇābhyāmanyatra pravartiṣyata iti /
ucyate /
salakṣaṇālakṣaṇābhyāṃ nāpyanyatra pravartate 		de ltar ni 'dod pa yang ma yin no /
de'i phyir mtshan nyid dang bcas pa'i dngos po la yang mtshan nyid 'jug par 'thad pa ma yin te /
dgos pa med pa'i phyir ro /
de la 'di snyam du mtshan nyid dang bcas pa dang mtshan nyid med pa gnyis las gzhan pa zhig la 'jug par 'dod par 'gyur ro snyam na /
brjod par bya ste /
mtshan bcas mtshan nyid med pa las /
gzhan la'ang 'jug par mi 'gyur ro /
ci'i phyir zhe na /
mi srid pa'i phyir ro /
gal te mtshan nyid dang bcas pa yin na ni /
kiṃ kāraṇam? asadbhāvāt mtshan nyid med pa ma yin no /
yadi salakṣaṇo nālakṣaṇaḥ, athālakṣaṇo na salakṣaṇaḥ /
ataḥ salakṣaṇaśca alakṣaṇaśceti vipratiṣiddhametat 		de ste mtshan nyid med pa yin na ni mtshan nyid dang bcas pa ma yin te /
de'i phyir mtshan nyid dang bcas pa yang yin la /
na ca vipratiṣiddhaṃ saṃbhavati mtshan nyid med pa yang yin no zhes bya ba 'di ni 'gal ba yin no /
tasmādasaṃbhavādeva salakṣaṇe cālakṣaṇe ca lakṣaṇapravṛttirnopapadyate iti 'gal ba dag ni srid pa yang ma yin no /
de'i phyir mi srid pas mtshan nyid dang bcas pa yang yin la /
athāpi syāt /
yadyapi na lakṣaṇapravṛttiḥ, tathāpi lakṣyamastīti etadapi nāsti /
yasmāt /
lakṣaṇāsaṃpravṛttau ca na lakṣyamupapadyate 		mtshan nyid med pa yang yin pa la mtshan nyid 'jug pa mi 'thad do /
ci ste yang gal te mtshan nyid 'jug pa med pa de ltar na yang mtshan gzhi yod do snyam na /
'di yang yod pa ma yin te /
gang gi phyir /
mtshan nyid 'jug pa ma yin na /
mtshan gzhi 'thad par mi 'gyur ro /
yadā lakṣaṇapravṛttireva nāsti tadā kathaṃ lakṣyaṃ syāt? naiva saṃbhavatītyabhiprāyaḥ gang gi tshe mtshan nyid 'jug pa nyid med pa de'i tshe ji ltar mtshan gzhir 'gyur te /
yod pa ma yin pa nyid do snyam du dgongs pa'o /
atrāha /
lakṣaṇapravṛttistvayā niṣiddhā na tu lakṣaṇam, tataśca vidyate lakṣyam, lakṣaṇa sadbhāvāt 		'dir smras pa /
khyod kyis 'jug pa bkag pa yin gyi mtshan nyid ni ma yin te /
de'i phyir mtshan nyid yod pas mtshan gzhi yang yod pa yin no /
ucyate /
lakṣyasyānupapattau ca lakṣaṇasyāpyasaṃbhavaḥ 		brjod par bya ste /
mtshan gzhi 'thad pa ma yin na /
mtshan nyid kyang ni yod ma yin /
lakṣaṇāsaṃpravṛttau ca na lakṣyamupapadyate iti pratipāditam /
tadā 		zhes bya ba'o /
mtshan nyid 'jug pa ma yin na /
mtshan gzhi 'thad par mi 'gyur ro /
lakṣyasyānupapattau ca lakṣaṇasyāpyasaṃbhavaḥ zhes bstan pa de'i tshe /
mtshan gzhi 'thad pa ma yin dang /
nirāśrayatvāt /
yadā caivaṃ lakṣaṇaṃ nāsti, tadā lakṣaṇasadbhāvādvidyate lakṣyamiti yaduktaṃ tanna yataścaitadevam 		mtshan nyid kyang yod pa ma yin te rten med pa'i phyir ro /
gang gi tshe de ltar mtshan nyid yod pa ma yin pa de'i tshe /
mtshan nyid yod pa'i phyir mtshan gzhi yang yod do zhes gang smras pa de med do /
tasmānna vidyate lakṣyaṃ lakṣaṇaṃ naiva vidyate gang gi phyir 'di de ltar yin pa /
de'i phyir mtshan gzhi yod min te /
mtshan nyid yod pa nyid ma yin /
iti nigamanam zhes mjug bsdus pa yin no /
atrāha /
yadyāpi lakṣyalakṣaṇe na staḥ, tathā (pyā)kāśamasti, bhāvarūpaṃ ca bhavadākāśa lakṣyaṃ lakṣaṇaṃ vā syāt 		'dir smras pa /
gal te yang mtshan nyid dang mtshan gzhi dag med pa de lta na yang dngos po'i rang bzhin gyi nam mkha' yod pa yin la /
nam mkha' dngos po'i rang bzhin can du gyur na ni mtshan gzhi 'am mtshan nyid du yang 'gyur te /
tasmāllakṣyalakṣaṇe api ṣṭa iti /
etadapyayuktamityāha 		de'i phyir mtshan gzhi dang mtshan nyid dag kyang yod do /
'di yang mi rigs so zhes bshad pa /
lakṣyalakṣaṇanirmukto naiva bhāvo 'pi vidyate mtshan gzhi mtshan nyid ma gtogs pa'i /
dngos po yang ni yod ma yin /
lakṣyalakṣaṇe yathā na staḥ, tathoktaṃ prāk mtshan gzhi dang mtshan nyid dag ji ltar med pa de ltar ni gong du bshad zin to /
yadā anayorabhāvaḥ, tadā lakṣyalakṣaṇarahitatvādākāśakusumavannāstyākāśam gang gi tshe 'di dag med pa de'i tshe mtshan gzhi dang mtshan nyid dang bral ba'i phyir nam mkha'i me tog ltar nam mkha' med do /
yadyākāśaṃ bhāvo na bhavati, abhāvastarhi astu? etadapi nāsti gal te nam mkha' dngos por gyur pa med na /
'o na dngos po med pa yod par 'gyur ro zhe na /
'di yang yod pa ma yin te /
yasmāt 'di ltar /
avidyamāne bhāve ca kasyābhāvo bhaviṣyati dngos po yod pa ma yin na /
dngos med gang gi yin par 'gyur /
yadā ākāśaṃ bhāvo na bhavati, tadā bhāvasyāsattve kasyābhāvaḥ kalpyatām? vakṣyati hi gang gi tshe nam mkha' dngos po ma yin pa de'i tshe dngos po yod pa ma yin na /
dngos po med pa gang gi yin par brtag par bya ste /
bhāvasya cedaprasiddhirabhāvo naiva sidhyati gal te dngos po ma grub na /
dngos po med pa 'grub mi 'gyur /
bhāvasya hyanyathābhāvamabhāvaṃ bruvate janāḥ dngos po gzhan du gyur pa la /
dngos po med ces skye bo smra /
iti /
tasmād bhāvābhāvādabhāvo 'pyākāśaṃ na saṃbhavati 		zhes 'chad par 'gyur ro /
de'i phyir dngos po med pas nam mkha' dngos po med pa yang med do /
rūpābhāvaścākāśamiti vyavasthāpyate nam mkha' dngos po zhes bya ba ni gzugs med pa la rnam par gzhag ste /
yadyapi rūpaṃ syāttadā rūpābhāva ākāśamiti syāt de'i phyir gal te gzugs yod na ni de'i tshe gzugs med pa la nam mkha' zhes bya bar 'gyur na /
yadā ca yathoktena nyāyena rūpameva nāsti, tadā kasyābhāva ākāśaṃ syāt? gang gi tshe ji skad bshad pa rigs pas gzugs nyid yod pa ma yin pa de'i tshe gang gi dngos po med pa nam mkha' 'gyur /
atrāha /
vidyete eva bhāvābhāvau, tatparīkṣakasadbhāvāt 		'dir de dag ni yongs su rtogs par byed pa po yod pa'i phyir /
asti ca bhavān bhāvābhāvayoḥ parīkṣakaḥ, ya evāha /
avidyamāne bhāve ca kasyābhāvo bhaviṣyati /
iti /
tasmād bhavato bhāvābhāvaparīkṣakasya sadbhāvāt parīkṣyāvapi bhāvābhāvau vidyete iti 		dngos po dang dngos po med pa gnyis ni yod pa nyid yin la /
gang zhig 'di skad du /
dngos po yod pa ma yin na /
dngos med gang gi yin par 'gyur /
zhes smra ba dngos po dang dngos po med pa dag gi yongs su rtog par byed pa khyod yod pa yang yin te /
de'i phyir dngos po dang dngos po med par rtog par byed pa khyod yod pas brtag bya dngos po dang dngos po med pa gnyis kyang yod pa yin no zhes smra'o /
ucyate /
etadapyayuktam 		brjod pa 'di yang mi rung ste /
gang gi phyir /
yasmāt /
bhāvābhāvavidharmā ca bhāvābhāvamavaiti kaḥ /
syātāṃ bhāvābhāvau yadi, tadā tayoḥ parīkṣako bhāvo va syādabhāvo vā /
yadi bhāva iṣyate, tasya 		dngos dang dngos med mi mthun chos /
gang gis dngos dang dngos med shes /
gal te de gnyis kyi rtog par byed pa po yod na ni /
dngos po dang dngos po med pa dag tu yang 'gyur na /
yod pa yang ma yin no /
yod na yongs su rtog par byed pa gang yin pa de dngos po 'am dngos po med pa zhig tu 'gyur grang /
gal te dngos po yin par 'dod na ni /
lakṣyalakṣaṇanirmukto naiva bhāvo 'pi vidyate mtshan gzhi mtshan nyid ma gtogs pa'i /
dngos po yang ni yod ma yin /
ityuktaṃ dūṣaṇam /
atha abhāvaḥ, 		zhes 'di'i sun 'byin pa bstan zin to /
'on te /
avidyamāne bhāve ca kasyābhāvo bhaviṣyati dngos po med pa yin na ni /
dngos po yod pa ma yin na /
dngos med gang gi yin par 'gyur /
ityatroktametadduṣaṇam /
na ca bhāvābhāvavisadṛśadharmā kaścit tṛtīyaḥ padārtho 'sti, yo 'nayoravagamaka iti nāsti bhāvābhāvayoḥ parīkṣakaḥ /
ata evoktaṃ bhagavatā 		zhes bya ba der sun 'byin pa bshad zin to /
gang zhig 'di gnyis kyi rtog par byed par 'gyur ba /
dngos po med pa dang chos mi mthun pa gsum pa 'ga' zhig yod pa yang ma yin te /
de'i phyir dngos po dang dngos po med pa dag gi yongs su rtog par byed pa med do /
de nyid kyi phyir /
bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang /
bhāvānabhāvāniti yaḥ prajānati sa sarvabhāveṣu na jātu sajjate gang gis dngos rnams dngos med shes pa de /
nam yang dngos po kun la chags mi 'gyur /
yaḥ sarvabhāveṣu na jātu sajjate sa ānimittaṃ bhajate samādhim gang zhig nam yang dngos kun chags med pa /
de ni ting 'dzin mtshan ma med la reg /
iti /
tathā /
yo 'pi ca cintayi śūnyakadharmān so 'pi kumārgapapannaku balaḥ 		ces bya ba dang de bzhin du /
gang dag chos rnams stong la sems byed pa'i /
byis pa de dag lam ngan zhugs pa yin /
akṣara kīrtita śūnyaka dharmāḥ te ca anakṣara akṣara uktāḥ chos rnams stong pa yi ges brjod pa yin /
de dag yi ge med par yi ges bstan /
śānta paśānta ya cintayi dharmān so 'pi ca cinta na jātu na bhūtaḥ gang dag zhi zhing rab zhi'i chos sems pa'i /
sems dpa' de yang nam yang byung ma yin /
cittavitarkaṇa sarvi papañcāḥ sūkṣma acintiya budhyatha dharmān spros kun sems kyi rnam par rtog yin te /
de'i phyir chos rnams bsam yas rtogs par gyis /
iti vistaraḥ /
idānīṃ pratipāditamarthaṃ nigamayannāha 		zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs so /
da ni ji ltar bstan pa de ltar mjug bsdu ba'i phyir /
tasmānna bhāvo nābhāvo na lakṣyaṃ nāpi lakṣaṇam de phyir nam mkha'i dngos po min /
dngos med ma yin mtshan gzhi min /
ākāśam /
iti /
yathā cākāśam, evam /
ākāśasamā dhātavaḥ pañca ye pare 		mtshan nyid ma yin zhes bya ba gsungs so /
nam mkha' ji lta ba de bzhin du khams lnga po gzhan gang dag kyang nam mkha' mtshungs /
pṛthivyādidhātavo ye pañca pare 'vaśiṣyante, te 'pi ākāśavad bhāvābhāvalakṣyalakṣaṇaparikalpasvarūparahitāḥ parijñeyā ityarthaḥ /
tadevaṃ padārthānāṃ svabhāve vyavasthite avidyātimiropahatamatinayanatayā anādisaṃsārābhyastatayā bhāvābhāvādiviparītadarśanā nirvāṇānugāmyaviparītanaiḥsvabhāvyadarśanasanmārgaparibhraṣṭāḥ 		sa la sogs pa'i khams lnga po gzhan gang dag lhag mar gyur pa de dag kyang nam mkha' ltar dngos po dang dngos po med pa dang mtshan gzhi dang mtshan nyid dang bral bar shes par bya'o zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go /
de'i phyir dngos po rnams kyi rang bzhin de ltar rnam par gnas pa yin dang ma rig pa'i rab rib kyis blo gros kyi mig nyams par gyur pa nyid kyis 'khor ba thog ma med pa nas dngos po dang dngos po med pa la sogs pa phyin ci log tu lta ba goms pa rang bzhin med pa phyin ci ma log par mthong ba'i lam mya ngan las 'das pa dang mthun par 'gro ba las nyams pa /
astitvaṃ ye tu paśyanti nāstitvaṃ cālpabuddhayaḥ blo chung gang dag dngos rnams la /
yod pa nyid dang med nyid du /
bhāvānāṃ te na paśyanti draṣṭavyopaśamaṃ śivam lta ba de ni blta bya ba /
nye bar zhi ba zhi mi mthong /
draṣṭavyopaśamaṃ śivalakṣaṇaṃ sarvakalpanājālarahitaṃ jñānajñeyanivṛttisvabhāvaṃ śivaṃ paramārthasvabhāvam /
paramārthamajaramamaramaprapañcaṃ nirvāṇaṃ śūnyatāsvabhāvaṃ te na paśyanti mandabuddhitayā astitvaṃ nāstitvaṃ cābhiniviṣṭāḥ santa iti 		blo zhan pa nyid kyis yod pa nyid dang med pa nyid du mngon par zhen pa de dag gis mya ngan las 'das pa blta bar bya ba nye bar zhi zhing zhi ba'i mtshan nyid rtog pa thams cad dang bral ba /
shes pa dang shes bya log pa'i ngo bo don dam pa /
stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin can mi mthong ngo /
yathoktamāryaratnāvalyām ji skad du /
rin po che'i phreng ba las /
nāstiko durgatiṃ yāti sugatiṃ yātyanāstikaḥ med pa pa ni ngan 'gror 'gro /
yod pa pa ni bde 'gror 'gro /
yathābhūtaparijñānānmokṣamadvayaniśritaḥ yang dag ji bzhin yongs shes phyir /
gnyis la mi brten thar par 'gyur /
iti /
āryasamādhirāje coktaṃ bhagavatā /
astīti nāstīti ume 'pi antā śuddhī aśuddhīti ime 'pi antā 		zhes bshad do /
mdo las kyang bcom ldan 'das kyis /
yod dang med ces bya ba gnyi ga mtha' /
dag dang ma dag 'di yang mtha' yin no /
tasmādume anta vivarjayitvā madhye 'pi sthānaṃ na karoti paṇḍitaḥ de'i phyir gnyi ga'i mtha' ni rnam spangs nas /
mkhas pas dbus la'ang gnas par yod mi byed /
astīti nāstīti vivāda eṣaḥ śuddhī aśuddhīti ayaṃ vivādaḥ yod dang med ces bya ba rtsod pa ste /
dag dang ma dag 'di yang rtsod pa yin /
vivādaprāptyā na dukhaṃ praśāmyate avivādaprāptyā ca duḥkhaṃ nirudhyate rtsod par gyur pa sdug bsngal zhi mi 'gyur /
rtsod pa med par 'gyur ba sdug bsngal 'gag /
iti /
tasmādasaṃbhava eva yatsāṃsārikeṇa mārgeṇa nirvāṇamadhigamyata iti 		ces gsungs so /
de'i phyir 'khor ba'i lam gyis mya ngan las 'das pa dam pa 'thob pa zhes bya ba gang yin pa ni srid pa ma yin no /
ityācāryacandrakīrtipādoparacitāyāṃ prasannapadāyāṃ madhyamakavṛttau dhātuparīkṣā nāma pañcamaṃ prakaraṇam /
rāgaraktaparīkṣā ṣaṣṭhaṃ prakaraṇam /
atrāha 		slob dpon zla ba grags pa'i zhal snga nas sbyar ba'i tshig gsal ba las /
khams brtag pa zhes bya ba rab tu byed pa lnga pa'i 'grel pa'o /
'dir smras pa /
vidyanta eva skandhāyatanadhātavaḥ /
kutaḥ? tadāśrayasaṃkleśopalabdheḥ 		phung po dang khams dang skye mched rnams ni yod pa nyid de /
de'i rten can kun nas nyon mongs pa dmigs pa'i phyir ro /
iha yannāsti, na tadāśrayasaṃkleśopalabdhirasti bandhyāduhituriva vandhyāsūnoḥ 'di na gang yod pa ma yin pa de'i rten can gyi kun nas nyon mongs pa ni dmigs pa med de /
dper na mo gsham gyi bu dang mo gsham gyi bu mo'i kun nas nyon mongs pa bzhin no /
santi ca rāgādayaḥ kleśāḥ saṃkleśanibandhanam /
yathoktaṃ bhagavatā 		'dod chags la sogs pa'i kun nas nyon mongs pa'i rgyu dag ni yod pa yin te /
ji skad du /
bālo bhikṣave aśrutavān pṛthagjanaḥ prajñaptimanupatitaḥ cakṣuṣā rūpāṇi dṛṣṭvā saumanasyasthānīyānyabhiniviśate bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong dag byis pa so so'i skye bo thos pa dang mi ldan pa rtag par lhung ba ni mig gi gzugs rnams mthong nas yid bde ba'i gnas su mngon par zhen par 'gyur ro /
so 'bhiniviṣṭaḥ san rāgamutpādayati de mngon par zhen par gyur nas 'dod chags skyed par byed do /
raktaḥ san rāgajaṃ dveṣajaṃ mohajaṃ karmābhisaṃskaroti kāyena vācā manaseti vistaraḥ chags par gyur nas lus dang ngag dang yid kyi 'dod chags las byung ba'i las mngon par 'du byed par 'gyur ro /
zhes rgya cher gsungs so /
ucyate /
syuḥ skandhāyatanadhātavo yadi rāgādaya eva kleśāḥ syuḥ /
ihāyaṃ rāgaḥ parikalpyamāno bālapṛthagjanaiḥ sati rakte nare parikalpyeta asati vā? ubhayathā ca na yujyata ityāha 		brjod par bya ste /
gal te 'dod chags la sogs pa dag nyid yod na /
phung po dang khams dang skye mched rnams yod par 'gyur na /
yod pa ni ma yin te /
'dir 'dod chags 'di yongs su brtags pa na /
chags pa yod pa'am /
med pa na rtog pa zhig na /
gnyi ga ltar yang mi rung ngo zhes bshad pa /
rāgādyadi bhavetpūrvaṃ rakto rāgatiraskṛtaḥ gal te 'dod chags snga rol na /
'dod chags med pa'i chags yod na /
taṃ pratītya bhavedrāgo rakte rāgo bhavetsati de la brten nas 'dod chags yod /
chags yod 'dod chags yod par 'gyur /
tatra rāgaḥ saktiradhyavasānaṃ saṅgo 'bhiniveśa iti paryāyāḥ /
rakto rāgāśrayaḥ /
sa yadi rakto rāgātpūrvaṃ rāgatiraskṛto rāgarahito bhavet, tadā taṃ rāgatiraskṛtaṃ raktaṃ pratītya rāgo bhavet 		'dod chags dang chags zhen dang lhag par zhen pa dang phrad zhen dang mngon par zhen pa zhes bya ba dag ni rnam grangs so /
chags pa ni 'dod chags kyi rten yin te /
gal te 'dod chags kyi snga rol na /
'dod chags med pa ste /
'dod chags dang bral ba zhig yod par gyur na ni /
'dod chags dang bral ba'i chags pa de la brten nas 'dod chags yod par 'gyur ro /
evaṃ sakti rakte rāgo bhavediti yuktam de lta na ni chags pa yod na 'dod chags yod do zhes bya ba rigs par 'gyur na /
na tvevaṃ saṃbhavati, yadrāgarahito raktaḥ syāt 'dod chags dang bral yang chags pa yin par 'gyur pa gang yin pa de lta bu ni med de /
arhatāmapi rāgaprasaṅgāt /
yadyevaṃ sati rakte na rāgaḥ, asati tarhi rakte rāgo 'stu 		dgra bcom pa dag la yang chags pa yod par thal bar 'gyur ba'i phyir ro /
gal te de ltar chags pa yod pa na 'dod chags med na /
'o na chags pa med pa yin no zhe na /
etadapyayuktamityāha 'di yang rigs pa ma yin no zhes bshad pa /
rakte 'sati punā rāgaḥ kuta eva bhaviṣyati /
yadā sati rakte rāgo nāsti, tadā kathamasati rakte nirāśrayo rāgaḥ setsyati? na hi asati phale tatpakvatā saṃbhavatīti 		chags pa yod par ma gyur na'ang /
'dod chags yod par ga la 'gyur /
gang gi tshe chags pa yod pa na 'dod chags yod pa ma yin pa de'i tshe /
ji ltar chags pa yod par ma gyur pa na /
rten med pa'i 'dod chags grub par ga la 'gyur te /
shing thog med par de'i smin pa nyid yod pa ni ma yin no /
atrāha /
yadyapi tvayā rāgo niṣiddhaḥ, tathāpi rakto 'sti, apratiṣedhāt 		'dir smras pa /
gal te yang khyod kyis 'dod chags bkag mod kyi /
de lta na yang chags pa ni yod pa yin te /
na ca rāgamantareṇa rakto yuktaḥ, tasmādayamapyastīti ma bkag pa'i phyir ro /
chags pa yang 'dod chags med par ni mi rigs te de'i phyir 'di yang yod do /
ucyate /
syādrāgo yadi raktaḥ syāt /
yasmādayaṃ rakta iṣyamāṇaḥ sati vā rāge parikalpyeta, asati vā? ubhayathā ca nopapadyate ityāha 		brjod par bya ste /
gal te chags pa yod na 'dod chags yod par 'gyur ba zhig na /
yod pa ni ma yin te /
'di ltar chags pa 'di 'dod pa na /
'dod chags yod pa'ang med pa na rtog grang na /
gnyi ga ltar yang 'thad pa ma yin no zhes bshad pa /
sati vāsati vā rāge rakte 'pyeṣa samaḥ kramaḥ /
tatra yadi sati rāge raktaḥ parikalpyeta, tatrāpi eṣa eva rāgānupapattikramo 'nantarokto rakte 'pi tulyaḥ /
raktādyadi bhavetpūrvaṃ rāgo raktatiraskṛtaḥ /
ityādi 		chags pa la yang 'dod chags ni /
yod dam med kyang rim pa mtshungs /
de la gal te 'dod chags yod pa na chags pa yod par rtog par byed na ni /
de lta na yang /
gal te chags pa'i snga rol na /
chags med 'dod chags yod na ni /
zhes bya ba la sogs pas chags pa la yang bshad ma thag pa 'dod chags mi 'thad pa'i rim pa 'di nyid mtshungs so /
athāsati rāge rakta iṣyate, etadapyayuktam ci ste 'dod chags med par chags pa 'dod na ni /
yasmāt /
rāge 'sati punā raktaḥ kuta eva bhaviṣyati 		'di yang mi rigs te /
'di ltar 'dod chags yod par ma gyur na'ang /
iti /
tasmādrakto 'pi nāsti /
rāgaraktābhāvācca skandhādayo 'pi na santīti 		chags pa yod par ga la 'gyur /
de'i phyir chags pa yang med do /
'dod chags dang chags pa med pa'i phyir na phung po la sogs pa dag kyang med do /
atrāha /
naiva hi rāgaraktayoḥ paurvāparyeṇa saṃbhavo yata idaṃ dūṣaṇaṃ syāt, kiṃ tarhi rāgaraktayoḥ sahaivodbhavaḥ 		'dir smras pa /
gang las skyon 'dir 'gyur ba 'dod chags dang chags pa dag snga phyir 'gyur ba ni ma yin pa nyid do /
'o na ci zhe na /
'dod chags dang chags pa dag ni lhan cig kho nar 'byung ste /
cittasahabhūtena rāgeṇa hi cittaṃ rajyate, tacca raktamiti sems dang lhan cig 'byung ba'i 'dod chags kyis /
sems chags par byas la /
ato vidyete eva rāgaraktāviti /
ucyate /
evamapi /
sahaiva punarudbhūtirna yuktā rāgaraktayoḥ 		de la chags pa yin te /
de'i phyir 'dod chags dang chags pa dag yod do zhe na /
brjod par bya ste /
de lta na yang /
'dod chags dang ni chags pa dag /
lhan cig nyid du skye mi rigs /
sahotpādo 'pi na yukto rāgaraktayoḥ 'dod chags dang chags pa gnyis lhan cig skye ba yang mi rigs te /
yasmāt /
bhavetāṃ rāgaraktau hi nirapekṣau parasparam 		gang gi phyir /
'di ltar 'dod chags chags pa dag /
phan tshun ltos pa med par 'gyur /
sahabhāvāt savyetaragoviṣāṇavadityabhiprāyaḥ lhan cig 'byung ba'i phyir ba lang gi rva g yas g yon bzhin no snyam du dgongs pa'o /
api ca /
anayo rāgaraktayoḥ sahabhāvaḥ ekatve parikalpyeta pṛthaktve vā? tatra yadi ekatve, tanna yujyate 		gzhan yang 'dod chags dang chags pa 'di dag lhan cig pa nyid du gcig nyid dam /
tha dad pa zhig la rtog grang /
de la gal te gcig nyid la yin na ni de mi rung ngo /
yasmāt /
naikatve sahabhāvo 'sti /
kasmātpunarnāstītyāha /
na tenaiva hi tatsaha 		gang gi phyir /
gcig nyid lhan cig nyid med de /
yang ci'i phyir med ce na /
de nyid de dang lhan cig min /
na hi rāgasvātmā rāgādavyatirikto rāgeṇa saheti vyapadiśyate 'di ltar 'dod chags kyi rang gi bdag nyid 'dod chags las tha mi dad pa ni 'dod chags dang lhan cig pa yin no zhes brjod pa ma yin no /
idānīṃ pṛthaktve 'pi sahabhāvābhāvamāha da ni tha dad pa nyid la yang lhan cig pa nyid med par bshad pa /
pṛthaktve sahabhāvo 'tha kuta eva bhaviṣyati ci ste tha dad nyid med na /
lhan cig tu ni ji ltar 'gyur /
na hi pṛthagbhūtayorālokāndhakārayoḥ saṃsāranirvāṇayorvā sahabhāvo dṛṣṭa iti snang ba dang mun pa'am 'khor ba dang mya ngan las 'das pa tha dad par gyur pa dag la ni lhan cig pa nyid ma mthong ngo /
kiṃ cānyat gzhan yang /
ekatve sahabhāvaścetsyātsahāyaṃ vināpi saḥ gal te gcig pu lhan cig na /
grogs med par yang der 'gyur ro /
pṛthaktve sahabhāvaścetsyātsahāyaṃ vināpi saḥ gal te tha dad lhan cig na /
grogs med par yang der 'gyur ro /
yadi ekatve sahabhāvaḥ syāt, tadā yatra yatraikatvaṃ tatra tatra sahabhāva ityekasyāpi sahabhāvaḥ syāt gal te gcig nyid la lhan cig pa nyid du 'gyur na ni /
de'i tshe gang dang gang na gcig nyid yod pa de dang de na lhan cig pa nyid yod do zhes bya bas gcig pu zhig [?] la yang lhan cig pa nyid yod par 'gyur ro /
pṛthaktve 'pi sahabhāve iṣyamāṇe yatra yatra pṛthaktvaṃ tatra tatra sahabhāva iti aśvādivyatiriktasya pṛthagavasthitasya goḥ asahāyasya sahabhāvaḥ syāt tha dad pa nyid la lhan cig pa nyid 'dod na yang /
gang dang gang na tha dad pa nyid yod pa de dang de na lhan cig pa nyid yod do zhes bya bas ba lang rta la sogs pa las tha dad cing so sor gnas pa grogs med pa la yang lhan cig pa nyid yang yod par 'gyur ro /
kiṃ ca gzhan yang /
pṛthaktve sahabhāvaśca yadi kiṃ rāgaraktayoḥ gal te tha dad lhan cig na /
ci go 'dod chags chags pa dag /
siddhaḥ pṛthakpṛthagbhāvaḥ sahabhāvo yatastayoḥ tha dad nyid du 'grub 'gyur ram /
de nas de gnyis lhan cig 'gyur /
pṛthaktve sahabhāvaśca rāgaraktayoḥ parikalpyate /
kimanayoḥ siddhaḥ pṛthakpṛthagbhāvaḥ? kiṃ rāganirapekṣo raktaḥ siddho yatastayoḥ sahabhāvaḥ syāt? pṛthakpṛthaksiddhayoreva hi gavāśvayoḥ sahabhāvo dṛṣṭaḥ /
na tvevaṃ rāgaraktau pṛthakpṛthaksiddhāviti nāstyanayoḥ sahabhāvaḥ 		gal te yang 'dod chags dang chags pa dag tha dad pa nyid la lhan cig pa nyid du rtog na ni /
ci 'di gnyis tha dad pa nyid du grub bam /
gang las de dag lhan cig pa nyid du 'gyur ba /
ci go 'dod chags chags pa la mi ltos pa'am /
chags pa yang 'dod chags la mi ltos pa zhes bya bar grub bam /
'di ltar tha dad par grub pa'i ba lang dang rta dag kho na la lhan cig pa nyid du mthong ba lta bu yin na /
'dod chags dang chags pa dag ni de ltar tha dad par grub pa ma yin pas 'di gnyis la lhan cig pa nyid med do /
athavā /
pṛthakpṛthagasiddhayorna sahabhāva iti kṛtvā /
siddhaḥ pṛthakpṛthagbhāvo yadi vā rāgaraktayoḥ 		ci ste yang tha dad par ma grub pa dag la lhan cig pa nyid med pa'i phyir /
gal te 'dod chags chags pa dag /
parikalpyate bhavatā, kimidānīṃ sahabhāvenākiṃcitkareṇa parikalpitenetyāha tha dad nyid du grub gyur na ste khyod rtog par 'gyur na da ni cung zad kyang mi byed pa'i lhan cig pa nyid brtags pas ci zhig bya zhes bshad pa /
sahabhāvaṃ kimarthaṃ tu parikalpayase tayoḥ de dag lhan cig nyid du ni /
ci yi phyir na yongs su rtog /
rāgaraktayoḥ siddhayarthaṃ sahabhāvaḥ parikalpyate 'dod chags dang chags pa dag grub par bya ba'i phyir lhan cig pa nyid rtog par byed la /
saca pṛthakpṛthagasiddhayornāstīti pṛthakpṛthak siddhirabhyupagamyate tvayā /
nanvevaṃ sati siddhatvātkimanayoḥ sahabhāvena kṛtyam? 		de yang tha dad par ma grub pa dag la yod pa ma yin pas tha dad par grub par khas len na ni /
de ltar grub pa'i phyir 'di dag gi lhan cig pa nyid kyis ci zhig bya /
atha /
pṛthaṅ na sidhyatītyevaṃ sahabhāvaṃ vikāṅkṣasi 		'on te /
tha dad grub par ma gyur pas /
de phyir lhan cig 'dod byed na ste /
pṛthakpṛthag rāgaraktayoḥ siddhirnāstīti kṛtvā yadyanayoḥ sahabhāvamicchasi, sa ca pṛthakpṛthagasiddhayornāstīti 'dod chags dang chags pa dag tha dad par grub pa yod pa ma yin pa'i phyir /
gal te 'di dag lhan cig pa nyid du 'dod na ni /
de yang tha dad par ma grub pa dag la yod pa ma yin pas /
sahabhāvaprasiddhayartha pṛthaktvaṃ bhūya icchasi lhan cig rab tu bsgrub pa'i phyir /
tha dad nyid du yang 'dod dam /
nanvevaṃ sati itaretarāśrayāyāṃ siddhau sthitāyāṃ kasyedānīṃ siddhau satyāṃ kasya siddhirastu? de ltar yin na ni /
grub pa phan tshun rten par gnas pa yin dang de gang grub pas gang zhig grub par 'gyur te /
yāvatā /
pṛthagbhāvāprasiddheśca sahabhāvo na sidhyati 		gang gi phyir /
tha dad dngos por ma grub pas /
lhan cig dngos po 'grub mi 'gyur /
katamasmin pṛthagbhāve sahabhāvaṃ satīcchasi tha dad dngos po gang yod na /
lhan cig dngos por 'dod par byed /
nāstyeva sa pṛthagbhāvaḥ sahabhāvānapekṣo yasmin pṛthagbhāve sati sahabhāvasiddhiḥ syādityasaṃbhāvayannāha tha dad pa'i dngos po gang zhig yod na /
lhan cig pa'i dngos po grub par 'gyur ba lhan cig pa'i dngos po la mi ltos pa tha dad pa'i dngos po de ni yod pa ma yin pa nyid do /
de'i phyir mi srid par dgongs nas bshad pa /
katamasminpṛthagbhāve sahabhāvaṃ satīcchasi tha dad dngos po gang yod na /
lhan cig dngos por 'dod par byed /
tadevaṃ yathoditavicāraparāmarśena rāgaraktayorasiddhiṃ nigamayannāha de'i phyir de ltar ji skad bshad pa'i rnam par dpyad pas gzhigs pas 'dod chags dang chags pa gnyis ma grub pa mjug bsdu ba'i phyir /
evaṃ raktena rāgasya siddhirna saha nāsaha de ltar 'dod chags chags pa dag /
lhan cig lhan cig min mi 'grub /
iti /
yathā ca rāgaraktayorna paurvāparyeṇa siddhiḥ nāpi sahabhāvena, evaṃ sarvabhāvānāmapītyatidiśannāha 		ces gsungs so /
ji ltar 'dod chags dang chags pa dag snga phyir ma grub la /
lhan cig pa nyid du yang ma grub pa de bzhin du dngos po thams cad kyang yin no zhes bsgre ba'i phyir bshad pa /
rāgavatsarvadharmāṇāṃ siddhirna saha nāsaha 'dod chags bzhin du chos rnams kun /
lhan cig lhan cig min mi 'grub /
iti dveṣadviṣṭamohamūḍhādīnāṃ rāgaraktavadasiddhiryojyate zhe sdang dang sdang ba dang gti mug dang rmongs pa rnams la yang 'dod chags dang chags pa ltar ma grub par sbyar bar bya'o /
ata evoktaṃ bhagavatā de nyid kyi phyir bcom ldan 'das kyis /
yo rajyeta yatra vā rajyeta yena vā rajyeta, yo duṣyeta yatra vā duṣyeta yena vā duṣyeta, yo muhyeta yatra vā muhyeta yena vā muhyeta, sa taṃ dharma na samanupaśyati taṃ dharma nopalabhate /
sa taṃ dharmamasamanupaśyannanupalabhamāno 'rakto 'duṣṭo 'mūḍho 'viparyastacittaḥ samāhita ityucyate /
tīrṇaḥ pāraga ityucyate /
kṣemaprāpta ityucyate /
abhayaprāpta ityucyate /
yāvat kṣīṇāsrava ityucyate 		gang 'dod chags pa dang gang la 'dod chags pa dang gang gis 'dod chags pa dang gang zhe sdang ba dang gang la zhe sdang ba dang gang gis zhe sdang ba dang gang gti mug pa dang gang la gti mug pa dang gang gis gti mug par 'gyur ba'i chos de des yang dag par rjes su mi mthong zhing chos de mi dmigs so /
des chos de yang dag par rjes su ma mthong zhing ma dmigs pas /
'dod chags med pa zhe sdang med pa /
gti mug med pa sems phyin ci ma log pa /
mnyam par gzhag pa zhes bya'o /
brgal ba pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya'o /
bde bar son pa zhes bya'o /
mi 'jigs pa thob pa zhes bya ba nas zag pa zad pa zhes bya'o /
nyon mongs pa med pa dbang dang ldan par gyur pa /
sems shin tu rnam par grol ba /
shes rab shin tu rnam par grol ba /
cang shes pa /
glang po chen po /
bya ba byas pa /
byed pa byas pa /
khur bor ba /
bdag gi don rjes su thob pa /
srid par kun du sbyor ba yongs su zad pa /
niḥkleśo vaśībhūtaḥ suvimuktacittaḥ suvimuktaprajña ājāneyo mahābhāgaḥ kṛtakṛtyaḥ kṛtakaraṇīyaḥ apahatabhāro 'nuprāptasvakārthaḥ parikṣīṇabhavasaṃyojanaḥ samyagājñāsuvimuktacittaḥ sarvacetovaśitāparamapāramiprāptaḥ śramaṇa ityucyate /
iti vistaraḥ /
tathā /
ye rāgadoṣamadamohasabhāva jñātvā saṃkalpahetujanitaṃ vitathapravṛttam /
na vikalpayanti na virāgamapīha teṣām [āśu] sarvabhavabhāvavibhāvitānām 		yang dag pa'i shes pas sems shin tu rnam par grol ba /
sems kyi dbang thams cad kyi dam pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i dge sbyong zhes bya'o zhes bya ba'i bar du rgya cher gsungs so /
de bzhin du /
gang dag 'dod chags zhe sdang rgyags dang gti mug gi /
ngo bo kun rtog gis bskyed log par zhugs shes nas /
rnam par rtog par mi byed chags bral mi 'gyur ba'i /
sgom pa de dag gnas ni dngos po thams cad yin /
zhes gsungs so /
ityācāryacandrakīrtipādoparacittāyāṃ prasannapadāyāṃ madhyamakavṛttau rāgaraktaparīkṣā nāma ṣaṣṭhaṃ prakaraṇam /
saṃskṛtaparīkṣā saptamaṃ prakaraṇam 		slob dpon zla ba grags pa'i zhal snga nas sbyar ba'i tshig gsal ba las /
'dod chags dang chags pa brtag pa zhes bya ba ste rab tu phyed pa drug pa'i 'grel pa'o /
atrāha /
vidyanta eva saṃskṛtasvabhāvāḥ, skandhāyatanadhātavaḥ utpādādisaṃskṛtalakṣaṇasadbhāvāt 		'dir smras pa /
phung po dang khams dang skye mched 'dus byas kyi rang bzhin can dag ni yod pa nyid de /
de dag gi 'dus byas kyi mtshan nyid skye ba la sogs pa yod pa'i phyir ro /
uktaṃ hi bhagavatā /
trīṇīmāni saṃskṛtasya saṃskṛtalakṣaṇāni /
saṃskṛtasya bhikṣavaḥ utpādo 'pi prajñāyate, vyayo 'pi, sthityanyathātvamapīti 		bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang dge slong dag gsum po 'di ni 'dus byas kyi mtshan nyid dag ste /
'dus byas skye bar yang mngon /
'jig par yang mngon te /
gnas pa las gzhan du 'gyur bar yang mngon no zhes gsungs so /
na ca avidyamānasya kharaviṣāṇasyeva jātyādilakṣaṇamasti med pa la ni ri bong gi rva ltar skye ba la sogs pa mtshan nyid yod pa ma yin no /
tasmātsaṃskṛtalakṣaṇopadeśādvidyanta eva skandhāyatanadhātavaḥ iti de'i phyir 'dus byas kyi mtshan nyid nye bar bstan pa las phung po dang khams dang skye mched rnams yod pa nyid do /
ucyate /
syuḥ skandhāyatanadhātavaḥ saṃskṛtasvabhāvāstāvakena matena, yadi jātyādilakṣaṇameva bhavet 		brjod par bya ste /
gal te khyod kyi lugs ltar skye ba la sogs pa'i mtshan nyid yod na ni /
phung po dang khams dang skye mched 'dus byas kyi rang bzhin can dag yod par 'gyur ba zhig na /
yod pa ni ma yin no /
ihāyamutpādaḥ saṃskṛtalakṣaṇatveneṣyamāṇaḥ saṃskṛto vā tallakṣaṇatveneṣyate, asaṃskṛto vā? tatra 'dir skye ba ni 'dus byas kyi mtshan nyid du 'dod pa na /
'dus byas zhig gam 'du ma byas zhig de'i mtshan nyid du 'dod grang na /
de la /
yadi saṃskṛta utpādastatra yuktā trilakṣaṇī gal te skye ba 'dus byas na /
de la mtshan nyid gsum ldan 'gyur /
trayāṇāṃ lakṣaṇānāṃ samāhārastrilakṣaṇī /
iyaṃ ca utpādasthitibhaṅgasamāhārasvabhāvasarvasaṃskṛtāvyabhicāriṇīti kṛtvā yadi utpādaḥ saṃskṛta iti parikalpyate, tadā utpāde 'pi trilakṣaṇī prasajyate 		mtshan nyid gsum gyi tshogs ni mtshan nyid gsum mo /
gal te skye ba 'dus byas su rtog na ni /
des na skye ba la yang mtshan nyid gsum yod par thal bar 'gyur te /
skye ba dang gnas pa dang 'jig pa'i tshogs kyi rang bzhin 'di ni 'dus byas thams cad la mi 'khrul ba yin pa'i phyir ro /
tataśca rūpādivallakṣyatvamutpādasya syāt, na saṃskṛtalakṣaṇatvam /
athotpāde 'pi trilakṣaṇī neṣyate, tadā trilakṣaṇīrahitatvādākāśavat saṃskṛtalakṣaṇatvamasyāvahīyate ityāha 		de'i phyir gzugs la sogs pa bzhin du skye bar mtshan gzhi nyid du 'gyur gyi /
'dus byas kyi mtshan nyid du ni mi 'gyur ro /
ci ste skye ba la mtshan nyid gsum mi 'dod na ni /
de'i tshe mtshan nyid gsum pa dang bral ba'i phyir de 'dus byas kyi mtshan nyid yin pa nyams par 'gyur te /
nam mkha' bzhin no zhes bshad pa ni /
athāsaṃskṛta utpādaḥ kathaṃ saṃskṛtalakṣaṇam ci ste skye ba 'dus ma byas /
ji ltar 'dus byas mtshan nyid yin /
iti /
naitatsaṃskṛtalakṣaṇamityabhiprāyaḥ 		zhes bya ba ste /
'di ni 'dus byas kyi mtshan nyid ma yin no snyam du dgongs pa yin no /
api ca /
ime utpādādayaḥ saṃskṛtasya lakṣaṇatvena parikalpyamānā vyastā vā pṛthagvā lakṣaṇatvena parikalpyeran, samastā vā sahabhūtā vā? ubhayathā ca na yujyata ityāha 		gzhan yang /
skye ba la sogs pa 'di dag 'dus byas kyi mtshan nyid du rtog pa na /
so so ba ste re re ba zhig gam /
'dus pa ste lhan cig pa zhig mtshan nyid du rtog pa zhig na /
gnyi ga ltar yang mi rung ngo zhes bshad pa /
utpādādyāstrayo vyastā nālaṃ lakṣaṇakarmaṇi skye la sogs gsum so so yis /
'dus byas mtshan nyid bya bar ni /
saṃskṛtasya samastāḥ syurekatra kathamekadā nus min gcig la dus gcig tu /
'dus pa yang ni ji ltar rung /
tatra vyastā lakṣaṇakarmaṇi na yujyante de la so so ba dag gis ni mtshan nyid bya bar mi rigs te /
yadi utpādakāle sthitibhaṅgau na syātāṃ tadā sthitibhaṅgarahitasya ākāśasyeva saṃskṛtalakṣaṇatvenānupapadya evotpādaḥ gal te skye ba'i dus na gnas pa dang 'jig pa med na /
de'i tshe nam mkha' ltar gnas pa dang 'jig pa dang bral ba la skye ba 'dus byas kyi mtshan nyid du 'thad pa ma yin pa nyid do /
atha sthitikāle utpādabhaṅgau na staḥ, tadā tadrahitasya sthitiḥ syāt ci ste gnas pa'i dus na skye ba dang 'jig pa dag med na ni de'i tshe de dag dang bral ba la gnas pa yod par 'gyur na /
utpādabhaṅgarahitaśca padārtho nāstyeveti na asyāvidyamānasya khapuṣpavat sthitiryujyate skye ba dang 'jig pa dang bral ba'i dngos po ni yod pa yin pas /
nam mkha'i me tog ltar med pa 'di la gnas pa yod par mi rigs so /
kiṃ ca /
sthitiyuktasya paścādanityatayāpi yogo na syāt, tadvirodhidharmākrāntatvāt 		gzhan yang gnas pa dang ldan pa ni phyis mi rtag pa nyid dang yang ldan par mi 'gyur te /
de dang 'gal ba'i chos dang ldan pa'i phyir ro /
atha syāt /
pūrvaṃ śāśvato bhūtvā paścādaśāśvata iti, na caikapadārthaḥ śāśvataścāśāśvataśca yukta iti notpādabhaṅgarahitasya sthitiḥ 		ci ste sngar rtag par gyur pa las phyis mi rtag par 'gyur ro snyam na /
dngos po gcig rtag pa dang mi rtag pa dang ldan par ni mi rigs so /
de'i phyir skye ba dang 'jig pa dang bral ba la gnas pa med do /
tathā yadi bhaṅgakāle sthityutpādau na syātām, evamapyanutpannasya sthitirahitasya khapuṣpasya vināśo 'pi nāstīti de bzhin du 'jig pa'i dus na gnas pa dang skye ba med na /
de lta na yang skye ba med cing gnas pa dang bral ba 'di la 'jig pa yang yod pa ma yin te nam mkha'i me tog bzhin no /
evaṃ tāvadutpādādayo vyastā nālaṃ lakṣaṇakarmaṇi nālaṃ na paryāptā ityarthaḥ /
idānīṃ samastā api na yujyanta ityāha 		de ltar na re zhig skye ba la sogs pa gsum po so so ba dag gis mtshan nyid kyi bya ba nus pa ma yin no /
nus pa ma yin pa ni mthu yod pa ma yin no zhes bya ba'i don to /
da ni 'dus pa dag kyang mi rung ngo zhes bshad pa /
samastāḥ syurekatra kathamekadā gcig la dus gcig tu /
'dus pa yang ni ji ltar rung /
ekatra padārthe, ekasmin kāle, parasparaviruddhatvādrāgavairāgyavat, ālokāndhakāravadvā na yujyanta ityabhiprāyaḥ dngos po gcig pa dus gcig tu 'dod chags dang chags pa dang bral ba bzhin nam snang ba dang mun pa ltar phan tshun 'gal ba'i phyir mi rigs so snyam du dgongs pa yin no /
yasminneva kṣaṇe padārtho jāyate, tasminneva tiṣṭhati vinaśyati ceti kaḥ sacetāḥ pratipadyeta? tasmātsamastānāmapi utpādādīnāṃ saṃskṛtasya lakṣaṇakarmaṇi nāsti sāmarthyam skad cig gang kho na la dngos po skye bar 'gyur ba'i skad cig de kho na la gnas pa dang 'jig pa yin no zhes sems dang bcas pa su zhig gis rtogs par 'gyur te /
de'i phyir skye ba la sogs pa 'dus pa rnams la yang 'dus byas kyi mtshan nyid kyi bya ba la mthu yod pa ma yin no /
'dir /
gal te skye ba 'dus byas na /
atha yaduktaṃ 'yadi saṃskṛta utpādaḥ'; ityādi, tena yadi utpādādīnāṃ trilakṣaṇī prāptā prasaktā, tataḥ ko doṣaḥ? athāsaṃskṛtaḥ, evamapyadoṣa iti zhes gang brjod pa de la /
gal te skye ba la sogs pa rnams la mtshan nyid gsum yod par 'gyur zhing thal bar 'gyur na /
de las nyes pa cir 'gyur la /
de ste 'dus ma byas pa yin pa de lta na yang nyes pa ci yod ce na /
ucyate /
utpādasthitibhaṅgānāmanyatsaṃskṛtalakṣaṇam 		brjod par bya ste /
skye dang gnas dang 'jig rnams la /
'dus byas mtshan nyid gzhan zhig ni /
asti cedanavasthaivaṃ nāsti cette na saṃskṛtāḥ gal te yod na thug med 'gyur /
med na de dag 'dus byas min /
nanu ca pakṣadvaye 'pi vihita eva doṣaḥ, tatra kiṃ punaruktābhidhāneneti gal te phyogs gnyi ga la yang nyes pa brjod zin pa nyid ma yin nam /
de la zlos bu brjod pas ci zhig bya zhe na /
nyes pa brjod pa bden mod kyi /
satyamukto doṣaḥ sa khalu nācāryeṇa, kiṃ tarhi vṛttikāreṇa de slob dpon gyis gsungs pa ni ma yin no /
'o na ci zhe na /
atha pūrvapratijñātameva dūṣaṇāntarābhidhānena spaṣṭīkaraṇārthaṃ punarācāryo 'bhihitavān 'grel pa mkhan gyis yin no /
rnam pa gcig tu na sngar dam bcas pa kho na skyon gzhan brjod pa'i sgo nas gsal bar bya ba'i phyir slob dpon gyis slar gsungs pa yin te /
yadi utpādasthitibhaṅgānāmanyadutpādādikaṃ saṃskṛtalakṣaṇamiṣyate, tadā teṣāmapyanyat, teṣāmapyanyat, ityaparyavasānadoṣaḥ syāt gal te skye ba dang gnas pa dang 'jig pa rnams la skye ba la sogs pa 'dus byas kyi mtshan nyid gzhan 'dod na ni /
de'i tshe de dag la yang gzhan yin pas mtha' thug pa med pa'i skyon du 'gyur ro /
thug pa med pa'i skyon du gyur na yang /
gang la dus phyi mar gzhan du 'gyur ba /
sati ca aparyavasānadoṣe, kiṃ pūrvaṃ syād yata uttarakālamaparaṃ bhavediti vyavasthābhāvādasaṃbhava evaṃ utpādādīnāmityabhiprāyaḥ snga ma ci zhig yod par 'gyur /
de'i phyir rnam par gzhag pa med pas skye ba la sogs pa rnams mi srid pa nyid do snyam du dgongs pa yin no /
athavā, pūrvaṃ mukhyatvādutpādasyaiva dūṣaṇamuktam, adhunā tu sāmānyeneti yang na sngar ni mi gtso bo yin pas skye ba kho na la sun 'byin pa brjod la /
da lta ni thun mong du yin no /
nāsti cette na saṃskṛtā iti gatārthametat med na de dag 'dus byas min /
zhes bya ba 'di ni don go bar zad do /
atrāhuḥ sāṃmitīyāḥ /
santi cotpādādīnāmutpādādayaḥ, na ca anavasthāprasaṅgaḥ, lakṣaṇānulakṣaṇānāṃ parasparaniṣpādakatvāt 		'dir mang pos bkur ba dag /
skye ba la sogs pa rnams la skye ba la sogs pa dag yod la /
thug pa med par thal bar yang mi 'gyur te /
mtshan nyid dang mthun pa'i mtshan nyid rnams phan tshun sgrub par byed pa'i phyir ro /
yasmādiha saṃskṛtadharmaḥ kuśalaḥ kliṣṭo vā utpadyamānaḥ ātmanā pañcadaśaḥ utpadyate gang gi phyir 'dir /
'dus byas kyi chos dge ba 'am nyon mongs pa can zhig skye ba na /
bdag nyid dang bco lnga skye bar 'gyur te /
sa dharmastasya cotpādaḥ samanvāgamaḥ sthitirjarā anityatā /
yadyasau dharmaḥ kliṣṭo bhavati, tasya mithyāvimuktiḥ 		chos de nyid dang de'i skye ba dang ldan pa dang gnas pa dang rga ba dang mi rtag pa nyid dang gal te chos de nyon mongs pa can zhig yin na ni /
de'i log pa'i rnam par grol ba dang 'on te dge ba zhig yin na ni /
atha śubhaḥ, tasya samyagvimuktiḥ /
yadi nairyāṇiko bhavati tasya nairyāṇikatā 		de'i yang dag pa'i rnam par grol ba dang gal te nges par 'byung ba zhig yin na ni de'i nges par 'byung ba nyid dang de ste nges par 'byung ba ma yin pa zhig yin na ni /
atha anairyāṇikaḥ, tasya anairyāṇikatā de'i nges par 'byung ba ma yin pa nyid de /
ityeṣa parivāraḥ de ltar na 'di dag ni 'khor yin no /
idānīmutpāda syāpara utpādaḥ yāvadanairyāṇikatānairyāṇikatetyeṣa parivārasya parivāraḥ de nas gzhan skye ba'i skye ba nas /
nges par 'byung ba ma yin pa'i nges par 'byung ba ma yin pa nyid ces bya ba'i bar 'di dag ni 'khor gyi 'khor yin no /
tatra yo 'yaṃ maula utpāda sa ātmānaṃ vihāya anyāṃścaturdaśa dharmān janayati de dag rtsa ba'i skye ba gang yin pa des ni bdag nyid ma gtogs pa chos gzhan bcu bzhi skyed par byed la /
utpādotpādasaṃjñakastu anulakṣaṇabhūta utpādo maulamevotpādaṃ janayati /
evaṃ yāvadanairyāṇikatā caturdaśa dharmān na niryāṇayati, na tannirvāṇaṃ prāpayatītyarthaḥ /
anairyāṇikatānairyāṇikatā tu na niryāṇayati 		skye ba'i skye ba'i ming can mthun pa'i mtshan nyid du gyur pa'i skyes pas ni rtsa ba'i skye ba kho na skyed par byed do /
de bzhin du /
nges par 'byung ba ma yin pa nyid kyis ni tshes bcu bzhi nges par 'byung bar mi byed de /
de dag gis mya ngan las 'das pa thob par mi byed de zhes bya ba'i don to /
nges par 'byung ba ma yin pa'i nges par 'byung ba ma yin pa nyid kyis ni nges par 'byung ba ma yin pa de kho na nges par 'byung bar mi byed do zhes bya ba'i bar du yin no /
tadevamutpādādīnāmanavasthāṃ pariharannāha de'i phyir de ltar skye ba la sogs pa rnams kyi thug pa med pa spang ba'i phyir /
utpādotpāda utpādo mūlotpādasya kevalam skye ba'i skye bas rtsa ba yi /
skye ba 'ba' zhig skyed par byed /
utpādotpādasutpādo maulo janayate punaḥ rtsa ba'i skye bas skye ba yi /
skye ba'ang skyed par byed pa yin /
zhes smras so /
dvividho hyutpādaḥ skye ba ni rnam pa gnyis te /
eko maula utpādaḥ, aparaśca utpādotpādasaṃjñakaḥ, utpādasyotpāda iti kṛtvā gcig ni rtsa ba'i skye ba'o /
gzhan ni skye ba'i skye ba zhes bya ba ste /
skye ba'i skye ba ni skye ba'i skye ba'o zhes bya ba'i phyir ro /
tatra yo 'yamutpādotpādasaṃjñaka utpādaḥ, sa mūlotpādasya kevalamutpādakaḥ de la gang skye ba'i skye ba zhes bya ba'i skye ba des ni rtsa ba'i skye ba 'ba' zhig gi skyed par byed pa yin la /
taṃ cedānīmutpādopādākhyamutpādaṃ maula utpādo janayati de nas skye ba'i skye ba zhes bya'i skye ba de ni rtsa ba'i skye bas skyed par byed pa yin no /
tadevaṃ parasparanirvartanādasti ca trilakṣaṇī utpādādīnām, na cānavasthāprasaṅga iti de'i phyir de ltar phan tshun sgrub par byed pa'i phyir skye ba la sogs pa rnams la mtshan nyid gsum po yod pa yin la /
thug pa med par thal bar yang mi 'gyur ro zhes smra ba'o /
atrocyate /
utpādotpāda utpādo mūlotpādasya te yadi 		'di la brjod par bya ste /
gal te khyod kyi skye ba'i skyes /
rtsa ba'i skye ba skyed byed na /
maulenājanitastaṃ te sa kathaṃ janayiṣyati khyod kyi rtsa bas ma bskyed des /
de ni ji ltar skyed par byed /
yadi tava utpādasyotpādo mūlotpādasya janaka iti matam, sa kathamidānīṃ maulenotpādenānutpāditaḥ san utpādotpādo maulaṃ janayiṣyati? gal te skye ba'i skye bas rtsa ba'i skye ba skyed par byed pa yin no zhes bya ba khyod kyi lugs yin na /
de ni rtsa ba'i skye bas ma bskyed par gyur ba'i skye pa'i skye ba des ji ltar rtsa ba skyed par byed pa yin /
atha manyase /
utpādita eva maulenotpādena utpādotpādo maulaṃ janayiṣyati, etadapyasadityāha 		ci ste rtsa ba'i skyes pas bskyed pa'i skye ba'i skye ba kho nas rtsa ba skyed par byed do snyam du sems na /
'di yang yod pa ma yin no zhes bshad pa /
sa te maulena janito maulaṃ janayate yadi gal te khyod kyi rtsa ba yis /
bskyed pa de yis rtsa bskyed na /
maulaḥ sa tenājanitastamutpādayate katham des ma bskyed pa'i rtsa ba des /
de ni ji ltar skyed par byed /
sa utpādotpādasaṃjñaka utpādo maulena janito yadi maulaṃ janayati, sa maula utpādotpādenājanito 'vidyamānaḥ kathamutpādotpādaṃ janayiṣyati? tasmānmaulena janitaḥ san utpādotpādo maulaṃ janayatīte na yujyate gal te skye ba'i skye ba zhes bya ba'i skye ba rtsa bas bskyed pa des rtsa ba skyed bar byed na /
des ma bskyed cing yod pa ma yin pa'i rtsa ba'i skye ba des ji ltar skye ba'i skye ba skyed par 'gyur /
de'i phyir rtsa bas bskyed par ma gyur pa'i skye ba'i skye bas rtsa ba bskyed par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba mi rigs so /
tataśca parasparanirvartyanirvartakatvābhāvātsa eva anavasthāprasaṅga iti nāstyutpādaḥ de'i phyir phan tshun sgrub par byed pa med pa'i phyir thug pa med par thal bar de nyid du 'gyur ro /
de'i phyir skye ba med do /
atrāha /
utpadyamāna eva mūlotpāda utpādotpādamutpādayati, sa evotpādotpādo mūlotpādaṃ janayiṣyatīti 		'dir smras pa /
rtsa ba'i skye ba skye bzhin pa nyid kyis skye ba'i skye ba skyed par byed la /
skye ba'i skye ba de nyid kyis rtsa ba'i skye ba skyed par 'gyur ro zhe na /
ucyate gal te /
ayamutpadyamānaste kāmamutpādayedimam de ma skyes pa de yis ni /
de skyed par ni byed nus na /
yadīmamutpādayitumajātaḥ śaknuyādayam khyod kyi skye bzhin pa de yis /
de bskyed par ni 'dod la rag /
kāmamayaṃ mūlotpāda utpadyamāna utpādayedutpādam, yadyayameva ajātaḥ śaknuyādaparamajātamutpādayitum gal te rang nyid ma skyes pas ma skyes pa gzhan bskyed par nus na ni /
rtsa ba'i skye ba skye bzhin pa des skye ba'i skye ba bskyed par 'dod la rag pa zhig na /
utpadyamāno hi nāma anāgataḥ skye bzhin pa zhes bya ba ni ma 'ongs pa yin la /
sa ca ajātaḥ kathamutpādayiṣyatīti na yuktamevaitadityabhiprāyaḥ evamutpādotpāde 'pi vācyam de yang ma skyes pa yin pas ji ltar gzhan skyed par 'gyur te /
'di ni mi rigs so snyam du dgongs pa yin no /
skye ba'i skye ba la yang de bzhin du brjod par bya'o /
atrāha /
naiva hi utpādasyāpara utpādo 'sti yato 'navasthāprasaṅgaḥ syāt 		'dir smras pa /
gang las thug pa med par thal bar 'gyur ba /
skye ba la ni skye ba gzhan yod pa ma yin te /
kiṃ tarhi 'o na ci zhe na /
pradīpaḥ svaparātmānau saṃprakāśayitā yathā ji ltar mar me rang dang gzhan /
snang bar byed pa de bzhin du /
utpādaḥ svaparātmānāvubhāvutpādayettathā /
yathā pradīpaḥ prakāśasvabhāvatvādātmānaṃ prakāśayati ghaṭādīṃśca, evamutpādo 'pyutpādasvabhāvatvādātmānamutpādayiṣyati paraṃ ceti 		skye ba'ang rang dang gzhan gyi dngos /
gnyi ga skyed par byed pa yin /
ji ltar mar me snang ba'i rang bzhin yin pa'i phyir /
bdag nyid dang bum pa snang bar byed pa de bzhin du /
skye ba yang skye ba'i rang bzhin yin pa'i phyir /
bdag nyid dang gzhan nyid bskyed par 'gyur ro /
ucyate /
syādetadevaṃ yadi pradīpaḥ svaparātmānau saṃprakāśayet 		brjod par bya ste /
gal te mar me rang dang gzhan gyi bdag nyid snang bar byed na ni /
'di de ltar 'gyur ba zhig na /
na caivam /
yasmāt 		byed pa yang ma yin te /
'di ltar /
pradīpe nāndhakāro 'sti yatra cāsau pratiṣṭhitaḥ mar me dang ni gang dag na /
de 'dug pa na mun pa med /
kiṃ prakāśayati dīpaḥ prakāśo hi tamovadhaḥ mar mes ci zhig snang bar byed /
mun pa sel bas snang byed yin /
iha prakāśo nāma tamasya (so?) vadhaḥ 'dir snang bar byed pa zhes bya ba ni mun pa sel bas yin na /
tamaśca pradīpasvātmani tāvanna saṃbhavati virodhāt, yattamo nighnataḥ svātmaprakāśatvaṃ syāt mun pa gang sel bar byed pas rang gi bdag nyid snang bar byed pa nyid du 'gyur ba /
re zhig mar me'i rang gi bdag nyid la ni mun pa yod pa ma yin te /
'gal ba'i phyir ro /
na cāpi pradīpo yatra deśe tiṣṭhati tatra tamo 'sti, yattamo nighnataḥ pradīpasya paraprakāśakatvaṃ syāt mun pa rang gang sel bar byed bas mar me la gzhan snang bar byed pa nyid yod par 'gyur ba /
yul gang na mar me 'dug pa de na yang mun pa yod pa ma yin no /
ato 'pi nāsti pradīpasya svaparātmaprakāśakatvam de'i phyir /
mar me la rang dang gzhan gyi bdag nyid snang bar byed pa nyid med do /
yadā caivam, tadā pradīpavadutpādasya svaparātmotpādakatvaṃ na saṃbhaviṣyati, iti ayuktametat gang gi tshe de ltar yin pa de'i tshe mar me bzhin du skye ba la rang dang gzhan gyi bdag nyid skyed par byed pa nyid yod par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba 'di ni rigs pa ma yin no /
atrāha /
yadetaduktaṃ pradīpe nāndhakāro 'stīti, etadasatyandhakāradhāte yuktameva vaktum /
yasmāttu utpadyamānenaiva pradīpena tamo nihatam, tatra pradīpe nāndhakāro 'sti, yatra ca pradīpo 'sti, tatrāpyandhakāro nāstīti yujyate 		'dir smras pa /
mar me dang ni gang dag na /
de 'dug pa na mun pa med /
ces gang smras pa de ni mun pa bsal ba med na /
de ltar brjod par mi rigs pa zhig ste /
gang gi phyir /
skye bzhin pa'i mar me nyid kyis mun pa bsal ba yin te /
de'i phyir mar me la mun pa med cing /
gang na mar me yod pa de na yang mun pa med do zhes bya bar rigs pa yin no /
yadi pradīpena nāndhakāradhātaḥ kṛtaḥ, tadā anutpanne iva pradīpe utpanne 'pi ghaṭādayo nopalabhyeran, andhakāraghātābhāvātprāgavasthāmiva gal te mar mes mun pa bsal bar ma byas par 'gyur na ni /
de'i tshe mar me mi 'bar ba de bzhin du 'bar ba na yang /
bum pa la sogs pa rnams dmigs par mi 'gyur te /
sngar gyi gnas skabs bzhin du mun pa bsal ba med pa'i phyir ro /
tasmādastyeva andhakāraghātalakṣaṇaṃ prakāśanaṃ pradīpasya /
taccānena utpadyamānena pradīpena kṛtamiti 		de'i phyir mar me la mun pa sel ba'i mtshan nyid can gyi snang bar byed pa yod pa yin la /
de yang mar me skye bzhin pa 'dis byas pa yin no /
ucyate /
kathamutpadyamānena pradīpena tamo hatam 		brjod par bya ste /
gang tshe mar me skye bzhin pa /
mun pa dang ni phrad med na /
notpadyamāno hi tamaḥ pradīpaḥ prāpnute yadā ji ltar mar me skye bzhin pas /
mun pa sel bar byed pa yin /
iha ālokāndhakārayoryaugapadyābhāvāt prāpterabhāvaḥ /
yadā caivaṃ prāpterabhāvaḥ, tadā kathaṃ kena prakāreṇedānīmutpadyamānena pradīpena tamo hatamiti yuktaṃ parikalpayitum? yasmācca evamutpadyamāna pradīpaḥ tamo na prāpnoti, tasmānnaiva aprāptatvātpradīpaḥ kiṃcidapi prakāśayatītyavasīyatām 		'dir snang ba dang mun pa gnyis la cig car ba nyid med pa'i phyir phrad pa med la /
gang gi tshe de ltar phrad pa med pa de'i tshe /
de ni ji ltar de rnam la gang gis mar me skye bzhin pas mun pa sel lo zhes brtag par rigs par 'gyur /
gang gi phyir de ltar mar me skye bzhin pa mun pa dang phrad pa med la /
phrad pa med pa de'i phyir mar mes cung zad kyang snang bar byed pa ma yin no zhes bya bar nges par bya'o /
atha manyase /
yathā aprāptāmeva avidyāṃ jñānaṃ nihanti, aprāptameva rūpaṃ cakṣuḥ paśyati aprāptameva ayaḥ ayaskānto maṇirākarṣati, evameva aprāptamevāndhakāraṃ pradīpo nihaniṣyatīti etadapyasāramityāha 		ci ste ye shes kyis ma rig pa ma phrad pa kho na 'joms pa dang mig gis gzugs ma phrad pa nyid mthong ba dang nor bu khab len gyis lcags ma phrad pa kho na 'dren par byed pa de bzhin du mar mes ma phrad pa'i mun pa sel bar 'gyur ro snyam du sems na /
'di yang snying po med do zhes bshad pa /
aprāpyaiva pradīpena yadi vā nihataṃ tamaḥ mar me phrad pa med par yang /
gal te mun pa sel byed na /
ihasthaḥ sarvalokasthaṃ sa tamo nihaniṣyati 'jig rten kun na gnas pa'i mun /
'di na gnas pa des bsal 'gyur /
yadi aprāpyaiva pradīpena tamo nihatam, evaṃ sati, ihastha eva pradīpaḥ sarvalokasthaṃ tamo nihaniṣyati, aprāptatvātsamīpasthamivetyabhiprāyaḥ gal te mar mes phrad pa med par mun pa sel na ni /
de lta yin dang 'di na gnas pa'i mar mes 'jig rten no cog na gnas pa'i mun pa sel bar 'gyur te /
ma phrad pa'i phyir nye ba na gnas pa bzhin na snyam du dgongs so /
tshul 'dis ni ye shes kyis ma rig pa 'joms shing /
etena nyāyena jñānena avidyāghātaḥ, cakṣuṣā rūpadarśanam, ayaskāntamaṇinā ayaākarṣaṇamiva ityevamādikaṃ sādhyasamaṃ jñeyam mig gis gzugs mthong la /
nor bu khab len gyis lcags 'dren no zhes bya ba de lta bu la sogs pa yang bsgrub par bya ba dang mtshungs par shes par bya'o /
atha aprāptāvapi satyāmayaskāntamaṇiprabhṛtīnāṃ yogyadeśāvasthānāmeva svakāryakṛtvaṃ debhaviṣyatīti cet, tadapi na yuktam ci ste ma phrad pa yin yang nor bu khab len pa la sogs pa rung ba'i yul na gnas pa rnams kho nas rang gi 'bras bu byed pa nyid du 'gyur ro zhe na /
de yang mi rung ste /
ma phrad pa yin na ni /
aprāptau hi satyāṃ viprakṛṣṭadeśāntarāvasthitavadavyavahitaśāntarāvasthita vacca aprāptatvād yogyadeśāvasthitānāmapi yogyadeśāvasthitatvaṃ na yuktamiti kuto yogyadeśāvasthitānāṃ svakāryakṛttvaṃ prasetsyati? yul gzhan thag ring ba na gnas pa dang bar du chod pa'i yul gzhan gnas pa gzhan du ma phrad pa'i phyir na /
rung ba'i yul na gnas pa rnams kyis rung ba'i yul na gnas pa nyid mi rigs pas rung ba'i yul na gnas pa'i sgo nas rang gi 'bras bu byed pa nyid kyang gang las 'grub par 'gyur /
dṛṣṭametallokata iti cennaitadevam gal te 'jig rten du mthong ngo zhe na /
de ni de lta ma yin te /
yathā hi bhavān parikalpayati na tathā loke dṛṣṭam ji ltar khyod rtog par byed pa de ltar ni 'jig rten du ma mthong ngo /
yasmāt na lokaḥ prāptyaprāpticintāmevamādau viṣaye 'vatārya pradīpādīnāṃ prakāśakatvādikaṃ kalpayati 'di ltar 'jig rten du ni de lta bu'i yul la sogs pa la phrad pa dang ma phrad pa'i dpyad ra bcug nas /
mar me la sogs pa rnams la snang bar byed pa nyid la sogs pa rtog par mi byed de /
yathoditaṃ tu vicāramanavatārya pradīpena tamo hatam, cakṣuṣā rūpadarśanam, ayaskāntamaṇinā ayaākarṣaṇam ityādi icchati ji skad brjod pa'i rnam par dpyad pa mi 'jug par mar mes mun pa sel ba dang mig gis gzugs mthong ba dang nor bu khab len gyis lcags 'dren no zhes bya ba la sogs par 'dod pa yin no /
de'i phyir khyod kyis ji skad smras pa de ltar 'jig rten du ma mthong ba nyid do /
paśyatu vā loka evam /
tattvavicārakāle tu lokasyāprāmāṇyānna tena bādhā śakyate kartum 		yang na 'jig rten gyis de ltar mthong mod /
de kho na rnam par dpyod pa'i dus su 'jig rten tshad ma ma yin pa'i phyir des gnod par byed mi nus so /
evaṃ tāvadaprāpya prakāśanamayuktam de ltar na re zhig ma phrad par snang bar byed pa mi rigs so /
prāptāvapi viṣayādigrahaṇamayuktameva yul la sogs pa 'dzin pa ni phrad na /
yang mi rigs pa nyid de /
prāptirhi ekatve sati bhavati phrad pa ni gcig nyid yin par 'gyur la /
yadā caikatvaṃ tadā svarūpavaddarśanākarṣaṇādikaṃ nāsti /
yadyapi ceyaṃ prāptyaprāptyādicintā laukikavyavahāre nāvataratīti nirupapattikatvena mṛṣārthatvādasya, tathāpi tattvavicāre 'vatāryā, mā bhūtparamārthato 'pi nirupapattikapakṣābhyupagama ityalaṃ prasaṅgena 		gang gi tshe /
gcig nyid yin pa de'i tshe ni rang gi ngo bo bzhin du mthong ba dang 'dren pa la sogs pa yod pa ma yin no /
gal te yang 'thad pa dang bral ba nyid kyis 'di brdzun pa'i don can nyid yin pa'i phyir /
'jig rten pa'i tha snyad la phrad pa dang ma phrad pa la sogs pa'i bsam pa 'di mi 'jug mod kyi /
de lta na yang don dam par yang 'thad pa dang bral ba'i phyogs khas blangs par 'gyur du 'ong bas de kho na nyid rnam par dpyod pa na gzhug par bya ba yin no /
spros pas chog go /
yadi ca svaparātmānau pradīpaḥ prakāśayatīti parikalpyate tvayā, tamaso 'pi tarhi pratipakṣa bhūtasya svaparātmanoḥ pracchādanaṃ prakalpyatamityāha gal te mar me rang dang gzhan gyi bdag nyid snang bar byed par rtog na /
'o na ni gnyen por gyur pa mun pa la yang rang dang gzhan gyi bdag nyid sgrib par brtag par bya dgos so zhes bshad pa /
pradīpaḥ svaparātmānau saṃprakāśayate yadi mar me rang dang gzhan gyi dngos /
gal te snang bar byed 'gyur na /
tamo 'pi svaparātmānau chādayiṣyatyasaṃśayam /
pratidvandvitvātpradīpavat tamo 'pi svaparātmagataṃ vyāpāraṃ kariṣyati, tataśca paravadātmānamapi chādayiṣyati 		mun pa'ang rang dang gzhan gyi dngos /
sgrib par 'gyur bar the tshom med /
'gal zla yin pa'i phyir /
mar me bzhin du mun pa yang rang dang gzhan gyi dngos por rtogs pa'i bya ba byed par 'gyur ro /
de'i phyir gzhan bzhin du /
bdag nyid la yang sgrib par 'gyur ro /
gal te mun pas bdag nyid sgrib par byed na ni /
yadi ca ātmānaṃ chādayettamaḥ, tasyaivānupalabdhiḥ syāt, ghaṭādivattamasā pracchāditatvāt mun pas bsgribs pa'i phyir de nyid kyang mi dmigs par 'gyur te /
bum pa la sogs pa bzhin no /
ata evoktamāryopālipṛcchāyām /
iha sāsani sūramaṇīye pravrajathā gṛhiliṅga jahitvā 		de nyid kyi phyir 'phags pa nye ba 'khor gyis zhus pa las kyang /
shin tu dga' ba'i bstan pa 'di la ni /
khyim pa'i rtags spangs rab tu byung gyis dang /
phalavantu bhaviṣyatha śreṣṭho eṣu nideśitu kāruṇikena 'bras bu yod cing mchog tu 'gyur gyi zhes /
thugs rje can gyis de skad bstan pa'ang mdzad /
pravrajitvā gṛhiliṅga jahitvā sarvaphalasya bhaviṣyati prāptiḥ khyim pa'i rtags spangs rab tu byung gyur nas /
'bras bu thams cad thob par gyur yang ni /
puna dharmasabhāva tulitvā sarvaphalāna phalāna ca prāptiḥ chos kyi rang bzhin dag la gzhal byas nas /
'bras bu kun med 'bras bu thob pa'ang med /
alabhanta phalaṃ tatha prāptiṃ āścariyaṃ puna jāyati teṣām 'on kyang 'bras bu thob pa thob 'gyur ba /
kye ma'o mi mchog thugs rje ldan pa yi /
aho 'tikāruṇiko narasiṃho suṣṭhupadeśita yukti jinena /
iti 		rgyal bas rigs pa shin tu legs bshad ces /
de dag ngo mtshar che ba skye bar 'gyur /
tathāryaratnakūṭasūtre /
yathā hi dīpo layane cirasya kṛto hi gehe puruṣeṇa kenacit 		zhes gsungs pa dang de bzhin du 'phags pa dkon mchog brtsegs pa'i mdo las kyang /
dper na khyim du mi 'ga' la la yis /
yun ring lon nas mar me bus byas na /
tatrāndhakārasya na bhoti evaṃ cirasthito nāhamito gamiṣye de la mun pa bdag gnas rang lon gyis /
'di nas mi 'gro snyam du sems pa med /
tamondhakārasya na śaktirasti kṛte pradīpe na vigacchanāya mar me byung na mun pa mun nag la /
med par mi 'gyur ba yi nus pa med /
pratītya dīpaṃ ca vinaśyate tama ubhayaṃ pi śūnyaṃ na ca kiṃ ca manyati mar me brten nas mun pa med par 'gyur /
gnyi ga stong la rlom sems ci yang med /
jñānaṃ tathā ārya pratītya nāsravaṃ ajñāna kleśopacitaṃ vigacchati de bzhin zag med 'phags pa'i ye shes brten /
mi shes nyon mongs bsags pa med par 'gyur /
saṃparka teṣāṃ na kadāci vidyate jñānasya kleśasya ca nityakālam ye shes dang ni nyon mongs rtag par yang /
de dag lan 'ga' tsam yang 'grogs pa med /
jñānaṃ na kalpeti añānu no bhavet jñānaṃ pratītyaiva vinaśyate tamo ye shes mi shes med bya mi sems kyang /
ye shes brten nas mi shes med par 'gyur /
bhayaṃ pi agrāhya khapuṣpasaṃnibhaṃ jñānaṃ tathājñānu bhayaṃ pi śūnyam gnyi ga gzung med nam mkha'i me tog bzhin /
de bzhin ye shes mi shes gnyi ga stong /
iti /
kiṃ cānyat 		zhes gsungs so /
ihāyamutpādo yadyātmānamutpādayet, sa utpanno vā svātmānamutpādayet, anutpanno vā? ubhayathā ca nopapadyate ityāha gzhan yang 'dir gal te skye ba 'dis bdag nyid skyed par byed na /
de skyes pa zhig gam ma skyes pa zhig gis rang gi bdag nyid skyed par byed grang /
gnyi ga ltar yang mi 'thad do zhes bshad pa /
anutpanno 'yamutpādaḥ svātmānaṃ janayetkatham skye ba 'di ni ma skyes pas /
rang gi bdag nyid ji ltar bskyed /
athotpanno janayate jāte kiṃ janyate punaḥ ci ste skyes pas skyed byed na /
skyes na ci zhig bskyed du yod /
yadi anutpanna utpādaḥ svātmānamutpādayet, maṇḍūkajaṭāśiromaṇirapyātmānamutpādayet gal te skye ba ma skyes pas rang gi bdag nyid skyed par byed na ni /
nam mkha'i me tog kyang rang gi bdag nyid skyed par byed par 'gyur ro /
atha utpanna utpādayet, kimutpannasyāpareṇotpādena prayojanamiti 'on te skyes pas skyed par byed na ni /
skyes zin pa la skye ba gzhan gyis dgos pa ci zhig yod /
evaṃ tāvadutpāda ātmānaṃ notpādayati de ltar re zhig skye bas bdag nyid bskyed pa ma yin no /
idānīṃ paramapi yathā notpādayati tathā pratipādayannāha da ni gzhan yang ji ltar mi skyed pa de ltar bstan pa'i phyir bshad pa /
notpadyamānaṃ notpannaṃ nānutpannaṃ kathaṃcana skyes dang ma skyes skye bzhin pa /
ci lta bur yang mi skyed pa /
utpadyate tathākhyātaṃ gamyamānagatāgataiḥ de ni song dang ma song dang /
bgom pas rnam par bshad pa yin /
