evaṃ yadi kenaciddarśanādikenopādānena kaścidātmasvabhāvo 'bhivyajyate asyāyamupādāteti, kenaciccātmanā kiṃcidupādānaṃ darśanādikamabhivyajyate idamasyopādānamiti, tadānīṃ syātparasparāpekṣayorupādānopādātroḥ siddhiḥ yadā tu upādātāraṃ vinā pṛthak siddhaṃ darśanādikamabhyupagamyate, tadā tannirāśrayamasadeva tasmānnāstyubhayorapi siddhiḥ, iti na yuktametat 'bras bu des kyang sa bon zhes bya ba'i rgyu ci zhig mngon par gsal bar byed pa de bzhin du gal te 'di ni 'di'i nye bar len pa po'o zhes bya bar lta ba la sogs pa nye bar len pa ci zhig gi bdag gang zhig mngon par gsal bar byed cing /
'di ni 'di'i nye bar len pa'o zhes bya ba bdag gang gis lta ba la sogs pa nye bar len pa ci zhig mngon par gsal bar byed par 'gyur na ni de'i tshe phan tshun ltos nas nye bar len pa dang nye bar len pa po dag grub par 'gyur na /
gang gi tshe nye bar len pa po med par logs shig tu lta ba la sogs pa khas len pa de'i tshe ni rten med pas de med pa nyid yin no /
de'i phyir gnyi ga yang grub pa med pas /
darśanādibhyaḥ pṛthagavasthita upādāteti /
atrāha /
yaduktaṃ darśanaśravaṇādibhya ityādi, atrocyate 		lta ba la sogs pa las tha dad par nye bar len pa po gnas ma yin no zhes bya ba 'di ni mi rigs so /
'dir smras pa /
lta dang nyan la sogs pa dang /
zhes bya ba la sogs pa gang smras pa de la brjod par bya ste /
yadi sarvebhyo darśanādibhya prāgavasthita ityabhyupagataṃ syāt, syādeṣa doṣaḥ gal te lta ba la sogs pa thams cad kyi snga rol na gnas so zhes bya bar khas blangs par gyur na ni /
nyes pa 'dir 'gyur ba zhig na /
yadā tu gang gi tshe /
sarvebhyo darśanādibhyaḥ kaścitpūrvo na vidyate lta ba la sogs thams cad kyi /
snga rol gang zhig yod pa min /
kiṃ tarhi ekaikasmātpūrvo vidyate /
yadā caivam, tadā /
ajyate darśanādīnāmanyena punaranyadā /
yadā darśanena draṣṭetyabhivyajyate, na tadā śravaṇādīnyupādāya prajñapyate, tataśca pūrvoktadoṣānavasara iti 		'o na ci zhe na /
re re'i snga rol na yod pa yin no gang gi tshe de lta yin pa de'i tshe /
lta sogs nang nas gzhan zhig gis /
gzhan gyi tshe na gsal bar byed /
gang gi tshe lta ba po zhes bya bar lta bas gsal bar byed pa de'i tshe ni /
nyan pa la sogs pa dag la brten nas nye bar gdags par bya ba ma yin no /
de'i phyir sngar smras pa'i nyes pa'i go skabs med do zhe na /
brjod pa 'di yang rigs pa ma yin te /
ucyate /
etadapi na yuktaṃ darśanādirahitasya nirupādānasya nirhetukasya nirañjanasyāstitvāsaṃbhavāt 		ci'i phyir zhe na /
lta ba la sogs pa dang bral ba ni nye bar len pa med pa /
rgyu med pa gsal byed dang bral ba ni yod pa nyid ma yin pa'i phyir ro /
sarvebhyo darśanādibhyo yadi pūrvo na vidyate lta la sogs pa thams cad kyi /
snga rol gal te yod min na ste /
iti parikalpyate, evamapi de ltar rtog na /
de lta na yang /
ekaikasmātkathaṃ pūrvo darśanādeḥ sa vidyate lta la sogs pa re re yi /
snga rol de ni ji ltar yod /
yo hi sarvebhyaḥ pūrvo na bhavati, sa ekaikasmādapi na bhavati gang zhig thams cad kyi snga rol na yod pa ma yin pa de ni re re'i snga rol na yang ma yin te /
tadyathā sarvebhyo vṛkṣebhya prāg vanaṃ nāsti, tadā ekaikasmādapi nāsti dper na shing thams cad kyi snga rol na nags med pa de'i tshe re re'i snga rol na yang med la /
sarvāsāṃ ca sikatānāṃ tailajananābhāve sati ekaikasyā api sikatāyāstailaṃ nāsti bye ma thams cad la til mar 'byin pa med la /
bye ma re re la yang til mar med pa bzhin no /
api ca gzhan yang /
yo hyekaikasmātpūrvo bhavati, nanu sa sarvebhyo 'pi pūrvaṃ evetyabhyupagataṃ bhavati gang zhig re re'i snga rol du yod par 'gyur ba de ni thams cad kyi snga rol na yang yod par khas blangs par 'gyur te /
ekaikavyatirekeṇa sarvasyābhāvāt /
tasmānna yuktamekaikasmātpūrvo vidyata iti 		re re ma gtogs par thams cad med pa'i phyir ro /
de'i phyir re re'i snga rol na yod do zhes bya ba ni mi rigs so /
itaśca na yuktam 'di'i phyir yang mi rigs te /
yasmāt /
draṣṭā sa eva sa śrotā sa eva yadi vedakaḥ 		gang gi phyir /
lta po de nyid nyan po de /
gal te tshor po'ang de nyid na /
tadā /
ekaikasmādbhavetpūrvaṃ 		de'i tshe /
re re'i snga rol yod gyur na /
na ca yuktaṃ vaktuṃ sa eva draṣṭā sa eva śroteti /
yadi syāt, tadā darśanakriyārahitasyāpi śroturdraṣṭṭatvaṃ syāt, śravaṇakriyārahitasyāpi draṣṭuḥ śrotṛtvaṃ syāt /
na caivaṃ dṛṣṭaṃ yaddarśanakriyārahito 'pi draṣṭā syāt, śravaṇakriyārahitaśca śroteti 		lta ba po gang yin pa de nyid nyan pa po yin no zhes bya bar brjod par ni rigs pa yang ma yin no /
gal te yin na /
de'i tshe lta ba'i bya ba dang bral ba'i nyan pa po yang lta ba po nyid du 'gyur la /
nyan pa'i bya ba dang bral ba'i lta ba po yang nyan pa por 'gyur na /
lta ba'i bya ba dang bral ba yang lta ba por 'gyur zhing /
nyan pa'i bya ba dang bral ba yang nyan pa por 'gyur ro zhes bya ba gang yin pa de lta bu ni mthong ba yang ma yin no /
ata evāha de nyid kyi phyir /
evaṃ caitanna yujyate /
iti 		de ni de ltar mi rigs so zhes bshad do /
pratikriyaṃ ca kārakabhedātkuta etadevaṃ bhaviṣyatīti pratipādayannāha bya ba so so la byed pa po tha dad pa'i phyir 'di ni de ltar yod par gal 'gyur zhes bstan pa'i phyir /
evaṃ caitanna yujyata iti de ni de ltar mi rigs so zhes gsungs so /
ācāryabuddhapālitastu vyācaṣṭe slob dpon sangs rgyas bskyangs ni /
bdag gcig yin na ni /
ekatve hi ātmanaḥ indriyāntaragamanaprasaṅgaḥ puruṣasya syāt, vātāyanāntaropagamanavaditi dbang po gzhan la 'gro bar thal bar 'gyur te /
skyes bu skar khung gzhan du nye bar 'gro ba bzhin no zhes rnam par 'chad do /
asya ācāryabhāvaviveko dūṣaṇamāha /
sarvagatasyātmano nendriyāntaragamanamastītyayuktaḥ prasaṅgadoṣa iti 		slob dpon legs ldan byed ni /
thams cad na yod pa'i bdag la dbang po gzhan la 'gro ba yod pa ma yin pas thal bar 'gyur ba'i skyon mi rigs so zhes de la sun 'byin par smra'o /
tadetadayuktaṃ svayūthyaparikalpitapudgalavādanirāsasya prastutatvāt, tasya ca sarvagatatvāpratijñānāt /
tasmād yukta eva prasaṅgadoṣa /
athāpi yathoktadoṣaparijihīrṣayā 		'di ni mi rigs te /
rang gi sde pas brtags pa'i gang zag tu smra ba dgag pa'i skabs su bab pa'i phyir dang de yang thams cad na yod pa nyid du khas ma 'ches pa'i phyir ro /
de'i phyir thal bar 'gyur ba'i skyon rigs pa nyid do /
'on te yang ji skad du bshad pa'i skyon spang bar 'dod pas /
draṣṭānya eva śrotānyo vedako 'nyaḥ punaryadi gal te lta po gzhan nyid la /
nyan pa po gzhan tshor gzhan na ste /
parikalpyate, tadapi na yuktam rtog par byed na de yang mi rigs te /
evaṃ hīṣyamāṇe de ltar 'dod par gyur na /
sati syād draṣṭari śrotā bahutvaṃ cātmanāṃ bhavet lta po yod tshe nyan por 'gyur /
bdag kyang mang po nyid du 'gyur /
tadyathā goranyo 'śvaḥ na hi gavi sati na bhavati yaugapadyena, evaṃ yadi draṣṭuranyaḥ śrotā syāt, sadraṣṭaryapi sati syādyaugapadyena ji ltar ba glang las gzhan du gyur pa'i rta ni ba glang yod pa'i tshe cig car du yod par mi 'gyur ba ma yin pa de bzhin du /
gal te nyan pa po lta ba po las gzhan du gyur na ni /
de lta ba po yod pa'i tsha na yang cig car du yod par 'gyur ba zhig na /
na caivamiṣyate iti nāstyanyatvam de ltar ni mi 'dod pas gzhan nyid yod pa ma yin no /
api ca /
evaṃ sati bahava evātmānaḥ prāpnuvanti draṣṭṭaśrotṛvedakādīnāṃ pṛthak pṛthak siddhayupagamāt /
tasmādekaikasmādapi darśanādeḥ pūrvaṃ nāsti pudgalo nāma kaścit 		gzhan yang de lta yin na ni bdag mang por 'gyur te /
lta ba po dang nyan pa po dang tshor ba po la sogs pa rnams so so so sor grub par khas blangs pa'i phyir ro /
de'i phyir /
gang zag ces bya ba ni lta ba la sogs pa re re'i snga rol na yang 'ga' zhig kyang med do /
atrāha /
vidyata eva pūrvaṃ sa sarvebhyo darśanādibhya ātmā /
atha matam /
yadyasti, kena prajñapyate sa iti yaducyate, iha darśanādibhyaḥ pūrvaṃ nāmarūpāvasthāyāṃ catvāri mahābhūtāni santi yataḥ kramānnāmarūpapratyayaṃ ṣaḍāyatanamiti darśanaśravaṇādīnyutpadyante 		'dir smras pa /
bdag ni lta ba la sogs pa thams cad kyi snga rol na yod pa nyid do /
ci ste gal te de yod na /
de ni gang gis gdags par bya /
snyam du sems na /
de la brjod par bya ste /
'di ltar lta ba la sogs pa dag gi snga rol na ming dang gzugs kyi gnas skabs na /
gang las rim gyis ming dang gzugs kyi rkyen gyis skye mched drug go zhes lta ba dang nyan pa la sogs pa dag 'byung par 'gyur ba 'byung ba chen po bzhi yod de /
tasmāddarśanādibhyaḥ pūrvaṃ caturmahābhūtopādānamevāstīti de'i phyir lta ba la sogs pa dag gi snga rol na /
bdag 'byung ba chen po bzhi'i nye bar len pa can yod do /
evamapi /
darśanaśravaṇādīni vedanādīni cāpyatha 		de lta na yang /
lta dang nyan la sogs pa dang /
tshor ba dag la sogs pa yang /
bhavanti yebhyasteṣveṣa bhūteṣvapi na vidyate gang las 'gyur ba'i 'byung de la'ang /
de ni yod pa ma yin no /
yebhyo mahābhūtebhyo darśanādikamutpadyate, teṣvapi mahābhūtopādānanimittako 'pyeṣa na yujyate pūrveṇaiva hetunetyabhiprāyaḥ /
tatra yathā pūrvamuktam 		'byung ba chen po gang dag las lta ba la sogs pa skye ba de dag la'ang /
nye bar len pa 'byung ba chen po'i rgyu can 'di yod pa mi rigs te /
sngar bshad pa'i gtan tshigs kyis so zhes bya bar dgongs so /
de la ji skad sngar /
kutaḥ kiṃcidvinā kaścitkiṃcitkaṃcidvinā kutaḥ ci med gang zhig ga la yod /
gang med ci zhig ga la yod /
iti, ihāpi tathaiva vaktavyam ces bshad pa de kho na ltar 'dir yang brjod par bya'o /
mahābhūtopādānādyaścātmā pūrvaṃ siddhaḥ syāt, sa mahābhūtānyupādāya syāt /
na caivam, nirhetukatvāt /
yaśca nāsti, sa kathaṃ mahābhūtānyupādāsyati? iti darśanopādānavadbhūtopādāne 'pi dūṣaṇamuktameveti na punarucyate /
atrāha /
yadyapyevamātmā pratiṣiddhaḥ, tathāpi darśanādikamasti, apratiṣedhāt 		gal te nye bar len pa 'byung ba chen po'i snga rol du bdag grub par gyur na ni /
des 'byung ba chen po dag nye bar len par 'gyur na /
de ltar yang ma yin te rgyu med pa'i phyir ro /
gang zhig yod pa ma yin pa de ni ji ltar 'byung ba chen po dag nye bar len par 'gyur /
de'i phyir /
lta ba'i nye bar len pa can ltar 'byung ba chen po'i nye bar len pa can la yang skyon brjod pa nyid yin pas slar yang ma brjod do /
gang gi phyir de ltar yin pa de'i phyir 'di ni 'byung ba dag la yang yod pa ma yin no /
'dir smras pa /
gal te yang de ltar bdag bkag mod kyi /
'on kyang lta ba la sogs pa ni yod pa nyid de /
bkag pa ma byas pa'i phyir ro /
na ca anātmasvabhāvānāṃ ghaṭādīnāṃ darśanādisaṃbandho 'sti bum pa la sogs pa bdag gi rang bzhin ma yin pa rnams la ni lta ba la sogs pa dang 'brel pa yod pa ma yin no /
tasmātsaṃbandhī vidyata evātmeti de'i phyir de dag dang 'brel pa can bdag yod pa kho na'o /
ucyate /
syādātmā yadi darśanādīnyeva syuḥ 		brjod par bya ste /
gal te lta ba la sogs pa rnams nyid yod na /
bdag kyang yod par 'gyur na /
na tu santi /
yasya darśanādīnyupādānaṃ sa yadā nāstīti pratipāditam, tadā tasminnātmani upādātari asati, kuto darśanādīnāmupādānabhūtānāmastitvamityāha 		yod pa ni ma yin te /
lta ba la sogs pa bdag gang gi nye bar len pa yin pa de med do zhes bstan pa de'i tshe /
nye bar len pa po bdag med na lta ba la sogs pa /
nye bar len par gyur pa rnams /
yod pa nyid du ga la 'gyur /
zhes gsungs pa ni /
darśanaśravaṇādīni vedanādīni cāpyatha lta dang nyan la sogs pa dang /
tshor ba dag la sogs pa yang /
na vidyate cedyasya sa na vidyanta imānyapi gang gi yin pa gal te med /
de dag kyang ni yod ma yin /
yasya darśanādīni parikalpyante sa yadā nāstītyuktam, nanu tadaiva darśanādikamapi nāstīti spaṣṭamādarśitaṃ bhavati /
tataśca darśanādyabhāvānnāstyevātmeti 		zhes bya ba ste /
lta ba la sogs pa dag gang gi yin par rtog pa de gang gi tshe med do zhes bshad pa de'i tshe kho nar lta ba la sogs pa de yang med do zhes gsal bar bstan pa ma yin nam /
de'i phyir lta ba la sogs pa med pa'i phyir bdag med do /
atrāha /
kiṃ khalu bhavato niścitametannāstyevātmeti? kena etaduktam? nanu ca anantaramevoktaṃ darśanādyabhāvādātmāpi nāstīti 		'dir smras pa /
ci bdag med do snyam du de ltar khyod kyis nges sam /
de skad sus smras /
lta ba la sogs pa med pa'i phyir /
bdag kyang med do zhes thal ma thag tu smras pa ma yin nam zhe na /
uktametadesmābhiḥ /
na tu asyārtho bhavatā samyagniścitaḥ /
yato bhāvarūpa ātmeti parikalpitaḥ, sa svabhāvato na vidyate, tasya ca mayā svabhāvābhiniveśanivartakameva vacanamuktamasadviparyāsapratipakṣeṇa, na tu asya abhāvaḥ parikalpitaḥ 		de skad du kho bo cag gis smras mod kyi /
'di'i don ni khyod kyis yang dag par gtan la ma phab pa yin no /
gang gi phyir bdag dngos po'i rang bzhin can yod do zhes brtags pa yin la /
de yang ngo bo nyid kyis yod pa ma yin zhing /
bdag gis kyang yang dag pa ma yin pa'i phyin ci log gi gnyen por de la rang bzhin du mngon par zhen pa zlog par byed pa'i tshig smras pa yin gyi /
'di'i dngos po med par brtags pa ni ma yin te /
dvayaṃ hyetat parityājyaṃ yaśca bhāveṣvabhiniveśaḥ, yaśca abhāveṣu abhiniveśa iti 'di ltar 'di gnyis ni spang bar bya ba yin te /
gang dngos po la mngon par zhen pa dang gang yang dngos ngo med pa la mgon par zhen pa'o /
yathoktamāryadevena ji skad du slob dpon 'phags pa'i ltas /
yastavātmā mamānātmā tenātmāniyamānna saḥ khyod kyi bdag kyang nga'i min /
des bdag nges med de phyir med /
nanvanityeṣu bhāveṣu kalpanā nāma jāyate dngos po mi rtag pa rnams la /
rtog pa zhes kyang nye bar skye /
iti /
etadeva pratipādayannāha 		zhes gsungs pa lta bu'o /
de nyid bstan pa'i phyir /
prāk ca yo darśanādibhyaḥ sāṃprataṃ cordhvameva ca gang zhig lta la sogs pa yi /
snga rol da lta phyin med /
na vidyate 'sti nāstīti nivṛttāstatra kalpanāḥ de la yod do med do zhes /
rtog pa dag ni ldog par 'gyur /
zhes bya ba gsungs so /
prāk tāvaddarśanādibhya ātmā nāsti, tatra hi tasyāstitvābhāvāt re zhig lta ba la sogs pa dag gi snga rol na ni bdag med de /
de dang bral ba la yod pa nyid med pa'i phyir ro /
darśanādisahabhūto 'pi nāsti, pṛthakpṛthagasiddhayoḥ sahabhāvādarśanāt śaśaśṛṅgayoriva lta ba la sogs pa dang lhan cig tu gyur pa yang med do /
so so so sor ma grub pa dag la /
ātmopādānayośca parasparanirapekṣayo pṛthakpṛthagasiddhatvāt sāṃpratamapi nāsti /
urdhvamapi 		lhan cig pa nyid ma mthong ba'i phyir dang ri bong gi rva gnyis ltar phan tshun ltos pa med pa'i bdag dang nye bar blangs pa dag kyang so so so sor ma grub pa'i phyir da ltar yang med do /
phyis kyang med de /
yadi hi pūrvaṃ darśanādīni syuḥ, uttarakālamātmā syāt, tadānīmūrdhvaṃ saṃbhavet 'di ltar gal te lta ba la sogs pa dag gong du yod par 'gyur zhing /
bdag 'og rol gyi dus su yod par 'gyur na ni de'i tshe phyis 'byung bar 'gyur na /
na caivam, akartṛkasya karmaṇo 'siddhatvāt /
yaścaivamātmā darśanādibhyaḥ prāk paścād yugapacca parīkṣyamāṇo nāsti, tasya idānīmanupalabdhasvabhāvasya astitvaṃ nāstitvaṃ vā kaḥ parikalpayetprājñaḥ? tasmātkarmakārakavadeva upādānopādātroḥ parasparāpekṣā siddhirna svābhāvikīti sthitam 		de ni de lta ma yin te /
byed pa po med pa'i las ma grub pa'i phyir ro /
bdag gang zhig de ltar yongs su brtags pa na lta ba la sogs pa dag gi sngar ram phyis sam lhan cig yod pa ma yin pa de'i tshe /
dmigs pa med pa'i rang bzhin de la yod pa'am /
med pa nyid du shes rab can su zhig rtog par byed /
de'i phyir nye bar len pa dang nye bar len pa po gnyis las dang byed pa po bzhin du phan tshun ltos pa'i grub pa nyid yin gyi /
ngo bo nyid kyis ni ma yin no zhes bya bar gnas so /
de nyid kyi phyir /
ata evoktaṃ bhagavatā āryasamādhirājabhaṭṭārake bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang /
'phags pa ting nge 'dzin gyi rgyal po'i mdo las /
tahi kāli so daśabalo anagho jinu bhāṣate imu samādhivaram de tshe sdig med stobs bcu ldan pa yi /
rgyal ba de ni ting 'dzin mchog 'di 'chad /
supinopamā bhagavatī sakalā na hi kaści jāyati na co mriyate srid pa'i 'gro ba rmi lam lta bu ste /
'di la su yang mi skyo 'chi ba med /
na ca sattvu labhyati na jīvu naro imi dharma phenakadalīsadṛśāḥ sems can ming dang srog kyang mi rnyed de /
chos 'di rnams ni dbu ba chu shing 'dra /
māyopamā gaganavidyusamā dakacandrasaṃnibha marīcisamāḥ sgyu ma lta bu nam mkha'i glog 'dra ste /
chu yi zla ba 'dra zhing smig rgyu bzhin /
na ca asmi loki mṛtu kaści naro paraloka saṃkramati gacchati vā mi 'ga' 'jig rten 'dir yang shi nas ni /
'jig rten gzhan du 'pho zhing 'gro med kyang /
na ca karma naśyati kadāci kṛtaṃ phalu deti kṛṣṇaśubha saṃsarato las byas rnams ni nam yang chud mi za /
'khor ba na yang dkar nag 'bras bu smin /
na ca śāśvataṃ na ca uccheda puno na ca karmasaṃcayu na cāpi sthitiḥ rtag pa ma yin chad par mi 'gyur te /
las bsags med cing gnas pa dag kyang med /
na ca so 'pi kṛtva punarāspṛśati na ca anyu kṛtva puna vedayate de yang byas nas reg par mi 'gyur min /
gzhan gyis byas pa tshor bar 'gyur ba'ang med /
na ca saṃkramo na ca punāgamanaṃ na ca sarvamasti na ca nāsti punaḥ 'pho ba med cing phyir yang 'ong ba med /
thams cad yod pa ma yin med pa'ang min /
na ca dṛṣṭisthānagatiśuddhiriha na ca sattvacārasupaśāntagati 'di na lta gnas 'jug pa dag pa min /
sems can spyod par bzhi 'jug pa med /
anutpāda śānta animittapadaṃ sugatāna gocara jināna guṇā bde gshegs spyod yul rgyal ba'i yon tan ni /
skye med zhi ba mtshan ma med pa'i gnas /
bala dhāraṇī daśabalāna balaṃ buddhāniyaṃ vṛṣamitā paramā stobs dang gzungs rnams dang ni stobs bcu'i stobs /
'di ni sangs rgyas khyu mchog dam pa'i mchog /
ityācāryacandrakīrtipādoparacitāyāṃ prasannapadāyāṃ madhyamakavṛttau pūrvaparīkṣā nāma navamaṃ prakaraṇam /
agnīndhanaparīkṣā daśamaṃ prakaraṇam 		ces rgya cher gsungs so /
slob dpon zla ba grags pa'i zhal snga nas sbyar ba'i tshig gsal ba las /
snga rol na gnas pa brtag pa zhes bya ba rab tu byed pa dgu pa'i 'grel pa'o /
atrāha /
yadidamuktaṃ tasmātkarmakārakavadeva upādānopādātrorapi na svābhāvikī siddhiriti, tadayuktam, sāpekṣāṇāmapi padārthānāṃ sasvābhāvyadarśanāt 		'dir smras pa /
nye bar len pa dang nye bar len pa po gnyis ngo bo nyid kyis grub pa ni ma yin no zhes gang smras pa de ni rigs pa ma yin te /
dngos po ltos pa dang bcas pa rnams la yang ngo bo nyid dang bcas pa nyid mthong ba'i phyir ro /
tathā hi agnirindhanamapekṣya bhavati 'di ltar bud shing la ltos nas me 'byung mod kyi /
na ca niḥsvabhāvo 'gniḥ, tasya auṣṇyadāhakatvādisvabhāvakāryopalambhāt me rang bzhin med pa ni ma yin te /
tsha ba dang sreg par byed pa nyid rang bzhin dang 'bras bu dmigs pa'i phyir ro /
evamagnimapekṣya indhanaṃ bhavati de bzhin du me la ltos nas bud shing yin mod kyi /
na ca tanniḥsvabhāvam, bāhyamahābhūtacatuṣṭayasvabhāvatvāt /
evamupādānasāpekṣo 'pyupādātā svabhāvato bhaviṣyati, upādātṛsāpekṣaṃ copādānamityagnīndhanavadetau bhaviṣyata upādānopādātārāviti 		de rang bzhin med pa ni ma yin te /
bsreg par bya ba 'byung ba chen po bzhi'i rang bzhin nyid yin pa'i phyir ro /
de bzhin du /
nye bar len pa la ltos pa dang bcas pa'i nye bar len pa po dang nye bar len pa po la ltos pa dang bcas pa'i nye bar len pa yang ngo bo nyid yod par 'gyur ro /
de'i phyir med dang bud shing bzhin du nye bar len pa dang nye bar len pa po de gnyis kyang 'byung bar 'gyur ro /
ucyate /
syādetadevam, yadi agnīndhane eva syātām, na tu staḥ 		brjod par bya ste /
gal te me dang bud shing dag nyid yod na de ltar 'gyur na /
yod pa ni ma yin no /
katham? iha yadi agnīndhane syātām, niyataṃ te ekatvena vā syātāmanyatvena vā? ubhayathā tu na yujyata ityāha 'dir gal te me dang bud shing dag yod par gyur na /
de dag nges par gcig nyid dam tha dad pa nyid du yod par 'gyur grang /
yadindhanaṃ sa cedagnirekatvaṃ kartṛkarmaṇoḥ gnyi ga ltar yang mi rigs so zhes gsungs pa /
bud shing gang de me yin na /
anyaścedindhanādagnirindhanādapyṛte bhavet byed pa po dang las gcig 'gyur /
gal te shing las me gzhan na /
tatra idhyate yat tadindhanam, dāhyaṃ kāṣṭhādikasaṃbhūtam /
tasya dagdhā kartā agniḥ 		shing med par yang 'byung bar 'gyur bud shing bsreg par bya ba shing la sogs pa las su gyur pa gang yin pa de'i sreg par byed pa po ni mi yin no /
tatra yadi tāvad yadindhanaṃ sa evāgniriti parikalpyate, tadā kartṛkarmaṇorekatvaṃ syāt de la gal te bud shing de nyid me yin no zhes bya bar rtog na ni de'i tshe byed pa po dang /
las dag gcig nyid du 'gyur na /
de ltar ni ma mthong ste /
na caivaṃ dṛṣṭam, ghaṭakumbhakārayośchettṛcchettavyayoścaikatvaprasaṅgāt, tasya cānabhyupagamāt rdza mkhan dang bum pa dag gam /
gcad bya dang gcod pa po yang gcig nyid du thal bar 'gyur pa'i phyir la /
de yang khas ma blangs pa'i phyir ro /
ci ste gzhan nyid yin na ni /
de lta na yang /
atha anyatvam, evamapi yadi indhanādanyo 'gniḥ syāt, tadā indhananirapekṣasyāgnerupalabdhiḥ syāt gal te bud shing las me gzhan du gyur na /
de'i tshe bud shing la ltos pa med par mi dmigs par 'gyur ro /
na hi ghaṭādanyaḥ paṭastannirapekṣo na dṛṣṭaḥ /
na caivamindhananirapekṣo 'gniriti na yuktametat 		bum pa las gzhan du gyur pa'i snam bu ni de la ltos pa med par mthong ba ma yin pa ma yin no /
bud shing la ltos pa med pa'i me ni de ltar yang ma yin pas /
api ca /
yadi indhanādanyo 'gniḥ syāt, tadānīm 		'di ni mi rigs so /
gzhan yang gal te bud shing las me gzhan du gyur na ni de'i tshe /
nityapradīpta eva syādapradīpanahetukaḥ rtag tu 'bar ba nyid du 'gyur /
'bar byed rgyu las mi 'byung zhing /
punarārambhavaiyarthyamevaṃ cākarmakaḥ sati rtsom pa don med nyid du 'gyur /
de lta yin na las kyang med /
indhanātpṛthagbhūto 'gniriṣyamāṇo nityapradīpta eva syāt, apradīpanahetukaśca syāt punarārambhavaiyarthyaṃ ca syāt, evaṃ ca sati akarmaka eva syāt /
amumevārthaṃ pratipādayitukāma āha 		me bud shing las tha dad par gyur par 'dod pa na rtag tu 'bar ba nyid du 'gyur zhing /
'bar byed rgyu las mi 'byung bar 'gyur la /
yang rtsom pa don med par 'gyur zhing /
de lta yin dang las kyang med par 'gyur ro /
paratra nirapekṣatvādapradīpanahetukaḥ don 'di nyid bstan par bzhed nas /
gzhan la ltos pa med pa'i phyir /
punarārambhavaiyarthyaṃ nityadīptaḥ prasajyate 'bar byed rgyu las mi 'byung zhing /
rtag tu 'bar ba yin na ni /
rtsom pa don med nyid du 'gyur /
iti /
tatra pradīpyate taditi pradīpanamindhanam /
pradīpanaṃ heturasyeti pradīpanahetuka, na pradīpanahetukaḥ apradīpanahetukaḥ 		zhes bya bar gsungs so /
de la des 'bar bar byed pas na 'bar bar byed de bud shing ngo /
'di la 'bar bar byed pa rgyur yod pas na 'bar bar byed pa'i rgyu las 'byung ba'o /
'bar bar byed pa'i rgyu las byung ba ma yin pa ni /
'bar bar byed pa'i rgyu las mi 'byung ba'o /
yadi pradīpanādanyo 'gniḥ syāt, tadā indhananirapekṣaḥ syāt /
yo hi yasmādanyaḥ, sa tannirapekṣo dṛṣṭaḥ, ghaṭādiva paṭaḥ /
tataśca paratra nirapekṣatvādapradīpanahetukaḥ syāt, pradīpanasāpekṣasya hi agneḥ tadabhāve syānnirvāṇam 		gal te 'bar bar byed pa las me gzhan yin par gyur na ni de'i tshe bud shing la ltos pa med par 'gyur ro /
gang zhig gang las gzhan yin pa de ni ltos pa med de /
bum pa dang snam bu bzhin no /
de'i phyir gzhan la ltos pa med pa'i phyir 'bar bar byed pa'i rgyu las mi 'byung bar 'gyur ro /
de'i phyir rtag tu 'bar bar byed do /
'bar bar byed pa la ltos pa dang bcas pa'i me de ni med na 'chi bar 'gyur na /
yadā tu pradīpananirapekṣa, tadā nirvāṇapratyayavaikalyānnityapradīpta eva bhavet gang gi tshe /
'bar bar byed pa la ltos pa med pa de'i tshe ni 'chi ba'i rkyen ma tshang bas rtag tu 'bar ba nyid du 'gyur ro /
nityapradīpte cāgnau sati agneraparinirvāṇārthaṃ cāsya upādānasaṃdhukṣaṇādikaṃ vyarthameva syāt rtag tu 'bar ba yin na ni /
mi 'chi bar bya ba'i phyir de nye bar len pa dang spar ba la sogs pa'i rtsom pa don med pa nyid du 'gyur ro /
evaṃ ca sati akarmako 'gniḥ kartā syāt de lta yin na me las med cing mi bdog pa yin bzhin du byed pa por yang 'gyur ro /
na ca avidyamānakarmakasya kartṛtvaṃ vandhyāsutasyeva las yod pa ma yin pa ni byed pa po nyid kyang ma yin te /
mo gsham gyi bu bzhin no /
tasmādindhanādagneranyatvamiti na yujyate de'i phyir bud shing las me gzhan pa nyid kyang mi rigs so /
atrāha /
yadetaduktam 		'dir smras pa /
gang 'di skad du /
anyaścedindhanādagnirindhanādapyṛte bhavet gal te shing las me gzhan na /
shing med par yang 'byung bar 'gyur /
iti, tadayuktam /
ihānyatve 'pi sati agnīndhanayorna vinaiva indhanena agnerastitvam 		zhes gang smras pa de ni mi rigs te /
'dir me dang bud shing dag gzhan nyid yin yang /
bud shing med par me yod pa nyid ma yin te /
yasmājjvālāparigato 'rtho dāhyatvalakṣaṇaḥ indhanam gang gi phyir /
'bar bar gyur pa'i don mes bsreg par bya ba'i mtshan nyid can ni bud shing yin la /
tadāśrayeṇa ca agnirupalabhyate na pṛthak /
yadā caitadevam, agnisaṃbandhādevendhanavyapadeśo bhavati, indhanāśrayeṇa cāgnirupalabhyate na pṛthak, tadā anyaścedindhanādagnirityādidoṣaprasaṅgasya nāstyevāvasara iti 		me yang de la brten nas dmigs kyi /
so sor ni ma yin no /
gang gi tshe /
de ltar me dang 'brel pa las bud shing du brjod par 'gyur zhing /
me yang bud shing la brten nas dmigs kyi so sor ma yin pa de'i tshe /
gal te shing las me gzhan na zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i nyes par thal ba'i go skabs med do zhe na phyogs 'di yang mi rigs pa nyid du brjod pa'i phyir ro /
asya pakṣasyāṣyayuktatāmudbhāvayannāha /
tatraitasmādidhyamānamindhanaṃ bhavatīti cet /
kenedhyatāmindhanaṃ tattāvanmātramidaṃ yadā 		de la gal te 'di snyam du /
bsreg bzhin bud shing yin sems na /
gang tshe de tsam de yin na /
gang gis bud shing de sreg byed /
yadi manyase jvālāparigato 'rtho dāhyalakṣaṇaḥ indhanam, tadāśrayaścāgniriti, evamapi parikalpyamāne indhanamagnirdahatīti nopapadyate ces bya ba gsungs te; gal te 'bar ba dang ldan pa'i don bsreg par bya ba'i mtshan nyid can ni bud shing yin la /
me ni de'i rten can yin no snyam du sems na /
de ltar brtags kyang /
mes bud shing bsreg go zhes bya ba mi 'thad de /
yasmāt /
kenedhyatāmindhanaṃ tattāvanmātramidaṃ yadā /
ihendhanamagnirdahatīti parikalpyamāne jvālāparigataṃ dāhyamindhanamiti, na caitadvayatirekeṇāparamagniṃ paśyāmo yenendhanaṃ dahyeta 		gang gi phyir /
gang tshe de tsam de yin na /
gang gis bud shing de sreg byed /
ces bya ba 'byung ngo /
gang tshe de tsam de yin na /
zhes bya ba ni gang gi tshe bsreg bzhin pa tsam zhig de yin pa na zhes bya ba'i don to /
'dir mes bud shing bsreg go zhes rtog pa na /
bud shing ni 'bar bar gyur pa bsreg par bya ba yin no zhes bya bar 'gyur ro zhe na /
yasmādetāvanmātramidamupalabhyate yaduta jvālāparigataṃ dāhyamātram /
yadā caitadvayatirikto nāstyagniḥ, tadā kena tadindhanaṃ dāhyatām? tāvanmātramidaṃ yadā, idhyamānamātramidaṃ yadetyarthaḥ 		'di las ma gtogs par gang gis bud shing sreg par byed pa'i me gzhan ni ma mthong ngo /
de'i phyir 'di tsam zhig tu gyur pa 'di nye bar dmigs te /
'di lta ste /
'bar bar gyur pa'i bsreg par bya ba tsam mo /
gang gi tshe de las tha dad pa'i me yod pa ma yin pa de'i tshe bud shing de gang gis sreg par byed /
tasmānnāgnirindhanaṃ dahati tadvayatiriktāgnyabhāvāt de'i phyir mes bud shing mi bsreg ste /
de las ma gtogs pa'i me med pa'i phyir ro /
yadā caivam, tadā kutaḥ kasyacijjvālāparigatiriti sa eva doṣo na vepate /
api ca /
anyatvābhyupagame 'gnīndhanayoridhyamānavyapadeśābhāvātkuta idhyamānamindhanam, kuto vā indhanamagnirdhakṣyatīti pratipādayannāha 		gang gi tshe de lta yin pa de'i tshe 'bar bar gyur pa 'ga' zhig kyang ga la yod de /
de'i phyir nyes pa de nyid bzlog tu med do /
gzhan yang me dang bud shing dag gzhan nyid du khas len na /
bsreg bzhin pa'i brjod pa med pas /
bsreg bzhin pa bud shing dug la 'gyur zhing /
mes bud shing bsreg par yang ga la 'gyur zhes bstan pa'i phyir /
anyo na prāpsyate 'prāpto na dhakṣyatyadahan punaḥ gzhan phyir mi phrad phrad med na /
sreg par mi 'gyur mi sreg na /
na nirvāsyatyanirvāṇaḥ sthāsyate vā svaliṅgavān 'chi bar mi 'gyur mi 'chi na /
rang rtags dang yang ldan par gnas /
zhes gsungs te /
yadi indhanādanyo 'gniḥ syāt, so 'nyatvādandhakāramivendhanaṃ na prāpnuyāt gal te bud shing las me gzhan du gyur na ni /
de gzhan yin pa'i phyir snang ba dang mun pa ltar bud shing dang phrad par mi 'gyur ro /
na ca dhakṣyati aprāptatvādviprakṛṣṭadeśāvasthitamivetyabhiprāyaḥ /
evaṃ ca idhyamānamindhanaṃ bhavatīti nopapannameva 		phrad pa med pa'i phyir bsreg par yang mi 'gyur te /
bskal pa'i yul na gnas pa bzhin no snyam du dgongs so /
de ltar na bsreg bzhin pa bud shing yin no zhes bya ba mi 'thad pa nyid do /
tataśca agnernirvāṇaṃ na syāt de'i phyir me 'chi bar mi 'gyur la /
anirvāṇaśca svaliṅgavāneva sthāsyati, pradīpta ityarthaḥ mi 'chi na yang rang gi rtags dang ldan pa nyid du gnas par 'gyur te /
rab tu 'bar zhing zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go /
vāśabdo 'vadhāraṇe draṣṭavyo vikalpārtho vā yang gi sgra ni rang gi rtags dang ldan pa kho nar gnas par 'gyur ba'am /
svaliṅgavāneva agniḥ sthāsyati, yadi vā nāstyanyatvamagnerindhanāditi yang na bud shing las me gzhan du gyur pa nyid med do zhes nges par bzung ba 'am rnam par rtog pa'i don du blta bar bya'o /
samuccaye vā /
anyo na prāpsyati na dhakṣyati na ca nirvāsyati svaliṅgavāṃśca sthāsyati /
tasmādayuktamindhanādanyatvamagneḥ 		yang na gzhan yin pa'i phyir mi phrad pa dang phrad pa med na bsreg par mi 'gyur ba dang mi bsreg na 'chi bar mi 'gyur ba dang mi 'chi na rang gi rtags dang yang ldan par 'gyur ro zhes bsdu bar bya ba'i phyir ro /
de'i phyir bud shing las me gzhan nyid du yang mi rigs so /
atrāha /
ayuktamagnīndhanayoranyatvam, yasmānna prāpsyate 'prāpto na dhakṣyatyadahan punarityādi, tadayuktam 		'dir smras pa /
me dang bud shing dag gzhan yin na gzhan phyir mi phrad phrad med na /
bsreg par mi 'gyur zhes bya ba la sogs pa gang smras pa de ni mi rigs te /
dṛṣṭā hi anyatve strīpuruṣayoḥ prāptiḥ, evamagnīndhanayorapi bhaviṣyatīti 'di ltar skyes pa dang bud med dag gzhan nyid yin yang phrad par mthong ba yin la /
me dang bud shing dag kyang de bzhin du 'gyur ro /
ucyate /
anya evendhanādagnirindhanaṃ prāpnuyādyadi 		brjod par bya ste /
ji ltar bud med skyes pa dang /
skyes pa'ang bud med phrad pa bzhin /
strī saṃprāpnoti puruṣaṃ puruṣaśca striyaṃ yathā gal te shing las me gzhan na /
shing dang phrad par rung bar 'gyur /
syādetadevam, yadi strīpuruṣavatparasparānapekṣā agnīndhanayoḥ siddhiḥ syāt gal te me dang bud shing dag skyes pa dang bud med ltar /
phan tshun ltos pa med par grub par gyur na ni /
na tvastītyāha de de ltar 'gyur ba zhig na /
anya evendhanādagnirindhanaṃ kāmamāpnuyāt gyur pa ni ma yin no zhes gsungs pa ni /
agnīndhane yadi syātāmanyonyena tiraskṛte /
na tvevaṃ saṃbhavati yadindhananirapekṣo 'gniḥ syāt, agninirapekṣaṃ cendhanamiti /
tasmād dṛṣṭāntavaiyarthyam 		gal te me dang shing dag ni /
gcig gis gcig ni bsal gyur na /
shing las me gzhan nyid yin yang /
shing dang phrad par 'dod la rag /
ces bya ba ste bud shing la ltos pa med par me yod par 'gyur zhing /
me la mi ltos par bud shing yod par 'gyur pa gang yin pa de lta bu ni mi srid do /
de'i phyir dpe 'di ni don med pa yin te /
anyonyāpekṣādhīnajanmanāṃ satyanyatve yeṣāṃ prāptiḥ siddhā, teṣāmeva dṛṣṭāntatvenopādānaṃ nyāyyaṃ syāt gzhan nyid yin yang phan tshun ltos pa la rag las te /
skyes par gyur pa gang dag phrad par grub pa de dag nyid dpe nye bar dgod par rigs par 'gyur na /
te ca na saṃbhavantīti na yuktametadanyatve sati prāptirastīti de dag kyang yod pa ma yin pas /
gzhan nyid yin bzhin du phrad pa yod do zhes bya ba mi rigs so /
atrāha /
yadyapi agnīndhanayoḥ strīpuruṣavatparasparanirapekṣā siddhirnāsti, tathāpi parasparāpekṣā tāvadasti /
tataśca astyevāgnīndhanayoḥ svarūpasiddhiḥ parasparasāpekṣatvāt 		'dir smras pa /
gal te yang me dang bud shing dag la skyes pa dang bud med ltar phan tshun ltos pa med par grub pa med mod kyi /
de lta na yang phan tshun ltos pa ni re zhig yod pa yin no /
phan tshun ltos pa de'i phyir me dang bud shing dag gi rang gi ngo bo grub pa ni yod pa yin te /
na hi avidyamānayorvandhyāputraduhitroḥ parasparāpekṣatā dṛṣṭeti yod pa ma yin pa'i mo gsham gyi bu dang bu mo dag ni phan tshun ltos pa dang bcas pa nyid du ma mthong ngo /
ucyate /
evamapi /
yadīndhanamapekṣyāgnirapekṣyāgniṃ yadīndhanam /
kataratpūrvaniṣpannaṃ yadapekṣyāgnirindhanam /
asyendhanasya ayamagnirdāhakaḥ kartā, ityevaṃ yadi indhanamapekṣyāgnirvyavasthāpyate, asyāgneridamindhanaṃ karmetyevamagnimapekṣya yadīndhanam, tat kataradanayoḥ pūrvaniṣpannam? kimindhanaṃ yadapekṣyāgni syāt, uta agniryamapekṣyendhanaṃ syāt? tatra yadi indhanaṃ pūrvaniṣpannamiti kalpyate, tadayuktam, agninirapekṣasya anidhyamānasyendhanatvābhāvāt, tṛṇādeḥ sarvasya caiva indhanatvaprasaṅgāt 		brjod par bya ste /
de lta na yang /
gal te shing ltos me yin la /
gal te me ltos shing yin na /
gang ltos me dang shing 'gyur ba /
dang por grub pa gang zhig yin /
gal te me 'di ni bud shing 'di'i sreg par byed pa'i byed pa po yin no zhes de ltar bud shing la ltos nas mer rnam par 'jog cing /
gal te bud shing 'di ni me 'di'i las yin no zhes de ltar me la ltos te /
bud shing rnam par 'jog pa de'i tshe de gnyis las sngar grub pa gang zhig yin /
ci bud shing la ltos nas mer 'gyur ram /
'on te me la ltos te bud shing du 'gyur /
de la gal te bud shing dang por grub po zhes rtog na ni /
de ni mi rigs te me la ltos pa med cing bsreg bzhin pa ma yin pa ni bud shing nyid ma yin pa'i phyir dang rtsva la sogs pa thams cad kyang bud shing nyid du thal bar 'gyur ba'i phyir ro /
ci ste dang por me yin la phyis bud shing yin no zhe na /
atha pūrvamagniḥ paścādindhanamiti, tadapyayuktam, indhanātpūrvasiddhasyāgnerasaṃbhavāt, nirhetukatvaprasaṅgāt /
paścāccāpekṣayā niṣprayojanatvāt /
tasmānnāsti atra kiṃcitpūrvasiddhaṃ yadapekṣya itarasya siddhi syāt 		de yang rigs pa ma yin te /
bud shing las sngar grub pa'i me med pa'i phyir dang rgyu med pa nyid du thal bar 'gyur ba'i phyir dang phyis ltos pa dgos pa med pa'i phyir ro /
de'i phyir 'dir gang la ltos nas cig shos 'grub par 'gyur ba dang por grub pa gang yang med do /
athāpi manyase /
pūrvamindhanaṃ paścādagniriti, evamapi 		ci ste yang sngar bud shing yin la phyis me yin no snyam du sems na /
yadīndhanamapekṣyāgniragneḥ siddhasya sādhanam de lta na yang /
gal te shing ltos me yin na /
bhaviṣyati /
yadi indhanamapekṣyāgnirbhaviṣyatīti parikalpyate, evaṃ tarhi siddhasya sato 'gneḥ punarapi sādhanaṃ syāt /
vidyamānasyaiva padārthasya siddharūpasyāpekṣā yujyate 		me grub pa la sgrub par 'gyur /
gal te bud shing la ltos nas mer 'gyur ro zhes rtog na /
de ltar na 'o na me grub zin pa la yang bsgrub par 'gyur te /
dngos po yod cing grub pa'i ngo bo can kho na ltos par rigs kyi /
na hi avidyamāno devadatto gṛhe kaṃcidapekṣate yod pa ma yin pa'i lha sbyin ni khyim 'ga' la yang ltos pa ma yin no /
evaṃ yadi agnirvidyamāno na syāt, nāsāvindhanamapekṣate gal te de ltar me yod par ma gyur na ni /
de bud shing la ltos par mi 'gyur ro /
tasmādastitvamagne rambhupeyam /
tadā ca kimasya indhanasyāpekṣayā punaḥ kartavyam? na hi siddho 'gniḥ punarindhanena kartavyo yadarthamindhanāpekṣāsāphalyaṃ syāt 		de'i phyir me yod par khas blang bar bya dgos la; de'i tshe na yang 'di bud shing la ltos pas ci zhig bya /
gang gi don du bud shing la ltos pa 'bras bu dang bcas par 'gyur ba grub zin pa'i me ni yang bud shing gis byar med do /
tasmādindhanamapekṣyāgnirbhavatīti na yuktam de'i phyir bud shing la ltos nas mer 'gyur ro zhes bya ba ni mi rigs so /
api ca /
yadi indhanamapekṣyāgnirbhavatīti parikalpyate 		gang yang gal te bud shing la brten nas mer 'gyur ro zhes rtog na /
de lta yin na /
evaṃ satīndhanaṃ cāpi bhaviṣyati niragnikam bud par bya ba'i shing la yang /
me med par ni 'gyur ba yin /
yadi indhanamasiddhaṃ syāt, naiva tadagninā apekṣyeta, asiddhasyāpekṣāyogāt /
tasmānniragnikasyendhanasya siddhirabhyupeyā, na caivametaditi na yuktametaditi 		gal te bud shing grub par ma gyur na ni de la me mi ltos pa nyid de /
ma grub pa la ltos pa mi rung ba'i phyir ro /
de'i phyir bud shing me med par grub par khas blang bar bya bar 'gyur na de ni de lta bu yang ma yin no /
atha matam /
yaugapadyenaiva indhanasiddhayā agnisiddhiḥ, agnisiddhayā ca indhanasiddiḥ 		de'i phyir 'di ni yod pa ma yin no /
ci ste dus gcig kho nar bud shing 'grub pas me 'grub cing /
me 'grub pas kyang bud shing 'grub par 'gyur te /
tataśca ekasyāpi pūrvasiddhayanabhyupagamāt, tatra yaduktam de'i phyir /
gcig kyang sngar grub par khas ma blangs pa'i phyir /
kataratpūrvaniṣpannaṃ yadapekṣyāgnirindhanam gang ltos me dang shing 'gyur ba /
dang por grub pa gang zhig yin /
iti, tadayuktamiti /
ucyate /
evamapīṣyamāṇe ubhayasyāpi nāsti siddhiḥ 		zhes smras pa gang yin pa de mi rigs so zhes 'dod na /
brjod par bya ste /
de ltar 'dod na ni yang gnyi ga grub pa yod pa ma yin te /
yasmāt 'di ltar /
yo 'pekṣya sidhyate bhāvastamevāpekṣya sidhyati gal te dngos po gang ltos 'grub /
de nyid la yang ltos nas ni /
yadi yo 'pekṣitavyaḥ sa sidhyatāṃ kamapekṣya kaḥ ltos bya gang yin de 'grub na /
gang la ltos nas gang zhig 'grub /
tatra yadi yaḥ agnyākhyo bhāvaḥ yamindhanākhyaṃ bhāvamapekṣya sidhyati, indhanākhyaśca bhāvaḥ yo 'gninā ātmasiddhayarthamapekṣitavyaḥ, sa yadi tameva agnyākhyaṃ padārthamapekṣya sidhyati, kathyatāmidānīṃ sidhyatāṃ kamapekṣya kaḥ iti /
yadā ca agnyabhāve sati indhanasya siddhireva nāsti, tadā akāraṇasyendhanasyābhāvāt kutastaddhetuko 'gniḥ prasetsyati? evaṃ ya indhanākhyo bhāvaḥ yamagnyākhyaṃ bhāvamapekṣya sidhyati, agnyākhyaśca bhāvo yaḥ indhanākhyena ātmasiddhayarthamapekṣitavyaḥ, sa yadi tamevendhanākhyaṃ bhāvamapekṣya sidhyati, kathyatāṃ kimidānīṃ sidhyatāṃ kamapekṣya kaḥ iti 		de la gal te me zhes bya ba'i dngos po gang zhig bud shing zhes bya ba'i dngos po gang zhig la ltos nas 'grub la /
bud shing zhes bya ba'i dngos po bdag nyid grub par bya ba'i phyir ltos par bya bar 'gyur ba gang yin pa de /
gal te me zhes bya ba'i dngos po gang zhig la ltos nas 'grub na /
da ni gang la ltos nas gang zhig 'grub par 'gyur ba smros shig /
gal te me med pa na bud shing 'grub pa nyid yod pa ma yin pa de'i tshe /
rgyu med pas bud shing med pa'i phyir de'i rgyu can gyi me 'grub par ga la 'gyur /
de bzhin du gal te bud shing zhes bya ba'i dngos po gang zhig /
me zhes bya ba'i dngos po gang zhig la ltos nas 'grub la /
me zhes bya ba'i dngos po bud shing gi bdag nyid 'grub par bya ba'i phyir /
ltos par bya bar grub pa gang yin pa de yang gal te bud shing zhes bya ba'i dngos po de nyid ltos nas 'grub na /
da ni gang la ltos nas gang zhig 'grub par 'gyur ba brjod par bya dgos so /
yadā hi indhanābhāve sati agneḥ siddhirnāsti, tadā niṣkāraṇasyāgnerabhāvāt kutastaddhetukamindhanam? gal te bud shing med pa na me 'grub pa nyid yod pa ma yin pa de'i tshe rgyu med pas me med pa'i phyir de'i rgyu can gyi bud shing yod par ga la 'gyur /
itaśca agnīndhanayoḥ parasparāpekṣayāpi siddhirasatī, siddhāsiddhayorapekṣābhāvāditi pratipādayannāha 'di'i phyir yang me dang bud shing dag phan tshun ltos nas grub pa med de /
grub pa dang ma grub pa dag ltos pa ma yin pa'i phyir ro zhes bstan pa'i phyir gsungs pa /
yo 'pekṣya sidhyate bhāvaḥ so 'siddho 'pekṣate katham dngos po ltos grub gang yin pa /
de ma grub na ji ltar ltos /
athāpyapekṣate siddhastvapekṣāsya na yujyate ci ste grub pa ltos shen /
de ni ltos par mi rigs so /
yo hi agnyākhyo bhāvaḥ indhanākhyaṃ bhāvamapekṣya sidhyati, saḥ asiddho vā indhanamapekṣate siddho vā? yadi asiddhaḥ, tadā asiddhatvāt kharaviṣāṇavannendhanamapekṣeta me zhes bya ba'i dngos po bud shing zhes bya ba'i dngos po la ltos nas grub pa gang yin pa de ma grub pa'am grub pa zhig bud shing la ltos grang /
gal te ma grub pa zhig yin na ni /
de'i tshe ma grub pa'i phyir /
bud shing la mi ltos te bong bu'i rva bzhin no /
atha siddhaḥ, siddhatvāt kimasyendhanāpekṣayā? na hi siddhaṃ punarapi sādhyate vaiyarthyāt ci ste grub pa yin na ni grub pa'i phyir de ltos ci dgos te /
don med par 'gyur ba'i phyir grub zin pa yin yang bsgrub par bya ba ma yin no /
evamindhane 'pi vācyam de bzhin du bud shing la yang brjod par bya'o /
tasmānnāgnīndhanayoḥ parasparāpekṣayā yaugapadyena vā siddhiriti de'i phyir me dang bud shing dag phan tshun ltos par ram /
dus gcig tu grub pa med do /
yataścaivam, tasmāt gang gi phyir de lta yin pa de'i phyir /
apekṣyendhanamagnirna shing la ma ltos pa'i me med de zhes bya ba'o /
atha syāt /
anapekṣyāgnistarhi bhaviṣyatīti 		ci ste 'o na ma ltos par mer 'gyur ro snyam na /
'di yang mi rung ngo zhes gsungs pa ni /
etadapi na yuktamityāha shing la ma ltos me yang med /
nānapekṣyāgnirindhanam /
anyatvapratiṣedhādahetukatvaprasaṅgācca 		ces bya ba ste /
gzhan nyid bkag zin pa'i phyir dang rgyu med pa nyid du thal bar 'gyur ba'i phyir ro /
yathā ca agnirapekṣya vā anapekṣya vā indhanaṃ saṃbhavati, evamindhanamapītyāha ji ltar bud shing la ltos pa'am /
ma ltos pa'i me med pa de bzhin du bud shing yang yin no zhes gsungs pa ni /
apekṣyendhanamagniṃ na nānapekṣyāgnimindhanam me la ltos pa'i shing med de /
me la ma ltos shing yang med /
etacca anantarameva gatārthatvānna punarucyate /
atrāha /
kimanayā asmākamatisūkṣmekṣikayā prayojanam, ye vayaṃ brūmaḥ 		ces bya ba ste /
'di'i don ni thal ma thag tu go bar zad pa nyid kyis na yang mi brjod do /
'dir smras pa dpyad pa shin tu phra mo 'dis kho bo cag la ci dgos te /
yasmādagninā idhyamānamindhanaṃ pratyakṣata upalabhyate, tasmātte eva agnīndhane iti gang gi phyir kho bo cag ni mngon sum gyi bud shing mes bsreg bzhin pa dmigs pa de'i phyir me dang bud shing dag yod do zhes bya ba 'di tsam zhig smra'o zhe na /
ucyate /
syādetadevam, yadi agnirindhanaṃ dahet 		brjod par bya ste /
gal te mes bud shing bsregs na de de ltar 'gyur na /
yadi indhane 'gniḥ saṃbhavet, sa indhanaṃ dahet sreg pa ni ma yin te 'di ltar gal te /
shing la me yod na ni des bud shing sreg par 'gyur na /
na tu saṃbhavatītyāha yod pa ni ma yin no zhes gsungs pa /
āgacchatyanyato nāgnirindhane 'gnirna vidyate me ni gzhan las mi 'ong ste /
shing la'ang me ni yod ma yin /
indhanavyatiriktāttāvatkutaścidanyato 'gnerāgamanaṃ nāsti, tasya adṛṣṭatvāt re zhig me ni bud shing ma gtogs par gzhan 'ga' zhig las 'ong ba med de /
de ma mthong ba'i phyir dang /
nirindhanasya cāhetukasyāgnerāgamanābhāvāt, sendhanasya cāgamane prayojanābhāvāt, tatrāpi cendhane tulyaparyanuyogāt, anavasthāprasaṅgācca āgacchatyanyato nāgniḥ rgyu med pas bud shing dang bral ba'i me la 'ong ba med pa'i phyir dang bud shing dang bcas pa 'ong ba la dgos pa med pa'i phyir dang der yang bud shing dang brgal zhing brtag pa mtshungs pas thug pa med par thal bar 'gyur ba'i phyir te /
me ni gzhan las mi 'ong ste /
zhes bya ba'o /
tathā indhane 'pyagnirna saṃbhavati tatrānupalabhyamānatvāt /
atha syāt 		de bzhin du /
shing la yang me yod pa ma yin te /
de la ma dmigs pa'i phyir ro; /
vidyamānasyāpi mūlodakādivadabhivyañjakapratyayavaikalyātpūrvamanupalabhyamānatvam, araṇinigharṣaṇādabhivyañjakapratyayasaṃbhavāttu paścādupalabdhiriti /
idameva tāvatsaṃpradhāryate /
kiṃ punarmūlodakādīnāmabhivyañjakaiḥ pratyayaiḥ kriyata iti /
tatra svarūpaṃ tāvanna kriyate vidyamānatvāt abhivyaktiḥ kriyata iti cet, keyamabhivyaktirnāma? prakāśateti cet, evaṃ tarhi saiva kriyate pūrvamavidyamānatvādasyāḥ 		ci ste rtsa ba dang chu la sogs pa ltar yod du zin kyang mngon par gsal bar byed pa'i rkyen ma tshang bas sngar dmigs par ma gyur bzhin du phyis gtsub shing gtsubs pa la sogs pa /
mngon par gsal bar byad pa'i rkyen yod pa las dmigs pa yin no snyam na /
ci ste rtsa ba dang chu la sogs pa rnams la mngon par gsal bar byed pa'i rkyen dag gis ci zhig byed ces 'di nyid re zhig dpyad par bya'o /
de la re zhig rang gi ngo bo ni mi byed de yod par gyur pa'i phyir ro /
mngon par gsal bar byed do zhe na /
mngon par gsal ba zhes bya ba 'di ci zhig gsal ba'o /
de la na ni /
'o na de sngar yod pa ma yin pa'i phyir de nyid byed par 'gyur la /
de lta na rgyu la 'bras bu yod par smra ba btang bar 'gyur te /
sngar mngon par gsal ba med pa'i phyir dang phyis yod pa'i phyir ro /
rang gi ngo bo skye ba'i rkyen la ltos pa med pa'i phyir mngon par gsal ba rkyen la ltos pa nyid du yang mi 'gyur te /
satkāryavādatyāgaścaivaṃ jāyate abhivyakteḥ pūrvamavidyamānatvātpaścācca bhāvāt nam mkha'i me tog bzhin no /
gzhan yang mngon par gsal ba 'di ni dngos po mngon par gsal bar gyur pa'am /
svarūpasya cotpattipratyayanirapekṣatvātkhapuṣpavadabhivyaktipratyayasāpekṣatāpi na syāt mngon par gsal bar ma gyur pa 'ga' zhig la rtog pa zhig na /
de la re zhig mngon par gsal bar gyur pa gang yin pa de ni mngon par gsal bar bya ba ma yin no /
api ca iyamabhivyaktirabhivyaktasya vā bhāvasya parikalpyeta anabhivyaktasya vā? tatra tāvad yadabhivyaktaṃ tannābhivyajyate, tasyābhivyaktivaiyarthyāt aniṣṭadoṣaprasaṅgācca /
anabhivyaktamapi nābhivyajyate khapuṣpavadanabhivyaktatvāt 		de la mngon par gsal bar bya ba don med pa'i phyir dang thug pa med par thal bar 'gyur ba'i phyir ro /
mngon par gsal bar ma gyur pa yang mngon par gsal bar mi byed de /
mngon par gsal bar ma gyur pa'i phyir /
nam mkha'i me tog bzhin no /
ityevamabhivyaktirna saṃbhavati de ltar na mngon par gsal ba yod pa ma yin no /
athāpi syāt /
vidyamānasyaiva pratyayaiḥ sthaulyaṃ kriyate iti, evamapi yadeva sthaulyaṃ pūrvaṃ nāstīti tadeva kriyata iti kutaḥ sthaulyāpādanamabhivyaktiḥ? saukṣmyasya ca nirhetukasyāsaṃbhavāt kasya sthūlatāpādanādabhivyaktiḥ syāditi 		ci ste yang rkyen rnams kyis yod par gyur pa rags pa nyid du byed pa yin no snyam na /
de lta na yang rags pa nyid sngar med pas de nyid byed par 'gyur te /
de'i phyir rags pa nyid du byas pas mngon par gsal bar ga la 'gyur /
phra ba nyid kyang rgyu med pas med pa'i phyir /
ci zhig rags par byas pa las mngon par gsal bar 'gyur /
tadevaṃ sarvathā indhane agnerna saṃbhava iti indhane 'gnirna vidyate de'i phyir de ltar rnam pa thams cad du bud shing la me mi srid pa'i phyir /
shing la'ang me ni yod ma yin /
na cāvidyamānāgninā indhanasya dahanamupajāyate ityasatyamevaitadupalabhate bhavān zhes bya ba'o /
yod pa ma yin pa'i mes ni bud shing sreg pa yang mi 'thad pas /
'di ni khyod kyis mi bden pa zhig mthong ba yin no /
api ca /
yathā pūrvaṃ gatāgatagamyamānānāṃ dūṣaṇamuktam 		gzhan yang song ba dang ma song ba dang bgom pa dag la sun 'byin pa sngar bshad pa ji lta ba /
atrendhane śeṣamuktaṃ gamyamānagatāgataiḥ /
agninā indhanaṃ dahyamānamupalabhyate ityatra indhanaprastāve śeṣaṃ dūṣaṇaṃ gamyamānagatāgatadūṣaṇena veditavyam, uktapāṭhaviparyayeṇa 		de bzhin shing gi lhag ma ni /
song dang ma song bgom pas bstan /
bud shing mes sreg bzhin pa dmigs so zhes bya ba'i bud shing 'di'i ste; bud shing gi skabs kyi sun 'byin lhag ma ni /
dagdhaṃ na dahyate tāvadadagdhaṃ naiva dahyate /
dagdhādagdhavinirmuktaṃ dahyamānaṃ na dahyate 		re zhig bsregs pa mi sreg ste /
ma bsregs pa la'ang sreg pa min /
bsregs dang ma bsregs ma gtogs pa'i /
ityādinā /
yata evam, ato nāstyagninā indhanasya dahanamiti veditavyam /
idānīṃ yathopapāditamarthaṃ nigamayannāha /
indhanaṃ punaragnirna nāgniranyatra cendhanāt /
nāgnirindhanavānnāgnāvindhanāni na teṣu saḥ /
tatra /
yadindhanaṃ sa cedagnirekatvaṃ kartṛkarmaṇoḥ /
bhavet, ityanena agnīndhanayorakatvapratiṣedhāt 		bsreg bzhin shes par mi 'gyur ro /
zhes bya ba la sogs pas bstan zin pa'i phyir 'don pa bzlog pa'i sgo nas song ba dang ma song ba dang bgom pa'i sun 'byin pa dang mtshungs par rig par bya'o /
gang gi phyir de lta yin pa de'i phyir bud shing mes bsreg pa yod pa ma yin no zhes bya bar rig par bya'o /
da ni ji skad bstan pa'i don gyi mjug bsdu ba'i phyir /
shing nyid mo ni ma yin te /
shing las gzhan la me yang med /
me ni shing dang ldan ma yin /
me la shing med der de med /
ces bya ba gsungs so /
de la /
bud shing gang de me yin na /
byed pa po dang las gcig 'gyur /
zhes bya ba 'dis me dang bud shing dag gcig nyid yin pa bkag pa'i phyir /
indhanaṃ punaragnirna, shing nyid me ni ma yin te /
zhes bya'o /
anyaścedindhanādagnirindhanādapyṛte bhavet gal te shing las me gzhan na /
shing med par yang 'byung bar 'gyur /
ityādinā anyatvasya pratiṣedhāt zhes bya ba la sogs pas gzhan yin pa bkag pa'i phyir /
nāgniranyatra cendhanāt shing las gzhan la me yang med do /
tattvānyatvobhayapakṣapratiṣedhādeva tadvatpakṣādhārādheyapakṣāṇāmapyarthataḥ pratiṣiddhatvāttānapi nigamayannāha de nyid dang gzhan nyid kyi phyogs gnyi ga bkag pa nyid kyis na de dang ldan pa dang rten dang brten pa'i phyogs dag kyang /
don gyis bkag pa'i phyir de dag kyang mjug bsdu ba'i phyir /
nāgnirindhanavānnāgnāvindhanāni na teṣu saḥ me ni shing dang ldan ma yin /
me la shing med der de med /
iti /
tatrāgnirindhanavānna bhavati 		ces bya ba gsungs so /
de la me ni shing dang ldan pa ma yin no /
indhanamasyāsmin vā vidyata iti vyatirekeṇa vā vyutpādena avyatirekeṇa vā /
tatra vyatirekeṇa 		'di'i lam 'di la bud shing yod do zhes tha dad pa'am /
tha mi dad par bye brag tu 'chad grang na de la tha dad par ni /
tadyathā gomān devadattaḥ /
avyatirekeṇa 		dper na lha sbyin ba glang dang ldan no zhes bya ba lta bu yin la /
buddhimān devadatto rūpavānityādi /
agnīndhanayośca pakṣadvayasyāpi pratiṣiddhatvādindhanavānagniriti pratiṣedho vihitaḥ 		tha mi dad par ni lha sbyin blo dang ldan no /
lha sbyin gzugs dang ldan no zhes bya ba la sogs pa lta bu yin na /
me dang bud shing dag la phyogs gnyi ga yang bkag pa'i phyir /
anyacca /
kuṇḍaṃ dadhna ādhāratāṃ pratipadyate /
na cendhanādanyatvamagnerastīti nāgnāvindhanānīti yujyate 		me shing dang ldan no zhes bya ba'ang bkag pa byas pa yin no /
gzhan du gyur ba'i 'khar gzhong ni rgya shug rnams kyi rten nyid du rtog na /
me la ni bud shing las gzhan pa nyid kyang yod pa ma yin pas /
me la shing med ces bya bar rigs so /
nāpi indhane 'styagniḥ, anyatvapratiṣedhāditi /
evamādhārādheyatāpratiṣedho 'pyarthata upapādita eva 		bud shing la yang me med de gzhan nyid bkag pa nyid kyi phyir ro /
de ltar na rten dang brten pa nyid bkag pa yang don gyis bstan pa nyid yin no /
yathā cāgniḥ pañcadhā vicāryamāṇo na saṃbhavati, evamātmāpi, ityatidiśannāha ji ltar rnam pa lngar rnam par brtags pa na /
me yod pa ma yin pa de bzhin du bdag kyang yin no zhes bsgre ba'i phyir /
agnīndhanābhyāṃ vyākhyāta ātmopādānayoḥ kramaḥ me dang shing gis bdag dang ni /
nye bar len pa'i rim pa kun /
sarvo niravaśeṣeṇa /
tatra upādīyate ityupādānaṃ pañcopādānaskandhāḥ /
yastānupādāya prajñapyate, sa upādātā grahītā niṣpādaka ātmetyucyate /
ahaṃkāraviṣayatvādāhita utpādito 'haṃmāno 'sminniti 		bum snam sogs dang lhan cig tu /
ma lus par ni rnam par bshad /
ces gsungs so /
de la nye bar blang bar bya bas na /
nye bar len pa ste nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga'o /
de dag la nye bar brten nas brtags pa /
nye bar len pa po /
'dzin pa po /
sgrub par byed pa po gang yin pa de ni bdag tu 'dzin pa'i yul yin pa'i phyir 'di la bdag tu nga rgyal bzhag cing bskyed pas na bdag ces bya'o /
tadasyātmana upādānasya ca yaḥ kramaḥ siddhiḥ, sa sarvo 'gnīndhanābhyāṃ vyākhyāto 'vagantavyo niravaśeṣeṇa de'i phyir /
bdag de dang nye bar len pa'i grub pa'i rim pa de thams cad ma lus par me dang bud shing dag gis rnam par bshad par khong du chud par bya'o /
kaḥ punaḥ sarvasya niravaśeṣasya ca bhedaḥ? sarvagrahaṇenaiva pañca pakṣāḥ samanantaraprakrānta abhisaṃbadhyante /
sarve ete pañcāpi pakṣāḥ agnīndhanavadātmopādānayorapyavikalā ḍhaukanīyāḥ /
yaścaiyā pratipādane upapattikramaḥ prāgupavarṇitaḥ, tena niravaśeṣeṇa ātmopādānayoḥ pratiṣedho veditavyaḥ ityanena sarvātmanā pratiṣedhasāmyamagnīndhanābhyāmātmopādānayorveditavyamityupadarśanārthaṃ sarvo nirava śeṣeṇetyāha /
tatra yadevopādānaṃ sa eva ātmā, ityevaṃ kartṛkarmaṇorekatvaprasaṅgānna yujyate nāpyanyadupādānamanya upādātā, skandhavyatirekeṇāpyātmopalabdhiprasaṅgāt, paratra nirapekṣatvādityādiprasaṅgācca /
ekatvānyatvapratiṣedhācca skandhavānaṣyātmā na bhavati 		yang kun dang ma lus pa la khyad par ci lta yod ce na /
kun smos pa ni thal ma thag pa'i phyogs lnga po sbyor bar byed pa yin te /
phyogs lnga po de dag thams cad kyang ma tshang ba med par me dang bud shing ltar bdag dang nye bar len pa gnyis la yang sbyar bar bya'o /
'di dag ston pa la 'thad pa'i tshul sngar brjod pa gang yin pa de yang ma lus pas bdag dang nye bar len pa dag dgag par rig par bya'o /
bdag dang nye bar len pa dag dgag pa me dang bud shing dag dang bdag nyid thams cad kyis mtshungs pa ni 'di gnyis kyi sgo nas yin par rig par bya'o zhes bstan par bya ba'i phyir /
rim pa kun /
ma lus par ni zhes bshad do /
de la nye bar len pa gang yin pa de nyid bdag nyid yin no zhes bya ba de lta bu ni mi rigs te /
byed pa po dang las dag gcig nyid du thal bar 'gyur ba'i phyir ro /
nye bar len pa gzhan la nye bar len pa po gzhan ma yang ma yin te /
bdag phung po las tha dad par yang dmigs par thal bar 'gyur ba'i phyir dang gzhan la ltos pa med pa'i phyir zhes bya ba la sogs par thal bar 'gyur ba'i phyir ro /
gcig nyid dang gzhan nyid bkag pa'i phyir bdag phung po dang ldan pa yang ma yin no /
anyatvābhāvācca nātmani skandhā na skandheṣvātmā /
yata evaṃ pañcasu prakāreṣu ātmano na sattvam, tasmātkarmakārakavadeva ātmopādānayoḥ parasparāpekṣikī siddhiriti sthitam 		gzhan nyid med pa'i phyir bdag la phung po dag yod pa dang phung po dag la bdag yod pa yang ma yin no /
gang gi phyir de ltar rnam pa lngar bdag yod pa nyid ma yin pa de'i phyir /
las dang byed pa po ltar bdag dang nye bar len pa gnyis phan tshun ltos pa'i grub pa yin no zhes bya bar gnas so /
yaścāyamātmopādānayoḥ kramaḥ, sa nānayoreva, kiṃ tarhi bdag dang nye bar len pa dag gi rim pa gang yin pa de yang de gnyis kho na'i ma yin te /
'o na ci zhe na /
sārdhaṃ ghaṭapaṭādibhiḥ bum snam sogs dang lhan cig tu /
zhes gsungs te /
niravaśeṣaiḥ padārthaiḥ sarvathā vyākhyāto veditavyaḥ dngos po ma lus pa dag dang lhan cig tu rnam pa thams cad rnam par bshad par rig par bya'o /
ghaṭādayo hi kāryakāraṇabhūta avayavāvayavibhūtā lakṣaṇalakṣyabhūtā guṇnaguṇibhūtā vā syuḥ bum pa la sogs pa ni rgyu dang 'bras bur gyur ba'am /
yan lag dang yan lag can du gyur pa'am /
mtshan nyid dang mtshan gzhir gyur pa'am /
yon tan dang yon tan can du gyur pa dag yin te /
tatra mṛddaṇḍacakrasūtrasalilakulālakaravyāyāmādayo ghaṭasya kāraṇabhūtāḥ, ghaṭaḥ kāryabhūtaḥ de la 'jim pa dang dbyu gu dang 'khor lo dang skud pa dang chu dang rdza mkhan gyi lag pa'i rtsol ba la sogs pa rnams ni bum pa'i rgyur gyur pa yin la /
bum pa ni 'bras bur gyur pa'o /
kapālādayo nīlādayo vā avayavabhūtāḥ ghaṭo 'vayavī dum bu la sogs pa'am /
sngon po la sogs pa dag ni yan lag tu gyur pa yin la /
bum pa ni yan lag can yin no /
pṛthubudhnalambauṣṭhadīrghagrīvatvādīni lakṣaṇāni ghaṭo lakṣyaḥ /
śyāmatvādayo guṇāḥ, ghaṭo guṇī 		lto ba yangs pa dang mchu 'phyang ba dang kha g yel ba dang mgul ba ring ba nyid la sogs pa rnams ni mtshan nyid yin la /
bum pa ni mtshan gzhi'o /
sngo bsangs nyid la sogs pa dag ni yon tan yin la /
ityevaṃ vyavasthāpya agnīndhanavat kramo yojyaḥ /
eṣāṃ ca ghaṭādīnāmātmopādānayośca madhyamakāvatāraprakaraṇād vyākhyānamavaseyam 		bum pa ni yon tan can yin no zhes de ltar rnam par gzhag pa la yang me dang bud shing ltar rim par rnam par sbyar bar bya'o /
bum pa la sogs pa rnams dang bdag dang nye bar len pa dag rnam par bshad pa ni dbu ma la 'jug pa las nges par bya'o /
tadevaṃ karmakārakavadātmopādānayorghaṭādīnāṃ ca parasparāpekṣikyāṃ siddhau vyavasthitāyāṃ tathāgatavacanāviparītārthāvabodhābhimānitayā tīrthyamatopakalpitapadārthavyavasthāṃ saugatapravacanārthatvenopanīya atimūḍhatayā de'i phyir de ltar las dang byed pa po ltar bdag dang nye bar len pa dang bum pa la sogs pa rnams phan tshun ltos pa'i grub pa yin par rnam par gzhag la de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung rab kyi don phyin ci ma log pa yin par mngon par rlom pa nyid kyis /
mu stegs pa'i gzhung lugs kyis nye bar brtags pa'i don gyi rnam par gzhag pa /
bde bar gshegs pa'i gsung rab las khong du chud pa'i don nyid du gcus nas /
shin tu blun pa nyid kyis na /
ātmanaśca satattvaṃ ye bhāvānāṃ ca pṛthakpṛthak gang dag bdag dang dngos po rnams /
de bcas nyid dang tha dad par /
nirdiśanti na tānmanye śāsanasyārthakovidān /
tatra saha tena vartata iti satat, satato bhāvaḥ satattvam, apṛthaktvam, ananyatvam ekatvamityarthaḥ 		ston pa de dag bstan don la /
mkhas so snyam du mi sems so /
de la de dang lhan cig tu 'jug pas na de bcas so /
de dang bcas pa'i dngos po nyid ni de bcas nyid de /
tha mi dad pa rang gzhan ma yin pa dang gcig nyid ces bya ba'i don to /
tadetat satattvaṃ ye varṇayanti, na tānācāryaḥ śāsanārthapaṇḍitān manyate gang dag de bcas nyid der smra ba de dag ni bstan pa'i don la mkhas par slob dpon mi dgongs so /
tadyathā 'di lta ste /
ātmā upādānena prajñapyate yena, sahaiva tenopādānena saṃbhavati /
sa na pṛthak 		nye bar len pa gang gis bdag tu 'dogs pa'i nye bar len pa de dang de lhan cig pa nyid du yod de /
avyatirekeṇaiva bhavatītyarthaḥ /
evaṃ yena kāraṇena mṛdādinā ghaṭaḥ prajñapyate, tadavyatirekeṇaiva sa bhavati, na pṛthak 		so so ma yin zhing tha mi dad par yod par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i tha tshig yin pa dang de bzhin du 'jim pa la sogs pa'i rgyu gang gis bum par 'dogs pa de dang der tha mi dad pa nyid du yod pa yin gyi /
evamātmano bhāvānāṃ ca satattvaṃ ye varṇayanti, na te paramagambhīrasya pratītyasamutpādastha śāśvatocchedarahitasya upādāyaprajñaptyabhidhānasya tattvaṃ paśyanti so sor ni ma yin pa de ltar gang dag bdag dang dngos po rnams de dang bcas pa nyid du smra ba de dag ni /
rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba mchog tu zab pa /
rtag pa dang chad pa dang bral ba /
brten nas gdags pa'i ming can gyi de kho na nyid mthong ba ma yin no /
pṛthak pṛthak ca ye nirdiśanti, pṛthagityātmānam, pṛthagupādānam, pṛthak kāryam, pṛthak kāraṇam, ityādinā anyatvaṃ paśyanti, amūnapi na śāsanasyārthakovidānācāryo manyate /
yathoktam 		gang dag bdag kyang gzhan la nye bar len pa yang gzhan /
'bras bu yang gzhan rgyu yang gzhan no zhes bya ba la sogs pas so so so sor ston par byed cing gzhan nyid du mthong ba de dag bstan pa'i don la mkhas par slob dpon ni mi dgongs so /
ji skad du /
ekatvānyatvarahitaṃ pratiśrutkopamaṃ jagat 'gro ba sgra brnyan dang 'dra bar /
gcig nyid gzhan nyid dang bral zhing /
saṃkrāntimāsādya gataṃ buddhavāṃstvamaninditaḥ 'pho dang 'jig pa dang bral bar /
smad med khyod kyis thugs su chud /
ces bshad pa lta bu'o /
evaṃ ca agnīndhanaparīkṣayā adhigatadharmatattvaparamasya yoginaḥ kalpenākālālipsitairapi naiva vapurdahyate rāgadveṣamohahutāśanairapi vā iti de ltar rnal 'byor pa me dang bud shing brtag pas chos kyi de kho na nyid khong du chud pa'i lus ni dus mtha'i me dag gam /
nyon mongs pa 'dod chags dang zhe sdang dang gti mug gi me dag gis 'tshig pa ma yin no /
yathoktaṃ bhagavatā ji skad du /
bcom ldan 'das kyis /
yatha gagaṇu na jātu dagdhapūrvaṃ subahubhi kalpaśatairhi dahyamānam bskal pa brgya phrag mang por rab bsregs kyang /
nam mkha' sngon chad nam yang mi 'tshig bzhin /
gaganasama vijānamāna dharmān so 'pi na dahyati jātu sāgnimadhye chos rnams nam mkha' mtshungs par rnam rig pas /
de ni gzhan yang me nang yong mi 'tshig /
sarvi hi jvalamāṇi buddhakṣetre praṇidhi karoti samādhiye sthihitvā gal te sangs rgyas zhing rnams 'bar gyur la /
'bar ba 'di dag ma lus zhi shog ces /
jvalata ayu praśāmyatāmaśeṣa pṛthivi vinaśyipi naivasyānyathātvam ting 'dzin gnas nas smon lam 'di btab pa /
sa rnams zhig kyang de la 'gyur ba med /
ces gsungs pa lta bu'o /
tathā /
araṇiṃ yatha cottarāraṇiṃ hastavyāyāmu trayebhi saṃgatiḥ 		de bzhin du /
ji ltar gtsub shing dang ni gtsub stan dang /
lag pa'i rtsol ba 'di gsum 'dus pa yi /
iti pratyayato 'gni jāyate jātu kṛtu kārya laghū nirudhyate rkyen 'di dag las me ni 'byung 'gyur zhing /
byung ste bya ba byas nas myur du 'gag /
atha paṇḍitu kaści mārgate kuta ayamāgatu kutra yāti vā de nas 'di ni gang nas 'ongs sam gar /
song zhes mkhas pa gang zhig tshol bar byed /
vidiśo diśa sarvi mārgato nāgatirnāsya gatiśca labhyati phyogs dang phyogs mtshams kun tu btsal ba dang /
'di yi 'gro dang 'ong ba rnyed min bzhin /
skandhāyatanāni dhātavaḥ śūnya ādhyātmika śūnya bāhirāḥ phung po dag dang skye mched khams rnams ni /
nang yang stong la phyi rol stong pa ste /
sarvātmaviviktanālayā dharma ākāśasabhāvalakṣaṇāḥ thams cad bdag gis dben zhing gnas med la /
chos kyi mtshan nyid nam mkha'i ngo bo nyid /
imu īdṛśa dharmalakṣaṇā buddha dīpaṃkaradarśane tvayā chos kyi mtshan nyid 'di 'dra 'di dag ni /
mar me mdzad pa mthong nas khyod kyis rtogs /
anubuddha yatha tvayātmanā tatha bodhehi sadevamānuṣān ji ltar nyid kyis rjes su rtogs pa ltar /
de bzhin lha mir bcas pas rtogs par gyis /
viparītaabhūtakalpitai rāgadoṣaiḥ paridahyate jagat log pa yang dag ma yin brtags pa yi /
'dod chags zhe sdang dag gis 'gro ba gdungs /
kṛpameghaśamāmbuśītalāṃ muñca dhārāmamṛtasya nāyaka thugs rje'i sprin las zhi ba bsil ba'i chu /
'dren pa bdud rtsi'i rgyun ni rab tu phob /
iti vistaraḥ /
ityācāryacandrakīrtipādoparacitāyāṃ prasannapadāyāṃ madhyamakavṛttau agnīndhanaparīkṣā nāma daśamaṃ prakaraṇam /
pūrvāparakoṭiparīkṣā ekādaśamaṃ prakaraṇam 		ces bya ba la sogs pa gsungs so /
slob dpon zla ba grags pa'i zhal snga nas sbyar ba'i tshig gsal ba las /
me dang bud shing brtag pa zhes bya ba rab tu byed pa bcu pa'i 'grel pa'o /
atrāha /
vidyata eva ātmā, saṃsārasadbhāvāt 		'dir smras pa /
bdag ni yod pa nyid de /
'khor ba yod pa'i phyir ro /
yadi hi ātmā na syāt, kasya pañcagatike ājavaṃjavībhāvena janmamaraṇaparaṃparayā saṃsaraṇaṃ syāt? uktaṃ hi bhagavatā gal te bdag yod par ma gyur na ni /
'gro ba lnga'i 'khor bar 'gro ba dang 'ong ba'i ngo bor skye ba dang 'chi ba gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pas gang zhig 'khor bar 'gyur /
anavarāgro hi bhikṣavo jātijarāmaraṇasaṃsāraḥ iti bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang /
dge slong dag skye ba dang rga shi'i 'khor ba ni thog ma dang tha ma med do /
avidyānīvaraṇānāṃ sattvānāṃ tṛṣṇāsaṃyojanānāṃ tṛṣṇāgaṇḍurabaddhānāṃ saṃsaratāṃ saṃdhāvatāṃ pūrvā koṭirna prajñāyata iti sems can ma rig pa'i sgrib pa dang ldan pa /
sred pa'i kun tu sbyor ba can /
sred pa'i lu gu rgyud kyis bcings pa /
'khor zhing rgyug pa rnams kyi sngon gyi mtha' mi mngon no zhes gsungs so /
yadā ca bhagavadupadeśātsaṃsāro 'sti, tadā saṃsartāpyasti /
sa ca ātmā ucyata iti 		gang gi tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis bstan pas 'khor ba yod pa de'i tshe 'khor ba po yang yod la /
de la yang bdag ces bya'o /
ucyate /
syādātmā, yadā saṃsāra eva syāt /
katham? yasmādasya 		brjod par bya ste /
gal te 'khor ba nyid yod na /
bdag kyang yod par 'gyur na yod pa ni ma yin no /
'di ltar /
pūrvā prajñāyate koṭirnetyuvāca mahāmuniḥ sngon mtha' sngon nam zhes zhus tshe /
thub pa chen pos min zhes gsungs /
saṃsāro 'navarāgro hi nāsyādirnāpi paścimam 'khor ba thog ma mtha' med de /
de la sngon med phyi ma med /
koṭirbhāgo deśa iti paryāyāḥ /
pūrvā koṭiḥ pūrvo deśa ityarthaḥ 		mtha' dang cha dang cha shas zhes bya ba rnams ni rnam grangs so /
sngon gyi mtha' ni sngon gyi cha zhes bya ba'i don to /
yadi hi saṃsāro nāma kaścit syāt, niyataṃ tasya pūrvamapi syāt, paścimamapi, ghaṭādīnāmiva /
uktaṃ ca bhagavatā 		gal te 'khor ba zhes bya ba 'ga' zhig yod na ni /
bum pa la sogs pa dag bzhin du de la nges par sngon dang phyi ma yang yod par gyur na /
yod pa ni ma yin te /
bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang /
anavarāgro hi bhikṣavo jātijarāmaraṇasaṃsāra iti dge slong dag skye ba dang rga shi'i 'khor ba ni thog ma dang tha ma med do zhes gsungs so /
yadeva avarāgre na staḥ, saṃsārasya anavarāgravacanāt, saṃsāra eva nāstīti nanu spaṣṭamādeśayāmāsa bhagavān gang gi phyir de ltar 'khor ba thog ma dang tha ma med par gsungs pa de'i phyir 'khor ba nyid yod pa ma yin no zhes bcom ldan 'das kyis gsal bar gsungs pa ma yin nam /
tasmānnāsti saṃsāraḥ, pūrvāparakoṭayanupalambhāt, alātacakravat, iti sthitam /
atredaṃ vicāryate 		de'i phyir sngon dang phyi ma'i mtha' ma dmigs pa'i phyir /
'khor ba med de mgal me'i 'khor lo bzhin no zhes bya bar gnas so /
'dir 'di dpyad par bya ste /
yadi pūrvaṃ cāparaṃ ca saṃsārasya niṣiddhaṃ bhagavatā, kathaṃ punaridamāha gal te bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khor ba'i sngon dang phyi ma bkag na /
ji ltar dge slong dag de lta bas na /
tasmāttarhi saṃsārakṣayāya pratipatsyāmaha ityevaṃ vo bhikṣavaḥ śikṣitavyam, iti? ucyate 'khor ba zad par bya ba'i phyir nan tan du bya'o snyam du de ltar khyed kyis bslab par bya'o zhes bya ba 'di gsungs she na /
brjod par bya ste /
avidyānīvaraṇānāṃ sattvānāmityādiviśeṣaṇopādānātteṣāmevāyamanavarāgraḥ saṃsāra iti pratīyate, na punastattvajñānānilabalāt samunmūlitāvidyānīvaraṇatarūṇām /
teṣāṃ tu lokottaramārgajñānāgninā dagdhāśeṣakleśavāsanāmūlaniḥśeṣapādapānāṃ bhavatyeva antaḥ iti vijñeyam 		sems can ma rig pa'i sgrib pa dang ldan pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i khyad par nye bar bkod pas de dag kho na'i 'khor ba de thog ma dang tha ma med par rtogs kyi /
de kho na nyid kyi ye shes kyi rlung gi shugs kyis ma rig pa'i sgrib pa'i ljon shing drungs phyung ba rnams kyis ni ma yin te /
'jig rten las 'das pa'i lam gyi mas /
nyon mongs pa'i ljon shing ma lus par bsregs pa de dag la ni mtha' yod pa nyid do zhes shes par bya'o /
kathaṃ punarādirahitānāmantopadeśa iti yāvat yang ji ltar na thog ma dang bral ba rnams la tha ma yod par bstan zhe na /
dṛṣṭametad bāhyeṣu vrīhyādiṣu ādyabhāve 'pi dahanādisaṃparkādantasadbhāvaḥ phyi rol gyi 'bru la sogs pa dag la thog ma med kyang /
me la sogs pa dang phrad pa las tha ma yod pa ni mthong ba nyid do /
yathoktamāryadevapādaiḥ ji skad du /
'phags pa'i lhas /
yathā bījasya dṛṣṭo 'nto na cādistasya vidyate ji ltar sa bon mtha' mthong zhing /
de la thog ma yod min ltar /
tathā kāraṇavaikalyājjanmano 'pi na saṃbhavaḥ de bzhin rgyu ni ma tshang phyir /
skye ba 'ang 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro /
iti /
sa ca antopadeśo laukika eva vyavahāre sthitvā saṃsāracārakāvabaddhānāmutsāhanārthaṃ sattvānāṃ deśito laukikajñānāpekṣayā /
vastukacintāyāṃ tu saṃsāra eva nāsti, tatkuto 'sya parikṣayaḥ? pradīpāvasthāyāṃ rajjūragaparikṣayavat 		zhes bshad do /
tha ma bstan pa de yang sems can 'khor ba'i btson rar bsdams pa rnams spro bar bya ba'i phyir /
'jig rten pa'i tha snyad la gzhug te /
'jig rten pa'i shes pa la ltos nas mdzad pa yin te /
dngos po sems pa yin na ni /
'khor ba nyid med na de'i phyir de zad pa lta ga la yod /
atrāha /
yadyevaṃ laukikajñānāpekṣayā antavad ādirapi kiṃ nocyate? ucyate /
ahetukadoṣaprasaṅgāt laukikajñānāpekṣayāpi saṃsārasyāderabhāva ityubhayathāpyāderabhāva eveti vijñeyam 		'dir smras pa /
'jig rten pa'i shes pa la ltos te tha ma ltar thog ma yang ci ste ma gsungs she na /
brjod pa /
rgyu med pa'i skyon du thal bar 'gyur ba'i phyir /
'jig rten pa'i shes pa la ltos nas kyang 'khor ba'i thog ma med de /
de'i phyir gnyi ga ltar yang thog ma med pa nyid do zhes shes par bya'o /
atrāha /
yadyāpi avarāgre na staḥ saṃsārasya, tathāpi madhyamasti, apratiṣedhāt 		'dir smras pa /
gal te yang 'khor ba la thog ma dang tha ma gnyis yod pa ma yin mod kyi de lta na yang ma 'gags pa'i phyir /
tataśca asti saṃsāro madhyasadbhāvāt dbus yod pa yin no /
de'i phyir 'khor ba yod de /
dbus yod pa'i phyir ro /
iha yannāsti, na tasya madhyamasti tadyathā kūrmaromaprāvaraṇasyeti 'dir gang yod pa ma yin pa de la ni dbus med de /
dper na rus sbal gyi spu'i gos bzhin no /
hāsyaḥ khalvasi /
nanu ca bhoḥ, /
naivāgraṃ nāvaraṃ yasya tasya madhyaṃ kuto bhavet 		khyod ni bzhad gang bya bar 'os pa zhig ste /
gang la thog ma tha med pa /
de la dbus ni ga la yod /
ma yin nam /
agramiti ādiḥ, pūrvam, prathamam ucyate thog ma zhes bya ba ni /
je dang sngon dang dang po la zhes bya'o /
avaramiti avasānam, antaḥ, vyavaccheda ucyate /
yasya saṃsārasya ādirantaśca pratiṣiddhaḥ, tasya kuto madhyaṃ bhaviṣyati? tataśca saṃjñāmātrakameva viparyāsaparavaśamānasānāṃ saṃsāraḥ ādimadhyāvasānavirahitatvādākāśavadalātacakrādivaditi bhāvaḥ 		tha ma zhes bya ba ni mtha' dang mjug dang rgyun chad pa la bya'o /
'khor ba gang la thog ma dang tha ma bkag pa de la dbus yod par ga la 'gyur /
de'i phyir 'khor ba ni nam mkha' ltar thog ma dang tha ma dang dbus dang bral ba'i phyir ming tsam zhig tu zad de /
mgal me'i 'khor lo la sogs pa bzhin no snyam du dgongs pa yin no /
saṃsārābhāvācca nāsti ātmeti /
yata evaṃ saṃsārasyādimadhyāvasānāni na santi, ata eva saṃsārābhāvājjātijarāmaraṇādīnāṃ pūrvāparasahakramā api naiva santītyāha 		'khor ba med pa'i phyir /
bdag kyang yod pa ma yin no /
gang gi phyir /
de ltar 'khor ba la thog ma dang tha ma dang dbus dag med pa de nyid kyi phyir 'khor ba med pas /
skye ba dang rga shi la sogs pa rnams la snga ba dang phyi ba rnams dang lhan cig pa'i rim pa yang yod pa ma yin pa nyid do zhes gsungs pa /
tasmānnātropapadyante pūrvāparasahakramāḥ /
yathā ca nopapadyante tathā pratipādayannāha 		de phyir de la snga phyi dang /
lhan cig rim pa mi 'thad do /
ji ltar mi 'thad pa de ltar bstan pa'i phyir /
pūrvaṃ jātiryadi bhavejjarāmaraṇamuttaram gal te skye ba sngar 'gyur la /
rga shi phyi ma yin na ni /
skye ba rga shi med pa dang /
nirjarāmaraṇā jātirbhavejjāyeta cāmṛtaḥ ma shi bar yang skye bar 'gyur /
zhes bya ba gsungs te /
yadi pūrvaṃ jātirbhavet, tadā maraṇasahitā syāt gal te skye ba snga mar gyur na ni /
de'i tshe rga shi dang bral bar 'gyur na /
na ca jarādirahitā jātiryujyate, asaṃskṛtatvaprasaṅgāt rga ba la sogs pa dang bral ba ni mi rung ste /
'dus ma byas nyid du thal bar 'gyur ba'i phyir ro /
jarāmaraṇarahitasya bhāvasya jātau parikalpyamānāyāmanyatra amṛtasyaiva devadattasya prathamamiha jātiḥ parikalpyamānā syāt rga shi dang bral ba'i dngos po la skye ba yod par rtog pa na /
lha sbyin gzhan du ma shi bar 'dir dang por skye bar rtogs par 'gyur ro /
tataśca ādimān saṃsāraḥ syādahetukadoṣaśca de'i phyir 'khor ba la thog ma yod par 'gyur zhing /
rgyu med pa'i nyes par yang 'gyur ro /
abhūvamatītamadhvānam, ityevaṃ pūrvāntakalpanā ca na syāt bdag 'das pa'i dus na byung bar gyur to zhes de ltar sngon gyi mtha' la rtogs par yang mi 'gyur zhing /
abhūtvā ca pūrvaṃ paścādihotpādaḥ syāt sngon byung bar ma gyur pa las phyis 'dir skye bar yang 'gyur ro /
atha syāt /
āmrādīnāṃ yathā pūrvaṃ vināpi jarāmaraṇasaṃbandhāt prathamameva utpādo dṛṣṭaḥ, evamātmāno 'pīti 		ci ste ji ltar aa mra la sogs pa rnams sngar rga shi dang 'brel pa med par yang dang po kho nar skye bar mthong ste /
de bzhin du bdag kyang yin no snyam na /
naivam /
sādhyasamatvāt /
āmrādīnāmapi hi svabījanirodhe samutpadyamānatvāt nānyatrāvinaṣṭānāmutpāda iti samametat pūrveṇa 		de ltar ma yin te /
bsgrub par bya ba dang mtshungs pa'i phyir ro /
aa mra la sogs pa rnams kyang ni rang gi sa bon 'gags par gyur pa na /
skye ba'i phyir gzhan du ma zhig pa skye ba ma yin pas 'di ni gong ma dang mtshungs so /
atha syāt /
anyadeva vṛkṣādbījam, ato 'nyatrāvināśapūrvaka eva vṛkṣasyotpāda iti naivam 		ci ste sa bon ni shing las gzhan nyid yin te /
de'i phyir shing gi skye ba ni gzhan du ma zhig pa sngon du 'gro ba can nyid do snyam na /
de ltar ni ma yin te /
kāryakāraṇayoranyatvasyāsiddhatvāt /
tathā ca vakṣyati 		rgyu dang 'bras bu dag gzhan nyid yin par ma grub pa'i phyir ro /
de skad du yang /
pratītya yadyadbhavati na hi tāvattadeva tat gang la brten te gang 'byung ba /
de ni re zhig de nyid min /
na cānyadapi tattasmānnocchinnaṃ nāpi śāśvatam de ni gzhan yang ma yin te /
de phyir chad min rtag ma yin /
zhes 'chad par 'gyur ro /
na ca bījādvṛkṣasyānyatvam de phyir sa bon las shing gzhan nyid ma yin te /
ataḥ sādhyasamametat /
yataśca anyatrāmṛtasya ihotpādo nāsti, na pūrvaṃ jātirabhyupeyā 		des na 'di ni bsgrub par bya ba dang mtshungs pa yin no /
gang gi phyir /
gzhan du ma shi ba la 'dir skye ba yod pa yang ma yin pa de'i phyir skye ba snga ma yin par khas blang bar mi bya'o /
atha pūrvaṃ jarāmaraṇam, paścājjātiḥ, evamapi ci ste rga shi snga la skye ba 'phyi ba yin na ni /
de lta na yang /
paścājjātiryadi bhavejjarāmaraṇamāditaḥ gal te skye ba 'phyi 'gyur la /
rga shi snga ba yin na ni /
ahetukamajātasya syājjarāmaraṇaṃ katham skye ba med pa'i rga shi ni /
rgyu med par ni ji ltar 'gyur /
jātipratyayaṃ jarāmaraṇamiti vacanājjātihetukaṃ jarāmaraṇamuktaṃ bhagavatā skye ba'i rkyen gyis rga shi zhes bya ba 'byung bas na /
bcom ldan 'das kyis rga shi skye ba'i rgyu rkyen nyid du gsungs na /
yadi etatpūrvaṃ syāttadā nirhetukaṃ syāt gal te 'di snga ba yin na ni /
de'i tshe rgyu med par 'gyur ro /
tasmānna yuktametat de'i phyir 'di ni mi rigs so /
yato 'pyuktam /
yatha ukkhitte loḍhammi ukkheve atthi kāraṇaṃ /
ṣaḍane kāraṇaṃ ṇatthi aṇṇaṃ ukkhevakāraṇā 		gang las /
bong ba bteg par gyur pa ni /
bteg pa la ni rgyu yod kyi /
bteg pa lta zhig rgyu las ni /
iti /
yathāṣyatrotkṣepaḥ patanakāraṇaṃ nānyat, evamihāpi jātimevakāraṇatvena vināśasya varṇayāmo nānyat, iti nāstyahetukatā vināśasya 		gzhan pa ltung ba med pa nyid /
ces bshad pa de yang ji ltar bteg pa kho nar ltung ba'i rgyu yin gyi /
gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin du /
jātihetukatvāccāsyodgamanameva vināśasya heturiti kṛtvā eṣāpi gāthā sunītā bhavati 'dir yang skye ba kho na 'jig pa'i rgyu nyid yin par smra'i gzhan ni ma yin no /
de'i phyir 'jig pa rgyu med pa nyid yod pa ma yin no /
evime saṃkhatā dhammā saṃbhavanti sakāraṇā 'di skye ba'i rgyu rkyen nyid yin pas 'byung ba kho na 'jig pa'i rgyu yin pa'i phyir na /
sa bhāva eva dhammāṇaṃ yaṃ vibhonti samuggatā de ltar 'dus byas chos de dag /
rgyu dang bcas par 'byung ba ste /
skyes nas 'jig pa gang yin pa /
iti /
idānīṃ sahabhāvenāpi jātijarāmaraṇānāmasadbhāvaṃ pratipādayannāha /
na jarāmaraṇenaiva jātiśca saha yujyate 		'di ni chos rnams rang bzhin no /
zhes bya ba'i tshigs su bcad pa 'di yang legs par drangs par 'gyur ro /
da ni skye ba dang rga shi dag lhan cig nyid du yang mi 'gyur bar bstan pa'i phyir /
skye ba dang ni rga shi dag /
lhan cig rung ba ma yin te /
mriyeta jāyamānaśca syāccāhetukatobhayoḥ /
yadi sahabhāvo jātijarāmaraṇānāṃ syāt, tadā jāyamānasya maraṇaṃ syāt 		skye bzhin pa na 'chi 'gyur zhing /
gnyi ga rgyu med can du 'gyur /
zhes bya ba gsungs te /
gal te skye ba dang rga shi dag lhan cig pa nyid du 'gyur na ni /
de'i tshe skye bzhin pa 'chi bar 'gyur na /
na caitadyuktam /
na ca parasparaviruddhatvādālokāndhakāravadekakālatā yuktā 		'di ni rigs pa yang ma yin te /
mun pa dang snang ba ltar phan tshun 'gal ba'i phyir dus gcig pa nyid du rigs pa yang ma yin zhing /
na caivaṃ loke dṛṣṭaṃ yajjāyamāna eva mriyate iti skye bzhin pa nyid 'chi ba zhes bya ba gang yin pa de lta bu ni 'jig rten du yang ma mthong ngo /
api ca /
ahetukatvaṃ jātyādīnāṃ sahabhāvakalpanāyāṃ syāt /
na hi sahabhūtayoḥ savyetaragoviṣāṇayoranyonyahetukatā dṛṣṭeti na yuktametat 		gzhan yang skye ba la sogs pa dag lhan cig 'byung bar rtog na ni rgyu med pa nyid du 'gyur ro /
ba glang gi rva g yas g yon lhan cig tu gyur pa dag ni phan tshun gyi rgyu can nyid du mthong ba yang ma yin pas /
tadevam /
yatra na prabhavantyete pūrvāparasahakramāḥ 		'di ni mi rigs so /
de'i phyir de ltar /
gang la snga phyi lhan cig gi /
rim pa de dag mi srid pa'i /
prapañcayanti tāṃ jātiṃ tajjarāmaraṇaṃ ca kim skye ba de dang rga shi de /
ci yi phyir na spro bar byed /
yasyāṃ jātau yatra jarāmaraṇe ete pūrvāparasahakramāḥ na santi, tāṃ jātimanupalabhamānā āryāḥ kiṃ prapañcayanti? kiṃśabdo 'saṃbhave /
naiva prapañcayantītyarthaḥ 		skye ba gang dang rga shi gang la snga ba dang 'phyi ba dang lhan cig gi rim pa de dag med pa'i skye ba de ma dmigs pa na /
'phags pa rnams ci'i phyir spro bar byed /
ci'i phyir gyi sgra ni mi srid pa la bya ste /
spro bar mi mdzad pa nyid do zhes pa'i don to /
athavā /
evamavidyamāneṣu jātyādiṣu tāṃ jātibhavidyamānāṃ bālāḥ kiṃ prapañcayanti tacca jarāmaraṇaṃ yanna saṃvidyate? tasmādavastuka eva bālānāṃ prapañca ityabhiprāyaḥ /
yathā ca saṃsārasya pūrvā koṭirnāsti, evamanyeṣāmapi bhāvānāmityāha /
kāryaṃ ca kāraṇaṃ caiva lakṣyaṃ lakṣaṇameva ca /
vedanā vedakaścaiva santyarthā ye ca kecana 		rga shi de yang ma dmigs na ci'i phyir spro bar byed /
yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin gzigs pa nyid kyi phyir ro snyam du dgongs so /
yang na de ltar skye ba la sogs pa dag yod pa ma yin na /
byis pa rnams yod pa ma yin pa'i skye ba de dang gang zhig yod pa ma yin pa'i rga shi de ci'i phyir spro bar byed /
de'i phyir byis pa rnams kyis spros pa ni dngos po yod pa ma yin pa nyid do zhes bya bar dgongs pa'o /
ji ltar 'khor ba la sngon gyi mtha' yod pa ma yin pa de bzhin du dngos po gzhan rnams la yang yin no zhes gsungs pa /
'khor ba 'ba' zhig sngon gyi mtha' /
yod ma yin par ma zad kyi /
rgyu dang 'bras bu nyid dang ni /
mtshan nyid dang ni mtshan gzhi nyid /
tshor dang tshor po nyid dang ni /
don yod gang dag ci yang rung /
pūrvā na vidyate koṭiḥ saṃsārasya na kevalam dngos rnams thams cad nyid la yang /
sngon gyi mtha' ni yod ma yin /
sarveṣāmapi bhāvānāṃ pūrvā koṭirna vidyate de la gal te rgyu snga la 'bras bu 'phyi bar gyur na ni /
tatra yadi pūrvaṃ kāraṇaṃ paścātkāryaṃ syāt, akāryakaṃ kāraṇaṃ nirhetukaṃ syāt /
atha pūrvaṃ kāryaṃ paścātkāraṇam, evamapi kāraṇātpūrvaṃ kāryaṃ nirhetukameva syāt 		'bras bu med pa'i rgyu rgyu med par 'gyur ro /
'on te 'bras bu snga la rgyu 'phyi na ni /
de lta na yang rgyu bas snga ba'i 'bras bu rgyu med pa nyid du 'gyur ro /
atha yugapatkāryakāraṇe syātām, evamubhayamapyahetukaṃ syāt ci ste rgyu dang 'bras bu cig car du gyur na ni /
de lta na yang gnyi ga rgyu med par 'gyur ro /
evaṃ lakṣyalakṣaṇe vedanāvedakau ca yojyau /
na ca kevalaṃ saṃsārasya vyākhyānena kāryakāraṇādikaṃ vyākhyātaṃ veditavyam, api ca ye 'pyante padārthā jñānajñeyapramāṇaprameyasādhanasādhyāvayavāvayaviguṇaguṇyādayaḥ, teṣāmapi pūrvā koṭirna vidyata iti yojyam 		de bzhin du mtshan nyid dang mtshan gzhi dag dang tshor ba dang tshor ba po dag la yang sbyar bar bya'o /
'khor ba'i rgyu bshad pa rgyu dang 'bras bu la sogs pa bshad par bya ba 'ba' zhig tu ma zad kyi /
gzhan yang dngos po gzhan gang dag shes pa dang shes bya dang tshad ma dang gzhal bya dang bsgrub bya dang sgrub byed dang /
yan lag dang yan lag can dang yon tan dang yon tan can la sogs pa de dag la yang sngon gyi mtha' mi rigs so zhes bya bar sbyar bar bya'o /
ata eva āryaratnameghasūtre āryasarvanīvaraṇaviṣkambhiṇā mahābodhisattvena bhagavān stutaḥ /
ādiśāntā hyanutpannāḥ prakṛtyaiva ca nirvṛtāḥ /
dharmāste vivṛtā nātha dharmacakrapravartane 		de nyid kyi phyir /
'phags pa dkon mchog sprin gyi mdo las /
chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba dang /
gzod nas zhi zhing mi skyes pa /
rang gzhan mya ngan 'das pa yi /
chos rnams mgon po khyod kyis bstan /
zhes 'phags pa byang chub sems dpa' chen po sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel bas bcom ldan 'das la bstod pa yin no /
iti /
tathā 		de bzhin du /
ādita śūnya anāgata dharmā no gata asthita sthānaviviktāḥ gzod ma nas ni stong zhing ma 'ongs chos /
song ba med cing gnas med gnas kyis dben /
nityamasāraka māyasabhāvāḥ śuddha viśuddha nabhopama sarvi sgyu ma'i rang bzhin rtag tu snying po med /
thams cad dag cing rnam dag nam mkha' bzhin /
yaṃ ca pabhāṣati dharma jinasya taṃ ca na paśyati so 'kṣayatāya rgyal ba'i chos ni gang dag rab ston pa /
der yang mi zad pas ni mi mthong ste /
ādinirātma nisattvimi dharmāstāṃśca ca pabhāṣati no ca kṣapeti chos 'di snga nas bdag med sems can med /
de dag rab tu ston kyang mi zad 'gyur /
kalpita buccati kalpitamātraṃ antu na labhyati saṃsaramāṇe btags pa tsam du brtags nas bstan pa yin /
'khor ba la ni tha ma mi rnyed de /
koṭi alakṣaṇa yā puri āsīdeti anāgati pratyayatāye gang dag sngon byung mtha' ni mtshan nyid med; /
ma 'ongs dus kyang shes par bya ba'i phyir /
karma kriyā ca pravartati evaṃ hīnautkṛṣṭatayā samudenti las dang bya ba de ltar zhugs 'gyur te /
rab dang tha ma dag tu 'ang 'byung bar 'gyur /
jaḍḍaka dharma sadā prakṛtīye śūnya nirātma vijānatha sarvān chos rnams rab tu blun zhing rang bzhin stong /
thams cad bdag med par yang shes par gyis /
ityādi /
ityācāryacandrakīrtipādoparacitāyāṃ prasannapadāyāṃ madhyamakavṛttau pūrvāparakoṭiparīkṣā nāmaikādaśamaṃ prakaraṇam /
duḥkhaparīkṣā dvādaśamaṃ prakaraṇam 		zhes bya ba la sogs pa 'byung ngo /
slob dpon zla ba grags pa'i zhal snga nas sbyar ba'i tshig gsal ba las /
sngon dang phyi ma'i mtha' brtag pa zhes bya ba rab tu byed pa bcu gcig pa'i 'grel pa'o /
atrāha /
vidyata eva ātmā, tatsaṃbandhiduḥkhasadbhāvāt /
iha hi pañcopādānaskandhā duḥkhamityucyate, tacca asti, tena ca duḥkhena kasyacidbhavitavyaṃ na nirāśrayeṇeti, ato vidyata eva duḥkhasyāśrayaḥ, sa cātmeti 		'dir smras pa /
bdag ni yod pa nyid do /
de dang 'brel pa can gyi sdug bsngal yod pa'i phyir ro /
'dir nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga la sdug bsngal zhes brjod do /
de yang yod la /
sdug bsngal de yang 'ga' zhig la 'gyur bar bya dgos te /
rten med par ni ma yin no /
de'i phyir sdug bsngal la rten yod pa nyid yin la /
de yang bdag yin no /
ucyate /
syādātmā yadi duḥkhameva syāt /
taddhi bhavet svayaṃ kṛtaṃ vā parakṛtaṃ vā ubhayakṛtaṃ vā heturahitaṃ vā 		brjod par bya ste /
gal te sdug bsngal nyid yod na /
bdag yod par 'gyur na yod pa ni ma yin no /
'di ltar de ni yod na /
bdag gis byas pa'am /
gzhan gyis byas pa'am /
gnyi gas byas pa'am /
rgyu dang bral ba zhig tu 'gyur ba zhig na /
sarvathā ca iṣyamāṇaṃ tatkāryameva nāstīti pratipādayannāha 'dod pa na yang rnam pa thams cad du de byas pa nyid yod pa ma yin no; ;zhes bstan pa'i phyir /
svayaṃ kṛtaṃ parakṛtaṃ dvābhyāṃ kṛtamahetukam /
duḥkhamityeka icchanti tacca kāryaṃ na yujyate 		kha cig sdug bsngal bdag gis byas /
gzhan gyis byas dang gnyi gas byas /
rgyu med pa las 'byung bar 'dod /
de ni bya bar mi rung ngo /
zhes bya ba gsungs so /
tatraike vādinaḥ svayaṃ kṛtaṃ duḥkhamiti pratipannāḥ de la rgol ba kha cig gis ni /
sdug bsngal bdag gis byas so zhes bya ba rtogs so /
apare punaḥ parakṛtam, anye ca ubhayakṛtam gzhan po dag gis ni gzhan gyos byas pa yin la /
kecidahetusamutpannameva duḥkhamiti pratipannāḥ /
sarvathā ca tadduḥkhamiṣyamāṇaṃ kāryaṃ kartavyaṃ na yujyate, tadetatpratijñāmātrakamiti /
tatpratipādayannāha /
svayaṃ kṛtaṃ yadi bhavetpratītya na tato bhavet /
skandhānimānamī skandhāḥ saṃbhavanti pratītya hi /
yasmādimān maraṇāntikān skandhān pratītya ime aupapattyāṃśikāḥ skandhā utpadyante tasmātsvayaṃ kṛtaṃ duḥkhamiti nopapadyate /
idānīṃ parakṛtamapi duḥkhaṃ yathā na saṃbhavati, tathā pratipādayannāha /
yadyamībhya ime 'nye syurebhyo vāmī pare yadi /
bhavetparakṛtaṃ duḥkhaṃ parairebhiramī kṛtāḥ /
