yadā amībhyo maraṇāntikebhyaḥ skandhebhyaḥ ime aupapattyāṃśikāḥ skandhā anye syuḥ, ebhyo vā aupapattyāṃśikebhyaḥ amī maraṇāntikā skandhāḥ pare syuḥ, syāttadānīṃ parakṛtaṃ duḥkham 		gzhan dag gis ni gnyi gas byas pa yin zhing 'ga' zhig dag gis ni sdug bsngal rgyu med par 'byung ba nyid do zhes bya bar rtogs so /
'dod par gyur pa'i sdug bsngal de ni rnam pa thams cad du bya bar te bskyed par bya bar mi rung ngo /
'di ni dam bca' ba tsam yin pa de bsgrub par bya ba'i phyir /
gal te bdag gis byas gyur na /
de phyir brten nas 'byung mi 'gyur /
gang phyir phung po 'di dag la /
brten nas phung po 'di dag 'byung /
zhes bya ba gsungs so /
de la bdag gis zhes bya ba ni bdag rang gis zhes bya ba'i don to /
gal te bdag gis sdug bsngal byas par gyur na ni /
sdug bsngal gyi rang gi ngo bo de nyid kyis sdug bsngal gyi rang gi ngo bo de nyid byas par 'gyur ro /
de ci'i phyir rten cing 'brel par 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro /
rgyu dang rkyen la mi ltos par 'byung bar 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i don te; rang gi ngo bo yod pa'i phyir ro /
yod pa ma yin pas ni rang gi ngo bo byed pa ma yin no /
'di ni rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba yang yin te /
'di ltar /
gang phyir phung po 'di dag la /
brten nas phung po de dag 'byung ba'i phyir te /
gang gi phyir /
'chi ba'i dus kyi phung po 'di dag la brten nas /
skye ba'i char gtogs pa'i phung po de dag 'byung ba'i phyir ro /
de'i phyir sdug bsngal bdag gis byas so zhes bya ba mi rigs so /
da ni gzhan gyis byas pa yang yod pa ma yin no zhes gsungs pa /
gal te 'di las de gzhan zhing /
gal te de las 'di gzhan na /
sdug bsngal gzhan gyis byas 'gyur zhing /
gzhan de dag gis de byas 'gyur /
gal te 'chi ba'i dus kyi phung po 'di dag las skye ba'i cha'i phung po de dag gzhan du 'gyur zhing /
skye ba'i char gtogs pa de dag las 'chi ba'i dus kyi phung po 'di dag gzhan yin na ni /
de'i tshe sdug bsngal gzhan gyis byas par 'gyur na /
na caiṣāmanyatvaṃ dṛṣṭaṃ hetuphalasaṃbandhāvasthānāt /
vakṣyati hi 		de dag la ni gzhan nyid ma mthong ste /
rgyu dang 'bras bu'i 'brel par gnas pa med pa'i phyir ro /
pratītya yadyadbhavati na hi tāvattadeva tat gang la brten te gang 'byung ba /
de ni re zhig de nyid min /
na cānyadapi tattasmānnocchinnaṃ nāpi śāśvatam de las gzhan pa'ang ma yin phyir /
de phyir tshad min rtag ma yin /
iti /
ataḥ parakṛtamapi duḥkhaṃ na saṃbhavati /
yadi hi anyatvaṃ syāt, tadā sati anyatve etaiḥ parabhūtaiḥ skandhairamī parabhūtāḥ kṛtā iti yuktaṃ vaktuṃ syāt 		zhes 'chad par 'gyur ro /
de'i phyir sdug bsngal gzhan gyis byas par yang yod pa ma yin no /
gal te gzhan nyid yin na ni /
de yi tshe gzhan nyid yin dang /
gzhan du gyur pa'i phung po de dag gis gzhan du gyur pa de dag byas so zhes bya ba brjod par nus par 'gyur na /
na caitadevam /
iti parakṛtamapi duḥkhaṃ na saṃbhavati 		de ni de ltar yang ma yin no /
de'i phyir sdug bsngal gzhan gyis byas pa yang yod pa ma yin no /
atha syāt /
na brūmo yasmādduḥkhenaiva duḥkhaṃ kṛtam, ataḥ svayaṃ kṛtamiti /
kiṃ tarhi svapudgalena yasmātsvayameva kṛtam, nāpareṇa kṛtvā dattam, ityataḥ svayaṃ kṛtaṃ duḥkhamiti brūmaḥ 		ci ste gang gi phyir sdug bsngal nyid kyis sdug bsngal byas pa de'i phyir bdag gis byas so zhes ni mi smra'o /
'o na ci zhe na /
gang zag bdag gis gang bdag nyid kyis byas pa yin gyi /
gzhan gyis byas nas 'di la byin pa ni ma yin te /
de'i phyir sdug bsngal bdag gis byas so zhes smra'o snyam na /
ucyate /
svapudgalakṛtaṃ duḥkhaṃ yadi duḥkhaṃ punarvinā 		brjod par bya ste /
gal te gang zag bdag gis ni /
sdug bsngal byas pa'i gang zag ste /
svapudgalaḥ sa katamo yena duḥkhaṃ svayaṃ kṛtam /
yadetanmanuṣyaduḥkhaṃ pañcopādānaskandhalakṣaṇaṃ svayaṃ pudgalena kṛtamiti parikalpyate, kalpyatāmasau pudgalo yena tadduḥkhaṃ svayaṃ kṛtam /
yadi tāvadyena duḥkhena svapudgalaḥ prajñapyate, tadeva duḥkhaṃ tena kṛtamiti, sa bhedena kathyatāmidaṃ tadduḥkhamayamasya karteti 		sdug bsngal ma gtogs gang zhig yin /
gal te mi'i sdug bsngal nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga'i mtshan nyid can 'di gang zag bdag nyid kyis byas so zhes bya bar rtag na /
gang bdag gis sdug bsngal de byas pa'i gang zag te rtog mod /
gal te re zhig sdug bsngal gang gis gang zag bdag nyid der 'dogs par byed pa'i sdug bsngal de nyid des byas pa yin na ni /
sdug bsngal de ni 'di yin la /
'di'i byed pa po ni 'di yin no zhes phye ste brjod dgos so /
athāpi manuṣyaduḥkhopādānena pudgalena tadeva duḥkhaṃ kṛtaṃ syāt, na tarhi svapudgalakṛtaṃ tat, parapudgalakṛtameva syāt ci ste yang mi'i sdug bsngal gyi nye bar len pa can gyi gang zag gis /
lha'i sdug bsngal byas par gyur na ni /
'o na de gang zag bdag gis byas pa ma yin gyi /
athopādānabhede 'pi pudgalābheda iṣyate, etacca nāsti, upādānavyatiriktasya bhinnasya pudgalasya darśayitumaśakyatvāt gang zag gzhan gyis byas pa nyid du 'gyur ro /
ci ste nye bar len pa tha dad kyang gang zag tha mi dad par 'dod na /
'di yang yod pa ma yin te /
nye bar len pa las tha dad cing /
gzhan du gyur pa'i gang zag bstan par mi nus pa'i phyir ro /
evaṃ tāvat svapudgalakṛtaṃ duḥkhaṃ na bhavati de ltar na re zhig sdug bsngal gang zag bdag gis byas pa ma yin no /
atrāha /
ka evamāha svapudgalakṛtaṃ duḥkhamiti? kiṃ tarhi parapudgalajaṃ duḥkham /
anya eva devaduḥkhānmanuṣyapudgalaḥ, manuṣyapudgalaśca devaduḥkhaṃ kṛtvā yasmāddevapudgalāya dadāti, tena ca devaduḥkhena devapudgalaḥ prajñapyate, tasmāttasya pudgalasya tadduḥkhaṃ parapudgalajameva bhavati 		'dir smras pa /
gang zag bdag gis sdug bsngal byas so zhes de skad du su smra; 'o na ci zhe na /
sdug bsngal ni gang zag gzhan las 'byung ba yin no /
'di ltar mi'i gang zag ni lha'i sdug bsngal las gzhan nyid yin la /
gang gi phyir mi'i gang zag gis kyang /
lha'i sdug bsngal byas nas lha'i gang zag la ster bar byed cing /
lha'i sdug bsngal des kyang lha'i gang zag go zhes 'dogs par byed pa de'i phyir /
gang zag de'i sdug bsngal de ni gang zag gzhan las 'byung ba yin no /
ucyate /
parapudgalajaṃ duḥkhaṃ yadi yasmai pradīyate 		brjod par bya ste /
gal te gang zag gzhan las ni /
sdug bsngal 'byung na gzhan zhig gis /
pareṇa kṛtvā tadduḥkhaṃ sa duḥkhena vinā kutaḥ /
yadi devaduḥkhaṃ manuṣyapudgalakṛtam, tena ca manuṣyapudgalena tadduḥkhaṃ kṛtvā parasmai devapudgalāya pradīyata iti sa devapudgalo devaduḥkhavinirmuktaḥ kuto yasmai pradīyeteti 		sdug bsngal de byas gang sbyin de /
sdug bsngal ma gtogs ci ltar rung /
gal te lha'i sdug bsngal mi'i gang zag gis byas la /
mi'i gang zag des kyang sdug bsngal de byas nas /
gzhan lha'i gang zag la ster bar byed do zhes bya ba yin na ni /
gang la sbyin par bya ba'i lha'i gang zag de /
lha'i sdug bsngal las ma gtogs par ji ltar rung bar 'gyur /
evaṃ tāvadaparapudgalajasya duḥkhasya pratigrāhaka eva nāsti de ltar na /
re zhig gang zag gzhan las 'byung ba'i sdug bsngal la len pa po nyid yod pa ma yin no /
idānīṃ yaśca dadāti, asāvapi nāstītyāha /
parapudgalajaṃ duḥkhaṃ yadi kaḥ parapudgalaḥ 		da ni gang zhig sbyin par byed pa de yang yod pa ma yin no zhes gsungs pa /
gal te gang zag gzhan sdug bsngal /
vinā duḥkhena yaḥ kṛtvā parasmai prahiṇoti tat /
yenopādānena sa manuṣyapudgalaḥ prajñapyate, sa manuṣyopādānavyatiriktaḥ katamo yo devapudgalāya devaduḥkhaṃ kṛtvā praheṣyati? tasmātparapudgalajamapi duḥkhaṃ na saṃbhavati 		'byung na gang gis de byas nas /
gzhan la ster ba'i gang zag gzhan /
sdug bsngal ma gtogs gang zhig yin /
gang gis lha'i sdug bsngal byas nas lha'i gang zag la ster bar byed cing /
nye bar len pa gang gis mi'i gang zag der gdags pa de ni /
mi'i nye bar len pa las tha dad pa gang zhig yin par 'gyur /
de'i phyir gang zag gzhan las byung ba'i sdug bsngal yang yod pa ma yin no /
tataśca de'i phyir /
svayaṃkṛtasyāprasiddherduḥkhaṃ parakṛtaṃ kṛtaḥ bdag gis byas par ma grub pas /
sdug bsngal gzhan gyis ga la byas /
paro hi duḥkhaṃ yatkuryāttattasya syātsvayaṃ kṛtam /
yadi devapudgaladuḥkhaṃ manuṣyapudgalena kṛtatvātparakṛtaṃ bhavati, nanu, manuṣyapudgalasya svayaṃkṛtameva tadbhavati 		gzhan gyis sdug bsngal gang byed pa /
de ni de yi bdag byas 'gyur /
gal te lha'i gang zag gis sdug bsngal mi'i gang zag gis byas pa'i phyir /
gzhan gyis byas pa yin na ni /
de ni mi'i gang zag gi rang gis byas pa nyid du 'gyur na /
etacca nāstītyuktam /
tataḥ svayaṃkṛtasyāprasiddheryadā manuṣyapudgalena svayaṃ tadduḥkhaṃ na kṛtam, tadā kutaḥ parapudgalasya devākhyasya tadduḥkhaṃ parakṛtaṃ bhaviṣyatīti /
ato 'pi parakṛtaṃ duḥkhaṃ na saṃbhavati /
idānīṃ prakaraṇāntareṇāpi pakṣadvayāsaṃbhavaṃ pratipādayannāha 		de yang yod pa ma yin no zhes bshad zin to /
de'i phyir /
gang gi tshe bdag gis byas par ma grub pa'i phyir sdug bsngal de mi'i gang zag gi bdag gis ma byas pa de'i tshe /
lha zhes bya ba'i gang zag gzhan gyi sdug bsngal de gzhan gyis byas par ga la 'gyur zhes bya ba 'di las kyang sdug bsngal gzhan gyis byas pa yod pa ma yin no /
da ni phyogs gnyis char rnam pa gzhan gyi sgo nas kyang yod pa ma yin par bstan pa'i phyir /
na tāvatsvakṛtaṃ duḥkhaṃ na hi tenaiva tatkṛtam re zhig sdug bsngal bdag byas min /
de nyid kyis ni de ma byas /
paro nātmakṛtaścetsyādduḥkhaṃ parakṛtaṃ katham gal te gzhan bdag ma byas na /
sdug bsngal gzhan byas ga la 'gyur /
zhes bya ba gsungs so /
itaśca svaparābhyāṃ duḥkhasya karaṇaṃ na yujyate, yasmānna tāvatsvakṛtaṃ duḥkham 'di las kyang sdug bsngal bdag dang gzhan dag gis byas par mi rigs so /
gang gi phyir re zhig sdug bsngal bdag gis byas pa ni ma yin no /
ci'i phyir zhe na /
kiṃ kāraṇam? yasmānna tenaiva hi tat kṛtam, svātmani vṛttivirodhāt, ataḥ svakṛtaṃ nāsti /
na parakṛtamapi, yasmādyo 'sau paraḥ karotīti parikalpyate, sa eva tāvannātmanā kṛto nātmanā niṣpannaḥ tasyāpi hetvantarāpekṣaṇāt 		gang gi phyir de nyid kyis de byas pa ma yin pa'i phyir te /
bdag nyid la byed pa 'gal ba'i phyir ro /
de'i phyir /
bdag gis byas pa yod pa ma yin no /
gzhan gyis byas pa yang yod pa ma yin te /
gang gi phyir /
byed po zhes bya bar brtags pa'i gzhan gang yin pa de nyid re zhig bdag gis ma byas shing bdag nyid kyis ma grub ste /
de yang rgyu gzhan la ltos pa'i phyir ro /
yaśca svātmanā na niṣpannaḥ, sa kathamavidyamānasvabhāvaḥ san paraṃ kariṣyatīti na yuktametat /
idānīmubhayakṛtamapi duḥkhamasadityāha 		gang zhig rang gi bdag nyid kyis grub pa ma yin pa de ni yod pa ma yin pa'i rang bzhin du gyur pas gzhan byed par ji ltar 'gyur te /
'di ni mi rigs so /
da ni sdug bsngal gnyis kas byas pa yang yod pa ma yin no zhes gsungs pa /
syādubhābhyāṃ kṛtaṃ duḥkhaṃ syādekaikakṛtaṃ yadi gal te re res byas gyur na /
sdug bsngal gnyi gas byas par 'gyur /
yadi hi ekaikena duḥkhasya karaṇaṃ syāt syāttadānīmubhābhyāṃ kṛtaṃ duḥkham /
na caikaikakṛtaṃ tat, uktadoṣāt 		gal te re res sdug bsngal byed par 'gyur na ni /
de'i tshe sdug bsngal gnyi gas byas pa yin na /
de ni re res byas pa yang ma yin te /
na caikaikena prāṇātipāte kṛte dvābhyāṃ kṛta iti vyapadeśo dṛṣṭaḥ /
idānīṃ nirhetukamapi duḥkhaṃ yathā nāsti, tathā pratipadayannāha 		bshad zin pa'i skyon du 'gyur ba'i phyir ro /
re res srog gcod pa ma byas par ni gnyi gas byas so zhes brjod pa ma mthong ngo /
da ni sdug bsngal rgyu med pa las byung ba yang ji ltar med pa de ltar bstan pa'i phyir /
parākārāsvayaṃkāraṃ duḥkhamahetukaṃ kutaḥ bdag gis ma byas gzhan ma byas /
sdug bsngal rgyu med ga la 'gyur /
pareṇa akāro akaraṇaṃ yasyeti parākāram zhes gsungs te /
gzhan gyis ma byas pa /
na svayaṃkāro 'syetyasvayaṃkāram /
yadi duḥkhaṃ svayaṃkṛtaṃ nāsti, parakṛtamapi nāsti yathoktena nyāyena, tadidānīṃ kuta eva nirhetukaṃ bhaviṣyati khapuṣpasaugandhyavat? duḥkhābhāvātkutastasyāśrayabhūta ātmā /
yathā ca caturdhā vicāryamāṇaṃ duḥkhamasat, evaṃ bāhyā api bījāṅkuraghaṭapaṭādayo bhāvā veditavyāḥ, iti pratipādayannāha 		gzhan gyis ma bskyed pa 'di la yod pas na /
gzhan gyis ma byas pa'o /
'di la bdag gis ma byas pa yod pas na bdag gis ma byas pa'o /
gal te ji skad bshad pa'i tshul gyis sdug bsngal bdag gis byas pa med cing /
gzhan gyis byas pa yang med pa de'i tshe rgyu med pa yod par ga la 'gyur te /
nam mkha'i me tog gi dri zhim po bzhin no /
sdug bsngal med pa'i phyir na de'i rten du gyur pa'i bdag kyang lta ga la yod /
ji ltar rnam pa bzhir dpyad na sdug bsngal yod pa ma yin pa de bzhin du /
phyi rol gyi dngos po sa bon dang myu gu dang bum pa dang snam bu la sogs pa dag kyang rig par bya'o zhes bstan pa'i phyir /
na kevalaṃ hi duḥkhasya cāturvidhyaṃ na vidyate sdug bsngal 'ba' zhig rnam pa bzhi /
yod ma yin pa ma yin gyi /
sarveṣāṃ /
bāhyānāmapi bhāvānāṃ cāturvidhyaṃ na vidyate 		dngos po thams cad dag la yang /
rnam pa bzhi po yod ma yin /
zhes bya ba gsungs te /
pūrvavatsarva samaṃ yojyam thams cad snga ma bzhin sbyar bar bya'o /
yadi khalveṣāṃ duḥkhādīnāṃ cāturvidhyāsaṃbhavaḥ, tatkatamena tarhi idānīṃ prakāreṇa eṣāṃ siddhiriti gal te sdug bsngal la sogs pa 'di dag la rnam pa bzhi po med na /
'o na da ni 'di dag rnam pa gang gis 'grub ce na /
ucyate /
svabhāvato yadi etāni duḥkhādīni syuḥ, niyatameṣāṃ caturṇāṃ prakārāṇāmanyatamena prakāreṇa siddhiḥ syāt 		brjod par bya ste /
gal te sdug bsngal la sogs pa 'di dag rang bzhin gyis yod par gyur na ni /
nges par rnam pa bzhi po 'di dag las gang yang rung ba zhig gis 'grub par 'gyur ba zhig na /
na tvasti /
tasmātsvabhāvato na santi duḥkhādīnītyavasīyate /
atha viparyāsamātralabdhātmasattākāyā duḥkhādisaṃvṛteḥ pratītyasamutpādavyavasthā mṛgyate, tadā karmakārakaparīkṣāprakaraṇavihitavidhinā yathoditapakṣacatuṣṭayatiraskāreṇa idaṃpratyayatāmātrārthapratītyasamutpādasiddhayā siddhirabhyupeyā /
yathoktam 		yod pa ni ma yin no /
de'i phyir sdug bsngal la sogs pa dag rang bzhin gyis yod pa ma yin par nges so /
'on te phyin ci log tsam gyi bdag nyid yod par rnyed pa /
sdug bsngal la sogs pa kun rdzob la rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'i rnam par gzhag pa tshol na ni /
de'i tshe las dang byed pa po brtags pa'i rab tu byed par bshad pa'i rnam pas ji skad smras pa'i phyogs bzhi bsal nas rkyen nyid 'di pa tsam gyi don gyi rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba grub par khas blang bar bya'o /
ji skad du /
svayaṃkṛtaṃ parakṛtaṃ dvābhyāṃ kṛtamahetukam sdug bsngal bdag gis byas pa dang gzhan gyis byas dang gnyi gas byas /
tārkikairiṣyate duḥkhaṃ tvayā tūktaṃ pratītyajam rgyu med rtog ge ba yis 'dod /
khyod kyis brten nas 'byung bar gsungs /
iti /
uktaṃ ca bhagavatā āryopālipṛcchāyām 		zhes bshad do /
bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang /
tathā /
saṃvṛti bhāṣitu dharma jinena saṃskṛta 'saṃskṛta paśyatha eva 		kun rdzob tu ni rgyal bas chos bshad de /
'dus byas 'dus ma byas yin de ltar ltos /
nāstiha bhūtatu ātma naro vā ettaku lakṣaṇa sarvajagasya yang dag nyid du bdag dang bdag med de /
'gro ba kun gyi mtshan nyid 'di 'dra'o /
kṛṣṇaśubhaṃ ca na naśyati karma ātmana kṛtva ca vedayitavyam dge dang nag po'i las rnams mi 'jig ste /
bdag gis byas pa bdag ni myong bar 'gyur /
no 'pi tu saṃkrama karmaphalasya no ca ahetuka pratyanubhoti las kyi 'bras bu 'pho bar mi 'gyur te /
rgyu med par yang myong bar mi 'gyur ro /
sarvi bhavā alikā vasikāśca riktaka tucchaka phenasamāśca srid pa thams cad sgyu ma dbang med pa; /
gsog dang gsob tu gyur pa dbu ba bzhin /
māyamarīcisamā sada śūnyā deśituḥ saṃvṛtu te ca viviktāḥ sgyu ma smig rgyu lta bur rtag tu stong /
sgra yis bshad kyang de dag dben pa yin /
śailaguhāgiridurganadīṣu yadva pratiśruka jāyi pratītya brag phug ri dang gcong rong klung rnams su /
rkyen gyis ji ltar brag ca 'byung ba ltar /
evimu saṃskṛta sarvi vijāna māyamarīcisamaṃ jagu sarvam de bzhin 'dus byas 'di kun rig par gyis /
'gro ba thams cad sgyu ma smig rgyu bzhin /
ityādi /
ityācāryacandrakīrtipādoparacitāyāṃ prasannapadāyāṃ madhyamakavṛttau duḥkhaparīkṣā nāma dvādaśamaṃ prakaraṇam 		zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs so /
slob dpon zla ba grags pa'i zhal snga nas sbyar ba'i tshig gsal ba las /
bdag gis byas pa dang gzhan gyis byas pa brtag pa zhes bya ba rab tu byed pa bcu gnyis pa'i 'grel pa'o /
saṃskāraparīkṣā trayodaśamaṃ prakaraṇam gang gi phyir de ltar rab tu byed pa thal ma thag pa'i tshul gyis rnam par dpyad pa na /
yataścaivaṃ samanantarātikrāntaprakaraṇavidhinā svaparobhayakṛtatvamahetusamutpanatvaṃ ca nirūpyamāṇaṃ bhāvānāmasat, anyaścotpādako vidhirasan, utpannarūpatvena caite bhāvā avidyātimiropahatamatinayanānāṃ bālapṛthagjanānāṃ khyānti, tasmānniḥsvabhāvā eva santo bālānāṃ visaṃvādakā māyākarituragādivat tadanabhijñānāṃ na tu vijñānām dngos po rnams la bdag dang gzhan dang gnyi gas byas pa dang rgyu med pa las byung ba nyid med cing skyed bar byed pa'i rnam pa gzhan yang med la /
ma rig pa'i rab rib kyis blo gros kyi mig nyams par byas pa rnams la dngos po 'di dag skye ba'i ngo bor yang snang ba de'i phyir /
rang bzhin med pa nyid du gyur pa na sgyu ma'i rta dang glang po che la sogs pas /
de mi shes pa rnams ltar byis pa rnams slu bar byed pa yin no /
de nyid kyi phyir /
blo'i sbyin chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin lkog tu ma gyur pa mnga' ba /
ata eva sarvadharmasvābhāvāvyāparokṣadhīnayanaḥ samunmūlitāśeṣāvidyāvāsanaḥ caturviparyāsaviparyastātrāṇasattvaparitrāṇāya aviparītanaiḥ svābhāvyopadeśatatparo buddho jagadvibodhako mahākāruṇikaḥ ma rig pa'i bag chags ma lus par drungs phyung ba /
sems can phyin ci log bzhis phyin ci log tu gyur zhing skyabs med pa yongs su bskyab par mdzad pa'i slad du rang bzhin med pa phyin ci ma log par nye bar ston pa lhur mdzad pa /
tanmṛṣā moṣadharma yadbhagavānityabhāṣata /
sarve ca moṣadharmāṇaḥ saṃskārāstena te mṛṣā 		thugs rje chen po'i mnga' ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis chos gang zhig /
slu ba de ni brdzun zhes gsungs /
'du byed thams cad slu ba'i chos /
des na de dag brdzun pa yin /
sūtre uktam /
tanmṛṣā moṣadharma yadidaṃ saṃskṛtam 		mdo las dge slong dag 'dus byas slu ba'i chos can gang yin pa de ni brdzun pa yin la /
etaddhi khalu bhikṣavaḥ paramaṃ satyaṃ yadidamamoṣadharma nirvāṇam /
sarvasaṃskārāśca mṛṣā moṣadharmāṇaḥ iti 		mi slu ba'i chos can mya ngan las 'das pa gang yin pa de ni bden pa dam pa'o zhes bya ba dang de bzhin du 'di ni slu bar byed pa'i chos can no /
tathā /
nāstyatra tathatā avitathatā vā 		'di ni 'jig pa'i chos can no zhes gsungs so /
moṣadharmakamapyetat /
pralopadharmakamapyetat iti 		de'i phyir tshul 'dis gang su zhing 'jig pa'i chos can de ni brdzun pa yin no zhes de skad du /
tadanena nyāyena yanmoṣadharma tanmṛṣetyevaṃ yasmāduktavāṃstathāgato bhagavān, sarve ca moṣadharmāṇaḥ saṃskārāḥ, tasmānmoṣadharmakatvena te saṃskārā mṛṣā bhavanti citrakarayantradārikāvat, lakṣaṇopetayantramayavāraṇavañcitodayanavatsarājavat /
tatra visaṃvādakaṃ moṣadharmakaṃ vitathakhyātyālātacakravat /
ato niḥsvabhāvatvena mṛṣā sarvasaṃskārāḥ moṣadharmakatvāt marīcikādijalavat 		bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs pa dang 'du byed thams cad kyang slu ba'i chos can yin pas de'i phyir /
'du byed de dag slu ba'i chos can yin pas brdzun par 'gyur ro /
de la slu ba'i chos can ni 'drid par byed cing phyin ci log tu snang ba ste /
mgal me'i 'khor lo bzhin no /
de'i rang bzhin ma yin pa nyid kyis na 'du byed thams cad brdzun pa ste /
slu ba'i chos can yin pa'i phyir /
smig rgyu'i chu bzhin no /
yattu satyaṃ na tanmoṣadharmakam, tadyathā nirvāṇamekam gang zhig bden pa de ni slu ba'i chos can ma yin te /
dper na mya ngan las 'das pa bzhin no /
de'i phyir /
tataśca vihitayā upapattyā asmāccāgamāt siddhaṃ sarvabhāvānāṃ naiḥsvābhāvyam bstan pa'i rigs pa dang lung 'di las /
dngos po rnams rang bzhin med par grub ste /
śūnyāḥ sarvadharmā niḥsvabhāvayogena iti ca prajñāpāramitā shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las chos thams cad ni stong pa ste /
rang bzhin med pa'i tshul gyis so zhes 'byung ba'i phyir ro /
ardhaśatikāpāṭhāt /
atrāha /
yadyevaṃ moṣadharmakatvena sarvasaṃskārāṇāṃ mṛṣātvaṃ pratipāditaṃ bhavatā, nanvevaṃ sati na santi sarve bhāvā iti sarvapadārthāpavādinī mithyādṛṣṭireva syāt 		'dir smras pa /
gal te de ltar slu ba'i chos can nyid kyis /
'du byed thams cad brdzun pa nyid du bstan na /
de lta na ni dngos po thams cad med pas dngos po thams cad la skur pa 'debs pa'i log par lta ba nyid du 'gyur ro /
ucyate /
satyaṃ moṣadharmakāḥ sarvasaṃskārāḥ, ye 'dyāpi bhavantaṃ muṣṇanti 		brjod par bya ste /
gang dag da dung du yang khyod slu bar byed pa slu ba'i chos can dag yod pa 'di ni bden no /
nanu ca bhoḥ, /
tanmṛṣā moṣadharma yadyadi kiṃ tatra muṣyate /
yadā asmābhiḥ tanmṛṣā moṣadharmakam ityuktam, tadā kiṃ tatra muṣyate? kiṃ tatrābhāvo bhavati? kaścidyadi padārtho 'bhaviṣyat, syāttasyāpavādādabhāvadarśanānmithyādṛṣṭiḥ 		gal te slu chos gang yin pa /
de brdzun de la ci zhig slu /
ma yin nam /
gang gi tshe kho bo cag gi slu ba can gang yin pa de ni brdzun pa'o zhes bshad pa de'i tshe de la ci zhig slu ste /
de la ci zhig dngos po med par 'gyur /
gal te dngos po 'ga' zhig yod par gyur na ni /
yadā tu padārthameva kaṃcinna paśyāmaḥ, tadā kiṃ tatra muṣyate? naiva kiṃcidabhāvo bhavatītyayukto 'yamupālambho bhavataḥ de la skur pa btab pas med par lta ba'i log par lta bar 'gyur na /
gang gi tshe dngos po cung zad kyang ma mthong ba de'i tshe /
atrāha /
yadi abhāvadarśanamapi na pratipādyate, kiṃ punaranenāgamena pratipādyata iti? ucyate 		der ci zhig slu bar 'gyur te /
'ga' yang dngos po med par mi 'gyur bas /
khyod kyis glan ka 'di ni mi rigs so /
'dir gal te dngos po med pa'i lta ba yang mi ston na /
lung 'dis ci zhig ston /
etattūktaṃ bhagavatā śūnyatāparidīpakam brjod par bya ste /
bcom ldan 'das kyis de gsungs pa /
yadetaduktaṃ bhagavatā, tanna bhāvānāmabhāvaparidīpakam kiṃ tarhi śūnyatāparidīpakam svabhāvānutpādaparidīpakamityarthaḥ stong nyid yongs su bstan pa yin /
bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad bstan pa gang yin pa de ni dngos po med par ston pa ma yin gyi /
'o na ci zhe na /
stong pa nyid yongs su ston pa yin te /
yathoktamanavataptahradāpasaṃkramaṇasūtre /
yaḥ pratyayairjāyati sa hyajāto no tasya utpādu sabhāvato 'sti 		rang bzhin gyis ma skyes pa'i yongs su gsal bar byed pa yin no zhes bya ba'i don to /
ji skad du mdo las /
gang zhig rkyen las skyes pa de ma skyes /
de la skye ba'i rang bzhin yod ma yin /
yaḥ pratyayādhīnu sa śūnya ukto yaḥ śūnyatāṃ jānati so 'pramattaḥ rkyen la rag las gang de stong par bshad /
gang zhig stong nyid shes de bag yod min /
iti /
atrāha /
nāyamāgamo bhāvasvabhāvānutpādaṃ paridīpayati, kiṃ tarhi niḥsvabhāvatvam, svabhāvasyānavasthāyitvam, vināśitvam, iti 		zhes gsungs so /
'dir lung gis dngos po'i rang bzhin gyis ma skyes pa yongs su gsal bar byed pa ni ma yin te /
'on te ci zhe na /
rang bzhin med pa ste rang bzhin mi gnas pa nyid dang 'jig pa nyid ston par byed pa yin no /
'di gang las she na /
kuta etaditi cet, dngos rnams ngo bo nyid med de /
bhāvānāṃ niḥsvabhāvatvamanyathābhāvadarśanāt /
vicāryamāṇānāmanyathātvaṃ vipariṇāmadarśanāt ityarthaḥ 		gzhan du 'gyur bar snang phyir ro /
gzhan du 'gyur ba ste /
yongs su 'gyur ba mthong ba'i phyir ro zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go /
etaduktaṃ bhavati 'di skad du gal te /
yadi bhāvānāṃ svabhāvo na syāt, tadānīṃ naivaiṣāmanyathātvamupalabhyeta dngos po rnams la rang bzhin med na /
de'i tshe 'di dag gzhan du 'gyur ba dmigs par mi 'gyur na /
upalabhyate ca pariṇāmaḥ yongs su 'gyur ba ni dmigs pa yang yin te /
tasmātsvabhāvānava sthāyitvameva sūtrārtha iti vijñeyam de'i phyir rang bzhin mi gnas pa nyid mdo'i don yin par shes par bya'o zhes bstan par 'gyur ro /
itaścaitadevam /
yasmāt /
asvabhāvo bhāvo nāsti bhāvānāṃ śūnyatā yataḥ 		'di'i phyir yang de ni de ltar yin te /
gang gi phyir /
dngos po ngo bo nyid med de /
gang phyir dngos rnams stong pa nyid /
yo hyasvabhāvo bhāvaḥ, sa nāsti 'di ltar dngos po gang zhig ngo bo nyid med pa de ni yod pa ma yin te /
bhāvānāṃ ca śūnyatā dharma iṣyate dngos po rnams kyi chos stong pa nyid ces bya ba ni 'dod pa yin no /
na ca asati dharmiṇi tadāśrito dharma upapadyate /
na hi asati vandhyātanaye tacchayāmatopapadyata iti /
tasmādastyeva bhāvānāṃ svabhāva iti 		yod pa ma yin pa'i mo gsham gyi bu la /
de'i sngo bsangs nyid mi 'thad pas chos can med pas /
de la brten pa'i chos kyang mi 'thad pa de'i phyir dngos po rnams rang bzhin yod pa yin no /
api ca gzhan yang /
kasya syādanyathābhāvaḥ svabhāvaścenna vidyate gal te ngo bo nyid med na /
gzhan du 'gyur ba gang gi yin /
yadi bhāvānāṃ svabhāvo na syāt, yo 'yaṃ vipariṇāmalakṣaṇaḥ anyathābhāvaḥ, sa kasya syāditi? atrocyate /
evamapi parikalpyamāne 		gal te dngos po rnams kyi rang bzhin med na /
yongs su 'gyur ba'i mtshan nyid can gyi gzhan du 'gyur ba gang yin pa de gang gi yin par 'gyur zhes 'dzer to /
'di la brjod par bya ste /
de ltar yongs su btags kyang /
kasya syādanyathābhāvaḥ svabhāvo yadi vidyate gal te ngo bo nyid yod na /
ji lta bur na gzhan du 'gyur /
iha yo dharmo yaṃ padārthaṃ na vyabhicarati, sa tasya svabhāva iti vyapadiśyate, aparapratibaddhatvāt 'dir chos gang zhig dngos po gang la mi 'khrul pa de na de'i rang bzhin zhes bsnyad de /
gzhan gyis gegs byar med pa'i phyir ro /
agnerauṣṇyaṃ hi loke tadavyabhicāritvāt svabhāva ityucyate de la mi 'khrul pa'i me'i tsha ba la ni 'jig rten na rang bzhin zhes brjod la /
tadeva auṣṇyamapsūpalabhyamānaṃ parapratyayasaṃbhūtatvātkṛtrimatvānna svabhāva iti tsha ba de nyid chu dag la dmigs pa na rkyen gzhan las byung bas bcos ma yin pa'i phyir rang bzhin ma yin no /
gang gi tshe /
yadā caivamavyabhicāriṇā svabhāvena bhavitavyam, tadā asya avyabhicāritvādanyathābhāvaḥ syādabhāvaḥ de ltar rang bzhin ni 'khrul pa med par 'gyur ba yin par bya dgos pa de'i tshe 'khrul pa med pas gzhan du 'gyur ba med de /
na hi agniḥ śaityaṃ pratipadyate me ni grang bar 'gyur ba ma yin no /
evaṃ bhāvānāṃ sati svabhāvābhyupagame 'nyathātvameva na saṃbhavet de bzhin du dngos po rnams la yang rang bzhin khas lan na gzhan du 'gyur ba nyid med par 'gyur na /
upalabhyate caiṣāmanyathātvam de dag ni gzhan du 'gyur ba nyid du dmigs pa yang yin te /
ato nāsti svabhāvaḥ de'i phyir rang bzhin yod pa ma yin no /
api ca /
ayamanyathābhāvo bhāvānāṃ naiva saṃbhavati, yaddarśanātsasvabhāvatā syāt /
yathā ca na saṃbhavati, tathā pratipādayannāha 		gzhan yang gang zhig snang ba las rang bzhin dang bcas pa nyid du 'gyur ba gzhan du gyur pa 'di ni dngos po rnams la mi srid pa nyid do /
ji ltar mi srid pa de ltar bstan pa'i phyir /
tasyaiva nānyathābhāvo nāpyanyasyaiva yujyate de nyid la ni gzhan 'gyur med /
gzhan nyid la yang yod ma yin /
yuvā na jīryate yasmādyasmājjīrṇo na jīryate gang phyir gzhon nu mi rga ste /
gang phyir rgas pa'ang mi rga'o /
tasyaiva tāvat prāgvat prāgavasthāyāṃ vartamānasya bhāvasyānyathātvaṃ nopapadyate zhes bya ba gsungs te /
re zhig dngos po sngar gyi gnas skabs na gnas pa de nyid ni gzhan du 'gyur bar mi 'thad do /
tathā hi yūno yuvāvasthāyāmeva vartamānasya nāsti anyathātvam /
athāpi avasthāntaraprāptasyaiva anyathātvaṃ parikalpyate, tadapi nopapadyate 		'di ltar lang tsho'i gnas skabs nyid la gnas pa'i gzhon nu la ni gzhan du 'gyur ba yod pa ma yin no /
ci ste gnas skabs gzhan thob pa nyid la gzhan du 'gyur ba nyid rtog na /
de yang mi 'thad de /
anyathātvaṃ nāma jarāyāḥ paryāyaḥ gzhan du gyur ba zhes bya ba ni rgas pa'i rnam grangs yin te /
tadyadi yūno neṣyate, anyasyaiva jīrṇasya bhavatīti, tadapi na yujyate /
yasmānna hi jīrṇasya punarjarayā saṃbandhaḥ, niṣprayojanatvāt 		de gal te gzhon nu la mi 'dod kyi gzhan rgas pa kho na la 'gyur na ni /
de yang mi rigs te /
gang gi phyir rgas pa la ni yang rga ba dang 'grel ba dgos pa med pa'i phyir ro /
rgas pa la yang rga ba dang 'brel pas ci zhig bya ste /
kiṃ hi jīrṇasya punarjarayā saṃbandhaḥ kuryāt? tadāgamanāntareṇa jīrṇatābhāvājjīrṇo jīryata iti na yujyate de med par yang rgas pa nyid yod pas rgas pa rga'o zhes bya ba ni mi rigs so /
ci ste gzhon nu nyid gzhan du 'gyur ro zhe na /
atha yūna evānyathābhāvaḥ, tadayuktam, aprāptajarāvasthasya yuveti vyapadeśāt, avasthādvayasya ca parasparaviruddhatvāt de ni mi rigs te /
rgas pa'i gnas skabs ma thob pa la gzhon nu zhes brjod pa'i phyir dang gnas skabs gnyis kyang phan tshun 'gal ba'i phyir ro /
api ca gzhan yang /
tasya cedanyathābhāvaḥ kṣīrameva bhaveddadhi /
atha syāt 		gal te de nyid gzhan 'gyur na /
'o ma nyid ni zhor 'gyur ro /
kṣīrāvasthāparityāgena dadhyavasthā bhavati, ataḥ na kṣīrameva dadhi bhavatīti ci ste 'o ma'i gnas skabs btang nas /
zho'i gnas skabs su gyur pa de'i phyir 'o ma nyid zhor 'gyur ro snyam na /
ucyate /
yadi kṣīraṃ dadhi bhavatīti neṣyate parasparavirodhāt 		brjod par bya ste /
gal te phan tshun 'gal bas 'o ma nyid zhor 'gyur ro zhes bya bar mi 'dod na ni /
kṣīrādanyasya kasyātha dadhibhāvo bhaviṣyati 'o ma las gzhan gang zhig ni /
zho yi dngos po yin par 'gyur /
kimudakasya dadhibhāvo bhavatu? tasmādasaṃbaddhameva tadanyasya dadhibhāvo bhaviṣyatīti ci chu zho'i dngos por 'gyur ram /
de'i phyir gzhan zho'i dngos por 'gyur ro zhes bya ba 'di ni ma 'brel pa yin no /
tadevamanyathātvāsaṃbhavāt kutastaddarśanāt sasvabhāvatā bhāvānāṃ prasetsyatīti na yuktametat de'i phyir /
de ltar gzhan du 'gyur ba med pa'i phyir de snang ba las dngos po rnams rang bzhin dang bcas par 'grub par ga la 'gyur /
de'i phyir 'di ni mi rigs so /
yathoktamāryaratnākaramahāyānasūtre /
yo na pi jāyati no cupapadyī no cyavate na pi jīryati dharmaḥ 		ji skad du /
'phags pa dkon mchog 'byung gnas zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo las /
chos gang skye ba med cing 'byung ba med /
'chi 'pho med cing rga bar mi 'gyur ba /
taṃ jinu darśayatī narasiṃha tatra nideśayi sattva maharṣī mi yi seng ge yis ni der bstan zhing /
sems can brgya phrag dag ni de la bkod /
yasya svabhāva na vidyati kaści no 'parabhāvatu kenaci labdhaḥ gang la'ang ngo bo nyid ni gang yang med /
gzhan yang ma yin sus kyang mi rnyed pa /
nāntarato na pi bāhirato vā labhyati tatra niveśayi nāthaḥ nang na ma yin phyi rol dag na yang /
mi rnyed de dag la ni mgon pos bkod /
śānta gatī kathitā sugatena no ca gatī upapadyati kāci bde bar gshegs pas zhi pa'i 'gro gsungs kyang /
'gro ba gang yang rnyed par mi 'gyur te /
tatra ca vyoharasī gatimukto muktaku mocayasī bahusattvān de dag 'gro las grol bar rnam par gsungs /
grol nas sems can mang po grol bar mdzad /
sarvi vadesi nirātmaka dharmān sattvatu grāhatu mocasi lokam bdag med par ni chos kun ston mdzad cing /
sems can 'dzin las 'jig rten rnam par grol /
mukta svayaṃ gatito gatimukto tenasi pāragato na ca tīrṇaḥ /
pāragato 'si bhavārṇavatīrṇaḥ pāragato na ca labhyati kaści 		bdag nyid 'gro las grol zhing 'gro grol bas /
de bzhin pha rol gshegs kyang rgal ba'ang med; ;drang srong chen po srid pa'i pha rol phyin /
pāru na vidyati nāpi apāru pāragato 'smi vadesi ca vākyam pha rol gshegs pa gang yang mi rnyed 'gyur /
pha rol yod ma yin zhing tshu rol med /
vāca na vidyati yāṃ ca vadesi yaṃ pi vadesi na vidyati taṃ pi pha rol song ngo zhes kyang tshig tu gsung /
gang gis tshig tu smra ba de yang med /
yasya vadesi na vidyati so 'pi yo 'pi vijānati so 'pi asanto gang smras de yi tshig kyang yod ma yin /
gang la smra ba de yang rnyed mi 'gyur /
tatra praṇaṣṭu jagaṃ imu sarvaṃ vitathavikalpaniveśavaśena gang gis shes pa de yang yod ma yin /
log par rtog la chags pa'i dbang gis su /
'dir ni 'gro ba 'di kun rab tu 'khyams /
śānta vijānati yo naru dharmāṃ stehi tathāgatu dṛṣṭa svayaṃbhūḥ skyes bu gang zhig zhi ba'i chos rig pa /
des ni rang 'byung de bzhin gshegs pa mthong /
śānta prajānati dharma praṇītān prīti sa vindati toṣati sattvān chos mchog zhi ba rnams kyang rab tu shes /
dga' ba rnyed nas sems can tshim par byed /
nyon mongs rgyal nas de nyid rgyal bar 'gyur /
so bhavatī jinu jitvena kleśān ātma ............ /
tena vijānita bodhi jinānāṃ buddhiya bodhayate sa jagaṃ pi 		bdag nyid rgyal bar gyur zhing gnas pa med /
de phyir rgyal ba'i byang chub rab tu mkhyen /
sangs rgyas nas ni 'gro ba shes par byed /
ityādi /
yaccoktam /
asvabhāvo bhāvo naivāsti, śūnyatā ca bhāvānāmiṣyate, tasmādasti śūnyatāaśrayo bhāvasvabhāva iti, etadapi na yujyate ityāha 		ces bya ba la sogs pa gsungs pa lta bu'o /
dngos po ngo bo nyid med pa ni yod pa ma yin te /
dngos po rnams stong pa nyid du ni 'dod pa yin no /
de'i phyir stong pa nyid kyi rten du gyur pa dngos po'i rang bzhin yod do zhes bya ba gang yin pa de dag mi rigs so zhes gsungs pa /
yadyaśūnyaṃ bhavetkiṃcitsyācchūnyamiti kiṃcana gal te stong min cung zad yod /
stong pa'ang cung zad yod par 'gyur /
na kiṃcidastyaśūnyaṃ ca kutaḥ śūnyaṃ bhaviṣyati mi stong cung zad yod min na /
stong pa'ang yod par ga la 'gyur /
yadi śūnyatā nāma kācit syāt, tadā tadāśrayo bhāvasvabhāvaḥ syāt gal te stong pa nyid ces bya ba zhig 'ga' zhig tu yod na ni /
de'i tshe de'i rten dngos po'i rang bzhin yod par 'gyur na /
na tvevam /
iha hi śūnyatā nāmeti sarvadharmāṇāṃ sāmānyalakṣaṇamityabhyupagamāt aśūnyadharmābhāvādaśūnyataiva nāsti 		de ltar ni ma yin no /
'dir stong pa nyid dang bdag med pa nyid dag ni chos thams cad kyi spyi'i mtshan nyid yin no zhes khas blangs pas stong pa ma yin pa'i chos med pa'i phyir stong pa nyid ma yin pa yod pa ma yin no /
yadā ca aśūnyāḥ padārthā na santi, aśūnyatā ca nāsti, tadā pratipakṣanirapekṣatvācchūnyatāpi khapuṣpamālāvannāstītyavasīyatām gang gi tshe stong pa ma yin pa'i dngos po med cing stong pa nyid ma yin pa yang yod pa ma yin pa de'i tshe /
gnyen po la ltos pa dang bral bas nam mkha'i me tog gi phreng ba ltar stong pa nyid kyang yod pa ma yin no zhes nges par bya'o /
yadā ca śūnyatā nāsti, tadātadāśrayā api padārthā na santīti sthitamavikalam gang gi tshe stong pa nyid yod pa ma yin pa de'i tshe de'i rten dngos po yang yod pa ma yin no /
atrāha /
trīṇi vimokṣamukhāni śūnyatānimittāpraṇihitākhyāni vimuktaye vineyebhyo bhagavatā nirdiṣṭāni sarvatīrthikasamayāsādhāraṇāni saugata eva pravacane samupalabhyante 		'dir smras pa /
gang bstan par bya ba'i phyir sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das /
'gro ba mu stegs pa'i smra ba ma rig pa'i smag chen po'i rjes su son pa la /
'gro ba'i sgron me gcig pur gyur pa /
bdag med pa nye bar ston pa'i me lce rgyun mi chad pa mnga' ba rnams 'byung ba /
rnam par thar pa'i sgo gsum po stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma med pa dang smon pa med pa zhes bya ba /
yeṣāmupadeśārthameva buddhā bhagavanto 'śeṣatīrthyavādamahāmohāndhakārānugatajagati jagadekapradīpā nairātmyopadeśāvicchinnaśikhā utpadyante bcom ldan 'das kyis gdul bya rnams la rnam par grol bar bya ba'i phyir bstan pa mu stegs pa'i gzhung lugs thams cad dang thun mong ma yin pa dag ni /
bde bar gshegs pa'i gsung rab kho na la dmigs na /
sa bhavāṃstathāgatapravacanavyākhyānavyājena idānīṃ tāmeva śūnyatāṃ pratikṣeptumārabdhavān, ityalaṃ bhavatā svargāpavargamārgasamucchedakeneti khyod kyis ni da ltar de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung rab rnam par 'chad pa'i rgyu thabs kyis stong pa nyid de spong bar brtsams pa yin pas /
mtho ris dang byang grol gyi lam rgyun gcod par byed pa khyod dang brtsad pas chog go /
ucyate /
aho vata bhavānatyunmukha iva atyantaviparyāsānnirvāṇapuragāminaṃ śivamṛjuṃ paramaṃ panthānamavadhūya bhāvābhiniveśavyā, kulitaṃ saṃsārakāntārānugameva mārgaṃ mokṣapuragāmitvena samāśrito nirmumukṣuḥ san saṃsārāṭavīkāntāraḥ sadbhirupālabhya eva san abhimānābhiniveśagrahapavaraśatayā tānevopālabhate 		brjod par bya ste /
ae ma kyi hud gnam du phyogs pa ltar shin tu phyin ci log tu gyur pas mya ngan las 'das pa'i grong khyer du 'gro ba'i lam zhi ba drang po bor nas /
dngos po la mngon par zhan pa'i sbrul gyis dkris pa /
'khor ba'i dgon pa'i lam las thar pa'i grong khyer du 'gro ba nyid du rten pa khyod ni dam pa dag gis smad par bya ba yin bzhin du mngon pa'i nga rgyal zhen pas gzung ba'i dbang nyid kyis de dag nyid la smod par byed pa zhig ste /
nanu bhoḥ, niravaśeṣakleśavyādhicikitsakairmahāvaidyarājaiḥ kva'i nyon mongs pa'i nad ma lus par gso bar mdzad pa /
sman pa'i rgyal po chen po ni /
śūnyatā sarvadṛṣṭīnāṃ proktā niḥsaraṇaṃ jinaiḥ rgyal ba rnams kyi stong pa nyid /
lta kun nges par 'byung bar gsungs /
yeṣāṃ tu śūnyatā dṛṣṭistānasādhyān babhāṣire gang dag stong pa nyid lta ba /
de dag sgrub tu med par gsungs /
iha sarveṣāmeva dṛṣṭikṛtānāṃ sarvagrahābhiniveśānāṃ yaniḥsaraṇamapravṛttiḥ sā śūnyatā ma yin nam /
'dir stong pa nyid ni 'di lta bar gyur pa thams cad kyi mngon par zhen pa thams cad nges par 'byung ba ste log pa gang yin pa de yin la /
na ca dṛṣṭikṛtānāṃ nivṛttimātraṃ bhāvaḥ /
ye tu tasyāmapi śūnyatāyāṃ bhāvābhiniveśinaḥ, tān prati avācakā vayamiti kuto 'smadupadeśāt sakalakalpanāvyāvṛttyā mokṣo bhaviṣyati? yaḥ nakiṃcidapi te paṇyaṃ dāsyāmītyuktaḥ, sa cet 'dehi bhostadeva mahyaṃ nakiṃcinnāma paṇyam,'; iti brūyāt, sa kenopāyena śakyaḥ paṇyābhāvaṃ grāhayitum? evaṃ yeṣāṃ śūnyatāyāmapi bhāvābhiniveśaḥ, kenedānīṃ sa teṣāṃ tasyāṃ bhāvābhiniveśo niṣidhyatāmiti? ato mahābhaiṣajye 'pi doṣasaṃjñitvāt paramacikitsakairmahāvaidyaistathāgataiḥ pratyākhyātā eva te 		lta bar gyur pa rnams log pa tsam ni dngos po yang ma yin no /
gang dag stong pa nyid de la yang dngos por mngon par zhen pa de dag la ni kho bo cag mi smra ste /
de'i phyir kho bo cag gis nye bar bstan pa las rtog pa mtha' dag logs na thar par 'gyur ba ga la yod /
'di ltar gang zhig la khyod la zong ci yang mi ster ro zhes smras pa dang kye bdag la ci yang med pa zhes bya ba'i thong de nyid byin cig ces smra na /
de zong med par 'dzin du gzhug par thabs gang gis nus /
de bzhin du gang dag stong pa nyid la yang mngon par zhen pa de dag gi de la dngos por mngon par zhen pa de gang gis 'gog par 'gyur /
de'i phyir sman pa chen po la yang nyes pa'i 'du shes yod pa'i phyir gso bar mdzad pa'i mchog sman pa chen po de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis de dag bor ba nyid yin no /
yathoktaṃ bhagavatā āryaratnakūṭasūtre /
yanna śūnyatayā dharmān śūnyān karoti, api tu dharmā eva śūnyāḥ 		ji skad du 'phags pa dkon mchog brtsegs pa chen po'i mdo las /
gang stong pa nyid kyis chos rnams stong par mi byed de /
yannānimittena dharmānanimittān karoti, api tu dharmā evānimittāḥ chos rnams nyid stong pa dang gang mtshan ma med pas chos rnams mtshan ma med par mi byed de /
yannāpraṇihitena dharmānapraṇihitān karoti, api tu dharmā evāpraṇihitāḥ /
yaivaṃ pratyavekṣā, iyamucyate kāśyapa madhyamā pratipaddharmāṇāṃ bhūtapratyavekṣā 		chos rnams nyid mtshan ma med pa dang gang smon pa med pas chos rnams smon pa med par mi byed de chos rnams nyid smon pa med par gang dag de ltar so sor rtog pa de ni 'od srungs dbu ma'i lam chos rnams la yang dag par so sor rtog pa zhes bya'o /
ye hi kāśyapa śūnyatopalambhena śūnyatāṃ pratisaranti, tānahaṃ naṣṭapraṇaṣṭāniti vadāmi /
iti pravacanāt 		'od srungs gang dag stong pa nyid du dmigs pas stong pa nyid la rtog pa de dag ni ngas gsung rab 'di las nyams rab tu nyams zhes bshad do /
tathā /
varaṃ khalu kāśyapa sumerumātrā pudgaladṛṣṭirāśritā, na tveva abhāvābhiniveśikasya śūnyatādṛṣṭiḥ 		'od srungs gang zag tu lta ba ri rab tsam la gnas pa ni bla'i /
mngon pa'i nga rgyal can stong pa nyid du lta ba ni de lta ma yin no /
tatkasya hetoḥ? sarvadṛṣṭikṛtānāṃ hi kāśyapa śūnyatā niḥsaraṇam de ci'i phyir zhe na /
'od srungs lta bar gyur pa thams cad las byung ba ni stong pa nyid yin na /
yasya khalu punaḥ śūnyataiva dṛṣṭiḥ, tamahamacikitsyamiti vadāmi 'od srungs gang stong pa nyid kho nar lta ba de ni gsor mi rung ngo zhes ngas bshad do /
tadyathā kāśyapa glānaḥ puruṣaḥ syāt 'od srungs 'di lta ste dper na min pa zhig yod la /
tasmai vaidyo bhaiṣajyaṃ dadyāt /
tasya tadbhaiṣajyaṃ sarvadoṣānuccārya svayaṃ koṣṭhagataṃ na niḥsaret 		sman pas de la sman btang nas sman des de'i nad thams cad bskyod de sman lto na 'dug pa de nyid mi 'byung na /
'od srungs 'di'i snyam du sems /
tatkiṃ manyase kāśyapa api tu sa puruṣastato glānyānmukto bhavet? no hīdaṃ bhagavan mi de nad de las thar bar 'gyur ram gsol pa /
bcom ldan 'das de ni mi 'gyur lags te /
gāḍhataraṃ tasya puruṣasya glānyaṃ bhavet, yasya tadbhaiṣajyaṃ sarvadoṣānuccārya koṣṭhagataṃ na niḥsaret gang sman des nad thams cad bskyod nas sman ltor mchis pa de nyid ma byung na /
mi de'i bro nad shin tu tshabs che par 'gyur lags so /
bhagavānāha /
evameva kāśyapa sarvadṛṣṭikṛtānāṃ śūnyatā niḥsaraṇam 		bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
'od srungs de bzhin du lta bar gyur pa thams cad las 'byung ba ni stong pa nyid kho nar yin na /
yasya khalu punaḥ śūnyataiva dṛṣṭiḥ, tamahamacikitsyamiti vadāmi /
iti 		'od srungs gang dag stong pa nyid kho nar lta ba de ni gsor mi rung ngo zhes ngas bshad do zhes gsungs pa lta bu'o /
ityācāryacandrakīrtipādoparacitāyāṃ prasannapadāyāṃ madhyamakavṛttau saṃskāraparīkṣā nāma trayodaśamaṃ prakaraṇam /
saṃsargaparīkṣā caturdaśamaṃ prakaraṇam /
atrāha /
astyeva bhāvasvabhāvaḥ, tatsaṃsargopadeśāt /
iha yannāsti, na tasya saṃsargaḥ, tadyathā vandhyāsutaduhitroḥ 		slob dpon zla ba grags pa'i zhal snga nas sbyar ba'i tshig gsal ba las /
'du byed brtag pa zhes bya ba rab tu byed pa bcu gsum pa'i 'grel pa'o /
'dir smras pa /
dngos po'i rang bzhin ni yod pa nyid de /
de dag gi phrad pa nye bar bstan pa'i phyir ro /
'dir gang med pa de la ni phrad pa med do /
asti ca saṃskārāṇāṃ saṃsargopadeśaḥ /
cakṣuḥ pratītya rūpāṇi cotpadyate cakṣurvijñānam, trayāṇāṃ saṃnipātaḥ sparśaḥ, sparśasahajā vedaneti vistaraḥ 		dper na mo gsham gyi bu dang bu mo gnyis bzhin no /
mig dang gzugs la brten nas mig gi rnam par shes pa 'byung ngo zhes bya ba dang gsum 'dus pa las reg pa'o /
tathā saṃjñā ca vedanā ca saṃsṛṣṭāvetau dharmau nāsaṃsṛṣṭāviti saṃskārāṇāṃ saṃsargopadeśaḥ /
tadevaṃ saṃsargopadeśādvidyata eva bhāvasvabhāva iti 		reg pa dang lhan cig 'byung ba ni tshor ba'o zhes rgya cher 'byung ba dang de bzhin du tshor ba dang 'du shes zhes bya ba'i chos 'di gnyis ni phrad pa yin gyi /
ma phrad pa ni ma yin no zhes 'du byed rnams la ni phrad par bstan pa yang yin no /
de'i phyir de ltar phrad pa bstan pa las ni dngos po'i rang bzhin yod pa nyid do /
ucyate /
syādetadevam, yadi saṃsarga eva bhavato bhavet, na tvasti, yasmāt 		brjod par bya ste /
gal te phrad pa nyid yod par 'gyur na /
'di de ltar 'gyur ba zhig na yod pa ni ma yin no /
gang gi phyir /
draṣṭavyaṃ darśanaṃ draṣṭā trīṇyetāni dviśo dviśaḥ blta bya lta ba lta ba po /
gsum po de dag gnyis gnyis dang /
sarvaśaśca na saṃsargamanyonyena brajantyuta thams cad kyang ni phan tshun du /
phrad par 'gyur ba yod ma yin /
de la blta bya ni gzugs so /
tatra draṣṭavyaṃ rūpam,darśanaṃ cakṣuḥ, draṣṭā vijñānam lta ba ni mig go /
lta ba po ni mig gi rnam par shes pa'o /
eṣāṃ trayāṇāṃ dviśo dviśaḥ saṃsargo nāsti /
cakṣuṣo rūpasya ca, cakṣuṣo vijñānasya ca, vijñānasya rūpasya ca saṃsargo nāsti 		gsum po 'di dag las rnam pa gnyis gnyis phrad pa ni yod pa ma yin te /
mig dang gzugs sam /
mig dang rnam par shes pa'am /
rnam par shes pa dang gzugs la phrad pa yod pa ma yin no /
ityevaṃ dviśo dviśaḥ saṃsargo na bhavati de ltar rnam pa gnyis gnyis dang phrad pa yod pa ma yin no /
sarvaśo 'pi trayāṇāmapyeṣāṃ yugapacca saṃsargo nāsti /
yathā ca draṣṭavyadarśanadraṣṭaṇāṃ dviśo dviśaḥ sarvaśaśca saṃsargābhāvaḥ, 		thams cad kyang ni ste gsum po de dag cig car phrad pa yang yod pa ma yin no /
ji ltar blta bar bya ba dang lta ba dang lta ba po rnams gnyis gnyis sam thams cad du yang phrad pa med pa /
evaṃ rāgaśca raktaśca rañjanīyaṃ ca dṛśyatām de bzhin 'dod chags chags pa dang chags par bya ba lta ba ste /
'dod chags dang chags pa'am /
rāgasya raktasya ca saṃsargo nāsti, rāgasya rañjanīyasya ca, trayāṇāmapi yugapatsaṃsargo nāsti 'dod chags dang chags par bya ba la phrad pa yod pa ma yin la /
gsum po dag cig car yang phrad pa yod pa ma yin no /
yathā caiṣām, evam 'di dag ji ltar yin pa de bzhin du /
traidhena śeṣāḥ kleśāśca śeṣāṇyāyatanāni ca nyon mongs pa /
lhag ma rnams dang skye mched kyi /
anyonyena saṃsargaṃ na vrajanti /
trayaḥ prakārāstridhā, tridhābhāvastraidham /
tena traidhena śeṣāḥ kleśā dveṣamohādayaḥ, te ete dveṣadviṣṭadveṣaṇīyādinā traidhena śrotraśrotṛśrotavyādinā ca 		lhag ma'ang rnam gsum nyid kyis so /
ste phan tshun du phrad par 'gyur ba yod pa ma yin no /
rnam pa gsum ni rnam gsum mo /
rnam pa gsum gyi dngos po ni rnam gsum nyid de /
rnam gsum nyid nges so /
nyon mongs pa lhag ma ni zhe sdang dang gti mug la sogs pa dag go /
de dag ni zhe sdang dang zhe sdang ba po dang spang bya la sogs pa rnam pa gsum gyis yin la /
nyan pa dang nyan pa po dang mnyan par bya ba la sogs pa gsum gyis kyang ngo /
kasmātpunareteṣāṃ saṃsargo nāstītyāha /
anyenānyasya saṃsargastaccānyatvaṃna vidyate 		yang ci'i phyir 'di dag la phrad par yod pa ma yin zhe na /
gzhan dang gzhan du phrad 'gyur na /
gang phyir blta bya la sogs pa /
gzhan de yod pa ma yin pa /
draṣṭavyaprabhṛtīnāṃ yanna saṃsargaṃ vrajantyataḥ /
yadityayaṃ yasmādarthe 		de phyir phrad par mi 'gyur ro /
zhes gsungs te /
gang phyir zhes bya ba 'di ni gang gi phyir gyi don la'o /
yadi draṣṭavyādīnāṃ parasparamanyatvaṃ syāt, tadā kṣīrodakayoriva anyena anyasya saṃsargaḥ syāt gal te blta bar bya ba la sogs pa dag la phan tshun du gzhan nyid yod na ni /
de'i tshe chu dang 'o ma gnyis bzhin du phan tshun phrad pa yod par 'gyur ba zhig na /
taccānyatvaṃ yasmādeṣāṃ draṣṭavyaprabhṛtīnāṃ na saṃbhavati, ato naite saṃsarga brajanti gang gi phyir blta bar bya ba la sogs pa dag la gzhan de yod pa ma yin pa de'i phyir /
de dag phrad par mi 'gyur ro /
api ca gzhan yang /
na ca kevalamanyatvaṃ draṣṭavyāderna vidyate blta bya la sogs 'ba' zhig la /
gzhan nyid med par ma zad kyi /
kasyacitkenacitsārdhaṃ nānyatvamupapadyate gang yang gang dang lhan cig tu /
gzhan pa nyid du mi 'thad do /
na ca kevalaṃ kāryakāraṇabhāvasthitānāṃ draṣṭavyādīnāmanyatvaṃ na saṃbhavati, ghaṭapaṭādīnāmapi padārthānāṃ sarveṣāṃ naiva saṃbhavatītyavasīyatām blta bar bya ba la sogs pa rgyu dang 'bras bu'i dngos por gnas pa rnams 'ba' zhig la gzhan nyid yod pa ma yin par ma zad kyi /
bum pa dang snam bu la sogs pa'i dngos po thams cad la yang yod pa ma yin no zhes nges par bya'o /
yathā caiṣāṃ draṣṭavyaprabhṛtīnāṃ parasparato 'nyatvamasat, tathā pratipādayannāha blta bar bya ba la sogs pa 'di dag la phan tshun gzhan nyid ji ltar med pa de ltar bstan pa'i phyir /
anyadanyatpratītyānyannānyadanyadṛte 'nyataḥ gzhan ni gzhan la brten te gzhan /
gzhan med par gzhan gzhan mi 'gyur /
yatpratītya ca yattasmāttadanyannopapadyate gang la brten te gang yin pa /
de ni de las gzhan mi 'thad /
iha yadetad ghaṭākhyaṃ vastu paṭādanyaditi vyapadiśyate, tadetadanyadanyatpratītya anyadbhavati ces gsungs te /
'dir bum pa zhes bya ba'i dngos po snam bu las gzhan no zhes brjod pa gang yin pa'i gzhan de ni gzhan la brten nas gzhan du 'gyur la /
anyavastunaḥ ṛte, ṛte 'nyataḥ, vinā anyat, anyadanyanna bhavati dngos po gzhan med par te gzhan mi bdog par ni gzhan gzhan du mi 'gyur ro /
yacca paṭākhyaṃ vastu anyad ghaṭākhyaṃ vastu pratītya anyadbhavati, tasmātpaṭākhyādvastunaḥ tad ghaṭākhyaṃ vastu nānyadbhavatītyavasīyatām bum pa zhes bya ba'i dngos po gang zhig snam bu zhes bya ba'i dngos po gzhan la brten nas gzhan yin par 'gyur ba'i bum pa zhes bya ba'i dngos po de ni snam bu'i dngos po de las gzhan du 'gyur ba ni ma yin no zhes bya bar nges par bya'o /
yasmāt, yatpratītya yadbhavati, tasmāttadanyanna bhavati, sāpekṣatvād bījāṅkuravat hrasvadīrghavacceti gang gi phyir gang la brten nas gang zhig tu 'gyur ba de ni de las gzhan du mi 'gyur te /
ltos pa dang bcas pa'i phyir sa bon dang myu gu 'am /
tathā ca vakṣyati /
pratītya yadyadbhavati na hi tāvattadeva tat 		ring po dang thung ngu bzhin no /
de skad du yang /
gang la brten te gang 'byung ba /
de ni re zhig de nyid min /
na cānyadapi tattasmānnocchinnaṃ nāpi śāśvatat de ni gzhan pa'ang ma yin phyir /
de phyir rtag min chad ma yin /
iti /
atrāha /
yadi ghaṭādanyaḥ paṭaḥ syāt, taṃ ca pṛthagbhūtaṃ paṭamapekṣya anyo ghaṭaḥ syāt, tadā ko doṣa iti 		zhes 'tshang par 'gyur ro /
'dir smras pa /
gal te snam bu ni bum pa las gzhan yin la /
tha dad par gyur pa'i snam bu de la ltos nas bum pa gzhan du 'gyur na de'i tshe nyes pa ci zhig yod ce na /
ucyate /
yadyanyadanyadanyasmādanyasmādapyṛte bhavet 		brjod par bya ste /
gal te gzhan ni gzhan las gzhan /
de tshe gzhan med par gzhan 'gyur /
tadanyadanyadanyasmādṛte nāsti ca nāstyataḥ /
eko 'tra anyaśabda upadarśane, aparaśca arthāntaraparāmarśī, anyaśca prasiddhoccāraṇam, iti anyaśabdatrayopādānam /
yadi hi etad ghaṭākhyaṃ vastu paṭādanyasmādanyat syāt, tad ghaṭākhyaṃ vastu anyasmādapi paṭākhyādṛte anyadbhavet, tadā ca paṭanirapekṣasyaiva ekaikasya ghaṭasya anyatvaṃ bhavet /
yaddhi yasmādanyat, tattena vināpi siddhayati 		gzhan med par ni gzhan 'gyur ba /
yod min de yi phyir na med /
ces bya ba ste /
'dir gzhan gyi sgra gcig ni nye bar bstan par bya ba yin la /
gzhan ni don gzhan 'dzin pa yin zhing /
yang gzhan ni rab tu grags par gyur pa brjod pa yin pas gzhan gyi sgra gsum nye bar bkod do /
gal te bum pa zhes bya ba'i dngos po de gzhan snam bu las gzhan yin par 'gyur na ni /
bum pa zhes bya ba'i dngos po de gzhan snam bu med par yang gzhan du 'gyur te /
de'i tshe snam bu la ma ltos pa'i bum pa gcig pu gzhan nyid du 'gyur ro /
'di ltar gang zhig gang las gzhan yin pa de ni de med par yang 'grub ste /
tadyathā /
sa eva ghaṭo na svarūpaniṣpattāvanyaṃ paṭamapekṣate 		dper na bum pa de nyid rang gi ngo bor grub pa las gzhan snam bu la mi ltos pa bzhin no /
evamanyatvamapi yadi ghaṭasya anyasmātpaṭādṛte bhavet, tadānīṃ paṭanirapekṣasya ghaṭasya paratvaṃ syāt de bzhin du gal te bum pa'i gzhan nyid gzhan snam bu las yin na ni /
de'i tshe snam bu la ma ltos pa'i bum pa la yang gzhan nyid yin par 'gyur na /
na tu ekaikasya paṭanirapekṣasya ghaṭasyānyatvaṃ dṛṣṭam snam bu la ma ltos pa'i bum pa gcig pu la ni gzhan nyid ma mthong ngo /
de'i phyir /
tasmādanyadbhavatīti bruvatā yadapekṣya yadanyat, tatastadanyanna bhavatīti sphuṭamabhyupetaṃ bhavati gzhan la brten nas gzhan du 'gyur ro zhes smra ba na /
gang la ltos nas gang zhig gzhan yin pa de ni de las gzhan ma yin no zhes gsal bar khas blangs par 'gyur ro /
atrāha /
yadi khalu anyatvamevaṃ kutaścitkasyacinnāsti, nanu idamapi tadā na saṃbhavati vaktum 		'dir smras pa /
gal te de ltar 'ga' zhig las gzhan nyid 'ga' zhig la yod pa ma yin na /
de'i tshe gang gi phyir gzhan ni gzhan la brten nas gzhan yin pa de'i phyir /
yasmādanyatpratītya anyadanyadbhavatīti, tasmādeva tadanyadanyanna bhavatīti de gzhan du mi 'gyur ro zhes bya ba 'di nyid kyang brjod par mi srid pa ma yin nam /
brjod par bya ste /
ucyate /
yata eva hi parasparāpekṣikī bhāvānāmanyatvasiddhiḥ, ata eva anyadityucyate laukike vyavahāre sthitvā 		gang gi phyir /
dngos po rnams kyi gzhan nyid grub pa phan tshun ltos pa ma yin pa de nyid kyi phyir /
'jig rten pa'i tha snyad la gnas te gzhan zhes brjod kyi /
vastutastu parīkṣyamāṇamanyatvaṃ na saṃbhavatīti brūmaḥ dngos su na gzhan nyid brtags pa na yod pa ma yin no zhes smra'o /
gal te gzhan nyid yod pa ma yin yang /
yadi tarhi evamapyavidyamāne 'pyanyatve lokasaṃvṛtyā paṭādanyo ghaṭa iti vyapadiśyate, atha kasmād bījāṅkurayorapi evamanyatvaṃ na vyapadiśyate? ucyate 'jig rten pa'i kun rdzob tu bum pa snam bu las gzhan yin no zhes brjod na /
'o na ni sa bon dang myu gu gnyis kyang gzhan nyid du ci'i phyir mi smra zhe na /
brjod par bya ste /
naiva hi loko ghaṭapaṭayoriva bījāṅkurayoranyatvaṃ pratipadyate, ghaṭapaṭayoriva janyajanakatvābhāvaprasaṅgāt, yaugapadyabhāvaprasaṅgāt /
api ca 		'jig rten pas ni sa bon dang myu gu gnyis bum pa dang snam bu ltar gzhan nyid du mi rtogs pa nyid de /
bum pa dang snam bu ltar bskyed bya skyed byed nyid med par thal ba'i phyir dang cig car yod par thal bar 'gyur ba nyid kyi phyir ro /
yasmādbījamātramu tvā bījakāryaṃ vṛkṣamupadarśayati pumān loke /
ayaṃ vṛkṣo mayopta iti, tasmālloke 'pi kāryakāraṇabhūtānāṃ nāstyeva paratvamiti vyavasthāpyate 		gzhan yang gang gi phyir 'jig rten pa ni shing 'di ngas btsugs so zhes sa bon tsam zhig btsugs nas sa bon gyi 'bras bu shing ston par byed pa yin te /
de'i phyir rgyu dang 'bras bur gyur pa rnams kyi gzhan nyid ni 'jig rten na yang yod pa ma yin no zhes bya bar rnam par 'jog pa yin no /
atrāha /
yadi padārthāntare padārthāntarasāpekṣā parabuddhiḥ syāt, syādeṣa doṣaḥ 		'dir smras pa /
gal te dngos po gzhan la ltos pa dang bcas pa'i gzhan gyi blo 'byung na ni /
tasmāttadanyanna bhavatīti /
na tvevaṃ brūmaḥ /
kiṃ tarhi iha anyatvaṃ nāma sāmānyaviśeṣo 'sti, tadyatra samavetam sa padārthaḥ padārthāntaranirapekṣayāpi para ityucyate, tasmāduktadoṣānavasaro 'smatpakṣe iti 		de'i phyir de gzhan du mi 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i nyes pa 'dir 'gyur na /
de skad du ni mi smra ste /
'o na ci zhe na /
'di na gzhan nyid ces bya ba spyi yang yin la khyad par yang yin pa zhig yod pa yin la /
de gang la 'du ba'i dngos po de ni dngos po gzhan la ltos pa med kyang gzhan zhes rjod par byed de /
de'i phyir kho bo cag gi phyogs la smras pa'i nyes pa'i go skabs med do /
ucyate syādetadevam, yadi anyatvameva syāt, na tvasti brjod par bya ste /
gal te gzhan nyid yod na ni 'di de ltar 'gyur na yod pa ni ma yin no /
ihedamanyatvaṃ kalpyamānamanyasmin vā kalpyeta ananyasmin vā? ubhayathā ca nopapadyata iti pratipādayannāha 'dir gzhan nyid 'di rtog pa na /
gzhan nam gzhan ma yin pa zhig la rtog grangs gnyi ga ltar yang mi 'thad do zhes bstan pa'i phyir /
gzhan nyid gzhan /
nānyasmin vidyate 'nyatvamananyasminna vidyate /
tatra anyasminnanyatvamastīti kalpyate, kiṃ tadānīmanyatvaparikalpanayā? anyavyapadeśasiddhayarthaṃ hi bhavatā anyatvaṃ parikalpyate 		la yod ma yin /
gzhan ma yin la'ang yod ma yin /
zhes gsungs so /
de la gal te gzhan la gzhan nyid yod do zhes rtog na ni /
gzhan nyid brtags pas ci zhig bya /
gzhan nyid du rtogs pa ni gzhan du brjod pa grub par bya ba'i phyir yin na /
sa ca anyavyapadeśo vināpyanyatvena siddha eva, yasmāllabdhānyavyapadeśa eva padārthe 'nyasmin anyatvaṃ kalpyate, ityevaṃ tāvadanyasminnanyatvaṃ na saṃbhavati idānīmananyasminnapi anyatvaṃ nāsti, yasmādananya ucyate ekaḥ, tatra ca anyatvaviruddhamekatvamastīti yataḥ virodhādananyasminnapi anyatvaṃ na saṃbhavati gzhan du brjod pa de ni gzhan nyid med par yang grub pa nyid de /
gang gi phyir gzhan du brjod pa rnyed pa'i dngos po gzhan la gzhan nyid rtog pa'i phyir ro /
de ltar na re zhig gzhan la gzhan nyid mi srid do /
da ni gzhan ma yin pa la yang gzhan nyid yod pa ma yin te /
gang gi phyir gzhan ma yin pa ni gcig nyid la bya la /
de la ni gzhan nyid dang 'gal ba gcig nyid yod pa de'i phyir 'gal bas /
gzhan ma yin pa la yang gzhan nyid yod pa ma yin no /
yacca idānīṃ nānyasminnananyasmin vidyate tadvayatiriktasya padārthāntarasyāsaṃbhavād etadvayatirikte 'pi padārthe na saṃbhavati, tatraivāsti gang zhig de ltar gzhan dang gzhan nyid ma yin pa la yod pa ma yin zhing /
de dag las ma gtogs pa'i dngos po med pas de dag las ma gtogs pa'i dngos po la yang yod pa ma yin pa de ni med pa nyid do /
yadā caivamanyatvameva nāsti, tadā anyatvasamavāyanibandhanaḥ anyabuddhidhvanipravṛttiheturanyo 'pi padārtho nāstīti siddham gang gi phyir de ltar gzhan nyid med pa de'i tshe gzhan nyid dang 'du ba'i rgyu can blo dang sgra 'jug pa'i rgyu dngos po gzhan yang yod pa ma yin no zhes bya bar grub bo /
atrāha /
yadyapi anyatvaṃ nāsti, tathāpi anyastāvadasti 		'dir smras pa /
gal te gzhan nyid med pa de lta na yang gzhan ni re zhig yod pa yin la /
na ca asati anyatve anyo bhavitumarhati, ato 'nyatvaṃ bhaviṣyatīti gzhan nyid med par ni gzhan yod par 'os pa yang ma yin te /
de'i phyir gzhan nyid kyang yod par 'gyur ro /
ucyate /
avidyamāne cānyatve nāstyanyadvā tadeva vā 		brjod par bya ste /
gzhan nyid yod pa ma yin na /
gzhan nam de nyid yod ma yin /
yadā anyatvameva nāstīti prāk pratipāditam, tadā kutaḥ asati anyatve anyadvā tadeva vā bhaviṣyati? tadeveti ananyatvamityarthaḥ /
tasmānnāsti anyadvā tadeva vā 		gang gi tshe sngar gzhan nyid ni yod pa ma yin no zhes bstan zin pa de'i tshe gzhan nyid med par gzhan nam de nyid yod par ga la 'gyur /
de nyid ces bya ba ni gzhan ma yin pa nyid ces bya ba'i tha tshig go /
de'i phyir gzhan nam de nyid yod pa ma yin no /
atrāha /
vidyanta eva darśanādayaḥ, saṃsargasadbhāvāt /
iha darśanādīnāṃ yadyapi anyatvaṃ nāstīti pratipāditam, tathāpi trayāṇāṃ saṃnipātaḥ saṃgatiḥ sparśa iti saṃsargo 'sti /
tataśca saṃsargasadbhāvād vidyanta eva darśanādaya iti 		'dir smras pa /
lta ba la sogs pa dag ni yod pa nyid de /
phrad pa yod pa'i phyir ro /
'dir gal te yang lta ba la sogs pa dag la gzhan nyid med do zhes bstan zin mod kyi /
de lta na yang reg pa ni gsum 'dus shing tshogs pa'o zhes bya bas phrad pa yang yod pa yin te /
de'i phyir phrad pa yod pas lta ba la sogs pa dag yod pa nyid do /
ucyate /
syurevam, yadi teṣāṃ saṃsarga eva syāt 		brjod par bya ste /
gal te de dag phrad pa nyid yod na ni de ltar 'gyur na /
na tvasti /
yathā ca nāsti, tathā pratipādayannāha 		yod pa ni ma yin no /
ji ltar yod pa ma yin pa de ltar bstan pa'i phyir /
de ni de dang phrad pa med /
na tena tasya saṃsargo nānyenānyasya yujyate gzhan dang gzhan yang phrad mi 'gyur /
zhes gsungs te /
iha yadi darśanādīnāṃ saṃsargaḥ syāt, sa ekatvena vā parikalpyeta anyatvena vā? tatra ekatve nāsti saṃsargaḥ /
na hi ekakaṃ kṣīramudakanirapekṣamudakena saṃsṛjyata ityucyate /
pṛthaktve 'pi saṃsargo nāsti /
na hi udakātpṛthagavasthitaṃ kṣīramudakena saṃsṛjyata iti kathyate 		'dir gal te lta ba la sogs pa dang phrad pa yin na /
de dag gcig nyid dam gzhan nyid du brtag grang /
de la gcig nyid yin na ni phrad pa med de /
chu la ltos pa med pa'i 'o ma gcig pu la ni chu dang phrad pa zhes mi brjod do /
tha dad pa yin na yang phrad pa med de /
chu las tha dad du gnas pa'i 'o ma la ni chu dang phrad pa zhes mi smra'o /
evaṃ darśanādīnāṃ yadi ekatve sati saṃsargaḥ parikalpyate, so 'nupapannaḥ de ltar gal te lta ba la sogs pa dag gcig nyid yin pa na /
phrad par rtog na de ni mi 'thad de /
ekakasyāpi cakṣuṣaḥ saṃsṛṣṭiprasaṅgāt /
atha pṛthaktvam, evamapyanupapannaḥ 		mig gcig pu la yang phrad pa yod par thal bar 'gyur ba'i phyir ro /
'on te tha dad pa nyid yin na /
de lta na yang mi 'thad pa nyid de /
ekakasyāpi cakṣuṣo rūpādibhyaḥ pṛthagbhūtasya saṃsṛṣṭiprasaṅgāt gzugs la sogs pa las so sor gyur pa'i mig gcig pu la yang phrad pa yod par thal bar 'gyur ba'i phyir ro /
asati saṃsarge nāsti darśanādikamiti siddham phrad pa med na ni lta ba la sogs pa yang med do zhes bya bar grub bo /
atrāha /
yadyapi saṃsargo nāsti, tathāpi saṃsṛjyamānaṃ saṃsṛṣṭaṃ saṃsraṣṭā cāsti, tadapratiṣedhāt 		'dir smras pa /
gal te yang phrad pa yod pa ma yin mod kyi /
de lta na yang phrad bzhin pa dang phrad pa dang phrad pa po ni yod pa ma yin te /
na ca saṃsargamantareṇa saṃsṛjyamānaṃ saṃsṛṣṭaṃ saṃsraṣṭā ca saṃbhavati /
tasmātsaṃsargo 'pi bhaviṣyatīti 		de dag bkag pa med pa'i phyir ro /
phrad bzhin pa dang phrad pa dang phrad pa po ni phrad pa med par yod pa yang ma yin te /
de'i phyir phrad pa yang yod par 'gyur ro /
ucyate /
etadapi na yuktam 		brjod par bya ste /
'di yang mi rigs te /
yasmādyadā saṃsarga eva nāstīti pratipāditam, asati ca saṃsarge tadā kutaḥ saṃsṛjyamānādikam? tatra vartamānasaṃsargakriyāsādhanakarmabhūtaṃ saṃsṛjyamānam, saṃsṛṣṭaṃ niṣpannasaṃsargakriyam, saṃsraṣṭā kartā kriyāniṣpattau svātantryeṇāvasthitaḥ gang gi phyir gang gi tshe phrad pa nyid med do zhes bstan pa de'i tshe phrad pa med par phrad bzhin pa la sogs pa yod par ga la 'gyur /
de la phrad bzhin pa ni da ltar ba phrad pa'i bya ba'i sgrub byed las su gyur pa'o /
phrad pa ni phrad pa'i bya ba rdzogs pa can no /
tadatra saṃsargābhāvādeva saṃsṛjyamānādikamapaśyaṃstatpratiṣedhaṃ nigamayannāha /
saṃsṛjyamānaṃ saṃsṛṣṭaṃsaṃsraṣṭā ca na vidyate 		phrad pa po ni byed pa po bya ba rdzogs par bya ba la rang dbang du gnas pa'o /
de'i phyir 'dir phrad pa med pas /
phrad bzhin pa la sogs pa ma gzigs shing /
de dgag pa mjug bsdu ba'i phyir /
phrad bzhin pa dang phrad pa dang /
phrad pa po yang yod ma yin /
iti /
yathoktaṃ bhagavatā [upāliparipṛcchāyām] 		zhes gsungs so /
de nyid kyi phyir /
bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang /
sarvasayogi tu paśyati cakṣustatra na paśyati pratyayahīnam mig ni ldan na thams cad mthong 'gyur te /
mig gis gzugs rnams mthong ba gang yin pa'ang /
[naiva ca] cakṣu papaśyati [rūpaṃ] tena sayogaviyogavikalpaḥ mtshan mo rkyen rnams med na mthong mi 'gyur /
de phyir ldan dang bral ba rnam rtog yin /
ālokasamāśrita paśyati cakṣu rūpa manorama citravicitram mig ni snang la brten te yid 'ong dang /
yid du mi 'ong sna tshogs gzugs mthong bas /
yena ca yogasamāśrita cakṣustena na paśyati cakṣu kadāci de ltar ldan pa brten te mthong bas na /
de phyir mig gis nam yang mthong ba med /
te parinirvṛta laukika śūrā yehi svabhāvata jñātibhi dharmāḥ gang dag rang bzhin med chos 'di shes pa; ;dpa' bo de dag 'jig rten mya ngan 'da' /
'dod pa'i yon tan spyod cing chags med cing /
kāmaguṇairhi caranti asaṅgāḥ saṅga vivarjiya sattva vinenti chags pa rnams spangs sems can 'dul bar byed /
'di na sems can 'ga' med srog med kyang /
no pi ca sattva na jīviha kaści sattvahitaṃ ca karonti jinendrāḥ mi dbang rnams ni sems can phan pa mdzad /
sems can yod pa min yang don mdzad pa /
de dag rnams kyi don ni dka' ba che /
............. sattvu na asti karonti ca artham zhes bya ba nas /
de la nam yang chags pa yod ma yin /
saṅgu na vidyati atra kadāci .............. /
............. tasya na vidyati vedana loke /
tathā 		gang dag chos nyid 'di la mos gyur pa /
de dag yid ni srid la chags mi 'gyur /
zhes bya ba'i bar dang de bzhin du /
bhāvitu mārga pavartitu jñāna śūnyaka dharma nirātmaka sarvi gang gis lam bsgoms chos kun stong pa dang /
bdag med ye shes rab tu bskyed byas nas /
yena vibhāvita bhontimi dharmāstasya bhavetpratibhānamanantam chos 'di dag ni rnam par bsgom 'gyur ba /
de yi spobs pa thogs pa med par 'gyur /
ityācāryacandrakīrtipādoparacitāyāṃ prasannapadāyāṃ madhyamakavṛttau saṃsargaparīkṣā nāma caturdaśamaṃ prakaraṇam /
svabhāvaparīkṣā pañcadaśamaṃ prakaraṇam 		zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs so /
slob dpon zla ba grags pa'i zhal snga nas sbyar ba'i tshig gsal ba las /
phrad pa brtag pa zhes bya ba rab tu byed pa bcu bzhi pa'i 'grel pa'o /
atrāha /
vidyata eva bhāvānāṃ svabhāvaḥ, tanniṣpādakahetupratyayopādānāt 		'dir smras pa /
dngos po rnams kyi rang bzhin ni yod pa nyid de /
de dag skyed par byed pa'i rgyu dang rkyen nye bar len pa'i phyir ro /
iha yannāsti na tasya niṣpādakahetupratyayopādānamasti yathā khapuṣpasya 'dir gang yang yod pa ma yin pa de la ni skyed par byed pa'i rgyu dang rkyen nye bar len pa yod pa ma yin te /
dper na nam mkha'i me tog bzhin no /
upādīyante ca bījāvidyādayo hetupratyayā aṅkarasaṃskārādīnāṃ niṣpādakāḥ, ityato vidyata eva bhāvasvabhāva iti myu gu dang 'du byed la sogs pa rnams skyed par byed pa'i rgyu dang rkyen sa bon dang ma rig pa la sogs pa dag nye bar len pa yang yin te /
de'i phyir dngos po'i rang bzhin yod pa nyid yin no /
ucyate /
yadi bhāvānāṃ saṃskārāṅkurādīnāṃ svabhāvo 'sti, kimidānīṃ vidyamānānāṃ hetupratyayaiḥ prayojanam 		brjod par bya ste /
gal te dngos po 'du byed dang myu gu la sogs pa rnams la rang bzhin yod na ni /
de'i tshe yod par gyur pa rnams la rgyu dang rkyen dag gis dgos pa ci zhig yod de /
yathā vartamānībhūtānāṃ saṃskārāṅkurādīnāṃ bhūyoniṣpattaye avidyābījādīnāmupādānaṃ kriyate evamanyadapi tadutpattaye na kartavyaṃ syāt, tatsvabhāvasya vidyamānatvāditi pratipādayannāha ji ltar 'du byed dang myu gu la sogs pa da lta bar gyur pa rnams la yang bskyed par bya ba'i ched du ma rig pa dang sa bon la sogs pa dag nye bar len par mi byed pa de bzhin du gzhan la yang de bskyed par bya ba'i phyir blang bar mi bya bar 'gyur te /
de'i rang bzhin yod par 'gyur ba'i phyir ro zhes bstan pa'i phyir /
na saṃbhavaḥ svabhāvasya yuktaḥ pratyayahetubhiḥ rang bzhin rgyu dang rkyen las ni /
'byung bar rigs pa ma yin no /
atha syāt zhes gsungs so /
naivotpādātpūrvaṃ kasyacidbhāvasya svabhāvo 'sti yato 'sya vidyamānatvādutpattivaiyarthyaṃ syāt, kiṃ tarhi utpādātpūrvamavidyamānasyaiva svabhāvasya hetupratyayān pratītya paścādutpādo bhavatīti /
evamapīḥyamāṇe 		ci ste gang las de yod pa nyid kyis skye ba don med par 'gyur ba skye ba'i snga rol du ni dngos po 'ga' la yang rang bzhin yod pa ma yin te /
'o na ci zhe na /
skye ba'i snga rol du yod pa ma yin pa'i rang bzhin kho na rgyu dang rkyen la brten te phyis 'byung bar 'gyur ro snyam na /
de ltar 'dod na yang /
hetupratyayasaṃbhūtaḥ svabhāvaḥ kṛtako bhavet /
atha syāt /
iṣyata eva hetupratyayasaṃbhūtatvātsvabhāvasya kṛtakatvam, tasmātkṛtakasyaiva svabhāvasyābhyupagamāt kṛtakatvaprasaṅgo nāsmākaṃ bādhaka iti, etadapi na yuktamityāha 		rgyu dang rkyen las byung ba yi /
rang bzhin byas pa can du 'gyur ro /
ci ste rgyu dang rkyen las byung bas rang bzhin byas pa nyid du 'gyur ba na 'dod pa kho na ste /
de'i phyir rang bzhin byas pa nyid du khas blangs pa'i phyir /
byas pa thal bar brtsad pa ni kho bo cag la gnod par byed pa ma yin no snyam na /
'di yang mi rigs so zhes gsungs pa /
svabhāvaḥ kṛtako nāma bhaviṣyati punaḥ katham rang bzhin byas pa can zhes byar /
ji lta bur na rung bar 'gyur /
kṛtakaśceti svabhāvaśceti parasparaviruddhatvādasaṃgatārthametat byas pa yang yin la /
rang bzhin yang yin no zhes bya ba 'di ni phan tshun 'gal ba'i phyir 'brel pa med pa'i don yin no /
iha hi svo bhāvaḥ svabhāva iti vyutpatteḥ, yaḥ kṛtakaḥ padārthaḥ, sa loke naiva svabhāva iti vyapadiśyate, tadyathā apāmauṣpyaṃ dhātupiśācapratyayaniṣpāditaḥ karkeṭanādīnāṃ padmarāgādibhāvaśca 'di ltar 'dir rang gi ngo bo ni rang bzhin no zhes bya bar bye brag tu bshad pa las na dngos po byas pa gang yin pa de ni 'jig rten na rang bzhin zhes mi brjod de /
dper na chu'i tsha ba dang ke ke ru la sogs pa dag nor sgyur mkhan gyis 'bad pas padma r'a ga la sogs pa'i dngos por byas pa lta bu'o /
gang zhig rang bzhin yin pa de ni ma byas pa yin te /
dper na me'i tsha ba nyid dam /
yastu akṛtakaḥ sa svabhāvaḥ, tadyathā agnerauṣṇyaṃ jātānāṃ padmarāgādīnāṃ padmarāgādisvabhāvaśca padma r'a ga la sogs pa rig ma rnams kyi padma r'a ga la sogs pa rnams kyi ngo bo bzhin te /
de ni dngos po gzhan dang phrad pas ma bskyed pa'i phyir de dag gi rang bzhin zhes bya'o /
sa hi teṣāṃ padārthāntarasaṃparkājanitatvātsvabhāva ityucyate /
tadevamakṛtakaḥ svabhāva iti lokavyavahāre vyavasthite vayamidānīṃ brūmaḥ 		de'i phyir de ltar rang bzhin ni ma byas pa yin no zhes 'jig rten gyi tha snyad rnam par gnas pa yin dang da ni kho bo cag tsha ba nyid gang yin pa de yang byas pa'i phyir mi'i rang bzhin ma yin no zhes gzung bar bya'o zhes smra'o /
yadetadauṣṇyaṃ tadaṣyagneḥ svabhāvo na bhavatīti gṛhyatāṃ kṛtakatvāt, iha maṇīndhanādityasamāgamādaraṇinirdharṣaṇādeśca agnerhetupratyayasāpekṣataiva upalabhyate 'dir nor bu dang me spru dang nyi ma phrad pa dang gtsub shing dang gtsubs pa las byung ba'i me ni rgyu dang rkyen la ltos pa dang bcas pa nyid du dmigs la /
me las gzhan pa'i tsha ba nyid kyang med pa de'i phyir tsha ba nyid kyang rgyu dang rkyen gyis bskyed pa yin te /
na ca agnivyatiriktamauṣṇyaṃ saṃbhavati /
tasmādauṣṇyamapi hetupratyayajanitam, tataśca kṛtakam, kṛtakatvāccāpāmauṣṇyavat svabhāvo naiva bhavatīti sphuṭamavasīyate /
nanu ca gopālāṅganājanaprasiddhametad agnerauṣṇyaṃ svabhāva iti 		de'i phyir byas pa yin zhing /
byas pa yin pa'i phyir na /
chu'i tsha ba bzhin du rang bzhin ma yin no zhes bya bar ches gsal bar nges pa yin no /
gal te me'i rang bzhin ni tsha ba nyid do zhes skye bo ba glang rdzi dang bud med yan chad la grags pa ma yin nam zhe na /
kiṃ khalu asmābhiruktaṃ na prasiddhamiti? etattu vayaṃ brūmaḥ ci kho bo cag gis ma grags so zhes smras sam /
'di ni rang bzhin yin par mi 'os te /
nāyaṃ svabhāvo bhavitumarhati svabhāvalakṣaṇaviyuktatvāt rang bzhin gyi mtshan nyid dang bral ba'i phyir ro zhes bya ba 'di ni kho bo cag smra'o /
avidyāviparyāsānugamāttu loko niḥsvabhāvameva bhāvajātaṃ sasvabhāvatvena pratipannaḥ ma rig pa'i phyin ci log gi rjes su song ba'i phyir 'jig rten pas ni dngos po'i rnam pa rang bzhin med pa nyid la rang bzhin dang bcas pa nyid du rtogs pa yin no /
yathā hi taimirikāḥ timirapratyayādasantameva keśādisvabhāvaṃ sasvabhāvatvenābhiniviṣṭāḥ, evamavidyātimiropahatamatinayanatayā bālā niḥsvabhāvaṃ bhāvajātaṃ sasvabhāvatvenābhiniviṣṭā yathābhiniveśaṃ lakṣaṇamācakṣate agnerauṣṇyaṃ svalakṣaṇam /
tato 'nyatrānupalambhādasādhāraṇatvena svameva lakṣaṇamiti kṛtvā 		ji ltar rab rib can rnams kyis skra shad la sogs pa rang bzhin med pa nyid la rab rib kyi rkyen gyis rang bzhin nyid du mngon par zhen pa de bzhin du byis pa rnams ma rig pa'i rab rib kyis blo gros kyi mig nyams pa nyid kyis dngos po'i rnam pa rang bzhin med pa la rang bzhin dang bcas pa nyid du mngon par zhen par gyur nas gzhan du ma dmigs pa las thun mong ma yin pa nyid kyis me'i rang bzhin gyi rang gi mtshan nyid ni tsha ba'o zhes bya bar mngon par zhen pa ji lta ba bzhin du mtshan nyid smra ste /
bdag nyid kyi mtshan nyid ni rang gi mtshan nyid do zhes bya ba'i phyir ro /
bālajanaprasiddhayaiva ca bhagavatā tadevaiṣāṃ sāṃvṛtaṃ svarūpamabhidharme vyavasthāpitam de rnams la grags pa nyid kyi sgo nas /
bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang chos mngon par de dag gi rang gi ngo bo kun rdzob pa de rnam par gzhag pa mdzad la /
sādhāraṇaṃ tvanityatvādikaṃ sāmānyalakṣaṇamiti coktam mi rtag pa la sogs pa thun mong pa ni spyi'i mtshan nyid do zhes bshad do /
yadā tu vigatāvidyātimirāvadātaprajñācakṣuṣāṃ darśanamapekṣyate, tadā vitimiraiḥ taimirikopalabdhakeśādarśanavat bālajanamatiparikalpitānupalabdhasvabhāvairāryaiḥ pura ucyate parahitavyāpāraiḥ, nāyaṃ svabhāvo bhāvānāmiti /
yathoktamāryalaṅkāvatārasūtre 		gang gi tshe ma rig pa'i rab rib dang bral ba dri ma med pa'i shes rab kyi spyan mnga' ba rnams kyis gzigs pa la ltos nas ni /
de'i tshe rab rib dang bral ba dag gis rab rib can gyis dmigs pa'i skra shad ma mthong ba ltar 'phags pa byis pa'i skye bo'i blos brtags pa'i rang bzhin ma gzigs pa rnams kyis 'di ni dngos po rnams kyi rang bzhin ma yin no zhes gsal bar gsungs par mdzad pa yin te /
ji skad du 'phags pa lang kar gshegs pa'i mdo las /
keśoṇḍukaṃ yathā mithyā gṛhyate taimirikairjanaiḥ ji ltar rab rib can dag gis /
skra shad log par 'dzin pa ltar /
tathā bhāvavikalpo 'yaṃ mithyā bālairvikalpyate de bzhin dngos por rtog pa 'di /
byis pas log par rnam par brtags /
na svabhāvo na vijñaptirna ca vastu na cālayaḥ /
bālairvikalpitā hyete śavabhūtaiḥ kutārkikaiḥ 		rang bzhin med cing rnam rig med /
kun gzhi med cing dngos med na /
byis pa ngan pa rtog ge ba /
iti /
tathā /
svabhāvānutpattiṃ saṃdhāya mahāmate mayā sarvadharmā anutpannā ityuktāḥ /
iti vistaraḥ 		ro dang 'dra bas 'di dag brtags /
zhes bya ba dang de bzhin du blo gros chen po rang bzhin gyis ma skyes pa la dgongs nas ngas chos thams cad ma skyes pa'o zhes gsungs so zhes rgya cher gsungs pa lta bu'o /
atrāha /
yadi khalu idamagnyāderauṣṇyādikaṃ hetupratyayasaṃbhūtatvena kṛtakatvānniḥsvabhāvamityucyate, kimidānīṃ tatsvabhāvasya lakṣaṇaṃ kaścāsau svabhāva iti vaktavyam 		'dir smras pa /
gal te me la sogs pa'i tsha ba nyid la sogs pa 'di rgyu dang rkyen las byung bas byas pa nyid yin pa'i phyir rang bzhin ma yin no zhes smra na /
da ni de dag gi rang bzhin gyi mtshan nyid gang yin zhing /
rang bzhin de yang gang zhig yin pa brjod dgos so /
ucyate /
akṛtrimaḥ svabhāvo hi nirapekṣaḥ paratra ca /
iha svo bhāvaḥ svabhāva iti yasya padārthasya yadātmīyaṃ rūpaṃ tattasya svabhāva iti vyapadiśyate 		brjod par bya ste /
rang bzhin dag ni bcos min dang /
gzhan la ltos pa med pa yin /
'di ni rang gi dngos po ni rang bzhin no zhes bya bas gang zhig dngos po gang gi bdag gi ba'i ngo bo yin pa de ni de'i rang bzhin yin no zhes brjod do /
gang zhig gang gi bdag gi ba yin zhe na /
kiṃ ca kasyātmīyaṃ yadyasyākṛtrimam, yattu kṛtrimaṃ na tattasyātmīyaṃ tadyathā apāmauṣṇyam gang gis gang ma bcos pa'o /
gang zhig bcos ma yin pa de ni de'i bdag gi ba ma yin te /
dper na /
yacca yasyāyattaṃ tadapi tadātmīyaṃ tadyathā sve bhṛtyāḥ, svāni dhanāni chu'i tsha ba nyid bzhin no /
gang zhig gang la rag ma las pa de yang de'i bdag gi ba yin te /
dper na /
yattu yasya parāyattaṃ na tattasyātmīyaṃ tadyathā tāvatkālikāyācitakamasvatantram /
yataścaivaṃ kṛtrimasya parasāpekṣasya ca svabhāvatvaṃ neṣṭam, ata eva auṣṇyamagnerhetupratyayapratibaddhatvātpūrvaṃmabhūtvā paścādutpādena kṛtakatvānna svabhāva iti yujyate /
yataścaitadevam, ato yadevāgneḥ kālatraye 'pyavyabhicāri nijaṃ rūpamakṛtrimam, pūrvamabhūtvā paścādyanna bhavati, yacca hetupratyayasāpekṣaṃ na bhavati apāmauṣṇyavat pārāvāravat dīrghahrasvavadvā, tat svabhāva iti vyapadiśyate 		rang gi khol po dang rang gi nor dag bzhin no /
gang zhig gi gzhan la rag las pa gang yin pa de ni de'i bdag gi ba ma yin te /
dper na /
re zhig pa'i brnyan por rang dbang med pa lta bu'o /
gang gi phyir de ltar bcos ma dang rang la ltos pa rang bzhin nyid du mi 'dod pa de nyid kyi phyir tsha ba nyid me'i rang bzhin no zhes bya ba ni mi rigs te /
rgyu dang rkyen la rag las pa'i phyir dang sngar ma byung ba las phyir 'byung bas byas pa yin pa'i phyir ro /
gang gi phyir 'di de ltar yin pa de'i phyir /
dus gsum du yang me la mi 'khrul pa gnyug ma'i ngo bo ma bcos pa /
gang zhig sngar ma byung ba las phyis 'byung ba ma yin pa /
gang zhig chu'i tsha ba 'am /
tshu rol dang pha rol lam /
ring po dang thung ngu ltar rgyu dang rkyen la ltos pa dang bcas par ma gyur pa gang yin pa de rang bzhin yin par brjod do /
ci me'i rang gi ngo bo de lta bur gyur pa de yod dam zhe na /
kiṃ khalu agneḥ taditthaṃ svarūpamasti? na tadasti, na cāpi nāsti svarūpataḥ de ni rang gi ngo bos yod pa yang ma yin la med pa yang ma yin no /
de lta yin mod kyi /
yadyapi evam, tathāpi śrotṛṇāmuttrāsaparivarjanārthaṃ saṃvṛtyā samāropya tadastīti brūmaḥ /
yathoktaṃ bhagavatā 		'on kyang nyan pa po rnams kyi skrag pa spang bar bya ba'i phyir /
sgro btags nas kun rdzob tu de yod do zhes bya bar de smra'o /
ji skad du bcom ldan 'das kyis /
anakṣarasya dharmasya śrutiḥ kā deśanā ca kā yi ge med pa'i chos la ni /
nyan pa gang yin ston pa gang /
śrūyate deśyate cāpi samāropādanakṣaraḥ sgro btags pa las yi ge med /
de ni nyan zhing ston pa 'ang yin /
iti /
ihāpi ca vakṣyati 		zhes gsungs pa lta bu'o /
'di nyid las kyang /
śūnyamiti na vaktavyamaśūnyamiti vā bhavet stong ngo zhes kyang mi brjod de /
mi stong zhes kyang mi bya zhing /
ubhayaṃ nobhayaṃ ceti prajñaptyarthaṃ tu kathyate /
yadi khalu tadadhyāropādbhavadbhirastītyucyate, kīdṛśaṃ tat? yā sā dharmāṇāṃ dharmatā nāma, saiva tatsvarūpam 		gnyis dang gnyis min mi bya ste /
gdags pa'i don du brjod par bya /
zhes 'chad par 'gyur ro /
gal te sgro btags pa las de yod do zhes brjod na /
de ci 'dra ba zhig yin zhe na /
de'i rang gi ngo bo ni chos rnams kyi chos nyid ces bya ba gang yin pa de nyid yin no /
atha keyaṃ dharmāṇāṃ dharmatā? dharmāṇāṃ svabhāvaḥ de nas chos rnams kyi chos nyid 'di yang gang zhig yin zhe na /
chos rnams kyi ngo bo'o /
ko 'yaṃ svabhāvaḥ? prakṛtiḥ /
kā ceyaṃ prakṛtiḥ? yeyaṃ śūnyatā /
keyaṃ śūnyatā? naiḥsvābhāvyam 		ngo bo 'di yang gang zhe na /
rang bzhin no /
rang bzhin 'di yang gang yin /
stong pa nyid do /
stong pa nyid 'di yang gang yin zhe na /
rang bzhin med pa'o /
kimidaṃ naiḥsvābhāvyam? tathatā rang bzhin med pa 'di yang gang zhig yin /
de bzhin nyid do /
keyaṃ tathatā? tathābhāvo 'vikāritvaṃ sadaiva sthāyitā /
sarvathānutpāda eva hyagnyādīnāṃ paranirapekṣatvādakṛtrimatvātsvabhāva ityucyate 		de bzhin nyid 'di yang gang zhig ce na /
de bzhin nyid kyi ngo bo 'gyur ba med pa nyid dang rtag tu gnas pa nyid de /
rnam pa thams cad du skye ba med pa nyid ni bcos ma ma yin pa'i phyir dang gzhan la ltos pa med pa'i phyir me la sogs pa rnams kyi rang bzhin yin no zhes brjod do /
etaduktaṃ bhavati /
avidyātimiraprabhāvopalabdhaṃ bhāvajātaṃ yenātmanā vigatāvidyātimirāṇāmāryāṇāmadarśanayogena viṣayatvamupayāti, tadeva svarūpameṣāṃ svabhāva iti vyavasthāpyate 		'di skad du bstan par 'gyur te /
dngos po'i rnam pa ma rig pa'i rab rib kyi mthus dmigs pa ni ma gzigs pa'i tshul gyis /
bdag nyid gang gis 'phags pa ma rig pa'i rab rib dang bral ba rnams kyi yul du 'gyur te /
tasya cedaṃ lakṣaṇam /
akṛtrimaḥ svabhāvo hi nirapekṣaḥ paratra ca 		ngo bo de nyid de dag gi rang bzhin du rnam par gzhag go /
rang bzhin dag ni bcos min dang gzhan la ltos pa med pa yin /
iti vyavasthāpayāṃbabhūvurācāryā iti vijñeyam /
sa caiṣa bhāvānāmanutpādātmakaḥ svabhāva akiṃcittvena abhāvamātratvādasvabhāva eveti kṛtvā nāsti bhāvasvabhāva iti vijñeyam /
yathoktaṃ bhagavatā 		zhes bya ba 'di ni slob dpon dag gis de'i mtshan nyid du rnam par gzhag go zhes bya bar shes par bya'o /
dngos po rnams kyi rang bzhin du gyur pa skye ba med pa de yang ci yang ma yin pa nyid kyis dngos po med pa tsam yin pas ngo bo med pa'i phyir dngos po'i rang bzhin du yod pa ma yin no zhes shes par bya'o /
ji skad du bcom ldan 'das kyis /
bhāvānabhāvāniti yaḥ prajānati sa sarvabhāveṣu na jātu sajjate gang gi dngos rnams dngos med shes pa ste /
nang yang dngos po kun la chags mi 'gyur /
yaḥ sarvabhāveṣu na jātu sajjate sa ānimittaṃ spṛśate samādhim gang zhig nam yang dngos kun chags med pa /
de ni ting 'dzin mtshan ma med la reg /
iti /
atrāha /
yadyapi svabhāvo nāsti bhāvānām, tathāpi parabhāvastāvadasti, tadapratiṣedhāt sati ca parabhāve svabhāvo 'pi bhaviṣyati 		ces gsungs pa lta bu'o /
'dir smras pa /
gal te yang dngos po rnams la rang bzhin yod pa ma yin pa de lta na yang re zhig gzhan gyi dngos po ni yod de /
de ma bkag pa'i phyir ro /
gzhan gyi dngos po yod na ni rang bzhin yang yod par 'gyur te /
svabhāvamantareṇa parabhāvāprasiddheriti rang bzhin med par gzhan gyi dngos po mi 'grub pa'i phyir ro /
ucyate brjod pa /
kutaḥ svabhāvasyābhāve parabhāvo bhaviṣyati rang bzhin med pa ma yin na /
gzhan gyi dngos po ga la yod /
svabhāvaḥ parabhāvasya parabhāvo hi kathyate /
iha svabhāva eva hi loke kaścitsvabhāvāntarāpekṣayā para iti vyapadiśyate 		gzhan gyi dngos po'i rang bzhin ni /
gzhan gyi dngos po yin zhes brjod /
'dir 'jig rten na ni rang bzhin 'ga' zhig kho na rang bzhin gzhan la ltos nas gzhan gyi dngos po zhes brjod do /
yadi hi agnerauṣṇyaṃ svabhāvaḥ syāt, dravasvabhāvasalilasāpekṣayā parabhāva iti vyapadiśyeta gal te tsha ba nyid me'i rang bzhin yin na ni /
gsher ba'i rang bzhin can gyi tshu la ltos nas gzhan gyi dngos po zhes brjod par 'gyur ba zhig na /
yadā tu mumukṣubhirvicāryamāṇasya kasyacitsvabhāva eva nāsti, tadā kutaḥ paratvaṃ syāt? parabhāvācca svabhāvo 'pi nāsti iti siddham gang gi tshe rnam par dpyad pa na gang la yang rang bzhin yod pa ma yin pa de'i tshe ni gzhan nyid yod par ga la 'gyur /
gzhan nyid med pas ni rang bzhin yang yod pa ma yin par grub po /
atrāha /
yadyapi svabhāvaparabhāvau na staḥ, tathāpi bhāvastāvadasti, apratiṣedhāt 		'dir smras pa; gal te yang rang bzhin dang gzhan gyi dngos po dag yod pa ma yin pa de lta na yang dngos po ni re zhig yod pa yin te /
ma bkag pa'i phyir ro /
sa ca bhāvo bhavan svabhāvo vā bhavet, parabhāvo vā dngos po de yod na yang rang bzhin nam gzhan gyi dngos po zhig tu 'gyur dgos te /
tasmātsvabhāvaparabhāvāvapi bhaviṣyata iti de'i phyir /
rang bzhin dang gzhan gyi dngos po dag kyang yod par 'gyur ro /
ucyate brjod pa /
svabhāvaparabhāvābhyāmṛte bhāvaḥ kutaḥ punaḥ rang bzhin dang ni gzhan dngos dag /
ma gtogs dngos po ga la yod /
svabhāve parabhāve vā sati bhāvo hi sidhyati rang bzhin dang ni gzhan dngos dag /
yod na dngos po 'grub par 'gyur /
bhāvo hi parikalpyamānaḥ svabhāvo vā bhavet, parabhāvo vā 'di ltar dngos po brtags pa na /
rang bzhin nam gzhan gyi dngos po zhig yin grang /
tau ca pūrvoktavidhinā na staḥ, iti tayorabhāvādbhāvo 'pi nāstītyavadhāryatām de gnyis kyang sngar bshad pa'i tshul gyis yod pa ma yin te /
de'i phyir de gnyis med pas dngos po yang yod pa ma yin no zhes nges par bya'o /
atrāha /
yadyapi bhavatā bhāvaḥ pratiṣiddhaḥ, tathāpyabhāvo 'sti, pratiṣedhābhāvāt 		'dir smras pa /
gal te yang khyod kyis dngos po bkag mod kyi /
de lta na yang dngos po med pa ni yod pa nyid de /
ma bkag pa'i phyir ro /
tataśca bhāvo 'pi bhaviṣyati pratidvandvisadbhāvāt, abhāvavaditi de'i phyir 'gal zla yod pas /
dngos po yang yod par 'gyur te /
dngos po med pa bzhin no /
ucyate /
syādbhāvaḥ, yadi abhāva eva syāt 		brjod par bya ste /
gal te dngos po med pa nyid yod na /
dngos po yang yod par 'gyur na /
na tvastītyāha /
bhāvasya cedaprasiddhirabhāvo naiva sidhyati 		yod pa ni ma yin no zhes gsungs pa /
gal te dngos po ma grub na /
dngos med 'grub par mi 'gyur ro /
bhāvasya hyanyathābhāvamabhāvaṃ vruvate janāḥ dngos po gzhan du gyur pa ni; ;dngos med yin par skye bo smra /
iha hi yadi bhāvo nāma kaścidabhaviṣyat, syāttasyānyathābhāvādabhāvaḥ 'di na gal te dngos po zhes bya ba 'ga' zhig yod par gyur na ni /
de gzhan du gyur pa las dngos po med par 'gyur ba zhig ste /
ghaṭādayo hi vartamānāvasthāyāḥ pracyutāḥ santaḥ anyathābhāvamāpannāḥ abhāvadhvanivācyā bhavanti loke 'di ltar bum pa la sogs pa da ltar gyi gnas skabs las nyams shing /
gzhan du gyur pa thob pa dag ni 'jig rten na dngos po med pa'i sgra'i brjod byar 'gyur ba yin no /
yadā tvamī ghaṭādayo bhāvarūpatvenaivāsiddhāḥ, tadā kuto 'vidyamānasvabhāvānāmanyathātvamiti gang gi tshe /
bum pa la sogs pa 'di dag dngos po'i ngo bo nyid du ma grub pa de'i tshe yod pa ma yin pa'i rang bzhin can rnams la gzhan du 'gyur pa nyid yod par ga la 'gyur /
ataḥ abhāvo 'pi nāsti /
tadevaṃ sarvathā svabhāvaparabhāvabhāvābhāveṣu anupapadyamāneṣu avidyātimiropahatamatinayanatayā viparītam 		de'i phyir dngos po med pa yang yod pa ma yin no /
de'i phyir de ltar rnam pa thams cad du rang bzhin dang gzhan gyi dngos po dang dngos po dang dngos po med pa dag yod pa ma yin pa la /
ma rig pa'i rab rib kyis blo gros kyi mig nyams pa nyid kyis phyin ci log tu /
svabhāvaṃ parabhāvaṃ ca bhāvaṃ cābhāvameva ca gang dag rang bzhin gzhan dngos dang /
dngos dang dngos med nyid lta ba /
ye paśyanti na paśyanti te tattvaṃ buddhaśāsane /
