ye hi tathāgatapravacanāviparītavyākhyānābhimānitayā pṛthivyāḥ kāṭhinyaṃ svabhāvaḥ, vedanāyā viṣayānubhavaḥ, vijñānasya viṣayaprativijñaptiḥ svabhāvaḥ, ityevaṃ svabhāvaṃ bhāvānāṃ varṇayanti, anyadvijñānam, anyadrūpam, anyaiva ca vedanā, ityevaṃ parabhāvaṃ varṇayanti, vartamānāvasthaṃ ca vijñānādikaṃ bhāvatvena ye varṇayanti, vijñānādikameva ca atītatāmāpannamabhāva iti, na te paramagambhīrasya pratītyasamutpādasya tattvaṃ varṇayanti 		de dag sangs rgyas bstan pa la /
de nyid mthong ba ma yin no /
gang dag de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung rab phyin ci ma log bar rnam par 'chad par rlom pa nyid kyis /
sa'i rang bzhin ni sra ba'o /
tshor ba'i ni yul myong ba'o /
rnam par shes pa'i rang bzhin ni yul so sor rnam par rig pa'o zhes de ltar dngos po rnams kyi rang bzhin smra ba dang gzugs gzhan la rnam par shes pa yang gzhan yin zhing /
tshor ba yang gzhan nyid do zhes de ltar gzhan gyi dngos po smra ba dang rnam par shes pa la sogs pa da ltar ba'i gnas skabs su gyur pa dngos por ram /
rnam par shes pa la sogs pa 'das par gyur pa dngos po med par smra ba de dag ni rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba mchog tu zab pa'i de kho na nyid smra ba ma yin no /
gang gi phyir /
yasmādyathoditopapattiviruddhaṃ svabhāvaparabhāvādīnāmastitvam, na copapattiviruddhaṃ padārthasvabhāvamanuvarṇayanti tathāgatāḥ rang bzhin dang gzhan gyi dngos po la sogs pa rnams yod pa nyid ni ji skad bshad pa'i 'thad pa dang 'gal ba yin la /
de bzhin gshegs pa rnams ni dngos po'i rang bzhin 'thad pa dang 'gal ba gsung ba yang ma yin te /
svayamaviparītāśeṣapadārthatattvasaṃbodhāt /
ata eva buddhānāmeva bhagavatāṃ vacanaṃ pramāṇamityupavarṇayanti vicakṣaṇāḥ, sopapattikatvenāvisaṃvādakatvāt /
ata eva ca āptebhyaḥ prahīṇāśeṣadoṣebhya āgatatvāt, āgamayatīti samantāt tattvaṃ gamayatīti vā, āmimukhyādgamanādvā tadāśrayeṇa lokasya nirvāṇagamanāt saṃbuddhavacanasyaiva āgamatvaṃ vyavasthāpyate 		rang nyid kyi dngos po ma lus pa'i de nyid phyin ci ma log par thugs su chud pa'i phyir ro /
de nyid kyi phyir /
mkhas pa dag ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kho na'i gsung tshad mar rjod par byed de /
'thad pa dang bcas pas mi slu ba'i phyir ro /
de nyid kyi phyir nyes pa ma lus pa spangs pa yid ches ba dag las 'ongs pa'i phyir ram /
kun du go bar byed pa ste /
de kho na nyid kun nas go bar byed pa'i phyir ram /
mngon du phyogs nas 'gro ba ste /
de la brten nas 'jig rten pa mya ngan las 'das par 'gro ba'i phyir rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi gsung nyid lung du rnam par gzhag la /
tadanyamatānāṃ tu upapattiviyuktatvānna prāmāṇyam, āgamābhāsatvaṃ ca vyavasthāpyate de las gzhan gyi gzhung lugs rnams ni 'thad pa dang bral bas tshad ma ma yin pa nyid dang lung ma yin pa nyid du rnam par gzhag go /
gang gi phyir /
yasmācca etāni svabhāvaparabhāvabhāvābhāvadarśanāni yuktividhuratvānna tattvāni, ata eva mumukṣūṇāṃ vineyajanānām rang bzhin dang gzhan gyi dngos po dang dngos po dang dngos po med par lta ba 'di dag rigs pa dang bral bas de kho na nyid ma yin pa de nyid kyi phyir /
gdul bya'i skye bo thar pa 'dod pa rnams la /
kātyāyanāvavāde cāstīti nāstīti cobhayam /
pratiṣiddhaṃ bhagavatā bhāvābhāvavibhāvinā /
uktaṃ hi bhagavatā āryakātyāyanāvavādasūtre 		bcom ldan dngos dang dngos med pa /
mkhyen pas k'a ta yan yi /
gdams ngag las ni yod pa dang /
med pa gnyi ga 'ang dgag par mdzad pa yin no /
bcom ldan 'das kyis k'a ta yan la gdams pa'i mdo las /
yadbhūyasā kātyāyana ayaṃ loko 'stitāṃ vā abhiniviṣṭo nāstitāṃ ca k'a ta yan gang gi phyir 'jig rten 'di ni phal cher yod pa nyid dang med pa nyid la mngon par zhen te /
tena na parimucyate /
jātijarāvyādhimaraṇaśokaparidevaduḥkhadaurmanasyopāyāsebhyo na parimucyate 		des na skye ba dang rga ba dang na ba dang 'chi ba dang mya ngan dang smre sngags 'don pa dang sdug bsngal ba dang yid mi bde ba dang 'khrugs pa dag las yongs su grol bar mi 'gyur /
pāñcagatikātsaṃsāracārakāgārabandhanānna parimucyate /
mātṛmaraṇasaṃtāpaduḥkhānna parimucyate /
pitṛmaraṇasaṃtāpaduḥkhāditi vistaraḥ /
idaṃ ca sūtraṃ sarvanikāyeṣu paṭhayate 		'gro ba lnga'i 'khor ba las grol bar mi 'gyur /
'chi ba'i gdung ba'i sdug bsngal las grol bar mi 'gyur zhes rgya cher gsungs pa yin la /
mdo sde 'di yang sde ba thams cad kyis 'don pa yin no /
tadasmādāgamāt yathopavarṇitāyāścopapatternārhati prājñasvabhāvaparabhāvabhāvābhāvadarśanaṃ tathāgatavacanādatyantaviruddhamāsthātum de'i phyir lung 'di dang ji skad bshad pa'i rigs pa las na shes rab can gyi rang bzhin dang gzhan gyi dngos po dang dngos po dang dngos po med par lta ba de bzhin gshegs pa'i bka' dang shin tu 'gal ba khas blang bar 'os pa ma yin te /
bhagavatā pratiṣiddhatvāt bcom ldan 'das kyis bkag pa'i phyir ro /
kiṃviśiṣṭena bhagavatā? bhāvābhāvavibhāvinā bcom ldan 'das kyis khyad par du 'phags pa zhig gis she na /
dngos dang dngos med mkhyen pas te /
bhāvābhāvau vibhāvayituṃ śīlamasyeti bhāvābhāvavibhāvī 'di la dngos po dang dngos po med pa dag mkhyen pa'i ngang tshul mnga' bas na /
yathāvasthitabhāvābhāvāviparītasvabhāvaparijñānād bhāvābhāvavibhāvīti bhagavānevocyate /
tena bhagavatā bhāvābhāvavibhāvinā yasmādastitvaṃca nāstitvaṃ ca ubhayametat pratiṣiddham, tasmānna yuktaṃ bhāvābhāvadarśanaṃ tattvamityāsthātum 		dngos po dang dngos po med pa mkhyen pa'o /
dngos po dang dngos po med pa'i rang bzhin ji ltar gnas pa bzhin phyin ci ma log par yongs su mkhyen pa'i phyir /
bcom ldan 'das nyid dngos po dang dngos po med pa mkhyen pa zhes bya'o /
gang gi phyir bcom ldan 'das dngos po dang dngos po med pa mkhyen pa des yod pa dang med pa nyid gnyi ga yang dgag pa mdzad pa de'i phyir dngos po dang dngos po med par lta ba de kho na nyid yin no zhes khas blangs par rigs pa ma yin no /
tathā /
astīti kāśyapa ayameko 'ntaḥ /
nāstīti kāśyapa ayameko 'ntaḥ 		de bzhin du /
'od srungs yod ces bya ba 'di ni mtha' gcig go /
med ces bya ba 'di ni mtha' gnyis so /
yadenayorantayormadhyam, tadarūpyamanidarśanamapratiṣṭhamanābhāsamaniketamavijñaptikam de gnyis kyi dbus gang yin pa de ni dpyad du med pa /
bstan du med pa /
rten ma yin pa /
snang ba med pa /
rnam par rig pa med pa /
iyamucyate kāśyapa madhyamāṃ pratipad bhūtapratyavekṣā iti /
tathā /
astīti nāstīti ubhe 'pi antā śuddhī aśuddhīti ime 'pi antā 		gnas pa med pa ste /
'od srungs 'di ni dbu ma'i lam chos rnams la so sor rtog pa zhes bya'o zhes bya ba dang de bzhin du /
yod dang med ces bya ba gnyi ga mtha' /
gtsang dang mi gtsang 'di yang mtha' yin te /
tasmādubhe anta vivarjayitvā madhye 'pi sthānaṃ na karoti paṇḍitaḥ de phyir gnyi ga'i mtha' ni rnam spangs nas /
mkhas pas dbus la'ang gnas par yod mi byed /
astīti nāstīti vivāda eṣaḥ śuddhī aśuddhīti ayaṃ vivādaḥ yod dang med ces bya ba rtsod pa ste /
gtsang dang mi gtsang 'di yang rtsod pa yin /
vivādaprāptyā na duḥkhaṃ praśāmyati avivādaprāptyā ca duḥkhaṃ nirudhyate rtsod par gyur pa'i sdug bsngal zhi mi 'gyur /
rtsod pa med par gyur pas sdug bsngal 'gag /
iti /
atrāha /
yadi punarevamagnyādīnāṃ svabhāvata evāstitvaṃ syāt, ko doṣaḥ syāt? uktadoṣaḥ 		ces gsungs so /
'dir smras pa /
gal te yang de ltar me la sogs pa rang bzhin kho nas yod pa nyid du gyur na nyes pa cir 'gyur /
hetupratyayasaṃbhūtaḥ svabhāvaḥ kṛtako bhavet rgyu dang rkyen las byung ba yi /
rang bzhin byas pa can du 'gyur /
ityādinā /
api ca /
yadi ayameṣāmagnyādīnāṃ svabhāvaḥ syāt, tasya vidyamānasya sato na syāt punaranyathātvamiti pratipādayannāha 		zhes bya ba la sogs pas nyes pa bshad zin to /
gzhan yang /
gal te me la sogs pa 'di dag gi rang bzhin 'di nyid yod pa yin na ni /
yod par gyur pa de yang gzhan du gyur pa ma yin no zhes bstan pa'i phyir /
yadyastitvaṃ prakṛtyā syānna bhavedasya nāstitā gal te rang bzhin gyis yod na /
de ni med nyid mi 'gyur ro /
zhes gsungs te /
yadi agnyāderbhāvasya prakṛtyā svabhāvato 'stitvam, tadā asya svabhāvasya prakṛtyā vidyamānasya punaranyathātvaṃ na syāt gal te 'di nyid me la sogs pa 'di dag gi rang bzhin te rang gi ngo bo yin par gyur na ni /
de'i tshe rang bzhin gyis yod pa'i rang bzhin de la slar yang gzhan du 'gyur ba med de /
yasmāt /
prakṛteranyathābhāvo na hi jātūpapadyate /
yadi eṣāmagnyādīnāmiyameva prakṛtiḥ syāt, svabhāvaḥ syāt, tadā prakṛteravikāriṇītvānna kadācitpunaranyathābhāva upapadyeta /
na hi ākāśasyānāvaraṇatvaṃ kadācidapyanyathātvaṃ pratipadyate /
evamagnyādīnāmapi prakṛtyā vidyamānānāṃ punaranyathātvaṃ na syāt /
upalabhate ca bhavāneṣāmanyathātvaprabandhoparamalakṣaṇaṃ vināśam 		gang gi phyir /
rang bzhin gzhan du 'gyur ba ni /
nam yang 'thad par mi 'gyur ro /
gal te 'di nyid me la sogs pa 'di dag gi rang bzhin yin par gyur na ni /
de'i tshe rang bzhin ni mi 'gyur ba nyid yin pa'i phyir nam yang gzhan du 'gyur bar 'thad pa ma yin no /
nam mkha'i mi sgrib pa nyid nam yang gzhan du 'gyur ba ma yin pa de bzhin du me la sogs pa rang bzhin gyis yod pa dag kyang slar gzhan du mi 'gyur ba zhig na /
de dag gzhan du 'gyur ba rgyun chad pa'i mtshan nyid can gyi 'jig pa ni khyod kyis dmigs pa yang yin no /
tasmādvipariṇāmadharmitvādapāmauṣṇyavat nāyameṣāṃ svabhāva iti pratīyatām de'i phyir rnam par 'gyur ba'i chos can yin pa'i phyir chu'i tsha ba nyid ltar 'di 'di dag gi rang bzhin ma yin no zhes shes par bya'o /
atrāha /
yadi prakṛtyā vidyamānasyānyathātvāsaṃbhavādanyathātvasya ca upalabhyamānatvāt prakṛtireṣāṃ bhāvānāṃ nāstītyucyate, nanu ca evamapi 		'dir smras pa /
gal te rang bzhin gyis yod pa la gzhan du 'gyur pa yod pa ma yin pa'i phyir dang gzhan du 'gyur ba nyid kyang dmigs pa'i phyir dngos po 'di dag la rang bzhin yod pa ma yin no zhes brjod na /
de lta na yang /
prakṛtau kasya cāsatyāmanyathātvaṃ bhaviṣyati /
kasya idānīṃ prakṛtyā svarūpeṇāvidyamānasya khapuṣpasyeva anyathātvaṃ bhaviṣyati? tasmādavidyamānaprakṛtikasya anyathātvānupalambhāt, anyathātvasya ca darśanāt, astyeva svabhāva iti 		rang bzhin yod pa ma yin na /
gzhan du 'gyur ba gang gi yin /
da ni nam mkha'i me tog ltar rang bzhin te rang gi ngo bos yod pa ma yin pas gzhan du 'gyur ba gang gi yin par 'gyur /
de'i phyir rang bzhin yod pa ma yin pa la gzhan du 'gyur ba ma dmigs pa'i phyir la /
gzhan du 'gyur ba nyid kyang mthong ba'i phyir rang bzhin yod do /
ucyate /
yadi tāvakena matena prakṛtyā svabhāvena asaṃvidyamānasya anyathātvābhāvād anyathātvasya ca darśanātprakṛtirityucyate, evamapi 		brjod par bya ste /
gal te khyod kyi lugs kyis rang bzhin te rang gi ngo bos yod pa ma yin pa la gzhan du 'gyur ba med pa'i phyir la /
gzhan du 'gyur ba yang mthong ba'i phyir rang bzhin yod do zhes smra ba yin na ni /
prakṛtau kasya ca satyāmanyathātvaṃ bhaviṣyati de lta na yang rang bzhin yod pa ma yin na yang gzhan du 'gyur ba ji ltar rung /
kasyedānīṃ prakṛtyā svabhāvena vidyamānasya vartamānasyaiva anyathātvaṃ bhaviṣyati? tasmāt prakṛtyā vidyamānasya anyathātvaṃ nāstīti sarvathā anyathātvāsaṃbhava eva da ni da ltar byung ba ltar rang bzhin te rang gi ngo bos yod pa'i phyir gzhan du 'gyur ba gang gi yin par 'gyur /
de'i phyir rang bzhin gyis yod pa la gzhan du 'gyur ba nyid yod pa ma yin pa'i phyir gzhan du 'gyur ba rnam pa thams cad du mi srid pa nyid do /
tataśca nāsti prakṛtirbhāvānāmioti vijñeyam de'i phyir dngos po rnams la rang bzhin med do zhes shes par bya'o /
yaccāpyuktam /
anyathātvasya darśanānnāsti prakṛtiriti, tadapi paraprasiddhayā anyathātvadarśanamadhikṛtyoktam, na tvasmābhiḥ kadācidapi kasyacidanyathātvamabhyupetam /
tadevamatyantataḥ prakṛtāvasaṃvidyamānāyāṃ sarvadharmeṣu asaṃvidyamāneṣu asvabhāveṣu tadanyathātve ca asaṃvidyamāne yo hi idānīmastitvaṃ nāstitvaṃ ca bhāvānāṃ parikalpayati, tasya evaṃ parikalpayato niyatameva 		gang yang gzhan du 'gyur ba mthong ba'i phyir rang bzhin yod pa ma yin no zhes bshad pa de yang gzhan la grags pa'i gzhan du 'gyur ba mthong ba'i dbang du byas nas brjod pa yin gyi /
kho bo cag gis nam yang gang la yang gzhan du 'gyur ba yod par khas ma blangs so /
de'i phyir de ltar rang bzhin gtan yod pa ma yin dang chos thams cad yod pa ma yin pa'i rang bzhin can yin pa dang de dag la gzhan du 'gyur ba yang yod pa ma yin bzhin du /
da lta gang zhig dngos po rnams yod pa nyid dang med pa nyid du rtog par byed de /
astīti śāśvatagrāho nāstītyucchedadarśanam de ltar rtog pa de la ni nges pa kho nar /
yod ces bya ba rtag par 'dzin /
prasajyata iti vākyaśeṣaḥ /
taccaitat śāśvatocchedadarśanaṃ svargāpavargamārgāntarāyakaratvād yasmānmahānarthakaram, 		med ces bya ba chad par lta bar thal bar 'gyur ro /
gang gi phyir rtag ba dang chad par lta ba 'di yang mtho ris dang byang grol gyi lam gyi bar du gcod par byed pa yin pa'i phyir don ma yin pa chen po byed pa /
tasmādastitvanāstitve nāśrīyeta vicakṣaṇaḥ de phyir yod dang med pa la /
mkhas pas gnas pas mi bya'o /
kasmātpunarbhāvābhāvadarśane sati śāśvatocchedadarśanaprasaṅgo bhavatīti? yasmāt yang ci'i phyir dngos po dang dngos po med par lta ba yod na rtag pa dang chad par lta bar thal bar 'gyur zhe na /
'di ltar /
asti yaddhi svabhāvena na tannāstīti śāśvatam gang zhig rang bzhin gyis yod pa /
de ni med pa yin pas rtag /
nāstīdānīmabhūtpūrvamityucchedaḥ prasajyate sngon byung da ltar med ces pa /
des na chad par thal bar 'gyur /
yat svabhāvena astītyucyate, svabhāvasyānapāyitvānna tat kadācidapi nāstīti, evaṃ bhāvasyāstitvābhyupagame sati śāśvatadarśanamāpadyate gang zhig rang bzhin gyis yod par brjod pa de ni rang bzhin la ldog pa med pas nam yang med pa ma yin te /
de ltar na rang bzhin yod pa nyid du khas blangs pas rtag par lta bar 'gyur la /
pūrvaṃ ca vartamānāvasthāyāṃ bhāvasvarūpamabhyupetya idānīṃ tadvinaṣṭatvānnāstiti paścādabhyupagacchataḥ ucchedadarśanaṃ prasajyate /
yasya tu bhāvasvabhāva eva nopapadyate, na tasya śāśvatocchedadarśanaprasaṅgaḥ, bhāvasvabhāvānupalambhāt 		sngon gnas pa'i gnas skabs su /
dngos po'i rang bzhin khas blangs nas da ltar phyis de zhig pas med do zhes khas blangs pas chad par lta bar thal bar 'gyur ro /
gang gi ltar na dngos po'i rang bzhin nyid mi 'thad pa de la ni rtag pa dang chad par lta bar thal bar mi 'gyur te /
dngos po'i rang bzhin ma dmigs pa'i phyir ro /
nanu ca bhāvānāṃ svabhāvo nāstītyabhyupagacchato mā bhūdbhāvadarśanābhāvācchāśvatadarśanam, ucchedadarśanaṃ tu niyataṃ prasajyate iti gal te dngos po rnams rang bzhin yod pa ma yin no zhes khas len pa la dngos por lta ba med pas rtag par lta ba med mod /
chad par lta bar thal bar ni nges par 'gyur ba ma yin nam zhe na /
naivamabhāvadarśanaṃ bhavati de ltar med par lta bar ni mi 'gyur ro /
yo hi pūrvaṃ bhāvasvabhāvamabhyupetya paścāt tannivṛttimālambate, tasya pūrvopalabdhasvabhāvāpavādāt syādabhāvadarśanam 'di ltar gang zhig sngar dngos po'i rang bzhin khas blangs nas /
phyis de ldog pa la rten par byed pa de ni dngos po'i rang bzhin sngar dmigs pa la skur ba btab pas med par lta bar 'gyur gyi /
yastu taimirikopalabdhakeśeṣviva vitaimiriko na kiṃcidupalabhate, sa nāstīti bruvan kiṃcinnāstīti brūyāt pratiṣedhyābhāvāt gang zhig rab rib can gyis dmigs pa'i skra shad dag la rab rib med pa ltar gyur cing ci yang ma dmigs pa des med do zhes smras pa na /
ci zhig med par smras par 'gyur te /
dgag bya med pa'i phyir ro /
viparyastānāṃ tu mithyābhiniveśanivṛttyarthamataimirikā iva vayaṃ brūmaḥ /
na santi sarvabhāvāḥ iti 		phyin ci log tu gyur pa rnams log par mngon par zhen pa bzlog par bya ba'i phyir rab rib med pa rnams ltar dngos po thams cad yod pa ma ma yin no zhes kho bo cag smra mod kyi /
na caivaṃ bruvatāmasmākaṃ parahitavyāpāraparāyaṇānāmucchedadarśanaprasaṅgaḥ /
yathoktaṃ sūtre 		de skad smras pa na /
kho bo cag chad par lta bar thal bar 'gyur ba ni ma yin no /
ji skad du mdo las /
yo hi bhagavan pūrvaṃ rāgadveṣamohabhāvābhyupagamaṃ kṛtvā paścānna santi rāgadveṣamohabhāvā iti bravīti, sa bhagavan vai nāstiko bhavati /
iti vistaraḥ /
yastu paratantracittacaittavastumātramabhyupetya tasya parikalpitasvabhāvābhāvādastitvadarśanaṃ pariharati, saṃkleśavyavadānanibandhanasya ca paratantravastumātrasadbhāvānnāstitvadarśanaṃ pariharati, tasya parikalpitasyāvidyamānatvāt paratantrasya ca vidyamānatvād astitvanāstitvadarśanadvayasyāpi upanipātāt kuto 'ntadvayaparihāraḥ? hetupratyayajanitasya ca sasvabhāvenāyuktatvapratipādanādayuktamevāsya vyākhyānam 		bcom ldan 'das gang gis sngar 'dod chags dang zhe sdang dang gti mug dag dngos por g yar gyis blangs nas /
phyis 'dod chags dang zhe sdang dang gti mug dag dngos po yod pa ni ma yin no zhes smra ba de ni med pa par yang 'gyur lags so zhes rgya cher gsungs pa lta bu'o /
gang zhig gzhan dbang sems dang sems las byung ba dngos po tsam khas blangs nas /
de la kun du brtags pa'i ngo bo nyid med pas yod par lta ba nyid spong zhing gzhan gyi dbang gi dngos po kun nas nyon mongs pa dang rnam par byang ba'i rgyur gyur pa tsam zhig yod pas ni med par lta ba nyid spong bar byed pa de'i ltar na /
kun tu brtags pa yod pa ma yin pa'i phyir dang gzhan gyi dbang yod pa'i phyir yod pa dang med pa nyid du lta ba gnyi gar yang 'gyur ba'i phyir mtha' gnyis spangs par ga la 'gyur /
rgyu dang rkyen gyis bskyed pa ni rang bzhin dang bcas pa nyid du yod par mi rigs par bstan zin pa'i phyir bshad pa mi rigs pa nyid do /
tadevaṃ madhyamakadarśane eva astitvanāstitvadvayadarśanasyāprasaṅgaḥ, na vijñānavādidarśanādiṣviti de'i phyir de ltar dbu ma pa'i lta ba kho na la yod pa dang med pa nyid du lta bar thal ba med pa yin gyi /
rnam par shes par smra ba'i lta ba la sogs pa dag la ni ma yin no zhes shes par bya'o /
vijñeyam /
ata evoktamāryaratnāvalyām 		de nyid kyi phyir /
rin po che'i phreng ba las /
sasāṃkhyaullūkyanirgranthapudgalaskandhavādinam gang zag phung por smra ba yi /
'jig rten grangs can 'ug phrug dang /
pṛccha lokaṃ yadi vadatyastināstivyatikramam gos med bcas la gal te zhig /
yod med 'das pa smra na dris /
dharmayautakamityasmādastināstivyatikramam de phyir sangs rgyas rnams kyi ni /
bstan pa 'chi med yod med las /
viddhi gambhīramityukta buddhānāṃ śāsanāmṛtam 'das pa zab mo zhes bshad pa /
chos kyi khud pa yin zhes kyis /
iti /
tathāvidhavineyajanabodhānurodhāttu paramārthadarśanasya upāyabhūtatvāt neyārthatvena bhagavatā mahākaruṇāparatantratayā vijñānādivādo deśitaḥ sāṃmitīyapudgalavādavat, na nītārthaḥ iti vijñeyam 		zhes gsungs so /
don dam pa mthong pa'i thabs su gyur pa nyid kyi phyir /
gdul bya'i skye bo rnam pa de lta bu rtog pa'i ngor /
bcom ldan 'das kyis thugs rje chen po'i gzhan gyi dbang nyid kyis mang po bkur pa'i gang zag tu smra ba ltar /
rnam par shes par smra ba drang ba'i don nyid du bstan gyi /
nges pa'i don du ma yin no zhes shes par bya'o /
yathoktamāryasamādhirājabhaṭṭārake ji skad du /
'phags pa ting nge 'dzin gyi rgyal po'i mdo las /
nītārthasūtrāntaviśeṣa jānati yathopadiṣṭā sugatena śūnyatā stong pa bde bar gshegs pas bshad pa ltar /
nges don mdo sde dag gi bye brag shes /
yasmin punaḥ pudgala sattva pūruṣo neyārthato jānati sarvadharmān gang las sems can gang zag skyes bu bstan /
chos de thams cad drang ba'i don du shes /
etacca āryākṣayamatinirdeśādiṣu vistareṇa boddhavyamiti /
bhāvābhāvadarśanadvayaprasaṅgo yāvat tāvatsaṃsāra ityavetya mumukṣubhiretaddarśanadvayanirāsena sadbhirmadhyamā pratipad bhāvanīyā yathāvaditi /
etaccoktaṃ bhagavatā 		zhes gsungs pa lta bu'o /
'di ni blo gros mi zad pas bstan pa'i mdo la sogs pa dag las rgyas par khong du chud par bya'o /
de'i phyir dam pa thar pa 'dod pa dag gis ji srid du dngos po dang dngos po med par lta ba gnyis kyi glags yod pa de srid du 'khor ba yin no zhes rtogs par byas nas /
lta ba 'di gnyis bsal te /
dbu ma'i lam ji lta ba bzhin du bsgom par bya'o /
bcom ldan 'das kyis /
bhāva abhāva vibhāvayi jñānaṃ sarvi acintiya sarvi abhūtaṃ /
ye puna cittavaśānuga bālāḥ te dukhitā bhavakoṭiśateṣu 		thams cad bsam yas thams cad 'byung min pas /
dngos dang dngos med shes pa rnam par bshig /
byis pa gang dag sems kyi dbang song ba /
bhāvānabhāvāniti yaḥ prajānatī sa sarvabhāveṣu na jātu sajjate de dag srid pa bye ba brgyar sdug bsngal /
zhes bya ba dang de bzhin du /
yaḥ sarvabhāveṣu na jātu sajjate sa ānimittaṃ spṛśate samādhim /
iti /
tathā 		sngon 'das dus kyi bskal pa bsam yas na /
mi yi gtso bo byung ba ngas dran te /
smarāmyahaṃ pūrvamatīta adhvani acintiye kalpi narāṇamuttamaḥ /
utpannu lokārthakaro maharṣī nāmena so 'bhāvasamudgato 'bhūt 		drang srong chen po gzings kyi don mdzad pa /
ming ni dngos po med las byung zhes bya /
skyes ma thag tu mkha' la rab tu gnas /
sa jātamātro gagane sthihitvā sarvāṇa dharmāṇabhāva deśayi /
tadānurūpaṃ kṛta nāmadheyaṃ śabdena sarvaṃ trisahasra vijñayī 		chos rnams thams cad dngos po med par bstan /
de tshe de dang mthun par mtshan btags te /
sgras ni 'jig rten kun tu grags par byas /
devāpi sarve pramumocu śabdaṃ abhāvanāmeti jino bhaviṣyati lha rnams thams cad rab tu sgra 'byin pa /
dngos po med ces bya ba'i rgyal bar gyur /
yo jātamātraḥ pada sapta prakraman abhāva dharmāṇa samaṃ prakāśayī skyes ma thag tu gom pa bdun bor te /
rgyal bas chos rnams dngos po med par bshad /
buddho yadā bheṣyati dharmarājaḥ sarvāṇa dharmāṇa prakāśako muniḥ thub pa ches rnams thams cad ston pa yi /
sangs rgyas chos kyi rgyal por nam gyur tshe /
tṛṇagulmavṛkṣauṣadhiśailaparvate abhāva dharmāṇa ravo bhaviṣyati rtsva shing gel pa sman ri brag rnams las /
chos rnams dngos po med ces sgra yang 'byung /
yāvanti śabdāstahi lokadhātau sarve hyabhāvā na hi kaści bhāvaḥ 'jig rten de na ji snyed sgra yod pa /
thams cad dngos med ci yang med pa zhes /
tāvanti kho tasya tathāgatasya ravu niścarī lokavināyakasya /
iti 		de lta bur ni 'jig rten 'dren pa yi /
sgra dbyangs rnam pa shin tu 'byung bar 'gyur /
bhavatīti bhāvaḥ sattā /
na vidyate sattā svabhāvaḥ sarvabhāvānāmityabhāvāḥ sarvadharmāḥ, śūnyāḥ sarvadharmā niḥsvabhāvayogeneti prajñāpāramitāpāṭhāt bhāvasvabhāvasyānupapatteḥ /
abhāva dharmāṇa ravo bhaviṣyati /
ityādinā sūtrārtho 'vagantavyaḥ /
yāvanti śabdāstahi lokadhātau /
sarve hyabhāvā na hi kaści bhāvaḥ /
ityādi /
bhūtvā abhāvapratiṣedhavivakṣitatvād bhāvābhāvārtha eva svabhāvābhāvārthaḥ /
ityācāryacandrakīrtipādoparacitāyāṃ prasannapadāyāṃ madhyamakavṛttau svabhāvaparīkṣā nāma pañcadaśamaṃ prakaraṇam 		zhes gsungs so /
dngos po'i rang bzhin mi 'thad pa yi phyir /
chos rnams dngos po med ces sgra yang 'byung /
zhes bya ba la sogs pa mdo'i don khong du chud par bya ste /
'jig rten de na ji sred sgra yod pa /
thams cad dngos med ci yang med pa ste /
zhes bya ba la sogs pa 'byung bas na /
med par dgag pa brjod par 'dod pa'i phyir dngos po med pa'i don ni rang bzhin med pa'i don yin no /
slob dpon zla ba grags pa'i zhal snga nas sbyar ba'i tshig gsal ba las /
rang bzhin brtag pa zhes bya ba rab tu byed pa bco lnga ba'i 'grel pa'o /
bandhamokṣaparīkṣā ṣoḍaśamaṃ prakaraṇam /
atrāha 		'dir smras pa /
dngos po rnams kyi rang bzhin ni yod pa nyid de /
vidyata eva bhāvānāṃ svabhāvaḥ, saṃsārasadbhāvāt 'khor ba yod pa'i phyir ro /
'di na 'khor bas na 'khor ba ste /
iha saṃsaraṇaṃ saṃsṛtiḥ gatergatyantaragamanaṃ saṃsāra ityucyate 'gro bas na 'gro ba gzhan du 'gro ba la 'khor ba zhes bya'o /
gal te dngos po rnams kyi rang bzhin yod pa ma yin na /
yadi bhāvānāṃ svabhāvo na syāt, kasya gatergatyantaragamanaṃ saṃsāraḥ syāt? na hi avidyamānānāṃ vandhyāsūnusaṃskārāṇāṃ saṃsaraṇaṃ dṛṣṭam /
tasmāt saṃsārasadbhāvāt vidyata eva bhāvānāṃ svabhāva iti 		de'i tshe su zhig 'gro ba nas 'gro ba gzhan du 'gro zhing 'khor bar 'gyur /
mo gsham gyi bu'i 'du byed yod pa ma yin pa dag ni 'khor bar ma mthong ngo /
de'i phyir 'khor ba yod pas dngos po rnams kyi rang bzhin yang yod pa nyid yin no /
ucyate /
syādbhāvānāṃ svabhāvaḥ, yadi saṃsāra eva bhavet 		brjod par bya ste /
gal te 'khor ba nyid yod na dngos po rnams kyi rang bzhin yang yod par 'gyur ba zhig na /
na tvasti /
iha yadi saṃsāraḥ syāt, sa niyataṃ saṃskārāṇāṃ vā bhavet sattvasya vā? kiṃ cātaḥ? ubhayathā ca doṣa ityāha 		yod pa ni ma yin no /
'dir gal te 'khor ba yod na ni nges par 'du byed dag gam sems can zhig der 'gyur grang /
gnyi ga ltar yang nyes pa yod do zhes gsungs pa /
saṃskārāḥ saṃsaranti cenna nityāḥ saṃsaranti te gal te 'du byed 'khor zhe na /
de dag rtag na mi 'khor te /
saṃsaranti ca nānityāḥ sattve 'pyeṣa samaḥ kramaḥ mi rtag na yang 'khor mi 'gyur /
sems can la yang rim 'di mtshungs /
tatra yadi saṃskārāḥ saṃsarantīti parikalpyate, kiṃ te nityāḥ saṃsaranti uta anityāḥ? tatra na nityāḥ saṃsaranti niṣkriyatvāt, anityānāṃ ca ghaṭādīnāṃ sakriyatvopalambhāt /
atha anityāḥ, ye hi akriyāḥ, te utpādasamanantarameva vinaṣṭāḥ 		de la gal te 'du byed dag 'khor bar rtog na ni /
ci rtag pa'am mi rtag pa dag cig 'khor grang /
de la rtag pa dag ni mi 'khor te /
bya ba dang bral ba'i phyir te /
bum pa la sogs pa mi rtag pa rnams kho na bya ba dang bcas par dmigs pa'i phyir ro /
ye ca vinaṣṭāḥ, kutasteṣāmavidyamānatvādvandhyāsūnusaṃskārāṇāmiva kvacid gamanam? ityevamanityānāmapi nāsti saṃsāraḥ 'on te mi rtag pa dag yin na ni /
gang mi rtag pa de dag ni skyes ma thag tu 'jig pa yin la; gang dag zhig ba de dag ni yod pa ma yin pas mo gsham gyi bu'i 'du byed dag bzhin du /
athāpi syāt /
anityā eva santo hetuphalasaṃbandhaparaṃparayā avicchinnakramāḥ saṃtānena ca pravartamānāḥ saṃskārāḥ saṃsarantīti 		'gar yang 'phyan par ga la 'gyur /
de ltar na mi rtag pa rnams kyang 'khor ba ma yin no /
ci ste 'du byed rgyu dang 'bras bu gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pas rim pa rgyun mi 'chad cing rgyun chags su 'jug pa mi rtag par gyur pa dag kho na 'khor ro snyam na /
etadapi nopapadyate 'di yang mi 'thad de /
kutaḥ? yat tāvadutpadyate kāryam, tasya saṃsāro nāsti, kutaścidanāgamanāt kvaciccāgamanāt re zhig 'bras bu skye ba gar yin pa de la ni 'khor ba yod pa ma yin te /
gang nas kyang mi 'ong ba'i phyir dang gar yang mi 'gro ba'i phyir ro /
yacca kāraṇaṃ naṣṭam, tasyāpi saṃsāro nāsti, kutaścidanāgamanāt kvaciccāgamanāt rgyu zhig par gyur ba gang yin pa de la yang 'khor ba yod pa ma yin te /
gang nas kyang mi 'ong pa'i phyir dang gar yang mi 'gro ba'i phyir ro /
saṃskāramātravyatirekeṇa atītānāgatayorasiddhatvāt, naṣṭājātatvena avidyamānatvāt 'du byed tsam las ma gtogs par 'das pa dang ma 'ongs pa dag ma grub pa'i phyir dang zhig pa dang ma skyes pa nyid kyis yod pa ma yin pa'i yang phyir ro /
uttarasmin kṣaṇe utpanne pūrvaḥ saṃsaratīti cet, yadi pūrvottarayoḥ kṣaṇayorekatvaṃ syāt, syādetadevam gal te skad cig ma phyi ma skyes pa na snga ma 'khor ba yin no zhe na /
gal te skad cig ma snga ma dang phyi ma gnyis gcig nyid du 'gyur na ni /
de de ltar 'gyur na /
gcig nyid du ni yod pa ma yin te /
na tu ekatvamasti kāryakāraṇabhāvāt, cakṣūrūpacakṣurvijñānānāṃ nāsti ca rgyu dang 'bras bu'i dngos po yin pa'i phyir /
mig dang gzugs dang mig gi rnam par shes pa dag bzhin no /
kiṃ ca ekatve sati pūrvottarakṣaṇavācyataiva na syāt gzhan yang gcig nyid yin na ni skad cig ma snga ma dang phyi mar brjod par bya ba nyid du yang mi 'gyur ro /
na hi eko devadattaḥ ekadā pūrvaścottaraśceti vyapadiśyate dus gcig gi tshe lha mi rnams gcig snga ma dang phyi mar 'gyur ro zhes brjod pa ni med de /
evamihāpi ekatvāt pūrvottarakṣaṇavyapadeśa eva na syāt de bzhin du /
'dir yang gcig yin pa'i phyir skad cig ma snga ma dang phyi mar bsnyad pa nyid du mi 'gyur ro /
api ca pūrvakṣaṇo naṣṭa iti na syāduttarakṣaṇavadavyatiriktatvāt gzhan yang skad cig ma snga ma zhig go zhes bya bar mi 'gyur te /
uttarakṣaṇa utpanna iti na syāt, pūrvakṣaṇavadavyatiriktatvāt tha mi dad pa'i phyir skad cig ma phyi ma bzhin no /
skad cig ma phyi ma skyes so zhes bya bar yang mi 'gyur te /
atha anyatve sati saṃsaraṇaṃ syāt, evaṃ sati arhatāmapi saṃsaraṇaṃ syāt tha mi dad pa'i phyir skad cig ma snga ma bzhin no /
ci ste gzhan nyid yin pa na 'khor ro zhe na /
anyasya pṛthagjanasya saṃsārotpattisadbhāvāt /
nirvṛtaśca pradīpaḥ pradīpāntare jvalatīti syāt /
kiṃ cānyat 		de lta na ni gzhan so so'i skye bo 'khor bar skye ba yod pa'i phyir dgra bcom pa rnams kyang 'khor bar 'gyur la /
mar me gzhan 'bar ba na shi ba'i mar me yang 'bar ro zhes bya bar yang 'gyur ro /
naṣṭādvā pūrvakṣaṇāduttarasya kṣaṇasyodayaḥ syādanaṣṭānnaśyamānādvā? tatra yadi naṣṭādiṣyate, vahnidagdhādapi bījādaṅkurodayaḥ syāt, tataśca nirhetukaḥ syāt gzhan yang skad cig ma phyi ma skad cig ma snga ma zhig pa'am ma zhig pa'am 'jig bzhin pa zhig las skye grang /
de las gal te zhig pa las yin par 'dod na ni /
sa bon tshig pa las kyang myu gu skye bar 'gyur ro /
de'i phyir rgyu med par 'gyur ro /
ci ste ma zhig pa las so zhe na /
atha anaṣṭāt, evamapi avikṛte 'pi bīje 'ṅkurodayaḥ syāt, kāryakāraṇayośca yaugapadyaṃ syāt, nirhetukaścotpādaḥ syāt de lta na yang sa bon rnam par 'gyur ba med par yang myu gu skye bar 'gyur zhing /
rgyu dang 'bras bu gnyis kyang dus gcig par 'gyur la /
skye ba rgyu med par yang 'gyur ro /
gal te 'gag bzhin pa las skye'o zhe na /
naśyamānāditi cet /
naṣṭānaṣṭavyatirekeṇa naśyamānābhāvāt, naṣṭānaṣṭayośca vihitadoṣatvānnaśyamānādapi nāstyutpattiriti, kutaḥ kāryakāraṇavyavasthā pūrvottarakṣaṇavyavasthā vā bhaviṣyati? yadā ca pūrvottarakṣaṇavyavasthā kāryakāraṇavyavasthā ca nāsti, tadā saṃtāno 'pi nāsti, tadabhāvānnāsti bhavatāṃ saṃsāra iti anityānāmapi saṃskārāṇāṃ nāsti saṃsāra iti 		'jig bzhin pa las kyang skye ba med de /
zhig pa dang ma zhig pa las ma gtogs pa'i 'jig bzhin pa med pa'i phyir dang zhig pa dang ma zhig pa dag la yang nyes pa brjod zin pa'i phyir ro /
de'i phyir rgyu dang 'bras bu'i rnam par gzhag pa dang skad cig ma snga ma dang phyi ma'i rnam par gzhag pa yod par ga la 'gyur /
gang gi tshe skad cig ma snga ma dang phyi ma'i rnam par gzhag pa dang rgyu dang 'bras bu'i rnam par gzhag pa yod pa ma yin pa de'i tshe rgyun yang yod pa ma yin la /
atraike varṇayanti de med pas 'khor ba yang med do /
satyaṃ saṃskārā na saṃsaranti utpattividhuratvāt, kiṃ tarhi sattvaḥ saṃsaratīti de'i phyir 'du byed mi rtag pa rnams la yang 'khor ba yod pa ma yin no /
'dir kha cig 'thad pa dang 'gal ba'i phyir na 'du byed dag mi 'khor ba ni bden te /
ucyate /
sattve 'pyeṣa samaḥ kramaḥ /
sattvaḥ saṃsaratītyucyamāne kimasau nityaḥ saṃsarati, uta anityaḥ, iti vicāryamāṇe ya eva saṃskārāṇāṃ saṃsaraṇānupapattikramaḥ, sa samatvātsattve 'pi samo nipatati /
tasmātsattvo 'pi na saṃsarati 		'o na ci zhe na /
bdag 'khor ro zhes smra bar byed do /
brjod par bya ste /
sems can la yang rim 'di mtshungs /
gang gi phyir sems can 'khor ro zhes smra ba /
ci 'di rtag pa'am mi rtag pa zhig 'khor zhes rnam par dpyad pa na /
'du byed dag 'khor bar mi 'thad pa'i rim pa gang yin pa de sems can la yang mtshungs par 'gyur ba de'i phyir sems can yang 'khor ba ma yin no /
atrāha /
naiva hi sattvasaṃskārāṇāṃ saṃsārānupapattikramaḥ samo bhavitumarhati, yasmādiha saṃskārāṇāṃ nityānityabhūtānāṃ saṃsaraṇaṃ nāstītyuktam /
na caivamātmā nityānityabhūtaḥ 		'dir smras pa /
'du byed dag 'khor bar mi 'thad pa'i tshul ni sems can la yang mtshungs par 'gyur bar 'os pa ma yin te /
gang gi phyir 'du byed rtag pa dang mi rtag par gyur pa dag kho na la 'khor ba yod pa ma yin no /
zhes bya bar smras na /
bdag ni de ltar rtag pa dang mi rtag par 'gyur ba ma yin no /
tasya hi skandhebhyastattvānyatvāvaktavyatāvat nityatvenānityatvenāpyavaktavyatā vyavasthāpyate /
tasmādātmaiva saṃsaratīti na coktadoṣaprasaṅga iti 		'di ltar phung po dag las de nyid dang gzhan du brjod du med pa ltar rtag pa dang mi rtag pa nyid du yang brjod du med par rnam par gzhag ste /
de'i phyir bdag kho na 'khor zhing sngar bstan pa'i nyes par yang thal bar mi 'gyur ro /
ucyate /
pudgalaḥ saṃsarati cetskandhāyatanadhātuṣu 		brjod par bya ste /
gal te gang zag 'khor zhe na /
phung po skye mched khams rnams la /
pañcadhā mṛgyamāṇo 'sau nāsti kaḥ saṃsariṣyati de ni rnam pa lngas btsal na /
med na gang zhig 'khor bar 'gyur /
yadi pudgalo nāma kaścit syāt, sa saṃsaret gal te gang zag ces bya ba 'ga' zhig yod na ni de 'khor bar 'gyur ba zhig na /
na tvasti /
yasmāt skandhāyatanadhātuṣu pañcadhā mṛgyamāṇo nāsti /
kathaṃ kṛtvā? 		yod pa ni ma yin te /
gang gi phyir phung po dang skye mched dang khams rnams la rnam pa lngas btsal ba na yod pa ma yin pa'i phyir ro /
ji ltar zhe na /
indhanaṃ punaragnirna nāgniranyatra cendhanāt shing nyid me ni ma yin te /
shing las gzhan la me yang med /
nāgnirindhanavānnāgnāvindhanāni na teṣu saḥ me ni shing dang ldan ma yin /
me la shing med der de med /
agnīndhanābhyāṃ vyākhyāta ātmopādānayoḥ kramaḥ /
ityevaṃ skandhāyatanadhātusvabhāva ātmā na bhavati 		me dang shing gis bdag dang ni /
nye bar len pa'i rim pa kun /
zhes bya ba de bzhin du bdag phung po dang skye mched dang khams kyi rang bzhin can ma yin zhing /
nāpi tebhyo vyatiriktaḥ de dag las tha dad pa yang ma yin la /
na skandhāyatanadhātumān /
na skandhāyatanadhātuṣvātmā 		phung po dang skye mched dang khams dang ldan pa yang ma yin zhing /
bdag la phung po dang skye mched dang khams med cing /
nātmani skandhāyatanadhātavaḥ /
ityevaṃ pañcadhā mṛgyamāṇa ātmā na saṃbhavati pūrvoditena nyāyena 		phung po dang skye mched dang khams la yang bdag med do zhes do zhes de ltar sngar bshad pa'i tshul gyis rnam pa lngas btsal ba na bdag yod pa ma yin no /
yaścedānīṃ skandhāyatanadhātuṣvevaṃ vicāryamāṇaḥ pañcadhā na saṃbhavati, sa kathamavidyamānaḥ san saṃsariṣyatīti? evamātmano 'pi nāsti saṃsāraḥ, vandhyāsutasyeva avidyamānatvāt /
api ca /
ayamātmā 		gang zhig de ltar phung po dang skye mched dang khams rnams la rnam pa lngas btsal ba na de ltar yod pa ma yin pa de ni de med pas ji ltar 'khor bar 'gyur /
de ltar na bdag la yang 'khor ba yod pa ma yin te /
mo gsham gyi bu ltar med pa'i phyir ro /
gzhan yang bdag 'di /
upādānādupādānaṃ saṃsaran vibhavo bhavet nye bar len nas nyer len par /
'khor na srid pa med par 'gyur /
vibhavaścānupādānaḥ kaḥ sa kiṃ saṃsariṣyati srid med nye bar len med na /
de gang ci zhig 'khor bar 'gyur /
bhavatu kāmamātmanaḥ saṃsāraḥ, yadi anupādānasya sato 'sya saṃsāro yuktaḥ syāt gal te yod ni nye bar len pa med par yang 'di 'khor bar rung bar 'gyur na ni /
bdag 'khor bar 'gyur la rag pa zhig go /
kathaṃ punarasya anupādānatā prasajyata iti pratipādayannāha ji ltar de la nye bar len pa med pa nyid du thal bar bstan pa'i phyir /
nye bar len nas nyer len par /
'khor na srid pa med par 'gyur /
upādānādupādānaṃ saṃsaran vibhavo bhavet iti /
iha hi manuṣyopādānāddevopādānaṃ gacchan parityajya vā manuṣyopādānaṃ devopādānaṃ gacchedaparityajya vā? yadi tāvatparityajya gacchatītyucyate, tadā pūrvopādānasya parityāgāduttarasya cānupādānāttadantarāle vibhavaḥ syāt 		zhes bya ba gsungs so /
'dir mi'i nye bar len pa nas lha'i nye bar len par 'gro ba na /
mi'i nye bar len pa btang nas lha'i nye bar len par 'gro ba'am /
ma btang bar yin grang /
re zhig gal te yongs su btang nas 'gro'o zhes brjod na ni /
de'i tshe nye bar len pa sngar ma btang ba'i phyir dang phyi ma ma blangs ba'i phyir /
de dag gi bar du srid pa med par 'gyur ro /
vigato bhavo vibhavaḥ /
bhavaḥ pañcopādānaskandhāḥ, tadrahitaḥ syāt /
yaśca vibhavo 'nupādānaḥ, sa skandharahitatvāt prajñaptyupādānakāraṇarahitatvānnirhetukaḥ syāt 		'di la srid pa dang bral ba yod pas na srid pa med pa'o /
srid pa ni nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga ste /
de dag dang bral bar 'gyur ro /
srid pa med cing nye bar len pa med pa gang yin pa de ni phung po lnga dang bral bas gdags pa'i nye bar len pa'i rgyu dang bral ba'i phyir rgyu med par 'gyur la /
yaśca anupādāno nirañjano 'vyakto nirhetukaḥ, kaḥ saḥ? na kaścit saḥ gang zhig nye bar len pa med cing gsal byed dang bral ba mi gsal ba rgyu med pa de ni gang ste /
de ni ci yang ma yin zhing /
nāstyeva sa ityarthaḥ /
tasmiṃścāsati tadabhāvādeva upādānamapi nirupādātṛkaṃ nāstīti kiṃ saṃsariṣyati? nāstyeva tat, yatsaṃsariṣyatītyarthaḥ 		de ni yod pa ma yin pa nyid do zhes bya ba'i don to /
de med pas 'byung bar 'gyur ba lha'i nye bar len pa po med pa yang yod pa ma yin pa'i phyir ci zhig tu 'khor bar 'gyur te /
gang du 'khor bar 'gyur ba de yang yod pa ma yin pa nyid do /
athavā, kimityetat saṃsaraṇakriyāviśeṣaṇam yang na ci zhig ces bya ba 'di ni bya ba 'khor ba'i khyad par yin te /
tataśca avidyamānatvāt naiva saṃsaraṇakriyāṃ kariṣyati de'i phyir yod pa ma yin pas 'khor ba'i bya ba byed par mi 'gyur ro /
evaṃ tāvatpūrvopādānaparityāgena saṃsaraṇamayuktam de ltar na re zhig nye bar len pa snga ma btang nas 'khor bar mi rigs pa yin no /
atha aparityāgena, tathāpi nopapadyate ci ste ma btang bar yin no zhe na /
de ltar yang rigs pa ma yin no /
kiṃ kāraṇam? pūrvasyāparityāgāduttarasya ca grahaṇād yasmādekasyātmano dvayātmakatā syāt ci'i phyir zhe na /
gang gi phyir snga ma ma btang ba'i phyir dang phyi ma ma bzung ba'i phyir bdag gcig gnyis nyid du 'gyur na /
na caitadiṣyata iti 'di ni 'dod pa yang ma yin no /
tasmādaparityāgenāpi saṃsaraṇaṃ nāsti de'i phyir ma btang bar 'khor ba yang yod pa ma yin no /
atha pūrvottarayorbhavayormadhye āntarābhavikaskandhasaṃbhavāt, taiśca sopādānatvāt sopādānaṃ saṃsarato 'pi na vibhavatāprasaṅga iti ci ste srid pa snga phyi gnyis kyi bar na srid pa bar mdo'i phung po yod pas de dag gis de nye bar len pa dang bcas pa'i phyir nye bar len pa nas nye bar len par 'khor yang srid pa med par thal bar mi 'gyur ro zhe na /
tadapi na yuktam, pūrvabhavaparityāgāparityāgābhyāmāntarāmavikaskandhasaṃsāre 'pi tulyaprasaṅgatvāt de yang mi rung ste /
srid pa bar mdo'i phung por 'khor ba la yang srid pa snga ma gtong ba dang mi gtong ba dag gi sgo nas thal bar 'gyur ba mtshungs pa'i phyir ro /
yugapattyāgopādānādadoṣa iti cet, ucyate /
kimekadeśena pūrvopādānaṃ tyajate ekadeśenāntarābhavopādānaṃ saṃcarati, atha sarvātmanā? tatra yadi avayaveneti parikalpyate, tadā dvayātmakatāprasaṅgādityuktadoṣaḥ 		cig car gtong ba dang len par byed pa'i phyir nyes pa med do zhe na /
brjod par bya ste /
ci phyogs gcig gis nye bar len pa snga ma gtong zhing phyogs gcig gis srid pa bar mdo'i nye bar len par rgyu 'am /
'on te bdag nyid thams cad kyis yin grang /
de la gal te cha shas kyis so zhes bya bar rtog na ni /
de'i tshe bdag gnyis nyid du thal bar 'gyur ro zhes nyes pa bshad zin to /
atha sarvātmanā, evamapi sa eva vibhavatāprasaṅga āpadyate ci ste bdag nyid thams cad kyis yin no zhe na /
de lta na yang khyed cag la thal ba de nyid du 'gyur ro /
etāvāṃstu viśeṣaḥ yadantarābhavasaṃcāre 'tisāmīpyāt sūkṣmaṃ kālamanupādānaḥ syāt khyad par ni 'di tsam zhig yod de /
srid pa bar ma dor rgyu ba na shin tu nye bas dus thung du zhig tu nye bar len pa med par 'gyur ba gang yin pa'o /
na ca sarvātmanā ekasya padārthasya abhinnapadārthasya viṣaye yugapat tyāgopādāne dṛṣṭe bdag nyid thams cad kyis gtong ba dang len pa dngos po tha dad pa'i yul can dag ni dngos po gcig la cig car mthong ba yang ma yin te /
na hi ekasya devadattasya sarvātmanā gṛhādgṛhaṃ saṃcarataḥ ekadā tyāgopādānakriye dve saṃbhavataḥ lha sbyin gcig pu khyim nas khyim du rgyu ba la dus gcig tu bdag nyid thams cad kyis gtong ba dang len pa'i bya ba gnyis yod pa ni ma yin no /
atha ekena pādena ekasya parityāgādaparasya copādānād yugapattyāgopādāne parikalpyete, nanu evaṃ sati pādadvayavad dvayātmakatā ātmanaḥ syāt ci ste rkang pa gcig gis gcig btang ba'i phyir dang gzhan len pa'i phyir cig car gtong ba dang len par rtog go zhe na /
de lta yin na rkang ba gnyis bzhin du bdag kyang gnyis nyid du 'gyur te /
aṃśena pūrvatrāvasthānādaṃśena cottaratrāvasthānādanekāvayavatā prasajyeta /
tasmād yaugapadyenāpi tyāgopādāne na saṃbhavataḥ ityaparihāra evāyam /
tasmādantarābhavopādāne 'pi sa eva doṣaprasaṅga iti sarvathā ātmano 'pi nāsti saṃsāraḥ /
yadā ca saṃskārāṇāmātmanaśca saṃsāro nāsti, tadā nāstyeva saṃsāra iti sthitam 		cha shas kyis snga ma la gnas pa'i phyir dang cha shas kyis phyi ma la gnas pa'i phyir cha shas du ma nyid du thal bar 'gyur ro /
de'i phyir cig car yang gtong ba dang len pa yod pa ma yin pas 'di ni lan ma yin pa nyid do /
de'i phyir srid pa bar ma do len pa la yang nyes pa de nyid du thal bar 'gyur bas rnam pa thams cad du bdag la yang 'khor ba yod pa ma yin no /
gang gi tshe 'du byed dag dang bdag 'khor ba yod pa ma yin pa de'i tshe 'khor ba med pa nyid do zhes bya bar gnas so /
atrāha /
vidyata eva saṃsāraḥ, pratidvandvisadbhāvāt 		'dir smras pa /
'khor ba ni yod pa nyid de /
'gal zla yod pa'i phyir ro /
iha yo nāsti, na tasya pratidvandvī vidyate, tadyathā vandhyāsūnoriti 'dir gang yod pa ma yin pa de la ni 'gal zla yod pa ma yin te /
dper na /
mo gsham gyi bu'i dgra bo bzhin no /
asti ca saṃsārasya pratidvandvi nirvāṇam /
tasmādasti saṃsāra iti 		'khor ba'i 'gal zla mya ngan las 'das pa ni yod na 'khor ba yod par 'gyur /
de'i phyir 'khor ba yang yod do /
ucyate /
syātsaṃsāraḥ, yadi tatpratidvandvi nirvāṇaṃ syāt 		brjod par bya ste /
gal te de'i 'gal zla mya ngan las 'das pa yod na /
'khor ba yod par 'gyur na /
na tvastītyāha /
saṃskārāṇāṃ na nirvāṇaṃ kathaṃcidupapadyate /
sattvasyāpi na nirvāṇaṃ kathaṃcidupapadyate /
yadi nirvāṇaṃ nāma kiṃcit syāt, tat parikalpyamānaṃ saṃskārāṇāṃ nityānāṃ vā parikalpyeta anityānāṃ vā? tatra nityānāmavikāriṇāṃ kiṃ nirvāṇaṃ kuryāt? anityānāmapi asaṃvidyamānānāṃ kiṃ nirvāṇaṃ kuryāditi sarvaṃ pūrveṇa tulyam /
na kathaṃciditi na kenāpi prakāreṇetyarthaḥ 		yod pa ni ma yin no zhes gsungs pa /
'du byed mya ngan 'da' bar ni /
ji lta bur yang mi 'thad do /
sems can mya ngan 'da' bar yang /
ji lta bur yang 'thad mi 'gyur /
gal te mya ngan las 'da' ba zhes bya ba cung zad cig yod na ni /
de rtog pa na 'du byed rtag pa'am mi rtag pa dag cig la rtog grang /
de la rtag pa 'gyur ba med pa dag la ni mya ngan las 'da' bas ci zhig byed par 'gyur /
mi rtag pa yod pa ma yin pa rnams la yang mya ngan las 'das pas ci zhig byed de /
thams cad snga ma dang mtshungs so /
ji lta bur yang zhes bya ba ni rnam pa gang gis kyang zhes bya ba'i don to /
atha sattvasya nirvāṇaṃ parikalpyate, tadapi nityasya vā anityasya vā pūrvavannopapadyate ci ste sems can la mya ngan las 'da' ba rtog go zhe na /
de yang snga ma ltar rtag pa'am mi rtag pa las 'thad pa ma yin no /
atha nityānityatvenāvācyasya parikalpyate, nanvevaṃ sati nirvāṇe 'pyātmāstītyabhyupeta bhavati saṃsāra iva ci ste rtag pa dang mi rtag pa nyid du brjod du med pa zhig la rtog go zhe na de lta na ni brjod du med pa'i phyir 'khor ba ltar mya ngan las 'das pa na yang bdag yod do zhes khas blangs par gyur pa ma yin nam /
api ca /
sopādānasyaivātmanaḥ avācyatā yujyate 		gzhan yang brjod du med pa ni bdag nye bar len pa dang bcas pa kho na la rigs na /
na ca nirvāṇe upādānamastīti kuto 'sya avācyatā? bhavatu vā tattvānyatvāvācyatā ātmanaḥ, api tu kimasau nirvāṇe 'sti uta nāsti? yadi asti, tadā mokṣe 'pi tasya sadbhāvānnityatā syāt mya ngan las 'das pa na ni nye bar len pa yod pa ma yin pas 'di la brjod du med pa nyid ga la yod /
yang na bdag de nyid dang gzhan du brjod du med par 'gyur mod /
'on kyang 'di ni mya ngan las 'das pa yod dam 'on te med pa zhig yin /
gal te yod na ni de'i tshe thar bar gyur pa na yang de yod pas rtag pa nyid du 'gyur ro /
atha nāsti, tadā anitya ātmā syāt /
tataśca tattvānyatvāvācyatāvannityānityatvenāpi ātmanaḥ avaktavyateti na syāt /
atha nirvāṇe 'pi ātmanaḥ astitvanāstitvenāvācyataiva iṣyate, evamapi kimasau vijñeyaḥ, atha na? yadi vijñeyaḥ, na tarhi nirupādāno 'sāvātmā nirvāṇe vijñeyatvāt saṃsāra iva 		'on te med na ni de'i tshe bdag mi rtag par 'gyur ro /
de'i phyir bdag de nyid dang gzhan nyid du brjod du med pa ltar rtag pa dang mi rtag pa nyid du yang brjod du med do zhes bya bar mi 'gyur ro /
ci ste mya ngan las 'das pa na bdag yod pa dang med pa nyid du yang brjod du med par 'dod do zhe na /
de lta na yang ci 'di de'i tshe shes par bya ba zhig yin nam /
'on te ma yin /
gal te shes par bya ba yin no zhe na /
'on te 'khor ba ltar mya ngan las 'das pa na yang shes par bya ba yin pa'i phyir bdag 'di nye bar len pa med pa ma yin no /
'on te mi shes na ni de'i tshe 'di shes par bya ba ma yin pa'i rang bzhin yin pa'i phyir /
atha na vijñāyate, tatrāsau avijñeyasvarūpatvāt khapuṣpavannāstyeveti kuto 'sya avācyatā? tadevaṃ nirvāṇamapi nāsti /
tadabhāvānnāsti saṃsāra iti 		nam mkha'i me tog ltar med pas 'di brjod du med pa nyid du ga la yod /
de'i phyir de ltar mya ngan las 'das pa yang yod pa ma yin la /
de med pas 'khor ba yang med do /
ata evoktaṃ bhagavatyāmaṣṭasāhasrikāyām de nyid kyi phyir bcom ldan 'das ma las /
nirvāṇamapyāyuṣman subhūte māyopamaṃ svapnopamam tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor mya ngan las 'das pa yang sgyu ma lta bu rmi lam lta bu'o /
buddhadharmā āyuṣman subhūte māyopamāḥ svapnopamā ityādi tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyang rmi lam lta bu sgyu ma lta bu'o zhes bya ba la sogs pa nas /
saceta kulaputra nirvāṇādapyadhikataro 'nyo dharmo 'bhaviṣyat, tamapyahaṃ māyopamaṃ svapnopamamiti vadāmi /
tathā āryasamādhirājabhaṭṭārake 		rigs kyi bu gal te mya ngan las 'das pa las ches lhag pa'i chos gzhan zhig yod na yang /
de yang sgyu ma lta bu rmi lam lta bu'o zhes nga smra'o zhes bya ba dang de bzhin du 'phags pa ting nge 'dzin gyi rgyal po las kyang /
paramārthasatya supinena samaṃ nirvāṇaṃ svapnasamotaratī don dam bden pa rmi lam 'dra ba dang mya ngan 'das pa rmi lam mtshungs par 'jug /
mana evamotarati yena vidu manasaṃvaraḥ kathitu śreṣṭhu ayam /
tathā 		gang gis mkhas pa de ltar 'jug pa yang /
de ni yid kyi sdom pa'i mchog tu brjod /
nirodhasatyaṃ supinaṃ yathaiva svapnasvabhāvāmatha nirvṛtiṃ ca ces bya ba dang de bzhin du /
'gog pa'i bden pa rmi lam ji bzhin te /
mya ngan 'das pa'ang rmi lam ji bzhin du /
yeneha vācottari bodhisattvo ayaṃ khu so vuccati vācasaṃvaraḥ gang la byang chub sems dpa' gang 'jug pa /
de ni ngag gi sdom pa de zhes bya /
zhes gsungs so /
atrāha /
yadyapi tvayā saṃsāranirvāṇe pratiṣiddhe, tathāpi bandhamokṣau vidyete /
na cāvidyamānasya bhāvasvabhāvasya bandhamokṣau saṃbhavataḥ /
tasmād bandhamokṣasadbhāvād vidyata eva bhāvānāṃ svabhāva iti 		'dir smras pa /
gal te yang khyod kyis 'khor ba dang mya ngan las 'das pa gnyis bkag mod kyi /
de lta na yang bcings pa dang thar pa dag ni yod pa yin no /
yod pa ma yin pa'i dngos po'i rang bzhin la ni bcings pa dang thar pa yod pa ma yin no /
de'i phyir bcings pa dang thar pa yod pa'i phyir dngos po rnams kyi rang bzhin yod pa nyid do /
ucyate /
syādbhāvānāṃ svabhāvaḥ, yadi bandhamokṣāveva syātām /
na tu staḥ ityāha 		brjod par bya ste /
gal te bcings pa dang thar pa gnyis nyid yod na dngos po rnams kyi rang bzhin yod par 'gyur na yod pa ni ma yin no /
zhes gsungs pa /
na badhyante na mucyante udayavyayadharmiṇaḥ skye 'jig chos can 'du byed rnams /
mi 'ching grol bar mi 'gyur te /
saṃskārāḥ pūrvavatsattvo badhyate na na mucyate /
iha ya ime rāgādayaḥ kleśāḥ baddhānāmasvatantrīkaraṇe bandhanamiti vyapadiśyate, yaiśca baddhāḥ pṛthagjanāḥ traidhātukaṃ nātikramantīti vyavasthāpyate, tadetadrāgādikaṃ bandhanatvena parikalpyamānamudayavyayadharmiṇāṃ tāvat kṣaṇikānāṃ saṃskārāṇāmutpādānantaradhvaṃsināṃ naṣṭānāmasattvānna saṃbhavati 		snga ma bzhin du sems can yang /
mi 'ching grol bar mi 'gyur ro /
'di na 'dod chags la sogs pa nyon mongs pa gang dag bcing bar bya ba rnams rang dbang med par byed pas 'ching pa'o zhes bya bar bsnyad cing /
gang dag gis bcings pas so so'i skye bo rnams khams gsum las mi 'da'o zhes bya bar rnam par 'jog na /
'dod chags la sogs pa 'ching ba nyid du brtags pa'i bcings pa de ni re zhig skye ba dang 'jig pa'i chos can 'du byed skad cig ma rnams la mi srid de /
skyes ma thag tu 'jig cing brlag pa rnams ni yod pa ma yin pa'i phyir ro /
rāgādibandhanavicchedalakṣaṇo 'pi mokṣaḥ anityānāṃ saṃskārāṇāmavidyamānatvānnaiva saṃbhavati 'dod chags la sogs pa'i 'ching ba rnam par chad pa'i mtshan nyid can gyi thar pa yang mi srid de /
'du byed mi rtag pa rnams ni yod pa ma yin pa nyid kyi phyir ro /
pūrvavat pūrvoktavidhinetyarthaḥ /
yathā ca pūrvoktavidhinā saṃskārāṇāṃ bandhamokṣau na saṃbhavataḥ, evaṃ pūrvavadeva sattvo 'pi na badhyate nāpi mucyate, ityevaṃ bandhamokṣāvapi na staḥ 		snga ma bzhin du zhes bya ba ni sngar bshad pa'i tshul gyis zhes bya ba'i don to /
ji ltar sngar bshad pa'i rnam pas 'du byed rnams la bcings pa dang thar pa dag yod pa ma yin pa de ltar /
snga ma bzhin du sems can yang mi 'ching zhing grol bar yang mi 'gyur ro /
de ltar na bcings pa dang thar pa yang med do /
atrāha /
yadyapi saṃskārāṇāṃ sattvasya vā bandho nāsti, tathāpi rāgādikamupādānākhyaṃ bandhanabhūtamasti, tatsadbhāvādbandho 'pi bhaviṣyatīti 		'dir smras pa /
gal te yang 'du byed dag dang sems can la bcings pa yod pa ma yin pa de lta na yang 'dod chags la sogs pa nye bar len pa zhes bya ba 'ching bar gyur pa ni yod pa yin la /
de yod pas bcings ba yang yod par 'gyur ro /
ucyate brjod pa /
syādupādānam, bandhanaṃ yadi kaṃcitpadārthaṃ badhnīyāt, na tu badhnāti gal te dngos po 'ga' zhig 'ching na ni /
nye bar len pa 'ching bar yang 'gyur na /
yathā ca na badhnāti, tathā pratipādayannāha 'ching ba yang ma yin no /
ji ltar mi 'ching ba de ltar bstan pa'i phyir bshad pa /
bandhanaṃ cedupādānaṃ sopādāno na badhyate gal te nye bar len 'ching na /
nye bar len bcas 'ching mi 'gyur /
badhyate nānupādānaḥ kimavastho 'tha badhyate nye bar len med mi 'ching ste /
gnas skabs gang zhig 'ching bar 'gyur /
tatra vidyamānopādānaḥ sopādānaḥ, sa tāvadbhāvo na badhyate de la nye bar len bcas ni nye bar len pa yod pa ste /
re zhig dngos po de ni 'ching bar mi 'gyur ro /
yo hi sopādānaḥ, sa baddha eva /
tasya punarapi bandhanayogaḥ kiṃ kuryāt? yaścāpi anupādānaḥ bandhanarahitaḥ, asāvapi bandhanarahitatvāt tathāgatavanna badhyate /
anupādānaḥ bandhanarahitaḥ badhyata iti parasparaviruddhatvāccāyuktametat 		gang zhig nye bar len pa dang bcas pa de ni bcings par gyur pa nyid yin na /
de la yang 'ching ba dang 'brel bas ci zhig byed par 'gyur /
gang zhig nye bar len pa med pa nye bar len pa dang bral ba de yang mi 'ching ste /
'ching pa dang bral ba'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa bzhin no /
nye bar len pa med pa 'ching ba dang bral ba 'ching ngo zhes bya ba ni phan tshun 'gal ba yin pa'i phyir yang 'di mi rigs so /
yaścaivaṃ nirūpyamāṇaḥ sopādāno nirupādāno vā na badhyate, sa idānīṃ kimavastho badhyatām? nāstyevāsau kācidaparā asyāvasthā, yasyāṃ badhyetetyabhiprāyaḥ gang zhig de ltar nges par brtags pa na nye bar len pa dang bcas pa'am nye bar len pa dang bral ba yin yang rung ste /
mi 'ching ba de ni da gnas skabs gang zhig tu gyur pa zhig 'ching bar 'gyur te /
gang zhig 'ching bar 'gyur ba de'i gnas skabs gzhan de ni 'ga' yang yod pa ma yin no snyam du dgongs pa'o /
yadā caivaṃ nirūpyamāṇaṃ bandhanaṃ na kaṃcidapi badhnāti, tadā kaṃcidapyabadhnata upādānasya rāgādeḥ kuto bandhanatvamiti /
tasmād bandhanamapi nāsti 		gang gi tshe de ltar gzhigs pa na 'ching bas ci zhig ltar yang 'ching bar mi byed pa de'i tshe 'ga' yang 'ching bar mi byed pa nye bar len pa 'dod chags la sogs pa 'ching ba nyid du ga la 'gyur /
de'i phyir bcings pa yang med do /
api ca gzhan yang /
badhnīyādbandhanaṃ kāmaṃ bandhyātpūrvaṃ bhavedyadi /
na cāsti tat 		gal te bcing bya'i snga rol na /
'ching ba yod na 'ching la rag /
de yang med de /
iha bandhyavyatirekeṇa bandhanaṃ nigaḍādikaṃ pūrvasiddhaṃ sat bandhyaṃ devadattaṃ badhnātīti dṛṣṭam /
evaṃ yadi bandhyebhyaḥ saṃskārebhyaḥ pudgalādvā bandhyātpūrvaṃ rāgādikaṃ bandhanaṃ siddhaṃ syāt, tena pūrvasiddhena bandhanaṃ syāt saṃskārāṇāṃ pudgalasya vā 		'di na 'ching ba lcags la sogs pa bcing bar bya ba las tha dad par lngar grub par gyur pas bcing bar bya ba lha sbyin 'ching ngo zhes bya bar mthong ba de bzhin du bcing bar bya ba 'du byed rnams sam gang zag gi snga rol du 'ching ba 'dod chags la sogs pa grub par gyur na ni sngar grub pa des 'du byed rnams sa ma gang zag 'ching bar 'gyur la rag na /
taccaitanna saṃbhavati nirāśrayasya rāgādikasya asiddhatvāt /
pūrvasiddhasya ca bandhanasya paścād bandhyena saha saṃbandhasya niṣprayojanatvāt /
bandhyasya ca bandhanātpṛthaksiddhasya pūvabandhanāpekṣāniṣprayojanatvācca nāsti bandhyādbandhanasya pūrvasiddhiḥ /
tasmānnaiva bandhanaṃ kaṃcidapi badhnāti 		de ni yod pa yang ma yin te /
rten med pas 'dod chags la sogs pa ma grub pa'i phyir dang sngar 'ching ba grub pa la phyis bcing bya dang lhan cig 'brel pa dgos pa med pa'i phyir dang 'ching ba las tha dad par grub pa'i bcings pa la yang 'ching ba dgos pa med pa'i phyir bcing bar bya ba'i snga rol du 'ching pa grub pa med do /
de'i phyir 'ching bas ni 'ga' yang mi 'ching la /
na ca kaṃcidapyabadhnato bandhanatvaṃ yuktamiti nāsti bandhanam /
bandhanābhāvācca bandhyo 'pi nāstīti siddham 		'ga' yang mi 'ching ba ni 'ching ba nyid du mi rigs pas 'ching ba yod pa ma yin zhing /
'ching pa med pas bcings pa yang med do zhes bya bar grub po /
yatpunaratra śeṣaṃ dūṣaṇaṃ tat gang zhig 'dir sun 'byin pa 'phrog gyur pa /
śeṣamuktaṃ gamyamānagatāgataiḥ lhag ma ni tshigs su bcad pa'i 'don pa go bsnor te /
iti veditavyam /
ślokapāṭhaparivartanena 		song dang ma song bgom pas bstan par rig par bya ste /
re zhig bcings pa mi 'ching ste /
baddho na badhyate tāvadabaddho naiva badhyate /
baddhābaddhavinirmukto badhyamāno na badhyate 		ma bcings pa yang 'ching mi 'gyur /
bcings dang ma bcings ma gtogs par /
'ching bzhin shes par mi 'gyur ro /
ityādinā yojyam /
atrāha /
yadyapi bhavatā bandhanaṃ pratiṣiddham, tathāpi saṃsāracārakāgārāvabaddhānāmatrāṇānāṃ sattvānāṃ mahākāruṇikaistathāgataiḥ śīlasamādhiprajñātmakarakandhatrayopadeśo yadarthamuktaḥ, sa tāvanmokṣo 'sti /
na ca abaddhasya puṃso mokṣaḥ 		zhes bya ba la sogs pas sbyar bar bya'o /
'dir smras pa /
gal te khyod kyis 'ching ba bkag mod kyi /
de lta na yang de bzhin gshegs pa thugs rje chen po mnga' ba rnams kyis sems can 'khor ba'i btson rar bsdams pa skyob pa med pa rnams la tshul khrims dang ting nge 'dzin dang shes rab kyi bdag nyid can phung po gsum nye bar bstan pa gang gi don du gsungs pa /
tasmād bandho 'pyastīti /
ucyate 		thar pa de ni re zhig yod pa yin la /
syādbandhayadi mokṣa eva syāt ma bcings pa la ni thar pa med de /
ihāyaṃ mokṣaḥ parikalpyamānaḥ baddhasya vā parikalpyeta abaddhasya vā? kicātaḥ? ubhayathā ca na yujyata ityāha /
baddho na mucyate tāvadabaddho naiva mucyate /
syātāṃ baddhe mucyamāne yugapadbandhamokṣaṇe /
tatra baddhasya mokṣo na saṃbhavati baddhatvāt /
atha baddhasya paścādupāyena mokṣa iti kṛtvā baddha eva mucyate iti syāt, na tarhi baddho mucyata iti vaktavyam, kiṃ tarhi mokṣyata iti /
vartamānasāmīpyādeva mucyata iti cet, yadi kadācidapi mokṣaḥ saṃbhavet, tadā samīpe syāt yadā tu kasyāṃcidapyavasthāyāṃ mokṣe iṣyamāṇe baddhasya mokṣāsaṃbhavena mokṣābhāvaḥ pratipipādayiṣita tadā kuto vartamānasamīpatā? evaṃ tāvad baddho na mucyate iti sthitam /
idānīmabaddho 'pi na mucyate /
sa hi mukta eva /
tasya punarapi mokṣaḥ kiṃ kuryāt /
muktānāṃ cārhatāṃ punarapi mokṣāpekṣatvād baddhataiva syāt, tataścārhato 'pi bandhaḥ syāt /
atha syāt /
abaddhasya mokṣāsaṃbhavād baddha eva mucyate iti, evaṃ sati baddhe mucyamāne parikalpyamāne baddhatvānmucyamānatvācca yaugapadyena bandhamokṣaṇe syātām /
na ca parasparaviruddhatvādālokāndhakāravadekasmin kāle bandhamokṣaṇe upapadyete /
yataścaivaṃ baddhābaddhayormokṣāsaṃbhava, tasmānmokṣo 'pi nāsti, tadabhāvācca bandhanamapi nāstīti siddham /
atrāha /
yadi bhavataiva saṃsāranirvāṇe niṣiddhe, bandhamokṣau ca pratiṣiddhau, ya eṣa saṃsāravinirmumukṣūṇāmavidyāsāndrāndhakāravividhakudarśanakaṭhinātidīrghalatāsaṃchāditasatpathaṃ jātyādivividhā paryantavyasanāniṣṭataravipulavipākaphaladānuśayaviṣavṛkṣasaṃkulaṃ viṃśatiśikharasamunnatatarātipṛthusatkāyadṛṣṭimahāśailapariveṣṭitasarvadiṅmukhaṃ viṣayasukhāśātipicchilavipulamahātaṭavivaravāhitṛṣṇānadīmahāparikhaṃ saṃsāramahāṭavīkāntāraṃ nistitīrṣūṇāṃ paramāśvāsakaraḥ kuśalo mahādharmacchandaḥ, kadā nu khalvahamanupādāno nirvāsyāmi, kadā nu me nirvāṇaṃ bhaviṣyatīti, nanu sa vyarthaka eva saṃjāyate, yaścāpyevamutpāditakuśalāmalavipuladharmacchandānāṃ kalyāṇamitrasaṃsevādānaśīlaśrutacintābhāvanādikramo nirvāṇaprāptaye, nanu tamyāpi vaiyarthyaṃ syāditi ucyate /
yo hyevaṃ niḥsvabhāveṣu sarvabhāveṣu pratibimbamarīcikājalālātacakrasvapnamāyendrajālasadṛśeṣu ātmātmīyasvabhāvarahiteṣu viparyāsamātrānugamāt tāmeva satkāyadṛṣṭim ahaṃ mametyahaṃkāramamakārasamudācāraparigraheṇotpādya manyate /
nirvāsyāmyanupādāno nirvāṇaṃ me bhaviṣyati /
iti yeṣāṃ grahasteṣāmupādānamahāgrahaḥ /
ahamanupādānaḥ sarvopādānarahito nirvāsyāmi, mama caivaṃ pratipannasya nirvāṇaṃ bhaviṣyatīti, evaṃ yeṣāṃ mumukṣūṇāṃ grāho bhavati, nanu tadeva ahaṃkāramamakārākhyaṃ satkāyadṛṣṭayupādānameṣāṃ mahāgraho bhavati, na caivaṃvidhamahāgrahābhiniviṣṭānāṃ śāntiḥ saṃbhāvyate /
niravaśeṣagrahaprahāṇenaiva mokṣāvāptaye yāvadahaṃmameti grāhābhiniveśaḥ, yāvacca nirvāṇaṃ nāma astīti grāhābhiniveśaḥ, yāvacca upādānatyāgābhiniveśaḥ, tāvanniyatameva anupāyena nirvāṇaṃ prārthayatāṃ sarva evārambhā vyarthā bhavanti /
tasmānmumukṣuṇā sarvametat parityājyam /
yathoktaṃ bhagavatā āryadhyāyitamuṣṭisūtre /
atha khalu bhagavān mañjuśriyaṃ kumārabhūtametadavocat /
caturṇāmāryasatyānāṃ yathābhūtārthādarśanāccaturbhirviparyāsairviparyastacittāḥ satvāḥ evamimamabhūtaṃ saṃsāraṃ nātikrāmanti /
evamukte mañjuśrīḥ kumārabhūto bhagavantametadavocat /
deśayatu bhagavān kasyopalambhataḥ sattvāḥ saṃsāraṃ nātikrāmanti /
bhagavānāha /
ātmātmīyopalambhānmañjuśrīḥ sattvāḥ saṃsāraṃ nātikrāmanti /
tat kasya hetoḥ? yo hi mañjuśrīrātmānaṃ paraṃ ca samanupaśyati, tasya karmābhisaṃskārā bhavanti /
bālo mañjuśrīraśrutavān pṛthagjanaḥ atyantāparinirvṛtān sarvadharmānaprajānānaḥ ātmānaṃ paraṃ ca upalabhate /
upalabhya abhiniviśate /
abhiniviṣṭaḥ san rajyate duṣyate muhyate /
sa rakto duṣṭo mūḍhaḥ san trividhaṃ karma abhisaṃskaroti kāyena vācā manasā /
saḥ asatsamāropeṇa vikalpayati /
ahaṃ raktaḥ, ahaṃ dviṣṭaḥ, ahaṃ mūḍhaḥ iti /
tasya tathāgataśāsane pravrajitasya evaṃ bhavati /
ahaṃ śīlavān, ahaṃ brahmacārīti /
ahaṃ saṃsāraṃ samatikramiṣyāmi /
ahaṃ nirvāṇamanuprāpsyāmi /
ahaṃ duḥkhebhyo mokṣyāmi /
sa vikalpayati /
ime kuśalā dharmāḥ, ime 'kuśalā dharmāḥ, ime dharmāḥ prahātavyāḥ, ime dharmāḥ sākṣātkartavyāḥ, duḥkhaṃ parijñātavyam, samudayaḥ prahātavyaḥ, nirodhaḥ sākṣātkartavyaḥ, mārgo bhāvayitavyaḥ /
sa vikalpayati /
anityāḥ sarvasaṃskārāḥ, ādīptāḥ sarvasaṃskārāḥ, yannvahaṃ sarvasaṃskārebhyaḥ palāyeyam /
tasya evamavekṣamāṇasya utpadyate nirvitsahagato manasikāraḥ animittapurogataḥ /
tasyaivaṃ bhavati /
eṣā sā duḥkhaparijñā /
yeyameṣāṃ dharmāṇāṃ parijñā /
tasyaivaṃ bhavati /
yannvahaṃ samudayaṃ prajaheyam /
sa ebhyo dharmebhya ārtīyate jehrīyate vitarati vijugupsate uttrasyati saṃtrasyati saṃtrāsamāpadyate /
tasyaivaṃ bhavati /
iyameṣāṃ dharmāṇāṃ sākṣātkriyā /
idaṃ samudayaprahāṇaṃ yadidamebhyo dharmebhyo 'rtīyanā vijugupsanā /
tasyaiva bhavati /
nirodhaḥ sākṣātkartavyaḥ /
samudayaṃ kalpayitvā nirodhe saṃjānāti /
tasyaivaṃ bhavati /
eṣā sā nirodhasākṣātkriyā /
tasyaivaṃ bhavati /
yannūnamahaṃ mārgaṃ bhāvayeyam /
sa eko rahogataḥ tān dharmān manasi kurvan śamathaṃ pratilabhate /
tasya tena nirvitsahagatena manasikāreṇa śamatha utpadyate /
tasya sarvadharmeṣu cittaṃ pratilīyate prativahati pratyudāvartate, tebhyaścārtīyate jehrīyate, anabhinandanācittamutpadyate /
tasyaivaṃ bhavati /
mukto 'smi sarvaduḥkhebhyaḥ /
na mama bhūya uttariṃ kiṃcitkaraṇīyam /
arhannasmi /
ityātmānaṃ saṃjānāti /
samaraṇakālasamaye utpattimātmanaḥ samanupaśyati /
tasya kāṅkṣā ca vicikitsā ca bhavati buddhabodhau /
sa vicikitsāpatitaḥ kālagato mahānirayeṣu prapatati /
tatkasya hetoḥ? yathāpīdamanutpannān sarvadharmān vikalpayitvā tathāgate vicikitsāṃ vimatiṃ cotpādayati /
atha khalu mañjuśrīḥ kumārabhūto bhagavantametadavocat /
kathaṃ punarbhagavaṃścatvāri āryasatyāni draṣṭavyāni? bhagavānāha /
yena mañjuśrīranutpannāḥ sarvasaṃskārā dṛṣṭāḥ, tena duḥkhaṃ parijñātam /
yena asamutthitāḥ sarvadharmā dṛṣṭāḥ, tasya samudayaḥ prahīṇaḥ /
yena atyantaparinirvṛtāḥ sarvadharmā dṛṣṭāḥ, tena nirodhaḥ sākṣātkṛtaḥ /
yena atyantaśūnyāḥ sarvadharmā dṛṣṭāḥ, tena mārgo bhāvitaḥ /
yena mañjuśrīrevaṃ catvāri āryasatyāni dṛṣṭāni, sa na kalpayati na vikalpayati /
ime kuśalā dharmāḥ, ime 'kuśalā dharmāḥ /
ime dharmāḥ prahātavyāḥ, ime dharmāḥ sākṣātkartavyāḥ /
duḥkhaṃ parijñātavyam /
samudayaḥ prahātavyaḥ, nirodhaḥ sākṣātkartavyaḥ, mārgo bhāvayitavya iti /
tatkasya heto? tathāhi sa taṃ dharmaṃ na samanupaśyati yaṃ parikalpayet /
bālapṛthagjanāstu etān dharmān kalpayanto rajyanti ca dviṣanti ca muhyanti ca /
sa na kaṃciddharmamāvyūhati nirvyūhati /
tasya evamanāvyūhato 'nirvyūhataḥ traidhātuke citta na sajjati, ajāta sarvatraidhātukaṃ samanupaśyati /
iti vistaraḥ /
ata eva asmādāgamāt paramārthasatya ucyate /
na nirvāṇasamāropo na saṃsārāpakarṣaṇam /
yatra kastatra saṃsāro nirvāṇaṃ kiṃ vikalpyate /
yatra hi nāma paramārthasatye naivaṃ na nirvāṇasamāropaḥ na nirvāṇādhyāropaḥ saṃbhavati, anupalabhyamānatvāt, nāpi saṃsārāpakarṣaṇaṃ saṃsāraparikṣayo na saṃbhavati, kastatra saṃsāraḥ yo vikalpyate kṣayārtham, kiṃ vā tatra nirvāṇaṃ yatprāpyarthaṃ vikalpyate? athavā /
yatra nirvāṇe kasyacit sattvasya saṃsārādapakarṣaṇamapanayanaṃ nirvāṇe ca samāropaṇaṃ prayatnavatāpi na śakyate kartuṃ saṃsāranirvāṇayorapyanupalabhyamānatvāt, tatra kiṃ nirvāṇaṃ vikalpyate? naiva hi kiṃcidvikalpayituṃ yuktam /
avikalpayataśca niyataṃ yathoditasaṃsārāṭavīkāntārātikramo nirvāṇapuraprāptiśca bhaviṣyatīti /
ata evoktamāryamāradamanasūtre /
atha mañjuśrīḥ kumārabhūtaḥ tasyāṃ velāyāṃ tathārūpaṃ samanvāhāraṃ samanvāharati sma, yanmāraḥ pāpīyānindrakīlabandhanabaddho dharaṇītalaprapatitaḥ utkrośati sma /
gāḍhabandhanabaddho 'smi /
mañjuśrīrāha /
asti pāpīyannetasmādbandhanādgāḍhataraṃ bandhanaṃ yena tvaṃ nityabaddho na punarbadhyase? tatpunaḥ katamat? yadidamasmimānaviparyāsabandhanaṃ tṛṣṇādṛṣṭibandhanam, idaṃ pāpīyan bandhanam /
ato bandhanād gāḍhataraṃ bandhanaṃ na saṃvidyate /
tena tvaṃ nityabaddho na punarbadhyase /
peyālam /
āha /
kiṃ tvaṃ pāpīyannāttamanā bhūyāḥ yadi mucyethāḥ /
āha /
āttamanā bhaveyam, paramāttamanā bhaveyam /
atha khalu suyāmo devaputro mañjuśriyaṃ kumārabhūtametadavocat /
utsṛja mañjuśrīrmāraṃ pāpīyāṃsam /
gacchatu svabhavanam /
atha khalu mañjuśrīḥ kumārabhūto māraṃ pāpīyāṃsametadavocat /
kenāsi pāpīyan baddho yadātmānamutsṛjasi? āha /
na jāne mañjuśrīḥ /
kenāsmi baddhaḥ iti /
āha /
yathā tvaṃ pāpīyan abaddho baddhasaṃjñī, evameva sarvabālapṛthagjanā anitye nityasaṃjñinaḥ, duḥkhe 'duḥkha saṃjñinaḥ, aśubhe śubhasaṃjñinaḥ, anātmani ātmasaṃjñinaḥ, arūpe rūpasaṃjñinaḥ, avedanāyāṃ vedanāsaṃjñinaḥ, asaṃjñāyāṃ saṃjñāsaṃjñinaḥ, asaṃskāre saṃskārasaṃjñinaḥ, avijñāne vijñānasaṃjñinaḥ /
api tu khalu punaḥ pāpīyan, yastvaṃ mokṣyase, kuto mokṣyase? āha /
nāhaṃ jāne kutaścinmokṣye /
āha /
evameva pāpīyan ye 'pi mokṣyante, nate kutaścidvimokṣyante, anyatra yā asau asadbhūtasaṃjñā /
tāṃ parijānanti, tāṃ parijñāya vimuktā ityucyante /
iti /
ata eva āgamād asadviparyāsakalpanāmātralatābandhanavicchedo vimokṣo nirvāṇamityucyate svapnopalabdhadahanajvālānirvāpaṇavat tadanilasalilairiti /
ityācāryacandrakīrtipādoparacitāyāṃ prasannapadāyāṃ madhyamakavṛttau bandhamokṣaparīkṣā nāma ṣoḍaśamaṃ prakaraṇam /
karmaphalaparīkṣā saptadaśamaṃ prakaraṇam /
atrāha /
vidyata eva saṃsāraḥ, karmaphalasaṃbandhāśrayatvāt /
yadi iha saṃtānāvicchedakrameṇa janmamaraṇaparaṃparayā hetuphalabhāvapravṛttyā saṃskārāṇāmātmano vā saṃsaraṇaṃ syāt, syāttadānīṃ karmaphalasaṃbandhaḥ /
yathāvarṇite saṃsārābhāve tu utpattyanantaravināśitvāccittasya karmākṣepakāle ca vipākasyāsadbhāvāt karmaphalasaṃbandhābhāva eva syāt /
saṃsārasadbhāve tu sati iha kṛtasya karmaṇe janmāntare 'pi vipākaphalasaṃbandhāt karmaṇāṃ phalasaṃbandho na virodhito bhavati /
tasmādvidyata eva saṃsāraḥ karmaphalasaṃbandhāśrayatvāditi /
kāni punastāni karmāṇi kiṃ vā tatphalamiti tatprabheda vivakṣayedamucyate /
ātmasaṃyamakaṃ cetaḥ parānugrāhakaṃ ca yat /
maitraṃ sa dharmastadbījaṃ phalasya pretya ceha ca /
tatra āhitaḥ utpāditaḥ ahaṃmāno 'sminnityātmā /
skandhānupādāya prajñapyamānaḥ pudgalaātmetyucyate /
cinoti upacinoti śubhamaśubhaṃ karma vipākadānasāmarthye niyamayatīti cetaḥ /
cittaṃ manaḥ vijñānamiti tasyaiva paryāyāḥ /
ātmānaṃ saṃyamayati viṣayeṣvasvatantrayati rāgādikleśavaśena pravṛttiṃ nivārayatītyātmasaṃyamakam /
tadetadātmasaṃyamakaṃ kuśalaṃ cetaḥ prāṇātipātādiṣu pravṛttividhārakaṃ durgatigamanāddhārayatīti dharma ityucyate /
dharmaśabdo 'yaṃ pravacane tridhā vyavasthāpitaḥ 		de'i phyir bcings pa yang yod do /
brjod par bya ste /
gal te thar pa nyid yod na bcing ba yod par gyur na /
yod pa ni ma yin te /
'dir thar pa 'di rtog pa na /
bcings pa'am ma bcings pa zhig la rtog pa zhig go /
de las cir 'gyur zhe na /
gnyi ga ltar yang mi rigs so zhes bshad pa /
re zhig bcings pa mi grol te /
ma bcings pa yang grol mi 'gyur /
bcings pa grol bzhin yin 'gyur na /
bcings dang grol ba dus gcig 'gyur /
de la bcings pa la ni thar pa yod pa ma yin te bcings pa'i phyir ro /
ci ste bcings par gyur pa phyis thabs kyis thar par 'gyur ba'i phyir bcings pa nyid grol bar 'gyur ro zhe na /
'o na ni bcings pa grol lo zhes bya bar brjod par mi bya ste /
'o na ci zhe na /
'gro ba grol bar 'gyur ro zhes bya bar 'gyur ro /
gal te da ltar ba dang nye bas de skad du brjod do zhe na /
gal te res 'ga' zhig na thar pa yod na ni de'i tshe de dang nye bar yod par 'gyur na /
gang gi tshe gnas skabs gang rung du yang thar 'dod pa na bcings pa la thar pa mi srid pas thar pa med par ston par 'dod pa de'i tshe da ltar ba dang nye ba nyid ga la yod /
de ltar na re zhig bcings pa mi grol lo zhes bya bar gnas so /
da ni ma bcings pa yang grol bar mi 'gyur te /
de ni grol ba nyid yin na de la yang thar pas ci zhig byed par 'gyur /
yang thar pa la ltos pa'i phyir dgra bcom pa grol bar gyur pa rnams la yang 'ching pa nyid yod par 'gyur te /
de'i phyir dgra bcom pa yang bcings par 'gyur ro /
de'i phyir ma bcings pa yang mi grol lo /
ci ste ma bcings pa la thar pa mi srid pa'i phyir bcings pa nyid grol bar 'gyur ro snyam na /
de lta yin na bcings pa la grol bzhin par rtog pa na /
bcings pa yin pa'i phyir dang grol bzhin pa yin pa'i phyir bcings pa dang grol ba dag dus gcig tu 'gyur na /
dus gcig tu bcings pa dang grol ba dag 'thad pa yang ma yin te /
phan tshun 'gal pa'i phyir snang ba dang mun pa bzhin no /
de'i phyir de ltar bcings pa dang ma bcings pa dag la thar pa yod pa ma yin no /
de'i phyir thar pa yang med la /
de med pa'i phyir bcings pa yang med do zhes bya bar grub bo /
'dir gal te de ltar khyod kyis 'khor ba dang mya ngan las 'das pa dag bkag cing /
bcings pa dang thar pa dag kyang bkag pas /
'khor ba'i 'brog dgon pa chen po ma rig pa'i mun pa mthug po can lta ba ngan pa sna tshogs pa'i 'khri shing shin tu sra bas lam dam par bkag pa /
phra rgyas kyi dug gi ljon shing rnam par smin pa'i 'bras bu skye ba la sogs pa'i sdug bsngal /
mtha' yas pa sna tshogs pa shin tu yid du mi 'ong ba rgya cher ster bas dkrigs pa 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i ri chen po rtse mo nyi shus ches mtho ba /
te bor brling bas phyogs kyi ngos kun nas bskor ba /
sred pa'i chu klung gi 'obs chen po /
yul gyi bde ba la re ba'i dogs shin tu 'dred cing yangs pa dang ldan pa rgyun mi 'chad par 'bab pas bskor ba las brgal bar 'dod pa /
thar pa 'dod pa rnams mchog tu dbugs 'byin par byed pa dge ba'i chos la 'dun pa chen po bdag na ma len pa med par mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gyur /
mya ngan las 'das pa bdag gir nam zhig na 'gyur snyam pa gang yin pa de don med pa kho nar 'gyur zhing de ltar dge ba'i chos la 'dun pa bskyed pa rnams kyi dge ba'i bshes gnyen bsten pa dang sbyin pa dang tshul khrims dang thos pa dang bsam pa dang bsgom pa la sogs pa'i rim pa mya ngan las 'das pa 'thob pa'i dgos pa can gang yin pa de yang don med par 'gyur ro zhes 'dzer to /
brjod par bya ste /
gang zhig de ltar dngos po thams cad rang bzhin med de /
gzugs brnyan dang smig rgyu'i chu dang mgal me'i 'khor lo dang rmi lam dang sgyu ma dang mig 'phrul dang mtshungs shing /
bdag dang bdag gi ba dang bral bzhin du /
phyin ci log gi rjes su song ba'i phyir nga dang nga'i zhes bdag tu 'dzin pa dang bdag gir 'dzin pa kun du spyod pa yongs su 'dzin pas /
'jig tshogs la lta ba de nyid bskyod nas /
bdag ni len med mya ngan 'da' /
myang 'das bdag gir 'gyur ro zhes /
rlom par byed de /
de ltar gang dag 'dzin de yi /
nyer len 'dzin pa chen po yin /
bdag ni nye bar len pa med cing len pa dang bral bar mya ngan las 'da'o /
mya ngan las 'das pa ni de ltar zhugs par gyur pa bdag gi yin par 'gyur ro zhes de ltar thar pa 'dod pa gang dag 'dzin par 'gyur ba de dag la ni bdag tu 'dzin pa dang bdag gir 'dzin pa zhes bya ba'i 'jig tshogs la lta ba nye bar len pa de nyid 'dzin pa chen po yin la /
rnam pa de lta bu'i 'dzin pa chen po mngon par zhen pa rnams la ni zhi ba yod pa ma yin te /
'dzin pa ma lus pa spangs pa kho nas thar pa 'thob pa'i phyir ro /
ji srid du bdag dang bdag gi'o snyam du 'dzin par mthong bar zhen pa dang ji srid mya ngan las 'das pa zhes bya ba yod do zhes mngon par zhen pa dang ji srid nye bar len pa btang ba la sogs par mngon par zhen pa de srid du ni thabs ma yin pas mya ngan las 'das pa don du gnyer ba rnams kyi rtsom pa thams cad nges par don med par 'gyur ro /
de'i phyir thar pa 'dod pas 'di dag thams cad yongs su gtang bar bya'o /
gang gi phyir rnam pa thams cad du don dam pa /
gang la mya ngan 'das bskyed med /
'khor ba bsal ba'ang yod min pa /
zhes bya ba /
de la 'khor ba ci zhig yin /
mya ngan 'das pa 'ang ci zhig brtag /
don dam pa'i bden pa gang la ma dmigs pas mya ngan las 'das pa bskyed pa ste /
mya ngan las 'das par sgro btags pa med cing /
'khor ba bsal ba ste /
'khor ba yongs su zad pa yang yod pa ma yin pa de la gang zhig zad par bya ba'i phyir brtags pa 'khor ba ci zhig yin la /
gang thob par bya ba'i phyir brtags pa mya ngan las 'das pa de yang gang zhig yin /
yang na 'khor ba dang mya ngan las 'das pa gnyi ga yang ma dmigs pa'i phyir sems can 'ga' yang mya ngan las 'das pa gang du 'khor ba nas bsal ba ste bkri ba dang mya ngan las 'das pa bskyed par 'bad pa dang ldan pas kyang bya bar mi nus pa de la mya ngan las 'das pa'ang ci zhig brtag ste /
cung zad kyang brtag pa mi rigs so /
mi rtog pa ni nges par ji skad smras pa'i 'khor ba'i 'brog dgon pa las 'da' zhing /
mya ngan las 'das pa'i grong khyer du yang phyin par 'gyur ro /
de nyid kyi phyir 'phags pa bdud btul ba'i mdo las /
de nas de'i tshe 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas ji ltar bdud sdig can sgo mo'i them pa'i 'ching bas bcings pa ltar sa steng du 'gyel nas /
nga ni 'ching pa dam pos bcings so /
nga ni 'ching ba dam pos bcings so zhes du zhing cho nges 'debs par gyur pa de lta bu'i gzugs su bsams so /
'jam dpal gyis smras pa /
sdig can gang gis khyod rtag tu bcings shing gzod bcings pa ma yin pa 'ching ba ches dam pa /
'ching ba 'di las gzhan pa zhig yod de /
de yang gang zhe na /
'di lta ste /
nga rgyal phyin ci log gi 'ching ba dang srid pa dang lta ba'i 'ching ba ste /
sdig can 'di ni 'ching ba yin gyi /
'ching ba 'di las gzhan ba 'ching ba ches dam por gyur ba ni yod pa ma yin no /
khyod ni des rtag tu bcings pa yin gyis gzod bcings pa ni ma yin no /
gzhan yang sdig can mi khyod gal te slar bkrol na dga' bar 'gyur ram /
smras pa dga' bar 'gyur ro /
de nas lha'i bu rab 'thab bral pa zhig gis /
'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces smras so /
'jam dpal bdud sdig can thong shig rang gi gnas su dong la rag go /
de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas bdud sdig to can la 'di skad ces smras so /
sdig can gang zhig btang ba khyod sus bcings /
smras pa /
'jam dpal bdag sus bcings pa mi shes so /
smras pa /
sdig can ji ltar khyod ma bcings pa las bcings par 'du shes pa de bzhin du byis pa so so'i skye bo thams cad mi rtag pa la rtag par 'du shes pa /
sdug bsngal ba la bde bar 'du shes pa /
bdag med pa la bdag tu 'du shes pa /
mi gtsang pa la gcang bar 'du shes pa /
gzugs med pa la gzugs su 'du shes pa /
tshor ba dag med pa dang 'du shes dag med pa dang 'du byed dag med pa dang rnam par shes pa med pa la /
tshor ba dang 'du shes dang 'du byed dang rnam par shes par 'du shes pa yin no /
gzhan yang sdig can gang khyod grol bar 'gyur na gang las grol bar 'gyur /
smras pa /
bdag ni gang las kyang grol bar mi 'gyur ro /
smras pa /
sdig can de bzhin du gang dag grol bar 'gyur ba de dag kyang /
yang dag pa ma yin pa'i 'du shes gang yin pa de yongs su shes pa ma gtogs par gang las kyang grol bar 'gyur ba med de /
de yongs su shes nas grol ba zhes bya'o zhes gsungs te /
lung 'di las na yang dag pa ma yin pa'i phyin ci log tu rtog pa tsam gyis 'ching ba'i 'khri shing rnam par chad pa la thar pa mya ngan las 'das pa zhes bya ste /
rmi lam du dmigs pa'i me 'bar ba chu dag gis bsad pa bzhin no /
slob dpon zla ba grags pa'i zhal snga nas sbyar ba'i tshig gsal ba las /
bcings pa dang thar pa brtag pa zhes bya ba rab tu byed pa bcu drug pa'i 'grel pa'o /
'dir smras pa /
'khor ba ni yod pa nyid de /
las dang 'bras bu 'brel pa'i rten yin pa'i phyir ro /
'di ltar gal te rgyun rnam par chad pa med pa'i rim pas skye ba dang 'chi ba gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa nyid kyis rgyu dang 'bras bu'i dngos po 'jug pas 'du byed rnams sam bdag 'khor bar gyur na ni /
de'i tshe las dang 'bras bu 'brel bar 'gyur na /
ji skad smras pa'i 'khor ba med na ni /
sems ni skyes ma thag tu 'jig pa'i phyir dang las 'phen pa'i dus na rnam par smin pa med pa'i phyir las dang 'bras bu'i 'brel ba med pa kho nar 'gyur ro /
'khor ba yod na ni 'dir byas pa'i las tshe rabs gzhan du yang rnam par smin pa'i 'bras bu dang 'brel pa'i phyir las rnams 'bras bu dang 'brel ba mi 'gal bar 'gyur ro /
de'i phyir las dang 'bras bu 'brel pa'i rten yin pa'i phyir 'khor ba yod pa nyid do /
las de dag kyang gang yin zhing /
de'i 'bras bu yang gang zhig yin zhe na /
de dag gi rab tu dbye ba brjod par 'dod pas 'di skad du brjod do /
bdag nyid legs par sdom pa dang /
gzhan la phan 'dogs byams sems gang /
de chos de ni 'di gzhan du /
'bras bu dag gi sa bon yin /
de la bdag tu nga rgyal ba 'di la gzhag cing bskyed pas bdag nyid do /
phung po la brten nas gdags pa'i gang zag la bdag ces bya'o /
bdag nyid yang dag par sdom zhing /
yul dag la rang dbang med par byed cing 'dod chags la sogs pa'i dbang gis 'jug pa zlog par byed pas na bdag nyid legs par sdom pa'o /
sog cing nye bar sogs la dge ba dang mi dge ba'i las rnam par smin pa 'byin par nus pa la nges par byed pas na sems te /
sems dang yid dang rnam par shes pa zhes bya ba ni de nyid kyi rnam grangs dag go /
de'i phyir bdag nyid legs par sdom pa srog gcod pa la sogs pa la 'jug pa las bzlog pa dge ba'i sems de ni ngan 'gror 'gro ba las 'dzin par byed pas na chos zhes bya'o /
chos kyi sgra 'di ni gsung rab las gsum du rnam par gzhag ste /
svalakṣaṇadhāraṇārthena kugatigamanavidhāraṇārthena pāñcagatikasaṃsāravidhāraṇārthena rang gi mtshan nyid 'dzin pa'i don dang /
'gro ba ngan par 'gro ba las 'dzin pa'i don dang 'gro ba lnga'i 'khor bar 'gro ba las 'dzin pa'i don gyis so /
tatra svalakṣaṇadhāraṇārthena sarve sāsravā anāsravāśca dharmā ityucyante de la zag pa dang bcas pa dang zag pa med pa thams cad ni rang gi mtshan nyid 'dzin pa'i don gyis na chos zhes bya'o /
kugatigamanavidhāraṇārthena daśakuśalādayo dharmā ityucyante /
dharmacārī sukhaṃ śete asmiṃlloke paratra ca /
pāñcagatikasaṃsāragamanavidhāraṇārthena nirvāṇe dharma ityucyate, dharmaṃ śaraṇaṃ gacchatītyatra /
iha tu kugatigamanavidhāraṇārthenaiva dharmaśabdo 'bhipretaḥ 		dge ba bcu la sogs pa'i chos rnams ni /
'jig rten 'di dang pha rol du /
chos spyod pa ni bde bar nyal /
zhes bya ba der 'gro ba ngan par 'gro ba las 'dzin pa'i don gyis na chos zhes bsnyad do /
chos la skyabs su mchi'o zhes bya ba der ni 'gro ba lnga'i 'khor bar 'gro ba las 'dzin pa'i don gyis na mya ngan las 'das pa la chos zhes brjod do /
'dir ni 'gro ba ngan par 'gro ba las 'dzin pa'i don nyid kyis chos kyi sgrar bzhed do /
kiṃ punarātmasaṃyamakamevaikaṃ cetaḥ dharma iti? netyāha yang ci bdag nyid legs par sdom pa'i sems gcig pu zhig chos yin nam zhe na /
smras pa /
ma yin te /
kiṃ tarhi parānugrāhakaṃ ca maitraṃ ca yaccetaḥ, asāvapi dharmaḥ 'o na ci zhe na /
gzhan la phan 'dogs pa dang byams pa'i sems gang yin pa de yang chos yin no /
maitramityatra caśabdo luptanirdiṣṭo veditavyaḥ /
tatra paramanugṛhṇātīti parānugrāhakaṃ cetaḥ, catuḥsaṃgrahavastupravṛttaṃ bhayaparitrāṇapravṛttaṃ ca yaccetaḥ, asāvapi dharmaḥ 		gzhan la phan 'dogs byams sems zhes bya ba 'dir rang gi sgra zhig mi mngon par byas shing bstan par rig par bya'o /
de la gzhan rjes su 'dzin par byed pas na gzhan la phan 'dogs pa'i sems te /
bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhi la zhugs pa dang 'jigs pa las skyob pa la sogs pa la zhugs pa'i sems gang yin pa de yang chos yin no /
mitre bhavamaviruddhaṃ sattveṣu yaccetaḥ, tanmaitraṃ cetaḥ 'dza' bshes las 'byung zhing sems can rnams dang 'gal ba med pa'i sems gang yin pa de ni byams pa'i sems so /
maitraṃ yaccetaḥ, tanmaitracetaḥ, maitramevaṃ vā /
yaccaitat trividhaṃ ceto nirdiṣṭam, sa dharma ityucyate 		yang na byams pa ni gnyen bshes nyid yin te /
bdag la phan 'dogs pa'i sems gang yin pa de nyid byams pa'i sems yin no /
gang zhig sems rnam pa gsum bstan pa de ni chos zhes bya ste /
viparyayādadharmo yojyaḥ bzlog pa ni chos ma yin par sbyar bar bya'o /
yaccaitannirdiṣṭaprabhedaṃ cetaḥ, tadbījaṃ phalasya de ltar rab tu dbye ba bstan pa'i sems gang yin pa de ni 'bras bu dag gi sa bon yin no /
asādhāraṇaṃ phalābhinirvṛttau yatkāraṇam, tadeva bījamityucyate rgyu gang zhig 'bras bu 'grub pa la thun mong ma yin pa de la ni sa bon zhes bya ste /
tadyathā śālyaṅkurasya śālibījam dper na s'a lu'i sa bon ni s'a lu'i myu gu'i rgyu yin pa lta bu'o /
yattu sādhāraṇaṃ kṣityādi na tadbījaṃ kāraṇametat /
yathaitadevam, ihāpi iṣṭasya vipākasyābhinirvṛttau trividhaṃ ceto bhavati bījam 		sa la sogs pa thun mong pa gang yin pa de ni sa bon ma yin gyi /
de ni rgyu nyid yin par zad do /
de ji ltar yin pa de bzhin du 'dir yang rnam par smin pa yid du 'ong ba mngon par 'grub pa la sems rnam pa gsum sa bon yin te /
skyes bu'i byed pa la sogs pa rnams ni rgyu tsam du zad do /
puruṣakārādayastu kāraṇameva /
kasmin punaḥ kāle bījasya phalaniṣpattirityāha 		yang dus gang gi tshe sa bon 'bras bu'i sgrub par byed pa yin zhe na /
'di gzhan du 'bras bu dag gi zhes bya ba gsungs te /
pretya ceha ca /
pretyeti adṛṣṭe janmani, iheti dṛṣṭe janmanītyarthaḥ 		'di zhes bya ba ni mthong ba'i skye ba la yin la /
gzhan du zhes bya ba ni ma mthong ba'i skye ba la'o zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go /
etacca āgamādvistareṇa boddhavyam /
evaṃ tāvat cittātmakamevaikaṃ dharmaṃ vyavasthāpya punarapi dvividhaṃ bhagavatā 		'di yang lung las rgyus par khong du chud par bya'o /
de ltar re zhig sems kyi bdag nyid can gyi chos gcig nyid rnam par gzhag nas slar yang bcom ldan 'das /
cetanā cetayitvā ca karmoktaṃ paramarṣiṇā /
paramārthadarśanādṛṣiḥ /
paramaścāsau ṛṣiśceti paramarṣiḥ sarvākāratayā paramārthagamanāt śrāvakapratyekabuddhabhyo 'pi utkṛṣṭatvāt paramarṣiḥ saṃbuddho bhagavān /
tena paramarṣiṇā cetanā karma, cetayitvā ca karmetyuktaṃ sūtre 		drang srong mchog gi las rnams ni /
sems pa dang ni bsams par nye rnam pa gnyis su gsungs so /
don dam pa thugs su chud pas na drang srong ngo /
drang srong yang yin la mchog kyang yin pas na drang srong mchog go /
don dam pa rnam pa thams cad du thugs su chud pa'i phyir la /
nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dag las kyang mchog tu byung ba yin pa'i phyir na drang srong mchog ste sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das so /
drang srong mchog des mdo las /
sems pa'i las dang bsams pa'i las so zhes gsungs so /
yaccaitad dvividhaṃ karmoktam gang zhig las rnam gnyis gsungs pa'i /
tasyānekavidho bhedaḥ karmaṇaḥ parikīrtitaḥ /
kathaṃ kṛtvā? /
tatra yaccetanetyuktaṃ karma tanmānasaṃ smṛtam 		las de dag gi bye brag ni /
rnam pa du mar yongs su bsgrags /
ji ltar zhe na /
de la las gang sems pa zhes /
gsungs pa de ni yid kyir 'dod /
cetayitvā ca yattūktaṃ tattu kāyikavācikam bsams pa zhes ni gang gsungs pa /
de ni lus dang ngag gir 'dod /
manasi bhavaṃ mānasam /
manodvāreṇaiva niṣṭhāgamanāt kāyavākpravṛttinirapekṣatvācca manovijñānasaṃprayuktaiva cetanā mānasaṃ karmetyucyate 		yid la yod pa ni yid kyi ste /
yid kyi sgo nas de mthar thug par 'gro ba'i phyir dang lus dang ngag 'jug pa la ltos pa med pa'i phyir yid kyi rnam par shes pa dang mtshungs par ldan pa'i sems pa kho na la yid kyi las zhes brjod do /
tatraśabdo nirdhāraṇe /
yattu dvitīyaṃ cetayitvā ca karmetyuktam, tatpunaḥ kāyikaṃ vācikaṃ ca veditavyam /
evaṃ ca evaṃ ca kāyavāgbhyāṃ pravartiṣye ityevaṃ cetasā saṃcintya yat kriyate, taccetayitvā karmetyucyate /
tatpunardvividham, kāyikaṃ vācikaṃ ca 		de la zhes bya ba'i sgra ni dmigs kyis bkar ba'o /
las gnyis pa bsams pa zhes gang gsungs pa de ni lus dang ngag gi yin par rig par bya ste /
lus dang ngag dag gis de lta de ltar 'jug par bya'o zhes de ltar sems kyis bsams nas gang zhig byed pa de ni bsams pa'i las zhes bya'o /
yang de ni rnam pa gnyis te /
kāyavācorbhavatvāt taddvāreṇa ca niṣṭhāgamanāt /
evaṃ ca trividham /
kāyikaṃ vācikaṃ mānasaṃ ca /
etadapi trividhaṃ karma punarbhidyamānaṃ saptavidhaṃ saṃjāyate, ityevaṃ tasya karmaṇo bhagavatā bahuprakāro bhedo 'nuvarṇitaḥ 		lus dang ngag la yod pa'i phyir dang de dag gi sgo nas mthar thug par 'gro ba'i phyir na lus kyi dang ngag gi'o /
de ltar na lus kyi dang ngag gi dang yid kyi ste /
rnam pa gsum du 'gyur ro /
las rnam pa gsum po 'di dag kyang slar phye na rnam pa bdun du 'gyur ro /
de ltar bcom ldan 'das kyis las de'i bye brag rnam pa mang por gsungs so /
kathaṃ kṛtvā? ci ltar zhe na /
vāgviṣpando 'viratayo yāścāvijñaptisaṃjñitāḥ ngag dang bskyod dang mi spong ba'i /
rnam rig byed min zhes bya gang /
avijñaptaya evānyāḥ smṛtā viratayastathā spong pa'i rnam rig byed min pa /
gzhan dag kyang ni de bzhin 'dod /
paribhogānvayaṃ puṇyamapuṇyaṃ ca tathāvidham longs spyod las byung bsod nams dang /
bsod nams ma yin tshul de bzhin /
cetanā ceti saptaite dharmāḥ karmāñjanāḥ smṛtāḥ /
tatra vyaktavarṇoccāraṇaṃ vāk 		sems pa dang ni chos de bdun /
