las su mngon par 'dod pa yin /
de la ngag ni yi ge gsal por brjod pa'o /
viṣpandaḥ śarīraṃceṣṭā /
tatra kuśalākuśalā vā vāk sarvaiva viratyaviratilakṣaṇā vijñaptisamutthāpikā sāmānyena vāgiti gṛhyate 		bskyod pa ni lus kyi g yo ba'o /
de la ngag ces bya bas ni dge ba dang mi dge ba'i dag rnam par rig byed ma yin pa'i spong ba dang mi spong ba'i mtshan nyid can kun nas slong bar byed pa thams cad spyir bzung ste /
evaṃ kuśalo 'kuśalo vā viratyaviratilakṣaṇo vijñaptisamutthāpako viṣpandaḥ sāmānyena gṛhyate de bzhin du dge ba dang mi dge ba'i bskyod pa rnam par rig byed ma yin pa spong ba dang mi spong ba'i mtshan nyid can kun nas slong bar byed pa yang spyir bzung ngo /
yathā caitadvijñapterdvidhā bhedaḥ, evamavijñapterapi /
aviratilakṣaṇā avijñaptayaḥ viratilakṣaṇāśceti kṛtvā /
tatra aviratilakṣaṇā avijñaptayaḥ tadyathā adyaprabhṛti mayā prāṇinaṃ hatvā cauryaṃ kṛtvā jīvikā parikalpayitavyeti pāpakarmābhyupagamātprabhṛti tadakāriṇo 'pi akuśalakarmābhyupagamahetukāḥ satatasamitamavijñaptayaḥ samupajāyante /
kaivartādīnāṃca jālādiparikarmakālātprabhṛti tadakāriṇāmapi yā avijñaptaya upajāyante, tā etā aviratilakṣaṇā avijñaptaya ityucyante 		ji ltar rnam par rig byed 'di'i dbye ba rnam pa gnyis su 'gyur ba de bzhin du /
rnam par rig byed ma yin pa'i yang yin te /
mi spong pa'i mtshan nyid can gyi rnam par rig byed ma yin pa dag dang spong pa'i mtshan nyid can gyi rnam par rig byed ma yin pa dag ces bya bar byas pa'i phyir ro /
de la mi spong ba'i mtshan nyid can gyi rnam par rig byed ma yin pa dag ni 'di lta ste /
deng nas bzung nas bdag gis sems can bsad cing chom rkun byas la 'tsho bar bya'o zhes sdig pa'i las khas blangs pa'i dus nas bzung ste /
de mi byed pa dag la yang rtag par rgyun mi 'chad par mi dge ba'i las khas blangs pa'i rgyu can gyi rnam par rig byed ma yin pa dag nye bar skye bar 'gyur ba dang rgya'i las byed pa nas bzung ste nya pa la sogs pa rnams de mi byed pa la yang rnam par rig byed ma yin pa dag nye bar skye ba gang yin pa ste /
'di dag ni mi spong ba'i mtshan nyid can zhes bya'o /
yathā caitāstathā anyāḥ viratilakṣaṇāḥ kuśalasvabhāvā avijñaptayaḥ 'di dag ji ltar yin pa de bzhin du spong ba'i mtshan nyid can gyi rnam par rig byed ma yin pa dge ba'i rang bzhin can gzhan dag kyang yin no /
tadyathā /
adyaprabhṛti prāṇātipātādibhyaḥ prativiramāmīti kāyavāgvijñaptiparisamāptikālakṣaṇātprabhṛti taduttarakālaṃ pramattādyavasthasyāpi yāḥ kuśalopacayasvabhāvā avijñaptaya upajāyante, tā etā viratilakṣaṇā avijñaptaya ityucyante 		'di lta ste /
deng nas bzung ste srog gcod pa la sogs pa dag spong ngo zhes lus dang ngag gi rnam par rig byed yongs su rdzogs pa'i dus nas bzung ste /
dus phyis myos pa la sogs pa'i gnas skabs su yang dge ba bsags pa'i rang bzhin gyi rnam par rig byed ma yin pa dag nye bar skye ba gang yin pa 'di dag ni spong ba'i mtshan nyid can gyi rnam par rig byed ma yin pa zhes bya'o /
etā rūpakriyāsvabhāvā api satyo vijñaptivat parānna vijñāpayantītyavijñaptayaḥ gzugs dang bya ba'i rang bzhin yin du zin kyang /
rnam par rig byed bzhin du gzhan la rnam par rig par mi byed pas na rnam par rig byed ma yin pa dag go /
tathā paribhogānvayaṃ puṇyam, kuśalamityarthaḥ de bzhin du longs spyod las byung ba sod nams te /
dge ba zhes bya ba'i don to /
paribhogena anvayaḥ asyeti paribhogānvayam longs spyod las byung ba 'di la yod pas na longs spyod las byung ba'o /
paribhogaḥ parityaktasya vastunaḥ saṃghādibhirupabhogaḥ longs spyod ni yongs su btang ba'i dngos po dge 'dun la sogs pa rnams kyis nye bar longs spyod ba'o /
anvayaḥ anugamaḥ /
dāyakasaṃtānajaḥ kuśalopacaya ityarthaḥ 		byung ba ni rjes su byung ba ste /
sbyin pa po'i rgyud la skyes pa'i dge ba'i 'phel bar 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i don to /
apuṇyaṃ ca tathāvidham, paribhogānvayamityarthaḥ bsod nams ma yin tshul de bzhin te /
longs spyod las byung zhes bya ba'i don to /
tadyathā devakulādipratiṣṭhāpanam, yatra sattvā hanyante ji ltar gang du srog chags dag gsod pa'i lha khang la sogs pa brtsigs pa lta bu ste /
yathā yathā hi tatkīrtau prāṇino hanyante, tathā tathā taddevakulādyupabhogāt tatkartṛṇāṃ saṃtāne paribhogānvayamapuṇyamapi jāyate, ityevamapuṇyaṃ ca tathāvidhaṃ bhavati /
cittābhisaṃskāramanaskarmalakṣaṇā cetanā ceti 		ji lta ji ltar lha khang der srog chags dag gsod pa de lta de ltar lha khang la sogs pa der longs spyad pa las byed pa po rnams kyi rgyud la longs spyad pa las byung ba'i bsod nams ma yin pa skye bar 'gyur ro /
de ltar na bsod nams ma yin pa yang tshul de bzhin du 'gyur ro /
yid kyi las kyi mtshan nyid can sems mngon par 'du byed pa sems pa zhes bya ba dang ste /
saṃkṣepeṇa etatsaptavidhaṃ karma bhavati /
kuśalākuśalā vāk, kuśalākuśalo viṣpandaḥ, kuśalamavijñaptilakṣaṇam, akuśalamavijñaptilakṣaṇam, paribhogānvayaṃ puṇyam, paribhogānvayamapuṇyam, cetanā ceti 		mdor bsdu na las rnam pa bdun po 'di dag tu 'gyur ro /
dge ba dang mi dge ba'i ngag dang bskyod pa gnyis dang dge ba rnam par rig byed ma yin pa'i mtshan nyid can dang mi dge ba rnam par rig byed ma yin pa mtshan nyid can dang longs spyod las byung ba'i bsod nams dang longs spyod las byung ba'i bsod nams ma yin pa dang sems pa zhes bya ba ste /
ete ca sapta dharmāḥ karmāñjanāḥ karmatvenābhivyaktāḥ karmalakṣaṇāḥ smṛtāḥ chos de bdun las su mngon par te las nyid du gsal zhing las kyi mtshan nyid can du 'dod pa yin no /
atraike paricodayanti 'di la kha cig rgol bar byed de /
yadetat karma bahuvidhamuktam, tat kimā vipākakālādavatiṣṭhate, atha na tiṣṭhati utpattyanantaravināśitvāt? yadi tāvat las rnam pa mang po zhig bshad pa gang yin pa de ci rnam par smin pa'i dus kyi bar du gnas pa zhig gam /
'on te skyes ma thag tu 'jig pa'i phyir /
mi gnas pa zhig yin grang /
re zhig /
tiṣṭhatyā pākakālāccetkarma tannityatāmiyāt gal te smin pa'i dus bar du /
gnas na las de rtag par 'gyur /
niruddhaṃ cenniruddhaṃ satkiṃ phalaṃ janayiṣyati gal te 'gags na 'gags gyur pa /
ji ltar 'bras bu bskyed par 'gyur /
yadi utpannaṃ sat karma āvipākakālaṃ svarūpeṇāvatiṣṭhate iti parikalpyate, tad iyantaṃ kālamasya nityatā āpadyate vināśarahitatvāt /
paścādvināśasadbhāvānna nityatvamiti cet, naitadevam, pūrvaṃ vināśarahitasya ākāśādivat paścādapi vināśena saṃbandhābhāvāt /
vināśarahitasya ca asaṃskṛtatvaprasaṅgāt, asaṃskṛtānāṃ ca vipākādarśanāt, avipākatvena sadaivāvasthānāt nityatābhyupagama eva karmaṇāmupapadyate 		gal te las 'di skyes nas rnam par smin pa'i dus kyi bar du rang gi ngo bos gnas so zhes bya bar rtog na ni /
de'i phyir de ltar na de dus 'di tsam gyi bar du rtag pa nyid du 'gyur te /
'jig pa dang bral ba'i phyir ro /
phyis 'jig par 'gyur ba'i phyir rtag pa ma yin no zhe na /
de ni de ltar ma yin te /
sngar 'jig pa dang bral ba ni nam mkha' la sogs pa ltar phyis kyang 'jig pa dang 'brel ba med pa'i phyir dang 'jig pa dang bral ba yang 'dus ma byas nyid du thal bar 'gyur ba'i phyir dang 'dus ma byas rnams la ni rnam par smin pa ma mthong ba'i phyir dang rnam par smin pa med pa nyid kyis rtag tu gnas par 'gyur ba'i phyir /
las rnams rtag pa nyid du khas blangs pa kho nar 'gyur ro /
ityevaṃ tāvannityatve doṣaḥ de ltar na re zhig rtag pa nyid kyi skyon du 'gyur ro /
atha utpādānantaravināśitvameva karmaṇāmabhyupetam, nanu evaṃ sati ci ste las rnams skyes ma thag tu 'jig pa nyid du khas len no zhe na /
de lta yin na ni /
niruddhaṃ cenniruddhaṃ sat kiṃ phalaṃ janayiṣyati gal te 'gags na 'gags gyur pa /
ji ltar 'bras bu bskyed par 'gyur /
abhāvībhūtaṃ sat karma avidyamānasvabhāvatvānnaiva phalaṃ janayiṣyatītyabhiprāyaḥ las med par gyur pa ni yod pa ma yin pa'i phyir 'bras bu skyed par mi 'gyur ro zhes bya bar bsams pa'o /
tatraike nikāyāntarīyāḥ parihāraṃ varṇayanti 'di la sde pa gzhan dag kha cig lan 'debs par byed pa ni /
utpattyanantaravināśitvātsaṃskārāṇām, anityatvadoṣastāvadasmākaṃ nopapadyate /
yaccāpyuktam 		re zhig kho bo cag la 'du byed rnams rtag pa nyid kyi nyes bar ni mi 'gyur te /
skyes ma thag tu 'jig pa'i phyir ro /
gang yang /
niruddhaṃ cenniruddhaṃ sat kiṃ phalaṃ janayiṣyati gal te 'gags na 'gags gyur pa /
ji ltar 'bras bu bskyed par 'gyur /
iti, atrāpi parihāraṃ brūmaḥ zhes smras pa de yang lan brjod par bya ste /
yo 'ṅkuraprabhṛtirbījātsaṃtāno 'bhipravartate myu gu la sogs rgyun gang ni /
sa bon las ni mngon par 'byung /
tataḥ phalamṛte bījātsa ca nābhipravartate de las 'bras bu sa bon ni /
med na de yang 'byung mi 'gyur /
iha bījaṃ kṣaṇikamapi sat svajātīyabhāviphalaviśeṣaniṣpattisāmarthyaviśeṣayuktasyaiva saṃtānasya aṅkurakāṇḍanālapatrādyabhidhānasya hetubhāvamapyupagamya nirudhyate /
yaścāyamaṅkuraprabhṛtirbījātsaṃtānaḥ pravartate, tasmāt krameṇa sahakārikāraṇavaikalye sati svalpādapi hetorvipulaphalapracaya upajāyate 		'dir sa bon ni skad cig ma nyid yin du zin kyang /
rgyun myu gu dang sdong bu dang sbubs 'chas pa dang lo ma la sogs pa'i ming can 'byung bar 'gyur ba'i 'bras bu'i khyad par rang dang rigs mthun pa bskyed pa'i nus pa dang ldan pa kho na'i rgyu'i dngos por gyur nas 'gags pa yin la /
gang yang myu gu la sogs pa'i rgyun sa bon las byung ba de las ni rgyu chung du yin du zin kyang rim gyis lhan cig byed pa'i rgyu ma tshang ba med pas 'bras bu'i tshogs rgya chen po skye bar 'gyur ro /
ṛte bījāt vinā bījāt sa ca aṅkurādisaṃtānaḥ nābhipravartate /
tadevaṃ tadbhāve bhāvitvena tadabhāve ca abhāvitvena bījahetukatvamaṅkurādisaṃtānasya phalasyopadarśitaṃ bhavati 		sa bon ni med na ste /
sa bon mi bdog par 'gyur na ni myu gu la sogs pa'i rgyun de yang 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro /
de'i phyir de ltar de yod na yod pa nyid dang de med na med pa nyid kyis na myu gu la sogs pa'i rgyun gyi 'bras bu ni sa bon gyi rgyu can nyid yin par bstan par 'gyur ro /
tadevam /
bījācca yasmātsaṃtānaḥ saṃtānācca phalodbhavaḥ 		de'i phyir de ltar /
gang phyir sa bon las rgyun dang /
rgyun las 'bras bu 'byung 'gyur zhig /
bījapūrvaṃ phalaṃ tasmānnocchinnaṃ nāpi śāśvatam sa bon 'bras bu'i sngon 'gro ba /
de phyir chad mi rtag ma yin /
yadi iha bījamaprasūya aṅkurādisaṃtānaṃ jvālāṅgārādivirodhipratyayasāṃnidhyānnirudhyeta, tadā tatra kāryasaṃtānapravṛttyadarśanāt syāducchedadarśanam gal te sa bon myu gu la sogs pa'i rgyun gyi rkyen du ma gyur par me lce dang me mdag la sogs pa 'gal ba'i rkyen nye bas 'gags par gyur na ni /
de'i tshe de'i 'bras bu'i rgyu ni 'byung bar ma mthong bas chad par ltar par 'gyur la /
yadi ca bījaṃ na nirudhyeta, aṅkurādisaṃtānaśca pravarteta, tadā bījasyānirodhābhyupagamācchāśvatadarśanaṃ syāt, na caitadevam, ityato nāsti bījasya śāśvatocchedadarśanaprasaṅgaḥ /
yathā ca bīje ayaṃ kramo 'nuvarṇitaḥ, evam 		yang gal te sa bon mi 'gag cing myu gu la sogs pa'i rgyun 'byung bar 'gyur na ni /
de'i tshe sa bon mi 'gag par khas blangs pas rtag par lta bar 'gyur na /
'di ni de ltar yang ma yin no /
de'i phyir sa bon chad pa dang rtag par thal bar 'gyur ba yod pa ma yin no /
ji ltar sa bon la tshul 'di smras pa de bzhin du /
yastasmāccittasaṃtānaścetaso 'bhipravartate sems kyi rgyun ni gang yin pa /
sems las mngon par 'byung bar 'gyur /
tataḥ phalamṛte cittātsa ca nābhipravartate de las 'bras bu sems lta zhig /
med na de yang 'byung mi 'gyur /
tasmāt kuśalākuśalacetanāviśeṣasaṃprayuktāccittād yaḥ cittasaṃtānastaddhetukaḥ pravartate, tasmāt kuśalākuśalacetanāparibhāvitāccittasaṃtānāt sahakārikāraṇasaṃnidhānāvaikalye sati iṣṭamaniṣṭaṃ phalamupajāyate sugatidurgatiṣu sems sems pa dge ba'i khyad par dang mtshungs par ldan pa de las ni de'i rgyu can sems kyi rgyun gang yin pa 'byung la /
sems pa dge bas yongs su bsgos pa'i sems kyi rgyun de las ni lhan cig byed pa'i rgyu nye ba ma tshang ba med pa na 'bras bu yid du 'ong ba skye bar 'gyur ro /
ṛte tu taccitāt cittamantareṇa sa ca nābhipravartate sems lta zhig med na ste /
sems mi bdog na rgyun de yang 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro /
tadevam /
cittācca yasmātsaṃtānaḥ saṃtānācca phalodbhavaḥ 		de'i phyir de ltar na /
gang phyir sems las rgyun dang ni /
rgyu las 'bras bu 'byung 'gyur zhing /
karmapūrvaṃ phalaṃ tasmānnocchinnaṃ nāpi śāśvatam /
yadi arhaccaramacittamiva taddhetuphalapāraṃparyāvicchinnakramavartino bhāvinaścittasaṃtānasya hetubhāvamanupagamya kuśalaṃ cittaṃ nirudhyeta, tadā ucchinnaṃ tatkarma syāt 		las ni 'bras bu'i sngon 'gro ba /
de'i phyir chad min rtag ma yin /
gal te sems dge ba de dgra bcom pa'i sems tha ma ltar /
sems kyi rgyun rgyu dang 'bras bu gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa'i rim pa rgyun ma chad pa 'byung bar 'gyur ba'i rgyu'i dngos por ma gyur pa 'gags na ni /
athāpi anāgatasaṃtānasya hetubhāvamupagamya svarūpādapracyutaṃ syāt, syāttadānīṃ karma śāśvatam /
na caitadevamiti /
tasmāt kṣaṇikakarmābhyupagame 'pi nāsti ucchedaśāśvatadarśanadvayaprasaṅga iti 		de'i phyir las de rgyun chad par 'gyur la /
ci ste yang ma 'ongs pa'i rgyun gyi rgyu'i dngos por gyur nas rang gi ngo bo las mi nyams par gyur na ni /
de'i tshe las rtag par 'gyur ba zhig na /
de ni de ltar yang ma yin no /
de'i phyir las skad cig mar khas blangs su zin kyang chad pa dang rtag par lta bar thal ba yod pa ma yin no /
tadatra yathoditakarmaprabhedavyākhyāne daśa kuśalāḥ karmapathā vyākhyātāḥ de'i phyir ji skad bstan pa'i las kyi rab tu dbye ba rnam par bshad pa 'dir dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam yang bshad pa yin la /
dkar po las kyi lam bcu po'o /
te ca /
dharmasya sādhanopāyāḥ śuklāḥ karmapathā daśa /
phalaṃ kāmaguṇāḥ pañca dharmasya pretya ceha ca 		de dag kyang /
chos sgrub pa'i thabs yin te /
chos kyi 'bras bu 'di gzhan du 'dod pa'i yon tan rnam lnga'o /
ta ete daśa kuśalāḥ karmapathā dharmasya sādhanopāyā niṣpattihetubhūtā ityarthaḥ dge ba'i las kyi lam bcu po de dag ni chos sgrub pa'i thabs yin te 'grub pa'i rgyur gyur pa yin no zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go /
kaḥ punarasau kuśalakarmapathavyatirikto dharmo nāma, yasyaite sādhanopāyatvena vyavasthāpyante? ucyate /
cittaviśeṣa eva kaścit dharmaśabdenoktaḥ /
ātmasaṃyamakaṃ cetaḥ parānugrāhakaṃ ca yat 		'di dag gang gis sgrub pa'i thabs nyid du 'jog par 'gyur ba'i chos zhes bya ba dge ba'i las kyi lam las tha dad pa 'di gang zhig yin zhe na /
brjod par bya ste /
chos kyi sgra ni sems kyi khyad par 'ga' zhig kho na brjod pa yin te /
bdag nyid legs par sdom pa dang /
maitraṃ sa dharmaḥ gzhan la phan 'dogs byams sems gang /
ityanena /
athavā 		de chos zhes brjod pa'i phyir ro /
pariniṣṭhitarūpā ete daśa kuśalāḥ karmapathā dharmaśabdavācyā bhavanti, kriyamāṇarūpāstu kuśalakarmapathavācyā bhavanti rnam pa gcig tu na dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam 'di dag yongs su mthar gtugs pa'i ngo bo ni chos kyi sgra'i brjod bya yin la /
byed bzhin pa'i ngo bo ni dge ba'i las kyi lam gyi sgra'i brjod byar 'gyur ro /
tadasya uktalakṣaṇasya ete daśa kuśalāḥ karmapathā niṣpattau hetutvena vyavasthāpyante dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam 'di dag ni bshad zin pa'i mtshan nyid can de 'grub par bya ba la rgyu nyid du rnam par gzhag go /
kathaṃ punaratra prakrānte karmavibhāge daśa kuśalāḥ karmapathā iti? ucyate yang las kyi rnam par dbye ba'i skabs thal zin pa der dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam du ji ltar 'gyur zhe na /
brjod par bya ste /
vāgviṣpando 'viratayo yāścāvijñaptisaṃjñitāḥ lus kyi gsum dang ngag gi bzhi ni /
ngag dang bskyod dang mi spong pa'i /
ityādinā kāyikāsrayaḥ karmapathāḥ vācikāścatvāro vyākhyātāḥ rnam rig byed min zhes bya gang /
zhes bya ba la sogs pas bshad pa yin la /
cetanā cetyanena abhidhyāvyāpādasamyagdṛṣṭayākhyāsrayo mānasā vyākhyātāḥ yid kyi gsum po brnab sems med pa dang gnod sems med pa dang yang dag par lta ba zhes bya ba ni /
sems pa dang ni zhes bya ba des rnam par bshad pa yin no /
ityevaṃ daśāpi kuśalāḥ karmapathā atra vyākhyātāḥ de ltar na der dge ba'i las kyi lam de dag bcu car yang rnam par bshad pa yin la /
te ca yathoditasya dharmasya niṣpattihetavo bhavanti /
asya ca dharmasya rūpaśabdagandharasaspraṣṭavyalakṣaṇāḥ pañca kāmaguṇāḥ 		de dag kyang ji skad bshad pa'i chos 'grub pa'i rgyu 'gyur ro /
chos de'i 'bras bu ni gzugs dang sgra dang dri dang ro dang reg bya'i mtshan nyid can 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga nye bar longs spyod pa'o /
pretya ca adṛṣṭe paraloke ityarthaḥ, iha ceti ihaloke ityarthaḥ, phalamupabhujyate iti 'di zhes bya ba ni 'jig rten 'di zhes bya ba'i don to /
gzhan du zhes bya ba ni ma mthong bar te 'jig rten pha rol du zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go /
evaṃ tāvadaikanikāyikairākṣepaparihāre varṇite sati, tān prati apare doṣamudbhāvya anyākṣepaparihāraṃ varṇayantaḥ āhuḥ de ltar re zhig kha cig gis brtsad pa'i lan btab pa yin dang gzhan dag gis de la skyon brjod nas /
brtsad pa'i lan gzhan gdab pa'i phyir smra pa /
bahavaśca mahāntaśca doṣāḥ syurapi kalpanā gal te brtag pa der 'gyur na /
nyes pa chen po mang por 'gyur /
yadyeṣā tena naivaiṣā kalpanātropapadyate /
yadi bījāṅkurasādharmyeṇa cittasaṃtāne śāśvatocchedadarśanadvayadoṣaprasaṅgaparihāraḥ syāt, tadā bahavaśca doṣāḥ saṃkhyābahutvena mahāntaśca dṛṣṭādṛṣṭavirodhena parapakṣe prāpruvanti /
kathaṃ kṛtvā? yadi hi bījasaṃtānadṛṣṭāntena śālibījāt śālyaṅkurādisaṃtāna eva pravartate, na vijātīyaḥ, śālyaṅkurādisaṃtānācca śāliphalameva upajāyate, na bilvaphalam, bhinnajātīyatvāt, evamihāpi kuśalacittāt kuśalacittasaṃtāna eva syāt, samānajātīyatvāt, na akuśalāvyākṛtacittasaṃtānaḥ, vijātīyatvāt 		de lta bas na brtag pa ste /
'dir ni 'thad pa ma yin no /
gal te sa bon dang myu gu dang chos mthun pa'i sgo nas sems kyi rgyun la chad pa dang rtag pa'i skyon du thal ba spong par 'gyur na ni de'i tshe gzhan gyi phyogs la nyes pa chen po ste mthong ba dang ma mthong ba dang 'gal ba dang grangs mang ba nyid kyis mang por 'gyur ro /
ji ltar zhe na /
gal te sa bon gyi rgyun gyi dpes yin na ni s'a lu'i sa bon las ni s'a lu'i myu gu la sogs pa'i rgyun kho na 'byung bar 'gyur gyi /
rigs mi mthun pa ma yin la s'a lu'i myu gu la sogs pa'i rgyun las kyang s'a lu'i 'bras bu kho na skye'i /
rigs tha dad pa'i phyir nim pa'i 'bras bu ma yin pa de bzhin du /
'dir yang rigs pa mtshungs pa'i phyir dge ba'i sems las dge ba'i sems kyi rgyun kho nar 'gyur gyi /
evamakuśalāvyākṛtacittādakuśalāvyākṛtacittasaṃtāna eva syānnānyaḥ, bhinnajātīyatvāt /
kāmarūpārūpyāvacarānāsravacittebhyaḥ sadṛśānāmeva cittānāṃ kāmarūpārūpyāvacarānāsravāṇāmutpādaḥ syāt, na bhinnajātīyānām /
manuṣyacittānmanuṣyacittameva syānna devanārakatiryagādyanyacittam /
tataśca yo devaḥ sa deva eva syāt, yo manuṣyaḥ sa manuṣya eva syādityādi /
tataśca akuśalamapi kurvatāṃ devamanuṣyāṇāṃ gatiyonivarṇabuddhīndriyabalarūpabhogādi vaicitryaṃ na syādapāyapatanaṃ ca 		rigs mi mthun pa'i phyir mi dge ba dang lung du ma bstan pa'i rgyun ni ma yin no /
de bzhin du mi dge ba dang lung du ma bstan pa'i sems yas kyang mi dge ba dang lung du ma bstan pa'i sems kyi rgyun kho nar 'gyur te /
rigs tha dad pa'i phyir gzhan ma yin no /
'dod pa dang gzugs dang gzugs med pa na spyod pa dang zag pa med pa'i sems rnams las kyang 'dra ba'i sems 'dod pa dang gzugs dang gzugs med pa pa na spyod pa dang zag pa med pa'i sems rnams kho na 'byung bar 'gyur gyi /
rigs mi mthun pa rnams ni ma yin no /
mi'i sems las kyang mi'i sems kho nar 'gyur gyi /
gzhan lha dang dmyal ba dang yi dags dang dud 'gro la sogs pa'i sems ni ma yin no /
de'i phyir gang zhig lha yin pa de ni lha kho nar 'gyur la /
gang zhig mi yin pa de ni mi kho nar 'gyur ro zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs so /
de'i phyir lha dang mi mi dge ba byed pa rnams kyi 'gro ba dang skye gnas dang rigs dang blo dang dbang po dang stobs dang gzugs dang longs spyod la sogs pa tha dad pa dang ngan 'gro ltung ba yang yod par mi 'gyur ba zhig na /
iṣyate caitatsarvamiti /
evaṃ bahavaśca mahāntaśca doṣā yasmādbījasaṃtānasādharmyakalpanāyāṃ prasajyante, tasmānnaiṣā kalpanā atropapadyate 		'di dag thams cad ni 'dod pa yang ma yin no /
gang gi phyir de ltar sa bon gyi rgyun dang chos mthun par rtog na nyes pa chen po dang mang por thal bar 'gyur ba de'i phyir brtag pa de 'dir yang 'thad pa ma yin no /
imāṃ punaḥ pravakṣyāmi kalpanāṃ yātra yojyate /
buddhaiḥ pratyekabuddhaiśca śrāvakaiścānuvarṇitām 		sangs rgyas rnams dang rang rgyal dang /
nyan thos rnams kyis gang gsungs pa'i /
brtag pa gang zhig 'dir 'thad pa /
kā cāsau kalpanetyāha /
patraṃ yathāvipraṇāśastatharṇamiva karma ca 		de ni rab tu brjod par byed /
brtag pa de yang gang zhig yin zhe na /
smras pa /
dpang rgya ji lta de bzhin chud /
mi za las ni bu lon bzhin /
caturvidho dhātutaḥ sa prakṛtyāvyākṛtaśca saḥ de ni khams las rnam pa bzhi /
de yang rang bzhin lung ma bstan /
iha kuśalaṃ karma kṛtaṃ sat utpādānantarameva nirudhyate, na ca tasminniruddhe phalābhāvaprasaṅgaḥ 'dir dge ba'i las byas par gyur pa ni skyes ma thag tu 'gags pa yin la /
de 'gags pas 'bras bu med par thal bar 'gyur ba yang ma yin te /
yasmād yadaiva tatkarma utpadyate, tadā etasya karmaṇo 'vipraṇāśo nāma viprayukto dharmaḥ kartuḥ saṃtāne samupajāyate ṛṇapatrasthānīyaḥ gang gi phyir las de gang gi tshe skye ba de nyid kyi tshe byed pa po'i rgyud la las de'i chud mi za ba zhes bya ba ldan pa ma yin pa'i chos bu lon gyi dpang rgya 'dra ba zhig skye bar 'gyur ro /
tadevaṃ patraṃ yathā avipraṇāśaḥ tathā veditavyaḥ /
yasya ca asau avipraṇāśākhyo dharma utpadyate, ṛṇamiva tatkarma veditavyam /
yathā ca ṛṇapatrāvasthānāt prayukte 'pi dhane dhanino na dhananāśo bhavati, saṃbadhyata eva sa kālāntareṇa pañcamena dhanaskandhena, tathā vinaṣṭe 'pi karmaṇi avipraṇāśākhyadharmāntarāvasthānāt tannimittakena phalena abhisaṃbadhyata eva kartā 		de'i phyir de ltar na dpang rgya ji lta ba de bzhin du chud mi za bar rig par bya la /
gang la chud mi za ba zhes bya ba'i chos de bskyed ba'i las de ni bu lon bzhin rig par bya'o /
ji ltar bu lon gyi dpang rgya bzhag nas nor spyad kyang nor bdag gi nor chud za bar mi 'gyur bar dus gzhan gyi tshe skyed dang bcas pa'i nor gyi phung po dang 'brel pa nyid du 'gyur ba de bzhin du las zhig tu zin kyang chud mi za ba zhes bya ba'i chos gzhan gnas pas byed pa po de'i rgyu can gyi 'bras bu dang mngon par 'brel ba nyid du 'gyur ro /
yathā ca ṛṇapatraṃ dāturdhanābhyāgamaṃ kṛtvā nirmuktaṃ sat punarapi vidyamānaṃ vā avidyamānaṃ vā na dhanābhyāgame samartham, evamavipraṇāśo 'pi dattavipākaḥ san vidyamāno vā avidyamāno vā na śaknoti nirmuktapatravat kartuḥ punarapi vipākasaṃbandhaṃ kartum /
yaścāyamavipraṇāśo 'smābhiruktaḥ sūtrāntaroktaḥ, caturvidho dhātutaḥ sa kāmarūpārūpyāvacarānāsravabhedāt, prakṛtyā avyākṛtaśca saḥ 		yang ji ltar bu lon gyi dpang rgyas gtong ba po la nor bkug nas ror gyur pa ni yod dam med kyang rung ste yang nor 'gugs par mi nus pa de bzhin du chud mi za ba yang rnam par smin pa phyung nas yod dam med kyang rung ste dpang rgya ror gyur pa ltar yang byed pa po rnam par smin pa dang 'brel par byed mi nus so /
yang mdo gzhan las gsungs shing kho bo cag gis smras pa'i chud mi za ba gang yin pa /
de ni khams las rnam pa bzhi ste /
'dod pa dang gzugs dang gzugs med pa na spyod pa dang zag pa med pa'i dbye ba las so /
de yang rang bzhin lung ma bstan /
kuśalākuśalatvena avyākaraṇādavyākṛta evāvipraṇāśaḥ chud mi za ba ni dge ba dang mi dge ba nyid tu brda mi sprod pa'i phyir lung du ma bstan pa kho na yin no /
yadi asau akuśalānāṃ karmaṇāmakuśalaḥ syāt, tadā kāmaṃ vītarāgāṇāṃ na syāt gal te mi dge ba'i las rnams kyi de mi dge ba zhig yin na ni de'i tshe 'dod pa'i 'dod chags dang bral ba rnams la med par 'gyur ro /
yadi ca kuśalānām, kuśalaḥ syāt, samucchinnakuśalamūlānāṃ sa na syāt gal te dge ba rnams kyi dge ba zhig yin na ni dge ba'i rtsa ba chad pa rnams la de med par 'gyur ro /
tasmāt prakṛtyavyākṛta evāsau de'i phyir de ni rang bzhin gyis lung du ma bstan pa nyid yin no /
kiṃ ca gzhan yang /
prahāṇato na praheyo bhāvanāheya eva vā spong ba spang ba ma yin te /
bsgoms pas spang ba nyid kyang min /
sa cāyamavipraṇāśaḥ prahāṇato na praheyaḥ chud mi za ba de spong bas spang ba ni ma yin no /
pārthagjanikāni karmāṇi darśanamārgeṇaiva prahīyante mā bhūdāryaḥ pṛthagjanakarmasamanvāgata iti 'phags pa yang so so skye ba'i las dang ldan par 'gyur du 'ong bas mthong ba'i lam gyis so so skye ba'i las dag kho na spong gi /
avipraṇāśastu tatkarmaprahāṇe 'pi darśanamārgeṇa na prahīyate, kiṃ tu bhāvanāmārgeṇa vā tasyā prahāṇaṃ bhavati /
dhātusamatikramaṇapraheya eveti vāśabdo vikalpārthaḥ /
yataścaivamavipraṇāśaḥ karmavināśe 'pi na naśyati, karmaprahāṇe 'pi na prahīyate, 		chud mi za ba ni de'i las spangs kyang mthong ba'i lam gyis spong ba ma yin te /
'on kyang de ni bsgom pa'i lam gyis kyang spong bar 'gyur ro /
kyang gi sgras ni khams las yang dag par 'das pas kyang spang bar bya ba yin no zhes rnam par rtog pa'i don to /
gang gi phyir de ltar las 'jig kyang chud mi za ba mi 'jig la /
las spangs kyang spang bar bya ba ma yin pa /
tasmādavipraṇāśena jāyate karmaṇāṃ phalam de phyir chud mi za ba yis /
las kyi 'bras bu bskyod par 'gyur /
yadi punarapi asya avipraṇāśasya karmaṇaḥ prahāṇena prahāṇātprahāṇataḥ prahāṇaṃ syāt karmaṇaśca saṃkrameṇa karmaṇo vināśena karmāntarasaṃmukhībhāvena vināśaḥ syāt, ko doṣaḥ syāditi? ucyate yang gal te chud mi za ba 'di las spong bas te 'dor bas spong bar 'gyur la; las 'pho ba ste las 'jig cing las gzhan mngon du phyogs pa'i ngo bos 'jig par 'gyur na nyes pa ci yod ce na /
brjod pa /
prahāṇataḥ praheyaḥ syātkarmaṇaḥ saṃkrameṇa vā gal te spong bas spang pa dang /
las 'pho ba yis 'jig 'gyur na /
yadi doṣāḥ prasajyeraṃstatra karmavadhādayaḥ de la las 'jig la sogs pa'i /
skyon rnams su ni thal bar 'gyur /
yadi darśanamārgeṇa pārthagjanikakarmavadavipraṇāśaḥ prahīyeta, tadā karmaṇo vināśa eva syāt gal te so so skye bo'i las bzhin du mthong pa'i lam gyis chud mi za ba spong na ni /
de'i tshe las 'jig pa kho nar 'gyur la /
karmavināśācca āryāṇāmiṣṭāniṣṭakarmaphalavipākaḥ pūrvakarmaphalahetuko na syāt las 'jig pa'i phyir 'phags pa rnams kyi las kyi 'bras bu rnam par smin pa yid du 'ong ba dang mi 'ong ba sngon gyi las kyi rgyu can du yang mi 'gyur ro /
akṛtasyaiva karmaṇaḥ phalodayaḥ syāt /
karmaphalābhāvadarśanācca mithyādarśanaṃ syāditi 		ma byas pa'i las las 'bras bu 'byung bar yang 'gyur ro /
las dang 'bras bu med par lta ba'i phyir log par lta bar yang 'gyur ro /
evaṃ karmavadhādayo doṣāḥ prasajyante prahāṇataḥ praheyatvābhyupagame sati avipraṇāśasya de ltar chud mi za bas spong bas spang bar bya ba nyid du khas len na las 'jig pa la sogs pa'i skyon rnams su thal bar 'gyur ro /
evaṃ karmaṇaḥ saṃkrame 'pi yojyam de bzhin du las 'pho ba la yang sbyar bar bya'o /
sarveṣāṃ viṣabhāgānāṃ sabhāgānāṃ ca karmaṇām khams mtshungs las ni cha mtshungs dang /
cha mi mtshungs ba thams cad kyi /
pratisaṃdhau sadhātūnāmeka utpadyate tu saḥ /
bhinnajātīyāni karmāṇi viṣabhāgāni /
sadṛśāni sabhāgāni 		de ni nying mtshams sbyor ba'i tshe /
gcig pu lon skye bar 'gyur /
cha mtshungs pa ni las rigs 'dra ba rnams so /
teṣāṃ sarveṣāmeva sabhāgānāṃ ca viṣabhāgānāṃ ca karmaṇāṃ kāmarūpārūpyadhātupratisaṃdhiṣu sarvakarmāpamardanaḥ eka eva avipraṇāśa utpadyate cha mi mtshungs pa ni las rigs tha dad pa rnams so; ;las cha mtshungs pa dang cha mi mtshungs pa de rnams thams cad kyi chud mi za ba ni 'dod pa dang gzugs dang gzugs med pa'i khams dag tu nying mtshams sbyor ba'i tshe las thams cad pa shig nas gcig kho na skye bar 'gyur ro /
de yang khams mtshungs te /
sa cāpi sadhātūnāṃ samānadhātukānāmeva utpadyate na viṣabhāgadhātukānām khams mnyam pa rnams kyi de kho na skye bar 'gyur gyi /
mi mtshungs pa rnams kyi ni mi 'gyur ro /
karmaṇaḥ karmaṇo dṛṣṭe dharma utpadyate tu saḥ mthong ba'i chos la rnam gnyis po /
thams cad las dang las kyi de /
dviprakārasya sarvasya vipakke 'pi ca tiṣṭhati tha dad par ni skye 'gyur zhing /
rnam par smin kyang gnas pa yin /
sa cāyamavipraṇāśākhyo dharmaḥ sarvasyaiva karmaṇaḥ cetanācetayitvāsvabhāvasya sāsravānāsravabhedena vā dviprakārabhinnasya dṛṣṭe dharme ihaiva janmani karmaṇaḥ karmaṇaḥ ekaiko 'vipraṇāśa utpadyate chud mi za ba zhes bya ba'i chos de ni mthong ba'i chos la ste tshe 'di la zag pa dang bcas pa dang zag pa med pa'i dbye bas rnam pa gnyis te /
tshul gnyis po thams cad kyi ste sems pa dang bsams pa'i las kyi rang bzhin can gyi las dang las kyi chud mi za ba re re skye bar 'gyur ro /
sa cāyamavipraṇāśo vipakke 'pi vipāke nāvaśyaṃ nirudhyate, nirbhuktapatravacca vidyamāno 'pi san na śaknoti punarapi vipaktum chud mi za ba de ni rnam par smin kyang ste rnam par smin pa na gdon mi za bar 'gag pa ma yin la /
yod du zin kyang dpang rgya ror gyur pha ltar yang 'bras bu 'byin par ni byed mi nus so /
phalavyatikramādvā sa maraṇādvā nirudhyate de ni 'bras bu 'pho ba dang /
shi bar gyur na 'gag par 'gyur /
anāsravaṃ sāsravaṃ ca vibhāgaṃ tatra lakṣayet de yi rnam dbye zag med dang /
zag dang bcas par shes par bya /
tatra phalavyatikramānnirudhyate de la 'bras bu 'pho ba na 'gag pa ni ji skad du /
yathoktam /
bhāvanāheya eveti 		bsgoms pas spang ba nyid kyang yin /
zhes bshad pa lta bu'o /
maraṇānnirudhyate shi bar gyur pa na /
yathoktam /
pratisaṃdhau sadhātūnāmeka utpadyate tu saḥ 		'gag pa ni ji skad du /
de ni nying mtshams sbyor ba'i tshe /
gcig pu kho na skye bar 'gyur /
iti /
sa cāyaṃ sāsravāṇāṃ sāsravaḥ, anāsravāṇāmanāsravaḥ ityevaṃ vibhāgaṃ lakṣayet /
tadevam /
śūnyatā ca na cocchedaḥ saṃsāraśca na śāśvatam 		zhes bsnyad pa lta bu'o /
de yang zag pa dang bcas pa rnams kyi ni zag pa dang bcas pa yin la /
zag pa med pa rnams kyi ni zag pa med pa yin te /
de ltar de'i rnam par dbye ba shes par bya'o /
de'i phyir da ltar na /
stong pa nyid dang chad med dang /
'khor ba dang ni rtag pa min /
karmaṇo 'vipraṇāśaśca dharmo buddhena deśitaḥ las rnams chud mi za ba'i chos /
sangs rgyas kyis ni bstan pa yin /
yasmāt karma kṛtaṃ sat nirudhyate, na svabhāvenāvatiṣṭhate, tasmāt karmaṇaḥ svabhāvenāvasthānāt śūnyatā copapadyate gang gi phyir las ni byas nas 'gag gi rang bzhin gyis gnas pa ma yin la /
las rang bzhin gyis gnas pa ma yin pa de'i phyir /
stong pa nyid du thal ba yin no /
na caivaṃ karmaṇo 'navasthānāducchedadarśanaprasaṅgaḥ, avipraṇāśaparigraheṇa karmavipākasadbhāvāt de ltar las mi gnas pas chad par lta bar thal bar 'gyur ba yang ma yin te /
chud mi za ba yongs su bzung bas las kyi 'bras bu yod pa'i phyir te /
vipākābhāve hi karmaṇaḥ ucchedadarśanaṃ syāt /
avipraṇāśadharmasadbhāvāt bījasaṃtānasādharmyaparikalpanābhāvācca nānāgatijātiyonidhātubhedabhinnaśca pāñcagatikaḥ saṃsāro vicitraḥ siddho bhavati 		rnam par smin pa med na ni las chad par lta bar 'gyur ba zhig go /
chud mi za ba'i tshos yod pa'i phyir dang sa bon gyi rgyun dang chos mthun pa'i rtag pa med pa'i phyir 'gro ba dang rigs dang skye gnas dang khams sna tshogs pa'i dbye bas phye ba /
'gro lnga'i 'khor ba bkra ba yang grub pa yin no /
na ca śāśvatavādaprasaṅgaḥ, karmaṇaḥ svarūpeṇāvasthānānabhyupagamāt gang gi phyir las rang gi ngo bos mi gnas par khas blangs pas rtag par smra bar thal ba yang ma yin la /
karmaṇāṃ ca avipraṇāśaḥ, avipraṇāśasadbhāvāt, iti /
evaṃ niravaśeṣāvidyānidrāpagamādvibuddhena bhagavatā yasmādayaṃ dharmo deśitaḥ, tasmād yatpūrvaṃmuktaṃ pareṇa 		chud mi za ba yod pa'i phyir las rnams kyang chud mi za ba zhes bya ba de lta bu'i chos 'di ma rig pa nyid ma lus pa dang bral bas sad par gyur pa /
sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis bstan pa de'i phyir sngar gzhan gyis /
tiṣṭhatyā pākakālāccet karma tannityatāmiyāt gal te smin pa'i dus bar du /
gnas na las de rtag par 'gyur /
niruddhaṃ cenniruddhaṃ sat kiṃ phalaṃ janayiṣyati /
iti, 		gal te 'gags na 'gags gyur pa /
ji ltar 'bras bu bskyed par 'gyur /
tadasmatpakṣe nopapadyate iti zhes gang smras pa de kho bo cag gi phyogs la mi 'thad do /
tasmādasmābhirupavarṇitakalpanaiva nyāyyā iti de'i phyir kho bo cag gis brjod pa'i brtag pa kho na rigs so zhe'o /
atrocyate /
kimiha bhavanto gandharvanagaraprākārapatanātiśaṅkitayā atīvodvignāḥ tatparirakṣāpariśramāyāsamāpannāḥ, ye nāma yūyaṃ karmaṇyanupapadyamāne tatphalanimittaṃ vipravadadhvam? yadi hi karmaṇaḥ svarūpeṇaivotpādaḥ syāt, tasya āvipākamavasthānānnityatvaṃ syāt, vināśāducchedaḥ syāt 		'di la bshad par bya ste /
gang dag las nyid kyang mi 'thad pa de'i phyir 'bras bu'i rgyu can gyi rtsod pa byed pa khyed cag ci'i phyir dri za'i grong khyer gyi rab 'gyel gyis dogs pas ches yid byung bar gyur zhing de srung ba'i ngal bas tshegs su 'gyur /
'di ltar gal te las rang gi ngo bos skye bar 'gyur na ni /
de rnam par ma smin gyi bar du gnas par rtag pa nyid du 'gyur la /
yadā tu karma naivotpadyate svabhāvaśūnyatvāt, tadā tasya kuto 'vasthānaṃ vināśo vā, yata eṣā cintā syāt? atrāha 'jig pas chad par 'gyur ba zhig na /
gang gi tshe rang bzhin gyis stong pas las skye ba med pa de'i tshe na gang las dpyad pa 'dir 'gyur ba de la gnas pa dang 'jig pa yod par ga la 'gyur /
karma notpadyate kasmāt /
ācārya āha 		'dir /
gang phyir las ni skye ba med /
ces smras pa /
slob dpon gyis /
niḥsvabhāvaṃ yatastataḥ 'di ltar rang bzhin med de'i phyir /
yasmānniḥsvabhāvaṃ karma tasmānnotpadyate /
yadi khalvevaṃ niḥsvabhāvatvātkarma notpadyate, tat kathamevamuktaṃ bhagavatā 		zhes gsungs te /
gang gi phyir las rang bzhin med pa de'i phyir skye ba med do /
gal te de ltar las rang bzhin med pas mi skye na /
ji ltar bcom ldan 'das kyis /
na praṇaśyanyi karmāṇi kalpakoṭiśatairapi lus can rnams kyi las rnams ni /
bskal pa brgyar yang chud mi za /
sāmagrīṃ prāpya kālaṃ ca phalanti khalu dehinām tshogs shing dus la bab pa na /
'bras bu nyid du smin par 'gyur /
iti? /
ucyate /
yasmācca tadanutpannaṃ na tasmādvipraṇaśyati 		zhes de skad du gsungs she na /
brjod pa /
bcom ldan 'das kyis dgongs pa ni /
gang phyir de ni ma skyes pa /
ityevaṃ bhagavato 'bhiprāya iti de phyir chud zar mi 'gyur ro /
zhes bya ba de ltar yin te /
ato nāyamasmākaṃ bādhako vidhiriti de'i phyir tshul 'dis ni kho bo cag la gnod par byed pa ma yin no /
avaśyaṃ caitadevaṃ vijñeyam /
niḥsvabhāvaṃ karmeti /
anyathā hi 		las rang bzhin med do zhes bya ba de ni de ltar yin par gdon mi za bar shes par bya ste /
gzhan du na /
karma svabhāvataścetsyācchāśvataṃ syādasaṃśayam gal te las la rang bzhin yod /
rtag par 'gyur bar the tshom med /
akṛtaṃ ca bhavetkarma kriyate na hi śāśvatam /
yadi hi karma svabhāvataḥ syāt, muktasaṃśayaṃ tacchāśvataṃ syāt, svabhāvasyānyathābhāvābhāvāt 		las ni byas pa ma yin 'gyur /
rtag la bya ba med phyir ro /
gal te rang bzhin gyis las yod par gyur na ni the tshom med par de rtag par 'gyur te /
tataśca akṛtameva karma bhavet rang bzhin la gzhan du 'gyur ba med pa'i phyir ro /
kartuḥ svatantrasya kriyayā yadīpsitatamaṃ tatkarma de'i phyir las ni byas pa ma yin pa nyid du 'gyur ro /
etacca na yujyate ci'i phyir zhe na /
kiṃ kāraṇam? yasmāt kriyate na hi śāśvatam gang gi phyir rtag la bya ba med phyir ro /
śāśvataṃ hi nāma tad yadvidyamānasattākam rtag pa zhes bya ba ni gang zhig yod pa yin la /
yacca vidyamānaṃ tasya karaṇānupapatteḥ tannaiva kāraṇamapekṣata iti /
śubhāśubhe karmaṇi akṛta eva sakalasya lokasya vipāko yasmāt, tataśca 		gang yod pa de ni bya ba mi 'thad pas rgyu la mi ltos so /
de'i phyir dge ba dang mi dge ba'i las ma byas par 'jig rten la rnam par smin par 'gyur ro /
de'i phyir /
akṛtābhyāgamabhayaṃ syātkarmākṛtakaṃ yadi ci ste las ni ma byas na /
ma byas pa dang phrad 'jig 'gyur /
abrahmacaryavāsaśca doṣastatra prasajyate tshangs spyod gnas pa ma yin pa'ang /
de la skyon du thal bar 'gyur /
yadi hi akṛtaṃ karma bhavet, tadā akṛtābhyāgamabhayaṃ syāt gal te las byas pa ma yin par gyur na ni de'i tshe ma byas pa dang phrad pa'i 'jig par 'gyur te /
yenāpi hi prāṇātipātādikaṃ na kṛtam, tasyāpi akṛtamapi sat tat karma astyeveti tenāpyasya saṃbandhādakṛtābhyāgamabhayaṃ syāt gang gi srog gcod pa'i las ma byas pa de la yang las de ma byas kyang yod pas 'di de dang 'brel ba'i phyir /
ma byas pa dang phrad pa'i 'jig par 'gyur ro /
abrahmacaryavāsaśca tatra pakṣe prāpnoti tshangs par spyod pa la gnas pa ma yin pa yang phyogs de la 'gyur ro /
kiṃ kāraṇam? pariśuddhabrahmacaryavāsānna kasyacinnirvāṇena bhavitavyaṃ syāt /
kiṃ cātaḥ? /
vyavahārā virudhyante sarva eva na saṃśayaḥ 		ci'i phyir zhe na /
tshangs par spyod pa la gnas pa yongs su dag pa rnams la yang mi tshangs par spyod pa ma byas par yod pas thams cad tshangs par spyod pa ma yin pa la gnas pa'i phyir 'ga' yang mya ngan las 'da' bar mi 'gyur ro /
gzhan yang tha snyad thams cad nyid dang yang /
'gal bar 'gyur ba the tshom med /
puṇyapāpakṛtornaiva pravibhāgaśca yujyate bsod nams dang ni sdig byed pa'i /
rnam par dbye ba'ang 'thad mi 'gyur /
ye hi ete kṛṣivāṇijyagorakṣādayaḥ kriyārambhāḥ phalārthamārabhyante, teṣāṃ sarveṣāmakṛtānāmeva vidyamānatvāt prārambhavaiyarthyaṃ syāt gang dag zhing rmo ba dang tshong dang ba lang 'tsho ba la sogs pa'i bya ba 'bras bu'i don du rtsom pa de dag thams cad kyis ma byas bzhin du yod pa'i phyir don med par 'gyur la /
ghaṭaṃ kuru, paṭaṃ kuru, ityevamādayaśca sarva eva laukikavyavahārā virudhyante, ghaṭādīnāṃ sarveṣāmeva vidyamānatvāt /
puṇyakṛdayam, pāpakṛdayam, iti ca pravibhāgo na prāpnoti, ubhayorapi puṇyapāpakṛtoḥ akṛtayorapi puṇyapāpayoḥ pratyekaṃ vidyamānatvāt 		bum pa gyis shig snam bu thogs shig bya ba de lta bu la sogs pa'i 'jig rten pa'i tha snyad thams cad dang yang 'gal bar 'gyur te /
bum pa la sogs pa thams cad yod pa nyid kyi phyir ro /
'di ni bsod nams byed pa'o /
'di ni sdig pa byed pa'o zhes bya ba'i rnam par dbye bar yang 'gyur ro /
bsod nams dang sdig pa byed pa gnyis po re re la yang ma byas kyang bsod nams dag yod pa'i phyir ro /
kiṃ ca gzhan yang /
tadvipakvavipākaṃ ca punareva vipakṣyati de ni rnam smin smin gyur pa /
yang dang yang du rnam smin 'gyur /
karma vyavasthitaṃ yasmāttasmātsvābhāvikaṃ yadi gal te rang bzhin yod na ni /
gang phyir las gnas de yi phyir /
vipakvavipākasyāpi karmaṇaḥ punarvipākadānamāpadyate svarūpādapracyutatvāt, avipakvavipākāvasthāyāmiva /
tadevaṃ yadi karma svābhāvikamiti manyase, yasmāt tatkarma vyavasthitamasti tasmānniḥsaṃśayaṃ yathopavarṇitā doṣāḥ prāpnuvanti sasvabhāvatve /
tasmānniḥsvabhāvaṃ karma, yataśca niḥsvabhāvaṃ karma, tasmācchāśvatocchedadarśanaprasaṅgo naivāsmākamevaṃ vyācakṣamāṇānāmāpadyate iti 		las rnam par smin pa rnam par smin zin pas kyang yang dang yang du rnam par smin pa 'byin par 'gyur te /
rnam par smin pa smin par ma gyur ba'i gnas skabs ltar rang gi ngo bo las ma nyams pa'i phyir ro /
de'i phyir de ltar gal te las rang bzhin yod do snyam du sems na ni rang bzhin dang bcas pa nyid yin dang gang gi phyir las rnam par gnas pa yod pa de'i phyir the tshom med par ji skad bshad pa'i nyes pa dag tu 'gyur ro /
de'i phyir las rang bzhin med pa yin no /
gang gi phyir las rang bzhin med pa de'i tshe kho bo cag de skad du rnam par 'chad bdag la rtag pa dang chad par lta bar thal ba'i skyon du mi 'gyur ro /
atrāha /
vidyata eva svabhāvataḥ karma, tatkāraṇasadbhāvāt 		'dir smras pa /
las ni rang bzhin gyis yod pa nyid yin te de'i rgyu yod pa'i phyir ro /
iha yannāsti, na tasya kāraṇamasti [kūrma] romakūpaprāvārasyeva 'dir gang yod pa ma yin pa de la ni rgyu med de /
rus sbal gyi spu'i gos bzhin no /
asti ca karmaṇaḥ kāraṇaṃ kleśāḥ las kyi rgyu nyon mongs pa rnams ni yod pa yang yin te /
avidyāpratyayāḥ saṃskārāḥ, ..... upādānapratyayo bhavaḥ, iti vacanāt /
tasmādvidyata eva karma svabhāvataḥ iti 		ma rig pa'i rkyen gyis 'du byed rnams so /
len pa'i rkyen gyis srid pa'o zhes 'byung ba'i phyir ro /
de'i phyir las yod pa nyid yin no /
ucyate /
ayuktameva 		brjod par bya ste /
'di ni mi rigs so /
kiṃ kāraṇam? yasmāt ci'i phyir zhe na gang gi phyir /
karma kleśātmakaṃ cedaṃ te ca kleśā na tattvataḥ las 'di nyon mongs ba dag nyid la /
nyon mongs de dag yang dag min /
na cette tattvataḥ kleśāḥ karma syāttattvataḥ katham gal te nyon mongs yang dag min /
las ni yang dag ji ltar yin /
ihedaṃ karma kleśātmakaṃ kleśahetukam /
te ca kleśāstattvato na santi /
vakṣyati hi /
śubhāśubhaviparyāsān saṃbhavanti pratītya ye /
te svabhāvānna vidyante tasmātkleśā na tattvataḥ /
iti 		'dir las 'di nyon mongs pa'i bdag nyid ste nyon mongs pa'i rgyu can yin la nyon mongs pa de dag kyang yang dag par yod pa ma yin te /
gang dag sdug dang mi sdug dang phyin ci log la rten 'byung ba /
de dag rang bzhin las med de /
de phyir nyon mongs yang dag med /
ces 'chad par 'gyur ba'i phyir ro /
de'i phyir de ltar nyon mongs pa de dag yang dag pa ma yin na /
tadevaṃ tāvat na tattvataḥ kleśāḥ, taddhetukaṃ karma tadānīṃ kutastattvato bhaviṣyati? tasmānnāsti karma svabhāvataḥ de'i tshe de dag gi rgyu can las gang yin pa de dag yang dag par ji ltar 'gyur /
de'i phyir las rang bzhin gyis yod pa ma yin no /
atrāha /
vidyanta eva kleśā karmāṇi ca, tatkāryasadbhāvāt 		'dir smras pa /
las dang nyon mongs pa dag ni yod pa nyid de /
de'i 'bras bu yod pa'i phyir ro /
iha hi kleśakarmaṇāṃ dehākhyaṃ kāryamupalabhyate 'dir las dang nyon mongs pa dag gi 'bras bu lus zhes bya ba dmigs pa yin la /
yasya ca kāryamupalabhyate tadasti, avidyamānasya khapuṣpādeḥ kāryādarśanāt iti gang gi 'bras bu dmigs pa de ni yod pa yin te /
yod pa ma yin pa nam mkha'i me tog la sogs pa'i 'bras bu ni ma mthong ba'i phyir ro /
ucyate /
syuḥ kleśāḥ karmāṇi ca, yadi tatkāryaṃ dehā vidyeran 		brjod par bya ste /
gal te de dag gi 'bras bu lus zhes bya ba yod na ni /
las dang nyon mongs pa dag kyang yod par 'gyur na /
na tu vidyante ityāha yod pa ni ma yin no zhes bstan pa'i phyir /
karma kleśāśca dehānāṃ pratyayāḥ samudāhṛtāḥ las dang nyon mongs pa dag ni /
las rnams kyi ni rkyen du bstan /
karma kleśāśca te śūnyā yadi deheṣu kā kathā gal te las dang nyon mongs pa /
de stong lus la ji ltar brjod /
yathā karma kleśāśca śūnyāḥ, tathā pratipāditam ces gsungs so /
ji ltar las dang nyon mongs pa dag stong pa de ltar ni bstan zin to /
tataśca karma kleśā yadā na santi, tadā tatkāryāṇāṃ dehānāmasattve kā kathā bhaviṣyati? nāstitvaṃ teṣāṃ pūrvameva siddhaṃ yasmāt, tasmānnānna kaścidvaktavyaviśeṣo 'stītyabhiprāyaḥ de'i phyir gang gi tshe las dang nyon mongs pa dag nyid yod pa ma yin pa de'i tshe de dag gi 'bras bu lus rnams yod pa ma yin pa la brjod pa ci zhig yod par 'gyur te /
gang gi phyir de dag yod pa ma yin pa nyid du sngar grub zin pa de'i phyir 'di la brjod par bya ba lhag ma cung zad kyang yod pa ma yin no snyam du dgongs pa yin no /
atrāha /
vidyata eva svabhāvataḥ karma, tatphalabhoktṛsadbhāvāt 		'dir smras pa /
las ni rang bzhin gyis yod pa nyid yin te /
de'i 'bras bu za ba po yod pa'i phyir ro /
yannāsti, na tasya phalopabhoktāsti, tadyathā gaganacūtaphalasyeti gang yod pa ma yin pa de'i 'bras bu za ba po ni yod pa ma yin te /
dper na /
asti ca karmaṇaḥ phalopabhoktā /
avidyānivṛto jantustṛṣṇāsaṃyojanaśca saḥ 		nam mkha'i aa mra'i shing thog bzhin no /
las kyi 'bras bu za ba po ni yod pa yin te /
ma rig bsgribs pa'i skye bo gang /
sred ldan de ni za ba po /
sa bhoktā sa ca na karturanyo na ca sa eva saḥ de yang byed las gzhan min zhing /
de nyid de yang ma yin no /
tatra avidyā ajñānaṃ tamaḥ saṃmoha iti paryāyāḥ de la ma rig pa dang mi shes pa dang mun pa dang rmongs pa zhes bya ba ni rnam grangs dag go /
avidyayā nivṛtaśchāditaḥ ma rig pas bsgribs pa ni g yogs pa'o /
pāñcagatikasaṃsāre punaḥ punarjāyata iti jantuḥ /
sattvaḥ pudgalaḥ prāṇīti tasyaiva paryāyāḥ 		'gro ba lnga'i 'khor bar yang dang yang du skye bas na skye ba ste /
sems can dang gang zag dang srog chags zhes bya ba ni de nyid kyi rnam grangs dag go /
tṛṣṇā rāgaḥ saktirvisaktiśceti paryāyāḥ /
saṃyojanaṃ bandhanam 		sred pa dang 'dod chags dang chags pa dang rnam par chags pa zhes bya ba'i sgra ni rnam grangs dag go /
ldan pa ni 'ching ba'o /
tṛṣṇā saṃyojanamasyeti tṛṣṇāsaṃyojanaḥ tṛṣṇābandhana ityarthaḥ /
yathoktaṃ sūtre 		srid pa'i 'ching ba 'di la yod pas na sred ldan te /
sred pa'i 'ching ba can zhes bya ba'i don to /
ji skad du mdo las /
ma rig bsgribs pa'i sems can dag /
avidyānivṛtāḥ sattvāstṛṣṇāsaṃyojanāḥ iti sred pa'i kun du sbyor ba can /
zhes gsungs so /
atha ca punaridaṃ pāpaṃ karma svayameva kṛtam, asya svayameva vipākaḥ pratyanubhavitavyaḥ iti vacanāt 'on kyang sdig pa'i las 'di ni rang gis byas pa yin la /
'di'i rnam par smin pa ni rang nyid kyis so sor nyams su myong bar bya ba yin no zhes 'byung ba las na de ni las kyi 'bras bu'i za ba po'o /
sa ca bhoktā karmaphalasya de yang byed pa po las gzhan ma yin la /
sa ca na karturanyaḥ, na ca sa eva saḥ /
tattvānyatvāvācyatvāt /
tasmāt phalopabhoktṛsadbhāvādastyeva karmeti 		de nyid de yang ma yin te de nyid dang gzhan du brjod du med pa'i phyir ro /
de'i phyir 'bras bu za ba po yod pa'i phyir las yod pa nyid do zhe na /
atrocyate /
syātkarmaṇaḥ kartā karmaphalasya copabhoktā yadi karmaiva syāt 		'di la brjod par bya ste /
gal te las nyid yod na las kyi byed pa po dang 'bras bu za ba po yang yod par 'gyur na /
na tvasti /
kathaṃ kṛtvā? 		yod pa ni ma yin no /
ji ltar zhe na /
na pratyayasamutpannaṃ nāpratyayasamutthitam gang gi phyir ni las 'di ni /
rkyen las byung ba ma yin zhing /
asti yasmādidaṃ karma tasmātkartāpi nāstyataḥ /
karma cennāsti kartā ca kutaḥ syātkarmajaṃ phalam 		rkyen min las byung yod min pa /
de phyir byed pa po yang med /
gal te las dang byed med na /
las skyes 'bras bu ga la yod /
asatyatha phale bhoktā kuta eva bhaviṣyati ci ste 'bras bu yod min na /
za ba po lta ga la yod /
yadi karma nāma kiṃcitsyāt, tat pratyayasamutpannaṃ vā bhavet, apratyayasamutpannaṃ vā? yadi tāvat pratyayasamutpannamiṣyate, tanna yuktam, pratyayaparīkṣāyāmuktadoṣatvāt /
atha apratyayajanitaṃ nirhetukam, tadapi /
hetāvasati kāryaṃ ca kāraṇaṃ ca ityādinā karmakārakaparīkṣāyāṃ vistareṇa pratipāditam /
yataścaivaṃ pratyayasamutpannaṃ vā apratyayasamutpannaṃ vā karmedaṃ na saṃbhavati, tasmādasya karmaṇaḥ kartāpi na saṃbhavati /
yadā caivaṃ karma ca kartā ca nāsti, tadā nirhetukaṃ karmajaṃ phalaṃ kuto bhaviṣyatīti, asati ca phale kuta eva phalabhoktā bhaviṣyatīti, sarvametat svabhāvato 'saṃvidyamānameveti vijñeyam /
atrāha /
yadi evaṃ naiḥsvābhāvyaṃ bhāvānāṃ vyavasthāpitaṃ bhavati, yattarhi etaduktaṃ bhagavatā /
svayaṃ kṛtasya karmaṇaḥ svayameva vipākaḥ pratyanubhavitavyaḥ iti, tadetat sarvamamunā nyāyena apākṛtaṃ bhavati /
karmaphalāpavādācca pradhānanāstiko bhavāniti /
ucyate /
na vayaṃ nāstikāḥ /
astitvanāstitvadvayavādanirāsena tu vayaṃ nirvāṇapuragāminamadvayapathaṃ vidyotayāmaḥ /
na ca karmakartṛphalādikaṃ nāstīti brūma, kiṃ tarhi niḥsvabhāvametaditi vyavasthāpayāmaḥ /
atha manyase /
niḥsvabhāvānāṃ bhāvānāṃ vyāpārakaraṇānupapatteḥ tadavastha eva doṣa iti, etadapi nāsti /
sasvabhāvānāmeva vyāpārādarśanāt /
niḥsvabhāvānāmeva vyāpāradarśanāt /
tathāhi niḥsvabhāvā eva santo ghaṭādayaḥ loke svakāryakṛt upalabhyante /
api ca /
amuṣmād dṛṣṭāntāt spaṣṭatarādayamartho 'vasīyatām /
yathā nirmitakaṃ śāstā nirmimītarddhisaṃpadā /
nirmito nirmimītānyaṃ sa ca nirmitakaḥ punaḥ /
tadyathā /
ekaṃ nirmitakaṃ śāstā buddho bhagavān ṛddhisaṃpadā ṛddhiprabhāveṇa nirmimīta, sa cāpi nirmitakaḥ punaḥ yo 'yaṃ buddhena bhagavatā nirmitaḥ, sa punarbhūyo 'nyamaparaṃ nirmitakaṃ nirmimīta /
tatra ya eṣa nirmitakaḥ aparasya nirmitakasya nirmātā, sa śūnyaḥ niḥsvabhāvaḥ, tathāgatasvabhāvarahita ityarthaḥ /
yaścāyamaparo nirmitakaḥ, yonirmitakena nirmitaḥ, asāvapi śūnyo nisvabhāvaḥ, tathāgatasvabhāvarahita ityarthaḥ /
yathātra niḥsvabhāvānāṃ nisvabhāvakāryakṛttvaṃ karmakartṛvyapadeśaśca bhavati, /
tathā nirmitakākāraḥ kartā karma ca tatkṛtam /
tadyathā nirmitenānyo nirmito nirmitastathā /
yo hyatra karmaṇaḥ kartā sa nirmitakākāraḥ svabhāvaśūnyaḥ /
tena ca svabhāvaśūnyena svatantrakartrā yat kiṃcit karma kriyate, tadapi svabhāvaśūnyam /
tadyathā nirmitakena anyo nirmitako nirmitaḥ tathā veditavyam /
yathoktamāgame /
ekasya bhāṣamāṇasya sarve bhāṣanti nirmitāḥ /
ekasya tūṣṇīṃbhūtasya sarve tūṣṇīṃbhavanti hi /
tasmādadvayavādināṃ mādhyamikānāṃ kuto mithyādarśanam? uktaṃ ca āryasamādhirāje /
yada sugatu kathāṃ katheti nātho vīthigatān manujān kṛpāyamānaḥ /
nirmita jinu tatra nirminitva vicarati teṣu praṇītabuddhadharmān /
prāṇiśatasahasra taṃ śruṇitvā praṇidadhayiṃsu varāgrabuddhajñāne /
kada vaya labhi jñānamevarūpaṃ āśaya jñātva jino 'sya vyākaroti /
raśmi śatasahasra aprameyān avasiri pādatalehi dharmarājā /
sarvi niraya śītalā bhavanti dukhamapanīya sukhaṃ ca vedayanti /
dharma daśabalaprabhāṣite 'tra marumanujāna viśuddha bhoti cakṣuḥ /
ityādi /
keci spṛha janenti tatra kāle parama acintya tehi labdhalābhā /
yehi jinu nimantrito narendro na ca pariyanta teṣu dakṣiṇāyā /
ityādi vistaraḥ /
tathā āryavimalakīrtinirdeśe /
tannirmitabodhisattvena gandhasugandhāyāṃ lokadhātau samantabhadratathāgatopabhuktaśeṣaṃ bhojanamānītaṃ nānāvyañjanakhādyādisaṃprayuktaṃ pṛthakpṛthagvividharasamekabhojanena sarvaṃ tacchrāvakabodhisattvasaṃgharājarājāmātyapurohitāntaḥ puradauvārikasārthavāhādijanapadaṃ saṃtarpya prītyākāraṃ nāma mahāsamādhiṃ lambhayāmāsa /
iti /
vinaye ca paṭhayate /
pāpabhikṣurapratirūpako bhagavatā bhikṣurabhinirmitaḥ /
tadvacanena śīlavato 'pi viśuddhipratijñāsaṃvāsaḥ prajñaptaḥ iti /
na ca kevalaṃ nirmāṇadṛṣṭāntena naiḥsvabhāvyadarśanamupapadyamānarūpam, api ca amībhyo dṛṣṭāntebhyaḥ sphuṭaṃ naiḥsvabhāvyaṃ bhāvānāṃ pratīyatāmiti pratipādayannāha /
kleśāḥ karmāṇi dehāśca kartāraśca phalāni ca /
gandharvanagarākārā marīcisvapnasaṃnibhāḥ /
tatra kleśā rāgādayaḥ, kliśnanti sattvacittasaṃtānānīti kṛtvā /
karmāṇi kuśalākuśalāneñjyāni /
dehāḥ śarīrāṇi /
kartāraḥ ātmānaḥ /
phalāni vipākādhipatyaniṣyandādīni /
ta ete kleśādayo 'rthāḥ gandharvanagarādivanniḥsvabhāvāḥ veditavyāḥ /
tasmānmādhyamikānāmeva bhāvānāṃ svabhāvānabhyupagamācchāśvatocchedadarśanadvayaprasaṅgo nāstīti vijñeyam /
atra ca karmaphalasaṃbandhavicāre kucodyaśeṣākṣepaparihāro madhyamakāvatārādvistareṇāvaseyaḥ /
yathoktamāryaratnakūṭasūtre /
pañca ca bhikṣuśatāni dhyānalābhīni utthāyāsanebhyaḥ prakrāntāni imāṃ gambhīrāṃ dharmadeśanāmanavabudhyamānāni anavataranti anavagāhamānāni anadhimucyamānāni /
bhagavānāha /
tathā hyete kāśyapa bhikṣavaḥ ābhimānikāḥ imāmanāsravāṃ śīlaviśuddhiṃ nāvataranti nāvagāhante nādhimucyante uttrasyanti saṃtrasyanti saṃtrāsamāpadyante /
gambhīraḥ kāśyapa gāthābhinirhāro gambhīrā ca buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ bodhiḥ /
sā na śakyā anavaropitakuśalamūlaiḥ sattvaiḥ pāpamitraparigṛhītairanadhimuktibahulairadhimoktum /
api ca /
etāni kāśyapa pañca bhikṣuśatāni kāśyapasya tathāgatasya pravacane 'nyatīrthikaśrāvakā abhūvan /
taireva tasya kāśyapasya tathāgatasyāntikādupālambhābhiprāyaireṣā dharmadeśanā śrutā /
śrutvā ca ekacittaprasādo labdhaḥ /
evaṃtairvāg bhāṣitā /
āścaryaṃ yāvat madhurapriyamāṇī kāśyapastathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddha iti /
ta etenaikacittaprasādena pratilabdhena kālagatāḥ trāyastriṃśeṣu deveṣūpapannāḥ /
te tataścyutāḥ samānāḥ ihopapannāḥ /
tenaiva ca hetunā iha mama śāsane pravrajitāḥ /
tānyetāni kāśyapa pañca bhikṣuśatāni dṛṣṭipraskandhāni imāṃ gambhīrāṃ dharmadeśanāṃ nāvataranti nāvagāhante nādhimucyante uttrasyanti saṃtrasyanti saṃtrāsamāpadyante kṛtaṃ punareṣāmanayā dharmadeśanayā parikarma /
na bhūyo durgativinipātaṃ gamiṣyanti /
ebhireva ca skandhaiḥ parinirvāsyanti /
atha khalu bhagavānāyuṣmantaṃ subhūtimāmantrayate sma /
gaccha subhūte, etān bhikṣūn saṃjñapatha /
subhūtirāha /
bhagavata eva tāvadete bhāṣitaṃ vilomayanti, kaḥ punarvādo mama? atha bhagavāṃstasyāṃ velāyāṃ yena mārgeṇaite bhikṣāvo gacchanti sma, tasmin mārge drau bhikṣū nirmimīte sma /
atha tāni pañca bhikṣuśatāni yena mārgeṇa tau dvau bhikṣū nirmitakau tenopasaṃkrāmanti sma /
upasaṃkramya etadavocan /
kutra āyuṣmantau gamiṣyathaḥ? tāvavocatām /
gamiṣyāva āvāmaraṇyāyataneṣu /
tatra dhyānasukhasaṃsparśavihārairvihariṣyāvaḥ /
..... tānyapi pañca bhikṣuśatānyetadavocan /
vayamapyāyuṣmantau bhagavato dharmadeśanāṃ nāvatarāmo nāvagāhāmahe nādhimucyāmahe uttrasyāmaḥ saṃtrasyāmaḥ saṃtrāsamāpadyāmahe /
tena vayamaraṇyāyataneṣu dhyānasukhasaṃsparśavihārairvihariṣyāma iti /
nirmitakāvavocatām /
tena hi āyuṣmantaḥ saṃgāsyāmo na vivadiṣyāmaḥ /
avivādaparamo hi śramaṇadharmaḥ /
yadidamāyuṣmanta ucyate parinirvāṇamiti, katamaḥ sa dharmo yaḥ parinirvāsyati? kaścitpunaratra kāyaḥ ātmā vā sattvo vā jīvo vā janturvā poṣo vā puruṣo vā pudgalo vā manujo vā mānavo va, yaḥ parinirvāsyati? kasya vā kṣayāt parinirvāṇam? te 'vocan rāgadveṣamohakṣayāt parinirvāṇam /
nirmitakāvavocatām /
kiṃ punarāyuṣmatāṃ saṃvidyante rāgadveṣamohā yān kṣayiṣyatha? te 'vocan /
na te adhyātmaṃ na bahirdhā nobhayamantareṇopalabhyante, nāpi te aparikalpitā utpadyante .... /
ityācāryacandrakīrtipādoparacitāyāṃ prasannapadāyāṃ madhyamakavṛttau karmaphalaparīkṣā nāma saptadaśamaṃ prakaraṇam /
ātmaparīkṣā aṣṭādaśamaṃ prakaraṇam /
atrāha /
yadi kleśāḥ karmāṇi ca dehāśca kartāraśca phalāni ca sarvametanna tattvam, kevalaṃtu gandharvanagarādivadattatvameva sat tattvākāreṇa pratibhāsate bālānām, kiṃ punaratra tattvam, kathaṃ vā tattvasyāvatāraḥ iti? ucyate /
ādhyātmikabāhyāśeṣavastvanupalambhena adhyātmaṃ bahiśca yaḥ sarvathā ahaṃkāramamakāraparikṣayaḥ, idamatra tattvam /
tattvāvatāraḥ punaḥ /
satkāyadṛṣṭiprabhavānaśeṣān kleśāṃśca doṣāṃśca dhiyā vipaśyan /
ātmānamasyā viṣayaṃ ca buddhā yogī karotyātmaniṣedhameva /
ityādinā madhyamakāvatārādvistareṇāvaseyaḥ /
kāyadṛṣṭimūlakameva saṃsāramanupaśyan ātmānupalambhācca satkāyadṛṣṭiprahāṇaṃ tatprahāṇācca sarvakleśavyāvṛttiṃ samanupaśyan prathamataramātmānamevopaparīkṣate, ko 'yamātmā nāmeti, yo 'haṃkāraviṣayaḥ /
sa cāyamahaṃkārasya viṣayaḥ parikalpyamānaḥ skandhasvabhāvo vā bhavetskandhavyatirikto vā? ādhārādheyatadvatpakṣāṇāmapi ekatvānyatvapakṣe eva antarbhāvāt saṃkṣepeṇaiva ca vivakṣitatvādekatvānyatvapakṣadvayapratiṣedhenaiva ātmaniṣedhamārabdhukāma ācārya āha /
ātmā skandhā yadi bhavedudayavyayabhāgbhavet /
skandhebhyo 'nyo yadi bhavedbhavedaskandhalakṣaṇaḥ /
kimartha punaranyatra tathāgataparīkṣāyāmagnīndhanaparīkṣāyāṃ ca pañca pañca pakṣā upanyastāḥ, iha tu punaḥ pakṣadvayameveti? ucyate /
yenaiva tatra prakaraṇadvaye pañca pañca pakṣā nirdiṣṭāḥ, ata eva anyatra nirdiṣṭatvānna punariha nirdiśyante /
saṃkṣepeṇa tu pakṣadvayamupanyasyate iti /
tatra yadi skandhā ātmeti parikalpyate, tadā udayavyayabhāg utpādī ca vināśī ca ātmā prāpnoti, skandhānāmudayavyayabhāktvāt /
na caivamiṣyate, ātmāneka[tva]doṣaprasaṅgāt vakṣyati hi /
nāpyabhūtvā samutpanno doṣo hyatra prasajyate /
kṛtako vā bhavedātmā saṃbhūto vāpyahetukaḥ /
iti /
tathā /
na copādānamevātmā vyeti tatsamudeti ca /
kathaṃ hi nāmopādānamupādātā bhaviṣyati /
iti /
kiṃ ca /
skandhā ātmā cedatastadbahutvāt ātmānaḥ syuste 'pi bhūyāṃsa eva /
dravyaṃ cātmā prāpnuyāttādṛśaśca dravye vṛttau vaiparītye ca na syāt /
ātmocchedo nirvṛtau syādavaśyaṃ nāśotpādau nirvṛteḥ prāk kṣaṇeṣu /
karturnāśāttatphalābhāva eva bhuñjītānyenārjitaṃ karma cānyaḥ 		gal te las zhes bya ba 'ga' zhig yod na ni /
de rkyen las byung ba'am /
rkyen ma yin pa las byung ba zhig tu 'gyur grang /
re zhig gal te rkyen las byung bar 'dod na ni /
de ni mi rigs te /
rkyen brtag par bshad zin pa'i phyir ro /
ci ste rkyen ma yin pa las byung ba ste /
rgyu med pa yin na ni de yang /
rgyu med na ni 'bras bu dang rgyu dang zhes bya ba la sogs pas byed pa po dang las brtag pa las rgyas par bstan zin to /
gang gi phyir de ltar las 'di rkyen las byung ba'am /
rkyen ma yin pa las byung ba yod pa ma yin pa de'i phyir /
las 'di'i byed pa po yang yod pa ma yin no /
gang gi tshe de ltar las dang byed pa po yod pa ma yin pa de'i tshe las las skyes pa'i 'bras bu med pa ba yod par ga la 'gyur /
'bras bu yod pa ma yin na 'bras bu za ba po yod par yang lta ga la 'gyur te /
'di dag thams cad ni rang bzhin gyis yod pa ma yin pa kho na'o zhes shes par bya'o /
'dir smras pa /
gal te de ltar khyod kyis dngos po rnams rang bzhin med par rnam par gzhag na /
'o na ni gang bcom ldan 'das kyis rang gis byas pa'i las kyi rnam par smin pa ni rang nyid kyis myong bar 'gyur ba yin no zhes gsungs pa de dag thams cad tshul 'dis bsal bar 'gyur la /
las dang 'bras bu la skur ba btab pa'i phyir na khyod med pa pa gtso bor gyur pa yin no /
brjod par bya ste /
kho bo cag med pa pa ma yin te /
kho bo cag ni yod pa dang med pa gnyis su smra ba bkag nas gnyis med pa'i lam mya ngan las 'das pa'i grong khyer du 'gro ba gsal bar byed pa yin no /
kho bo cag ni las dang byed pa po dang 'bras bu la sogs pa med do zhes smra ba yang ma yin te /
'o na ci zhe na /
'di dag rang bzhin med do zhes rnam par 'jog pa yin no /
ci ste rang bzhin med pa rnams la bya ba byed pa mi 'thad pa'i phyir nyes pa po na 'dug pa nyid do snyam na /
de yang yod pa ma yin te /
rang bzhin dang bcas pa rnams kho na la bya ba ma mthong ba'i phyir dang rang bzhin med pa rnams kho na la bya ba mthong ba'i phyir ro /
'di ltar bum pa la sogs pa rang bzhin med par gyur pa dag kho na 'jig rten na rang gi bya ba byed par dmigs pa yin no /
gzhan yang don 'di ni dpe ches gsal ba 'di las nges par bya'o /
ji ltar ston pas sprul pa ni /
rdzu 'phrul phun tshogs kyis sprul zhing /
sprul pa de yang sprul pa na /
slar yang gzhan ni sprul pa ltar /
'di lta ste /
dper na /
ston pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis rdzu 'phrul phun tshogs te /
rdzu 'phrul gyi mthus sprul pa sprul la /
sprul pa de yang ste gang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis sprul pa de slar yang ste phyis gzhan te sprul pa gzhan po sprul pa yin no /
de la sprul pa gang zhig sprul pa gzhan sprul pa po de ni stong zhing rang bzhin med de /
de bzhin gshegs pa'i rang bzhin dang bral ba zhes bya ba'i don te /
yang gang zhig sprul pas sprul pa'i sprul pa gzhan gang yin pa de yang stong zhing rang bzhin med pa ste /
de bzhin gshegs pa'i rang bzhin dang bral ba zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go /
ji ltar der rang bzhin med pa rnams la rang bzhin med pa'i bya ba byed pa nyid dang las dang bya ba byed pa po'i brjod par 'gyur ba /
de bzhin byed po des las gang /
byas pa'ang sprul pa'i rnam pa bzhin /
dper na sprul pas sprul gzhan zhig /
sprul pa mdzad pa de bzhin no /
'dir las kyi byed pa po gang yin pa de ni sprul pa'i rnam pa bzhin te /
rang bzhin gyis stong pa yin la /
rang bzhin gyis stong pa'i byed pa po des las gang cung zad cig byed pa de yang rang bzhin gyis stong pa yin te /
dper na /
sprul pas sprul pa gzhan sprul pa de bzhin du rig par bya'o /
de'i phyir dbu ma pa gnyis su med par smra ba rnams la log par lta ba ga la yod /
ji skad du /
gang tshe bde gshegs gtam rnams ston pa na /
mgon po srang bzhud mi la thugs brtse'i phyir /
rgyal bas der ni sprul pa rnam sprul te /
de dag la yang sangs rgyas chos bzang ston /
srog chags brgya stong dag gis de thos nas /
sangs rgyas ye shes mchog la smon lam 'debs /
nam bdag 'di 'dra'i ye shes thob snyam ste /
bsam pa mkhyen pas rgyal bas de lung ston /
gang gis rgyal ba mi dbang spyan drangs pa /
de yi sbyin pa mu mtha' med 'gyur te /
rnyed mchog bsam gyis mi khyab de rnyed ces /
la la dag ni de la mos pa bskyed /
ces rgyas par gsungs pa lta bu'o /
'dul ba las kyang /
bcom ldan 'das kyis sdig pa can gyi dge slong mi mthun pa zhig sprul la /
de'i tshig gis tshul khrims dang ldan pa la rnam par dag par khas 'ches pa dang 'grogs par yang bcas so zhes 'don to /
de la sprul pa'i dpes rang bzhin med par lta ba 'thad pa'i ngo bo yin pa 'ba' zhig tu ma zad kyi /
gzhan yang dpe 'di dag gis kyang dngos po rnams rang bzhin med par gsal bar shes par bya'o zhes bstan pa'i phyir /
nyon mongs las dang lus rnams dang /
byed pa po dang 'bras bu dag /
dri za'i grong khyer lta bu dag /
smig rgyu rmi lam 'dra ba yin /
zhes gsungs so /
de la nyon mongs pa ni 'dod chags la sogs pa dag ste /
sems can gyi sems kyi rgyud dag nyon mongs par byed pa'i phyir ro /
las ni dge ba dang mi dge ba dang mi g yo ba dag go /
lus ni khog pa dag go /
byed pa po ni bdag rnams so /
'bras bu ni rnam par smin pa dang bdag po dang rgyu mthun pa rnams te; nyon mongs pa la sogs pa'i don de dag ni dri za'i grong khyer gyi rnam pa la sogs pa ltar rang bzhin med par rig par bya'o /
de'i phyir dngos po rnams kyi rang bzhin khas ma blangs pas dbu ma pa rnams kho na la rtag pa dang chad par lta ba gnyis su thal ba med pa yin no zhes shes par bya'o /
las dang 'bras bu'i 'brel pa rnam par dpyod pa der brtsad pa ngan pa lhag ma'i brgal ba dang lan dag ni rgyas par dbu ma la 'jug pa las nges par bya'o /
'dir sprul pa'i dge slong gnyis kyis dge slong dmigs pa ba lnga brgya btul ba 'phags pa dkon mchog brtsegs pa'i mdo las gsungs pa ma tshang ba med par dper brjod par bya'o /
slob dpon zla ba grags pa'i zhal snga nas kyis sbyar ba'i tshig gsal ba las /
las dang 'bras bu brtag pa zhes bya ba rab tu byed pa bcu bdun pa'i 'grel pa'o /
'dir smras pa /
gal te nyon mongs pa rnams dang las dag dang lus rnams dang byed pa po dag dang 'bras bu rnams te /
'di dag thams cad de kho na nyid ma yin gyi /
'on kyang dri za'i grong khyer la sogs pa ltar de kho na nyid ma yin bzhin du /
byis pa rnams la de kho na nyid kyi rnam par snang ba yin na /
yang 'dir de kho na nyid ni gang zhig yin la /
de kho na nyid la 'jug pa yang ji ltar yin /
brjod par bya ste /
nang dang phyi'i dngos po ma dmigs pas na /
nang dang phyi la bdag tu 'dzin pa dang bdag gir 'dzin pa rnam pa thams cad du zad pa 'di ni 'dir de kho na nyid do /
de kho na nyid la 'jug pa ni /
nyon mongs skyon rnams ma lus 'jig tshogs la /
lta las byung bar blo yis mthong gyur zhing /
bdag ni 'di yi yul du rtogs byas nas /
rnal 'byor pa yis bdag ni 'gog par byed /
ces bya ba la sogs pas rgyas par dbu ma la 'jug pa las btsal bar bya'o /
'dir ni gnas pa'i phyogs tsam nyid bshad par bya ste /
'di na rnal 'byor pa de kho na nyid la 'jug par 'dod cing /
nyon mongs pa dang skyon ma lus pa rab tu spong bar 'dod pa ni /
'khor ba 'di ci'i rtsa ba can yin zhes de ltar nye bar rtog par byed la /
de de ltar nye bar rtog pa na /
'khor ba 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i rtsa ba can nyid du mthong zhing bdag ni 'jig tshogs la lta ba de'i dmigs pa yin par mthong la bdag ma dmigs pas 'jig tshogs la lta ba spong zhing /
de spangs pas nyon mongs pa dang skyon ma lus pa ldog par mthong pas /
gang zhig bdag tu 'dzin pa'i yul bdag ces bya ba 'di ci zhig ces ches thog mar bdag kho na la nye bar rtogs par bya'o /
bdag tu 'dzin pa'i yul de yang brtags pa na phung po'i rang bzhin nam /
phung po las tha dad pa zhig tu 'gyur grang /
de la rten dang brten pa dang de dang ldan pa'i phyogs rnams kyang gcig nyid dang gzhan nyid kyi phyogs kyi khongs su 'dus pa'i phyir dang mdor bsdus nas brjod par 'dod pa'i phyir /
gcig nyid dang gzhan nyid kyi phyogs gnyis bkag pa nyid kyis bdag dgag par brtsam par bzhed na /
gal te phung po bdag yin na /
skye dang 'jig pa can du 'gyur /
gal te phung po rnams las gzhan /
phung po'i mtshan nyid med par 'gyur /
zhes bya ba gsungs so /
yang gzhan de bzhin gshegs pa brtag pa dang me dang bud shing brtag par phyogs lnga nye bar bkod la /
'dir ni phyogs gnyis nyid yin pa ci'i phyir zhe na /
brjod par bya ste /
gang gi phyir /
de dag tu phyogs lnga bstan pa de nyid kyi phyir /
gzhan du bstan pas yang 'dir ma bstan te /
mdor bsdus nas phyogs gnyis shig nye bar bkod de de la gal te phung po bdag yin no zhes rtog na ni des na skye dang 'jig pa can te bdag skye ba dang 'jig pa can du 'gyur te phung po rnams skye ba dang 'jig pa la brten pa'i phyir ro /
bdag ni de ltar 'dod pa yang ma yin te nyes pa du mar thal bar 'gyur ba'i phyir ro /
'di ltar /
ma byung ba las byung min te /
'di la skyon du thal bar 'gyur /
bdag ni byas par 'gyur ba dang /
'byung ba rgyu med can du'ang 'gyur /
zhes bya ba dang de bzhin du /
nye bar len nyid bdag ma yin /
de byung ba dang 'jig pa yin /
nye bar blang ba ji lta bur /
nye bar len po yin par 'gyur /
zhes 'chad par 'gyur ro /
gzhan yang phyogs 'di ni /
gal te phung po bdag na de phyir de /
mang pas bdag de dag kyang mang por 'gyur /
bdag ni rdzas su 'gyur zhing der lta ba /
rdzas la 'jug pas phyin ci log mi 'gyur /
mya ngan 'das tshe nges par bdag chad 'gyur /
mya ngan 'das sngon skad cig dag la ni /
skye 'jig byed po med pas 'bras med nyid /
gzhan gyis bsags las gzhan gyis za bar 'gyur /
ityādinā madhyamakāvatāre vistareṇa vihitavicārādapi pakṣo boddhavya iti neha punarvistaraprapañca ārabhyate /
evaṃ tāvat skandhā ātmā na bhavati /
skandhavyatirikto 'pi na yujyate 		zhes bya ba la sogs pa dbu ma la 'jug pa las rgyas par rnam par dpyad pa byas pa las khong du chud par bya ste /
'dir ni spros pa rgyas par mi brtsam mo /
de ltar re zhig phung po bdag ma yin na /
phung po las tha dad par yang mi rung ngo /
yadi hi skandhebhyo 'nya ātmā bhavet, askandhalakṣaṇo bhavet gal te phung po rnams las gzhan phung po'i mtshan nyid med par 'gyur /
yathā hi goranyo 'śvaḥ na golakṣaṇe bhavati, evamātmāpi skandhavyatiriktaḥ parikalpyamānaḥ askandhalakṣaṇo bhavet ji ltar ba glang las gzhan pa'i rta ba glang gi mtshan nyid can du mi 'gyur ba de bzhin du /
bdag kyang phung po las tha dad par rtog pa na /
phung po'i mtshan nyid med par 'gyur ro /
tatra skandhāḥ saṃskṛtatvād hetupratyayasaṃbhūtā utpādasthitibhaṅgalakṣaṇāḥ de la phung po dag ni 'dus byas yin pa'i phyir /
skye ba dang gnas pa dang 'jig pa'i mtshan nyid can yin no /
tatra askandhalakṣaṇa ātmā bhavan bhavanmatena utpādasthitibhaṅgalakṣaṇāyuktaḥ syāt de la bdag phung po'i mtshan nyid can du ma gyur pas skye ba dang gnas pa dang 'jig pa dang ldan par mi 'gyur ro /
yaścaivaṃ bhavati, saḥ avidyamānatvādasaṃskṛtatvādvā khapuṣpavannirvāṇabadvā naiva ātmavyapadeśaṃ pratilabhate, nāpyahaṃkāraviṣayatvena yujyate, iti skandhavyatirikto 'pyātmā na yujyate /
athavā 		gang zhig de lta bu yin pa des ni yod pa ma yin pa'i phyir ram 'dus ma byas yin pa'i phyir nam mkha'i me tog gam mya ngan las 'das pa ltar /
bdag tu brjod pa rnyed par mi 'gyur la /
bdag tu 'dzin pa'i yul de nyid du yang mi rigs so /
de'i phyir bdag phung po las gzhan du yang rigs pa ma yin no /
ayamanyo 'rthaḥ /
yadi ātmā skandhavyatiriktaḥ syāt, saḥ askandhalakṣaṇa syāt 		rnam pa gcig tu na 'di ni don gzhan yin no /
gal te bdag phung po las tha dad na de phung po ma yin pa'i mtshan nyid can du 'gyur te /
rūpaṇānubhavanimittodgahaṇābhisaṃskaraṇaviṣayaprativijñaptilakṣaṇāḥ pañca skandhāḥ phung po lnga ni gzugs su rung ba dang nyams su myong ba dang mtshan mar 'dzin pa dang mngon par 'du byed pa dang yul so sor rnam par rig pa'i mtshan nyid can yin na /
ātmā ca rūpādiva vijñānaṃ skandhebhyo vyatirikta iṣyamāṇaḥ pṛthaglakṣaṇasiddhaḥ syāt, pṛthaglakṣaṇasiddhaśca gṛhyeta rūpādiva cittam bdag ni gzugs las rnam par shes pa bzhin du phung po dag las tha dad par 'dod pa na mtshan nyid tha dad par grub par 'gyur la /
mtshan nyid tha dad par grub pa ni gzugs las sems ltar gzung bar 'gyur na /
na ca gṛhyate 'dzin pa yang ma yin no /
tasmāt skandhavyatirikto 'pi nāsti /
nanu ca tīrthikāḥ skandhebhyo vyatiriktamātmānaṃ pratipannā bhinnalakṣaṇamācakṣate, tasmātteṣāmabādhaka evāyaṃ vidhiriti 		de'i phyir phung po las tha dad pa yang yod pa ma yin no /
gal te mu stegs pa dag gis bdag phung po las tha dad par rtogs shing /
de'i mtshan nyid kyang tha dad par smra ba ma yin nam /
de'i phyir tshul 'di ni de dag la gnod par byed pa ma yin no /
yathā ca tīrthikā ātmano bhinnalakṣaṇamācakṣate tathoktaṃ madhyamakāvatāre ji ltar mu stegs pa dag bdag gi mtshan nyid tha dad par smra ba de ltar ni /
ātmā tīrthyaiḥ kalpyate nityarūpo 'kartā bhoktā nirguṇo niṣkriyaśca za po rtag dngos byed po min pa'i bdag /
yon tan bya med mu stegs rnams kyis brtags /
kaṃcitkaṃcidvedamāśritya tasya bhedaṃ yātā prakriyā tīrthikānām de dbye cung zad cung zad la brten nas /
mu stegs can rnams lugs ni tha dad 'gyur /
zhes dbu ma la 'jug pa las smras pa yin no zhe na /
ityanena /
ucyate /
satyaṃ bruvanti tīrthikāḥ skandhavyatiriktasya lakṣaṇam, na punaste svarūpata ātmānamupalabhya tasya lakṣaṇamācakṣate, kiṃ tarhi yathāvadupādāyaprajñaptyanavagamena nāmamātrakamevātmānaṃ trāsādapratipadyamānāḥ saṃvṛtisatyādapi paribhraṣṭā mithyākalpanayaiva kevalamanumānābhāsamātravipralabdhāḥ santaḥ mohāt parikalpayanti ātmānam, tasya ca lakṣaṇamācakṣate 		brjod par bya ste /
mu stegs pa dag bdag phung po las tha dad pa de'i mtshan nyid smra ba bden mod kyi /
de dag bdag rang gi ngo bos dmigs nas de'i mtshan nyid smra ba ni ma yin te /
'o na ci zhe na /
brten nas brtags pa'i don ji lta ba bzhin ma rtogs par skrag pas bdag ming tsam zhig tu ma rtogs shing kun rdzob kyi bden pa las kyang nyams te /
log par rtog pa 'ba' zhig gi sgo nas rjes su dpag pa ltar snang ba tsam gyis bslus bas bdag yongs su rtog par byed la /
teṣāṃ ca karmakārakaparīkṣādiṣu ātmopādānayoḥ parasparāpekṣikīṃ siddhiṃ bruvatā saṃvṛtyāpi pratiṣedho vihita eva /
uktaṃ ca /
yathādarśamupādāya svamukhapratibimbakam 		de'i mtshan nyid kyang smra bar byed pa yin te /
las dang byed pa po brtag pa la sogs pa dag tu bdag dang nye bar len pa gnyis phan tshun ltos pa'i grub pa yin par gsungs pa na kun rdzob tu yang de dag gi dgag pa mdzad pa nyid yin no /
ji ltar me long brten nas su /
dṛśyate nāma taccaiva na kiṃcidapi tattvataḥ rang bzhin gzugs brnyan snang mod kyi /
de ni yang dag nyid du na /
ahaṃkārastathā skandhānupādāyopalabhyate cung zad kyang ni yod min pa /
de bzhin phung po rnams brten nas /
na ca kaścitsa tattvena svamukhapratibimbavat /
yathādarśamanādāya svamukhapratibimbakam /
na dṛśyate tathā skandhānanādāyāhamityapi 		ngar 'dzin pa ni dmigs par 'gyur /
rang gi bzhin gyi gzugs brnyan bzhin /
yang dag tu na de 'ga' 'ang med /
ji ltar me long ma brten par /
evaṃvidhārthaśravaṇāddharmacakṣuravāptavān /
āryānandaḥ svayaṃ caiva bhikṣubhyo 'bhīkṣṇamuktavān 		rang bzhin gzugs brnyan mi snang ltar /
phung po rnams la ma brten par /
ngar 'dzin pa lang de dang 'dra /
iti /
ato na punastatpratipādanārthaṃ yatna ārabhyate /
upādāya prajñapyamāna eva avidyāviparyāsānugatānāmātmābhiniveśāspadabhūto mumukṣubhirvicāryate, yasyedaṃ skandhapañcakamupādānatvena pratibhāsate kimasau skandhalakṣaṇaḥ uta askandhalakṣaṇaḥ iti 		zhes gsungs so /
de'i phyir de bstan pa'i phyir yang 'bad pa mi brtsam mo /
brten nas btags pa ma rig pa'i phyin ci log dang ldan pa rnams bdag tu mngon par zhen pa'i gzhir gyur pa ni /
phung po lnga po 'di gang gi nye bar len pa nyid du snang ba 'di ci phung po'i mtshan nyid yod pa zhig gam /
sarvathā ca vicārayanto mumukṣavo nainamupalabhante bhāvasvabhāvataḥ /
tadā eṣām /
ātmanyasati cātmīyaṃ kuta eva bhaviṣyati /
ātmānupalambhādātmaprajñaptyupādānaṃ skandhapañcakamātmīyamiti sutarāṃ nopalabhante 		'on te phung po'i mtshan nyid med pa zhig ces thar pa 'dod pa rnams kyis rnam par dpyod pa yin no /
rnam pa thams cad du dpyad pa na thar pa 'dod pa rnams kyis ma dmigs pa de'i phyir de rnams la /
bdag nyid yod pa ma yin na /
bdag gi yod par ga la 'gyur /
bdag ma dmigs pa'i phyir bdag tu gdags pa'i rgyu phung po lnga po dngos po bdag gi ba yang shin tu ches dmigs par mi 'gyur ro /
yathaiva hi dagdhe rathe tadaṅgānyapi dagdhatvānnopalabhyante, evaṃ yogino yadaiva ātmanairātmyaṃ pratipadyante, tadaiva ātmīyaskandhavastunairātmyamapi niyataṃ pratipadyante ji ltar shing rta tshig na de'i yan lag kyang tshig pas mi dmigs pa de bzhin du rnal 'byor ba dag gis gang gi tshe bdag gi bdag med par rtogs pa de nyid kyi tshe phung po'i dngos po bdag gi ba yang bdag med par nges par rtogs par 'gyur ro /
yathoktaṃ ratnāvalyām /
ahaṃkārodbhavāḥ skandhāḥ so 'haṃkāro 'nṛto 'rthataḥ 		ji skad du /
ngar 'dzin las byung phung po rnams /
ngar 'dzin de ni don du brdzun /
bījaṃ yasyānṛtaṃ tasya prarohaḥ satyataḥ kutaḥ gang gi sa bon brdzun pa de'i /
skye ba bden pa ga la zhig /
skandhānasatyān dṛṣṭvaivamahaṃkāraḥ prahīyate phung po de ltar mi bden par /
mthong nas ngar 'dzin spong bar 'gyur /
ahaṃkāraprahāṇācca na punaḥ skandhasaṃbhavaḥ ngar 'dzin pa dag spangs nas ni /
phyis ni phung po 'byung mi 'gyur /
iti /
yathaiva hi grīṣme madhyāhnakālāvasānamāsāditasya vidhananabhomadhyadeśamācikraṃsorīṣatparibhramyamānapaṭutarahutabhugvitatasphuliṅgāniva virūkṣataramahīmaṇḍalottāpanaparān pradīptakiraṇasya kiraṇān pratītya virūkṣataramavanideśaṃ cāsādya viparītaṃ ca darśanamapekṣya salilākārā marīcaya upalabhyamānā vidūradeśāvasthitānāṃ janmavatāmatiprasannābhinīlajalākāraṃ pratyayamādadhati na tu tatsamīpagatānām, evamihāpi yathāvasthitātmātmīyapadārthatattvadarśanavidūradeśāntarasthitānāṃ saṃsārādhvani vartamānānāmavidyāviparyāsānugamānmṛṣārtha eva skandhasamāropaḥ satyataḥ pratibhāsamānaḥ padārthatattvadarśanasamīpasthānāṃ na pratibhāsate 		zhes bshad do /
ji ltar nyi ma so ga'i zla ba tha ma dang 'tsham pa /
nam mkha' sprin dang bral ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi phyogs gnon par byed cing cung zad nur bar gyur pa'i 'od zer me ches gsal ba'i me stag rgya chen po dang 'dra ba /
sa'i dkyil 'khor ches je rtsub tu gyur pa gdung bar byed pa lhur len pa dag la brten zhing sa phyogs ches ji rtsub tu gyur pa dang phrad de /
mthong ba phyin ci log la ltos nas chu dang 'dra ba'i smig rgyu dag dmigs pas skye bo yul thag ring ba na gnas pa rnams la shes pa chu shin tu dang ba'i rnam pa can skye bar byed kyi /
de dang nye bar gyur pa rnams la ma yin pa de bzhin du /
'dir yang /
ma rig pa'i phyin ci log dang ldan pas so so'i skye bo bdag dang bdag gi ba'i dngos po ji ltar gnas pa de nyid mthong ba las rgyang ring du gnas pa rnams la /
bden par snang ba bdag dang phung por sgro btags pa brdzun pa'i don 'di nyid ni dngos po'i de nyid mthong ba dang nye bar gnas pa rnams la mi snang ngo /
yathoktamācāryapādaiḥ /
dūrādālokitaṃ rūpamāsannairdṛśyate sphuṭam 		ji skad du /
thag ring nas ni mthong ba'i gzugs /
nye ba rnams kyis gsal bar mthong /
marīciryadi vāri syādāsannaiḥ kiṃ na gṛhyate smig rgyu gal te chu yin no /
nye ba rnams kyis cis mi mthong /
dūrībhūtairyathābhūto loko 'yaṃ dṛśyate yathā ji ltar ring ba rnams kyis ni /
'jig rten 'di ni yang dag mthong /
na dṛśyate tadāsannairānimitto marīcivat de ltar de dang nye rnams kyis /
mi mthong mtshan med smig rgyu bzhin /
marīcistoyasadṛśī yathā nāmbhona cārthataḥ ji ltar smig rgyu chu 'dra ba /
chu min dong du ma yin pa /
skandhāstathātmasadṛśā nātmāno nāpi te 'rthataḥ de bzhin phung po bdag 'dra ba /
de dag bdag min don du min /
iti /
ata eva ca ātmātmīyānupalambhātparamārthadarśanasamīpastho yogī niyataṃ bhavati 		zhes bshad do /
bdag dang bdag gi ma dmigs pa de nyid kyi phyir don dam ma mthong ba dang nye ba'i rnal 'byor pa ni nges par /
nirmamo nirahaṃkāraḥ śamādātmātmanīnayoḥ bdag dang bdag gi zhi ba'i phyir /
ngar 'dzin nga yir 'dzin med 'gyur /
ātmani hitamātmanīnam, skandhapañcakam, ātmīyamityarthaḥ bdag la phan pa ni bdag gi ste /
bdag gi ba'i phung po lnga zhes bya ba'i don to /
ātmano 'haṃkāraviṣayasya ātmanīnasya ca skandhādervastunaḥ mamakāraviṣayasya śamādanutpādādanupalambhānnirmamo nirahaṃkāraśca jāyate yogī bdag ste ngar 'dzin pa'i yul dang nga yir 'dzin pa'i yul bdag gi ba phung po la sogs pa'i dngos po zhi ba ste /
ma skyes shing ma dmigs pa'i phyir rnal 'byor pa ngar 'dzin pa dang nga yir 'dzin pa med par 'gyur ro /
nanu ca yo 'sāvevaṃ nirmamo nirahaṃkāraśca yogī bhavati, sa tāvadasti gal te 'ga' zhig de ltar ngar 'dzin pa dang nga yir 'dzin pa med par 'gyur pa rnal 'byor pa de re zhig yod pa ma yin nam /
sati ca tasmin siddha ātmā skandhāśceti naitadevam de yod na bdag dang phung po yang grub po zhe na /
de ni de ltar ma yin te /
yasmāt /
nirmamo nirahaṃkāro yaśca so 'pi na vidyate 		gang gi phyir /
ngar 'dzin nga yir 'dzin med gang /
de yang yod pa ma yin te /
nirmamaṃ nirahaṃkāraṃ yaḥ paśyati na paśyati ngar 'dzin nga yir 'dzin med par /
gang gis mthong bas mi mthong ngo /
ātmani skandheṣu ca sarvathānupalabhyamānasvarūpeṣu kutastadvayatirikto 'parapadārtho bhaviṣyati yo 'sau nirmamo nirahaṃkāraśceti bdag dang phung po dag rnam pa thams cad du mi dmigs pa'i rang gi ngo bo yin dang gang zhig ngar 'dzin pa dang nga yir 'dzin pa med par 'gyur ba de dag las tha dad pa'i dngos po gzhan yod par ga la 'gyur /
yastu evamasaṃvidyamānasvarūpaṃ nirmamaṃ nirahaṃkāraṃ ca paśyati, sa tattvaṃ na paśyatīti vijñeyam gang gis de ltar yod pa ma yin pa'i rang gi ngo bo ngar 'dzin pa dang nga yir 'dzin pa med par mthong ba des /
de kho na nyid mi mthong ngo zhes shes par bya'o /
yathoktaṃ bhagavatā ji skad du /
bcom ldan 'das kyis /
śūnyamādhyātmikaṃ paśya paśya śūnyaṃ bahirgatam nang gi bdag nyid stong par ltos /
phyi rol gyur pa'ang stong par ltos /
na vidyate so 'pi kaścidyo bhāvayati śūnyatām gang zhig stong nyid sgom byed pa /
de yang 'ga' zhig kyang yod min /
tathā /
yo 'pi ca cintayi śūnyaka dharmān so 'pi kumārgapapannaku bālaḥ 		zhes bya ba dang de bzhin du /
gang dag zhi zhing rab zhi'i chos sems pa'i /
byis pa de dag lam ngan zhugs pa yin /
akṣara kīrtita śūnyaka dharmāḥ te ca anakṣara akṣara uktāḥ chos rnams stong pa yi ge med pa yin /
de dag yi ge med par yi ges bstan /
śānta paśānta ya cintayi dharmān so 'pi ca cittu na jātu na bhūtaḥ gang dag zhi zhing rab zhi'i chos sems pa'i /
sems pa de yang nam yang 'byung ma yin /
cittavitarkiṇa sarvi papañcāḥ tasya acintiya budhyatha dharmān spros kun sems kyi rnam par rtog pa ste /
de phyir chos rnams bsam yas shes par gyis /
iti /
tathā /
skandha sabhāvatu śūnya vivikta bodhi sabhāvatu śūnya vivikta 		zhes bya ba dang de bzhin du /
phung po'i rang bzhin dben zhing stong pa nyid /
byang chub rang bzhin dben zhing stong pa nyid /
yo 'pi caretsa pi śūnyasabhāvo jñānavato na tu bālajanasya gang spyod de yang rang bzhin stong pa ste /
ye shes ldan pas shes kyi byis pas min /
iti /
tadevam /
mametyahamiti kṣīṇe bahirdhādhyātmameva ca 		zhes gsungs so /
de'i phyir de ltar /
nang dang phyi rol nyid dag la /
bdag dang bdag gi snyam zad na /
nirudhyata upādānaṃ tatkṣayājjanmanaḥ kṣayaḥ /
satkāyadṛṣṭimūlakāḥ satkāyadṛṣṭisamudayāḥ satkāyadṛṣṭihetukāḥ sarvakleśāḥ sūtre uktāḥ 		nye bar len pa 'gag 'gyur zhing /
de zad pas na skye ba zad /
nyon mongs pa thams cad ni 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i rtsa ba can no /
'jig tshogs la lta ba'i kun 'byung ba can no /
'jig tshogs la lta ba'i rgyu can no zhes mdo las gsungs la /
sā ca satkāyadṛṣṭirātmātmīyānupalambhātprahīyate, tatprahāṇācca kāmadṛṣṭiśīlavratātmavādopādānacatuṣṭayaṃ prahīyate, upādānakṣayācca janmanaḥ punarbhavalakṣaṇasya kṣayo bhavati /
yataśca ayaṃ janmanivṛttikramaḥ evaṃ vyavasthāpitaḥ, tasmāt /
karmakleśakṣayānmokṣaḥ 		'jig tshogs la lta ba de yang bdag dang bdag gi ma dmigs pas spong bar 'gyur zhing de spangs pas kyang 'dod pa nye bar len pa dang lta ba dang tshul khrims dang brtul zhugs dang bdag tu smra ba nye bar len pa zhes bya ba ste nye bar len pa bzhi spong bar 'gyur ro /
nye bar len pa zad pas ni yang srid pa'i mtshan nyid can skye ba zad par 'gyur ro; ;gang gi phyir skye ba ldog pa'i rim pa 'di de ltar rnam par gzhag pa de'i phyir /
las dang nyon mongs zad pas thar /
iti sthitam zhes bya bar gnas so /
upādāne hi kṣīṇe tatpratyayo bhavo na bhavati 'di ltar nye bar len pa zad na de'i rkyen can srid pa yang mi 'byung la /
bhave niruddhe kuto jātijarāmaraṇādikasya saṃbhava iti nye bar len pa dang srid pa 'gags na skye ba dang rga shi la sogs pa yod par ga la 'gyur te /
evaṃ karmakleśakṣayānmokṣo bhavatīti sthitam de ltar na las dang nyon mongs pa zad pas thar bar 'gyur ro zhes bya bar grub po /
karmakleśānāṃ tarhi kasya kṣayātparikṣaya iti vaktavyam 'o na ni las dang nyon mongs pa rnams gang zad pas zad par 'gyur brjod dgos so zhe na /
ucyate brjod pa /
karmakleśā vikalpataḥ las dang nyon mongs rnam rtog las /
te prapañcātprapañcastu śūnyatāyāṃ nirudhyate /
ayoniśo hi rūpādikaṃ vikalpayato bālapṛthagjanasya kleśa upajāyate rāgādikaḥ vakṣyati hi 		de dag spros las spros pa ni /
stong pa nyid kyis 'gag par 'gyur /
byis pa so so'i skye bo tshul bzhin ma yin par gzugs la sogs par rtog pa la ni 'dod chags la sogs pa'i nyon mongs pa skye bar 'gyur te /
saṃkalpaprabhavo rāgo dveṣo mohaśca kathyate 'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug rnams /
kun du rtog las 'byung bar gsungs /
śubhāśubhaviparyāsān saṃbhavanti pratītya hi sdug dang mi sdug phyin ci log /
brten pa nyid las kun du 'byung /
uktaṃ ca sūtre zhes 'chad par 'gyur ro /
kāma jānāmi te mūlaṃ saṃkalpātkila jāyase mdo las kyang 'dod pa khyod kyi rtsa ba ni /
shes te kun tu rtog las skye /
na tvāṃ saṃkalpayiṣyāmi tato me na bhaviṣyasi khyod la rtog par mi 'gyur ba /
de phyir nga la mi 'byung ngo /
iti /
evaṃ tāvat karmakleśā vikalpataḥ pravartante /
te ca vikalpāḥ anādimatsaṃsārābhyastād jñānajñeyavācyavācakakartṛkarmakaraṇakriyāghaṭapaṭamukuṭaratharūpavedanāstrīpuruṣalābhālābhasukhaduḥkhayaśo 'yaśonindāpraśaṃsādilakṣaṇādvicitrātprapañcādupajāyate 		zhes gsungs so /
de ltar re zhig las dang nyon mongs pa ni rnam par rtog pa las byung la /
rnam par rtog pa de dag kyang spros pa sna tshogs pa /
'khor ba thog ma med pa nas goms pa /
shes pa dang shes bya dang brjod bya dang rjod byed dang bum pa dang snam bu dang shing rta dang gzugs dang tshor ba dang skyes pa dang bud med dang rnyed pa dang ma rnyed pa dang bde ba dang sdug bsngal ba dang grags pa dang ma grags pa dang bstod pa dang smad pa la sogs pa'i mtshan nyid can las skye bar 'gyur ro /
sa cāyaṃ laukikaḥ prapañco niravaśeṣa śūnyatāyāṃ sarvasvabhāvaśūnyatādarśane sati nirudhyate 'jig rten pa'i spros pa de yang ma lus par stong pa nyid kyis te /
dngos po thams cad stong pa nyid du lta bas 'gag par 'gyur ro /
kathaṃ kṛtvā? yasmātsati hi vastunaṃ upalambhe syād yathoditaprapañcajālam ji ltar zhe na /
gang gi phyir dngos por dmigs pa yod na ni ji skad bshad pa'i spros pa yod par 'gyur gyi /
na hi anupalabhya vandhyāduhitaraṃ rūpalāvaṇyayauvanavatīṃ tadviṣayaṃ prapañcamavatārayanti rāgiṇaḥ /
na ca anavatārya prapañcaṃ tadviṣayamayoniśo vikalpamavatārayanti 		mo gsham gyi bu mo ma dmigs par ni chags pa can dag de'i yul can spros pa 'jug par mi byed do /
spros pa ma bcug par ni de'i yul can tshul bzhin ma yin par rnam par rtog pa 'jug par mi 'gyur ro /
na ca anavatārya kalpanājālam ahaṃmametyabhiniveśāt satkāyadṛṣṭimūlakān kleśagaṇānutpādayanti /
na ca anutpādya satkāyadṛṣṭayātmakān kleśagaṇān karmāṇi śubhāśubhāniñjyāni kurvanti /
