na ca akurvāṇāḥ karmāṇi jātijarāmaraṇaśokaparidevaduḥkhadaurmanasya[upāyāsādirūpaṃ] ekajālībhūtaṃ saṃsārakāntāramanubhavanti /
evaṃ yogino 'pi śūnyatādarśanāvasthā niravaśeṣaskandhadhātvāyatanāni svarūpato nopalabhante /
na ca anupalabhamānā vastusvarūpaṃ tadviṣayaṃ prapañcamavatārayanti /
na ca anavatārya tadviṣayaṃ prapañcaṃ vikalpamavatārayanti 		rnam par rtog pa ma bcug par yang nga dang nga yi zhes mngon par zhen pa las nyon mongs pa'i tshogs 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i rtsa ba can skyed par mi byed do /
nyon mongs pa'i tshogs 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i rtsa ba can ma bskyed par ni las dag byed par mi 'gyur la /
las dag mi byed pa rnams ni skye ba dang rga shi zhes bya ba'i 'khor ba nyams su myong bar yang mi 'gyur ro /
gang gi phyir de ltar stong pa nyid spros pa ma lus pa nye bar zhi ba'i mtshan nyid can la brten nas spros pa dang bral bar 'gyur zhing spros pa dang bral bas kyang rnam par rtog pa ldog cing /
na ca anavatārya vikalpam ahaṃmametyabhiniveśāt satkāyadṛṣṭimūlakaṃ kleśagaṇamutpādayanti /
na ca anutpādya satkāyadṛṣṭayādikaṃ kleśagaṇaṃ karmāṇi kurvanti /
na ca akurvāṇāḥ jātijarāmaraṇākhyaṃ saṃsāramanubhavanti /
tadevam aśeṣaprapañcopaśamaśivalakṣaṇāṃ śūnyatāmāgamya yasmādaśeṣakalpanājālaprapañcavigamo bhavati, prapañcavigamācca vikalpanivṛtiḥ, vikalpanivṛttyā ca aśeṣakarmakleśanivṛtti, karmakleśanivṛttyā ca janmanivṛttiḥ, tasmāt śūnyataiva sarvaprapañcanivṛttilakṣaṇatvānnirvāṇamityucyate yathoktaṃ śatake /
dharmaṃ samāsato 'hiṃsāṃ varṇayanti tathāgatāḥ /
śūnyatāmeva nirvāṇaṃ kevalaṃ tadihobhayam /
iti /
ācāryabhāvavivekastu śrāvakapratyekabuddhānāṃ yathoditaśūnyatādhigamamapratipadyamānaḥ evaṃ varṇayati /
aparotpannapratikṣaṇavinaśvarasaṃskārakalāpamātramanātmānātmīyamavalokayataḥ āryaśrāvakasyāpi ātmātmīyavastvabhāvād dharmamātramidaṃ jāyate mriyate ceti darśanamutpadyate /
ahaṃkāraviṣayo hyātmā, [tadabhāvāttasyāpyabhāvaḥ], tadabhāvādeva na kvacidādhyātmikaṃ bāhyaṃ vā vastu astīti mamakārānutpatteḥ nirmamo nirahaṃkāro 'hamiti na svarūpaviniścitirupajāyate, anyatra vyavahārasaṃketāt 		rnam par rtog pa log pas las dang nyon mongs pa ldog la /
las dang nyon mongs pa ldog pas skye ba ldog pa de'i phyir /
stong pa nyid kho na spros pa thams cad log pa'i mtshan nyid can yin pas mya ngan las 'das pa zhes bya'o /
ji skad du brgya pa las /
mdor na chos ni mi 'tshe bar /
de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis gsungs /
stong nyid mya ngan 'das pa ste /
'dir ni de gnyis 'ba' zhig go /
zhes bshad do /
slob dpon legs ldan byed ni nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas rnams la ji skad du bshad pa'i stong pa nyid rtogs pa yod par khong du ma chud nas /
ji skad du /
'phags pa nyan thos 'du byed kyi tshogs gzhan dang gzhan skye ba'i skad cig ma re re la 'jig pa'i dang can bdag dang bdag gi tha med pa la nges par lta ba la yang /
bdag ces bya ba'i dngos po med pa'i phyir skye ba dang 'jig pa 'di dag ni chos tsam du zad do zhes bya bar lta ba skye ste /
'di ltar bdag ni ngar 'dzin pa'i yul yin pas de med na de yang mi 'byung la /
de med pa kho na'i phyir 'ga' la yang nang dang phyi rol gyi dngos po med pas nga yir 'dzin pa med 'thad pa'i phyir /
tha snyad kyi brdar bya ba ma gtogs par /
nga la ni ngar 'dzin pa med cing nga yir 'dzin pa med do zhes bya bar rang gi ngo bo nges pa skye bar mi 'gyur na /
prāgeva ajātasarvasaṃskāradarśināṃ nirvikalpaprajñācāravihāriṇāṃ mahābodhisattvānāmiti /
ata āha 		byang chub sems dpa' chen po 'du byed skye ba med par lta ba rnam par mi rtog pa'i shes rab kyi spyod yul la gnas pa rnams la lta smos kyang ci dgos pas /
de'i phyir /
nirmamo nirahaṃkāro yaśca so 'pi na vidyate nga dang nga yir 'dzin med gang /
de yang yod pa ma yin te /
iti /
tadayamācāryo yathaivaṃvidhe viṣaye nācāryapādamatānuvartī tathā pratipāditaṃ madhyamakāvatāre /
dūraṃgamāyāṃ tu dhiyādhikaḥ 		zhes gsungs so /
zhes de skad du smra'o /
slob dpon 'di ji ltar rnam pa de lta bu'i yul la /
slob dpon gyi lugs kyi rjes su 'jug ba ma yin pa de ltar ni dbu ma la 'jug pa las /
ityatreti na punastaddūṣaṇe yatna āsthīyate ring du song bar de blo 'ang lhag par 'gyur zhes bya ba der bstan zin pas /
ata evoktaṃ bhagavatā āryāṣṭasāhasrikāyāṃ bhagavatyām yang de sun dbyung ba la 'bad bar mi bya'o /
de nyid kyi phyir bcom ldan 'das kyis /
śrāvakabodhimabhisaṃboddhukrāmena subhūte asyāmeva prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyam rab 'byor nyan thos kyi byang chub thob par 'dod pas kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid la bslab par bya'o /
pratyeka bodhimabhisaṃboddhukāmena subhūte asyāmeva prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyam rab 'byor rang sangs rgyas kyi byang chub thob par 'dod pas kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid la bslab par bya'o /
anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃboddhukāmena subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena asyāmeva prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyamityādi rab 'byor bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub thob par 'dod pas kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid la bslab par bya'o zhes rgya cher gsungs shing /
āha ca gzhan yang /
yo icchatī sugataśrāvaku haṃ bhaveyaṃ pratyekabuddhu bhavijā tatha dharmarājo gang dag bde gshegs nyan thos 'gyur bar bya snyam dang /
rang sangs rgyas dang de bzhin chos rgyal 'gyur 'dod pa /
imu kṣānti nāgatya na śakyati pāpuṇotuṃ yatha ārapāragamanīyaṃ atīradarśī bzod pa 'di la ma brten thob par mi 'gyur te /
dper na tshu rol pha rol 'gro ngogs mi mthong bzhin /
iti /
atrāha /
yadyevamādhyātmikabāhyavastvanupalambhādadhyātmaṃ bahiśca ahaṃmametikalpanājālānāmanutpādastattvamiti vyavasthāpitam, yattarhi etaduktaṃ bhagavatā /
ātmā hi ātmano nāthaḥ ko nu nāthaḥ paro bhavet 		zhes gsungs so /
'dir smras pa /
gal te de ltar nang dang phyi'i dngos po ma dmigs pa'i phyir nang dang phyi la nga dang nga'i snyam pa'i rtog pa rnams ma skyes pa de de kho na nyid yin no zhes rnam par gzhag na /
'o na bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di skad du /
bdag nyid bdag gi mgon yin gyi /
ātmanā hi sudāntena svargaṃ prāpnoti paṇḍitaḥ gzhan ni su zhig mgon du 'gyur /
bdag nyid legs par dul bas ni /
ātmā hi ātmano nāthaḥ ko nu nāthaḥ paro bhavet /
ātmā hi ātmanaḥ sākṣī kṛtasyāpakṛtasya ca /
tathā āryasamādhirāje /
kṛṣṇaśubhaṃ ca na naśyati karma ātmana kṛtva ca vedayitavyam /
no pi ca saṃkrama karmaphalasya no ca ahetuka pratyanubhoti /
iti vistaraḥ /
tatkathaṃ na virudhyata iti? ucyate 		mkhas pas mtho ris thob par 'gyur /
zhes bya ba dang de bzhin du /
gnag dang dkar po'i las ni 'jig mi 'gyur /
bdag gis byas pa myong bar 'gyur ba yin /
las dang 'bras bu 'pho bar 'gyur ba'ang min /
rgyu dang rkyen med par yang 'byung ba min /
zhes rgya cher gsungs pa de dang ji ltar mi 'gal /
idamapi kiṃ noktaṃ bhagavatā /
nāstīha sattva ātmā vā dharmāstvete sahetukāḥ 		brjod par bya ste /
'di na bdag gam sems can med /
chos 'di dag ni rgyu dang bcas /
iti? /
tathā hi /
rūpaṃ nātmā rūpavānnāpi cātmā rūpe nātmā nātmani rūpaṃ .... 		zhes bya ba dang de bzhin du /
bdag gzugs ma yin /
bdag gzugs dang ldan pa ma yin /
gzugs la bdag med /
bdag la gzugs med /
evaṃ yāvat vijñānaṃ nātmā, vijñānavānnātmā vijñāne nātmā nātmani vijñānam iti /
tathā 		de bzhin du bdag rnam par shes pa ma yin /
bdag rnam par shes pa dang ldan pa ma yin /
anātmānaḥ sarvadharmā iti rnam par shes pa la bdag med /
tatkathamidānīmanenāgamena pūrvakasyāgamasya virodho na syāt? tasmāddeśanābhiprāyo bhagavato 'nveṣyaḥ bdag la rnam par shes pa med ces bya ba'i bar dang de bzhin du chos thams cad ni bdag med pa'o zhes bya ba de skad du yang /
bcom ldan 'das kyis ci'i phyir ma gsungs /
sāmānyena tu bhagavadbhirbuddhaiḥ pravacane neyanītārthavistaraprabhede 'śeṣajagadvineyabuddhipadmākaravibodhana parairādityakalpairanastaṃgatairmahākaruṇopāyavijñānagabhastivistaraiḥ /
ātmetyapi prajñapitamanātmetyapi deśitam 		de'i phyir da ji ltar lung gong ma lung 'di dang 'gal bar mi 'gyur /
de'i phyir 'dir bcom ldan 'das kyis bstan pa'i dgongs pa btsal bar bya'o /
bcom ldan 'das kyis ni spyir gsung rab las /
bdag go zhes kyang btags gyur cing /
bdag med ces kyang bstan par gyur /
buddhairnātmā na cānātmā kaścidityapi deśitam /
atra cāyamabhiprāyaḥ 		sangs rgyas rnams kyis bdag dang ni /
bdag med 'ga' med ces kyang bstan /
'dir dgongs pa ni 'di yin te /
iha ye [ātmābhāvaviparyāsa] kudarśanadhanatimirapaṭalāvacchāditāśeṣabuddhinayanatayā laukikāvadātadarśanaviṣayānatikrāntamapi bhāvajātamapaśyanto vyavahārasatyāvasthitā eva santaḥ kṣitisalilajvalanapavanābhidhānatattvamātrānuvarṇanaparā mūlaudanodakakiṇvādidravyaviśeṣaparipākamātrapratyayotpannamadamurcchādisāmarthyaviśeṣānugatamadyapānopalambhavat kalalādimahābhūtaparipākamātrasaṃbhūtā eva buddhīranuvarṇayantaḥ pūrvāntāparāntāpavādapravṛttāḥ santaḥ paralokamātmānaṃ cāpavadante 'di na gang dag lta ba ngan pa'i rab rib kyi ling tog mthug bos blo'i mig ma lus par bkab pas dngos po'i rnam pa 'jig rten pa'i lta ba dri ma med pa'i yul las ma 'das kyang ma mthong bar gyur pa /
tha snyad kyi bden pa la gnas pa kho na yin bzhin du sa dang chu dang me dang rlung zhes bya ba'i de kho na nyid tsam gyi rjes su 'jug pa lhur len pa /
rtsa ba dang chan dang phabs dang chu dang drod la sogs pa rdzas kyi khyad par yongs su smin pa tsam gyi rkyen las byung zhing /
myos pa dang brgyal ba la sogs pa'i nus pa'i khyad par dang ldan pa'i chang dmigs pa ltar /
blo nur nur po la sogs pa'i 'byung ba chen po yongs su smin pa tsam las 'byung ba nyid du smra ba /
nāstyayaṃ lokaḥ, nāsti paralokaḥ, nāsti sukṛtaduṣkṛtānāṃ karmaṇāṃ phalavipākaḥ, nāsti sattva upapādukaḥ, ityādinā sngon gyi mtha' dang phyi ma'i mtha' la skur ba 'debs par zhugs pa /
'jig rten 'di yang med legs par byas pa dang nyes par byas pa'i las rnams kyi 'bras bu rnam par smin pa yang med /
tadapavādācca svargāpavargaviśiṣṭeṣṭaphalaviśeṣākṣepaparāṅmukhāḥ satatasamitamakuśalakarmābhisaṃskaraṇapravṛttā narakādimahāprapātapatanābhimukhāḥ sems can rdzus te skye ba yang med do zhes bya ba la sogs bas 'jig rten pha rol dang bdag la skur ba 'debs par byed pa /
de la skur ba 'debs pas 'bras bu khyad par du 'phags pa yid du 'ong ba mtho ris dang byang grol gyi khyad par 'phen pa la rgyab kyis phyogs pa /
teṣāṃ tadasadṛṣṭinivṛttyartha caturaśīticittacaritasahasrabhedabhinnasya sattvadhātoryathāśayānuvartakairaśeṣasattvadhātūttāraṇākṣiptapratijñāsaṃpādanatatparaiḥ prajñopāyamahākaruṇāsaṃbhārapuraḥ sarairnirupamairekajagadbandhubhirniravaśeṣakleśamahāvyādhicikitsakairmahāvaidyarājabhūtairhīnamadhyotkṛṣṭavineyajanānujidhṛkṣayā hīrnānāṃ vineyānāmakuśalakarmakāriṇāmakuśalādi nivartayituṃ buddhairbhagavadbhiḥ kvacidātmetyapi prajñapitaṃ loke vyavasthāpitam /
ahetuvādapratiṣedhopapattiśca karmakārakaparīkṣātaḥ, nāpyahetutaḥ ityataḥ, madhyamakāvatārācca vistareṇa veditavyeti tatpratiṣedhārtha neha punaryatna āsthīyate 		rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par mi dge ba'i las mngon par 'du byed pa la zhugs pas dmyal pa la sogs pa'i g yang sa chen por ltung ba la mngon du phyogs pa de dag gi yang dag pa ma yin pa'i lta ba de dag bzlog par bya zhing gdul bya dman pa dang 'bring po dang mchog rjes su gzung bar bzhed pas gdul bya dman pa sdig pa mi dge ba byed pa rnams mi dge ba las bzlog par bya ba'i phyir /
sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das spyod pa brgyad khri bzhi stong gi dbye bas tha dad pa'i sems can gyi khams kyi bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du rjes su gshegs pa /
sems can gyi khams ma lus pa bsgral bar thugs dam bcas pa /
sgrub pa lhur mdzad pa /
thabs dang mkhyen rab dang thugs rje chen po dang ldan pa /
'gro ba du ma'i dpe zla mi mnga' ba'i gnyen /
nyon mongs pa'i nad ma lus pa gso bar mdzad pa /
sman pa'i rgyal po chen po rnams kyis 'ga' zhig tu bdag go zhes kyang btags gyur zhing ste /
bzhag par gyur to /
rgyu med par smra ba dgag pa'i 'thad pa ni /
byed pa po dang las brtag pa dang rgyu med las kyang min zhes bya ba des dbu ma la 'jug pa las rgyas par shes par bya ste /
de dgag pa'i phyir 'dir yang 'bad par mi bya'o /
gang dag dge ba'i las byed cing mi dge ba'i las las log pa /
bdag tu yang dag par lta ba mkhregs pa bya srad bu ches shin tu ring bas brtod pa ltar shin tu ring por phyin yang khams gsum las shin tu 'das nas /
mya ngan las 'das pa'i grong khyer zhi bar 'gro mi nus pa /
ye tu sadbhūtātmadṛṣṭikaṭhinātidīrghaśithilamahāsūtrabaddhā vihaṃgamā iva sudūramapi gatāḥ kuśalakarmakāriṇo 'kuśalakarmapathavyāvṛttā api na śaknuvanti traidhātukabhavopapattimativāhya śivamajaramamaraṇaṃ nirvāṇapuramabhigantum, teṣāṃ madhyānāṃ vineyānāṃ satkāyadarśanābhiniveśaśithilīkaraṇāya nirvāṇābhilāṣasaṃjananārthaṃ buddhairbhagavadbhirvineyajanānugrahacikīrṣubhiranātmetyapi deśitam /
ye tu pūrvābhyāsaviśeṣānugatagambhīradharmādhimokṣalabdhabījaparipākāḥ pratyāsannavartini nirvāṇe teṣāmutkṛṣṭānāṃ vineyānāṃ vigatātmasnehānāṃ paramagambhīramaunīndrapravacanārthatattvāvagāhanasamarthānāmadhimuktiviśeṣamavadhārya 		gdul bya bar ma de dag 'jig tshogs la lta bar mngon par zhen pa lhod par bya ba'i phyir dang mya ngan las 'das pa la 'dun pa bskyed par bya ba'i phyir ni /
sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis bdag med ces kyang bstan par gyur to /
gang dag sngon goms pa'i khyad par gyis zab mo'i chos la lhag par mos pa rjes su 'brel pa'i sa bon yongs su smin par gyur pa thob pa mya ngan las 'das pa la nye bar gnas pa bdag la chags pa dang bral ba /
thub pa'i dbang po'i gsung rab kyi don gyi de kho na nyid mchog tu zab pa'i gting dpog par nus pa /
gdul bya mchog tu gyur pa de dag la ni lhag par mos pa'i khyad par nges par bzung nas /
buddhairātmā na cānātmā kaścidityapi deśitam sangs rgyas rnams kyis bdag dang ni /
bdag med 'ga' med ces kyang bstan te /
yathaiva hi ātmadarśanamatattvam, evaṃ tatpratipakṣabhūtamapi anātmadarśanaṃ naiva tattvamiti /
evaṃ nāstyātmā kaścit, na cāpyanātmā kaścidastīti deśitam /
yathoktamāryaratnakūṭe /
ātmeti kāśyapa ayameko 'ntaḥ /
nairātmyamityayaṃ dvitīyo 'ntaḥ 		ji ltar bdag tu lta ba yang dag pa ma yin pa de bzhin du /
de'i gnyen por gyur pa bdag med par lta ba yang /
yang dag pa ma yin pa nyid do /
de ltar na bdag 'ga' yang med la /
bdag med pa yang 'ga' yang med do zhes bstan pa yin no /
ji skad du mdo las /
'od srungs bdag ces bya ba 'di ni mtha' gcig go /
bdag med ces bya ba 'di ni mtha' gnyis so /
yadetadanayorantayormadhyaṃ tadarūpyamanidarśanamapratiṣṭhamanābhāsamavijñaptikamaniketam mtha' de gnyis kyi dbus gang yin pa de ni gzugs med pa bstan du med pa /
rten med pa /
snang ba med pa /
rnam par rig pa med pa /
iyamucyate gnas med pa ste /
kāśyapa madhyamā pratipada dharmāṇāṃ bhūtapratyavekṣā iti /
uktaṃ cāryaratnāvalyām 		'od srungs 'di ni dbu ma'i lam chos rnams la yang dag par so sor rtogs pa zhes bya'o zhes gsungs so /
'phags pa rin po che'i phreng ba las kyang /
naivamātmā na cānātmā yathābhūtena labhyate de ltar bdag dang bdag med pa /
yang dag ji bzhin dmigs su med /
ātmānātmakṛte dṛṣṭī vavārāsmānmahāmuniḥ bdag dang bdag med lta ba ni /
de phyir thub pa chen pos bzlog /
dṛṣṭaśrutādyaṃ muninā na satyaṃ na mṛṣoditam mthong dang thos sogs thub pa yis /
bden min brdzun pa min par gsungs /
pakṣāddhi pratipakṣaḥ syādubhayaṃ tacca nārthataḥ phyogs las mi mthun phyogs gyur pas /
de dag gnyi ga don du min /
iti /
yataścaivaṃ hīnamadhyotkṛṣṭavineyajanāśayanānātvena ātmānātmatadubhayapratiṣedhena buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ dharmadeśanā pravṛttā, tasmānnāsti āgamabādho mādhyamikānām 		zhes gsungs so /
gang gi phyir de ltar gdul bya'i skye bo dman pa dang bar ma dang mchog gi bsam pa tha dad pa nyid kyis bdag dang bdag med pa dang de gnyi ga dgag pa'i sgo nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi chos bstan pa 'jug pa de'i phyir /
dbu ma pa rnams la lung gis gnod pa med do /
ata evoktamāryadevapādaiḥ de nyid kyi phyir slob dpon 'phags pa'i lhas /
vāraṇaṃ prāgapuṇyasya madhye vāraṇamātmanaḥ bsod nams min pa dang por bzlog /
bar du bdag ni bzlog pa dang /
sarvasya vāraṇaṃ paścādyo jānīte sa buddhimān phyi nas lta zhig kun bzlog pa /
gang gis shes te mkhas pa yin /
iti /
tathā ācāryapādairuktam 		zhes bshad do /
de bzhin du /
yathaiva vaiyākaraṇo mātṛkāmapi pāṭhayet /
buddho 'vadattathā dharma vineyānāṃ yathākṣamam /
keṣāṃcidavadaddharmaṃ pāpebhyo vinivṛttaye /
keṣāṃcitpuṇyasiddhayarthaṃ keṣāṃcid dvayaniścitam /
dvayāniśritamekeṣāṃ gambhīraṃ bhīrubhīṣaṇam /
śūnyatākaruṇāgarbhaṃ keṣāṃcid bodhisādhanam /
iti /
athavā /
ayamanyo 'rthaḥ /
ātmetyapi prajñapitaṃ sāṃkhyādibhiḥ pratikṣaṇavinaśvarāṇāṃ saṃskārāṇāṃ karmaphalasaṃbandhābhāvamutprekṣya /
anātmetyapi prajñapitaṃ lokāyatikaiḥ upapattyā ātmānaṃ saṃsartāramapaśyadbhiḥ /
etāvāneva puruṣo yāvānindriyagocaraḥ /
bhadre vṛkapadaṃ hyetad yadvadanti bahuśrutāḥ /
ityādinā /
taimirikopalabdhakeśamaśakādiṣviva vitaimirikairiva bālajanaparikalpitātmānātmādivastusvarūpaṃ sarvathaivāpaśyadbhiḥ /
buddhairnātmā na cānātmā kaścidityapi deśitam /
yathoktamāryatathāgataguhyasūtre /
atha khalu śāntamatirbodhisattvo bhagavantametadavocat /
upaśama upaśama iti bhagavannucyate, ka eṣa upaśamo nāma? kasya copaśamādupaśama ityucyate? bhagavānāha /
upaśama iti kulaputra ucyate, kleśopaśamasyaitadadhivacanam /
kleśopaśama iti saṃkalpavikalpaparikalpopaśamasyaitadadhivacanam /
saṃkalpavikalpaparikalpopaśama iti saṃjñāmanasikāropaśamasyaitadadhivacanam /
saṃjñāmanasikāropaśama iti viparyāsopaśamasyaitadadhivacanam /
viparyāsopaśama iti hetvārambaṇopaśamasyaitadadhivacanam /
hetvārambaṇopaśama iti avidyābhavatṛṣṇopaśamasyaitadadhivacanam /
avidyābhavatṛṣṇopaśama iti ahaṃkāramamakāropaśamasyaitadadhivacanam /
ahaṃkāramamakāropaśama iti ucchedaśāśvatadṛṣṭayupaśamasyaitadadhivacanam /
ucchedaśāśvatadṛṣṭayupaśama iti satkāyadṛṣṭayupaśamasyaitadadhivacanam iti śāntamate ye kecidārambaṇahetudṛṣṭisaṃyuktāḥ saṃkleśāḥ pravartante, sarve te satkāyadṛṣṭerutpadyante, satkāyadṛṣṭayupaśamātsarvadṛṣṭayupaśama iti /
sarvadṛṣṭayupaśamātsarvapraṇidhānopaśama iti /
sarvaprāṇi dhānopaśamātsarvakleśopaśamaḥ /
tadyathāpi nāma śāntamate vṛkṣasya mūle chinne sarvaśākhāpatraphalāni śuṣyanti, evameva śāntamate satkāyadṛṣṭayupaśamātsarvakleśā upaśāmyante /
satkāyadṛṣṭau śāntamate aparijñātāyāṃ sarvopādānopakleśā utpadyante /
satkāyadṛṣṭiparijñāto 'pi sarvopādānopakleśā notpadyante na bādhante /
śāntamatirāha /
kā punarbhagavan satkāyadṛṣṭiparijñā? bhagavānāha /
ātmāsamutthānaṃ śāntamate satkāyadṛṣṭiparijñā sattvāsamutthānaṃ jivāsamutthānaṃ pudgalāsamutthānaṃ dṛṣṭayasamutthānaṃ satkāyadṛṣṭiparijñā na khalu punaḥ śāntamate sā dṛṣṭiradhyātmaṃ pratiṣṭhitā, na bahirdhā pratiṣṭhitā /
sā dṛṣṭiḥ sarvato 'pratiṣṭhitā /
yattasyā apratiṣṭhitāyā dṛṣṭerapratiṣṭhiteti jñānam, iyaṃ śāntamate satkāyadṛṣṭiparijñā /
satkāyadṛṣṭiparijñeti śāntamate śunyatāyā etadadhivacanam /
yacchūnyatānulomikyā kṣāntyā tāṃ dṛṣṭi nodgṛhṇāti, iyamapi śāntamate satkāyadṛṣṭiparijñā /
satkāya iti śāntamate śūnyatānimittāpraṇihitānabhisaṃskārājātānutpādadṛṣṭayā tāṃ dṛṣṭiṃ nodgṛhṇāti, iyamapi śāntamate satkāyadṛṣṭiparijñā /
satkāya iti śāntamate akāya eṣaḥ, na kasati na vikasati na cinoti nopacinoti, ādita eva tadabhūtaṃ parikalpitam /
yacca abhūtaṃ parikalpitam, tanna parikalpitaṃ na parikalpyate na vikalpyate, tanna kriyate na viṭhapyate, notthāpyate nādhyavasyate /
taducyate upaśama iti /
śāntamatirāha /
upaśānta upaśānta iti bhagavannucyate, kasyopaśamādupaśānta ityucyate /
bhagavānāha /
ārambaṇataḥ śāntamate cittaṃ jvalati /
yanna bhūya ālambanīkaroti tanna jvalati, ajvalan upaśānta ityucyate /
tadyathāpi nāma śāntamate agnirupādānato jvalati, anupādānataḥ śāmyati, evameva ālambanataścittaṃ jvalati anālambanataḥ śāmyati /
tatra śāntamate upāyakuśalo 'yaṃ bodhisattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāpariśuddhaḥ ālambanasamatāṃ ca prajānāti, kuśalamūlālambanaṃ ca śamayati /
ityādi /
atrāha /
yadi buddhairbhagavadbhirnātmeti deśitam, nānātmeti, kiṃ tarhi deśitamiti? ucyate /
nivṛttamabhidhātavyaṃ nivṛtte cittagocare /
anutpannāniruddhā hi nirvāṇamiva dharmatā /
iha yadi kiṃcidabhidhātavyaṃ vastu syāt, taddeśyeta /
yadā tu abhidhātavyaṃ nivṛttam, vācāṃ viṣayo nāsti, tadā kiṃcidapi naiva deśyate buddhaiḥ /
kasmātpunarabhidhātavyaṃ nāstītyāha /
nivṛtte cittagocare iti /
cittasya gocaraḥ cittagocaraḥ /
gocaro viṣayaḥ /
ārambaṇamityarthaḥ /
yadi cittasya kaścid gocaraḥ syāt, tatra kiṃcinnimittamadhyāropya syād vācāṃ pravṛttiḥ /
yadā tu cittasya viṣaya evānupapannaḥ, tadā kva nimittādhyāropaḥ, yena vācāṃ pravṛttiḥ syāt? kasmāt punaścittaviṣayo nāstīti pratipādayannāha /
anutpannāniruddhā hi nirvāṇamiva dharmatā /
yasmādanutpannāniruddhā nirvāṇamiva dharmatā dharmasvabhāvaḥ dharmaprakṛtiḥ vyavasthāpitā, tasmānna tatra cittaṃ pravartate /
cittasyāpravṛttau ca kuto nimittādhyāropaḥ? tadabhāvāt kuto vācāṃ pravṛttiḥ? ataśca na kiṃcid buddhairbhagavadbhirdeśitamiti sthitamavikalam /
ata eva ca vakṣyati /
sarvopalambhopaśamaḥ prapañcopaśamaḥ śivaḥ /
na kvacitkasyacitkaściddharmo buddhena deśitaḥ /
iti /
evaṃ caitat /
athavā /
ayamanyaḥ pūrvapakṣaḥ /
yaduktaṃ prapañcaḥ śūnyatāyāṃ nirudhyate iti, kathaṃ punaḥ prapañcasya śūnyatāyāṃ nirodha iti? ucyate /
yasmānnivṛttamabhidhātavyamityādi pūrvavad vyākhyeyam /
athavā yadetaduktaṃ prāgādhyātmikabāhyavastvanupalambhena adhyātmaṃ bahiśca yaḥ sarvadā ahaṃkāramamakāraparikṣayaḥ, idamatra tattvamiti /
kīdṛśaṃ tat kiṃvat, vaktuṃ vā śakyate, tasmāt /
nivṛttamabhidhātavyaṃ nivṛtte cittagocare /
tatra tattvataḥ iti vākyaśeṣaḥ /
kiṃ punaḥ kāraṇaṃ tatra tattve nivṛttamabhidhātavyaṃ nivṛtte cittagocare ityāha /
anutpannāniruddhā hi nirvāṇamiva dharmatā /
iti pūrvakameva vyākhyānaṃ yojyam /
ata evoktamāryatathāgataguhyasūtre /
yāṃ ca śāntamate rātriṃ tathāgato 'nuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbuddhaḥ, yāṃ ca rātrimanupādāya parinirvāsyati, asminnantare tathāgatena ekākṣaramapi nodāhṛtaṃ na pravyāhṛtaṃ na pravyāhariṣyati /
kathaṃ tarhi bhagavatā sakalasurāsuranarakiṃnarasiddhavidyādharoragaprabhṛtivineyajanebhyo vividhaprakārebhyo dharmadeśanā deśitā? ekakṣaṇavāgudāhāreṇaiva tattajjanamanastamoharaṇī bahuvidhabuddhinalinīvanavibodhinī jarāmaraṇasaritsāgarocchoṣiṇī kalpakālānalasaptārkaraśmivisarahrepiṇī śaradaruṇamahāprabheti /
tadevaṃ sūtre /
yathā yantrakṛtaṃ tūryaṃ vādyate pavaneritam /
na cātra vādakaḥ kaścinniścarantyatha ca svarāḥ /
evaṃ pūrvasuśuddhatvātsarvasattvāśayeritā /
vāgniścarati buddhasya na cāsyāstīha kalpanā /
pratiśrutkādayaḥ śabdā nādhyātmaṃ na bahiḥ sthitāḥ /
vāgapyevaṃ narendrasya nādhyātmaṃ na bahiḥ sthitāḥ /
iti /
tathā /
devata codani dundubhi divya karmavipāka nivṛtta marūṇaṃ /
deva pamattavihāriṇa ñātvā dundubhighoṣa pamuñci nabhāto /
sarva anitya aśāśvata kāmā itvara adhruva phenasabhāvāḥ /
māyamarīcisamā dakacandrāḥ sarvi bhavāḥ supināntasabhāvāḥ /
dundubhi vādita śakramarudbhiḥ sārddhaya saṃkrami dharmasabhāyām /
dharmakathāṃ pakaroti marūṇāṃ yā katha śānta virāganukūlā /
tathā āryasamādhirāje /
buddho yadā bheṣyati dharmarājaḥ sarvāṇa dharmāṇa pakāśako muniḥ /
tṛṇagulmavṛkṣauṣadhi śaila parvata abhāva dharmāṇa ravo bhaviṣyati /
yāvanti śabdāstahi lokadhātau sarve hyabhāvā na hi kaści bhāvaḥ /
tāvantu kho tasya tathāgatasya svaru niścarī lokavināyakasya /
iti vistaraḥ /
tathā /
ekasvarā tu tava lokahito nānādhimukti svaru niścarati /
ekaikamanvimamabhāṣi jino brūhi smitaṃ prakṛtakasya kṛte /
iti /
atraike paricodayanti /
nāstikāviśiṣṭā mādhyamikāḥ, yasmāt kuśalākuśalaṃ karma kartāraṃ ca phalaṃ ca sarvaṃ ca lokaṃ bhāvasvabhāvaśūnyamiti bruvate /
nāstikā api hi etannāstīti bruvate /
tasmānnāstikāviśiṣṭā mādhyamikā iti /
naivam /
kutaḥ? pratītyasamutpādavādino hi mādhyamikāḥ hetupratyayān prāpya pratītya samutpannatvāt sarvameva ihalokaparalokaṃ niḥsvabhāvaṃ varṇayanti /
yathāsvarūpavādino naiva nāstikāḥ pratītyasamutpannatvād bhāvasvabhāvaśunyatvena na paralokādyabhāvaṃ pratipannāḥ /
kiṃ tarhi aihalaukikaṃ vastujātamupalabhya svabhāvataḥ tasya paralokādihāgamanam, ihalokācca paralokagamanapaśyantuḥ ihalokopalabdhapadārthasadṛśapadārthāntarāpavādaṃ kurvanti /
tathāpi vastusvarūpeṇa avidyamānasyaiva te nāstitvaṃ pratipannāḥ ityamunā tāvaddarśanena sāmyamastīti cet, na hi /
kutaḥ? saṃvṛtyā mādhyamikairastitvenābhyupagamānna tulyatā /
vastutastulyateti cet, yadyapi vastuto 'siddhistulyā, tathāpi pratipatṛbhedādatulyatā /
yathā hi kṛtacaurya puruṣamekaḥ samyagaparijñāyaiva tadamitrapreritaḥ taṃ mithyā vyācaṣṭe cauryamanena kṛtamiti, aparastu sākṣād dṛṣṭvā dūṣayati, tatra yadyapi vastuto nāsti bhedaḥ, tathāpi parijñātṛbhedādekastatra mṛṣāvādītyucyate, aparastu satyavādīti, ekaśca ayaśasā ca apuṇyena ca samyak parīkṣyamāṇo yujyate nāparaḥ, evamihāpi yathāvadviditavastusvarūpāṇāṃ mādhyamikānāṃ bruvatāmavagacchatāṃ ca vastusvarūpābhede 'pi yathāvadaviditavastusvarūpairnāstikaiḥ saha jñānābhidhānayornāsti sāmyam /
yathaiva hi upekṣāsāmānye 'pi apratisaṃkhyāya pratisaṃkhyāya upekṣakayoriva pṛthagjanārhatoḥ jātyandhacakṣuṣmatośca viṣamaprapātapradeśaviniścitasāmānye 'pi yathāsti mahān viśeṣaḥ, tathā nāstikānāṃ mādhyamikānāṃ ca viśeṣo bhaviṣyatīti pūrvācāryāḥ /
ityalaṃ prasaṅgenaḥ prakṛtameva vyākhyāsyāmaḥ /
atrāha /
yadyapi evam /
anutpannāniruddhā hi nirvāṇamiva dharmatā /
tasyāṃ ca nāsti vākcittayoḥ pravṛttiḥ, tathāpi naivāsau adeśyamānā śakyā janairvijñātumiti avaśyaṃ tasyāmavatāraṇārthaṃ vineyajanānāṃ saṃvṛtisatyāpekṣayā kadāciddeśanānupūrvyā bhavitavyam, ityataḥ sā kathyatāmiti /
ucyate /
iyamatra buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ tattvāmṛtāvatāradeśanānupūrvī vijñeyā, yaduta /
sarvaṃ tathyaṃ na vā tathyaṃ tathyaṃ cātathyameva ca /
naivātathyaṃ naiva tathyametadbuddhānuśāsanam /
tatra /
yadyadyasya priyaṃ pūrvaṃ tattattasya samācaret /
na hi pratihataḥ pātraṃ saddharmasya kathaṃcana /
iti /
tathā ca bhagavatoktam /
loko mayā sārdhaṃ vivadati /
nāhaṃ lokena sārdhaṃ vivadāmi /
yalloke 'sti saṃmatam, tanmamāpyasti saṃmatam /
yalloke nāsti saṃmatam, mamāpi tannāsti saṃmatam /
ityāgamācca /
nānyayā bhāṣayā mlecchaḥ śakyo grāhayituṃ yathā /
na laukikamṛte lokaḥ śakyo grāhayituṃ tathā /
ityādita eva tāvadbhagavatā svaprasiddhapadārthamedasvarūpavibhāgaśravaṇasaṃjātābhilāṣasya vineyajanasya yadetat skandhadhātvāyatanādikamavidyātaimirikaiḥ satyataḥ parikalpitamupalabdham, tadeva tāvat satyamityupavarṇitaṃ bhagavatā taddarśanāpekṣayā, ātmani lokasya gauravotpādanārtham /
viditaniravaśeṣalokavṛttānto 'yaṃ bhagavān sarvajñaḥ sarvadarśī, yaḥ evaṃ bhavāgraparyantasya vāyumaṇḍalāderākāśadhātuparyavasānasya bhājanalokasya sattvalokasya ca aviparītaṃ sthityutpādapralayādikaṃ sātivicitraprabhedaṃ sahetukaṃ saphalaṃ sāsvādaṃ sādīnavaṃ copadiṣṭavāniti /
tadevaṃ bhagavati utpannasarvajñabuddhivineyajanasya uttarakālaṃ tadeva sarvaṃ na vā tathyamityupadeśitam /
tatra tathyaṃ nāma yasya anyathātvaṃ nāsti /
vidyate ca pratikṣaṇavināśitvāt saṃskārāṇāmanyathābhāvaḥ, tasmādanyathābhāvasadbhāvānna vā tathyam /
vāśabdaścakārārtho deśanāsamuccaye draṣṭavyaḥ /
sarvaṃ tathyaṃ na ca tathyamiti /
keṣāṃcit sarvametat tathyaṃ ca atathyaṃ ceti deśitam /
tatra bālajanāpekṣayā sarvametat tathyam /
āryajñānāpekṣayā tu sarvametanmṛṣā, tairevamanupalambhāditi /
keṣāṃcittu aticirābhyastatattvadarśanānāṃ kiṃcinmātrānutkhātāvaraṇatarūmūlānāṃ naivātathyaṃ naiva tathyaṃtaditi deśitam 		slob dpon gyi zhal snga nas kyang /
brda sprod pa dag ji lta bur /
yi ge'i phyi mo 'ang klog 'jug ltar /
de bzhin sangs rgyas gdul bya la /
ji tsam bzod pa'i chos ston to /
kha cig la ni sdig pa las /
rnam par bzlog phyir chos ston to /
kha cig bsod nams grub bya'i phyir /
kha cig la ni gnyis brten pa /
kha cig la ni gnyis mi brten /
zab mo khu 'phrig can 'jigs pa /
stong nyid snying rje'i snying po can /
byang chub sgrub pa kha cig la'o /
zhes gsungs so /
yang na 'di'i don gzhan yin te /
'du byed skad cig re re la 'jig pa'i ngang can rnams la las dang 'bras bu'i 'brel pa med par bltas nas grangs can pa la sogs pa dag gis bdag go zhes kyang btags gyur zhing /
'thad pas 'khor ba po bdag ma mthong zhing 'jig rten rgyang pan pa dag gis /
ji tsam dbang po'i spyod yul ba /
skyes bu'ang de tsam nyid du zad /
bzang mo mang thos gang smra ba /
de dag spyang ki'i rjes dang 'dra /
zhes bya ba la sogs pas bdag med ces kyang bstan par 'gyur la /
rab rib can gyis dmigs pa'i skra shad dag la rab rib med pa dag ltar dngos po byis pa'i skye bos btags pa'i /
bdag dang bdag med pa la sogs pa rang gi ngo bo rnam pa thams cad du ma gzigs pa /
bcom ldan 'das /
sangs rgyas rnams kyis bdag dang ni /
bdag med 'ga' med ces kyang bstan /
zhes bya ba'o /
'dir smras pa /
gal te sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis bdag dang bdag med pa gnyi ga med par bstan na /
de gnyis ma bstan pa yin dang 'o na ci bstan /
brjod par bya ste /
brjod par bya ba bzlog pa ste /
sems kyi spyod yul bzlog pas so /
ma skyes pa dang ma 'gags pa /
chos nyid mya ngan 'das dang mtshungs /
'dir brjod par bya ba 'ga' zhig yod na ni /
de ston par 'gyur ba zhig na /
gang gi tshe brjod par bya ba ldog cing /
tshig dag gi yul yod pa ma yin pa de'i tshe sangs rgyas rnams kyis cung zad kyang ma bstan to /
yang ci'i phyir brjod par bya ba med ce na /
sems kyi spyod yul ldog pas so zhes gsungs te /
sems kyi spyod yul ni sems kyi spyod yul lo /
spyod yul ni yul te /
dmigs pa zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go /
gal te sems kyi spyod yul 'ga' zhig yod par gyur na ni der rgyu mtshan 'ga' zhig sgro btags nas tshig dag 'jug par 'gyur na /
gang gi tshe sems kyi spyod yul nyid mi 'thad pa de'i tshe /
rgyu mtshan sgro btags nas tshig gar 'jug par 'gyur /
yang ci'i phyir sems kyi spyod yul med ce na /
bstan pa'i phyir /
ma skyes pa dang ma 'gags pa /
chos nyid mya ngan 'das dang mtshungs /
zhes gsungs te /
gang gi phyir ma skyes pa dang ma 'gags pa chos nyid de chos kyi ngo bo dang chos kyi rang bzhin mya ngan las 'das pa dang mtshungs par gzhag pa de'i phyir de la sems mi 'jug go /
sems mi 'jug na rgyu mtshan sgro 'dogs par ga la 'gyur la /
de med pa'i phyir tshig dag 'jug par ga la 'gyur te /
de'i phyir sangs rgyas rnams kyis cung zad kyang ma bstan to zhes bya bar gnas so /
de nyid kyi phyir /
dmigs pa thams cad nyer zhi zhing /
spros pa nye bar zhi ba ste /
sangs rgyas rnams kyis gang du yang /
su la'ang chos 'ga' ma bstan to /
zhes 'chad par 'gyur ro /
'di ni de ltar ma yin pa'am /
yang na phyogs snga ma 'di ni gzhan yin te /
spros pa ni /
stong pa nyid kyis 'gag par 'gyur /
zhes gang smras na /
ji ltar spros pa stong pa nyid kyis 'gag par 'gyur zhe na /
brjod pa /
gang gi phyir /
brjod par bya ba bzlog pa ste /
sems kyi spyod yul ldog pas so /
zhes bya ba la sogs pa ste /
snga ma bzhin du bshad par bya'o /
rnam pa gcig tu na 'di skad du /
sngar nang dang phyi'i dngos po ma dmigs pas nang dang phyi rol la ngar 'dzin pa dang nga yir 'dzin pa zad pa gang yin pa de ni 'dir de kho na nyid yin no zhes gang bshad na /
de ci 'dra ba zhig yin zhing /
ci de brjod pa'am shes par bya bar nus sam zhe na /
'di ltar /
brjod par bya ba ldog pa ste /
sems kyi spyod yul ldog pas so /
de kho na nyid de la zhes bya ba ni tshig gi lhag ma'o /
yang rgyu ci'i phyir de kho na nyid de brjod par bya ba ldog cing sems kyi spyod yul ldog par 'gyur zhe na /
ma skyes pa dang ma 'gags pa /
chos nyid mya ngan 'das dang mtshungs /
zhes gsungs te /
bshad pa ni snga ma kho na sbyar bar bya'o /
de nyid kyi phyir mdo las /
zhi ba'i blo gros gang gi nub mo de bzhin gshegs pa bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa dang gang gi nub mo len pa mi mnga' bar yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gyur ba de'i bar du de bzhin gshegs pas tha na yi ge 'bru gcig kyang ma gsungs so; ;gsung bar mi 'gyur ro zhes gsungs so /
'khrul 'khor las byas sil snyan ni /
ji ltar rlung bskul sgra 'byung ba /
de la dkrol byed med mod kyi /
'on kyang sgra dag 'byung 'gyur ba /
de bzhin legs par sngar sbyangs shing /
sems can bsam pas bskul gyur pa /
sangs rgyas gsung ni 'byung 'gyur yang /
'di la rtog pa yod mi mnga' /
ji ltar brag ca'i sgra nang dang /
phyi rol gnas pa ma yin pa /
de bzhin mi yi dbang po'i gsung /
nang dang phyi rol gnas pa yin /
zhes bya ba la sogs pa 'byung ngo /
'dir kha cig dbu ma pa ni med pa pa dang khyad par med pa yin te /
gang gi phyir dge ba dang mi dge ba'i las dang byed pa po dang 'bras bu dang 'jig rten thams cad rang bzhin gyis stong par smra ba yin la /
med pa pa dag kyang de dag med do zhes smra bar byed pa yin pa de'i phyir /
dbu ma pa ni med pa pa dang khyad par med do zhes rgol par byed do /
de ltar ni ma yin te /
dbu ma pa dag ni rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba smra ba yin la /
rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'i phyir 'jig rten 'di dang 'jig rten pha rol la sogs pa thams cad rang bzhin med par smra bar byed do /
med pa pa dag gis ni de ltar rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba yin pa'i phyir rang bzhin gyis stong pa nyid kyi sgo nas 'jig rten pha rol la sogs pa dngos po med par rtog pa ma yin te /
'o na ci zhe na /
'jig rten 'di'i dngos po'i rnam pa rang bzhin gyis dmigs nas de 'jig rten pha rol nas 'dir 'ong ba dang 'jig rten 'di nas 'jig rten pha rol du 'gro bar ma mthong nas 'jig rten 'dir dmigs pa'i dngos po dang 'dra ba'i dngos po gzhan la skur pa 'debs par byed pa yin no /
gal te de lta na yang de dag gis dngos po'i rang gi ngo bor yod pa ma yin pa nyid la med pa nyid du rtog pa'i phyir re zhig lta ba 'di'i sgo nas mtshungs pa yod do zhe na /
med de /
dbu ma pa dag gis ni kun rdzob tu yod par khas blangs pa'i phyir la /
de dag gis khas ma blangs pa'i phyir mi mtshungs pa nyid do /
gal te dngos po ma grub par mtshungs so zhe na /
gal te yang dngos po ma grub pa mtshungs pa nyid yin pa de lta na yang rtogs pa po tha dad pas mi mtshungs pa nyid do /
'di ltar dper na rku byas pa'i mi zhig la /
gcig gis ni yang dag par mi shes bzhin du de dang mi mdza' bas sbud nas 'dis brkus so zhes de la log par smra bar byed la /
gzhan ni dngos su mthong nas sun 'byin par byed do /
de la dngos po tha dad pa med mod kyang de lta na yang /
rtogs pa po tha dad pas gcig la ni der brdzun du smra'o zhes brjod la /
gzhan la ni bden par smra'o zhes bya'o /
gcig la ni yang dag par brtags pa na grags pa ma yin pa dang kha na ma tho bar 'gyur la /
gzhan la ni ma yin pa de bzhin du 'dir yang dngos po'i rang gi ngo bo tha mi dad kyang dbu ma pa dngos po'i rang gi ngo bo ji lta ba bzhin rig pa rnams khong du chud pa dang smra ba na /
med pa pa dngos po'i rang gi ngo bo ji lta ba bzhin rig pa ma yin pa dag dang lhan cig shes pa dang brjod pa dag mtshungs par yod pa ma yin no /
sngon gyi slob dpon dag ni ji ltar so so'i skye bo dang 'phags pa gnyis kyi so sor ma brtags pa dang so sor brtags pa'i btang snyoms dag btang snyoms su mtshungs pa dang ji ltar dmus long dang mig dang ldan pa gnyis kyis yul phyogs nges par mtshungs kyang khyad par chen po yod pa de bzhin du med pa pa dag dang dbu ma pa rnams la yang khyad par yod par 'gyur ro zhe'o /
'dir smras pa /
gal te de ltar /
ma skyes pa dang ma 'gags pa /
chos nyid mya ngan 'das dang mtshungs pa yin la /
de la ngag dang sems dag 'jug pa yod pa ma yin mod kyi /
de lta na yang /
de ma bstan na gdul bya'i skye bo rnams kyis shes par mi nus pas /
gdul bya'i skye bo rnams de la 'jug par bya ba'i phyir gdon mi za bar kun rdzob kyi bden pa la ltos nas ji zhig ltar de bstan pa'i rim pa zhig yod dgos pas de brjod par bya'o /
brjod pa /
'dir sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi de kho na nyid kyi bdud rtsi la 'jug pa'i bstan pa'i rim pa ni 'di yin par shes par bya ste /
gang 'di /
thams cad yang dag yang dag min /
yang dag yang dag ma yin nyid /
yang dag min min yang dag min /
de ni sangs rgyas rjes bstan pa'o /
zhes bya'o /
de la /
gang zhig gang gang la dga' ba /
de yi de de sngar bshad bya /
nyams par gyur pa dam chos kyi /
snod ni cis kyang ma yin no /
zhes bya ba dang ji ltar kla klo skad gzhan gyis /
gzung bar mi nus de bzhin du /
'jig rten pa yis ma gtogs pa /
'jig rten gzung bar nus ma yin /
zhes bya ba dang de bzhin du bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang /
'jig rten nga dang lhan cig rtsod kyi /
nga ni 'jig rten dang mi rtsod de /
gang 'jig rten na yod par 'dod pa de ni nga yang yod par bzhed do /
gang 'jig rten na med par 'dod pa de ni nga yang med par bzhed do zhes bya ba'i lung las na thog ma kho nar re zhig bcom ldan 'das kyis gang gis na de ltar snod kyi 'jig rten dang sems can gyi 'jig rten thog mar rlung gi dkyil 'khor nas srid pa'i rtse mo la thug pa /
nam mkha'i khams kyi mtha' gtugs pa'i skye ba dang gnas pa dang 'jig pa phyin ci ma log pa rab tu dbye ba sna tshogs pa dang bcas pa /
rgyu dang bcas pa /
'bras bu dang bcas pa /
ro myang ba dang bcas pa /
nyes dmigs dang bcas pa /
nye bar bstan pa /
bcom ldan 'das thams cad mkhyen zhing thams cad gzigs pa 'di ni 'jig rten gyi byung tshul ma lus pa mkhyen pa yin no snyam du bdag nyid la 'jig rten gus pa bskyed par bya ba'i phyir de'i lta ba la ltos nas /
gdul bya'i skye bo rang la grags pa'i dngos po rab tu dbye ba dang rang gi ngo bo'i rnam par phye ba thos nas mos pa mngon par 'dod pa skyes pa la /
phung po dang khams dang skye mched la sogs pa ma rig pa'i rab rib can dag gis bden par brtags pa gang yin pa de nyid bden no zhes gsungs so /
de'i phyir de ltar gdul bya'i skye bo bcom ldan 'das la thams cad mkhyen pa yin no snyam du blo skyes pa la dus phyis /
de dag thams cad yang dag min /
zhes bstan to /
de la yang dag pa zhes bya ba ni gang la gzhan du 'gyur ba nyid med pa la bya na /
skad cig re re la 'jig pa'i phyir 'dus byas rnams la ni gzhan du 'gyur ba yod pa yin te /
de'i phyir gzhan du 'gyur ba yod pas yang dag pa ma yin no /
'ang gi sgra ni dang gi don te /
thams cad yang dag pa dang yang dag pa ma yin pa zhes bstan pa sdud par blta bar bya'o /
kha cig la ni 'di dag thams cad /
yang dag yang dag ma yin nyid /
ces bstan to /
de la byis pa'i skye bo la ltos nas ni 'di dag thams cad yang dag pa yin la /
'phags pa'i ye shes la ltos nas ni 'di dag thams cad brdzun pa ste /
'di dag gis de ltar ma gzigs pa'i phyir ro /
de kho na nyid lta ba la yun ring po nas goms pa sgrib pa cung zad tsam ma bkrol ba kha cig la ni /
de dag yang dag min min yang dag min zhes bstan te /
tasyāpi kiṃcinmātrasyāvaraṇasya prahāṇārthaṃ vandhyāsutasya avadātaśyāmatāpratiṣedhavadubhayametat pratiṣiddham sgrib pa cung zad tsam po de yang spang bar bya ba'i phyir mo gsham gyi bu'i sngo ba sangs dang dkar sham bkag pa ltar de gnyi ga yang bkag pa yin no /
etacca buddhānāṃ bhagavatāmanuśāsanam 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis rjes su bstan pa ste /
unmārgādapanīya samyaṅmārgapratiṣṭhāpanaṃ śāsanam lam gol pa nas bzlog nas lam bzang po la 'god pa ni bstan pa'o /
evamānupūrvyā śāsanamanuśāsanam de ltar mthar gyis ston pa ni rjes su ston pa'o /
vineyajananurūpyeṇa vā śāsanamanuśāsanam yang na gdul bya'i skye bo dang 'tsham par ston pa ni rjes su ston pa'o /
sarvāścaitā deśanā buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ mahākaruṇopāyajñānavatāṃ tattvāmṛtāvatāropāyatvena vyavasthitāḥ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis bstan pa de dag thams cad ni de kho na nyid kyi bdud rtsi la 'jug pa'i thabs nyid du rnam par gnas so /
na hi tathāgatāḥ tattvāmṛtāvatārānupāyabhūtavākyamudāharanti de bzhin gshegs pa rnams ni gsung de kho na nyid kyi bdud rtsi la 'jug pa'i thabs su ma gyur pa mi gsung ste /
vyādhyanurūpabhaiṣajyopasaṃhāravat te vineyajanānujighṛkṣayā yathānurūpaṃ dharmaṃ deśayanti nad dang rjes su mthun pa'i sman nye bar sogs pa ltar 'dul ba'i skye bo rjes su gzung bar bzhed pas ji ltar 'tsham pa ltar ston par mdzad pa yin no /
yathoktaṃ śatake ji skad du brgya pa las /
sadasatsadasacceti nobhayaṃ ceti kathyate yod dang med dang yod med dang /
gnyi ga min zhes kyang bstan te /
nanu vyādhivaśātpathyamauṣadhaṃ nāma jāyate nad kyi dbang gis thams cad ni /
sman zhes bya bar 'gyur min nam /
iti /
kiṃlakṣaṇaṃ punaḥ tat tattvaṃ yasyaitā deśanā avatārārthamupadiśante bhagavantaḥ? uktametadasmābhiḥ 		zhes bshad do /
gang la 'jug par bya ba'i phyir bstan pa 'di dag ston pa'i de kho na nyid de mtshan nyid ci dang ldan pa zhig ce na /
nivṛttamabhidhātavyaṃ nivṛtte cittagocare brjod par bya ba bzlog pa ste /
sems kyi spyod yul bzlog pas so /
iti /
yadā caitadevam, tadā kimaparaṃ pṛcchayate? yadyapyevam, tathāpi vyavahārasatyānurodhena laukikatathyādyabhyupagamavat tasyāpi samāropato lakṣaṇamucyatāmiti 		zhes 'di ni kho bo cag gis bshad zin to /
gang gi tshe 'di de lta bu yin pa de'i tshe gzhan yang ci zhig drir yod /
de lta yin mod kyi /
'on kyang 'jig rten pa'i tha snyad khas blangs pa ltar tha snyad kyi bden pa'i ngor sgro btags nas de'i mtshan nyid kyang brjod par bya dgos so zhe na /
taducyate /
aparapratyayaṃ śāntaṃ prapañcairaprapañcitam 		de brjod par bya ste /
gzhan las shes min zhi ba dang /
spros pa rnams kyis ma spros pa /
nirvikalpamanānārthametattattvasya lakṣaṇam rnam rtog med don tha dad min /
de ni de nyid mtshan nyid do /
tatra nāsmin parapratyayo 'stīti aparapratyayam de la 'di la gzhan las shes pa yod pa ma yin pas na gzhan las shes min te /
paropadeśāgamyam /
svayamevādhigantavyamityarthaḥ /
yathā hi taimirikā vitathaṃ keśamaśakamakṣikādirūpaṃ paśyanto vitimiropadeśenāpi na śaknuvanti keśānāṃ yathāvadavasthitaṃ svarūpamadarśananyāyena adhigantavyamataimirikā ivādhigantum, kiṃ tarhi ataimirikopadeśānmithyaitadityetāvanmātrakameva pratipadyante /
yadā tu timiropaghātyaviparītaśūnyatādarśanāñjanāñjitabuddhinayanāḥ santaḥ samutpannatattvajñānā bhavanti, tadā tat tattvamanadhigamanayogena svayamadhigacchantīti /
evamaparapratyayaṃ bhāvānāṃ yat svarūpaṃ tat tattvam /
etacca śāntasvabhāvamataimirikakeśādarśanavat svabhāvavirahitamityarthaḥ 		gzhan gyis bstan pas rtogs par bya ba ma yin gyi /
rang nyid kyis rtogs par bya ba yin no zhes bya ba'i don to; ;ji ltar rab rib can dag gis skra shad la sogs pa'i ngo bo phyin ci log mthong ba na /
rab rib med pas bstan du zin kyang /
rab rib med pa ltar skra shad la sogs pa'i rang gi ngo bo ma mthong ba'i tshul gyis rtogs par bya ba ji ltar gnas pa bzhin rtogs par mi nus kyi /
'o na ci zhe na /
rab rib med pas bstan pa las 'di ni phyin ci log yin no zhes bya ba 'di tsam zhig tu ni rtogs par 'gyur la /
gang gi tshe rab rib sel ba'i mig sman bskus pas rab rib med par gyur pa de'i tshe ni skra shad la sogs pa'i rang gi ngo bo de ma rtogs pa'i tshul gyis rtogs par 'gyur ba de bzhin du /
'phags pa rnams sgro btags pa'i sgo nas de kho na nyid ston mod kyi de lta na yang de tsam gyis 'phags pa ma yin pa rnams kyis de'i rang gi ngo bo rtogs par mi 'gyur la /
gang gi tshe stong pa nyid phyin ci ma log par lta ba ma rig pa'i rab rib sel bar byed pa'i mig sman gyis blo'i mig dag la bskus par gyur pa na /
de kho na nyid kyi ye shes skyes par gyur pa de'i tshe de kho na nyid de ma rtogs pa'i tshul gyis rang nyid kyis rtogs par 'gyur te /
de ltar na dngos po rnams kyi rang gi ngo bo gzhan las shes pa ma yin pa de ni de kho na nyid do /
de ni zhi ba'i rang bzhin te /
rab rib med pas skra shad ma mthong ba ltar rang bzhin dang bral ba yin no zhes bya ba'i don to /
ata eva tat prapañcairaprapañcitam de nyid kyi phyir de ni spros pa rnams kyis ma spros pa'o /
prapañco hi vāk, prapañcayati arthāniti kṛtvā spros pa ni ngag ste don rnams spro bar byed pa'i phyir ro /
prapañcairaprapañcitaṃ vāgbhiravyāhṛtamityarthaḥ spros pa rnams kyis ma spros pa ni ngag dag gis ma brjod pa'o zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go /
nirvikalpaṃ ca tat /
vikalpaścittapracāraḥ 		de ni rnam par rtog pa med pa yang yin te /
rnam par rtog pa ni sems kyi rgyu ba yin na /
tadrahitatvāt tat tattvaṃ nirvikalpam /
yathoktaṃ sūtre /
paramārthasatyaṃ katamat? yatra jñānasyāpyapracāraḥ, kaḥ punarvādo 'kṣarāṇāmiti 		de dang bral ba'i phyir de kho na nyid de ni rnam par rtog pa med pa yin no /
ji skad du mdo las /
don dam pa'i bden pa gang zhe na /
gang la sems kyi rgyu ba yang med na /
yi ge rnams la lta smos kyang ci dgos zhes gsungs so /
evaṃ nirvikalpam /
nānārtho 'syeti nānārthaṃ bhinnārtham, na nānārthaḥ anānārtham, abhinnārthamityarthaḥ /
yathoktamāryasatyadvayāvatārasūtre 		de ltar na rnam par rtog pa med pa yin no /
'di la don tha dad pa yod pas na /
don tha dad pas te don so so ba'o /
don tha dad pa med pa ni don tha dad pa min pa ste /
don so so ba ma yin pa zhes bya ba'i don to /
ji skad du 'phags pa bden pa gnyis la 'jug pa'i mdo las /
devaputra āha lha'i bus smras pa /
katamaḥ punarmañjuśrīḥ samyakprayogaḥ? mañjuśrīrāha /
yatsamā devaputra paramārthatastathatā dharmadhātuḥ atyantājātiśca, tatsamāni paramārthataḥ pañcānantaryāṇi, yatsamāni pañcānantaryāṇi tatsamāni dṛṣṭikṛtāni, yatsamāni dṛṣṭikṛtāni tatsamāḥ pṛthagjanadharmāḥ, yatsamāḥ pṛthagjanadharmāḥ tatsamāḥ śaikṣadharmāḥ, yatsamāḥ śaikṣadharmāḥ tatsamā aśaikṣadharmāḥ, yatsamā aśaikṣadharmāḥ tatsamāḥ samyaksaṃbuddhadharmāḥ, yatsamāḥ samyaksaṃbuddhadharmāḥ tatsamaṃ nirvāṇam, yatsamaṃ nirvāṇaṃ tatsamaḥ saṃsāraḥ, yatsamaḥ saṃsāraḥ tatsamaḥ paramārthataḥ saṃkleśaḥ, yatsamaḥ paramārthataḥ saṃkleśaḥ tatsamaṃ paramārthato vyavadānam, yatsamaṃ paramārthato vyavadānaṃ tatsamāḥ paramārthataḥ sarvadharmāḥ 		'jam dpal don dam pa'i sbyor ba ni gang yin /
'jam dpal gyis smras pa /
lha'i bu dag don dam par na de bzhin nyid dang chos kyi dbyings dang gtan ma skyes pa gang du mtshungs pa der don dam par mtshams med pa rnams kyang mtshungs so /
mtshams med pa rnams don dam par gang du mtshungs pa der ni lta bar gyur pa rnams kyang mtshungs so /
lta bar gyur pa rnams gang du mtshungs pa der ni so so skye bo'i chos rnams kyang mtshungs so /
so so skye bo'i chos rnams gang du mtshungs pa der ni slob pa'i chos rnams kyang mtshungs so /
slob pa'i chos rnams gang du mtshungs pa der ni mi slob pa'i chos rnams kyang mtshungs so /
mi slob pa'i chos rnams gang du mtshungs pa der ni yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyang mtshungs so /
yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams gang du mtshungs pa der ni mya ngan las 'das pa yang mtshungs so /
mya ngan las 'das pa gang du mtshungs pa der ni 'khor ba yang mtshungs so /
don dam par 'khor ba gang du mtshungs pa der ni don dam par kun nas nyon mongs pa yang mtshungs so /
don dam par kun nas nyon mongs pa gang du mtshungs pa der ni don dam par rnam par byang ba yang mtshungs so /
don dam par rnam par byang ba gang du mtshungs pa der ni chos thams cad kyang mtshungs so /
evaṃ paramārthataḥ sarvadharmasamatāprayukto devaputra bhikṣuḥ samyakprayukta ityucyate lha'i bu chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid la yang dag par sbyor ba'i dge slong ni don dam par yang dag par sbyor ba zhes bya ste /
ji skad brjod pa bzhin du ma yin no /
devaputra āha lha'i bus smras pa /
katamayā punarmañjuśrīḥ samatayā yāvat paramārthato yatsamaṃ vyavadānaṃ tatsamāḥ sarvadharmāḥ paramārthata iti? mañjuśrīrāha mnyam pa nyid gang du don dam par na rnam par byang ba'i bar du mnyam pa gang yin pa der don dam par chos thams cad kyang mnyam pa zhes bya zhe na /
'jam dpal gyis smras pa /
paramārthataḥ sarvadharmānutpādasamatayā paramārthataḥ sarvadharmātyantājātisamatayā paramārthataḥ samāḥ sarvadharmāḥ /
tat kasmāddhetoḥ? paramārthato nirvāṇānānākaraṇā hi devaputra sarvadharmā atyantanirutpādatāmupādāya 		don dam par ni chos thams cad ma skyes par mnyam pa dang don dam par na chos thams cad ma byung bar mnyam pa dang don dam par na chos thams cad gtan du ma skyes par mnyam pa dang don dam par na chos thams cad dngos po med par mnyam pas /
lha'i bu don dam par chos thams cad mtshungs so /
de ci'i phyir zhe na /
lha'i bu don dam par ni gtan ma skyes pa nye bar bzung nas chos thams cad la tha dad du bya ba med do /
tadyathāpi nāma devaputra yacca mṛddhājanasyāmyantaramākāśam, yacca ratnabhājanasyākāśam, ākāśadhātureva eṣaḥ lha'i bu 'di lta ste dper na /
kham pa'i snod kyi nang gi nam mkha' gang yin pa dang rin po che'i snod kyi nang gi nam mkha' gang yin pa 'di gnyis nam mkha'i khams nyid yin te /
tat paramārthato na kiṃcinnānākaraṇam /
evameva devaputra yaḥ saṃkleśaḥ, sa paramārthato 'tyantānutpādatā /
yadapi vyavadānaṃ tadapi paramārthato 'tyantānutpādatā /
saṃsāro 'pi paramārthato 'tyantānutpādatā /
yāvannirvāṇamapi paramārthato 'tyantānutpādatā 		de la don dam par tha dad du bya ba cung zad kyang med do /
lha'i bu de bzhin du don dam par gang kun nas nyon mongs pa de gtan mi skye ba nyid do /
gang rnam par byang ba de yang don dam par gtan mi skye ba nyid do /
don dam par na 'khor ba yang gtan mi skye ba nyid do /
don dam par na mya ngan las 'das pa'i bar du yang gtan mi skye ba nyid de /
nātra kiṃcitparamārthato nānākaraṇam de la don dam par na tha dad du bya ba cung zad kyang med do /
tat kasmāddhetoḥ? paramārthato 'tyantānutpādatvātsarvadharmāṇāmiti de ci'i phyir zhe na /
don dam par na chos thams cad gtan mi skye ba'i phyir ro zhes gsungs so /
tadevamanānārthatā tattvasya lakṣaṇaṃ veditavyam, śūnyataikarasatvāt /
uttarottaravyākhyānaṃ cātra veditavyam /
evaṃ tāvadāryāṇāṃ jātijarāmaraṇasaṃsāraparikṣayāya kṛtakāryāṇāṃ tattvalakṣaṇam 		de'i phyir de ltar na don tha dad pa ma yin pa ni de kho na'i mtshan nyid yin par rig par bya ste /
stong pa nyid du ro gcig pa'i phyir ro /
'dir phyi ma phyi mas bshad par yang rig par bya'o /
de ltar na re zhig 'phags pa rnams kyi de kho na nyid kyi mtshan nyid yin no /
laukikaṃ tu tattvalakṣaṇamadhikṛtyocyate 'jig rten pa'i de kho na nyid kyi mtshan nyid kyi dbang du byas nas brjod par bya ste /
pratītya yadyadbhavati na hi tāvattadeva tat gang la brten te gang 'byung ba /
de ni re zhig de nyid min /
na cānyadapi tattasmānnocchinnaṃ nāpi śāśvatam /
yat kāraṇaṃ pratītya yat kāryamutpadyate, tadyathā śālibījaṃ pratītya pṛthivyādisāmagrīṃ ca śālyaṅkura upajāyate, na hi tāvat tadeva taditi śakyate vaktum 		de las gzhan pa'ang ma yin phyir /
de phyir chad min rtag ma yin /
ji ltar s'a lu'i sa bon la brten nas s'a lu'i myu gu 'byung ba ltar rgyu gang la brten te 'bras bu gang zhig 'byung ba /
de ni re zhig de nyid do zhes brjod par ni mi nus so /
naiva yadeva bījaṃ sa eva aṅkuraḥ, janyajanakayorekatvaprasaṅgāt sa bon gang yin pa de ni myu gu ma yin te /
bskyed par bya ba dang skyed par byed pa dag gcig nyid du thal bar 'gyur ba'i phyir ro /
tataśca pitāputrayorapi ekatvaṃ syāt de'i phyir pha dang bu gnyis kyang gcig nyid du 'gyur ro /
ananyatvācca aṅkurāvasthāyāmaṅkuravadbījagrahaṇamapi syāt, bījavacca aṅkurasyāpi grahaṇaṃ syāt gcig yin pa'i phyir myu gu ltar myu gu'i gnas skabs su sa bon 'dzin par yang 'gyur ro /
yang na sa bon ltar myu gu yang 'dzin par mi 'gyur ro /
nityatvaṃ caivaṃ bījasya syāt, avināśābhyupagamāt de ltar na sa bon rtag pa nyid du yang 'gyur te /
mi 'jig par khas blangs pa'i phyir ro /
tataśca śāśvatavādaprasaṅgānmahādoṣarāśiḥ syāt karmaphalādyabhāvaprasaṅgāt /
evaṃ tāvad yadeva bījaṃ sa eva aṅkuraḥ iti na yujyate 		de'i phyir rtag par smra bar thal bar 'gyur bas nyes pa chen por 'gyur te /
las dang 'bras bu la sogs pa med par thal bar 'gyur ba'i phyir ro /
de ltar na re zhig sa bon gang yin pa de nyid myu gu yin no zhes bya bar mi rigs so /
na ca anyadapi tattasmāt de las gzhan pa yang ma yin no /
nāpi bījādaṅkurasyānyatvam, bījamantareṇāpi aṅkurodayaprasaṅgāt sa bon las myu gu gzhan pa nyid kyang ma yin te /
sa bon med par yang myu gu skye bar yang thal bar 'gyur ba'i phyir te /
yadyanyadanyadanyasmādanyasmādapyṛte bhavet gal te gzhan ni gzhan las gzhan /
de tshe gzhan med par gzhan 'gyur /
iti vacanādaṅkurāvasthāne'pi bījānucchedaprasaṅgāt /
tataśca satkāryavādadoṣaḥ syāt 		zhes bya ba la sogs pa 'byung pa'i phyir ro /
myu gu'i gnas skabs na yang sa bon rgyun chad pa med par thal bar 'gyur la /
de'i phyir 'chol pa'i skyon du 'gyur ro /
yataścaivaṃ yat kāraṇaṃ pratītya yat kāryamutpadyate, naiva tat kāraṇaṃ kāryaṃ bhavati, na ca tasmātkāraṇāttat kāryamanyat gang gi phyir de ltar rgyu gang zhig la brten nas 'bras bu gang zhig 'byung bar 'gyur la /
rgyu de 'bras bu yang ma yin zhing /
tasmānna kāraṇamucchinnaṃ nāpi śāśvatamiti śakyate vyavasthāpayitum /
yathoktamāryadevapādaiḥ 		rgyu de las 'bras bu de gzhan pa yang ma yin pa de'i phyir rgyu ni chad pa yang ma yin zhing rtag pa yang ma yin no zhes bya bar gzhag par yang nus pa yin no /
ji skad du 'phags pa'i lhas /
yasmātpravartate bhāvastenocchedo na jāyate /
yasmānnivartate bhāvastena nityo na jāyate /
iti 		gang phyir dngos po 'jug 'gyur ba /
des na chad par mi 'gyur zhing /
gang phyir dngos po ldog 'gyur ba /
uktaṃ ca āryalalitavistarasūtre des na rtag par mi 'gyur ro; ;zhes bshad do /
mdo las kyang /
bījasya sato yathāṅkuro na ca yo bīja sa caiva aṅkuro sa bon yod na myu gu ji bzhin te /
sa bon gang yin myu gu de nyid min /
na ca anyu tato na caiva tadevamanuccheda aśāśvata dharmatā de las gzhan min de yang ma yin te /
de phyir rtag min chad min chos nyid do /
iti /
tadevaṃ yathopavarṇitena nyāyena 		zhes gsungs so /
de'i phyir de ltar ji skad bshad pa'i tshul gyis /
anekārthamanānārthamanucchedamaśāśvatam sangs rgyas 'jig rten mgon rnams kyi /
etattallokanāthānāṃ buddhānāṃ śāsanāmṛtam /
mahākaruṇopāyamahāmeghapaṭalanirantarāvacchāditākāśadhātuparyantadiṅmaṇḍalānāṃ rāgādikleśagaṇasamudācārātitīkṣṇatarādityamaṇḍalopatāpitajagajjātijarāmaraṇaduḥkhadahanasaṃtāpopaśamatatparāṇāṃ satatāviratayathānurūpacaritapratipakṣasaddharmadeśanāmṛtadhārāpātaiḥ yathānurūpavineyajanakuśalamūlaśasyauṣadhiphalaphullalatotpannātivṛddhayanujidhṛkṣūṇāṃ saddharmāmṛtamahāvarṣavarṣiṇāṃ samyaksaṃbuddhamahānāgānāmatrāṇālaukikatrāṇānāmanāthanāthānāṃ sakalalokanāthānāmetat tatsaddharmāmṛtaṃ sakalatraidhātukabhavaduḥkhakṣayasvabhāvaṃ yathopavarṇitena nyāyena ekatvānyatvarahitaṃ śāśvatocchedavādavigataṃ ca vijñeyam /
etaddharmatattvāmṛtapratipannānāṃ śrāvakāṇāṃ śrutacintābhāvanākramāt pravartamānānāṃ śīlasamādhiprajñātmakaskandhatrayāmṛtarasasya upayogānniyatameva jarāmaraṇakṣayasvabhāvanirvāṇādhigamo bhavati 		bstan pa bdud rtsir gyur pa de /
don gcig ma yin tha dad min /
chad pa ma yin rtag ma yin /
yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas klu chen po thugs rje chen po'i sprin chen po'i tshogs kyis phyogs kyi dkyil 'khor nam mkha'i khams kyi mtha' gtugs pa bar mtshams med par khebs par mdzad pa /
'gro ba 'dod chags la sogs pa nyon mongs pa'i tshogs mngon du rgyu'i nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor shin tu ches tsha bas gdungs pa'i gdung ba nye bar zhi ba lhur mdzad pa /
rtag par rgyun mi 'chad par ji ltar 'tsham par spyod pa rnams kyi gnyen por gyur pa /
dam pa'i chos ston pa'i bdud rtsi'i rgyun dag 'bebs pas ji ltar 'os par gdul ba'i skye bo'i dge ba'i rtsa ba'i lo tog gi myu gu skyes pa spel bas rjes su bzung bar bzhed pa /
rtag tu dam pa'i chos kyi bdud rtsi'i char 'bebs pa /
'jig rten pa skyob pa med pa'i skyob pa /
mgon med pa'i mgon /
'jig rten mgon po rnams kyi dam pa'i chos kyi bdud rtsi rga ba dang 'chi ba gtan gcod pa de ni /
ji skad bstan pa'i tshul gyis gcig dang tha dad pa nyid dang bral ba dang chad pa dang rtag par smra ba dang bral bar shes par bya'o /
nyan thos kyi chos kyi de kho na nyid bdud rtsi 'di la zhugs pa /
thos pa dang bsam pa dang sgom pa'i rim gyis rab tu zhugs pa rnams kyis ni /
tshul khrims dang ting nge 'dzin dang shes rab kyi phung po gsum gyi bdud rtsi nye bar spyad pa'i phyir nges pa kho nar rga shi zad pa'i ngo bo mya ngan las 'das pa 'thob par 'gyur ro /
athāpi kathaṃcidiha aparipakvakuśalamūlatayā śrutvāpyetat saddharmāmṛtam, dṛṣṭa eva dharme na mokṣamāsādayanti, tathāpi janmāntare 'pi avaśyameṣāṃ pūrvahetubalādeva niyatā siddhiḥ saṃpadyate ci ste yang ji zhig ltar 'dir dge ba'i rtsa ba ma smin pa nyid kyis dam pa'i chos kyi bdud rtsi 'di thos su zin kyang thar pa ma thob na ni /
de lta na 'ang de dag skye ba gzhan du'ang sngon gyi rgyu'i stobs nyid las grub pa nges par gdon mi za bar 'grub par 'gyur ro /
yathoktaṃ śatake ji skad du brgya pa las /
iha yadyapi tattvajño nirvāṇaṃ nādhigacchati de nyid shes pas gal te 'dir /
mya ngan 'das pa ma thob kyang /
prāpnotyayatnato 'vaśyaṃ punarjanmani karmavat skye ba phyi mar 'bad med par /
nges par thob 'gyur las bzhin no /
iti /
athāpi kathaṃcit 		zhes bshad do /
ci ste yang ji zhig ltar /
saṃbuddhānāmanutpāde śrāvakāṇāṃ punaḥ kṣaye rdzogs sangs rgyas rnams ma byung zhing /
nyan thos rnams kyang zad pa na ste /
sati, āryamārgopadeśakakalyāṇamitrapratyayavaikalyāt na syād dharmatattvāmṛtādhigamaḥ, tathāpi pūrvajanmāntaradharmatattvaśravaṇahetubalādeva aihalaukikopadeśanirapekṣāṇāmapi pravivekasevāmātropanatapratyayānāṃ svāyaṃbhuvaṃ gyur pa'i tshe 'phags pa'i lam ston par byed pa'i rkyen ma tshang bas de kho na nyid kyi bdud rtsi ma thob par gyur pa /
de lta na yang sngon tshe rabs gzhan du de kho na nyid thos pa'i rgyu'i stobs kho na las 'jig rten 'di'i nye bar bstan pa la ltos pa dang bral yang rkyen rnam par dben pa rten pa tsam thob pa /
jñānaṃ pratyekabuddhānāmasaṃsargātpravartate rang 'byung rang sangs rgyas kyi ye shes ni /
rten pa med las rab tu skye ba yin no /
kāyacetasoḥ praviveko 'saṃsargaḥ, kalyāṇamitrāparyeṣaṇaṃ vā rten pa med pa ni lus dang sems dag dben pa'am /
dge ba'i bshes gnyen yongs su mi tshol ba ste /
rten med pa'i rgyu de las so /
tasmādasaṃsargāddhetoḥ pratyekabuddhānāmasaṃbuddhake 'pi kāle yasmādbhavatyeva dharmatattvādhigamaḥ, tasmādabandhyā siddhirasya saṃbuddhamahāvaidyarājapraṇītasya saddharmatattvāmṛtabhaiṣajyasyeti vijñeyam gang gi phyir sangs rgyas mi 'byung ba'i dus su rang sangs rgyas rnams kyis de kho na nyid rtogs par 'gyur ba de'i phyir /
yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas sman pa'i rgyal pos gsungs pa dam pa'i chos de kho na nyid kyi bdud rtsi ji skad du bshad pa de 'bras bu yod par grub par shes par bya'o /
yataśca etadevam, ato 'rhati prājñaḥ prāṇānapi parityajya saddharmatattvaṃ paryeṣitumiti /
yathoktaṃ bhagavatā āryāṣṭasāhasrikāyāṃ bhagavatyām 		gang gi phyir 'di de ltar yin pa de'i phyir /
shes rab can rnams kyis srog dag kyang btang ste de kho na nyid btsal bar 'os pa yin te /
byang chub sems dpa' rtag tu dus bcom ldan 'das ma ji ltar btsal ba bzhin no /
ji skad du /
bcom ldan 'das ma yum shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa brgyad stong pa las /
kathaṃ ca bhagavan sadāpraruditena bodhisattvena mahāsattvena iyaṃ prajñāpāramitā paryeṣitā? evamukto bhagavānāyuṣmantaṃ subhūtiṃ sthavirametadavocat /
sadāpraruditena bodhisattvena mahāsattvena pūrvaṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ paryeṣamāṇena kāye 'narthikena jīvitanirapekṣeṇa lābhasatkāraślokeṣvaniśritena paryeṣamāṇena paryeṣitā /
tena prajñāpāramitāṃ paryeṣamāṇena araṇyagatena antarīkṣānnirghoṣaḥ śruto 'bhūt /
gaccha kulaputra pūrvasyāṃ diśi /
tatra prajñāpāramitāṃ śroṣyasi 		bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu dus /
shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ji ltar yongs su btsal ba lags /
de skad ces gsol pa dang bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to /
rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu dus /
sngon shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di yongs su tshol ba na /
lus la ched cher mi byed /
srog la mi lta /
rnyed pa dang bkur sti dang tshigs su bcad pa dag la mi gnas par yongs su btsal to /
tathā ca gaccha yathā na kāyaklamathamanasikāramutpādayasi, na styānamiddhamanasikāramutpādayasi, na bhojanamanasikāramutpādayasi, yāvat mā kvaciccittaṃ praṇidhā adhyātmaṃ vā bahirdhā vā /
mā ca kulaputra vāmenāvalokayan gāḥ, mā dakṣiṇena, [mā pūrveṇa], mā paścimena, mā uttareṇa, mā urdhvaṃ mā adhaḥ, mā ca anuvidiśamavalokayan gāḥ 		de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su tshol zhing 'brog dgon pa zhig tu phyin pa na bar snang las sgra thos par gyur te /
rigs kyi bu shar phyogs su song shig dang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa thos par 'gyur gyi ci nas lus ngal ba yid la byed pa mi skyed pa dang gnyid dang rmugs pa yid la byed pa mi skyed pa dang bza' ba yid la byed pa mi skyed pa dang zhes bya ba nas nang ngam phyi rol gang la yang sems smon par ma byed cig /
rigs kyi bu g yon du ma lta bar song shig /
g yas su ma yin /
shar du ma yin /
nub tu ma yin /
byang du ma yin /
steng du ma yin /
'og tu ma yin /
tathā ca kulaputra gaccha yathā [nātmato] na satkāyataścalasi na rūpato na vedanāto na saṃjñāto na saṃskārebhyo na vijñānataścalasi /
yo hi ataścalati sa vitiṣṭhate 		phyogs mtshams su yang ma lta bar song shig /
rigs kyi bu ji ltar bdag las ma yin 'jig tshogs las kyang ma g yos pa dang ji ltar gzugs las kyang ma g yos pa dang ji ltar tshor ba dang 'du shes dang 'du byed rnams dang ji ltar rnam par shes pa las kyang ma g yos pa de ltar song shig /
gang 'di las g yos pa de ni rnam par nyams par 'gyur ro /
ci las nyams par 'gyur zhe na /
[kuto vitiṣṭhate?] buddhadharmebhyo vitiṣṭhate sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams las nyams par 'gyur ro /
yo buddhadharmebhyo vitiṣṭhate, sa saṃsāre carati gang sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams las nyams par gyur pa de ni 'khor ba la spyod do /
yaḥ saṃsāre carati, sa prajñāpāramitāyāṃ na carati, na ca tāmanuprāpnotīti /
yāvanmāreṇa pāpīyasā udake 'ntardhāpite athāsyaitadabhūt /
yannvahamātmanaḥ kāyaṃ viddhā ime pṛthivīpradeśaṃ rudhireṇa siñceyam 		gang 'khor ba la spyod pa de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi spyod de /
des shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rjes su mi 'thob po zhes bya ba'i bar nas /
chu de dag mi snang bar byas nas kun tu chu btsal na chu ma rnyed do /
de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu dus 'di snyam du sems te /
bdag gi lus phug la khrag gis sa phyogs 'di chag chag gdab bo /
de ci'i phyir zhe na /
tatkasya hetoḥ? ayaṃ pṛthivīpradeśa uddhatarajaskaḥ, mā rajodhāturito dharmodgatasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya śarīre nipatet sa phyogs 'di ni rdul che ste /
sa phyogs 'di nas rdul gyi khams byung bas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags kyi lus la phog na mi rung na /
kimahamātmabhāvena kariṣyāmi avaśyaṃ bhedanadharmiṇā? varaṃ khalu punarmama evaṃrūpayā kriyayā ātmabhāvasya vināśaḥ kṛto bhavet, na tvevaṃ niḥsāmarthyakriyayā /
bahūni ca mama ātmabhāvasahasrāṇi kāmahetoḥ kāmanidānaṃ bhinnāni punaḥ punaḥ saṃsāre saṃsarataḥ, na punarevaṃbhūteṣu sthāneṣu ..... /
atha khalu sadāprarudito bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ tīkṣṇaṃ śastraṃ gṛhītvā samantādātmānaṃ viddhā samantatastaṃ pṛthivīpradeśaṃ svakena rudhireṇāsiñcadityādi 		bdag gi lus gdon mi za bar 'jig pa 'dis ci zhig bya /
bdag gi lus 'di lta bu'i bya ba la 'jig pa ni bla'i /
nus pa med pa'i bya ba la 'dod pa'i phyir dang 'dod pa'i gzhis 'khor bdag na 'khor ba na bdag gi lus brgya stong mang po de lta bu'i gnas su zhig pa ni cir yang ma rung ngo snyam mo /
de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu dus mtshon rnon po blangs te /
bdag gi lus kun tu phug nas rang gi khrag gis sa phyogs de khor khor yug tu chag chag btab po zhes bya ba la sogs pa dang de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu dus /
atha khalu sadāprarudito bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ sahadarśanādeva dharmodgatasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya evaṃrūpaṃ sukhaṃ pratyalabhata /
tadyathāpi nāma prathamadhyānasamāpannasya bhikṣorekāgramanasikārasya bhikṣoḥ /
tatreyaṃ dharmodgatasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya prajñāpāramitādeśanā yaduta sarvadharmasamatayā prajñāpāramitāsamatā, sarvadharmaviviktatayā prajñāpāramitāviviktatā, sarvadharmācalatayā prajñāpāramitācalatā, sarvadharmāmananatayā prajñāpāramitāmananatā, sarvadharmāstambhitatayā prajñāpāramitāstambhitatā, sarvadharmaikarasatayā prajñāpāramitaikarasatā, sarvadharmāparyantatayā prajñāpāramitāparyantatā, sarvadharmānutpādatayā prajñāpāramitānutpādatā, sarvadharmānirodhatayā prajñāpāramitānirodhatā, gaganāparyantatayā prajñāpāramitāparyantatā, yāvat sarvadharmāsaṃbhedanatayā prajñāpāramitāsaṃbhedanatā, sarvadharmānupalabdhitayā prajñāpāramitānupalabdhitā, sarvadharmābhibhāvanāsamatayā prajñāpāramitābhibhāvanāsamatā, sarvadharmaniśceṣṭatayā prajñāpāramitāniśceṣṭatā, sarvadharmācintyatayā prajñāpāramitācintyatā veditavyeti 		byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags mthong ma thag tu 'di lta ste; dper na dge slong bsam gtan dang po la snyoms par zhugs pa'i dge slong rtse gcig tu yid la byed pa de bzhin du bde ba de lta bu thob po /
de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ston pa ni 'di lta ste /
chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mnyam pa nyid do /
chos thams cad dben pa nyid pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa nyid do /
chos thams cad g yo ba med pa nyid pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa g yo ba med pa nyid do /
chos thams cad rlom sems med pa nyid pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rlom sems med pa nyid do /
chos thams cad khengs pa med pa nyid pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa khengs pa med pa nyid do /
chos thams cad ro gcig pa nyid pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ro gcig pa nyid do /
chos thams cad mu med pa nyid pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mu med pa nyid do /
chos thams cad skye ba med pa nyid pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa skye ba med pa nyid do /
chos thams cad 'gag pa med pa nyid las shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'gag pa med pa nyid do /
nam mkha' mu med pa nyid pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mu med pa nyid do zhes bya ba'i bar dang chos thams cad ma 'dres pa nyid pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma 'dres pa nyid do /
chos thams cad dmigs su med pa nyid pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dmigs su med pa nyid do /
chos thams cad rnam par 'jig pa mnyam pa nyid pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par 'jig pa mnyam pa nyid do /
chos thams cad byed pa med pa nyid pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa byed pa med pa nyid do /
ityācāryacandrakīrtipādoparacitāyāṃ prasannapadāyāṃ madhyamakavṛttau ātmaparīkṣā nāma aṣṭādaśamaṃ prakaraṇam chos thams cad bsam gyis mi khyab pa nyid pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa nyid du rig par bya'o zhes bya ba'i bar du gsungs pa lta bu'o /
slob dpon zla ba grags pa'i zhal snga nas sbyar ba'i tshig gsal ba las /
kālaparīkṣā ekonaviṃśatitamaṃ prakaraṇam bdag brtag pa zhes bya ba rab tu byed pa bco brgyad pa'i 'grel pa'o /
atrāha /
vidyata eva bhāvānāṃ svabhāvaḥ, kālatrayavijñaptihetutvāt /
iha atītānāgatapratyutpannāsrayaḥ kālā bhagavatā upadiṣṭāḥ 		'dir smras pa; dngos po rnams kyi rang bzhin ni yod pa nyid de /
de dus gsum du gdags pa'i rgyu yin pa'i phyir ro /
'dir dus gsum po 'das pa dang ma 'ongs pa dang da ltar byung ba dag ni bcom ldan 'das kyis bstan la /
te ca bhāvāśrayāḥ /
yasmādutpanno niruddho hi bhāvasvabhāvaḥ atīta iti vyapadiśyate, utpanno 'niruddho hi vartamānaḥ, alabdhātmabhāvo 'nāgata iti /
evaṃ bhāvasvabhāvanibandhanāsrayaḥ kālā upadiṣṭāḥ 		de dag kyang dngos po'i rten can yin te /
gang gi phyir dngos po'i rang bzhin skyes nas 'gags pa la ni 'das pa zhes bsnyad la /
skyes la ma 'gags pa ni da ltar ba yin zhing /
bdag gi dngos po ma rnyed pa ni ma 'ongs pa yin no /
de ltar na dngos po'i rang bzhin gyi rgyu can dus gsum ltar na /
te ca santi /
tasmāt tannibandhano 'pi bhāvasvabhāvo 'stīti 		de dag kyang yod pa yin te /
de'i phyir de'i rgyu dngos po'i rang bzhin yang yod do /
ucyate /
syāt kālatrayaprajñaptiheturbhāvasvabhāvaḥ, yadi kālatrayameva bhavadabhimataṃ bhavet 		brjod par bya ste /
gal te dus gsum nyid yod na /
dus gsum du gdags pa'i rgyu dngos po'i rang bzhin yang yod par 'gyur na /
na tvasti /
yathā ca nāsti, tathā pratipādayannāha 		yod pa ni ma yin no /
ji ltar yod pa ma yin pa de ltar bstan pa'i phyir /
pratyutpanno 'nāgataśca yadyatītamapekṣya hi da ltar byung dang ma 'ongs pa /
gal te 'das la ltos gyur na /
pratyutpanno 'nāgataśca kāle 'tīte bhaviṣyataḥ /
iha tāvat yadi vartamānānāgatau syātām, tāvapekṣya atītaṃ kālaṃ bhavetām, anapekṣya vā? tatra yadi atītamapekṣya sidhyete, tathā niyatamatīte kāle bhaviṣyataḥ 		da ltar byung dang ma 'ongs pa /
'das pa'i dus na yod par 'gyur zhes gsungs te /
'dir gal te re zhig da ltar dang ma 'ongs pa'i dus dag yod na /
de dag 'das pa'i dus la ltos pa'am ma ltos pa yod par 'gyur grang /
de la gal te 'das pa la ltos nas grub na ni /
de'i tshe nges par dag 'das pa'i dus na yod par 'gyur te /
yasmāt, yasya hi yatra asattvam, tat tena nāpekṣyate gang gi phyir gang zhig gang na yod pa ma yin pa de ni de la ltos pa ma yin te /
tadyathā vandhyā srī svatanayena, gaganamālatīlatā svakusumena, sikatā svatailena dper na rang gi bu mo mo gsham dang rang gi me tog nam mkha' dang rang gi ti la mar bye ma dag la mi ltos pa bzhin no /
avidyamānamapyandhakāraṃ pradīpena, pradīpo 'pi andhakāreṇa pratidvandvitvena apekṣyate iti cet, naitadevam gal te sgron ma'i rang gi ngo bo la mun pa med kyang 'gal zla nyid du ltos pa yin no zhe na /
de ni de lta ma yin te /
asyāpi sādhyasamatvāt /
tadatra yadi atīte kāle vartamānānāgatau kālau iṣyete, apekṣāsiddhayarthamevaṃ sati atīte kāle vidyamānatvāt atītakālātmavat tayorapyatītatvaṃ syāt /
tataśca atīto 'pi na syāt 		de yang bsgrub par bya ba dang mtshungs pa'i phyir ro /
de'i phyir 'dir gal te ltos pa grub par bya ba'i phyir da ltar dang ma 'ongs pa'i dus dag 'das pa'i dus na yod par 'dod na ni /
de ltar na /
'das pa'i dus na yod pa'i phyir 'das pa'i dus kyi rang gi bdag nyid ltar /
de dag kyang 'das pa'i dus nyid du 'gyur ro /
de'i phyir 'das par yang mi 'gyur te /
yasmāt vartamānāvasthātikrānto hi atītaḥ asaṃprāptaḥ anāgata iti syāt gang gi phyir da ltar las 'das pa ni 'das pa yin la /
ma thob pa ni ma 'ongs pa yin no zhes bya ba yin na /
yadā tu vartamānānāgatayorasaṃbhava eva, tadā kutaḥ kasyacidatītatvaṃ syāt? ityataḥ atīto 'pi na syāt /
atha yathoktadoṣaparijihīrṣayā /
pratyutpanno 'nāgataśca na stastatra punaryadi 		gang gi tshe da ltar dang ma 'ongs pa dag yod pa ma yin pa nyid du gyur pa de'i tshe gang zhig 'das pa nyid du 'gyur ba ga la yod /
de'i phyir 'das par yang mi 'gyur ro /
ci ste ji skad du bshad pa'i skyon spang bar 'dod na /
da ltar byung dang ma 'ongs pa /
gal te de na med gyur na /
pratyutpanno 'nāgataśca syātāṃ kaśramapekṣya tam /
tatra atīte kāle yadi vartamānānāgatau kālau na staḥ iti parikalpyate, evamapi tatra avidyamānatvāt gaganendīvaravannāstyapekṣā 		da ltar byung dang ma 'ongs pa /
ji ltar de la ltos par 'gyur /
gal te da ltar ba dang ma 'ongs pa'i dus de dag 'das pa'i dus de na med par rtog na /
de lta na yang de na yod pa ma yin pas /
athāpi syāt /
kālavādināṃ vidyate eva kālaḥ, tatra kimapekṣayā prayojanamiti? ucyate 		nam mkha'i autpala ltar ltos pa yod pa ma yin no /
ci ste yang dus smra ba rnams kyi ltar na dus yod pa nyid yin na /
de la ltos pas dgos pa ci yod snyam na /
evamapi /
anapekṣya punaḥ siddhirnātītaṃ vidyate tayoḥ 		brjod pa de lta na yang /
'das pa la ni ma ltos par /
de gnyis grub pa yod ma yin /
pratyutpanno 'nāgataśca tasmātkālo na vidyate de phyir da ltar byung ba dang /
ma 'ongs dus kyang yod ma yin /
pratyutpannānāgatayorasattvam, atītānapekṣatvāt, kharaviṣāṇavat da ltar byung ba dang ma 'ongs pa dag yod pa ma yin te /
'das pa la mi ltas pa'i phyir bong bu'i rva bzhin no /
yataścaivam pratyutpanno 'nāgataśca tasmātkālo na vidyate iti vijñeyam /
yadā caivam atītamapekṣya vā anapekṣya vā pratyutpannānāgatayornāsti siddhiḥ, evaṃ pratyutpannāpekṣayā vā anapekṣayā vā atītānāgatayoḥ anāgatāpekṣayā vā anapekṣayā vā pratyutpannātītayoḥ asiddhau iṣyamāṇāyāṃ tenaiva pratyutpannāgatayoḥ atītāpekṣayā vā anapekṣayā asiddhikrameṇa dūṣaṇasāmyamatidiśannāha 		gang gi phyir de lta yin pa de'i phyir da ltar byung ba dang ma 'ongs pa'i dus yod pa ma yin no zhes shes par bya'o /
de ltar na ji ltar 'das pa la ltos pa'am ma ltos pa yang rung ste /
da ltar byung ba dang ma 'ongs pa dag grub pa yod pa ma yin pa de bzhin du /
da ltar byung ba la ltos sam ma ltos kyang rung ste /
'das pa dang ma 'ongs pa dag gam /
ma 'ongs pa la ltos sam ma ltos kyang rung ste /
'das pa dang da ltar byung ba dag ma grub par shes pa na /
da ltar byung ba dang ma 'ongs pa dag 'das pa la ltos sam ma ltos kyang rung ste ma grub pa'i rim pa'i tshul 'di nyid dang sun dbyung ba mtshungs par bsgre ba'i phyir /
etenaivāvaśiṣṭau dvau krameṇa parivartakau rim pa'i tshul ni 'di nyid kyi /
lhag ma gnyis po bsnor ba dang /
uttamādhamamadhyādīnekatvādīṃśca lakṣayet /
kathaṃ kṛtvā? /
yadyatīto 'nāgataśca pratyutpannamapekṣya hi 		mchog dang tha ma 'bring la sogs /
gcig la sogs pa'ang shes par bya /
zhes gsungs so /
ji ltar zhe na /
'das pa dang ni ma 'ongs pa /
gal te da ltar byung ltos na /
kālo 'tīto 'nāgataśca pratyutpanne bhaviṣyataḥ 'das pa dang ni ma 'ongs pa /
da ltar byung dus yod par 'gyur /
kālo 'tīto 'nāgataśca na stastatra punaryadi 'dis pa dang ni ma 'ongs dus /
gal te de ni med gyur na /
kālo 'tīto 'nāgataśca syātāṃ kathamapekṣya tam 'das pa dang ni ma 'ongs dus /
ji ltar de la ltos par gyur /
anapekṣya punaḥ siddhirna jātaṃ vidyate tayoḥ da ltar la ni ma ltos par /
de gnyis grub pa yod ma yin /
tenātīto 'nāgataśca kālo nāma na vidyate de yi phyir na 'das pa dang /
ma 'ongs dus kyang yod ma yin /
zhes bya ste /
eṣa tāvadekaḥ kālaparivartaḥ /
atīto vartamānaśca yadyajātamapekṣya hi 		re zhig 'di ni dus bsnor ba gcig yin no; ;'das dang da ltar byung ba ni /
gal te ma 'ongs ltos gyur na /
'das pa dang ni da ltar byung /
atīto vartamānaśca kāle 'jāte bhaviṣyataḥ /
atīto vartamānaśca na stastatra punaryadi 		ma 'ongs dus na yod par 'gyur /
'das dang da ltar byung ba ni /
gal te de na med gyur na /
'das pa dang ni da ltar byung /
atīto vartamānaśca syātāṃ kathamapekṣya tam ji ltar de la ltos par 'gyur /
ma 'ongs pa la ma ltos par /
anapekṣya punaḥ siddhirnājātaṃ vidyate tayoḥ de gnyis grub pa yod ma yin /
de yi phyir na 'das pa dang /
atīto vartamānaśca tasmātkālo na vidyate /
eṣa dvitīyaḥ kālaparivarta iti vyākhyānakārikā iti 		da ltar dus kyang yod ma yin /
zhes bya ba 'di ni dus bsnor ba gnyis pa ste /
de ltar dus bsnor ba gnyis khong du chud par bya'o /
evaṃdvau kālaparivartau boddhavyau gang gi phyir rnam par dpyad pa na /
yataśca evaṃ vicāraṇe kālatrayaṃ nāsti, tasmāt kālo na vidyate, kālābhāvācca bhāvasadbhāvo 'pi nāsti iti siddham dus gsum med pa de'i phyir dus yod pa ma yin la /
dus med pas dngos po'i rang bzhin yang yod pa ma yin no zhes bya bar grub bo /
yathā caitatkālatrayaṃ vicāritam, evam /
uttamādhamamadhyādīnekatvādīṃśca lakṣayet 		ji ltar dus gsum po 'di rnam par dpyad pa de bzhin du /
mchog dang tha ma 'bring la sogs /
gcig la sogs pa'ang shes par bya ste /
mchog dang tha ma 'bring la sogs /
uttamādhamamadhyamān iti ādiśabdena kuśalākuśalāvyākṛtāni, utpādasthitibhaṅgāḥ, pūrvāntāparāntamadhyāntāḥ, kāmarūpārūpyadhātavaḥ, śaikṣāśaikṣanaivaśaikṣanaivāśaikṣādayo yāvantaḥ padārthāḥ tripadārthasaṃbandhavyavasthitāḥ, te sarve gṛhyante /
ekatvādīṃśca ityanena ādiśabdena dvitvabahutvayo grahaṇāt te eva uttamādayaḥ ekatvādayaśca kālatrayavyākhyānena vyākhyātā veditavyāḥ 		zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i sgras ni /
dge ba dang mi dge ba dang lung du ma bstan pa rnams dang skye ba dang gnas pa dang mi rtag pa rnams dang sngon gyi mtha' dang dbus kyi mtha' dang phyi ma'i mtha' rnams dang 'dod pa dang gzugs dang gzugs med pa'i khams dag dang slob pa dang mi slob pa dang slob pa yang ma yin mi slob pa yang ma yin pa la sogs pa dngos po gsum dang 'brel par gnas pa ji snyed cig yod pa de dag thams cad bsdu'o /
gcig la sogs pa'ang zhes bya ba'i sogs pa'i sgra 'dis ni gnyis pa dang mang po dag sdud do /
mchog la sogs pa dag dang /
gcig la sogs pa de rnams ni /
dus gsum rnam par bshad pas bshad par rig par bya'o /
atrāha /
vidyata eva kālaḥ parimāṇavattvāt 		'dir smras pa /
dus ni yod pa nyid de /
tshad dang ldan pa nyid kyi phyir ro /
iha yannāsti, na tasya parimāṇavattvaṃ vidyate tadyathā kharaviṣāṇasya 'dir gang med pa de la ni tshad dang ldan pa nyid yod pa ma yin te /
dper na ri bong gi rva bzhin no /
asti ca kālasya parimāṇavattvaṃ kṣaṇalavamuhūrtadivasarātryahorātrapakṣamāsasaṃvatsarādibhedena dus la ni skad cig dang thang cig dang yud tsam dang nyin mo dang mtshan mo dang nyin mtshan dang zla ba phyed pa dang zla ba dang nyi ma nur ba dang lo la sogs pa'i dbye bas tshad dang ldan pa nyid yod pa yang yin te /
tasmāt, parimāṇavattvād vidyata eva kālaḥ iti de'i phyir tshad dang ldan pa nyid kyi phyir dus yod pa nyid do /
ucyate /
yadi kālo nāma kaścit syāt, syāttasya parimāṇavattvam 		brjod par bya ste /
gal te dus zhes bya ba 'ga' zhig yod na ni /
de tshad dang ldan pa nyid du yang 'gyur na /
na tvasti /
yasmāt 		yod pa ni ma yin te /
gang gi phyir /
nāsthito gṛhyate kālaḥ sthitaḥ kālo na vidyate mi gnas dus ni 'dzin mi byed /
gang zhig gzung bar bya ba'i dus /
yo gṛhyetāgṛhītaśca kālaḥ prajñapyate katham gnas pa yod pa ma yin pas /
ma bzung dus ni ji ltar gdags /
iha yadi kālo nāma kaścidavasthitaḥ kṣaṇādivyatiriktaḥ syāt, sa kṣaṇādibhiḥ parimāṇavattvād gṛhyeta gal te 'di na dus zhes bya ba skad cig ma la sogs pa la tha dad pa gnas pa 'ga' zhig yod na ni de skad cig la sogs pa dag gi sgo nas tshad dang ldan par 'dzin pa zhig na /
na tu avasthitaḥ kūṭasthaḥ kaścit kālo nāma asti, yaḥ kṣaṇādibhirgṛhyeta dus zhes bya ba gang zhig skad cig ma la sogs pa dag gi sgo nas 'dzin pa ther zug par gnas pa ni yod pa yang ma yin no /
tadevaṃ nāsthito gṛhyate kālaḥ, asthitatvānna gṛhyate ityarthaḥ de'i phyir de ltar na mi gnas dus ni 'dzin mi byed de /
mi gnas pa'i phyir 'dzin par mi 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i don to /
athāpi syāt /
nitya eva avasthitasvabhāvaḥ kālo nāma asti, kṣaṇādibhirabhivyajyate 		ci ste yang dus rtag par gnas pa'i rang bzhin can kho na yod pa yin la /
de skad cig la sogs pa dag gis mngon par gsal bar byed pa yin te /
tathāhi /
kālaḥ pacati bhūtāni kālaḥ saṃharate prajāḥ 		de skad du yang /
dus kyis 'byung ba smin par byed /
kālaḥ supteṣu jāgarti kālo hi duratikramaḥ dus kyis skye dgu sdud par byed /
dus kyis gnyid log sad par byed /
iti /
yaścaivaṃlakṣaṇaḥ so 'vasthitasvabhāvo 'stīti /
ucyate /
evamapi sthitaḥ kālo na vidyate yaḥ kṣaṇādibhirabhivyajyamāno gṛhyeta 		dus las 'da' bar shin tu dka' /
zhes 'byung ba de lta bu'i mtshan nyid can gnas pa'i rang bzhin gang yin pa de ni yod pa yin no snyam na /
brjod par bya ste /
de ltar na yang gang zhig skad cig la sogs pa dag gis mngon par gsal zhing gzung ba dus gnas pa yod pa ma yin no /
kasmāt punaḥ sthitaḥ kālo nāstīti cet, kṣaṇādivyatirekeṇāgṛhyamāṇatvāt /
api ca 		yang ci'i phyir dus gnas pa yod pa ma yin no zhe na /
skad cig la sogs pa las tha dad par ma bzung ba'i phyir ro /
ayaṃ kālaḥ saṃskṛtasvabhāvaḥ san astīti, asaṃskṛtasvabhāvo vā? ubhayaṃ ca saṃskṛtaparīkṣāyāṃ pratiṣiddham gzhan yang dus 'di 'dus byas kyi rang bzhin du gyur pa zhig gam /
'dus ma byas kyi rang bzhin du gyur pa zhig yod par rtog grang na /
gnyi ga yang /
utpādasthitibhaṅgānāmasiddhau nāsti saṃskṛtam skye dang gnas dang 'jig pa dag /
ma grub phyir na 'dus byas med /
saṃskṛtasyāpyasiddhau ca kathaṃ setsyatyasaṃskṛtam 'dus byas rab tu ma grub pas /
'dus ma byas ni ji ltar 'grub /
ityanena /
tadevaṃ nāsti vyavasthitaḥ kālaḥ, yo gṛhyeta /
yaśca idānīṃ kālo na gṛhyate asthitatvādavidyamānasvarūpatvāt, so 'gṛhyamāṇaḥ san kathaṃ kṣaṇādibhiḥ prajñapayituṃ bhāvataḥ pāryata ityāha 		ces bya ba des 'dus byas brtag par bkag zin to /
de'i phyir de ltar na gang zhig gzung bar bya ba dus gnas pa yod pa ma yin no /
dus gang zhig de ltar mi gnas shing yod pa ma yin pa'i phyir gzung ba ma yin pa de ni ma bzung ba yin dang ji ltar skad cig la sogs pa dag gis gdags par nus zhes gsungs pa ni /
agṛhītaśca kālaḥ prajñapyate kathamiti /
tasmānnāstyeva kālaḥ 		ma bzung dus ni ji ltar gdags /
zhes bya ba'o /
de'i phyir dus med pa nyid do /
atrāha /
satyaṃ nāsti nityaḥ kālo nāma kaścid rūpādivyatiriktaḥ svabhāvasiddhaḥ, kiṃ tarhi rūpādīneva sa saṃskārānupādāya prajñaptaḥ kālaḥ kṣaṇādivācyo bhavati, tasmādadoṣa iti 		'dir smras pa /
dus zhes bya ba gzugs la sogs pa las tha dad pa'i rang bzhin du grub pa rtag pa 'ga' zhig med pa ni bden te /
'o na ci zhe na /
'du byed gzugs la sogs pa dag la brten na brtags pa'i dus ni skad cig la sogs pa'i sgras brjod par bya bar 'gyur te; de'i phyir nyes pa med do /
ucyate /
evamapi /
bhāvaṃ pratītya kālaścetkālo bhāvādṛte kutaḥ 		brjod par bya ste /
de lta na yang /
gal te dus ni dngos brten te /
dngos med dus ni ga la yod /
yadyevaṃ bhāvaṃ pratītya kālo bhavatīti bhavatā vyavasthāpyate, yadā khalu bhāvo nāsti, tadā niyataṃ taddhetuko 'pi kālo nāstīti pratipādayannāha /
na ca kaścana bhāvo 'sti 		gal te de ltar dngos po la brten nas dus su 'gyur ro zhes rnam par 'jog na'o /
gang gi tshe dngos po nyid yod pa ma yin pa de'i tshe nges par de'i rgyu can gyi dus kyang yod pa ma yin no zhes bstan pa'i phyir /
dngos po 'ga' yang yod min na /
iti pūrvaṃ vistareṇa pratipāditatvādvakṣyamāṇapratiṣedhācca zhes gsungs te /
gong du rgyas par bstan pa'i phyir dang dgag pa 'chad par 'gyur ba'i yang phyir ro /
yadā caivaṃ na kaścidbhāvo 'sti bhāvataḥ, tadā gang gi tshe de ltar dngos po 'ga' yang yod pa ma yin pa de'i tshe /
kutaḥ kālo bhaviṣyati /
kālābhāvācca na santi kṣaṇalavamuhūrtādayaḥ kālabhedāḥ tatpariṇāmabhūtāḥ, ityataḥ kutaḥ pariṇāmavattvena kālasiddhirbhaviṣyati? tasmānnāstyeva bhāvānāṃ svabhāvaḥ iti /
uktaṃ hi bhagavatā āryahastikakṣyasūtre /
yadi koci dharmāṇa bhavetsvabhāvaḥ tatraiva gaccheya jinaḥ saśrāvako 		dus lta yod par ga la 'gyur /
dus med pas de'i tshad du gyur pa dus kyi bye brag skad cig la sogs pa yang med do /
de'i phyir tshad dang ldan pa nyid kyis dus grub par ga la 'gyur te /
de'i phyir dngos po rnams kyi rang bzhin yod pa ma yin pa nyid do /
bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang 'phags pa glang po'i rtsal gyi mdo las /
kūṭasthadharmāṇa siyā na nirvṛtī na niṣprapañco bhavi jātu paṇḍitaḥ /
iti 		gal te chos rnams rang bzhin 'ga' yod na /
rgyal ba nyan thos bcas pas de mkhyen 'gyur /
tathā /
buddhasahasraśatā ya atītā dharmasahasraśatāni bhaṇitvā /
naiva ca dharma na cākṣara kṣīṇā nāsti samudbhavu tena akṣīṇā /
iti /
tathā /
utpādakāle hi tathāgatasya maitreyanāmā tviha yo bhaviṣyati /
bhaviṣyatīyaṃ kanakāvṛtā mahī tasyā idānīṃ kuta āgamo 'sau /
ullāpanāḥ kāmaguṇā hi pañca vibhrāmaṇā mohana moṣadharmiṇaḥ /
madhyāhnakāle hi yathaiva grīṣme jalaṃ marīcyāṃ hi tathaiva kāmāḥ /
ekena kalpena bhaveddhi loko ākāśabhūto gaganasvabhāvo /
