dāhaṃ vināśaṃ ca payānti bhe[bhī?]ravaḥ kuta āgamaḥ kutra gatiśca teṣām /
iti /
tadyathā /
pañcemāni bhikṣavaḥ saṃjñāmātraṃ pratijñāmātraṃ vyavahāramātraṃ saṃvṛtimātraṃ yaduta atīto 'dhvā anāgato 'dhvā ākāśaṃ nirvāṇaṃ pudgalaśceti /
ityācāryacandrakīrtipādoparacitāyāṃ prasannapadāyāṃ madhyamakavṛttau kālaparīkṣā nāma ekonaviṃśaṃ prakaraṇam /
sāmagrīparīkṣā viṃśatitamaṃ prakaraṇam /
atrāha /
vidyate kālaḥ, phalapravṛttau sahakārikāraṇabhāvāt /
yo nāsti, nāsau sahakārikāraṇabhāvena pratipadyate, vandhyātanayavat /
tasmādasti kālaḥ, sahakārikāraṇabhāvāt /
iha bījāvanisalilajvalanapavanagaganābhidhānahetupratyayasāmagrīṃ pratītya ayamaṅkura upajāyamānaḥ satyāmapi bījādipratyayasāmagryām, ṛtuviśeṣāsaṃnidhānānnopajāyate 		ther zug chos rnams mya ngan 'das mi 'gyur /
mkhas rnams nam yang spyod pa med mi 'gyur /
zhes gsungs la /
de bzhin du /
chos ni stong phrag brgya dag bstan gyur nas /
sangs rgyas 'bum phrag gang dag 'das gyur kyang /
chos dang yi ge dag la zad med de /
skye ba yod min des na zad pa med /
ces bya ba dang de bzhin du /
de bzhin gshegs pa 'byung ba'i dus kyi tshe /
byams pa zhes bya'i rgyal ba 'byung 'gyur zhing /
sa 'di gser gyis bdal ba 'byung 'gyur ba /
de tshe de yi 'byung de ga la yod /
ces bya ba la sogs pa gsungs so /
slob dpon zla ba grags pa'i zhal snga nas sbyar ba'i tshig gsal ba las /
dus brtag pa zhes bya ba rab tu byed pa bcu dgu pa'i 'grel pa'o /
'dir smras pa /
dus ni yod pa nyid de /
'bras bu 'byung ba la lhan cig byed pa'i rkyen yin pa'i phyir ro /
gang med pa de ni lhan cig byed pa'i ngo bo ma yin te mo gsham gyi bu bzhin no /
de'i phyir dus ni yod pa nyid de /
lhan cig byed pa'i rkyen yin pa'i phyir ro /
'di na myu gu gang zhig sa bon dang sa dang chu dang me dang rlung dang nam mkha' dang dus zhes bya ba rgyu dang rkyen tshogs pa la brten nas skye ba ni /
sa bon la sogs pa'i rgyu dang rkyen tshogs pa yod kyang dus kyi khyad par nye bas mi skye ba yin no /
yathā ca bāhyeṣu, evamādhyātmikeṣvapi /
yathoktaṃ bhagavatā 		phyi rol dag la ji lta ba de bzhin du nang gi bdag nyid la yang yin te /
bcom ldan 'das kyis /
na praṇaśyanti karmāṇi kalpakoṭiśatairapi lus can rnams kyi las rnams ni /
bskal pa brgyar yang chud mi za /
sāmagrīṃ prāpya kālaṃ ca phalanti khalu dehinām tshogs shing dus la bab pa na /
'bras bu nyid du smin par 'gyur /
iti /
yasmācca evamasti kālāpekṣā, tasmādastyasau kālo nāma, yaḥ aṅkurādipravṛttau sahakārikāraṇaṃ bhavatīti 		zhes ji skad du gsungs pa lta bu'o /
gang gi phyir de ltar dus de la ltos pa yod pa de'i phyir gang zhig myu gu la sogs pa byung ba la lhan cig byed pa'i rkyen du 'gyur ba dus zhes bya ba de yod pa yin no /
ucyate /
syāt sahakārikāraṇatā kālasya, yadi aṅkurādiphalasya pravṛttireva syāt 		brjod par bya ste /
gal te myu gu la sogs pa 'bras bu 'byung ba nyid yod na ni /
dus lhan cig byed pa'i rgyu nyid du 'gyur ba zhig na /
yod pa ni ma yin no /
na tvasti ji ltar zhe na /
kathaṃ kṛtvā? iha bījādihetupratyayasāmagrīto 'ṅkurādiphalodaye parikalpyamāne vyavasthitasya vā phalasya sāmagryāṃ satyāṃtata utpādaḥ parikalpyeta avyavasthitasya vā? kiṃ cātaḥ? yadi tāvad vyavasthitasya parikalpyate, tanna yujyate iti pratipādayannāha 'dir sa bon la sogs pa rgyu dang rkyen gyi tshogs pa las myu gu la sogs pa 'bras bu skye bar rtog pa na /
'bras bu tshogs pa la rnam par gnas pa zhig gam /
mi gnas pa zhig de las skye bar rtog grang /
de las cir 'gyur zhe na /
gal te rnam par gnas pa zhig la rtog na ni /
de ni mi rung ngo zhes bstan pa'i phyir /
hetośca pratyayānāṃ ca sāmagryā jāyate yadi gal te rgyu dang rkyen rnams kyi /
tshogs pa nyid las skye 'gyur zhing /
phalamasti ca sāmagryāṃ sāmagryā jāyate katham tshogs la 'bras bu yod na ni /
ji ltar tshogs pa nyid las skye /
yadi hetupratyayasāmagryāṃ tvanmatena phalamasti, nanu evaṃ sati yasmāt sāmagryāmasti, kathaṃ tayā tajjanyate? na hi kuṇḍe dadhi vidyamānaṃ kuṇḍena janyate /
api ca /
yadvidyate tanniṣpannatvāt niṣpannapurovasthitaghaṭavat na punarjanmāpekṣate 		zhes gsungs te; gal te rgyu dang rkyen gyi tshogs pa las 'bras bu yod na ni /
de lta na gang zhig tshogs pa la yod pa de ji ltar des bskyed par 'gyur te /
khar gzhong na yod pa'i zho ni khar gzhong gis bskyed pa ma yin no /
gzhan yang gang yod pa de ni grub zin pa'i phyir /
abhivyaktiḥ sthaulyaṃ vā sūkṣmātmanā vidyamānasya kriyata iti cet, tasyāpi pakṣasya pūrvameva grub zin pa'i bum pa mdun na gnas pa ltar yang skye ba la ltos pa med pa yin no /
gal te mngon par gsal ba'am rags par byed pa yin no zhe na /
ma yin te /
phyogs 'di la gong du lan btab zin pa'i phyir ro /
āgacchatyanyato nāgnirindhane 'gnirna vidyate me ni gzhan las mi 'ong ste /
shing la'ang me ni yod ma yin /
ityatroktamuttaram /
atha nāstyeva sāmagryāṃ phalamiti parikalpyate, etadapi nopapadyate iti pratipādayannāha 		de bzhin zhes bya ba der lan brjod zin to /
ci ste tshogs pa la 'bras bu med do zhes rtog na /
de yang mi 'thad do zhes bstan pa'i phyir /
hetośca pratyayānāṃ ca sāmagryā jāyate yadi gal te rgyu dang rkyen rnams kyi /
tshogs pa nyid las skye 'gyur zhing /
phalaṃ nāsti ca sāmagryāṃ sāmagryā jāyate katham /
yadi hetośca pratyayānāṃ ca sāmagryāṃ nāsti tatphalam, kathaṃ tarhi hetupratyayasāmagryā phalaṃ janyate? tatra avidyamānatvāt sikatābhiriva tailam 		tshogs la 'bras bu med na ni /
ji ltar tshogs pa nyid las skye; /
zhes gsungs te /
gal te rgyu dang rkyen rnams kyi tshogs pa la 'bras bu de med na ni /
'o na ji ltar rgyu dang rkyen tshogs pas 'bras bu bskyed de /
de na yod pa ma yin pa'i phyir bye ma dag gi til mar bzhin no /
ata eva asaṃbhāvayannāha de nyid kyi phyir mi srid pas /
phalaṃ nāsti ca sāmagryāṃ sāmagryā jāyate katham tshogs la 'bras bu med na ni /
ji ltar tshogs pa nyid las skye /
na tatphalaṃ sāmagrīto jāyate ityabhiprāyaḥ zhes gsungs te /
'bras bu de tshogs pa nyid las mi skye ba nyid do snyam du dgongs pa yin no /
kiṃ cānyat gzhan yang /
hetośca pratyayānāṃ ca sāmagryāmasti cetphalam gal te rgyu dang rkyen rnams kyi /
tshogs la 'bras bu yod na ni /
gṛhyeta nanu sāmagryāṃ sāmagryāṃ ca na gṛhyate tshogs la gzung du yod rigs na /
tshogs pa nyid la gzung du med /
yad yatra asti, tat tatra gṛhyate, tadyathā kuṇḍe dadhi gang zhig gang na yod pa de ni der gzung du yod de /
dper na khar gzhong gi zho bzhin la /
yacca yatra nāsti na tattatra gṛhyate tadyathā sikatāsu tailam, maṇḍūkajaṭāyāṃ śiromaṇiḥ gang zhig gang na yod pa ma yin pa de ni der gzung du yod pa ma yin te /
dper na bye ma dag la 'bru mar lta bu'o /
atha syāt /
vidyamānā api padārthāḥ atisaukṣmyāt, atisaṃnikarṣāt, ativiprakarṣāt, indriyopaghātāt, mūrtivaddravyavyavadhānāt, mūrtyantardhānāt, manonavasthānāt, paramāṇuvat akṣasthāñjanaśalākāvat ādityagativat taimirikaikaikakeśavat andhabadhirādirūpaśabdādivat kuḍayādivyavahitaghaṭādivat siddhadevapiśācādiśarīravat viṣayāntaravyāpṛtasya viṣayāntaravanna gṛhyate iti cet, kiṃ khalu eṣāmagṛhyamāṇānāmastitve liṅgam, yena eṣāmastitve sati anupalabdhiriti syāt? anumānopamānāgamairgrahaṇādeṣāmastitvamiti cet, na tarhi teṣāmanupalabdhiriti vaktavyam, anumānādibhirupalabhyamānatvāt 		ci ste dngos po rnams yod kyang /
shin tu phra ba dang shin tu nye ba dang shin tu ring ba dang dbang po la rnyog pa chags pa dang dbang po la gnod pa byas ba dang lus can gyi rdzas kyis chod pa dang lus mi snang bar 'gyur ba dang yid la ma bzung ba'i phyir phra rab dang mig la gnas pa'i mig sman gyi thur ma dang nyi ma'i 'gros dang rab rib can gyi skra re re dang long ba dang 'on pa la sogs pa'i gzugs dang sgra la sogs pa dang rtsig pa la sogs pas bar du bcad pa'i bum pa dang grub pa dang lha dang sha za la sogs pa'i lus dang yul gzhan yid la byed pa dang bcas pa'i yul gzhan ltar gzung du med pa yin no zhe na /
'on gang gis na 'di dag yod bzhin du mi dmigs par 'gyur ba /
ma bzung ba 'di dag yod pa nyid la rtag cing yod /
rjes su dpag pa dang nye bar 'jal ba dang lung rnams kyis 'dzin pa'i phyir de dag yod pa nyid do zhe na /
'o na de dag ma dmigs so /
zhes brjod par mi bya ste /
rjes su dpag pa la sogs pa dag gis dmigs pa'i phyir ro /
yad rūpīndriyagrāhyaṃ tad ebhiḥ kāraṇairvidyamānamapi sanna gṛhyate, iti cet, ucyate gal te dbang po gzugs can gyis gzung bar bya ba de gang yin pa de yod kyang byed pa dag gis ma bzung ba yin no zhe na /
kimasmābhirevamuktam /
rūpīndriyairvidyamānaṃ sad gṛhyeteti? kiṃ tarhi sāmānyenaiva yad brūmaḥ 		brjod pa /
ci kho bo cag gis yod bzhin par gyur pa dbang po gzugs can dag gis gzung du med do zhes de skad du smras sam /
'o na ci zhe na /
gṛhyeta nanu sāmagryāmiti kho bo cag ni /
tshogs la gzung du yod rigs na /
athāpi manyase zhes spyir smra'o /
yad yatra nāsti, na tat tasmādutpadyate sikatābhyastailavat ci ste yang gang zhig gang na med pa de ni de las skye ba ma yin te /
bye ma dag las 'bru mar bzhin no /
utpadyate ca sāmagrītaḥ phalam, tasmādanumānataḥ sāmagryāṃ phalasyāstitvamiti 'bras bu ni tshogs pa las skye ba yang yin te /
de'i phyir tshogs pa la 'bras bu yod pa nyid ni rjes su dpag pa las yin no snyam du sems na /
ucyate brjod pa /
yad yatra asti, na tat tasmādutpadyate, tadyathā kuṇḍād dadhi iti /
asmādapyanumānādastitvamasya ayuktamiti kṛtvā nāstyeva sāmagryāṃ phalamiti kiṃ na gṛhyate? 		gang zhig gang na yod pa de ni de las skye ba ma yin te /
dper na khar gzhong las zho mi skye ba bzhin no zhes rjes su dpag pa 'di las de yod par mi rigs pa'i phyir tshogs pa 'bras bu med pa nyid do zhes ci ste mi gzung /
athāpi syāt /
ubhyorapi pakṣayoranumānavirodhād yathā astitvaṃ na yuktam, evaṃ nāstitvamapīti /
ucyate /
na vayamasyāsattvaṃ pratipādayāmaḥ, kiṃ tarhi paraparikalpitaṃ sattvamasya nirākurmaḥ 		ci ste yang phyogs gnyi ga yang rjes su dpag pa dang 'gal ba'i phyir na ji ltar yod pa nyid mi rigs pa de bzhin du med pa nyid kyang mi rigs so snyam na /
brjod par bya ste /
kho bo cag ni 'di med par sgrub pa ma yin gyi /
'o na ci zhe na /
'di gzhan gyis yod pa nyid du yongs su brtags pa 'gog pa yin no /
de bzhin du kho bo cag ni 'di yod pa nyid du sgrub pa ma yin te /
evaṃ na vayamasya sattvaṃ pratipādayāmaḥ, kiṃ tarhi paraparikalpitamasattvamasya apākurmaḥ /
antadvayaparihāreṇa madhyamāyāḥ pratipadaḥ pratipādayitumiṣṭatvāditi 		'o na ci zhe na /
'di gzhan gyis med pa nyid du brtags pa sel ba yin te /
mtha' gnyis bsal nas dbu ma'i lam sgrub par 'dod pa'i phyir ro /
brgya ba las kyang /
uktaṃ ca āryadevapādīye śatake 'bras bu yod nyid gang 'dod dang /
stambhādīnāmalaṃkāro gṛhasyārthe nirarthakaḥ 'bras bu med nyid gang 'dod la /
khyim gyi don du ka ba la /
satkāryameva yasyeṣṭaṃ yasyāsatkāryameva ca /
iti 		sogs pa'i rgyan ni don med 'gyur /
zhes bshad do /
tadevaṃ na sāmagrītaḥ phalamutpadyate vidyamānasya grahaṇaprasaṅgāt, iti vyavasthitam /
atha manyase 		de'i phyir de ltar na tshogs pa las 'bras bu skye ba ma yin te /
yod pa ni gzung du yod par thal bar 'gyur ba'i phyir ro zhes bya bar rnam par gzhag pa yin no /
nāstyeva sāmagryāṃ phalamiti, evamapi /
hetośca pratyayānāṃ ca sāmagryāṃ nāsti cetphalam /
hetavaḥ pratyayāśca syurahetupratyayaiḥ samāḥ 		ci ste tshogs pa la 'bras bu med pa nyid do snyam du sems na de lta na yang /
gal te rgyu dang rkyen rnams kyi /
tshogs la 'bras bu med na ni /
rgyu rnams dang ni rkyen dag kyang /
rgyu rkyen ma yin mtshungs par 'gyur /
ji ltar me dang sol ba la sogs pa dag la myu gu med pa'i phyir na /
yathā hi jvālāṅgārādiṣu aṅkuro nāstīti kṛtvā tasya te hetupratyayā na bhavanti, eva vivakṣitānāmapi bījādīnāṃ hetupratyayatā na syāt teṣu aṅkuro nāstīti kṛtvā de dag de'i rgyur mi 'gyur ba de bzhin du; sa bon la sogs pa brjod par 'dod pa rnams kyang rgyu dang rkyen nyid du mi 'gyur te /
de dag la myu gu med pa'i phyir ro /
na ca ahetu pratyayebhyaḥ phalapravṛttiryukteti nāsti svabhāvataḥ phalapravṛttiḥ rgyu dang rkyen ma yin pa dag las ni 'bras bu 'byung bar rigs pa yang ma yin te /
de'i phyir 'bras bu 'byung ba med do /
atrāha /
naiva hi sāmagryāḥ phalotpādanasāmarthyamasti yataḥ iyaṃ cintā syāt /
kiṃ sāmagryāṃ phalamasti utāho nāstīti 		'dir smras pa /
gang las ci tshogs pa las 'bras bu yod dam 'on te med ces bya ba'i bsam pa 'dir 'gyur ba /
tshogs pa la ni 'bras bu bskyed pa'i nus pa med do /
kiṃ tarhi hetoḥ phalotpādanasāmarthyam 'o na ci zhe na /
rgyu la 'bras bu bskyed pa'i nus pa yod la /
sāmagrī tu hetoranugrahamātraṃ karoti tshogs pas ni rgyu la phan 'dogs pa tsam zhig byed pa yin no /
sa hetuḥ phalasyotpattyarthaṃ hetuṃ datvā nirudhyate, tena ca hetunā anugṛhyamāṇaṃ phalamutpadyate iti rgyu de ni 'bras bu bskyed par bya ba'i phyir rgyu byin nas 'gag par 'gyur la /
rgyu des phan btags pa'i 'bras bu yang skye ba yin no /
ucyate /
naiva hi ajātasya phalasya hetoranugrahaṇamasti 		brjod par bya ste /
'bras bu ma skyes pa'i rgyu la ni phan 'dogs pa yod pa ma yin la /
na cāpyajātasya bandhyātanayasyeva kenacitkiṃcinmātraṃ kartuṃ śakyamityayuktaiṣā kalpanā ma skyes pa la ni mo gsham gyi bu ltar sus kyang cung zad tsam yang byed par mi nus pas rtog pa 'di ni mi rigs so /
api ca gzhan yang /
hetukaṃ phalasya datvā yadi heturnirudhyate gal te rgyus ni 'bras bu la /
rgyu byin nas ni 'gag 'gyur na /
yaddattaṃ yanniruddhaṃ ca hetorātmadvayaṃ bhavet /
yadi hetuḥ phalasyotpattyarthaṃ hetukaṃ kāraṇaṃ datvā nirudhyata iti parikalpyate, evaṃ sati yaddattaṃ yanniruddhaṃ ca tadātmabhāvadvayaṃ hetoḥ syāt 		gang byin pa dang gang 'gag pa'i /
rgyu yi bdag nyid gnyis su 'gyur /
gal te rgyu des 'bras bu skyed pa'i phyir rgyu de byed rgyu byin nas 'gag par 'gyur ro zhes rtog na ni /
de lta na rgyu'i bdag nyid gang byin pa dang gang 'gag pa de gnyis su 'gyur na /
de ni rigs pa yang ma yin te /
na caitad yuktam, ardhaśāśvataprasaṅgāt nityānityayośca parasparaviruddhayorekatvābhāvāt /
atha hetorātmabhāvadvayaprasaṅgaparihārārthaṃ sarvātmanā nirodha iṣyate phalasyotpattyarthaṃ kiṃcidapyadatvā, evamapi 		phyed rtag par thal bar 'gyur ba'i phyir dang phyed mi rtag par 'gyur ba'i phyir ro /
rtag pa dang mi rtag pa phan tshun 'gal ba dag kyang gcig la med pa'i phyir ro /
ci ste rgyu'i bdag nyid gnyis su thal ba spang bar bya ba'i don du 'bras bu skyed par byed pa'i phyir cung zad kyang ma byin par bdag nyid thams cad kyi rgyu'i 'gag par 'dod na ni /
de lta na yang /
hetuṃ phalasyādatvā ca yadi heturnirudhyate gal te rgyus ni 'bras bu la /
rgyu ma byin par 'gag 'gyur na /
hetau niruddhe jātaṃ tatphalamāhetukaṃ bhavet rgyu 'gags nas ni skyes pa yi /
'bras bu de ni rgyu med 'gyur /
yadi phalasya kiṃcidapyadatvā sarvātmanā heturnirudhyate, nanu tasmin hetau niruddhe yatphalamutpadyate tat āhetukaṃ syāt /
na ca āhetukamasti 		gal te 'bras bu la cung zad kyang ma byin par bdag nyid thams cad kyis rgyu 'gags na ni /
de ltar rgyu de 'gags nas skyes pa'i 'bras bu gang yin pa de rgyu med pa kho nar 'gyur na /
ityayuktaiṣā kalpanā /
atrāha /
yadi evaṃ phalasya hetorutpattau doṣaḥ, evaṃ sati sahotpannaiva sāmagrī phalasya janikā astu, tadyathā pradīpaprabhāyā iti 		rgyu med pa ni yod pa ma yin pas rtog pa 'di ni mi rigs so /
'dir smras pa /
gal te 'bras bu rgyu las skye bas nyes pa 'dir 'gyur na ni /
de ltar na tshogs pa dang lhan cig skyes pa kho na 'bras bu skyed par byed pa yin par 'gyur te /
dper na sgron ma 'od kyis skyed par byed pa yin pa bzhin no /
eṣāpi kalpanā nopapadyate iti pratipādayannāha /
phalaṃ sahaiva sāmagryā yadi prādurbhavetpunaḥ 		rtog pa 'di yang 'thad pa ma yin no zhes bstan pa'i phyir; gal te tshogs dang lhan cig tu /
'bras bu yang ni skye 'gyur na /
ekakālau prasajyete janako yaśca janyate skyed par byed dang bskyed bya gang /
dus gcig par ni thal bar 'gyur /
na caikakālayoḥ savyetaragoviṣāṇayorjanyajanakatvaṃ dṛṣṭam, vāmadakṣiṇakarayoścaraṇayorvā, ityayuktaiṣā kalpanā ityayuktametat zhes gsungs te /
ba glang gi rva g yas g yon dus gcig pa dag ni bskyed par bya ba dang skyed par byed pa nyid du yang ma mthong bas /
'di ni mi rigs so /
atrāhureke 'dir kha cig na re /
naiva hi abhūtvā bhāvānāmutpattiryuktā ākasmikatvaprasaṅgāt /
tasmād hetupratyayasāmagrītaḥ pūrvameva tat phalamanāgatāvasthāyāṃ vyavasthitamanāgatātmanā 		dngos po rnams ma byung ba las skye ba ni med de /
glo bur bar thal bar 'gyur ba'i phyir ro /
de'i phyir 'bras bu de ni rgyu dang rkyen gyis tshogs pa'i snga rol ma 'ongs pa'i gnas skabs na gnas pa yin la /
tasya hetupratyaya sāmagryā vartamānāvasthā janyate, dravyaṃ tu vyavasthitameveti rgyu dang rkyen gyi tshogs pas ni de da ltar ba'i gnas skabs su bskyed pa yin gyi /
rdzas ni gnas pa nyid do zhes zer ro /
tān pratyucyate de dag la brjod pa ni /
pūrvameva ca sāmagryāḥ phalaṃ prādurbhavedyadi gal te tshogs pa'i snga rol du /
'bras bu skyes par gyur na ni /
rgyu dang rkyen rnams med pa yi /
hetupratyayanirmuktaṃ phalamāhetukaṃ bhavet 'bras bu rgyu med 'byung bar 'gyur /
zhes bya ba ste /
yadi bhavatāmabhīpsitaṃ sāmagrītaḥ pūrvameva phalaṃ svarūpataḥ syāditi, tad hetupratyayanirapekṣaṃ syāt, tataśca āhetukaṃ syāt gal te tshogs pa'i snga rol na 'bras bu rang gi ngo bos yod par gyur na ni /
de rgyu dang rkyen la ltos pa med par 'gyur la /
de'i phyir rgyu med par 'byung bar 'gyur na /
na ca āhetukānāṃ padārthānāmastitvaṃ yuktam, kharaturagoragaviṣāṇādīnāmapyastitvaprasaṅgāt, pūrvasiddhasya ca punaḥ hetupratyayāpekṣayā niṣprayojanatvādityayuktametat dngos po rgyu med par 'byung ba dag ni yod pa nyid kyang ma yin te bong bu'i rva la sogs pa rnams kyang yod par thal bar 'gyur ba'i phyir ro /
sngar grub zin pa la yang rgyu dang rkyen la ltos pas dgos pa med pa'i phyir yang 'di rigs pa ma yin no /
anye punarvarṇayanti yang gzhan dag ni /
hetureva phalaṃ janayati na sāmagrī 'bras bu ni rgyu kho nas skyed par byed kyi /
tshogs pas ni ma yin la /
na ca uktadoṣaprasaṅgaḥ bshad zin pa'i nyes par thal ba yang ma yin te /
yasmāt na hi anyohetuḥ anyat phalam 'di ltar gang las ci rgyus 'bras bu la rgyu byin nas 'gag par 'gyur ram /
yataḥ, kiṃ hetuṃ datvā phalasya heturnirudhyate uta adatvaiveti vicāraḥ syāt /
api tu hetureva niruddhaḥ phalātmanā vyavasthitaḥ iti 		'on te ma byin par yin zhes rnam par dpyod par 'gyur ba /
rgyu yang gzhan la 'bras bu yang gzhan pa ni ma yin gyi /
'on kyang rgyu nyid 'gags nas 'bras bu'i bdag nyid du rnam par gnas pa yin no zhes 'dzer to /
ucyate /
evamapi 		de lta na yang /
niruddhe cetphalaṃ hetau hetoḥ saṃkramaṇaṃ bhavet /
pūrvajātasya hetośca punarjanma prasajyate 		la te rgyu 'gags 'bras bu na /
rgyu ni kun du 'pho bar 'gyur /
sngon skyes pa yi rgyu yang ni /
yadi niruddhe hetau bhavanmatena phalamutpadyate, tacca phalaṃ hetvātmakameva bhavatīti parikalpyate, evaṃ sati hetoḥ saṃkramaṇaṃ bhavet, naṭasya veṣāntaraparityāgena veṣāntarasaṃcāravat hetoḥ saṃkramaṇa mātrameva syāt, na tu apūrvasya phalasyotpādaḥ yang skye bar ni thal bar 'gyur /
gal te rgyu 'gags pa na 'bras bu skye la 'bras bu de yang rgyu'i bdag nyid can kho na yin no zhes rtog na /
de lta yin na ni /
rgyu ni kun du 'pho bar 'gyur te /
zlos gar mkhan cha byad gzhan btang nas cha byad gzhan len pa ltar rgyu 'pho ba tsam zhig tu 'gyur gyi /
'bras bu snga na med pa skye ba ni ma yin no /
tataśca hetornityataiva syāt /
na ca nityānāmastitvaṃ kvacidasti 		de'i phyir rgyu rtag pa nyid du 'gyur na /
rtag pa dag ni yod pa nyid kyang ma yin no /
yathoktaṃ śatake ji skad du brgya pa las /
apratītyāstitā nāsti kadācitkasyacitkvacit gang zhig gang na nam gyi tshe 'ang /
ma bsten par ni yod nyid med /
na kadācitkvacitkaścidvidyate tena śāśvataḥ des na nam yang gang zhig tu /
rtag pa 'ga' yang yod ma yin /
iti /
kiṃ ca /
etasyāṃ kalpanāyāṃ pūrvajātasya ca hetoḥ punarjanma prāpnoti /
na ca jātasya punarapi [janma] yujyate niṣprayojanatvāt, anavasthāprasaṅgācca 		zhes bshad do /
gzhan yang rtog pa 'di la ni /
sngon skyes pa'i rgyu yang skye bar 'gyur na /
skyes pa ni slar yang skye bar mi rigs te /
dgos pa med pa'i phyir dang thug pha med par thal bar 'gyur ba'i phyir ro /
atha manyase /
yenātmanā vidyamāno na tenaivātmanā jāyate, yena cātmanā avidyamānaḥ tenaiva jāyata iti 		ci ste bdag nyid gang gis yod pa'i bdag nyid de skye ba ni ma yin gyi /
bdag nyid gang gis yod pa ma yin pa de kho na skye ba yin no snyam na /
etadapi na yuktam /
aparityaktahetusvabhāvasya hetusvarūpasya phalamiti saṃjñāmātrabhedādavasthābhedācca dravyābhedasya sādhayitumaśakyatvāt /
phalāvasthāyāṃ ca parityaktahetusvabhāvasya phalaśabdavācyatvād hetuḥ phalātmanā tiṣṭhatīti yatkiṃcidetat 		'di yang mi rung ste /
rgyu'i rang gi ngo bo rgyu'i rang bzhin ma spangs pa la 'bras bu yin no zhes bya bar ming tsam zhig tha dad pa yin pa'i phyir dang gnas skabs tha dad na yang rdzas tha mi dad par sgrub par mi nus pa'i phyir dang 'bras bu'i gnas skabs na rgyu'i rang bzhin yongs su spangs pa ni 'bras bu'i sgras brjod par bya ba yin pa'i phyir na rgyu 'bras bu'i bdag nyid du gnas so zhes bya ba 'di ni gyi na'o /
kiṃ cānyat /
yadi hetuḥ phalaṃ janayet, niruddho vā janayedaniruddho vā? phalamapi utpannaṃ vā janayedanutpannaṃ vā? ubhayathā ca nopapadyate iti pratipādayannāha 		gzhan yang /
gal te rgyus 'bras bu skyed par byed na /
de 'gags pa'am ma 'gags pa zhig gis skyed par byed /
'bras bu yang skyes pa'am ma skyes pa zhig bskyed grang na /
gnyi ga ltar yang mi 'thad do zhes bstan pa'i phyir /
janayetphalamutpannaṃ niruddho 'staṃgataḥ katham 'gags pa nub par gyur pa zhig /
'bras bu skyes pa ji ltar skyed /
tiṣṭhannapi kathaṃ hetuḥ phalena janayeddhṛtaḥ 'bras bu dang ni 'brel pa'i rgyu /
gnas pas kyang ni ji ltar skyed /
ces gsungs te /
[yadi tāvata niruddhaḥ astaṃgataḥ hetuḥ utpannaṃ sat vidyamānaṃ phalaṃ janayatīti parikalpyate, tannopapadyate gal te re zhig 'gags pa nub cing zhig par gyur pa'i rgyus 'bras bu skyes pa ste yod cing bdog pa bskyed do zhes bya bar rtog na ni de ni mi 'thad do /
ci'i phyir zhe na /
kasmāditi cet, kathaṃ niruddhaḥ asaṃvidyamānaḥ hetuḥ phalaṃ janayet? yadi janayati, vandhyāputro 'pi putraṃ janayiṣyati ji ltar 'gags pa yod pa ma yin pa'i rgyus 'bras bu skyed par byed par 'gyur /
gal te 'bras bu skyed na ni mo gsham gyi bus kyang bu skyed par 'gyur ro /
phalaṃ ca sad vidyamānamapi janmanirapekṣamapi kathaṃ heturjanayi ṣyati? atha manyase 'bras bu yod cing bdog pa yang skye ba la ltos pa med pa yang rgyus ji ltar bskyed par 'gyur /
ci ste yang nus pa med pa'i phyir 'gags pas ni mi bskyed de /
śaktyabhāvānniruddho na janayati, kiṃ tu tiṣṭhanneva hetuḥ phalaṃ janayiṣyatīti 'o na ci zhe na /
rgyu gnas pa kho nas 'bras bu bskyed par 'gyur ro snyam na /
ucyate /
] tiṣṭhannapi heturavikṛtarūpo vidyamānena phalena vṛtaḥ saṃbaddhaḥ kathaṃ janayet? iha hi 		brjod pa /
'bras bu dang ni 'brel pa'i rgyu /
gnas pas kyang ni ji ltar bskyed /
'bras bu yod pa dang 'brel pa ste yang dag par 'brel pa'i rgyu 'gyur ba med pa'i rang bzhin can gnas pas kyang ji ltar bskyed par 'gyur /
'dir /
kāraṇaṃ vikṛtiṃ gacchajjāyate 'nyasya kāraṇam rgyu ni rnam par 'gyur ba na /
gzhan gyi rgyu ru 'gyur ba yin /
iti kāraṇābhāvaṃ pratipadyamānasya hetoravaśyaṃ vikāreṇa bhavitavyam zhes bya ba'i rgyu rgyu'i dngos por rtogs bzhin pa ni gdon mi za bar rnam par 'gyur ba yin dgos la /
yastu na vikriyate, sa hetulakṣaṇayukta eva na bhavatīti /
phalena ca saṃbaddhaḥ kathaṃ janayet? phalasya vidyamānatvāt 		gang zhig rnam par mi 'gyur ba de ni rgyu'i mtshan nyid dang ldan pa ma yin pas 'bras bu dang 'brel pas ji ltar bskyed par 'gyur te /
atha manyase /
vidyamānasya phalasya punarjanayitumaśakyatvāt avṛta eva asaṃbaddha eva hetuḥ phalena phalaṃ janayiṣyatīti, etadapyayuktamityāha 		'bras bu yod pa nyid kyi phyir ro /
'on te 'bras bu yod pa yang bskyed par mi nus pa'i phyir 'bras bu dang ma 'brel zhing /
yang dag par 'brel pa med pa'i rgyu kho nas 'bras bu bskyed par 'gyur ro snyam na /
'di yang mi rigs so zhes gsungs pa ni /
ci ste rgyu 'bras ma 'brel na /
athāvṛtaḥ phalenāsau katamajjanayetphalam /
yadi hetuḥ phalena asaṃbaddha eveṣyate, tadā katamadidānīṃ phalaṃ janayet? sarvameva vā phalaṃ janayedasaṃbaddhatvāt, na vā kiṃcijjanayedasaṃbaddhatvādevetyabhiprāyaḥ 		'bras bu gang zhig skyed par byed /
ces bya ste /
gal te rgyu 'bras bu dang ma 'brel par 'dod na /
da ni 'bras bu gang zhig skyed par byed de /
ma 'brel pa'i phyir 'bras bu'o cog skyed par byed pa'am yang na cung zad kyang skyed par byed par mi 'gyur te /
'brel pa med pa'i phyir ro zhes bya bar dgongs pa'o /
kiṃ cānyat /
yadi hetuḥ phalaṃ janayet, sa dṛṣṭvā phalaṃ janayedadṛṣṭvā vā? ubhayathā ca na yujyate ityāha 		gzhan yang /
'dir gal te rgyus 'bras bu skyed par byed na /
des 'bras bu de mthong nas sam ma mthong bar skyed par byed grang na /
gnyi ga ltar na yang mi rung ngo zhes gsungs pa ni /
rgyus ni mthong dang ma mthong bar /
na hyadṛṣṭvā vā dṛṣṭvā vā heturjanayate phalam /
tatra yadi heturdṛṣṭvā janayatīti parikalpyate, tanna yujyate 		'bras bu skyed par mi byed do /
zhes bya ba'o /
de la gal te mthong nas skyed par byed do zhes rtog na /
de ni mi rigs te /
yasmādvidyamānameva draṣṭuṃ pāryate nāvidyamānam gang gi phyir yod pa kho na mthong bar nus kyi /
yod pa ma yin pa ni ma yin no /
yod pa yin no zhe na ni /
vidyamānaṃ cet, tanna janyate vidyamānatvāditi de bskyed par bya ba ma yin te /
yod pa'i phyir ro /
evaṃ tāvad hetuḥ phalaṃ dṛṣṭvā na janayati, adṛṣṭvāpi na janayati, sarvasya phalasya hetorjanakatvaprasaṅgāt /
atha kimidaṃ darśanaṃ kiṃ vā adarśanamiti? ucyate 		de ltar na re zhig rgyus 'bras bu mthong nas skyed par mi byed do /
ma mthong bar yang skyed par mi byed de /
'bras bu thams cad kyi skyed par byed pa nyid du thal bar 'gyur ba'i phyir ro /
ci ste mthong ba 'di go ci zhig yin zhe na /
prasiddhametalloke brjod par bya ste /
upalabdhirdarśanamiti /
nanu etad bījādiṣu nirindriyeṣu na saṃbhavati 		mthong ba ni dmigs pa'o zhes bya ba 'di ni 'jig rten du grags pa yin no /
gal te dbang po med pas sa bon la sogs pa dag la 'di mi srid pa ma yin nam zhe na /
saṃbhavatu mā vā srid dam mi srid kyang rung ste /
nāsmākamayaṃ paryanuyogaḥ kiṃ tarhi tasyotpādavādinaḥ /
tatra yaḥ utpādavādī brūyāt 		kho bo cag la ni brgal zhing brtag par ni mi bya ste /
'o na su la zhe na /
skye bar smra ba de la'o /
dṛṣṭvā janayatīti, sa vaktavyaḥ /
na dṛṣṭametalloke yadbījādikaṃ paśyatīti /
tasmādayuktā eṣā kalpanā /
atha adṛṣṭvā kalpayet, evamapi yatkiṃcidadṛṣṭaṃ saṃbhavati tatsarvamutpādayet, na cotpādayati, tasmāt na adṛṣṭvāpi janayati 		de la gal te skye bar smra ba po mthong nas skyed par byed do zhes smra na /
sa bon la sogs pas mthong ngo zhes bya ba gang yin pa 'di ni 'jig rten du ma mthong ngo zhes de la brjod par bya'o; ;de'i phyir rtog pa 'di mi rigs so /
ci ste ma mthong bar zhes rtog par byed na /
de lta na yang gang ma mthong ba gang cung zad cig yod pa de thams cad skyed par byed par 'gyur na /
bskyed pa yang ma yin no /
aniṣṭāpattyā hi vayaṃ parakalpanāṃ vicārayāmaḥ saṃsārāṭavīkāntāragiridarīprapātaduḥkhamālāsamākulāmā tāmīva de'i phyir ma mthong bar yang skyed par byed pa ma yin no /
kho bo cag ni mi 'dod pa bsgrubs pas gzhan gyis brtags pa 'gog par byed pa yin te /
buddhipūrvakartṛkaṃ ca puruṣādikāraṇino jagadabhyupagacchanto nirgranthāścaikendriyaṃ bījādikaṃ pratipannāḥ prasaṅgānna vyativartanta iti /
tasmānnāsti doṣaḥ 		skyes bu la sogs pa rgyur smra ba 'gro ba blo sngon du gtong ba'i byed pa po can du khas len pa rnams dang gcer bu pa sa bon la sogs pa dbang po gcig par rtogs pa rnams la ni thal bar 'gyur ba ldog pa ma yin te /
de'i phyir nyes pa med do /
kiṃ cānyat /
yadi yuṣmadabhimataṃ hetoḥ phalasya ca anyonyaḍhaukanalakṣaṇaṃ saṃgamanaṃ syāt, syāttadānīṃ tayorjanyajanakabhāvaḥ 		gzhan yang gal te rgyu dang 'bras bu la phan tshun tshogs pa'i mtshan nyid kyi phrad pa yod na ni de'i tshe de gnyis bskyed bya skyed byed kyi dngos por 'gyur te /
yasmāt na hi parasparāsaṃgatayorālokāndhakārayoḥ saṃsāranirvāṇa yorjanyajanakabhāvo dṛṣṭa iti gang gi phyir phan tshun phrad pa med par snang ba dang mun pa dag gam /
'khor ba dang mya ngan las 'das pa dag la ni bskyed bya skyed byed kyi dngos po ma mthong ngo /
ataḥ avaśyaṃ hetuphalabhāvayorjanyajanakabhāvamicchatā pareṇa saṃgatirabhyupeyā de'i phyir rgyu dang 'bras bu gnyis bskyed par bya ba dang skyed par byed pa'i dngos por 'dod pa na /
gzhan gyis phrad pa gdon mi za bar khas blang dgos na /
sā ca kālatraye 'pi vicāryamāṇā na saṃbhavati de yang rnam par dpyad pa na dus gsum char du yang yod pa ma yin te /
ato hetuḥ phalaṃ na janayati 'di'i phyir yang rgyus 'bras bu bskyed pa ma yin no /
yathā ca saṃgatirnāsti tathā pratipādayannāha ji ltar phrad pa yod pa ma yin pa de ltar bstan pa'i phyir /
'bras bu 'das pa rgyu 'das dang /
nātītasya hyatītena phalasya saha hetunā ma skyes pa dang skyes pa dang /
lhan cig phrad par 'gyur ba ni /
nājātena na jātena saṃgatirjātu vidyate nam yang yod pa ma yin no /
zhes gsungs so /
atītasya tāvat phalasya atītena hetunā saha jātu kadācidapi saṃgatirnāsti, atītatvenobhayorapyavidyamānatvāt re zhig 'bras bu 'das pa ni rgyu 'das pa dang lhan cig phrad pa nam yang ste gzhar yang yod pa ma yin te /
dus gnyi ga yang 'das pa nyid kyis yod pa ma yin pa'i phyir ro /
nāpi ajātena hetunā atītasya phalasya saṃgatirjātu vidyate, naṣṭājātatvena ubhayorapyavidyamānatvāt, bhinnakālatvācca 'bras bu 'das pa ni rgyu ma skyes pa dang yang phrad pa nam yang yod pa ma yin te /
zhig pa dang ma skyes pa nyid kyis gnyi ga yang yod pa ma yin pa'i phyir dang dus tha dad pa'i phyir ro /
nāpi jātena vartamānena hetunā saha atītasya phalasya saṃgatiḥ saṃbhavati, bhinnakālatvāt, naṣṭasya ca phalasya avidyamānatvādvandhyāputreṇeva devadattasyetyabhiprāyaḥ 'bras bu 'das pa yang rgyu skyes pa da ltar ba dang yang phrad pa yod pa ma yin te dus tha dad pa'i phyir dang 'bras bu zhig pa ni yod pa ma yin pa'i phyir mo gsham gyi bu dang lha sbyin bzhin no snyam du dgongs pa'o /
yathā ca atītasya phalasya atītena anāgatavartamānena hetunā saha na kadācit saṃgatirasti, evaṃ vartamānasyāpi phalasya traikālikena hetunā saha nāsti saṃgatiriti tat pratipādayannāha ji ltar 'bras bu 'di rgyu 'das pa dang ma 'ongs pa dang da ltar ba dang lhan cig phrad pa nam yang yod pa ma yin pa de bzhin du /
'bras bu da ltar ba rgyu dus gsum pa dang lhan cig phrad pa yod pa ma yin no zhes bstan pa'i phyir /
na jātasya hyajātena phalasya saha hetunā /
nātītena na jātena saṃgatirjātu vidyate 		'bras bu skyes pa rgyu ma skyes /
'das pa dang ni skyes pa dang /
lhan cig phrad par 'gyur ba ni /
nam yang yod pa ma yin no /
zhes bya ba gsungs pa la /
jātasya phalasya bhinnakālatvādajātena ca atītena ca hetunā saha saṃgamanaṃ nāsti 'bras bu skyes pa ni rgyu ma skyes pa 'das pa dang lhan cig phrad pa yod pa ma yin te /
dus tha dad pa'i phyir ro /
nāpi vartamānasya vartamānena hetunā saha saṃgatirasti, hetuphalayoryaugapadyābhāvāt, tayośca saṃgatirvaiyarthyāt 'bras bu da ltar ba ni rgyu da ltar ba dang yang lhan cig phrad pa yod pa ma yin te /
rgyu dang 'bras bu dag cig car med pa'i phyir dang yod zin pa la phrad pa don med pa'i phyir ro /
kiṃ hi vidyamānayoḥ parasparanirapekṣayoḥ punaḥ saṃgatyā prayojanamiti nāsti saṃgatiḥ /
idānīmanāgatasyāpi phalasya yathā atītānāgatapratyutpannena hetunā saha saṃgamanaṃ nāsti tathā pratipādayannāha 		yod pa phan tshun ltos pa med pa dag la ni yang phrad pas dgos pa ci zhig yod de /
de'i phyir phrad pa med do /
da ni ji ltar 'bras bu ma 'ongs pa yang rgyu 'das pa dang ma 'ongs pa dang da ltar byung ba dang lhan cig phrad pa yod pa ma yin pa de ltar bstan pa'i phyir /
nājātasya hi jātena phalasya saha hetunā 'bras bu ma skyes rgyu skyes dang /
ma skyes pa dang 'das pa dang /
nājātena na naṣṭena saṃgatirjātu vidyate lhan cig phrad par 'gyur ba ni /
nam yang yod pa ma yin no /
zhes bya ba gsungs te /
ajātaṃ hi phalamasaṃvidyamānam 'bras bu ma skyes pa ni med pa yin la /
tasya bhinnakālena vartamānena atītena ca hetunā saha nāsti saṃgamanaṃ bhinnakālatvāt de ni rgyu dus tha dad pa dang da ltar ba dang 'das pa dang lhan cig phrad pa yod pa ma yin te /
dus tha dad pa'i phyir ro /
anāgatenāpi hetunā saha nāsti saṃgamanam, ubhayoravidyamānatvāt rgyu ma 'ongs pa dang yang lhan cig phrad pa yod pa ma yin te /
gnyi ga yang med pa'i phyir ro /
yadā caivaṃ sarvathā hetuphalayoḥ saṃgatirnāsti, tadā gang gi tshe de ltar rnam pa thams cad du rgyu dang 'bras bu gnyis phrad pa yod pa ma yin pa de'i tshe /
asatyāṃ saṃgatau hetuḥ kathaṃ janayate phalam phrad pa yod pa ma yin na /
rgyus ni 'bras bu ji ltar bskyed /
naiva hetuḥ phalaṃ janayati saṃgateravidyamānatvāt vandhyāputramivetyabhiprāyaḥ /
athāpi syāt 		phrad pa yod pa ma yin pa'i phyir rgyus 'bras bu mi bskyed pa nyid de /
mo gsham gyi bu bzhin no snyam du dgongs pa'o /
satyāmeva saṃgatau hetuḥ phalaṃ janayatīti, tadapi na yuktam, kālatraye 'pi saṃgatyanupalabdheḥ ci ste yang phrad pa yod pa nyid yin dang rgyus 'bras bu bskyed do snyam na /
de yang mi rigs te /
dus gsum char du yang phrad pa ma dmigs pa'i phyir ro /
athāpi kathaṃcid hetuphalayoḥ saṃgatiḥ parikalpyate, evamapi ci ste yang rgyu dang 'bras bu gnyis ci zhig ltar phrad par rtog na /
de lta na yang /
satyāṃ vā saṃgatau hetuḥ kathaṃ janayate phalam phrad pa yod pa yin na yang /
rgyus ni 'bras bu ji ltar bskyed de /
saṃnihitasya phalasya punarjanmavaiyarthyāt, asaṃhitānāṃ ca saṃgaterayuktatvāt ityabhiprāyaḥ 'bras bu lhan cig pa yang skye ba don med pa'i phyir dang lhan cig ma yin pa rnams kyang phrad par mi rigs pa'i phyir ro zhes bya bar dgongs pa'o /
kiṃ cānyat gzhan yang /
hetuḥ phalena śūnyaścetkathaṃ janayate phalam gal te 'bras bus stong pa'i rgyus /
ji ltar 'bras bu skyed par byed /
hetuḥ phalenāśūnyaścetkathaṃ janayate phalam gal te 'bras bus mi stong rgyus /
ji ltar 'bras bu skyed par byed /
yo 'yaṃ phalasya hetuḥ phalasya janaka iṣyate, sa tena śūnyo vā bhavan phalamutpādayet, aśūnyo vā? tatra hetuḥ śūnyaḥ phalena rahitaḥ phalaṃ na janayati, ahetuvat phalaśūnyatvāt rgyu gang zhig 'bras bu skyed par byed par 'dod pa de des stong pa zhig gam mi stong pa zhig gis 'bras bu skyed par byed grang /
de la 'bras bus stong zhing bral ba'i rgyus ni 'bras bu skyed par mi byed de /
rgyu ma yin pa ltar 'bras bus stong pa'i phyir ro /
phalena aśūnyo 'pi hetuḥ phalaṃ na janayati, vidyamānatvāt phalasya, vidyamānaputraṃ devadatta iva 'bras bus mi stong pa'i rgyus kyang 'bras bu skyed par mi byed de /
yod pa'i phyir bu yod pa'i lha sbyin bzhin no /
evaṃ tāvat phalaśūnyo vā phalāśūnyo vā hetuḥ phalaṃ na janayati de ltar na /
re zhig 'bras bus stong pa'am mi stong pa'i rgyus 'bras bu skyed par byed pa ma yin no /
yaccāpi phalamutpadyate, taccāpyaśūnyaṃ vā samutpadyate, śūnyaṃ vā? tatra tāvat 'bras bu gang zhig skye ba de yang mi stong pa'am stong pa zhig bskyed grang /
de la /
phalaṃ notpatsyate 'śūnyamaśūnyaṃ na nirotsyate 'bras bu mi stong skye mi 'gyur /
mi stong 'gag par mi 'gyur ro /
aniruddhamanutpannamaśūnyaṃ tadbhaviṣyati mi stong de ni ma 'gags dang /
ma skyes par yang 'gyur ba yin /
aśūnyaṃ hi phalamapratītyasamutpannaṃ svabhāvavyavasthitam, tadevaṃvidhaṃ phalaṃ naivotpatsyate svabhāvasyānapāyitvācca na nirotsyate 'bras bu mi stong pa ni rten cing 'brel par ma byung zhing rang bzhin gyis rnam par gnas pa yin la /
'bras bu rnam par gnas pa de lta bu de ni skye bar mi 'gyur zhing /
rang bzhin la ldog pa med pas 'gag par mi 'gyur ro /
tataśca aśūnyaṃ tadiṣyamāṇamaniruddhamanutpannaṃ ca syāt /
na caitadiṣṭam, ityataḥ aśūnyaṃ tatphalaṃ na bhavati, utpādanirodhābhyupagamāt 		de'i phyir de mi stong par 'dod pa na mi skye ba dang mi 'gag par gyur na /
de ltar ni 'dod pa ma yin no /
de'i phyir 'bras bu de mi stong pa ma yin te /
skye ba dang 'gag par khas blangs pa'i phyir ro /
idānīṃ śūnyamapi tatphalaṃ na saṃbhavati, anudayāvyayavattvaprasaṅgāt iti pratipādayannāha da ni 'bras bu stong pa de yang yod pa ma yin te /
skye ba dang 'gag pa med pa nyid du thal bar 'gyur ba'i phyir ro zhes bstan pa'i phyir /
kathamutpatsyate śūnyaṃ kathaṃ śūnyaṃ nirotsyate stong pa ji ltar skye 'gyur zhing /
stong pa ji ltar 'gag par 'gyur /
śūnyamapyaniruddhaṃ tadanutpannaṃ prasajyate stong pa de yang ma 'gags dang /
ma skyes par yang thal bar 'gyur /
zhes bya ba gsungs te /
tatra śūnyamucyate yatsvabhāvena nāsti /
yacca vastu svabhāvena nāsti, tat kathamutpatsyate, kathaṃ vā nirotsyate? na hi svabhāvena avidyamānasya ākāśādeḥ udayavyayau dṛṣṭau /
tasmācchūnyamapi tatphalamiṣyamāṇamaniruddhamanutpannaṃ ca prasajyate 		de la stong pa ni gang rang bzhin gyis med pa la brjod la /
gang rang bzhin gyis med pa de ni ji ltar skye ba'am 'gag par 'gyur te; nam mkha' la sogs pa rang bzhin gyis med pa la ni skye ba'am 'jig pa ma mthong ngo /
de'i phyir 'bras bu de stong par 'dod pa na yang ma skyes pa dang ma 'gags par thal bar 'gyur ro /
kiṃ cānyat gzhan yang /
yadi hetuḥ phalaṃ janayet, sa phalādavyatirikto vā janayet, vyatirikto vā? ubhayathā ca nopapadyate ityāha gal te rgyu gang zhig 'bras bu skyed par byed pa na /
de 'bras bu las tha dad pa'am /
tha mi dad pa zhig gis bskyed grang na /
gnyi ga ltar yang mi 'thad do /
zhes gsungs pa ni /
hetoḥ phalasya caikatvaṃ na hi jātūpapadyate rgyu dang 'bras bu gcig nyid du /
nam yang 'thad par mi 'gyur ro /
hetoḥ phalasya cānyatvaṃ na hi jātūpapadyate rgyu dang 'bras bu gzhan nyid du /
nam yang 'thad par mi 'gyur ro /
tadetat pratijñāmātrakamiti pratipādayannāha zhes bya ba'o /
'di ni dam bca' ba tsam zhig yin te /
ji ltar grub ce na /
ekatve phalahetvoḥ syādaikyaṃ janakajanyayoḥ bstan pa'i phyir /
rgyu dang 'bras bu gcig nyid na /
pṛthaktve phalahetvoḥ syāttulyo heturahetunā /
yadi hetoḥ phalasya ca ekatvaṃ syāt, tadā janyajanakayorekatvamabhyupetaṃ syāt /
na cānayorekatvam, pitāputrayoścakṣuścakṣurvijñānayorbījāṅkurayoścaikyaprasaṅgāt 		bskyed bya skyed byed gcig tu 'gyur /
rgyu dang 'bras bu gzhan nyid na /
rgyu dang rgyu min mtshungs par 'gyur /
zhes gsungs te /
gal te rgyu dang 'bras bu gcig nyid yin na ni /
de'i tshe bskyed par bya ba dang skyed par byed pa gnyis gcig pa nyid du khas blangs par 'gyur na /
de gnyis ni gcig pa nyid kyang ma yin te pha dang bu dang mig dang mig gi rnam par shes pa dag kyang gcig tu thal bar 'gyur ba'i phyir ro /
evaṃ tāvad hetoḥ phalasya ca ekatvaṃ nāsti /
idānīmanyatvamapi nāsti 		de lta na re zhig rgyu dang 'bras bu la gcig nyid yod pa ma yin no /
da ni gzhan nyid kyang yod pa ma yin te /
ci'i phyir zhe na /
kiṃ kāraṇam? yadi hetoḥ phalasya ca bhavanmatenābhimatamanyatvaṃ syāt, tadā paratra nirapekṣatvād hetunirapekṣameva phalaṃ syāt gal te rgyu dang 'bras bu gzhan nyid yin na ni /
de'i tshe gzhan la ltos pa med pa'i phyir 'bras bu rgyu la ltos pa med pa nyid du 'gyur na; de ni de ltar yang ma yin te /
na caitadevam, ityataḥ anyatvamapi hetoḥ phalasya ca na saṃbhavati de'i phyir rgyu dang 'bras bu la gzhan nyid kyang yod pa ma yin no /
gang dag la de ltar rnam par dpyad pa na /
yayośca evaṃ vicāryamāṇayostattvānyatve na staḥ, tayorna kadācijjanyajanakabhāvaḥ iṣyate de nyid dang gzhan nyid yod pa ma yin pa de dag ni nam yang bskyed par bya ba dang skyed par byed pa'i dngos po ma yin te /
ato naiva hetuḥ phalaṃ janayati /
kiṃ cānyat /
yadi hetuḥ phalaṃ janayet, sa tatphalaṃ svabhāvena sadbhūtaṃ vā janayet, asadbhūtaṃ vā? ubhayathā ca na yujyate ityāha 		de'i phyir rgyus 'bras bu bskyed pa ma yin no /
gzhan yang gal te rgyus 'bras bu skyed par byed na /
des 'bras bu de ngo bo nyid kyis yod pa'am /
med pa zhig bskyed /
de las cir 'gyur zhe na /
phalaṃ svabhāvasadbhūtaṃ kiṃ heturjanayiṣyati /
phalaṃ svabhāvāsadbhūtaṃ kiṃ heturjanayiṣyati /
tatra yat phalaṃ svabhāvena sadbhūtaṃ svabhāvena vidyamānam, tanna punarjanyate vidyamānatvāt, vidyamānaghaṭavat 		gnyi ga ltar yang mi rigs so zhes gsungs pa ni 'bras bu ngo bo nyid yod na rgyus ni ci zhig bskyed par 'gyur /
'bras bu ngo bo nyid med na /
rgyus ni ci zhig bskyed par 'gyur /
zhes bya ba'o /
de la 'bras bu gang zhig ngo bo nyid kyis yod pa rang bzhin gyis bdog pa de ni yang mi skye ste /
yod pa'i phyir bum pa yod pa bzhin no /
yadapi svabhāvena asadbhūtaṃ phalam, tadapi heturna janayati, svabhāvena asadbhūtatvāt, kharaviṣāṇavat 'bras bu ngo bo nyid kyis med pa gang yin pa de yang rgyus bskyed pa ma yin te /
ngo bo nyid kyis yod pa ma yin pa'i phyir bong bu'i rva bzhin no /
pratibimbenānaikāntikateti cet, bhavatu anaikāntikatā, naiḥsvābhāvyaṃ tu siddhaṃ bhāvānām gal te gzugs brnyan gyis ma nges pa nyid do zhe na /
ma nges pa nyid du 'gyur mod /
dngos po rnams rang bzhin med par ni grub bo /
tataśca sasvabhāvavādatyāgaḥ syāt, asmadvādānuvarṇanameva syāt de'i phyir rang bzhin du smra ba btang bar 'gyur zhing /
kho bo cag smra ba'i rjes su smra ba nyid du 'gyur ro /
sasvabhāvaśca na kaścit padārtho nāma astīti pratidvandvayabhāvāt niḥsvabhāvo 'pi padārtho nāstīti kuto 'naikāntikatā? na hi asmākaṃ pratibimbakaṃ sasvabhāvaṃ nāpi niḥsvabhāvam, dharmiṇamantareṇa taddharmayorapyabhāvāt /
na hi āryāḥ pratibimbakaṃ nāma kiṃcit niḥsvabhāvaṃ sasvabhāvaṃ vā upalabhanta iti 		dngos po rang bzhin dang bcas pa 'ga' yang med pas 'gal zla med pa'i phyir dngos po rang bzhin med pa yang med de /
de'i phyir ma nges pa nyid du ga la 'gyur /
'di ltar kho bo cag gi ltar na ni gzugs brnyan rang bzhin dang bcas pa ma yin zhing /
rang bzhin med pa yang ma yin te /
chos can med na de'i chos dag kyang med pa'i phyir ro /
'phags pa rnams kyis ni gzugs brnyan zhes bya ba cung zad cig rang bzhin dang rang bzhin med par gzigs pa ma yin no /
de la sngar ni /
tatra pūrvaṃ phalaṃ notpatsyate ityādinā ślokadvayena sākṣādutpattikriyākartṛtvaṃ phalasya niṣiddham 'bras bu mi stong skye mi 'gyur /
zhes bya ba la sogs pa tshigs su bcad pa gnyis kyis dngos su 'bras bu skye ba'i byed pa po nyid yin pa bkag pa yin la /
idānīṃ hetoḥ phalotpattikriyāprayojakatvaṃ pratiṣiddhamiti /
ayamasya pūrvakādviśeṣa iti vijñeyam 		de lta ni rgyus 'bras bu skye ba'i bya ba'i rab tu sbyor bar byed pa po nyid yin pa bkag pa yin no zhes bya ba 'di ni gong ma las 'di'i khyad par yin no zhes bya bar shes par bya'o /
atrāha /
yadyapi hetoḥ phalotpattikriyāprayojakatvaṃ niṣiddham, tathāpi hetustāvat svabhāvato 'sti, na ca asati phale hetorhetutvaṃ sidhyati, tasmāt phalamapi bhaviṣyatīti 		'dir smras pa /
gal te yang rgyu 'bras bu skye ba'i bya ba'i rab tu sbyor bar byed pa nyid yin pa bkag mod kyi /
de lta na yang re zhig rgyu ni rang bzhin gyis yod pa yin la /
'bras bu med na ni rgyu'i rgyu nyid kyang mi 'grub ste /
de'i phyir 'bras bu yang yod par 'gyur ro /
ucyate /
syāddhetuḥ, yadi ajanayato 'sya hetutvaṃ syāt 		brjod par bya ste /
gal te 'di skyed par byed pa ma yin bzhin du rgyu nyid yin par 'gyur na ni rgyur gyur pa zhig na /
na cājanayamānasya hetutvamupapadyate skyed par byed pa ma yin na /
rgyu nyid 'thad par mi 'gyur ro /
atha syāt /
yadyapi evaṃ hetorhetutvaṃ nāsti, tathāpi phalaṃ tāvadasti 		ci ste de ltar rgyu'i rgyu nyid yod pa ma yin mod kyi /
de lta na yang 'bras bu ni re zhig yod pa yin la /
na ca hetumantareṇa phalaṃ yuktamiti phalasadbhāvād heturapi bhaviṣyatīti rgyu med par ni 'bras bu rigs pa yang ma yin te /
de'i phyir 'bras bu yod pas rgyu yang yod par 'gyur ro snyam na /
ucyate /
yadā ajanayamānasya hetorhetutvaṃ nāstītyuktam, tadā 		brjod par bya ste /
gang gi tshe skyed par mi byed pa la rgyu'i rgyu nyid yod pa ma yin par bshad pa /
hetutvānupapattau ca phalaṃ kasya bhaviṣyati de'i tshe /
rgyu nyid 'thad pa yod min na /
iti /
tasmāt phalamapi nāstīti 		'bras bu gang gi yin par 'gyur /
de'i phyir 'bras bu yang med do /
atrāha /
naiva hi kevalasya hetoḥ phalotpattikriyāyāḥ prayojakatvam, kiṃ tarhi hetupratyayasāmagryā phalaṃ janyate iti 		'dir smras pa /
rgyu 'ba' zhig 'bras bu skye ba'i bya ba'i rab tu sbyor bar byed pa nyid ma yin gyi /
'o na ci zhe na /
rgyu dang rkyen tshogs pas 'bras bu skyed do zhe na /
ucyate /
uktadoṣatvāt na yuktametat 		de ni mi rigs te /
nyes pa brjod zin pa'i phyir ro /
api ca, iyaṃ hetupratyayasāmagrī yadi phalasya janiketi kalpyate, kiṃ sāsvayameva tāvadātmānaṃ janayati, utāho na? yadi janayatīti kalpyate, tanna yujyate gzhan yang rgyu dang rkyen gyi tshogs pa 'di gal te 'bras bu skyed par byed par rtog na /
ci ste bdag nyid kyis bdag nyid skyed par byed pa zhig gam /
'on te ma yin pa zhig yin grang /
na hi alabdhātmabhāvasya prayojakatvaṃ dṛṣṭamityataḥ sāmagryā avaśyaṃ labdhātmabhāvayā bhavitavyam gal te skyed par byed pa zhig yin no zhes rtog na ni de mi rung ste /
bdag gi dngos po ma rnyed pa ni rab tu sbyor bar byed pa nyid du ma mthong ba de'i phyir gdon mi za bar tshogs pas bdag gi dngos po rnyed par 'gyur dgos na /
na ca labdhātmabhāvāyāḥ punaḥ svātmotpāde prayojakatvaṃ yuktam, ityataḥ na sāmagrī svātmānamutpādayati bdag gi dngos po rnyed pa ni yang bdag nyid bskyed pa la rab tu sbyor bar byed pa nyid du mi rigs te /
de'i phyir tshogs pas rang gi bdag nyid mi skyed la /
yā ca ātmānaṃ notpādayati, sā kathaṃ phalamutpādayituṃ śaknotīti pratipādayannāha gang zhig bdag nyid mi skyed pa des ni ji ltar 'bras bu skyed par nus zhes bstan pa'i phyir /
rgyu rnams dang ni rkyen dag gis /
na ca pratyayahetūnāmiyamātmānamātmanā tshogs pa gang yin de yi ni /
bdag gis bdag nyid mi skyed na /
yā sāmagrī janayate sā kathaṃ janayetphalam 'bras bu ji ltar skyed par byed /
de phyir tshogs pas byas pa med /
ces gsungs te /
pratyayānāṃ hetūnāṃ ca yeyaṃ sāmagrī sā tāvadātmanaiva ātmānaṃ notpādayati, svātmani vṛttivirodhāt, satyāḥ punarutpādavaiyarthyācca rgyu rnams dang rkyen dag gi tshogs pa gang yin pa de re zhig bdag gis bdag nyid mi skyed de /
bdag nyid la byed pa 'gal ba'i phyir dang bdag nyid skye ba don med pa'i phyir ro /
yā ca evamātmānameva tāvanna janayati, sā kathaṃ phalaṃ janayiṣyati? na hi bandhyāduhitā ātmānaṃ janayitumaśaktā satī putraṃ janayiṣyatīti yujyate /
evaṃ sāmagryapi svātmājanikā phalaṃ janayatīti na yujyate 		gang zhig re zhig bdag nyid mi skyed pa des 'bras bu ji ltar skyed par byed de /
mo gsham gyi bu bdag nyid skyed par mi nus pas bu skyed par byed do zhes bya bar mi rigs so /
de ltar tshogs pa yang rang gi bdag nyid skyed par byed pa ma yin par 'bras bu bskyed pa mi rigs te /
tasmāt /
na sāmagrīkṛtaṃ phalaṃ 		de'i phyir tshogs pas byas pa'i 'bras bu med do /
athāpi syāt /
yadi sāmagrīkṛtaṃ phalaṃ na saṃbhavati, evaṃ tarhi asāmagrīkṛtaṃ bhaviṣyatīti cet, ucyate 		ci ste yang gal te tshogs pas byas pa'i 'bras bu med na /
de lta na 'o na tshogs pa ma yin pas byas pa yod do snyam na /
brjod pa /
nāsāmagrīkṛtaṃ phalam tshogs min byas pa'i 'bras bu med /
yadā sāmagrīkṛtaṃ phalaṃ na saṃbhavati, tadā kathamatyantaviruddhamasāmagrīkṛtaṃ bhaviṣyati? asāmagrīkṛtaṃ phalaṃ na saṃbhavati /
atha syāt /
yadyapi nāsti phalaṃ svabhāvataḥ, tathāpi hetupratyayasāmagrī tāvadasti 		gang gi tshe tshogs pas byas pa'i 'bras bu yod pa ma yin pa de'i tshe ji ltar tshogs pa ma yin pas byas pa shin tu 'gal ba yod par ga la 'gyur te /
tshogs pa ma yin pas byas pa'i 'bras bu yang yod pa ma yin no /
ci ste yang 'bras bu med mod kyi /
de lta na yang re zhig rgyu dang rkyen gyi tshogs pa ni yod pa yin la /
na ca phalamantareṇa hetupratyayasāmagrī saṃbhavatīti phalamapi saṃbhaviṣyatīti 'bras bu med par ni rgyu dang rkyen gyi tshogs pa srid pa yang ma yin te /
de'i phyir 'bras bu yang yod par 'gyur ro snyam na /
ucyate /
syāddhetupratyayasāmagrī, yadi phalameva bhavet 		brjod par bya ste /
gal te 'bras bu nyid yod na /
rgyu dang rkyen gyi tshogs pa yang yod par 'gyur na /
yadā tu yathoditena nyāyena phalameva nāsti, tadā gang gi tshe ji skad bshad pa'i rigs pas 'bras bu nyid yod pa ma yin pa de'i tshe /
asti pratyayasāmagrī kuta eva phalaṃ vinā 'bras bu yod pa ma yin na /
rkyen gyi tshogs pa ga la yod /
phalābhāve sati nirhetukā hetupratyayasāmagrī api nāstītyabhiprāyaḥ /
uktaṃ hi āryalalitavistarasūtre 		'bras bu med pa nyid yin na rgyu mtshan med pas rkyen gyi tshogs pa dag kyang yod pa ma yin no snyam du dgongs pa yin no /
'phags pa rgya cher rol pa'i mdo las kyang /
kaṇṭhoṣṭha pratītya tālukaṃ jihvaparivarti ravanti akṣarāḥ mchu dang lkog ma rkan la brten nas ni /
lce bsgyur ba las yi ge'i sgra 'byung yang /
na ca kaṇṭhagatā na tāluke akṣaraikaikaśa nopalabhyate lkog mar brten nas ma yin rkan las min /
re re la ni yi ge dmigs su med /
sāmagri pratītyataśca sā vāca manabuddhivaśena niścarī tshogs pa de la brten nas ngag de ni /
yid kyi blo yi dbang gis 'byung mod kyi /
mana vāca adṛśyarūpiṇī bāhyato 'bhyantari nopalabhyate yid dang ngag ni mi snang gzugs med de /
nang dang phyi rol dag na'ang dmigs su med /
utpādavyayaṃ vipaśyato vācarutaghoṣasvarasya paṇḍitaḥ mkhas pas ngag skad sgra dang dbyangs rnams kyi /
skye dang 'jig la rnam par brtags byas na /
kṣaṇikāṃ vaśikāṃ tadā dṛśī sarva vāca pratiśrutakopamā de tshe ngag kun brag ca lta bu dang /
skad cig pa dang snying po med par mthong /
tathā āryopāliparipṛcchāyāmuktaṃ bhagavatā /
iha śāsani sūramaṇīye pravrajathā gṛhiliṅga jahitvā 		zhes gsungs pa dang de bzhin du 'phags pa nye ba 'khor gyis zhus pa las kyang /
bcom ldan 'das kyis /
shin tu dga' ba'i bstan pa 'di la ni /
khyim pa'i rtags spangs rab tu byung gyis [*gis?] la /
phalavantu bhaviṣyatha śreṣṭhā eṣu nideśitu kāruṇikena 'bras bu yod pa'i mchog tu 'gyur gyis zhes /
thugs rje can gyis de skad bstan pa'ang mdzad /
pravrajitva gṛhiliṅga jahitvā sarvaphalasya bhaviṣyati prāptiḥ khyim pa'i rtags spangs rab tu byung gyur nas /
'bras bu thams cad thob par gyur yang ni /
puna dharmasabhāva tulitvā sarvaphalāna phalāna ca prāptiḥ chos kyi rang bzhin dag la gzhal byas na /
'bras bu kun med 'bras bu thob pa'ang med /
alabhanta phalaṃ tatha prāptiṃ āścariyaṃ puna jāyati teṣām /
aho 'tikāruṇiko narasiṃho suṣṭupadeśita yukti jinena /
iti 		'on kyang 'bras bu thob pa thob 'gyur ba /
kye ma mi mchog thugs rje ldan pa yis /
rgyal bas rigs pa shin tu legs bshad ces /
tathā āryaprajñāpāramitāyāmaṣṭasāhasrikāyām /
tena hi kauśika bodhisattvena mahāsattvena mahāsaṃnāhasaṃnaddhena na rūpe sthātavyaṃ na vedanāyāṃ na saṃjñāyāṃ na saṃskāreṣu na vijñāne sthātavyam 		de dag ngo mtshar che ba skye bar 'gyur /
zhes gsungs pa dang de bzhin du 'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las kyang /
koo shi ka byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po go cha chen po bgos pa des /
gzugs la gnas par mi bya'o /
tshor ba la ma yin /
'du shes la ma yin /
'du byed rnams la ma yin /
rnam par shes pa la gnas par mi bya'o /
rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la ma yin /
na srotaāpattiphale na sakṛdāgāmiphale na anāgāmiphale na arhattve na pratyekabuddhatve na samyaksaṃbuddhatve sthātavyam lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la ma yin /
phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la ma yin /
dgra bcom pa nyid kyi 'bras bu la ma yin /
iti /
ityācāryacandrakīrtipādoparacitāyāṃ prasannapadāyāṃ madhyamakavṛttau sāmagrīparīkṣā nāma viṃśatitamaṃ prakaraṇam 		rang sangs rgyas nyid la ma yin /
yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nyid la gnas par mi bya'o zhes gsungs so /
slob dpon zla ba grags pa'i zhal snga nas sbyar ba'i tshig gsal ba las /
saṃbhavavibhavaparīkṣā ekaviṃśatitamaṃ prakaraṇam tshogs pa brtag pa zhes bya ba rab tu byed pa nyid shu pa'i 'grel ba'o /
atrāha /
vidyata eva svabhāvataḥ kālaḥ, saṃbhavavibhavanimittatvāt 		'dir smras pa /
dus ni rang bzhin gyis yod pa nyid de /
'byung ba dang 'jig pa'i rgyu yin pa'i phyir ro /
iha kaṃcit kālaviśeṣamapekṣya aṅkurotpattiḥ bhāvānāmutpādo bhavati, kaṃcitkālaviśeṣamapekṣya vibhavo vināśo bhavati, na sarvadā, vidyamānāyāmapi hetupratyayasāmagryām 'di na myu gu la sogs pa dag dus 'ga' zhig la ltos nas ni 'byung zhing skye bar 'gyur la; dus kyi khyad par 'ga' zhig la ltos nas ni 'jig cing rnam par 'jig par 'gyur gyi /
rgyu dang rkyen gyi tshogs pa yod kyang thams cad kyi tshe ni ma yin no /
ityato vidyata eva kālaḥ, saṃbhavavibhava nimittattvāt de'i phyir dus yod pa nyid de /
'byung ba dang 'jig pa'i rgyu yin pa'i phyir ro /
ucyate /
syāt saṃbhavavibhavanimittatā kālasya yadi saṃbhavavibhavāveva syātām 		brjod par bya ste /
gal te 'byung ba dang 'jig pa dag nyid yod na ni /
dus 'byung ba dang 'jig pa'i rgyu nyid du 'gyur na /
na tu staḥ /
yathā ca na staḥ, tathā pratipādayannāha 		yod pa ni ma yin no /
ji ltar med la de ltar bstan pa'i phyir /
vinā vā saha vā nāsti vibhavaḥ saṃbhavena vai 'jig pa 'byung ba med par ram /
lhan cig yod pa nyid ma yin /
vinā vā saha vā nāsti saṃbhavo vibhavena vai 'byung ba 'jig pa med par ram /
lhan cig yod pa nyid ma yin /
zhes gsungs te /
iha yadi saṃbhavavibhavau syātām, tau anyonyaṃ sahabhāvena vā syātām, vinābhāvena vā 'dir gal te 'byung ba dang 'jig pa dag yod par gyur na /
phan tshun med par yod pa'am /
lhan cig yod par 'gyur ba zhig na /
ubhayathā ca vicāryamāṇau na saṃbhavataḥ rnam par dpyad pa na gnyi ga ltar yang yod pa ma yin no /
kathaṃ kṛtvā? tatra tāvad yathā vinā saṃbhavena utpādena vibhavo vināśo nāsti, tathā pratipādayannāha ji ltar zhe na /
de la 'jig pa rnam par 'jig pa ji ltar 'byung ba ste skye ba med par yod pa ma yin pa de ltar bstan pa'i phyir /
bhaviṣyati kathaṃ nāma vibhavaḥ saṃbhavaṃ vinā 'jig pa 'byung ba med par ni /
ji lta bur na yod par 'gyur /
vinaiva janma maraṇaṃ vibhavo nodbhavaṃ vinā skye ba med par 'chi bar 'gyur /
'jig pa 'byung ba med par med /
ces gsungs te /
saṃbhavaṃ vinā kathaṃ nāma vibhavo vināśo bhaviṣyati? kathaṃ nāmetyanena prasiddhamatyantāsaṃbhavaṃ darśayati 'jig pa rnam par 'jig pa ni 'byung ba med par ji lta bur na yod par 'gyur /
ji lta bur na zhes bya ba 'dis ni gtan mi srid par grags pa ston par byed pa'o /
kathaṃ nāma bhaviṣyati, naiva etatsaṃbhavatītyabhiprāyaḥ ji lta bur na yod par 'gyur te /
de ni yod pa ma yin no zhes bya bar dgongs pa yin no /
yadi punarvinaiva saṃbhavaṃ vibhavaḥ syāt, ko doṣaḥ syāt? ucyate yang gal te 'byung ba med par 'jig pa yod par 'gyur na nyes pa cir 'gyur zhe na /
brjod pa /
vinaiva janma maraṇaṃ syāt, ajātasya maraṇaṃ syāt skye ba med par 'chi bar 'gyur te /
ma skyes pa 'chi bar 'gyur na /
na ca ajātasya maraṇaṃ dṛṣṭamiti ma skyes par ni 'chi bar yang ma mthong ngo /
tasmādvibhavo nodbhavaṃ vinā bhavitumarhati de'i phyir 'jig pa 'byung ba med par yod par mi 'os so /
ādyenātra ślokasyārdhena pratijñā, madhyena pādena prasaṅgāpādanam, antyena nigamanamiti vijñeyam 'dir tshigs su bcad pa'i phyed gong mas ni dam bcas pa yin la /
rkang pa bar mas ni thal ba bsgrubs pa yin zhing /
thams ni mjug bsdus pa yin no zhes bya bar shes par bya'o /
evaṃ tāvadvinā saṃbhavena vibhavo na yuktaḥ iti pratipādya idānīṃ saha saṃbhavenāpi vibhavo na saṃbhavati tathā pratipādayannāha de ltar re zhig 'byung ba med par 'jig par mi rigs so zhes bstan nas /
de ni 'jig pa 'byung ba dang lhan cig tu yang ji ltar yod pa ma yin pa de ltar bstan pa'i phyir /
saṃbhavenaiva vibhavaḥ kathaṃ saha bhaviṣyati 'jig pa 'byung dang lhan cig tu /
ji ltar yod pa nyid du 'gyur /
na janmamaraṇaṃ caivaṃ tulyakālaṃ hi vidyate 'chi ba skye dang dus gcig tu /
yod pa nyid ni ma yin no /
zhes gsungs te /
yadi hi saṃbhavena saha yugapat tulyakālaṃ vibhavaḥ syāt, evaṃ sati janmamaraṇe yugapat syātām gal te 'jig pa 'byung ba dang lhan cig tu ste dus gcig tu cig car yod par 'gyur na ni /
de ltar na 'chi ba dang skye ba dus gcig par 'gyur na /
na caivaṃ parasparaviruddhe ālokāndhakāravadekasmin kāle vidyete iti phan tshun 'gal ba de gnyis ni snang ba dang mun pa ltar dus gcig gi tshe yang yod pa ma yin no /
tasmāt sahāpi saṃbhavena vibhavasya nāsti siddhiriti sthitam /
yadā caivaṃ saṃbhavena vinā vā saha vā vibhavasya nāsti siddhiḥ, evaṃ saṃbhavasyāpi vinā vā saha vā vibhavena nāsti siddhiriti pratipādayannāha 		de'i phyir 'jig pa ni 'byung ba dang lhan cig tu yang grub pa yod pa ma yin no zhes bya bar gnas so /
gang gi tshe de ltar 'jig pa 'byung ba med par ram /
lhan cig tu yang grub pa yod pa ma yin pa de bzhin du 'byung ba yang 'jig pa med par ram /
lhan cig tu grub pa yod pa ma yin no zhes bstan pa'i phyir /
bhaviṣyati kathaṃ nāma saṃbhavo vibhavaṃ vinā 'byung ba 'jig pa med par ni /
ji ltar yod pa nyid du 'gyur /
anityatā hi bhāveṣu na kadācinna vidyate dngos po rnams la mi rtag nyid /
nam yang med pa ma yin no /
naiva hi saṃbhavo vibhavena vinā yujyate zhes gsungs so /
'byung ba ni 'jig pa med par mi rigs pa nyid de /
yasmādanityatā hi bhāveṣu bhavanadharmakeṣu utpāda dharmakeṣu na kadācinna vidyate, kiṃ tarhi sarvadaiva vidyate gang gi phyir dngos po 'byung ba'i chos can skye ba'i chos can rnams la mi rtag pa nyid nam yang med pa ma yin gyi /
'o na ci zhe na /
uktaṃ hi /
jarāmaraṇadharmeṣu sarvabhāveṣu sarvadā 		thams cad kyi tshe yod pa yin te /
dngos po thams cad dus kun du /
rga dang 'chi ba'i chos yin na /
tiṣṭhanti katame bhāvā ye jarāmaraṇaṃ vinā gang dag rga dang 'chi med par /
gnas pa'i dngos po gang zhig yin /
iti /
yadā caivaṃ nityamanityatānugatāḥ sarve bhāvāḥ, tadā kutaḥ sā kācidavasthā yā vināśarahitā syāditi? ato nāsti vibhavena vinā utpāda iti 		zhes bshad do /
gang gi tshe de ltar dngos po thams cad rtag tu mi rtag pa dang rjes su 'brel pa de'i tshe gang 'jig pa dang bral bar gyur ba'i /
gnas skabs de 'ga' yang yod par ga la 'gyur /
evaṃ tāvadvinā vibhavena nāsti saṃbhavaḥ /
śeṣamatra saṃskṛtaparīkṣāyāṃ vicāritattvānna vicāryate /
yastu sahetuko vināśaḥ, saṃskṛtalakṣaṇatvāt, utpādavat, iti sādhanamutkṣipya antyacittacaittakṣaṇairanaikāntikatāmāha, sa na yuktamāha, tadvināśasyāpi jātipratyayatvena sahetukatvāt sādhyasamatvācca anaikāntikatābhāvāt 		de'i phyir 'jig pa med par 'byung ba srid pa yod pa ma yin no /
de ltar na re zhig 'byung ba 'jig pa med par yod pa ma yin no; ;'di dag gi dpyad pa lhag ma ni 'dus byas brtag par dpyad zin pa'i phyir yang rnam par mi dpyad do /
gang zhig 'jig pa ni rgyu dang bcas pa yin te /
'dus byas kyi mtshan nyid yin pa'i phyir skye ba bzhin no zhes sgrub byed bkod pa rjes su brjod nas /
tha ma'i sems dang sems las byung ba'i mtshan nyid dag gis ma nges par smra ba des ni mi rigs pa smras pa yin te /
de'i 'jig pa yang skye ba'i rkyen can yin pa nyid kyis rgyu dang bcas pa'i phyir dang bsgrub par bya ba dang mtshungs pa'i phyir na /
yadapi nirdiṣṭam /
bhāvātmabhāva eva abhūtvā bhāvādutpāda ucyate, tasmād dravyasadutpādasiddhervyavahārato dṛṣṭāntabhāva iti, tadapi na yuktam, adravyasatāṃ pratibimbādīnāṃ sahetukatvābhyupagamāt 		ma nges pa nyid med pa'i phyir ro /
gang yang dngos po'i bdag nyid kyi ngo bo nyid ni ma byung ba las byung ba skye ba zhes bya ste /
de'i phyir rdzas su yod pa rnams ni skye bar grub pa'i phyir tha snyad du yang dpe med pa yin no zhes bstan pa de yang mi rigs te /
gzugs brnyan la sogs pa rdzas su med pa rnams rgyu dang bcas pa nyid du khas blangs pa'i phyir ro /
yathoktamācāryapādaiḥ slob dpon gyi zhal snga nas ji skad du /
hetutaḥ saṃbhavo yeṣāṃ tadabhāvānna santi ye gang dag rgyu las 'byung 'gyur zhing /
gang dag de med pas med pa /
kathaṃ nāma na te spaṣṭaṃ pratibimbasamā matāḥ de dag gzugs brnyan dang mtshungs par /
gsal ba ji lta bur me bzhed /
iti /
asmādā[gamāt] kuto vyavahārato dṛṣṭāntāsiddhiḥ? yadi ca bhāvāt, yat tattvānyatvena na śakyate vaktum, tat saṃvṛtyāpi nāstītyucyate 		ces gsungs so /
de'i phyir tha snyad du dpe ma grub pa ga la yod /
gal te yang gang dngos po las de nyid dang gzhan nyid du brjod par mi nus pa de ni kun rdzob tu yang yod pa ma yin no zhes smra na ni /
nīlādikamapi nāstītyucyate /
yathoktaṃ ratnāvalyām 		sngon po la sogs pa yang yod pa ma yin no zhes brjod par bya ste /
ji skad du /
rūpasyābhāvamātratvādākāśaṃ nāmamātrakam gzugs kyi dngos po ming tsam phyir /
nam mkha' yang ni ming tsam mo /
bhūtairvinā kuto rūpaṃ nāmamātrakamapyataḥ 'byung med gzugs lta ga la yod /
de'i phyir ming tsam nyid kyang yin /
iti /
api ca 		zhes gsungs so /
kuto mādhyamikānāṃ svabhāvarūpaṃ siddhasattākaṃ yasya avasthāviśeṣa utpādaḥ syāt? ataḥ ayuktameva dṛṣṭāntāsiddhatodbhāvanam gzhan yang gang gi gnas skabs kyi khyad par skye bar 'gyur ba /
dbu ma pa rnams la ni dngos po'i rang gi ngo bo yod par ga la 'gyur /
de'i phyir dpe ma grub par brjod pa ni mi rigs pa nyid do /
yaccoktam /
na sahetuko vināśaḥ, avināśavattvāt, yathā asaṃskṛtamiti, tasyaivaṃ bruvato mahāntaṃ virodhamayaṃ heturābhavati /
yathā hi ayaṃ heturvināśasya nirhetukatvaṃ sādhayati, evaṃ saṃskṛtalakṣaṇatvābhāvamapi sādhayati 		gang yang 'jig pa ni rgyu dang bcas pa ma yin te /
'jig pa dang mi ldan pa nyid kyi phyir dper na 'dus ma byas bzhin no zhes smra ste /
de skad smra ba de la ni gtan tshigs 'dis 'gal ba chen po 'dren pa yin no /
ji ltar gtan tshigs 'dis 'jig pa la rgyu med par sgrub par byed pa de ltar 'dus byas kyi mtshan nyid ma yin pa yang sgrub par byed do /
tathā saṃskāraskandhasaṃgrahapratītyasamutpādāṅgasaṃgrahādikamapi sarvaṃ virodhayatīti na yuktametanmatam de bzhin du 'du byed kyi phung pos bsdus pa dang rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'i yan lag gis bsdus pa la sogs pa thams cad kyang 'gal bar byed pas 'di ni mi rigs so /
tathā /
na vijñānaṃ viṣayasvarūpacchedakam, avijñānavattvāt, asaṃskṛtavat, ityādinā sarvaniṣedhānmahatī aniṣṭāpattirupapadyate 'sya, iti nāstheyametat /
idānīṃ vibhavena saha yathā saṃbhavasya nāsti siddhiḥ, tathā pratipādayannāha 		de bzhin du rnam par shes pa ni yul gyi rang gi ngo bo yongs su gcod par byed pa ma yin te /
rnam par shes pa dang mi ldan pa'i phyir 'dus ma byas bzhin no zhes bya ba la sogs pas thams cad bkag pa'i phyir 'di la mi 'dod pa chen po grub par 'gyur bas 'di gzung bar mi bya'o /
da ni ji ltar 'byung ba 'jig pa dang lhan cig grub pa yod pa ma yin pa de ltar bstan pa'i phyir /
saṃbhavo vibhavenaiva kathaṃ saha bhaviṣyati 'byung ba 'jig dang lhan cig tu /
ji ltar yod pa nyid du 'gyur /
na janmamaraṇaṃ caiva tulyakālaṃ hi vidyate skye ba 'chi dang dus gcig tu /
yod pa nyid ni ma yin no /
zhes gsungs te /
yadi hi saṃbhavo vibhavenaiva saha syāt, tadā janmamaraṇayostulyakālatā syāt /
na ca [sā] saṃbhavati /
tasmāt sahabhāvenāpi saṃbhavavibhavayornāsti siddhiḥ 		gal te 'byung ba 'jig pa dang lhan cig yod par gyur na ni /
de'i tshe skye ba dang 'chi bdag dus gcig pa nyid du 'gyur na srid pa yang ma yin no /
de'i phyir 'byung ba dang 'jig pa dag lhan cig pa nyid du grub pa yang yod pa ma yin no /
atha syāt /
yadyapi janmamaraṇayorekībhāvena vā nānābhāvena vā nāsti siddhiḥ, tathāpi vidyete eva saṃbhavavibhavau, vācyatvāt, vijñānavat, iti 		ci ste skye ba dang 'chi ba dag lhan cig gi ngo bo 'am tha dad pa'i ngo bor grub pa yod pa ma yin pa de lta na yang 'byung ba dang 'jig pa dag yod de /
brjod par bya ba yin pa'i phyir rnam par shes pa bzhin no snyam na /
ucyate /
yadi vācyatvena anayoḥ siddhiriṣyate, vandhyāputrasyāpi iṣyatām 		brjod par bya ste /
gal te brjod par bya ba nyid kyis de dag grub par 'dod na ni /
mo gsham gyi bu yang 'dod par bya'o /
api ca gzhan yang /
sahānyonyena vā siddhirvinānyonyena vā yayoḥ gang dag phan tshun lhan cig gam /
phan tshun lhan cig ma yin par /
na vidyate, tayoḥ siddhiḥ kathaṃ nu khalu vidyate grub pa yod pa ma yin pa /
de dag grub pa ji ltar yod /
sahabhāvāsahabhāvarahitaṃ nāsti pakṣāntaraṃ yataḥ saṃbhavavibhavayoḥ siddhiḥ syāt gang las 'byung ba dang 'jig pa dag 'grub par 'gyur ba lhan cig pa nyid dang lhan cig pa nyid ma yin pa las ma gtogs pa phyogs gzhan ni med do /
avācyatayā siddhirbhaviṣyatīti cet, keyamavācyatā nāma? yadi miśrībhāvaḥ, so 'nupapannaḥ, pṛthakpṛthagasiddhayo miśrībhāvābhāvāt brjod du med pa nyid du grub par 'gyur ro snyam na /
brjod du med pa zhes bya ba 'di ci zhig gal te 'dres par gyur pa yin na de ni mi 'thad de /
so sor ma grub pa dag la 'dres par gyur pa med pa'i phyir ro /
anirdhāryamāṇau svarūpatvāt bandhyāputraśyāmagauratādivanna staḥ eva saṃbhavavibhavāviti /
yadā caivaṃ saṃbhavavibhavau na staḥ, tadā taddheturapi kālo nāstīti siddham 		brjod du med pa ni nges par gzung du med pa'i rang bzhin nyid yin no zhe na /
de lta na ni nges par gzung du med pa'i rang gi ngo bo yin pa'i phyir mo gsham gyi bu'i sngo ba sangs dang dkar sham nyid la sogs pa ltar 'byung ba dang 'jig pa dag yod pa ma yin no zhes bya bar 'gyur ro /
kiṃ cānyat /
ihemau saṃbhavavibhavau parikalpyamānau kṣayadharmiṇo vā bhāvasya parikalpyeyātāmakṣayadharmiṇo vā? ubhayathā ca nopapadyate iti pratipādayannāha 		gang gi tshe de ltar 'byung ba dang 'jig pa dag yod pa ma yin pa de'i tshe de dag gi rgyu dus kyang med do zhes bya bar grub po; ;gzhan yang 'di na 'byung ba dang 'jig pa de dag rtog pa na dngos po zad pa'i chos can nam /
ma zad pa'i chos can zhig la rtog grang na /
kṣayasya saṃbhavo nāsti nākṣayasyāpi saṃbhavaḥ gnyi ga ltar yang mi 'thad do zhes bya bar bstan pa'i phyir /
zad la 'byung ba yod ma yin /
kṣayasya vibhavo nāsti vibhavo nākṣayasya ca ma zad pa la'ang 'byung ba med /
zad la 'jig pa yod ma yin /
ma zad pa la'ang 'jig pa med /
tatra kṣayasya kṣayalakṣaṇasya bhāvasya virodhidharmasadbhāvāt saṃbhavo na yuktaḥ ces bya ba gsungs so /
de la zad pa ste dngos po zad pa'i chos can la ni 'gal ba'i chos yod pas 'byung ba rigs pa ma yin no /
akṣayasyāpi bhāvalakṣaṇaviyuktatvāt kharaviṣāṇasyeva saṃbhavo na yuktaḥ dngos po'i mtshan nyid dang mi ldan pa'i phyir ma zad pa la yang 'byung ba rigs pa ma yin te /
evaṃ kṣayasya vibhavo nāsti bod bu'i rva bzhin no /
de bzhin du /
kṣayadharmo hi avidyamānaḥ, tasya nirāśrayo vibhavo na yuktaḥ zad pa la 'jig pa yod pa ma yin te zad pa'i chos can ni med pa yin te /
de la rten med pa'i phyir 'jig pa mi rigs so /
tathā vibhavo nākṣayasya ca de bzhin du ma zad pa la'ang 'jig pa med de /
akṣayadharmo hi bhāvābhāvalakṣaṇavilakṣaṇaḥ ma zad pa'i chos can gyi dngos po ni dngos po'i mtshan nyid dang mi mthun pa yin na /
tasya avidyamānasya kuto vibhavo bhaviṣyati? yau ca saṃbhavavibhavau na kṣayadharmiṇo nākṣayadharmiṇo bhāvasya saṃbhavataḥ, tau na saṃbhavataḥ yod pa ma yin pa de la 'jig pa yod par ga la 'gyur /
'byung ba dang 'jig pa gang dag dngos po zad pa dang ma zad pa'i chos can la mi srid pa de dag ni /
yod pa ma yin pa nyid de /
iti na staḥ saṃbhavavibhavau de'i phyir 'byung ba dang 'jig pa dag med do /
atrāha /
vidyete eva bhāvānāṃ saṃbhavavibhavau, tadāśrayidharmisadbhāvāt 		'dir smras pa /
dngos po rnams kyi 'byung ba dang 'jig pa ni yod pa nyid de /
de dag gi rten chos can yod pa'i phyir ro /
iha bhāvāśrayau saṃbhavavibhavau, sa ca tāvad bhāvo 'sti, tatsadbhāvāt tadāśritāvapi dharmau bhaviṣyataḥ iti 'dir 'byung ba dang 'jig pa dag ni dngos po la brten pa yin la /
dngos po de yang re zhig yod pa yin no /
de yod pas de la brten pa'i chos dag kyang yod par 'gyur ro /
ucyate /
syātāṃ bhāvāśritāvetau dharmau, yadi bhāvaḥ syāt 		brjod par bya ste /
gal te dngos po yod na ni /
dngos po la brten pa'i chos de gnyis yod par 'gyur na /
yadā tu bhāvo nāsti, tadā gang gi tshe dngos po yod pa ma yin pa de'i tshe /
saṃbhavo vibhavaścaiva vinā bhāvaṃ na vidyate dngos po yod pa ma yin par /
'byung dang 'jig pa yod ma yin /
kasmātpunarbhāvo nāstīti cet, yasmāt yang ci'i phyir dngos po yod pa ma yin zhe na /
saṃbhavaṃ vibhavaṃ caiva vinā bhāvo na vidyate 'di ltar /
'byung dang 'jig pa med par ni /
bhāvasya hi lakṣaṇabhūtau saṃbhavavibhavau, tau ca svarūpato na staḥ iti pratiṣiddhau /
yadā ca tau bhāvataḥ pratiṣiddhau, tadā bhāvalakṣaṇaṃ saṃbhavaṃ vibhavaṃ ca vinā kuto bhāvalakṣaṇavilakṣaṇo bhāvo bhaviṣyati? bhāvaṃ ca vinā na staḥ saṃbhavavibhavau 		dngos po yod pa ma yin no /
'byung ba dang 'jig pa dag ni dngos po'i mtshan nyid du gyur ba yin na /
de dag ni bkag pa yin no; ;gang gi tshe bkag pa de'i tshe dngos po'i mtshan nyid 'byung ba dang 'jig pa med par dngos po'i mtshan nyid dang mi mthun pa yod par ga la 'gyur /
apare tu pūrvārdhaṃ paścimaṃ kṛtvā vyācakṣate /
staḥ eva saṃbhavavibhavau, bhāvadharmatvāt 		dngos po med na ni 'byung ba dang 'jig pa dag kyang yod pa ma yin no /
gzhan dag ni 'byung ba dang 'jig pa dag yod pa yin te /
iha yannāsti, na tasyāsti bhāvadharmatvam, tadyathā maṇḍūkajaṭāśiromaṇeḥ dngos po'i chos yod pa'i phyir ro /
'dir gang yod pa ma yin pa de la ni dngos po'i chos med de /
dper na sbal pa'i ral pa bzhin no /
bhāvadharmau ca saṃbhavavibhavau, tasmāt staḥ eva tau iti 'byung ba dang 'jig pa gnyis ni dngos po'i chos kyang yin no /
de'i phyir de dag yod do zhe na /
'di la brjod par bya ste /
yadi kasyacit paramārthataḥ saṃbhavavibhavau syātām, sa bhāva iti yuktaṃ syādabhidhātum gal te 'ga' zhig la don dam par 'byung ba dang 'jig pa dag yod na ni /
de dngos po zhes bya bar brjod par rigs par 'gyur na /
tau ca na staḥ, iti de dag ni med de /
saṃbhavaṃ vibhavaṃ caiva vinā bhāvo na vidyate de'i phyir /
'byung dang 'jig pa med na ni /
dngos po yod pa ma yin no ste /
bhāvasya saṃbhavavibhavasattve vidyamānatvāt, iti bhāvaḥ dngos po ni 'byung ba dang 'jig pa yod na yod pa nyid yin pa'i phyir ro snyam du dgongs pa'o /
tadasattve ca hetorasiddhārthatā de med na ni gtan tshigs ma grub pa'i don nyid yin no /
tathā /
saṃbhavo vibhavaścaiva vinā bhāvaṃ na vidyate 		de bzhin du /
dngos po yod pa ma yin par /
'byung dang 'jig pa yod ma yin te /
āśrayasyābhāvādāśritasya asiddhiḥ ityabhisaṃdhiriti /
kiṃ cānyat 		rten med pas brten pa ma grub po zhes bya bar dgongs pa yin no zhes phyed gang ma phyed 'og mar byas nas rnam par 'chad do /
ihemau saṃbhavavibhavau parikalpamānau śūnyasya vā bhāvasya parikalpyeyātāmaśūnyasya vā? ubhayathā ca nopapadyate iti pratipādayannāha gzhan yang 'dir 'byung ba dang 'jig pa de dag rtog pa na dngos po stong pa'am /
mi stong pa la rtog grang na /
gnyi ga ltar yang mi 'thad do /
zhes bstan pa'i phyir ro /
saṃbhavo vibhavaścaiva na śūnyasyopapadyate stong la 'byung dang 'jig pa dag /
'thad pa nyid ni ma yin no /
avidyamānāśrayatvādākāśacitravadityabhiprāyaḥ zhes bya ba gsungs te /
rten med pa'i phyir nam mkha'i ri mo bzhin no snyam du dgongs pa yin no /
tathā /
saṃbhavo vibhavaścaiva nāśūnyasyopapadyate 		de bzhin du /
mi stong la yang 'byung 'jig dag /
'thad pa nyid ni ma yin no /
aśūnyasya asattvāt nirāśrayau saṃbhavavibhavau nopapadyataḥ mi stong pa la yod pa'i rang bzhin can yin pa'i phyir /
rten med pas 'byung ba dang 'jig pa 'brad pa yin no /
kiṃ cānyat gzhan yang /
iha yadi saṃbhavavibhavau syātām, tau ekatvena vā syātāmanyatvena vā? ubhayathā ca nopapadyate ityāha /
saṃbhavo vibhavaścaiva naika ityupapadyate 		gal te 'byung ba dang 'jig pa dag yod na /
de dag gcig nyid dam gzhan nyid du yod pa zhig na /
gnyi ga ltar yang mi 'thad do zhes gsungs pa ni /
'byung ba dang ni 'jig pa dag /
parasparaviruddhayorālokāndhakārayorivaikatvānupapatteḥ gcig pa nyid ni mi 'thad do; ;snang ba dang mun pa ltar phan tshun 'gal ba dag ni gcig nyid du mi 'thad pa'i phyir ro /
saṃbhavo vibhavaścaiva na nānetyupapadyate 'byung ba dang ni 'jig pa dag /
gzhan nyid du yang mi 'thad do /
ubhayoḥ parasparamavyabhicāritvāt gnyi ga phan tshun mi 'khrul pa'i phyir ro /
na hi saṃbhavarahitasya vināśaḥ, na vibhavarahitasya saṃbhavo dṛṣṭa iti 'byung ba dang bral ba la ni 'jig pa mi rigs la /
'jig pa dang bral ba la ni 'byung ba ma mthong ste /
evamubhayoḥ parasparamavyabhicāritvāt de ltar na gnyi ga phan tshun mi 'khrul ba'i phyir ro /
saṃbhavo vibhavaścaiva na nānetyupapadyate 'byung ba dang ni 'jig pa dag /
gzhan nyid du yang mi 'thad do /
atha syāt /
kimanayā sūkṣmekṣikayā? āgopālāṅganādiko hi janaḥ yasmāt saṃbhavaṃ vibhavaṃ ca paśyati, tasmāt staḥ saṃbhavavibhavau 		ci ste zhib mor brtags pa 'dis ci zhig bya /
gang gi phyir skye bo ba glang rdzi dang bud med yan chad kyis 'byung ba dang 'jig pa mthong ba de'i phyir 'byung ba dang 'jig pa dag yod pa yin te /
na hi avidyamāno vandhyātanayaḥ śakyo draṣṭumiti /
evamapi 		yod pa ma yin pa'i mo gsham gyi bu ni blta bar mi nus so snyam na /
gal te de ltar /
dṛśyate saṃbhavaścaiva vibhavaścaiva te bhavet /
ucyate 		'byung ba dang ni 'jig pa dag /
mthong ngo snyam du khyod sems na /
anaikāntikametat /
na hi yad yad lokenopalabhyate tasya tasya astitvam /
tathā hi āgopālāṅganādiko jano gandharvanagaramāyāsvapnālātacakramarīcikāsalilādikamavidyamānamapi paśyati indriyopaghātāt, evamimāvapi saṃbhavavibhavau asantau mohādeva paśyatītyāha 		'di ni ma nges pa yin te /
gang dang gang 'jig rten pas mthong ba de dang de yod pa nyid ni ma yin no /
'di ltar skye bo ba glang rdzi dang bud med yan chad kyis yod pa ma yin yang /
dri za'i grong khyer dang sgyu ma dang rmi lam dang mgal me'i 'khor lo dang smig rgyu'i chu la sogs pa mthong zhing /
dbang po la gnod par gyur pa las rab rib can gyi skra shad dang sbrang ma dang sbrang bu mchu ring sa dag mthong ba yin te /
de bzhin du 'byung ba dang 'jig pa dag kyang med bzhin du mi shes pa'i gti mug gi rab rib can gyi blo'i mig ldongs par byas pas mthong ba yin no zhes bshad pa /
dṛśyate saṃbhavaścaiva mohādvibhava eva ca 'byung ba dang ni 'jig pa dag /
gti mug nyid kyis mthong ba yin /
atha kasmāt punaretadevaṃ niścīyate /
avidyamānasvarūpāvimau saṃbhavavibhavau mohādeva vāralokena dṛśyete iti 		zhes bya ba'o /
ci ste 'byung ba dang 'jig pa dag yod pa ma yin pa'i rang gi ngo bo can 'di dag gti mug kho nas mthong ba yin no zhes bya ba 'di de ltar cis nges she na /
yuktyā hyetadevaṃ niścīyate /
kā punaratra yuktiḥ? iha yadi kaścid bhāvo nāma bhavet, niyataṃ sa bhāvādvā jāyeta abhāvādvā 		'di ni de ltar rigs pas nges pa yin no /
'dir rigs pa gang yin zhe na /
'dir gal te dngos po zhes bya ba 'ga' zhig yod na ni /
de nges par dngos po'am dngos po med pa las skye ba zhig yin /
tathā yadi abhāvo nāma kaścit, so 'pi bhāvādvā jāyeta abhāvādvā de bzhin du gal te dngos po med pa zhes bya ba 'ga' zhig yod na ni /
de yang dngos po'am dngos po med pa las skye ba zhig yin grang na /
ubhayathā ca ubhayorapyasaṃbhavaḥ ityāha gnyis char gnyi ga ltar yang yod pa ma yin no zhes gsungs pa /
na bhāvājjāyate bhāvo bhāvo 'bhāvānna jāyate dngos po dngos las mi skye ste /
dngos po dngos med las mi skye /
nābhāvājjāyate 'bhāvo 'bhāvo bhāvānna jāyate dngos med dngos med mi skye ste /
dngos med dngos las mi skye'o /
bhāvāt tāvat saṃbhavākhyād bhāvasya saṃbhavākhyasya utpādo na vidyate, kāryakāraṇayoryaugapadyābhāvāt, utpādasya ca labdhajanmanaḥ punarutpādavaiyarthyāt re zhig dngos po ste yang dag par 'byung ba zhes bya ba ni dngos po ste yang dag par 'byung ba las skye ba yod pa ma yin te /
rgyu dang 'bras bu gnyis dus gcig pa med pa'i phyir dang skye ba rnyed zin pa'i skye ba la yang skye ba don med pa'i phyir ro /
abhāvādapi bhāvo na jāyate dngos po ni dngos po med pa las kyang mi skye'o /
kiṃ kāraṇam? abhāvo hi nāma vibhavo vināśaḥ /
sa ca bhāvaviruddhaḥ 		ci'i phyir zhe na /
dngos po med pa zhes bya ba ni 'jig cing rnam par 'jig pa yin la /
de yang dngos po dang 'gal ba yin te /
tasmādbhāvaviruddhāt kathaṃ bhāvaḥ syāt? yadi syāt, tadā vandhyāduhiturapi putraḥ syāt dngos po dang 'gal ba de'i phyir de las dngos po ji ltar 'byung bar 'gyur /
gal te 'gyur na ni mo gsham gyi bu mo las kyang bu skye bar 'gyur ro /
na caitadevamiti /
tasmādabhāvādapi bhāvo na bhavati /
idānīmabhāvo 'pyabhāvānna bhavati 		de'i phyir dngos po ni dngos po med pa las kyang 'byung ba ma yin no /
da ni dngos po med pa yang dngos po med pa las mi 'byung ste /
dngos po med pa ni dngos po log pa'i rang bzhin can yin te /
bhāvanivṛttirūpo hi abhāvaḥ, tata kuto 'sya kāryakaraṇasāmarthyam? yadi syāt, nirvāṇasyāpi kāryakaraṇasāmarthyaṃ syāt de'i phyir de la 'bras bu skyed pa'i nus pa ga la yod /
gal te yod na ni mya ngan las 'das pa la yang 'bras bu skyed pa'i mthu yod par 'gyur ro /
yadi ca abhāvādabhāvaḥ syāt, tadā vandhyāduhiturapi putraḥ syāt /
na caitadevamiti /
tasmādabhāvādapyabhāvo na bhavati 		gal te dngos po med pa las dngos po med pa 'byung bar 'gyur na ni /
de'i tshe mo gsham gyi bu mo las kyang bu skye bar 'gyur na /
de ni de ltar yang ma yin te /
de'i phyir dngos po med pa ni /
dngos po med pa las kyang 'byung ba ma yin no /
idānīṃ bhāvādapyabhāvo na bhavati da ni dngos po med pa dngos po las kyang mi 'byung ste /
bhāvaviruddho hyabhāvaḥ dngos po med pa ni dngos po dang 'gal ba yin na /
sa kathaṃ bhāvādbhavet de ji ltar dngos po las 'byung bar 'gyur /
yadi bhavet, pradīpādandhakāraḥ syāt gal te 'gyur na ni sgron ma las kyang mun pa 'byung bar 'gyur ro /
yataścaivaṃ vicāryamāṇau saṃbhavavibhavau na staḥ, tasmānmohādeva lokena dṛśyete iti vijñeyam /
athavā 		gang gi phyir de ltar rnam par dpyad na 'byung ba dang 'jig pa dag yod pa ma yin pa de'i phyir gti mug nyid kyis mthong pa yin no zhes bya bar shes par bya'o /
ayamanyaḥ pūrvapakṣaḥ /
iha hi yadi saṃbhavavibhavau syātām, tau bhāvāśrayau vā syātāmabhāvāśrayau vā 		rnam pa gcig tu na phyogs snga ma 'di gzhan yin no /
'di ltar 'dir gal te 'byung ba dang 'jig pa dag yod na ni /
de dag dngos po la brten pa'am /
dngos po med pa la brten par 'gyur ba zhig na /
tau ca bhāvābhāvau sarvathā vicāryamāṇau na saṃbhavataḥ dngos po dang dngos po med pa de gnyis ni rnam par dpyad pa na /
tataśca kuto nirāśrayau saṃbhavavibhavāviti? ataḥ thams cad du yod pa ma yin te de'i phyir rten med pas 'byung ba dang 'jig pa dgag la yod /
de'i phyir /
dṛśyate saṃbhavaścaiva mohādvibhava eva ca 'byung ba dang ni 'jig pa dag /
gti mug nyid kyis mthong ma yin /
iti vijñeyam /
yathā ca bhāvābhāvau na saṃbhavataḥ, tathā pratipādayannāha 		zhes bya bar shes par bya'o /
dngos po dang dngos po med pa gnyis ji ltar yod pa ma yin pa de ltar bstan pa'i phyir /
na bhāvājjāyate bhāvo bhāvo 'bhāvānna jāyate dngos po dngos las mi skye ste /
dngos po dngos med las mi skye /
nābhāvājjāyate 'bhāvo 'bhāvo bhāvānna jāyate dngos med dngos med mi skye ste /
dngos med dngos las mi skye'o /
zhes gsungs te /
asyārthaḥ pūrvavat 'di'i don ni gong ma bzhin no /
api ca /
yadi kaścid bhāvo nāma syāt, tasya udayavyayavattvāt saṃbhavavibhavau syātām 		gzhan yang gal te dngos po zhes bya ba 'ga' zhig yod na ni /
de skye zhing zang pa dang ldan pas 'byung ba dang 'jig par 'gyur na /
na ca kaścid bhāvaḥ svarūpato 'sti kharaviṣāṇavat svabhāvānutpannatvāt dngos po 'ga' yang yod pa ma yin te /
bong bu'i rva ltar rang bzhin gyis ma skyes pa'i phyir ro /
anutpannatvamasiddhamiti cet, tat siddham, yasmāt ma skyes pa nyid ma grub po zhe na /
ma grub pa ma yin te /
na svato jāyate bhāvaḥ parato naiva jāyate 'di ltar /
dngos po bdag las mi skye ste /
na svataḥ parataścaiva jāyate, jāyate kutaḥ gzhan las skye ba nyid ma yin /
bdag dang gzhan las skye ba na /
etacca ādya eva prakaraṇe vyākhyātattvānna punarvyākhyāyate yod min ji ltar skye bar 'gyur /
'di ni rab tu byed pa dang por rnam par bshad zin pa'i phyir yang mi bshad do /
yaścaivaṃ yathoktaprakāreṇa jāyate sa idānīṃ kuto jāyate? naiva kutaścijjāyate ityabhiprāyaḥ gang gi phyir de ltar ji skad bshad pa'i rnam pa dag gis skye ba yod pa ma yin pa de'i phyir de ji ltar skye bar 'gyur te /
avaśyaṃ caitadevamabhyupeyam /
sarvathā nāsti bhāvasyotpāda iti /
bhāvasadbhāvatābhyupagame ca bhavataḥ śāśvatocchedadarśanamāpadyate bauddhamatānugasyetyāha 		ji ltar yang skye bar mi 'gyur ba nyid do snyam du dgongs pa yin no /
dngos po skye ba rnam pa thams cad du yod pa ma yin no zhes bya ba 'di ni de ltar gdon mi za bar khas blang bar bya'o /
de lta ma yin na ni /
bhāvamabhyupapannasya śāśvatocchedadarśanam dngos po yod par khas blangs na /
rtag dang chad par lta bar ni /
prasajyate thal bar 'gyur te /
yasmāt, /
sa bhāvo hi nityo 'nityo 'tha vā bhavet /
yo hi yathoditapadārthavyavasthāmatikramya bhāvasadbhāvadarśanamabhyupaiti, tasya avaśyaṃ pravacanātyantaviruddhaṃ śāśvatocchedadarśanadvayamāpadyate 		gang gi phyir /
dngos po de ni /
rtag dang mi rtag 'gyur phyir ro /
gang zhig dngos po'i rnam par gzhag pa ji skad bshad pa las 'das nas dngos por lta ba khas len pa de ni gdon mi za bar gsung rab dang shin tu 'gal ba rtag pa dang chad par lta bar 'gyur ro /
kiṃ kāraṇam? yasmāt sa bhāvaḥ parikalpyamānaḥ nityo vā bhavedanityo vā ci'i phyir zhe na /
gang gi phyir dngos po de brtags pa na rtag pa'am mi rtag pa zhig tu 'gyur grang /
yadi nityaḥ, tadā niyataṃ śāśvatavādaḥ gal te rtag pa yin na ni de'i tshe nges par rtag par smra bar 'gyur la /
atha anityaḥ, tadā niyatamuccheda iti 'on te mi rtag pa yin na ni de'i tshe nges bar chad par smra bar 'gyur ro /
atrāha /
bhāvamabhyupapannasya naivocchedo na śāśvatam 		'dir smras pa /
dngos po yod par khas blangs kyang /
chad par mi 'gyur rtag mi 'gyur /
kiṃ kāraṇam? yasmāt ci'i phyir zhe na /
gang gi phyir /
udayavyayasaṃtānaḥ phalahetvorbhavaḥ sa hi 'bras bu rgyu yi 'byung 'jig gi /
rgyun de srid pa yin phyir ro /
yo hi hetuphalayorudayavyayānuprabandhaḥ, sa hi asmākaṃ bhavaḥ saṃsāraḥ rgyu dang 'bras bu'i 'byung ba dang 'jig pa'i rgyun gang yin pa de ni kho bo cag gi srid pa ste 'khor ba yin no /
tatra yadi heturnirudhyeta, taddhetukaṃ phalaṃ notpadyeta, tadā syāducchedavādadoṣaḥ de la gal te rgyu 'gags shing de'i rgyu can gyi 'bras bu mi skye na ni /
de'i tshe chad par 'gyur la /
yadi ca heturna nirudhyeta, svarūpeṇāvatiṣṭhet, tadā syācchāśvatavādadarśanadoṣaḥ /
na caitadevamiti /
tasmād bhāvābhyupagame 'pi nāsti śāśvatocchedadarśanadoṣadvayaprasaṅgaḥ 		gal te rgyu mi 'gag cing rang gi ngo bos gnas na ni /
de'i tshe rtag par thal bar yang 'gyur na de ni de ltar yang ma yin no /
de'i phyir dngos po khas blangs su zin kyang rtag pa dang chad par lta bar thal ba yod pa ma yin no /
sa eva saṃsāraḥ yo 'yaṃ hetuphalāvicchinnakramavartī utpādavyayānuprabandhaḥ saṃskārāṇāmiti 'du byed rnams kyi 'byung ba dang 'jig pa'i rgyun rgyu dang 'bras bu rnam par ma chad par rim par 'byung ba gang yin pa de nyid 'khor ba yin te /
ato nāsti asmākamayaṃ doṣa iti de'i phyir kho bo cag la nyes pa 'di yod pa ma yin no /
ucyate /
udayavyayasaṃtānaḥ phalahetvorbhavaḥ sa cet /
nanu evamapi 		brjod par bya ste /
gal te 'bras rgyu'i 'byung 'jig gi /
rgyun de srid pa yin gyur na /
de lta na yang /
vyayasyāpunarutpatterhetūcchedaḥ prasajyate 'jig la yang skye med pa'i phyir /
rgyu ni chad par thal bar 'gyur /
ma yin nam /
