yo hi hetukṣaṇaḥ phalasyotpattau hetubhāvamupetya nirudhyate, nanu tasya vyayavato hetukṣaṇasya punaranutpādāducchedadarśanamāpadyate gang rgyu'i skad cig ma 'bras bu bskyed par bya ba la rgyur gyur nas 'gag pa /
rgyu'i skad cig ma 'jig pa dang ldan pa de yang mi skye ba'i phyir chad par lta bar 'gyur ro /
tavāyaṃ kathaṃ na doṣa iti cet, bhāvamabhyupapannasya ayaṃ doṣaḥ khyod la skyon 'dir ji ltar mi 'gyur zhe na /
dngos po khas len pa la nyes pa 'dir 'gyur gyi /
na ca mayā bhāvo 'bhyupagataḥ, svabhāvānutpannatvāt sarvadharmāṇām /
yatrāpi mayā 		ngas ni dngos po khas ma blangs te /
chos thams cad skye ba med pa'i phyir ro /
gang du /
pratītya yadyadbhavati na hi tāvattadeva tat gang la brten te gang 'byung ba /
de ni re zhig de nyid min /
na cānyadapi tattasmānnocchedo nāpi śāśvatam de las gzhan pa'ang ma yin phyir /
de phyir chad min rtag ma yin /
ityuktam, tatrāpi amunā nyāyena naiḥsvābhāvyameva bhāvānāṃ pratipāditam zhes bshad pa der yang kho bos tshul 'dis dngos po rnams rang bzhin med par bstan pa yin te /
de lta ma yin te /
anyathā hi sati bhāvasvarūpe bījāṅkurayoḥ kathamanyatvaṃ na syāt? tasmānnāyaṃ prasaṅgo 'smākaṃ bādhaka iti dngos po rang gi ngo bo yod na ni sa bon dang myu gu dag gzhan nyid du ji ltar mi 'gyur /
de'i phyir thal ba 'di kho bo cag la gnod par byed pa ma yin no /
evaṃ tāvad bhāvamabhyupapannasya hetoḥ punaranutpādāducchedadarśanaprasaṅgamudbhāvya idānīṃ śāśvatavāde doṣaprasaṅgamudbhāvayannāha de ltar re zhig dngos po yod par khas len na rgyu yang skye ba med pa'i phyir chad par lta bar thal bar 'gyur ba brjod nas /
da ni rtag pa'i nyes par thal bar brjod pa'i phyir /
sadbhāvasya svabhāvena nāsadbhāvaśca yujyate dngos po ngo bo nyid yod na /
dngos med 'gyur bar mi rigs so /
zhes bya ba smos te /
yadi hi hetoḥ sadbhāvaḥ svabhāvataḥ syāt, tasya paścādasadbhāvo na syāt svabhāvasyā napāyitvāt gal te rgyu rang bzhin gyis yod par gyur na ni /
de phyis yod pa ma yin par mi 'gyur te /
rang bzhin la ldog pa med pa'i phyir ro /
tataśca śāśvatadarśanaprasaṅgaḥ tadavastha eva de'i phyir rtag par lta bar thal ba son 'dug go /
kiṃ cānyat gzhan yang /
nirvāṇakāle cocchedaḥ praśamādbhavasaṃtateḥ /
yadyapi hetuphalayorudayavyayasaṃtānapravṛttyā śāśvatocchedadarśanaprasaṅgaḥ parihriyate, tathāpi yatrāsya saṃtānasya punarapyapravṛttiḥ, tatra nirvāṇe niyatamucchedadarśanamāpadyate /
ucchedadarśanaṃ ca prahātavyamityuktaṃ bhagavatā /
evaṃvidhamucchedadarśanaṃ na bhaviṣyatīti cet, anyadapi kimarthaṃ bhavatā bhaviṣyatīti bhāvavicchedālambanatvāt, nirvāṇakāle bhāvavicchedālambanavadityabhiprāyaḥ /
yaccoktam 		mya ngan 'das pa'i dus na chad /
srid rgyun rab tu zhi phyir ro /
gal te yang rgyu dang 'bras bu dag gi 'byung ba dang 'jig pa'i rgyun 'jug pas rtag pa dang chad par lta bar thal ba spong bar byed mod kyi /
de lta na yang gang du rgyun de yang 'byung bar mi 'gyur ba mya ngan las 'das pa der ni nges par chad par lta bar 'gyur na /
bcom ldan 'das kyis ni chad par lta ba spang bar bya ba gsungs so /
rnam pa de lta bu ni chad par lta ba yin par mi 'gyur ro zhe na /
khyod la gzhan yang ci'i phyir yin par 'gyur te /
mya ngan las 'das pa'i dus su dngos po rnam par chad pa la dmigs pa ltar /
dngos po rnam par chad pa la dmigs pa'i phyir ro snyam du bsams pa'o /
gang yang /
udayavyayasaṃtānaḥ phalahetvorbhavaḥ sa hi /
iti, tadapi nopapadyate 		'bras bu rgyu yi 'byung 'jig gi /
rgyun de srid pa yin phyir ro /
zhes smras pa de yang mi 'thad de /
ji ltar zhe na /
kathaṃ kṛtvā? iha hi caramo bhavo nivṛttilakṣaṇaḥ, prathamo gatipratisaṃdhilakṣaṇaḥ 'dir srid pa tha ma ni ldog pa'i mtshan nyid can yin la /
dang po ni 'gro ba nyid mtshams sbyor ba'i mtshan nyid can no /
tatra caramo bhavo nirudhyamāno hetutvenāvatiṣṭhate de la srid pa tha ma 'gag bzhin pa ni rgyu nyid du gnas pa yin la /
upapattilakṣaṇastu prathamo bhavaḥ phalarūpatvena vyavatiṣṭhate skye ba'i mtshan nyid can srid pa dang po ni 'bras bu'i ngo bor gnas pa yin te /
anayośca bhavayoḥ saṃsāra iti saṃjñā kṛtā /
atra ca idaṃ vicāryate 		srid pa de gnyis la 'khor ba zhes ming du btags pa yin no /
'dir 'di dpyad par bya ba ste /
ya eṣa prathamo bhavaḥ phalarūpatvena vyavasthāpyate, sa kiṃ carame bhave niruddhe upajāyate, athāniruddhe, uta nirudhyamāne, yato hetuphalānuprabandhāt saṃsāraḥ syāt? sarvathā ca vicāryamāṇo na saṃbhavatīti pratipādayannāha gang las rgyu dang 'bras bu'i rgyun gyis 'khor bar 'gyur ba /
srid pa dang po 'bras bu'i ngo bo nyid du rnam par gnas pa gang yin pa de ci srid pa tha ma 'gags pa'am /
'on te ma 'gags pa'am de ste 'gag bzhin pa na skye grang /
rnam par dpyad na rnam pa thams cad du yod pa ma yin no zhes bstan pa'i phyir /
carame na niruddhe ca prathamo yujyate bhavaḥ tha ma 'gags par gyur pa na /
srid pa dang po rigs mi 'gyur /
tha ma 'gags par ma gyur tshe /
carame nāniruddhe ca prathamo yujyate bhavaḥ srid pa dang po rigs mi 'gyur /
zhes gsungs so /
tatra yadi carame bhave niruddhe prathamo bhavo jāyate iti parikalpyate, tadā nirhetuka syāt /
dahanadagdhabījādapi aṅkurodayaḥ syāt 		de la gal te srid pa tha ma 'gags pa ni srid pa dang po skye'o zhes rtog na ni /
de'i tshe rgyu med par 'gyur zhing /
sa bon tshig pa las kyang myu gu skye bar 'gyur na /
na caitadiṣṭam de ni 'dod pa yang ma yin no /
tasmāccarame niruddhe prathamo bhavo na yujyate de'i phyir tha ma 'gags pa na srid pa dang po mi rigs so /
idānīmaniruddhe 'pi carame bhave prathamo bhavo na yujyate /
yadi syāt, nirhetukaḥ syāt, dvirūpatā ca ekasya sattvasya syāt, apūrvasattvaprādurbhāvaśca, pūrvasya ca nityatā syāt, avinaṣṭe ca bīje aṅkurodayaḥ syāt 		da ni srid pa tha ma ma 'gags pa na yang srid pa dang po rigs par mi 'gyur te /
gal te 'gyur na ni rgyu med pa dang sems can gcig la ngo bo gnyis yod pa dang sngon med pa'i sems can 'byung ba dang snga ma rtag pa nyid dang sa bon ma zhig pa la myu gu skye bar 'gyur na /
na caitadevamiṣṭamiti de dag ni de ltar yang ma yin no /
ataḥ /
carame nāniruddhe ca prathamo yujyate bhavaḥ /
iti sthitam 		de'i phyir /
tha ma 'gags par ma gyur tshe /
srid pa dang po rigs mi 'gyur ro /
idānīṃ nirudhyamāne 'pi carame bhave prathamo bhavo yathā nopapadyate tathā pratipādayannāha da ni srid pa tha ma 'gag bzhin pa na yang ji ltar srid pa dang po mi 'thad pa de ltar bstan pa'i phyir /
nirudhyamāne carame prathamo yadi jāyate gal te tha ma 'gag bzhin na /
dang po skye bar 'gyur na ni /
nirudhyamāna ekaḥ syājjāyamāno 'paro bhavet /
tatra nirudhyamāno vartamāno vartamānapratyayāntavācyatvāt, jāyate ityapi vartamāna evocyate vartamānaśabdavācyatvāt 		'gag bzhin pa ni gcig 'gyur zhing /
skye bzhin pa yang gzhan du 'gyur /
zhes gsungs so /
de la 'gag bzhin pa ni da ltar ba ste /
da ltar ba'i rkyen gyi mtha' can gyis brjod par bya ba yin pa'i phyir ro /
skye bar 'gyur ba zhes bya bas kyang da ltar ba nyid brjod de /
da ltar ba'i sgra'i brjod bya yin pa'i phyir ro /
athavā nirudhyamāno nirodhakriyākārakaḥ yang na 'gag bzhin pa ni 'gag pa'i bya ba byed pa po yin la /
yaścāpi jāyate, asāvapi janikriyākārakaḥ, tau ca ekakālāviṣyamāṇau yaugapadyenaiva staḥ skye bar 'gyur ba gang yin pa de yang skye ba'i bya ba byed pa po yin te /
de dag dus gcig par 'dod pa na cig car du yod par 'gyur ro /
de'i phyir 'gag bzhin pa ni srid pa gcig tu 'gyur zhing /
tataśca nirudhyamānaḥ eko bhavaḥ syāt, jāyamānaścāpara iti yaugapadyenaiva dvau bhavau prāpnutaḥ /
na caikasya yugapad dvau bhavau saṃbhavataḥ ityuktametat /
tadevaṃ yathoktena vicārakameṇa 		skye bzhin pa yang gzhan du 'gyur bas /
srid pa gnyis dus gcig pa nyid du 'gyur na /
gcig la cig car gnyis yod pa yang ma yin pas 'di ni mi rigs so /
de'i phyir de ltar ji skad bshad pa'i rnam par dpyad pa'i tshul gyis /
na cennirudhyamānaśca jāyamānaśca yujyate /
sārdhaṃ ca mriyate yeṣu teṣu skandheṣu jāyate 		gal te 'gag bzhin skye bzhin dag /
lhan cig tu yang rigs min na /
phung po gang la 'chi 'gyur pa /
caśabdaḥ samuccayārthaḥ /
pṛthakpṛthak ceti etatsaṃnidhāpayati 		de la skye ba'ang 'byung 'gyur ram /
'ang gi sgra ni bsdu ba'i don du ste /
de dag so so so sor 'jog par byed pa'i phyir ro /
yadā evaṃ yathoditanyāyena niruddhe carame prathamo bhavo na saṃbhavati, aniruddhe 'pi carame prathamo bhavo na saṃbhavati, sārdhaṃ caikasmiśca kāle caramena bhavena saha prathamo bhavo na saṃbhavati, tat kimidānīṃ yeṣu eva skandheṣu mriyate teṣu eva jāyate iti syāt gang gi tshe de ltar ji skad bshad pa'i tshul gyis tha ma 'gags pa na srid pa dang po 'byung ba ma yin zhing /
tha ma ma 'gags par srid pa dang po 'byung ba ma yin la /
srid pa tha ma dang lhan cig ste dus gcig tu yang srid pa dang po 'byung ba ma yin na /
da ni /
yeṣu skandheṣu sthito mriyate, teṣveva jāyate iti atyantaviruddhametat /
na hi mriyamāṇo jāyate iti dṛṣṭam 		phung po gang la 'chi 'gyur ba /
de la skye ba'ang 'byung 'gyur ram /
phung po gang dag la gnas pa 'chi bar 'gyur ba de dag nyid la skye ba zhes bya ba 'di ni shin tu 'gal ba yin no /
'di ltar 'chi bzhin pa ni skye bar ma mthong ngo /
tat /
evaṃ triṣvapi kāleṣu na yuktā 		de'i phyir /
de ltar dus gsum dag tu yang /
bhavadabhimatā /
bhavasaṃtatiḥ 		srid pa'i rgyun ni mi rigs na /
carame bhave niruddhe 'niruddhe nirudhyamāne yasmāt prathamo bhavo na saṃbhavati, tasmāt triṣvapi kāleṣu bhavasaṃtirnāsti gang gi phyir srid pa tha ma 'gags pa dang ma 'gags pa dang 'gag bzhin pa ni srid pa dang po yod pa ma yin pa de'i phyir /
dus gsum char du yang srid pa'i rgyun yod pa ma yin no /
triṣu kāleṣu yā nāsti sā kathaṃ bhavasaṃtatiḥ dus gsum dag tu gang med pa /
de ni ji ltar srid pa'i rgyun /
yā ca idānīṃ triṣu kāleṣu nāsti, kutaḥ sā anyenātmanā bhaviṣyatīti sarvathā nāsti bhavanmatā bhavasaṃtatiḥ gang zhig dus gsum dag tu yod pa ma yin pa de bdag nyid gzhan gyis yod par ga la 'gyur /
de'i phyir rnam pa thams cad du srid pa'i rgyun yod pa ma yin no /
tataśca yaduktam /
udayavyayasaṃtānaḥ phalahetvorbhavaḥ sa hi /
iti, tanna yuktam 		de'i phyir /
'bras bu rgyu yi 'byung 'jig gi /
rgyu de srid pa yin phyir ro /
tataśca bhāvābhyupagame sati sa eva śāśvatocchedavādaprasaṅgo durnivāro bhavatām, ityato nāstyeva bhāvānāṃ svabhāvata utpattiriti siddham /
yathoktamāryasamādhirājabhaṭṭārake /
tathā /
bījasya sato yathāṅkuro na ca yo bīju sa caiva aṅkuro /
na ca anyu tato na caiva tadevamanuccheda aśāśvata dharmatā /
mudrātpratimudra dṛśyate mudrasaṃkrānti na copalabhyate /
na ca tatra na caiva sānyato evaṃ saṃskāra anucchedaśāśvatāḥ /
ata evoktamāryanāgārjunapādaiḥ /
svādhyāyadīpamudrādarpaṇaghoṣārkakāntabījāmraiḥ /
skandhapratisaṃdhirasaṃkramaśca vidvadbhiravadhāryau /
iti /
tathā bhagavān /
jāyate cyavate cāpi na ca jātirna ca cyutiḥ /
yasya vijānata eṣa samādhirnāsya durlabhaḥ /
iti /
tathā /
sūsukhitā sada te nara loke yehi acintiya jñātibhi dharmāḥ /
na ca dharma adharma vikalpo cittapapañca vibhāvita sarvi 		zhes gang smras pa de ni mi rigs pa smras pa yin no /
de'i phyir dngos po yod par khas len na rtag pa dang chad par lta bar thal ba de nyid bzlog par dka' ba yin no /
de'i phyir dngos po rnams skye ba med do zhes bya bar grub po /
bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang /
srid gsum rmi lam dang 'dra snying po med /
myur du 'jig cing mi rtag sgyu ma bzhin /
'ong ba med cing 'di nas 'gro ba'ang med /
rgyun rnams rtag tu stong zhing mtshan ma med /
ces bya ba dang de bzhin du /
skye ba dang ni 'chi 'gyur yang /
skye ba med cing 'chi med par /
gang gis shes par gyur ba yin /
ting 'dzin 'di ni rnyed mi dka' /
zhes gsungs pa dang de bzhin du /
gang dag bsam yas chos rnams 'di shes pa /
mi rnams de dag rtag tu bde ba yin /
chos dang chos min rnam rtog med pa ste /
thams cad sems kyi spros pas phye ba yin /
bhāva abhāva vibhāvayi jñānaṃ sarvamacintayi sarvamabhūtam thams cad bsam yas thams cad 'byung min pas /
dngos dang dngos med shes pa rnam par bshig /
ye puna cittavaśānuga bālāste dukhitā bhavakoṭiśateṣu byis pa gang dag sems kyi dbang song ba /
de dag srid pa bye ba brgyar sdug bsngal /
yo 'pi ca cintayi śūnyakadharmān so 'pi kumārgapapannaku bālaḥ zhes gsungs so /
slob dpon zla ba grags pa'i zhal snga nas sbyar ba'i tshig gsal ba las /
akṣara kīrtita śūnyaka dharmāste ca anakṣara akṣara uktāḥ 'byung ba dang 'jig pa brtag pa zhes bya ba rab tu byed pa nyi shu rtsa gcig pa'i 'grel pa'o /
'dir smras pa /
śānta paśānta ya cintayi dharmān so 'pi ca cittu na jātu na bhūtaḥ srid pa'i rgyun ni yod pa nyid de /
de bzhin gshegs pa yod pa'i phyir ro /
cittavitarkaṇa sarvi papañcāḥ sūkṣma acintiya budhyatha dharmān 'di na bcom ldan 'das bskal pa grangs med pa gsum mam bdun du bar chad med pa'i tshul gyis brtson pa /
iti /
ityācāryacandrakīrtipādoparacitāyāṃ prasannapadāyāṃ madhyamakavṛttau saṃbhavavibhavaparīkṣā nāma ekaviṃśatitamaṃ prakaraṇam 		bsod nams bya ba rtsom pa phul du dbyung du med pa /
'gro ba la phan pa 'byung ba'i bya ba gcig pu'i mtshan nyid can rnam pa sna tshogs pa de dang de dag gis 'gro ba /
tathāgataparīkṣā dvāviṃśatitamaṃ prakaraṇam /
atrāha 		bu gcig pa phangs pa bas kyang ches lhag pa ma lus pa rjes su 'dzin pa lhur mdzad pa /
vidyata eva bhavasaṃtatiḥ, tathāgatasadbhāvāt thugs rje chen po'i gzhan gyi dbang du gyur pa /
iha hi bhagavatā mahākaruṇopāyaprajñādvayadhāriṇā sakalatraidhātukāśeṣasattvajātyādiduḥkhavyupaśamaikamanasā tribhiḥ kalpāsaṃkhyeyaiḥ saptabhirvā nairantaryakrameṇodyacchatā taistairniratiśayairativicitraiḥ puṇyakriyāprārambhaiḥ sakalajagaddhitodayaikakriyālakṣaṇaiḥ priyaikaputrādapyadhikataraniravaśeṣajagadanugrahatatpareṇa mahākaruṇāparavaśena tatratatropapattyāyatane kṣitisalilajvalanapavanasādhāraṇabhaiṣajyamahāmahīruhavajjanānāṃ svecchāta upabhogyatāmātmānamupagamayatā mahākālena sārvajñaṃ sarvākāraparicchedi padamadhigatam /
sa evamadhigatasarvajñajñāno bhagavān yathā dharmāṇāṃ tattvaṃ vyavasthitaṃ tathaiva aśeṣato gatatvād buddhatvāt tathāgata ityucyate /
yadi bhavasaṃtatirna syāt, tadā tathāgato 'pi na syāt /
na hi ekena janmanā śakyaṃ tathāgatatvamanuprāptum /
tasmādvidyata eva bhavasaṃtatiḥ, tathāgatasadbhāvāditi /
ucyate /
bhavadīyameva hi idamatimahadajñānaṃ bhavasaṃtānasya avicchedavartitāṃ ca atidīrghakālaṃ ca gamayati, yasya nāma bhavataḥ atimahadajñānadhanāndhakārameva vicitrairupapattiśaraccandrajñānālokairvidhvasyamānamapi aticiratarakālābhyāsavāsanāvistarābhivṛddhamadyāpi na vidhvasyate na nivartate /
yadi hi tathāgato nāma kaścit syāt svabhāvataḥ, tadā tasya mahatā kālenābhiniṣpatterbhavasaṃtatiḥ syāt 		'khrungs pa'i gnas de dang der sa dang chu dang me dang rlung dang sman gyi ljon shing thun mong ba ltar bdag nyid kyang 'gro ba rnams kyi rang gi 'dod pas longs spyad par bya bar gyur par mdzad pas dus ring mo zhig gis thams cad mkhyen pa'i go 'phang brnyes pa yin la /
thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes brnyes pa bcom ldan 'das de nyid chos rnams kyi de kho na nyid ji ltar gnas pa de ltar ma lus par mkhyen zhing thugs su chud pa nyid kyis na de bzhin gshegs pa zhes brjod do /
de'i phyir gal te srid pa'i rgyun med na ni /
de'i tshe de bzhin gshegs pa yang yod par mi 'gyur te /
skye ba gcig gis ni de bzhin gshegs pa nyid brnyes par mi dpyod do /
de'i phyir srid pa'i rgyun yod pa nyid de /
de bzhin gshegs pa yod pa'i phyir ro zhes smra'o /
brjod par bya ste /
gang gi mi shes pa shin tu chen po 'thas pa'i snang ba rnam pa sna tshogs pa de lta bu dag gis bzlog tu zin kyang shin tu yun ring por goms pas da rung yang mi zlog cing mi 'jig pa /
khyod kyis mi shes pa shin tu chen po 'di nyid srid pa'i rgyun rnam par chad pa med par 'jug pa dang ches ring bar go bar byed pa yin no /
gal te 'dir de bzhin gshegs pa zhes bya ba 'ga' zhig rang bzhin gyis yod na ni /
de'i tshe dus ring pos mngon par grub pa'i phyir srid pa'i rgyun yod par 'gyur na /
na ca tathāgato nāma kaścid bhāvasvabhāvata upalabhyate /
kevalaṃ tu bhavānavidyātimiropahatamatinayanatayā dvicandrakeśamaśakādivanmithyā tathāgataṃ nāma svabhāvata upalabhate 		de bzhin gshegs pa zhes bya ba 'ga' zhig dngos po'i rang bzhin du dmigs pa yang ma yin te /
khyod kyi ma rig pa'i rab rib chen pos blo gros kyi mig nyams pa nyid kyis zla ba gnyis la sogs pa ltar log par de bzhin gshegs pa zhes bya bar dmigs pa 'ba' zhig tu zad do /
gang gi tshe de ltar de bzhin gshegs pa nyid rang bzhin gyis yod pa ma yin pa de'i tshe de'i srid pa'i rgyun yod par ga la 'gyur /
yathā ca tathāgato nāsti svabhāvataḥ, tathā pratipādayannāha ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pa rang bzhin gyis med pa de ltar bstan pa'i phyir /
skandhā na nānyaḥ skandhebhyo nāsmin skandhā na teṣu saḥ phung min phung po las gzhan min /
de la phung med der de med /
tathāgataḥ skandhavānna katamo 'tra tathāgataḥ /
yadi hi tathāgato nāma kaścit padārtho 'malo niṣprapañcaḥ syāt, sa skandhasvabhāvo vā bhavet, rūpavedanāsaṃjñāsaṃskāravijñānākhyaskandhapañcakasvabhāvo vā bhavet /
yadi vā śīlasamādhiprajñāvimuktivimuktijñānadarśanākhyapañcaskandhasvabhāvaḥ, tadvayatirikto vā bhavet 		de bzhin gshegs pa phung ldan min /
de bzhin gshegs pa gang zhig yin /
zhes bya ba gsungs te /
gal te de bzhin gshegs pa zhes bya ba dngos po 'ga' zhig yod na ni /
de phung po'i rang bzhin te /
gzugs dang tshor ba dang 'du shes dang 'du byed dang rnam par shes pa zhes bya ba phung po lnga'i rang bzhin nam /
tshul khrims dang ting nge 'dzin dang shes rab dang rnam par grol ba dang rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba zhes bya ba'i phung po lnga'i rang bzhin nam /
pūrvakā eva pañca skandhāḥ sattvaprajñaptinimittatvādiha vicāre parigṛhyante nottare, avyāpakatvādeṣāṃ pūrvakairantarbhāvita tvāditi de gnyis las tha dad par 'gyur ba zhig na; snga ma'i phung po lnga po nyid /
sems can du gdags pa'i rgyu yin pas rnam par dpyad pa 'dir bzung gi /
phyi ma dag ni ma yin te /
yadi vā pañcaskandhavyatirikto bhavet, tatra tathāgate vā skandhāḥ syuḥ, skandheṣu vā sa bhavet, tathāgato vā skandhavān bhavet dhanavāniva devadattaḥ? sarvathā ca vicāryamāṇo na saṃbhavati 'di dag khyab par byed pa ma yin pa'i phyir dang snga ma'i khongs su 'dus pa'i phyir ro /
gal te phung po lnga las tha dad pa yin na ni /
de bzhin gshegs pa de la phung po yod pa'am /
phung po de dag la de yod pa'am /
lha sbyin nor dang ldan pa ltar de bzhin gshegs pa de phung po dang ldan par 'gyur grang na /
rnam pa thams cad du dpyad pa na yod pa ma yin no /
kathaṃ kṛtvā? tatra tāvat skandhā eva na tathāgataḥ /
kiṃ kāraṇam? uktaṃ hi 		ji ltar zhe na /
de la re zhig phung po nyid ni de bzhin gshegs pa ma yin te /
ci'i phyir zhe na /
yadindhanaṃ sa cedagnirekatvaṃ kartṛkarmaṇoḥ bud shing gang de me yin na /
byed pa po dang las gcig 'gyur /
bhavediti, tadihāpi yojyam, zhes bshad pa dang nyer len gang de sangs rgyas na /
sa buddho yo hyupādānamekatvaṃ kartṛkarmaṇoḥ /
bhavediti 		byed pa po dang las gcig 'gyur /
zhes bya ba 'dir yang sbyar bar bya la /
tathā /
ātmā skandhā yadi bhavedudayavyayabhāgbhavet 		de bzhin du /
gal te phung po bdag yin na /
skye dang 'jig pa can du 'gyur /
ityuktam, tadihāpi yojyam, zhes bshad pa dang gal te phung po sangs rgyas na /
buddhaḥ skandhā yadi bhavedudayavyayabhāgbhavet /
iti 		skye dang 'jig pa can du 'gyur /
zhes 'dir yang sbyar bar bya'o /
evaṃ tāvat skandhā na tathāgataḥ de ltar na re zhig phung po de bzhin gshegs pa ma yin no /
idānīṃ nānyaḥ skandhebhyastathāgata iti /
kiṃ kāraṇam? uktaṃ hi 		da ni de bzhin gshegs pa la phung po dag las gzhan pa yang ma yin te /
ci'i phyir zhe na /
anyaścedindhanādagnirindhanādaṣyṛte bhavet gal te shing las me gzhan na /
shing med par yang 'byung bar 'gyur /
tathā /
paratra nirapekṣatvādapradīpanahetukaḥ 		zhes bya ba dang de bzhin du /
gzhan la ltos pa med pa'i phyir /
'bar bar byed rgyu las mi 'byung /
punarārambhavaiyarthyamevaṃ cākarmakaḥ sati rtsom pa don med nyid du 'gyur /
de lta yin na las kyang med /
iti, /
tathā ihāpi yojyam, /
buddho 'nyaścedupādānādupādānaṃ vinā bhavet 		ces bshad pa de bzhin du /
'dir yang /
gal te nyer len sangs rgyas gzhan /
nyer len med par 'byung bar 'gyur /
tathā /
paratra nirapekṣatvādanupādānahetukaḥ 		zhes bya ba dang de bzhin du /
gzhan la ltos pa med pa'i phyir /
nye bar len rgyu las mi 'byung /
punarārambhavaiyarthyamevaṃ cākarmakaḥ sati rtsom pa don med nyid du 'gyur /
de lta yin na las kyang med /
ces bya bar sbyar bar bya'o /
tathā /
skandhebhyo 'nyo yadi bhavedbhavedaskandhalakṣaṇaḥ 		de bzhin du /
gal te phung po rnams las gzhan /
phung po'i mtshan nyid med par 'gyur /
iti /
anyatvābhāvācca skandhādīnāṃ tathāgatasya ca, tathāgate skandhā nopapadyante 		zhes bya bar yang sbyar bar bya'o /
phung po la sogs pa dag dang de bzhin gshegs pa la gzhan nyid med pa'i phyir na /
de bzhin gshegs pa la phung po dag yod pa mi 'thad cing /
nāpi skandheṣu tathāgata iti upapadyate /
uktaṃ caitanmadhyamakāvatāre pakṣadvayavyākhyānam 		phung po dag la de bzhin gshegs pa yod pa zhes bya ba yang 'thad pa ma yin no /
phyogs gnyis kyi rnam par bshad pa 'di ni /
skandheṣvātmā vidyate naiva cāmī santi skandhā ātmanītīha yasmāt /
satyanyatve syādiyaṃ kalpanā vai taccānyatvaṃ nāstyataḥ kalpanaiṣā /
skandhavānapi tathāgato yathā na bhavati, tathā tatraivoktam 		'dir bdag phung po la med phung 'di dag /
bdag la yod pa ma yin gang gi phyir /
gzhan nyid yod na rtog pa 'dir 'gyur na /
gzhan nyid de med de phyir 'di rtog go /
zhes dbu ma la 'jug pa las bshad pa yin no /
de bzhin gshegs pa phung po dang ldan pa yang ji ltar ma yin pa de ltar ni /
iṣṭo nātmā rūpavānnāsti yasmādātmā vattvārthopayogo hi nātaḥ bdag 'dod gzugs ldan ma yin gang gi phyir /
bdag med de phyir ldan don dang 'brel min /
bhede gomān rūpavānaṣyabhede tattvānyatve 'rūpato nātmanaḥ staḥ /
tattvānyatvapakṣe eva tu pañcāpi pakṣā antargatā vastutaḥ /
satkāyadṛṣṭipravṛttyapekṣayā tu pañca pakṣāḥ samupavarṇyante ācāryeṇeti vijñeyam 		tha dad phyugs ldan tha mi dad gzugs ldan /
de nyid gzhan du bdag med dngos med phyir /
zhes de nyid du bshad zin to /
dngos sun phyogs lnga po de dag de nyid dang gzhan nyid kyi phyogs nyid kyi nang du 'dus mod kyi /
'jig tshogs la lta ba'i 'jug pa la ltos nas phyogs lnga po slob dpon gyis gsungs so zhes shes par bya'o /
yaścaivaṃ skandheṣu pañcadhā vicāryamāṇo nāsti tathāgataḥ, sa kenānyena ātmanā bhaviṣyatīti, sarvathā na saṃbhavatyeva tathāgata iti bhāvasvabhāvādapaśyanta ācāryapādāḥ prāhuḥ de bzhin gshegs pa gang zhig de ltar phung po dag la rnam pa lngas dpyad pa na yod pa ma yin pa de bdag nyid gang gis yod par 'gyur te /
de'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa rnam pa thams cad du yod pa ma yin par gzigs shing /
slob dpon gyis /
katamo 'tra tathāgata iti de bzhin gshegs pa gang zhig yin /
nāstyeva sa kaścit sakalatrailokyavastuvipaścidbhāvasvabhāva ityabhiprāyaḥ /
tathāgatābhāvācca bhavasaṃtatirapi dravyasaṃtatirnāstīti siddham /
atraike vadanti /
naiva hi skandhāstathāgata iti brūmaḥ, yathoktadoṣaprasaṅgāt 		zhes gsungs te /
de ni 'ga' yang med do zhes bya bar dgongs so /
de bzhin gshegs pa med pa'i phyir na srid pa'i rgyun yang med do zhes bya bar grub po /
'dir kha cig na re /
ji skad bshad pa'i nyes par thal bar 'gyur bas de phung po de bzhin gshegs pa yin no zhes kyang mi smra la /
nāpi skandhavyatiriktaḥ phung po las tha dad par yang ma yin zhing /
nāpi tathāgate anāsravān skandhān varṇayāmaḥ, himavati parvate iva tarukhaṇḍam ri gangs can la shing gi tshogs ltar de bzhin gshegs pa la phung po dag yod par yang mi smra la /
nāpi skandheṣu, tarukhaṇḍe eva siṃham /
nāpi skandhavantaṃ varṇayāmaḥ, lakṣaṇavantamiva cakravartinam, ekatvānyatvānabhyupagamādeva 		nags khrod na seng ge ltar phung po dag la de bzhin gshegs pa yod pa yang ma yin zhing /
'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po mtshan dang ldan pa ltar /
de bzhin gshegs pa phung po dang ldan par yang mi smra ste /
gcig nyid dang gzhan nyid khas blangs pa nyid kyi phyir ro /
kiṃ tarhi skandhānamalānupādāya tattvānyatvādyavācyaṃ tathāgataṃ vyavasthāpayāmaḥ 'o na ci zhe na /
phung po la brten nas de bzhin gshegs pa de nyid dang gzhan nyid du brjod du med pa zhig rnam par 'jog pa yin te /
tasmānnāyaṃ vidhirasmākaṃ bādhaka iti de'i phyir tshul 'di ni kho bo cag la gnod par byed pa ma yin no zhes smra'i /
atrocyate /
buddhaḥ skandhānupādāya yadi nāsti svabhāvataḥ 		'di la brjod par bya ste /
gal te sangs rgyas phung po la /
brten nas rang bzhin las yod min /
svabhāvataśca yo nāsti kutaḥ sa parabhāvataḥ rang bzhin las ni gang med pa /
de gzhan dngos las ga la yod /
yadi hi buddho bhagavānamalān skandhānupādāya tattvānyatvenāvaktavyaḥ prajñapyate, na tarhi svabhāvataḥ so 'stīti vyaktamāpadyate, pratibimbavadupādāya prajñapyamānatvāt gal te sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de nyid dang gzhan nyid du brjod pa med pa zhig phung po la brten nas 'dogs na /
'o na ni phung po la brten nas brtags pa'i gzugs brnyan ltar rang bzhin gyis yod pa ma yin pa zhes bya bar 'gyur ro /
yaśca idānīṃ svabhāvato nāsti ātmīyena svarūpeṇa, sa kathamavidyamānaḥ svabhāvataḥ skandhānupādāya parabhāvato bhaviṣyatīti? na hi avidyamāno vandhyātanayaḥ parabhāvamapekṣya bhavatīti yujyate gang zhig de ltar rang bzhin las te rang gi ngo bos med cing /
rang bzhin las yod pa ma yin pa de ji ltar phung po la brten nas gzhan gyi dngos po las yod par 'gyur /
yod pa ma yin pa'i rang gi ngo bo can gyi mo gsham gyi bu ni /
gzhan gyi dngos po la ltos nas yod par mi rigs so /
atha syāt /
yathaiva hi pratibimbakaṃ svabhāvato 'saṃvidyamānamapi parabhāvaṃ mukhādarśādikamapekṣya bhavati, evaṃ ca tathāgato 'pi svabhāvato 'saṃvidyamānaḥ anāsravān pañca skandhānupādāya parabhāvato bhaviṣyatīti, evamapi 		ci ste ji ltar gzugs brnyan rang bzhin las yod pa ma yin yang /
bzhin dang me long la sogs pa gzhan gyi dngos po la ltos nas yod par 'gyur ba de bzhin du /
de bzhin gshegs pa rang bzhin las yod pa ma yin yang phung po la brten nas gzhan gyi dngos po las yod par 'gyur ro snyam na /
pratītya parabhāvaṃ yaḥ so 'nātmetyupapadyate de lta na yang /
gang zhig gzhan gyi dngos brten nas /
de bdag nyid du mi 'thad do /
yaścānātmā sa ca kathaṃ bhaviṣyati tathāgataḥ gang zhig bdag nyid med pa de /
ji ltar de bzhin gshegs par 'gyur /
yadi pratibimbavat parabhāvaṃ pratītya tathāgataḥ iṣyate, evaṃ sati pratibimbavadeva sa tathāgato 'nātmetyupapadyate gal te gzugs brnyan ltar gzhan gyi dngos po la brten nas de bzhin gshegs par 'dod na ni /
de lta na de bzhin gshegs pa de gzugs brnyan ltar bdag nyid ces bya bar mi 'thad cing /
na tu svabhāvata iti yujyate /
ātmaśabdo 'yaṃ svabhāvaśabdaparyāyaḥ 		rang bzhin zhes bya bar mi rigs te /
bdag nyid kyi sgra 'di ni rang bzhin gyi rnam grangs yin no /
yaśca anātmā niḥsvabhāvaḥ pratibimbavadeva, sa kathaṃ tathāgataḥ svabhāvarūpato bhaviṣyati? aviparītamārgagato na bhaviṣyatītyabhiprāyaḥ gang zhig gzugs brnyan ltar bdag nyid med cing rang bzhin med pa de ji ltar de bzhin gshegs par 'gyur te /
phyin ci ma log pa'i lam nas gshegs par ji ltar 'gyur zhes bya bar dgongs pa'o /
kiṃ cānyat /
iha yadi tathāgatasya kaścit svabhāvaḥ syāt, tadā tatsvabhāvāpekṣayā skandhasvabhāvaḥ parabhāva iti syāt, taṃ ca parabhāvaṃ pratītya tathāgataḥ syāt 		gzhan yang /
gal te 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa la rang bzhin 'ga' zhig yod na ni /
de'i tshe de'i rang bzhin la ltos nas phung po'i rang bzhin gzhan gyi dngos por 'gyur la /
gzhan gyi dngos po de la brten nas de bzhin gshegs par 'gyur ba zhig na /
yadā tu tathāgatasya svabhāva eva nāsti, tadā kutaḥ skandhānāṃ paratvaṃ syāditi pratipādayannāha /
yadi nāsti svabhāvaśca parabhāvaḥ kathaṃ bhavet 		gang gi tshe de bzhin gshegs pa la rang bzhin nyid yod pa ma yin pa de'i tshe phung po rnams gzhan nyid du ga la 'gyur zhes bstan pa'i phyir gsungs pa /
gal te rang bzhin yod min na /
gzhan dngos yod par ji ltar 'gyur /
yadā caivaṃ svabhāvaparabhāvau na staḥ, tadā gang gi tshe de ltar rang bzhin dang gzhan gyi dngos po dag med pa de'i tshe /
svabhāvaparabhāvābhyāmṛte kaḥ sa tathāgataḥ rang bzhin dang ni gzhan dngos dag /
ma gtogs de bzhin gshegs de gang /
padārtho hi bhavan svabhāvo bhavet, parabhāvo vā dngos po yin na rang bzhin gzhan gyi dngos por 'gyur gyi /
tābhyāṃ tu vinā ko 'sau aparaḥ padārtho 'sti, yastathāgata iti vyavasthāpyate? tasmānnāsti svabhāvatastathāgata iti gang zhig de bzhin gshegs pa zhes bya bar rnam par gzhag pa de gnyis las ma gtogs pa'i dngos po gzhan de gang zhig yod /
de'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa rang bzhin gyis med do /
kiṃ cānyat gzhan yang /
skandhān yadyanupādāya bhavetkaścittathāgataḥ gal te phung po ma brten par /
de bzhin gshegs pa 'ga' yod na /
sa idānīṃmupādadyādupādāya tato bhavet de ni da gdod brten 'gyur zhing /
brten nas de las 'gyur la rag /
yadi manyase /
skandhebhyastattvānyatvena avaktavyastathāgataḥ skandhānupādāya prajñapyate iti, tat kadā yujyate? yadi skandhānanupādāya agṛhītvā pūrvaṃ kaścittathāgato nāma bhavet, sa skandhānupādadyāt 		gal te de bzhin gshegs pa phung po dag las de nyid dang gzhan nyid du brjod du med pa zhig phung po dag la brten nas 'dogs so snyam du sems na ni /
de la gal te phung po rnams la ma brten par te ma bzung bar sngar de bzhin gshegs pa zhes bya ba 'ga' zhig yod cing phung po la brten nas gyur pa de'i tshe rigs te /
vyatirikta eva hi pūrvasiddho dhanād devadatto dhanasyopādānaṃ kurute, tadvadetān skandhānanupādāya yadi kaścit tathāgataḥ syāt, sa idānīṃ skandhānupādadyāt, tataśca tān skandhānupādāya tato bhavet 'di ltar sngar nor las tha dad par grub pa'i lha sbyin ni nor len par byed pa yin no /
de bzhin du gal te phung po la ma brten par de bzhin gshegs pa 'ga' zhig yod na ni /
de da gzod phung po dag la brten par 'gyur zhing /
phung po de dag la brten nas 'gyur la rag na /
vicāryamāṇastu sarvathā /
skandhāṃścāpyanupādāya nāsti kaścittathāgataḥ 		rnam pa thams cad du dpyad pa na /
phung po rnams la ma brten par /
de bzhin gshegs pa 'ga' yang med de rgyu med pa nyid du thal bar 'gyur ba'i phyir ro /
nirhetukatvaprasaṅgāt gang zhig ma brten yod min na /
yaśca nāstyanupādāya sa upādāsyate katham /
avidyamānatvādityabhiprāyaḥ 		de ni ji ltar nyer len 'gyur /
yod pa ma yin pa'i phyir ro snyam du dgongs pa yin no /
yadā caivaṃ na kiṃcidapyupādatte, tadā skandhānupādāya tathāgato nāma bhaviṣyatīti nopapadyate /
yadā caivaṃ tathāgataḥ upādānātpūrvamavidyamānatvāt na kiṃcidupādatte, tadā tadupādānasyāpi kenacidapi anupādīyamānasya upādānatvaṃ na saṃbhavatyeveti pratipādayannāha 		gang gi tshe de ltar phung po cung zad kyang mi len pa de'i tshe /
phung po la brten nas de bzhin gshegs par 'gyur ro zhes bya bar mi 'thad do /
gang gi tshe de bzhin gshegs pa de nye bar len pa'i snga rol du med pas cung zad kyang mi len pa de'i tshe sus kyang nye bar ma blangs pas de'i nye bar len pa yang nye bar len pa nyid du 'gyur ba ma yin no zhes bstan pa'i phyir /
na bhavatyanupādattamupādānaṃ ca kiṃcana nye bar blangs pa ma yin par /
nye bar len par cis mi 'gyur /
yadā caivamupādānaṃ kenacidapyanupādīyamānatvādupādānaṃ na bhavatīti, tadā upādānābhāvādupādātāpi kaścinnāstīti pratipādayannāha zhes bya ba gsungs so /
gang gi tshe de ltar sus kyang ma blangs ba'i phyir nye bar len pa nye bar len par mi 'gyur ba de'i tshe nye bar len pa med pas nye bar len pa po 'ga' yang yod pa ma yin no zhes bstan pa'i phyir /
na cāsti nirupādānaḥ kathaṃcana tathāgataḥ nye bar len pa med pa yi /
de bzhin gshegs pa ci yang med /
iti /
tadevaṃ yathopapāditanyāyena /
tattvānyatvena yo nāsti mṛgyamāṇaśca pañcadhā 		ces bya ba gsungs so /
de'i phyir de ltar /
ji skad bshad pa'i tshul gyis /
rnam pa lngas ni btsal byas nas /
gang zhig de nyid gzhan nyid du /
upādānena sa kathaṃ prajñapyeta tathāgataḥ /
yo hi tathāgato vicāryamāṇo mṛgyamāṇaḥ tattvenaskandhebhya ekatvena nāsti, anyatvena skandhebhyaḥ pṛthaktvena ca yo nāsti, evaṃ tattvānyatvāsatvādādhārādheyatadvatpakṣapañcaprakārairmṛgyamāṇo yo nāsti, sa kathamatyanto 'saṃvidyamānastathāgataḥ upādānena śakyaḥ prajñapayitum? ityato 'pi nāsti tathāgato nāma svabhāvataḥ 		med pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa de /
nye bar len par ji ltar gdags /
de bzhin gshegs pa gang zhig dpyad cing btsal bar byas pa na /
gang zhig phung po dag las de nyid de gcig tu med cing /
phung po dag las gzhan nyid du ste tha dad pa nyid du med la /
gang zhig de nyid dang gzhan nyid du med pas rten dang brten pa dang de dang ldan pa'i phyogs rnam pa lngas btsal ba na med cing gtan yod pa ma yin pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa de nye bar len pas ji ltar gdags par nus /
de'i phyir yang de bzhin gshegs pa rang bzhin gyis med do /
na kevalamanena vicāreṇa tathāgata eva nāsti, rnam par dpyad pa 'dis de bzhin gshegs pa kho na med pa 'ba' zhig tu ma zad kyi /
'on kyang /
yadapīdamupādānaṃ tatsvabhāvatvānna vidyate gang zhig nye bar blangs pa de /
de ni rang bzhin las yod min /
yadapi idamupādānaṃ rūpavedanāsaṃjñāsaṃskāravijñānākhyaṃ skandhapañcakam, tadapi svabhāvena na vidyate, pratītyasamutpannatvāt, skandhaparīkṣāyāṃ ca vistareṇa pratiṣiddhatvāt /
athāpi syāt 		gang zhig nye bar blangs pa gzugs dang tshor ba dang 'du shes dang 'du byed dang rnam par shes pa zhes bya ba phung po lnga po de yang rang bzhin gyis yod pa ma yin te /
rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'i phyir dang phung po brtag par rgyas par bgag pa'i phyir ro /
yadyapi svabhāvataḥ upādānaṃ nāsti, tathāpi hetupratyayātmakāt parabhāvā dbhaviṣyatīti, tadāpi nopapadyate iti pratipādayannāha ci ste yang nye bar blang ba'i rang bzhin las yod pa ma yin pa de lta na yang /
rgyu dang rkyen gyi bdag nyid can gzhan gyi dngos po las yod par 'gyur ro snyam na /
de yang mi 'thad do zhes bstan pa'i phyir /
svabhāvataśca yannāsti kutastatparabhāvataḥ bdag gi dngos las gang med pa /
de gzhan dngos las yod re skan /
na hi bandhyāsūnuḥ svabhāvato 'saṃvidyamānaḥ śakyaḥ parabhāvena prajñapayitumiti /
ataḥ upādānamapi nāsti 		zhes gsungs te /
mo gsham gyi bu bdag gi dngos po las yod pa ma yin pa de ni gzhan gyi dngos pos gdags par nus pa ma yin no /
de'i phyir nye bar blangs pa yang med do /
athavā /
yadapīdamupādānaṃ tatsvabhāvānna vidyate 		rnam pa gcig tu na /
gang zhig nye bar blangs pa de /
de ni rang bzhin las yod min te /
upādātṛsāpekṣatvādupādātṛnirapekṣasya ca upādānatvābhāvānnāsti svabhāvasiddhamupādānam nye bar len pa po la ltos pa'i phyir dang nye bar len pa po la ma ltos pa la nye bar blang ba nyid med pa'i phyir rang gi ngo bos grub pa'i nye bar blang ba yod pa ma yin no /
atha yadyapi upādātṛnirapekṣamupādānaṃ svabhāvasiddhaṃ na saṃbhavati, evaṃ tadupādātrapekṣameva bhavatviti ci ste gal te nye bar blang ba nye bar len pa po la ma ltos pa'i rang bzhin gyis grub pa yod pa ma yin na /
'o na ni de lta na nye bar len pa po la ltos pa dang bcas pa nyid du 'gyur ro zhe na /
ucyate /
evamapi 		de lta na yang /
svabhāvataśca yannāsti kutastatparabhāvataḥ bdag gi dngos las gang med pa /
de gzhan dngos las yod re skan /
svabhāvato yadupādānaṃ na siddham, tadavidyamānasvabhāvaṃ kathamupādātuḥ parabhāvato bhaviṣyatīti /
tasmādupādānamapi nāstīti /
idānīṃ yathāprasādhitamevārthamupadarśayannāha 		nye bar blang ba gang zhig bdag gi dngos po las ma grub cing yod pa ma yin pa'i rang bzhin de nye bar len pa po gzhan gyi dngos po las yod par ji ltar 'gyur /
de'i phyir nye bar blang ba yang med do zhes bya ba'o /
da ni ji ltar rab tu bsgrubs pa'i don nyid nye bar bstan pa'i phyir /
evaṃ śūnyamupādānamupādātā ca sarvaśaḥ de ltar nyer blangs nyer len po /
rnam pa kun gyis stong pa yin /
zhes gsungs te /
sarveṇa prakāreṇa vicāryamāṇaṃ śūnyamupādānaṃ niḥsvabhāvam, upādātā ca śūnyaḥ svabhāvarahitaḥ rnam pa thams cad kyis dpyad pa na /
nye bar blangs pa stong pa ste rang bzhin med cing nye bar len pa po stong zhing rang bzhin dang bral ba yin no /
tenedānīmupādānena da ni nye bar blangs pa de /
prajñapyate ca śūnyena kathaṃ śūnyastathāgataḥ stong pas de bzhin gshegs stong pa /
ji lta bur na 'thad par 'gyur /
naiva tatsaṃbhavati yadavidyamānena avidyamānasya tathāgatasya prajñaptiḥ syāditi yod pa ma yin pa'i nye bar blangs pas yod pa ma yin pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa 'dogs so zhes bya ba gang yin pa de ni srid pa ma yin no /
tasmāt skandhānupādāya tathāgataḥ prajñapyate iti nopapadyate de'i phyir phung po dag la brten nas de bzhin gshegs pa 'dogs so zhes bya ba ni 'thad pa ma yin no /
atrāhuḥ /
aho vata hatā pratyāśā asmākam, ye hi nāma vayaṃ svavikalpavikalpitātikaṭhinakudarśanamālutālatājālāvabaddheṣu nirvāṇapuragāmyaviparītamārgagamanaparibhraṣṭeṣu anatikrāntasaṃsārāṭavīkāntāradurgeṣu kaṇabhakṣākṣapādadigambarajaimininaiyāyikaprabhṛtiṣu tīrthakareṣu aviparītasvargāpavargamārgopadeśābhimāniṣu spṛhāṃ parityajya niravaśeṣānyatīrthyamatāndhakāropaghātakaṃ svargāpavargānugāmyaviparītamārgasaṃprakāśakaṃ saddharmadeśanātipaṭutarakiraṇavyāptāśeṣāśāmukhaṃ vividhavineyajanamatikamalakuṅmalavibodhanatatparaṃ yathāvadavasthitapadārthatattvārthabhājanānāmamalaikacakṣurbhūtaṃ sakalajagaccharaṇyabhūtamadvitīyaṃ daśabalavaiśāradyāveṇikabuddhadharmāmalamaṇḍalaṃ mahāyānamahānayasārathivaraṃ saptabodhyaṅgottuṅgaturaṃgapadātiyojitaṃ sakalatribhuvanajanajātijarāmaraṇasaṃsārakāntārasariducchoṣaṇatatparaṃ caturasamamārārātisamaraśarasaṃpātavijayinaṃ sakalajagadasadgrāharāhugrahavigrahodgrahanirāsinaṃ tathāgatasavitāramajñānadhanagahanāndhakāranirākaraṇāya mokṣārthino 'tuttarasamyaksaṃbodhyarthinaḥ śaraṇaṃ pratipannāḥ, tasya ca tvayā /
evaṃ śūnyamupādānamupādātā ca sarvaśaḥ /
prajñapyate ca śūnyena kathaṃ śūnyastathāgataḥ /
ityādinā svabhāvato 'sattvaṃ vruvatā bhavatā hatā asmākaṃ mokṣapratyāśā anuttarasamyaksaṃbodhyāgamābhilāṣaḥ iti /
tadalaṃ bhavatā tathāgatamahādityapracchādakena ākālikadhanadhanāvalīvisaraṇena jagadandhakāropameneti /
ucyate /
asmākameva hatā pratyāśā bhavadvidheṣvabudhajaneṣu ye hi nāma bhavantaḥ mokṣakāmatayā anyatīrthyamatāni parityajya bhagavantaṃ tathāgatamapi aviparītaṃ paramaśāstāraṃ pratipadya paramagambhīramanuttaraṃ sarvatīrthyavādāsādhāraṇaṃ nairātmyasiṃhanādamasahamānāḥ kuraṅgamā iva svādhimuktidaridratayā vividhakudṛṣṭivyālamālākulaṃ viparyastajanānuyātaṃ tameva mahāghorasaṃsārāṭavīkāntāracārakānugamārgamavagāhante /
na hi tathāgatāḥ kadācidapyātmanaḥ skandhānāṃ vā astitvaṃ prajñapayanti /
yathoktaṃ bhagavatyām /
buddho 'pyāyuṣman subhūte māyopamaḥ svapnopamaḥ /
buddhadharmā apyāyuṣman subhūte māyopamāḥ svapnopamāḥ /
iti /
tathā /
dharma svabhāvatu śūnya vivikto bodhi svabhāvatu śūnya viviktā /
yo hi caretsa pi śūnyasvabhāvo jñānavato na tu bālajanasya /
iti /
na ca vayaṃ sarvathaiva niṣprapañcānāṃ tathāgatānāṃ nāstitvaṃ brūmaḥ, yadasmākaṃ tadapavādakṛto doṣaḥ syāt /
api ca /
niḥsvabhāvaṃ hi tathāgataṃ vyācakṣāṇena aviparītārthābhidhitsunā yogināṃ satā sarvathā /
śūnyamiti na vaktavyamaśūnyamiti vā bhavet /
ubhayaṃ nobhayaṃ ceti /
sarvametanna vaktavyamasmābhiḥ /
kiṃ tu anukte yathāvadavasthitaṃ svabhāvaṃ pratipattā pratipattuṃ na samartha ityato vayamapi āropato vyavahārasatye eva sthitvā vyavahārārthaṃ vineyajanānurodhena śūnyamityapi brūmaḥ, aśūnyamityapi, śūnyāśūnyamityapi, naiva śūnyaṃ nāśūnyamityapi brūmaḥ /
ata evāha /
prajñaptyarthaṃ tu kathyate /
iti /
yathoktaṃ bhagavatā /
śūnyāḥ sarvadharmā niḥsvabhāvayogena /
nirnimittāḥ sarvadharmā nirnimittatāmupādāya /
apraṇihitāḥ sarvadharmā apraṇidhānayogena /
prakṛtiprabhāsvarāḥ sarvadharmāḥ prajñāpāramitāpariśuddhayā /
iti /
anyatra aśūnyamuktam /
atītaṃ cedbhikṣavo rūpaṃ nābhaviṣyanna śrutavānāryaśrāvako 'tītaṃ rūpamabhyanandiṣyat /
yasmāttarhi bhikṣavaḥ asti atītaṃ rūpam, tasmādāryaśrāvakaḥ śrutavānatītaṃ rūpamabhinandatīti /
anāgataṃ cedbhikṣavaḥ /
ityādi /
evaṃ yāvat atītaṃ cedbhikṣavo vijñānaṃ nābhaviṣyat /
ityādi pūrvavat /
tathā sautrāntikamate atītānāgataṃ śūnyam, anyadaśūnyam /
viprayuktā vijñaptiḥ śūnyā /
vijñānavāde 'pi kalpitasvabhāvasya śūnyatvam, apratītyasamutpannatvāt, taimirikadvicandrādi darśanavat /
na śūnyaṃ nāpi cāśūnyaṃ tasmātsarvaṃ vidhīyate /
[tathā] sattvādasattvācca madhyamā pratipacca sā /
iti /
yena tvabhiprāyeṇa śūnyatvādikamupadiśyate, sa ātmaparīkṣāto boddhavyaḥ /
yathoktaṃ sūtre /
māyopamaṃ jagadidaṃ bhavatā naṭaraṅgasvapnasadṛśaṃ vihitam /
nātmā na sattva na ca jīvagatī dharmā marīcidakacandrasamāḥ 		'dir smras pa /
ae ma ma la kho bo cag gi re thag bcad do /
'di ltar gang kho bo cag ni gzegs zan dang rkang mig dang phyogs kyi gos can dang rgyal dpog pa la sogs pa rang gi rnam par rtog pas brtags pa'i lta ba ngan pa'i lcug ma shin tu srin te'i dra bas gtums pa /
mya ngan las 'das pa'i grong khyer du 'gro ba'i lam phyin ci ma log pa las nyams pa /
'khor ba'i 'brog dgon pa'i lam shin tu bgrod par dka' bas ma brgal pa /
mtho ris dang byang grol gyi lam phyin ci ma log par bstan par mngon par rlom pa dag la dga' ba spangs nas /
de bzhin gshegs pa'i nyi ma gzhan mu stegs pa'i gzhung lugs kyi mun pa ma lus par sel bar mdzad pa /
mtho ris dang byang grol dang mthun pa'i lam phyin ci ma log par ston par mdzad pa /
dam pa'i chos ston pa'i 'od zer shin tu gsal bas phyogs kyi ngos ma lus par khyab par mdzad pa /
gdul bya rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i blo'i padma'i tshogs kha 'byed pa lhur mdzad pa /
dngos po'i de kho na nyid kyi don ji ltar gnas pa bzhin bstan pa'i snod du gyur pa rnams kyi dri ma med pa'i mig gcig pur gyur pa /
'gro ba mtha' dag gi zla med pa'i skyabs su gyur pa /
stobs bcu dang mi 'jigs pa dang sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa'i dkyil 'khor dri ma med pa mnga' ba la skyabs su song zhing thar pa don du gnyer ba yin na /
da lta ni /
de ltar nyer blang nyer len po /
rnam pa kun gyis stong pa yin /
stong pas de bzhin gshegs stong pa /
ji lta bur na 'dogs par 'gyur /
zhes bya ba la sogs pas de bzhin gshegs pa rang bzhin gyis med par smras pas kho bo cag gi thar pa'i re thag bcad pa yin no /
de phyir de bzhin gshegs pa'i rtsi sman chen po'i ljon shing rtsad nas 'don pa khyod dang brtsad pas chog go /
brjod par bya ste /
'dir khyod lta bu'i skye bo la kho bo cag gi re thag chad pa yin no /
'di ltar gang khyod ni thar pa 'dod pas gzhan mu stegs pa'i gzhung lugs dag dor nas phyin ci ma log par ston pa po bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa la skyabs su song yang bdag med pa'i seng ge'i sgra mchog tu zab pa mu stegs can gyi smra ba thams cad dang thun mong ma yin pa mi bzod pa na /
rang gi lhag par mos pas bkren pa nyid kyis lam lta ba ngan pa sna tshogs pa'i sbrul gyis dkrugs pa /
skye bo phyin ci log tu gyur pas rjes su bgrod pa /
'khor ba'i 'brog dgon pa mi zad pa dang rjes su mthun pa de nyid nas song ba yin no /
de bzhin gshegs pa ni nam yang bdag dang phung po rnams yod pa nyid du mi gsung ngo /
ji skad du /
tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor sangs rgyas kyang sgyu ma lta bu rmi lam lta bu'o /
tshe dang ldan pa 'byor sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyang sgyu ma lta bu rmi lam lta bu'o zhes gsungs so /
kho bo cag ni gang las kho bo cag la de skad du skur pa btab pas byas pa'i nye sa par 'gyur ba rnam pa thams cad du de bzhin gshegs pa spros pa med pa dag nyid du mi smra'o /
gzhan yang de bzhin gshegs pa rang bzhin med par ston zhing phyin ci ma log pa'i don brjod par 'dod pas ni; stong ngo zhes kyang mi brjod de /
mi stong zhes kyang mi bya zhing /
gnyis dang gnyis min mi bya ste /
'di dag thams cad brjod par bya ba ma yin mod kyi /
'on kyang ma brjod na rtogs pa po rnams kyis ji lta ba bzhin du gnas pa'i rang bzhin rtogs par mi nus te /
de'i phyir kho bo cag tha snyad kyi bden pa la gnas nas tha snyad kyi don du gdul bya'i skye bo'i ngor ltag par sgro btags nas stong pa zhes kyang smra la mi stong pa zhes bya ba dang stong pa yang yin la mi stong pa yang yin zhes bya ba dang stong pa yang ma yin la mi stong pa yang ma yin pa zhes kyang smra'o /
de nyid kyi phyir /
gdags pa'i don du brjod par bya /
zhes gsungs te /
bcom ldan 'das kyis dgongs pa gang gis stong pa nyid la sogs pa bstan pa de ni bdag brtags pa las khong du chud par bya'o /
ji skad du mdo las /
khyod kyis 'gro 'di sgyu ma lta bu dang /
zlos gar lta dang rmi lam lta bu dang /
bdag med sems can med cing srog 'gro med /
chos rnams smig rgyu chu zla lta bur mkhyen /
śūnyaṃ ca śāntamanupādamayaṃ avijānadeva jagadudbhramatī stong pa zhi ba skye ba med pa'i tshul /
mi shes pas na 'gro ba 'khyam 'gyur ba /
teṣāmupāyanayayuktiśatairavatārayasyapi kṛpālutayā /
rāgādibhiśca bahurogaśataiḥ saṃtrāsitaṃ sakalamīkṣi jagat 		de dag thugs rje mnga' bas thabs tshul dang /
rigs pa brgya dag gis ni 'dzud par mdzad /
ces bya ba la sogs pa gsungs so /
vaidyopamo vicarase 'pratimo parimocayaṃ sugata sattvaśatān rtogs pa 'di dag thams cad ni de bzhin gshegs pa spros pa med ba la mnga' ba yin no /
rathacakravad bhramati sarvajagat tiryakṣu pretanirayeṣu gatāḥ de bzhin gshegs pa la stong pa nyid la sogs pa bzhi po mi mnga' ba 'ba' zhig tu ma zad kyi /
mūḍhā adeśika anāthagatāḥ teṣāṃ pradarśayasi mārgavaram /
iti 		gzhan yang /
rtag dang mi rtag la sogs bzhi /
zhi ba 'di la ga la yod /
sarvāstvetāḥ kalpanā niṣprapañce tathāgate na saṃbhavanti mtha' dang mtha' med la sogs bzhi /
zhi ba 'di la ga la yod /
'dir /
na ca kevalaṃ śūnyatvādikameva catuṣṭayaṃ tathāgate na saṃbhavati, api ca bcom ldan 'das kyis lung du ma bstan pa'i dngos po bcu bzhi bstan pa yin no /
'di lta ste /
śāśvatāśāśvatādyā kutaḥ śānte catuṣṭayam 'jig rten rtag go /
'jig rten mi rtag go /
antānantādi cāpyatra kuntaḥ śānte catuṣṭayam 'jig rten rtag kyang rtag la mi rtag kyang mi rtag go /
iha caturdaśa avyākṛtavastūni bhagavatā nirdiṣṭāni /
tadyathā 		'jig rten rtag pa yang ma yin mi rtag pa yang ma yin zhes bya ba ni bzhi tshan dang po'o /
śāśvato lokaḥ, aśāśvato lokaḥ, śāśvataśca aśāśvataśca lokaḥ, naiva śāśvato nāśāśvataśca lokaḥ, iti catuṣṭayam 'jig rten mtha' dang ldan pa dang 'jig rten mtha' dang mi ldan pa dang 'jig rten mtha' dang ldan pa yang yin la mtha' dang mi ldan pa yang yin /
antavān lokaḥ, anantavān lokaḥ, antavāṃśca anantavāṃśca lokaḥ, naiva antavān na anantavāṃśca lokaḥ, iti dvitīyam /
bhavati tathāgataḥ paraṃ maraṇāt, na bhavati tathāgataḥ paraṃ maraṇāt, bhavati ca na bhavati ca tathāgataḥ paraṃ maraṇāt, naiva bhavati na na bhavati ca tathāgataḥ paraṃ maraṇāt, iti tṛtīyam 		'jig rten mtha' dang ldan pa yang ma yin mtha' dang mi ldan pa yang ma yin zhes bya ba ni gnyis pa'o /
de bzhin gshegs pa grongs phan chad yod do /
de bzhin gshegs pa grongs phan chad med do /
de bzhin gshegs pa grongs phan chad yod pa yang yin la med pa yang yin no /
de bzhin gshegs pa grongs phan chad yod pa yang ma yin med pa yang ma yin zhes bya ba ni gsum pa'o /
lus de srog yin /
sa jīvastaccharīram, anyo jīvo 'nyaccharīram, iti srog de lus yin /
srog kyang gzhan la lus kyang gzhan yin zhes bya ba ste /
tānyetāni caturdaśa vastūni avyākṛtatvādavyākṛtavastūni ityucyante dngos po bcu bzhi po 'di dag ni brda sprod par bya ba ma yin pas lung du ma bstan pa'i dngos po zhes bya'o /
tatra yathopavarṇitena nyāyena yathā śūnyatvādikaṃ catuṣṭayaṃ prakṛtyā śānte niḥsvabhāve tathāgate na saṃbhavati, evaṃ śāśvatāśāśvatādikamapi catuṣṭayamatra na saṃbhavati de la ji skad bshad pa'i tshul gyis stong pa nyid la sogs pa bzhi po de bzhin gshegs pa rang bzhin gyis zhi zhing ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa la ji ltar mi mnga' ba de bzhin du /
rtag pa dang mi rtag pa la sogs pa bzhi yang de la mi mnga'o /
asaṃbhavādeva ca catuṣṭayaṃ vandhyāputrasya śyāmagauratvādivat na vyākṛtaṃ bhagavatā lokasya /
yathā ca etaccatuṣṭayaṃ tathāgate na saṃbhavati, evamantānantādikamapi śānte tathāgate na saṃbhavati /
idānīṃ bhavati tathāgataḥ paraṃ maraṇāt ityādikasyāpi kalpanācatuṣṭayasya pravṛttyasaṃbhava mudbhāvayannāha 		mi mnga' ba nyid kyi phyir mo gsham bu'i sngo bsangs dang dkar sham nyid ltar 'jig rten la bzhi po dag kyang bcom ldan 'das kyis lung du ma bstan pa yin no; ;bzhi po 'di dag de bzhin gshegs pa la ji ltar mi mnga' ba de bzhin du mtha' yod pa dang mtha' med pa la sogs pa yang de bzhin gshegs pa la mi mnga'o /
da ni de bzhin gshegs pa grongs phan chad yod do zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i rtog pa bzhi po yang 'jug pa yod pa ma yin par bstan pa'i phyir /
yena grāho gṛhītastu ghano 'stīti tathāgataḥ gang gis de bzhin gshegs yod ces /
'dzin pa stug pos gzung gyur pa /
nāstīti sa vikalpayannirvṛtasyāpi kalpayet de ni mya ngan 'das pa la /
med ces rnam rtog rtog par byed /
ces gsungs te /
yena hi ghanataro mahatābhiniveśena asti tathāgataḥ iti grāho gṛhītaḥ, parikalpa utpāditaḥ, saḥ niyataṃ parinirvṛte tathāgate, na bhavati tathāgataḥ paraṃ maraṇāt, maraṇāduttarakālaṃ na bhavati, ucchinnastathāgataḥ, na saṃvidyate, iti parikalpayet /
tasya evaṃ vikalpayataḥ syād dṛṣṭikṛtam /
yasya tu na kasyāṃcidapyavasthāyāṃ svabhāvaśūnyatvāt tathāgatasya astitvanāstitvam, tasya pakṣe 		gang gis mngon par zhen pa chen pos de bzhin gshegs pa yod do zhes bya bar 'dzin pa chen pos stug pos bzung zhing yongs su rtog pa bskyed pa de ni nges par de bzhin gshegs pa yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa la /
de bzhin gshegs pa grongs phan chad de grongs nas dus phyis med cing de bzhin gshegs pa rgyun chad la de bzhin gshegs pa mi bdog pa yin no zhes rtog par byed do /
de ltar rtog pa de la ni lta bar byas par 'gyur ro /
gang gi ltar na rang bzhin gyis stong pa'i phyir gnas skabs 'ga' yang de bzhin gshegs pa yod pa nyid ma yin pa de'i phyogs la ni; rang bzhin gyis ni stong de la /
sangs rgyas mya ngan 'das nas ni /
svabhāvataśca śūnye 'smiṃścintā naivopapadyate yod do zhe 'am med do zhes /
bsam pa 'thad pa nyid mi 'gyur /
paraṃ nirodhādbhavati buddho na bhavatīti vā /
ākāśe citrarūpakalpanāvadeṣā kalpanā nāstītyabhiprāyaḥ 		nam mkha' la ri mo'i gzugs rtog pa ltar rtogs pa yod pa ma yin no zhes bya bar dgongs pa'o /
de'i phyir de ltar de bzhin gshegs pa rang bzhin gyis zhi zhing /
tadevaṃ prakṛtiśānte niḥsvabhāve tathāgate sarvaprapañcātīte mandabuddhitayā śāśvatāśāśvatādikayā nityānityāstināstiśūnyāśūnyasarvajñāsarvajñādikayā kalpanayā rang bzhin med pa spros pa thams cad las 'das pa las blo zhan pa nyid kyis rtag pa dang mi rtag pa la sogs pa ste /
rtag pa dang mi rtag pa dang yod pa dang med pa dang stong pa dang mi stong pa dang thams cad mkhyen pa dang thams cad mi mkhyen pa la sogs par rtog pa dang gang dag sangs rgyas spros 'das shing /
prapañcayanti ye buddhaṃ prapañcātītamavyayam zad pa med la spros byed pa /
spros pas nyams pa de kun gyis /
te prapañcahatāḥ sarve na paśyanti tathāgatam de bzhin gshegs pa mthong mi 'gyur /
spros pa mi dngos po'i rgyu can yin na /
vastunibandhanā hi prapañcāḥ syuḥ, avastukaśca tathāgataḥ /
kutaḥ prapañcānāṃ pravṛttisaṃbhava iti? ataḥ prapañcātītastathāgataḥ 		de bzhin gshegs pa dngos po med pa la spros pa rnams 'jug pa ga la yod de /
de'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa spros pa las 'das pa yin no /
anutpādasvabhāvāvācca svabhāvāntarāgamanādavyayaḥ skye ba med pa'i rang bzhin yin pas rang bzhin gzhan du mi 'gro ba'i phyir zad pa med pa'o /
tamitthaṃvidhaṃ tathāgataṃ svotprekṣitamithyāparikalpamalamalinamānasatayā vividhairabhūtaiḥ parikalpaviśeṣaiḥ ye buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ prapañcayanti, te svakaireva prapañcairhatāḥ santaḥ tathāgataguṇasamṛddheratyantaparokṣavartino bhavanti gang dag rnam par rtog pa log pa de rang gis brtags pa'i dri mas sems dri ma can du byas pas yang dag pa ma yin pa'i kun tu rtog pa'i khyad par rnam pa sna tshogs pa dag gis de bzhin gshegs pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnam pa de lta bu da spros par byed pa de dag la ni rang gi spros pa dag gis nyams par gyur pas /
de bzhin gshegs pa'i yon tan phun sum tshogs pa lkog tu gyur par gnas par 'gyur ro /
tataśca śavabhūtāḥ etasmin pravacane na paśyanti tathāgataṃ jātyandhā ivādityam de'i phyir ro dang 'dra ba de dag gis gsung rab 'di la de bzhin gshegs pa mthong bar mi 'gyur te /
ata evāha bhagavān dmus long gis nyi ma bzhin no /
ye māṃ rūpeṇa adrākṣurye māṃ ghoṣeṇa anvayuḥ de nyid kyi phyir bcom ldan 'das kyis /
gang dag nga la gzugs su mthong /
mithyāprahāṇaprasṛtā na māṃ drakṣyanti te janāḥ gang dag nga la sgrar shes pa /
log par spong bar zhugs pa ste /
dharmato buddhā draṣṭavyā dharmakāyā hi nāyakāḥ skye bo de dag nga mi mthong /
sangs rgyas rnams ni chos nyid blta /
dharmatā cāpyavijñeyā na sā śakyā vijānitum 'dren pa rnams ni chos kyi sku /
chos nyid shes bya ma yin te /
iti /
tadatra tathāgataparīkṣāyāṃ sattvalokaḥ sakalaḥ sasurāsuranarādiḥ parīkṣitaḥ 		de ni shes par nus ma yin /
zhes gsungs so; ;de'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa brtag pa 'dir sems can gyi 'jig rten brtag pa byas pa yin no /
yathā cāyaṃ sattvaloko niḥsvabhāvaḥ, tathā bhājanalokasyāpi vāyumaṇḍalāderakaniṣṭhavitānabhavanaparyantasya naiḥsvābhāvyamudbhāvayannāha /
tathāgato yatsvabhāvastatsvabhāvamidaṃ jagat /
idaṃ jagaditi ayaṃ bhājanaloka ityarthaḥ /
kiṃsvabhāvastathāgataḥ punarityāha /
tathāgato niḥsvabhāvo niḥsvabhāvamidaṃ jagat /
iti /
yathā ca jagato naiḥsvābhāvyam, tathā pratyayaparīkṣādibhiḥ pratipāditam /
ata evoktaṃ sūtre 		sems can gyi 'jig rten 'di ji ltar rang bzhin med pa de ltar /
snod kyi 'jig rten yang rang bzhin med pa yin no zhes bsgre ba'i phyir /
de bzhin gshegs pa'i rang bzhin gang /
de ni 'gro 'di'i rang bzhin yin /
de bzhin gshegs pa rang bzhin med /
'gro ba 'di yis rang bzhin med /
ces bya ba gsungs te /
'gro ba ji ltar rang bzhin med pa yin pa de ltar ni rkyen brtags pa la sogs pa dag gis bstan to /
de nyid kyi phyir mdo las /
anupādadharmaḥ satataṃ tathāgataḥ sarve ca dharmāḥ sugatena sādṛśāḥ rtag tu skye med chos ni de bzhin gshegs /
chos rnams kun kyang bde bar gshegs dang 'dra /
nimittagrāheṇa tu bālabuddhayaḥ asatsu dharmeṣu caranti loke byis pa'i blo can mtshan mar 'dzin pa rnams /
'jig rten na ni med pa'i chos la spyod /
tathāgato hi pratibimbabhūtaḥ kuśalasya dharmasya anāsravasya de bzhin gshegs pa zag pa med pa yi /
dge ba'i chos kyi gzugs brnyan lta bu yin /
naivātra tathatā na tathāgato 'sti bimbaṃ ca saṃdṛśyati sarva loke 'di ni de bzhin dang de gshegs pa med /
'jig rten thams cad kyis ni gzugs brnyan mthong /
iti /
uktaṃ ca bhagavatyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyām 		zhes gsungs so /
bcom ldan 'das ma las kyang /
atha khalu te devaputrāḥ āyuṣmantaṃ subhūtiṃ sthavirametadavocan de nas lha'i bu de dag gis gnas brtan tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces smras so /
kiṃ punarāryasubhūte māyopamāste sattvāḥ, na te māyā? evamukte āyuṣmān subhūtistān devaputrānetadavocat 'phags pa rab 'byor ci sems can de dag sgyu ma lta bu yin gyi sgyu ma ma yin nam /
de skad ces smras pa dang tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis lha'i bu de dag la 'di skad ces smras so /
māyopamāste devaputrāḥ sattvāḥ, svapnopamāste devaputrāḥ sattvāḥ lta'i bu dag sems can de dag ni sgyu ma lta bu'o /
lha'i bu dag sems can de dag ni rmi lam lta bu ste /
iti hi māyā ca sattvāśca advayameta dadvaidhīkāram lha'i bu dag de ltar na sgyu ma dang sems can de dag ni gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do /
iti hi svapnaśca sattvāśca advayametadadvaidhīkāram /
sarvadharmā api devaputrā māyopamāḥ svapnopamāḥ /
strotaāpanno 'pi māyopamaḥ svapnopamaḥ /
strotaāpattiphalamapi māyopamaṃ svapnopamam 		de ltar na rmi lam dang sems can de dag ni gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do /
lha'i bu dag chos thams cad kyang sgyu ma lta bu rmi lam lta bu'o /
rgyun du zhugs pa yang sgyu ma lta bu rmi lam lta bu'o /
rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu yang rmi lam lta bu sgyu ma lta bu'o /
evaṃ sakṛdāgāmyapi sakṛdāgāmiphalamapi /
anāgāmyapi anāgāmiphalamapi /
arhannapi māyopamaḥ svapnopamaḥ /
arhattvaphalamapi māyopamaṃ svapnopamam /
pratyekabuddho 'pi māyopamaḥ svapnopamaḥ /
pratyekabuddhatvamapi māyopamaṃ svapnopamam 		de bzhin du lan cig phyir 'ong ba dang lan cig phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang phyir mi 'ong ba dang phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang dgra bcom pa yang sgyu ma lta bu rmi lam lta bu'o /
dgra bcom pa'i 'bras bu yang sgyu ma lta bu rmi lam lta bu'o /
rang sangs rgyas kyang sgyu ma lta bu rmi lam lta bu'o /
rang sangs rgyas nyid kyang sgyu ma lta bu rmi lam lta bu'o /
samyaksaṃbuddho 'pi māyopamaḥ svapnopamaḥ iti yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyang sgyu ma lta bu rmi lam lta bu'o /
samyaksaṃbuddhatvamapi māyopamaṃ svapnopamamiti vadāmi yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nyid kyang sgyu ma lta bu rmi lam lta bu'o /
atha khalu devaputrā āyuṣmantaṃ subhūtimetadavocan de nas lha'i bu de dag gis gnas brtan tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces smras so /
samyaksaṃbuddho 'pi māyopamaḥ svapnopama iti, samyaksaṃbuddhatvamapi māyopamaṃ svapnopamamiti āryasubhūte vadasi? subhūtirāha 'phags pa rab 'byor yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyang sgyu ma lta bu rmi lam lta bu'o zhes smra'am /
yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nyid kyang sgyu ma lta bu rmi lam lta bu'o zhes smra 'am /
nirvāṇamapi devaputrā māyopamaṃ svapnopamamiti vadāmi, kiṃ punaranyaṃ dharmam? devaputrā āhuḥ rab 'byor gyis smras pa /
lha'i bu dag mya ngan las 'das pa yang sgyu ma lta bu rmi lam lta bur smra na /
chos gzhan lta ci smos /
nirvāṇamapyāryasubhūte māyopamaṃ svapnopamamiti vadasi? subhūtirāha lha'i bu dag gis smras pa; 'phags pa rab 'byor mya ngan las 'das pa yang sgyu ma lta bu rmi lam lta bu zhes smra 'am /
rab 'byor gyis smras pa /
yadyapi devaputrā nirvāṇādapyanyaḥ kaściddharmo viśiṣṭataraḥ syāt, tamapyahaṃ māyopamaṃ svapnopamamiti vadeyam lha'i bu dag kho bo ni gal te mya ngan las 'das pa bas ches khyad par du 'phags pa'i chos gzhan 'ga' zhig yod na yang /
de yang bdag sgyu ma lta bu rmi lam lta bu'o zhes smra'o /
iti hi māyā ca nirvāṇaṃ ca advayametadadvaidhīkāramiti de ltar na rmi lam dang mya ngan las 'das pa 'di dag ni gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do zhes gsungs so /
ityācāryacandrakīrtipādoparacitāyāṃ prasannapadāyāṃ madhyamakavṛttau tathāgataparīkṣā nāma dvāviṃśatitamaṃ prakaraṇam /
viparyāsaparīkṣā trayoviṃśatitamaṃ prakaraṇam /
atrāha 		slob dpon zla ba grags pa'i zhal snga nas sbyar ba'i tshig gsal ba las /
de bzhin gshegs pa brtag pa zhes bya ba rab tu byed pa nyi shu gnyis pa'i 'grel pa'o /
'dir smras pa /
vidyata eva bhavasaṃtatiḥ, tatkāraṇasadbhāvāt srid pa'i rgyun ni yod pa nyid de /
de'i rgyu yod pa'i phyir ro /
iha hi kleśebhyaḥ karma pravartate 'di na nyon mongs pa rnams las ni las 'byung zhing /
karmakleśahetukā janmamaraṇaparaṃparā upajāyate /
sā ca bhavasaṃtatirvyapadiśyate 		las dang nyon mongs pa'i rgyu can skye ba dang 'chi ba gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa yang nye bar zhi nga skye bar 'byung la /
de yang srid pa'i rgyu nyid du rtog go /
rgyun du bsnyad do /
tasyāśca pradhānaṃ kāraṇaṃ kleśāḥ, prahīṇakleśānāṃ bhavasaṃtaterabhāvāt de'i gtso bo'i rgyu ni nyon mongs pa rnams yin te /
nyon mongs pa spangs pa dag la de med pa'i phyir ro /
te ca rāgādayaḥ kleśāḥ santi nyon mongs pa 'dod chags la sogs pa de rnams ni yod pa yin te /
tasmāt kāryabhūtāpi janmamaraṇaparaṃparā avicchedaprabandhena bhavasaṃtatirapi bhaviṣyatīti /
ucyate /
syād bhavasaṃtatiḥ, yadi taddhetubhūtāḥ kleśāḥ syuḥ 		de'i phyir 'bras bur 'gyur ba srid pa'i rgyun yang yod par 'gyur ro /
brjod par bya ste /
gal te de'i rgyur gyur pa nyon mongs pa dag yod na ni /
srid pa'i rgyun yang yod par 'gyur na /
na tu santi yod pa ni ma yin no /
kathaṃ kṛtvā? iha bhagavadbhirbuddhaiḥ sakalatribhuvanajanasaṃkleśaśatruvidhvaṃsibhiścaturmārārātisamaraparājayaiḥ /
saṃkalpaprabhavo rāgo dveṣo mohaśca kathyate /
śubhāśubhaviparyāsān saṃbhavanti pratītya hi /
saṃkalpo vitarkaḥ /
saṃkalpāt prabhavatīti saṃkalpaprabhavaḥ /
kāma jānāmi te mūlaṃ saṃkalpātkila jāyase /
na tvāṃ saṃkalpayiṣyāmi tato me na bhaviṣyasi 		ji ltar zhe na /
'dir sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis /
'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug rnams /
kun tu rtog las 'byung bar gsungs /
sdug dang mi sdug phyin ci log /
brten pa nyid las kun du 'byung /
kun tu rtog pa ni rtog pa'o /
kun tu rtog pa las 'byung bas na kun tu rtog pa las 'byung ba'o /
'dod pa khyod kyi rtsa ba ni /
shes te kun tu rtog las skye /
iti gāthābhidhānāt /
saṃkalpaprabhavo rāgo dveṣo mohaśca kathyate 		zhes tshigs su bcad de 'byung ba'i phyir /
'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug rnams /
kun tu rtog las 'byung bar gsungs so /
etanmūlakatvādanyeṣāṃ kleśānāṃ mukhyatvādeṣāmevopādānaṃ trayāṇām 'di dag kho na nye bar bzung bas ni /
nyon mongs pa gzhan rnams 'di dag gi rgyu can yin pas gtso bor gyur pa'i phyir ro /
ete ca trayaḥ kleśāḥ nyon mongs pa gsum po de dag ni /
śubhāśubhaviparyāsān saṃbhavanti pratītya hi /
tatra hi śubhamākāraṃ pratītya rāga utpadyate, aśubhaṃ pratītya dveṣaḥ, viparyāsān pratītya moha utpadyate 		sdug dang mi sdug phyin ci log /
brten pa nyid las kun tu 'byung ste /
de la yul sdug pa'i rnam pa la brten nas ni 'dod chags 'byung la /
mi sdug pa la brten nas zhe sdang 'byung ngo /
phyin ci log la brten nas ni gti mug 'byung ngo /
saṃkalpastu eṣāṃ trayāṇāmapi sādhāraṇakāraṇamutpattau /
kathaṃ punarmohaḥ saṃkalpaprabhavaḥ? ucyate 		kun tu rtog pa ni de dag gsum char yang bskyed par bya ba la rgyu thun mong pa yin no /
yang ji ltar gti mug kun tu rtog pa las 'byung zhe na /
uktaṃ hi pratītyasamutpāde bhagavatā /
avidyāpi bhikṣavaḥ sahetukā sapratyayā sanidānā 		brjod par bya ste bcom ldan 'das kyis rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba las dge slong dag ma rig pa ni rgyu dang bcas pa gzhi dang bcas pa rkyen dang bcas pa'o /
kaśca bhikṣavaḥ avidyāyā hetuḥ? ayoniśo bhikṣavo manaskāro 'vidyāyā hetuḥ /
āvilo mohajo manaskāro bhikṣavo 'vidyāyā hetuḥ /
ityataḥ avidyā saṃkalpaprabhavā bhavati 		dge slong dag ma rig pa'i rgyu gang zhe na /
tshul bzhin ma yin pa'i yid la byed pa'o zhes bya ba dang de bzhin du yid la byed pa rnyog pa can ni gti mug las skye ba yin no zhes gsungs so /
de'i phyir ma rig pa dang kun tu rtog pa las 'byung bar 'gyur ro /
tataśca de'i phyir /
śubhāśubhaviparyāsān saṃbhavanti pratītya ye gang dag sdug dang mi sdug dang /
phyin ci log la brten 'byung ba /
te svabhāvānna vidyante tasmāt kleśā na tattvataḥ /
iti /
yadi rāgādayaḥ svabhāvasiddhāḥ syuḥ, naiva te śubhāśubhaviparyāsān pratītya saṃbhaveyuḥ, svabhāvasya akṛtrimatvāt paranirapekṣatvācca 		de dag rang bzhin las med de /
de phyir nyon mongs yang dag med /
gal te 'dod chags la sogs pa nyon mongs pa rnams rang bzhin gyis grub pa yin na ni /
rang bzhin ni bcos ma ma yin pa'i phyir dang /
gzhan la ltos pa med pa'i phyir /
de rnams sdug pa dang mi sdug pa dang phyin ci log la brten nas mi 'byung ba zhig na /
bhavanti ca śubhāśubhaviparyāsān pratītya, tasmānniḥsvabhāvā eva te sdug pa dang mi sdug pa dang phyin ci log la brten nas 'byung ba yang yin te /
de'i phyir de dag rang bzhin med pa nyid yin gyi /
tattvato na vidyante, paramārthataḥ svabhāvato na vidyante ityarthaḥ yang dag par yod pa ni ma yin te /
don dam par rang bzhin gyis yod pa ma yin no zhes bya ba'i don to /
api ca gzhan yang /
ātmano 'stitvanāstitvena kathaṃcicca sidhyataḥ bdag gi yod nyid med nyid ni /
ji lta bur yang 'grub pa med /
taṃ vināstitvanāstitve kleśānāṃ sidhyataḥ katham de med nyon mongs rnams kyi ni /
yod nyid med nyid ji ltar 'grub /
ātmano yathā astitvanāstitve na staḥ, tathā uktaṃ vistareṇa bdag gi yod pa nyid dang med pa nyid dag ji ltar yod pa ma yin pa de ltar ni rgyas par bshad zin to /
tataśca /
tadāśritasya dharmasya kuto 'stitvanāstitve bhaviṣyataḥ? 		de'i phyir de la brten pa'i chos kyi yod pa nyid dang med pa nyid yod par ga la 'gyur /
atha syāt /
yadi astitvanāstitve ātmano na staḥ, tadā kimatra kleśānāmāyātam, yatasteṣāmapi astitvanāstitve na staḥ iti? ucyate 		ci ste gal te bdag gi yod pa nyid dang med pa nyid med pa de'i tshe gang las de rnams kyi yod pa nyid dang med pa nyid dag med par 'gyur ba /
'dir nyon mongs pa rnams las ci zhig 'byung snyam na /
brjod pa /
kasyaciddhi bhavantīme kleśāḥ sa ca na sidhyati nyon mongs 'di dag gang gi yin /
de yang 'grub pa yod pa yin /
kaścidāho vinā kaṃcitsanti kleśā na kasyacit 'ga' med pa ni gang gi yang /
nyon mongs pa dag yod ma yin /
iha amī rāgādayaḥ kuḍayaṃ citravat phalaṃ pakvatādivacca utpattau āśrayamapekṣante 'dir nyon mongs pa 'di dag rtsig ngos kyi ri mo dang 'bras bu smin pa nyid bzhin du bskyed bar bya ba brten pa la ltos pa yin no /
tataśca kasyacidete bhavanti, na vinā kaṃcidāśrayam de'i phyir 'di dag gang zhig gi yin par 'gyur gyi rten 'ga' zhig med par ni ma yin no /
sa ca āśrayaḥ parikalpyamānaḥ ātmā vā cittaṃ vā bhavet /
sa caiṣāmāśrayaḥ pūrvameva pratiṣiddhatvānnāsti 		rten de yang brtags pa na bdag gam sems shig yin pa zhig na /
de dag gi rten de ni sngar bkag zin pa'i phyir yod pa ma yin no /
taṃ ca kaṃcidāśrayaṃ vinā kasya kleśā bhavantu? naiva kasyacidbhavanti, tasyāvidyamānatvāt, āho vinā kaṃcit santi kleśā na kasyacit rten de 'ga' yang med par ni gang gi nyon mongs pa yin par 'gyur /
de med pa nyid kyi phyir gang gi phyir yang ma yin no zhes bshad pa /
'ga' med par ni gang gi yang /
atrāha /
naiva hi kleśānāṃ kaścidāśrayaḥ pūrvaṃ siddho 'bhyupagamyate /
na ca ātmā nāma kaścidasti, yaḥ āśrayatvena vyavasthāpyeta, nirhetukatvād vyomacūtataruvat /
kiṃ tarhi kliṣṭaṃ cittaṃ pratītya kleśā upajāyante, tacca cittaṃ sahaiva kleśairupajāyata iti /
etadapi na yuktamityāha 		nyon mongs pa dag yod ma yin /
'dir nyon mongs pa rnams kyi rten sngar grub pa ni 'ga' yang khas mi len la; gang zhig rten nyid du rnam par gzhag pa bdag ces bya ba 'ga' yang yod pa ma yin te /
rgyu med pa'i phyir nam mkha'i aa mra'i shing bzhin no /
'o na ci zhe na /
nyon mongs pa can gyi sems la brten nas nyon mongs pa rnams skye bar 'gyur la /
sems de yang nyon mongs pa rnams dang lhan cig skye'o zhes zer ro /
'di yang mi rigs so zhes bshad pa /
svakāyadṛṣṭivat kleśāḥ kliṣṭe santi na pañcadhā rang lus lta zhing nyon mongs rnams /
nyon mongs can la rnam lngar med /
svakāyadṛṣṭivat kliṣṭaṃ kleśeṣvapi na pañcadhā rang lus lta zhig nyon mongs can /
nyon mongs pa la rnam lngar med /
svakāyo hi nāma rūpādilakṣaṇasaṃhatiḥ /
svakāyadṛṣṭiḥ svakāye ātmadṛṣṭiḥ ātmīyākāragrahaṇapravṛttā 		rang lus zhes bya ba ni gzugs la sogs pa'i mtshan nyid kyi tshogs so /
rang gi lus la lta ba ni rang lus lta ste /
bdag dang bdag gi ba'i rnam par 'dzin par zhugs so /
yatheyaṃ pañcadhā vicāryamāṇā svakāye na saṃbhavati, /
skandhā na nānyaḥ skandhebhyo nāsmin skandhā na teṣu saḥ 		ji ltar 'di /
phung min phung po las gzhan min /
de la phung med der de med /
de bzhin gshegs pa phung ldan min /
tathāgataḥ skandhavānna katamo 'tra tathāgataḥ /
ityanena /
evaṃ kliṣṭe 'pi kleśā vicāryamāṇāḥ pañcadhā na saṃbhavanti /
tatra kliśyantīti kleśā kliśyate iti kliṣṭam 		zhes bya ba 'dis rnam pa lngar dpyad pa na /
rang gi lus la yod pa ma yin pa de bzhin du nyon mongs pa rnams kyang rnam pa lngar dpyad pa na nyon mongs pa can la yod pa ma yin no /
de la nyon mongs par byed pas ni nyon mongs pa rnams so /
nyon mongs par bya bas na nyon mongs pa can no /
tatra yadeva kliṣṭaṃ tadeva kleśā iti na yujyate dagdhṛdāhyayorapyekatvaprasaṅgāt de la nyon mongs pa can gang yin pa de nyid nyon mongs pa rnams yin no zhes bya bar ni mi rigs te /
sreg pa po dang bsreg par bya ba dag kyang gcig nyid du thal ba'i phyir ro /
anyat kliṣṭam, anye kleśā iti na yujyate /
paratra nirapekṣatvāt, akliṣṭahetuka kleśaprasaṅgāt /
ata eva ca ekatvānyatvābhāvādādhārādheyatadvatpakṣāṇāṃ ca abhāvānna kleśeṣu kliṣṭam, na kliṣṭe kleśāḥ, nāpi kleśavat kliṣṭam /
ityevaṃ kliṣṭe pañcadhā vicāryamāṇāḥ kleśā na saṃbhavanti 		nyon mongs pa can yang gzhan la nyon mongs rnams kyang gzhan yin no zhes bya bar yang mi rigs te /
gzhan la ltos pa med pa'i phyir nyon mongs pa rnams nyon mongs pa can gyi rgyu las ma byung bar thal bar 'gyur ba'i phyir ro /
de nyid dang gzhan nyid med pa de nyid kyi phyir /
rten dang brten pa dang de dang ldan pa'i phyogs rnams med pas nyon mongs pa rnams la nyon mongs pa can med la /
nyon mongs pa can la nyon mongs pa rnams med cing /
yathā ca kliṣṭahetukāḥ kleśā na saṃbhavanti, evaṃ kleśahetukamapi kliṣṭaṃ kleśeṣu vicāryamāṇaṃ pañcadhā na saṃbhavati /
na hi kleśā eva kliṣṭam, kartṛkarmaṇorekatvaprasaṅgāt, nānye kleśā anyat kliṣṭam, nirapekṣatvaprasaṅgāt, na ca kliṣṭe kleśāḥ na ca kleśeṣu kliṣṭam, na kliṣṭavantaḥ kleśāḥ 		nyon mongs pa can nyon mongs pa rnams dang ldan pa yang ma yin no /
de ltar na rnam pa lngas dpyad pa na /
nyon mongs pa rnams nyon mongs pa can la yod pa ma yin no; ;ji ltar nyon mongs pa can gyi rgyu can nyon mongs pa rnams yod pa ma yin pa de bzhin du /
nyon mongs pa'i rgyu can gyi nyon mongs pa can yang rnam pa lngas dpyad pa na nyon mongs pa rnams la yod pa ma yin no /
ityevaṃ svakāyadṛṣṭivadeva kliṣṭaṃ kleśeṣvapi pañcadhā nāsti /
yataścaivam, ataḥ parasparāpekṣayāpi kleśākliṣṭayornāsti siddhiḥ /
atrāha /
yadyapi tvayā kleśāḥ pratiṣiddhāḥ, tathāpi kleśahetavaḥ śubhāśubhaviparyāsāstāvat santi, tatsadbhāvācca kleśāḥ santīti /
ucyate /
syuḥ kleśāḥ, yadi śubhāśubhaviparyāsā eva syuḥ, yāvatā ete 'pi pratītya sasutpannatvādvakṣyamāṇapratiṣedhācca /
yadā ca te na santi svabhāvataḥ, tadā /
svabhāvato na vidyante śubhāśubhaviparyayāḥ /
pratītyasamutpannatvādvakṣyamāṇapratiṣedhācca /
yadā ca te na santi svabhāvataḥ, tadā /
pratītya katamān kleśāḥ śubhāśubhaviparyayān 		'di ltar nyon mongs pa rnams nyid nyon mongs pa can ni ma yin te /
byed pa po dang las dag gcig pa nyid du thal ba'i phyir ro /
nyon mongs pa rnams kyang gzhan la /
nyon mongs pa can gzhan pa yang ma yin te /
ltos pa med pa nyid du thal bar 'gyur ba'i phyir ro /
nyon mongs pa can la nyon mongs pa rnams med la /
nyon mongs pa rnams la nyon mongs pa can med cing /
nyon mongs pa rnams nyon mongs pa can dang ldan pa yang ma yin no /
de ltar na rang gi lus la lta ba bzhin du nyon mongs pa can yang nyon mongs pa rnams la rnam pa lngar yod pa ma yin no /
gang gi phyir de lta yin pa de'i phyir nyon mongs pa dang nyon mongs pa can dag phan tshun ltos nas grub pa yang yod pa ma yin no /
'dir smras pa /
gal te yang khyod kyis nyon mongs pa rnams bkag mod kyi /
de lta na yang nyon mongs pa'i rgyu sdug pa dang mi sdug pa dang phyin ci log dag ni re zhig yod pa yin no /
de yod pas nyon mongs pa rnams kyang yod par 'gyur ro /
brjod par bya ste /
gal te sdug pa dang mi sdug pa dang phyin ci log dag nyid yod na /
nyon mongs pa rnams yod par 'gyur na /
gang gi phyir /
sdug dang mi sdug phyin ci log /
de dag kyang rang bzhin las ni yod min na ste /
rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'i phyir dang dgag pa chad par 'gyur ba'i phyir ro /
gang gi tshe de ltar rang bzhin gyis yod pa ma yin pa de'i tshe /
sdug dang mi sdug phyin ci log /
brten nas nyon mongs gang dag yin /
naiva santi kleśāḥ, taddhetuśubhāśubhaviparyayābhāvādityabhiprāyaḥ de'i rgyu sdug pa dang mi sdug pa dang phyin ci log rnams med pas nyon mongs pa rnams yod pa ma yin pa nyid do snyam du dgongs pa'o /
atrāha /
vidyanta eva kleśāḥ, tadālambanasadbhāvāt 		'dir smras pa /
nyon mongs pa rnams ni yod pa nyid de /
de dag gi dmigs pa yod pa'i phyir ro /
iha hi yannāsti, na tasyālambana masti, tadyathā vandhyāsūnoḥ /
asti ca rūpaśabdagandharasaspraṣṭavyadharmākhyaṃ ṣaḍvidhamālambanam 		'dir yang gang med pa de la ni dmigs pa yod pa ma yin te /
dper na mo gsham gyi bu bzhin no /
gzugs dang sgra dang dri dang ro dang reg dang chos zhes bya ba dmigs pa rnam pa drug ni yod pa yin te /
tasmādālambanasadbhāvādvidyanta eva kleśā iti de'i phyir dmigs pa yod pas nyon mongs pa rnams yod pa nyid du brjod par bya ste khyed cag gis /
ucyate /
astyetat, yad bhavadbhiḥ 		gzugs sgra ro dang reg pa dang /
dri dang chos dag rnam drug ni /
rūpaśabdarasasparśā gandhā dharmāśca ṣaḍvidham /
vastu rāgasya dveṣasya mohasya ca vikalpyate /
tatra vastu ālambanam, vasatīti vā asmin rāgādikam, tadutpatteḥ iti kṛtvā 		bzhi ste 'dod chags zhe sdang dang /
gti mug gis ni yin par brtags pa gang yin pa de ni yod do /
de la de las skye ba'i phyir 'dod chags la sogs pa 'dir gnas pas bzhi ste dmigs pa'o /
tacca tadālambanaṃ ṣoḍhā bhavati, indriyāṇāṃ ṣaṇṇāṃ paricchedakarāṇāmanyonyabhedāt /
rūpaṃ śabdā gandhā rasāḥ spraṣṭavyāni dharmāśceti 		dmigs pa de yang gzugs dang sgra dang dri dang ro dang reg bya dang chos zhes bya ba dang drug tu 'gyur te /
yongs su gcod par byed pa dbang po drug phan tshun tha dad pa'i phyir ro /
tatra idamihāmutreti nirūpaṇāt, rūpaṇācca rūpam de la 'di ni 'di na'o /
pha gi ni pha gi na'o zhes nges par brtag tu rung ba'i phyir dang /
tena śabdena śabdyante prakāśyante padārthā iti śabdaḥ gzugs su rung bas na gzugs so /
'dis don sgrogs shing ston par byed pas na sgra'o /
gandhyante hiṃsyante yatra prāptāḥ tato 'nyatrāgamanād gandhāḥ brngub cing bsnam par bya bas ni dri dag ste /
gang du phyin pa de las gzhan du mi 'gro ba'i phyir ro /
rasyate āsvādyate iti rasaḥ bro zhing ro myang bar bya bas na ro'o /
spṛśyate iti sparśaḥ reg par bya bas na reg pa'o /
svalakṣaṇāsādhāraṇānnirvāṇāgradharmādhāraṇāddharmāḥ rang gi mtshan nyid 'dzin pa'i phyir ram /
chos kyi mchog mya ngan las 'das pa 'dzin pas na chos so /
tadetat ṣaḍvidhaṃ vastu bhavati rnam pa drug po de dag gzhi yin no /
gang gi zhe na /
kasya? rāgasya dveṣasya mohasya 'dod chags dang zhe sdang dang gti mug gi'o /
tatra rañjanaṃ rāgo raktiradhyavasānam de la 'gal bas na 'dod chags te /
chags pa dang lhag par zhen pa'o /
rajyate vā anena cittamiti rāgaḥ /
dūṣaṇaṃ doṣaḥ, āghātaḥ sattvaviṣayo 'sattvaviṣayo vā dūṣyate vā anena citamiti doṣaḥ 		yang na 'dis sems dga' bar byed pas na 'dod chags so /
sun 'byin pas na zhe sdang ste /
kun nas mnar sems pa'o /
yang na 'dis sems sun 'byin par byed pas na zhe sdang ngo /
mohanaṃ mohaḥ saṃmohaḥ padārthasvarūpāparijñānam gti mug pas na gti mug ste /
kun nas gti mug pa'o /
muhyate vā anena cittamiti mohaḥ yang na 'dis sems gti mug tu byed pas ni gti mug go /
tadeṣāṃ kleśānāṃ rūpādikaṃ ṣaḍvidhaṃ vastu ālambanaṃ bhavati de'i phyir gzugs la sogs pa rnam pa drug ni nyon mongs pa 'di dag gi gzhi ste /
dmigs pa yin no /
tatra śubhākārādhyāropeṇa yathā rūpādibhyo rāga upajāyate, aśubhākārādhyāropeṇa dveṣaḥ, nityātmādyadhyāropeṇa mohaḥ saṃbhavatīti de la gzugs la sogs pa dag la sdug pa'i rnam par sgro btags pas ni 'dod chags skye'o /
mi sdug pa'i rnam par sgro btags pas ni zhe sdang ngo /
rtag pa dang bdag la log par sgro btags pas ni gti mug skye bar 'gyur ro /
satyaṃ vikalpyate etadbālajanaiḥ ṣaḍvidhaṃ vastu rnam pa drug po 'di dag gzhir btags pa bden mod kyi /
kiṃ tu avidyamānasvabhāvasattākametad rāgādīnāmālambanatvena parikalpyate bhavatā taimirikairiva asatkeśamaśakamakṣikādvicandrādikamiti pratipādayannāha /
rūpaśabdarasasparśā gandhā dharmāśca kevalāḥ 		'on kyang rab rib can dag gis yod pa ma yin pa'i skra shad la sogs pa ltar /
de dag yod pa ma yin pa'i rang bzhin du gyur ba zhig khyod kyis 'dod chags la sogs pa rnams kyi dmigs par yongs su btags pa yin no zhes bstan pa'i phyir /
gzugs sgra ro dang reg pa dang /
dri dang chos dag 'ba' zhig ste /
kevalā iti parikalpitamātrā niḥsvabhāvā ityarthaḥ zhes gsungs so /
'ba' zhig ste zhes bya ba ni btags pa tsam zhig tu zad de /
yadi niḥsvabhāvāḥ, kathaṃ tarhi upalabhyante iti? ucyate /
gandharvanagarākārā marīcisvapnasaṃnibhāḥ 		rang bzhin med do zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go /
gal te rang bzhin med na /
'o na ji ltar dmigs pa yin zhe na /
brjod par bya ste /
dmigs pa de dag ni /
dri za'i grong khyer lta bu dang /
iti ete upalabhyante smig rgyu rmi lam 'dra ba yin /
yathā gandharvanagarādiprakhyā ete kevalaṃ viparyāsādupalabhyante, tadā gang gi tshe de dag dri za'i grong khyer la sogs pa ltar phyin ci log las dmigs pa 'ba' zhig tu zad pa de'i tshe /
aśubhaṃ vā śubhaṃ vāpi kutasteṣu bhaviṣyati /
māyāpuruṣakalpeṣu pratibimbasameṣu ca 		sgyu ma'i skyes bu lta bu dang /
gzugs brnyan 'dra ba de dag la /
sdug pa dang ni mi sdug pa /
tadanena mithyāśrayasamutpannatvācchubhāśubhayorapi nimittayormṛṣātvameva bhavati /
yathoktam 		'byung bar yang ni ga la 'gyur /
'dis ni rten log pa las byung ba dang sdug pa dang mi sdug pa'i mtshan ma dag kyang brdzun pa nyid du 'gyur ro /
ji skad du /
ahaṃkārodbhavāḥ skandhāḥ so 'haṃkāro 'nṛto 'rthataḥ /
bījaṃ yasyānṛtaṃ tasya prarohaḥ satyataḥ kutaḥ /
skandhānasatyān dṛṣṭvaivamahaṃkāraḥ prahīyate /
ahaṃkāraprahāṇācca na punaḥ skandhasaṃbhavaḥ /
iti /
na ca kevalamāśrayamithyātve śubhāśubhayornimittayormithyātvam, api ca anayāpyupapattyā anayormithyātvamiti pratipādayannāha 		ngar 'dzin las byung phung po rnams /
ngar 'dzin de ni don du brdzun /
gang gi sa bon brdzun pa de'i /
skye ba bden pa ga la zhig /
ces gsungs so /
rten log pa nyid yin pas sdug pa dang mi sdug pa'i mtshan ma dag brdzun pa 'ba' zhig tu ma zad kyi 'on kyang 'thad pa 'dis kyang 'di gnyis brdzun pa nyid yin no zhes bstan pa'i phyir /
gang la brten nas sdug pa zhes /
anapekṣya śubhaṃ nāstyaśubhaṃ prajñapayemahi gdags par bya ba mi sdug pa /
sdug la ma ltos yod min pas /
yatpratītya śubhaṃ tasmācchubhaṃ naivopapadyate de phyir sdug pa 'thad ma yin /
zhes gsungs te /
iha yadi śubhaṃ nāma kiṃcit syāt, niyataṃ tadaśubhamapekṣya bhavet, pārāvāravat, bījāṅkuravat, hrasvadīrghavadvā, śubhasya saṃbandhyantarapadārthasāpekṣatvāt 'di na gal te sdug pa zhes bya ba 'ga' zhig yod na ni /
sdug pa dang 'brel pa can gzhan la ltos pa dang bcas pa'i phyir nges par ring thung ngam pha rol dang tshu rol ltar mi sdug pa la ltos par 'gyur na /
taccāpyapekṣaṇīyamaśubhaṃ śubhena vinā nāsti /
[anapekṣya śubhaṃ nāstyaśubhaṃ] śubhaṃ nirapekṣyāśubhaṃ nāstītyabhiprāyaḥ 		mi sdug pa gang la brten zhing mi sdug pa gang la ltos nas sdug pa zhes gdags par bya zhing rnam par gzhag par bya ba ltos par bya ba mi sdug pa de yang /
yadaśubhaṃ pratītya yadaśubhamapekṣya śubhaṃ prajñapayemahi vyavasthāpayemahi sdug pa med par yod pa ma yin zhing /
sdug pa la ma ltos par mi sdug pa yod pa ma yin te /
yacchabdena anantarasyāśubhasya parāmarśaḥ sdug pa la ltos pa med par mi sdug pa med pa yin no zhes bya ba'i don to /
prajñapayemahītyanena uttarasya śubhasya saṃbandhaḥ /
yataśca evaṃ śubhasya prajñaptau saṃbandhyantaramapekṣaṇīyamaśubhākhyaṃ padārthāntaraṃ nāsti, tasmācchubhaṃ naivopapadyate hrasvāsaṃbhavādiva dīrgham, pārāsaṃbhavādiva avāramityabhiprāyaḥ 		gang la'i sgras ni mjug thogs kyi mi sdug pa gzung ngo; ;gdags par bya ba zhes bya ba ni gong gi sdug pa dang sbyar ro /
gang gi phyir de ltar na sdug par gdags pa la /
mi sdug pa zhes bya bar ltos par bya ba dngos po 'brel ba can gzhan yod pa ma yin pa de'i phyir sdug pa 'thad ma yin /
thung ngu med pas ring po 'am /
pha rol med pas tshu rol mi 'thad pa bzhin no zhes dgongs pa yin no /
idānīmaśubhamapi yathā na saṃbhavati, tathā pratipādayannāha da ni mi sdug pa ni ji ltar yod pa ma yin pa de ltar bstan pa'i phyir /
anapekṣyāśubhaṃ nāsti śubhaṃ prajñapayemahi gang la brten nas mi sdug par /
gdags par bya ba sdug pa ni /
yatpratītyāśubhaṃ tasmādaśubhaṃ naiva vidyate mi sdug ma ltos yod min pas /
de phyir mi sdug 'thad ma yin /
zhes gsungs te /
yadi hi aśubhaṃ nāma kiṃcit syāt, niyatameva tacchubhamapekṣya bhavet, pārāvāravat, hrasvadīrghavadvā, aśubhasya saṃbandhyantarapadārthasāpekṣatvāt gal te mi sdug pa zhes bya ba 'ga' zhig yod na ni /
mi sdug pa dngos po 'brel pa can gzhan la ltos pa'i phyir de nges par ring thung ngam pha rol dang tshu rol ltar sdug pa la ltos par 'gyur na /
sdug pa gang la brten zhing sdug pa gang la ltos nas mi sdug pa zhes gdags par bya zhing /
taccāpyapekṣaṇīyaṃ śubhamaśubhena vinā nāsti, anapekṣyāśubhaṃ nāsti śubham rnam par gzhag par bya ba ltos par bya ba sdug pa de yang mi sdug pa med par yod pa ma yin zhing /
aśubhaṃ nirapekṣya śubhaṃ na saṃbhavatītyabhiprāyaḥ mi sdug pa la ma ltos par sdug par yod pa ma yin te /
yacchubhaṃ pratītya yacchubhamapekṣya aśubhaṃ prajñapayemahi, aśubhaṃ vyavasthāpayemahi /
atrāpi yacchabdena anantarasya śubhasya parāmarśaḥ 		mi sdug pa la ltos pa med par /
sdug pa med pa yin no zhes bya ba'i don to /
'di yang gang la'i sgras ni mjug thogs kyi sdug pa gzung ngo /
prajñapayemahītyanena ca uttarasyāśubhasya saṃbandhaḥ gdags par bya ba zhes bya ba ni gong gi mi sdug pa dang sbyar ro /
yataścaivamaśubhasya prajñaptau saṃbandhyantaramapekṣaṇīyaṃ śubhākhyaṃ padārthāntaraṃ nāsti, tasmādaśubhaṃ naiva vidyate gang gi phyir de ltar na mi sdug par gdags pa la sdug pa zhes bya ba ltos par bya ba dngos po 'brel pa can gzhan yod pa ma yin pa /
de'i phyir mi sdug 'thad ma yin /
zhes bya'o /
yataścaivaṃ śubhāśubhayorasaṃbhavaḥ, ataḥ gang gi phyir de ltar sdug pa dang mi sdug pa dag yod pa ma yin pa de'i phyir /
avidyamāne ca śubhe kuto rāgo bhaviṣyati sdug pa yod pa ma yin na /
'dod chags yod par ga la 'gyur /
aśubhe 'vidyamāne ca kuto dveṣo bhaviṣyati mi sdug yod pa ma yin na /
zhe sdang 'byung bar ga la 'gyur /
śubhāśubhanimittakayo rāgadveṣayoḥ śubhāśubhanimittābhāve sati nirhetukatvānnāsti saṃbhava ityabhiprāyaḥ sdug pa dang mi sdug pa'i mtshan ma med na rgyu med pa'i phyir sdug pa dang mi sdug pa'i mtshan ma'i rgyu can gyi 'dod chags dang zhe sdang dag kyang yod pa ma yin no zhes bya bar dgongs pa'o /
tadevaṃ śubhāśubhanimittābhāvena rāgadveṣayorabhāvamupapādya viparyāsasvabhāvābhāvapratipādanena mohasyāpyadhunā svabhāvābhāvaṃ pratipādayannāha de'i phyir de ltar sdug pa dang mi sdug pa'i mtshan ma med pas 'dod chags dang zhe sdang gnyis med par bstan nas /
da ni phyin ci log med par bstan pa'i sgo nas gti mug kyang med par bstan pa'i phyir /
anitye nityamityevaṃ yadi grāho viparyayaḥ gal te mi rtag rtag pa zhes /
de ltar 'dzin pa log yin na /
nānityaṃ vidyate śūnye kuto grāho viparyayaḥ stong la mi rtag yod min pas /
'dzin pa ji ltar log ma yin /
iha catvāro viparyāsā ucyante zhes gsungs te /
'dir phyin ci log ni bzhir brjod do /
tadyathā /
anitye pratikṣaṇavināśini skandhapañcake yo nityamiti grāhaḥ, sa viparyāsaḥ 		'di lta ste phung po lnga po skad cig re re la 'jig cing mi rtag pa la rtag go snyam du 'dzin pa gang yin pa de ni phyin ci log yin no /
tathā /
anityasya dhruvā pīḍā pīḍā yasya na tatsukham 		de bzhin du /
mi rtag pa la nges par gnod /
gang la gnod yod de bde min /
tasmādanityaṃ yatsarvaṃ duḥkhaṃ taditi jāyate /
ityamunā nyāyena yadanityaṃ tadduḥkham, sarvasaṃskārāśca anityāḥ, tasmādduḥkhātmake skandhapañcake yaḥ sukhamiti viparīto grāhaḥ, so 'paro viparyāsaḥ 		de phyir gang zhig mi rtag pa /
de ni thams cad sdug bsngal 'gyur /
zhes bya ba'i tshul 'dis mi rtag pa gang yin pa de ni sdug bsngal ba yin la /
