'du byed thams cad kyang mi rtag pa yin te /
de'i phyir phung po lnga po sdug bsngal gyi bdag nyid can la /
bde ba'o snyam du log par 'dzin pa gang yin pa de ni phyin ci log gzhan yin no /
tathā /
śukraśoṇitasaṃparkabījaṃ viṇmūtravardhitam /
amedhyarūpamājānan rajyase 'tra kayecchayā /
amedhyapuñjapracchanne tatkledārdreṇa carmaṇā /
yaḥ śayīta sa nārīṇāṃ śayīta jaghanodare /
ityādi /
evamidaṃ śarīraṃ sarvātmanā satatamaśucisvabhāvam 		de bzhin du /
khu khrag phrad pa'i sa bon can /
bshad dang gci bas bskyed gyur zhing /
mi gtsang rang bzhin shes bzhin du /
'dod pa gang gis de la chags /
zhes bya ba de ltar rtag tu lus 'di bdag nyid thams cad du mi gtsang ba yin bzhin du rmongs pas de la gtsang ba nyid du 'dzin pa gang yin pa de ni phyin ci log yin no /
tatra yo mohācchucitvena grāho 'bhiniveśaḥ, sa viparyāsaḥ /
tathā pañcaskandhakamātmalakṣaṇavilakṣaṇamasthiratvādudayavyayadharmitvācca nirātmakamātmasvabhāvaśūnyam, tasmin ya ātmagrāho 'bhiniveśaḥ anātmani ātmābhiniveśaḥ, sa viparyāsaḥ 		de bzhin du phung po lnga po bdag gi mtshan nyid dang mi mthun pa mi rtag pa'i phyir dang /
skye zhing 'jig pa'i chos can yin pa'i phyir /
bdag med cing bdag gi rang bzhin gyis stong bzhin du /
de la rtag tu 'dzin pa de ni bdag med pa la bdag tu mngon par zhen pa'i phyin ci log yin no /
ityete catvāro viparyāsāḥ saṃmohasya hetubhūtāḥ /
atredānīṃ vicāryate 		de ltar na phyin ci log bzhi po de dag ni gti mug gi rgyur gyur pa yin no; ;da ni 'dir 'di dpyad par bya ste /
yadi nityatvaṃ nityadarśanaṃ svabhāvaśūnyeṣu nityagrāho viparyāsa ityevaṃ vyavasthāpyate, nanu ca svabhāvaśūnyeṣu skandheṣu anityatvamapi nāsti, iti gal te phung po rtag pa nyid kyis stong pa dag la rtag par 'dzin pa log pa ste /
phyin ci log yin no zhes de ltar rnam par 'jog na /
phung po rang bzhin gyis stong pa la mi rtag pa yang med pa ma yin nam /
de'i phyir /
nānityaṃ vidyate śūnye kuto grāho viparyayaḥ stong la mi rtag yod min pas /
'dzin pa ji ltar log pa yin /
anityatvaṃ hi viparītamapekṣya nityatvaṃ viparyāsa iti vyavasthāpyate 'di ltar phyin ci ma log pa'i mi rtag pa nyid la ltos nas rtag pa phyin ci log yin no zhes bya bar gzhag pa yin na /
na ca anityatvaṃ vidyate śūnye /
yadā anityatvasyābhāvaḥ, tadā kutastadvirodhi nityatvaṃ nityadarśanaviparyāso bhaviṣyatīti bhāvaḥ /
tasmānnāsti viparyāsaḥ /
yathā ca anityatvaṃ śūnye na saṃbhavati bhāvasvabhāvarahite sasvabhāvena anutpanne, evaṃ duḥkhatvamapi na saṃbhavati, aśucitvamapi nāsti /
anātmakatvamapi nāsti 		gang gi tshe stong pa la mi rtag pa nyid yod pa ma yin pa de'i tshe mi rtag pa nyid med pas de dang 'gal ba'i rtag pa nyid phyin ci log tu ga la 'gyur /
de'i phyir phyin ci log med do /
ji ltar rang bzhin dang bral zhing rang bzhin gyis ma skyes pa'i stong pa la mi rtag pa nyid med pa de bzhin du sdug bsngal pa yang med cing mi gtsang ba yang med la bdag med pa yang yod pa ma yin no /
yadā ca svabhāvaśūnyatvādduḥkhatvādikaṃ nāsti, tadā kutastadvipakṣabhūtā nityasukhaśucyātmaviparyāsā bhaviṣyanti? tasmāt santi viparyāsāḥ svarūpataḥ gang gi tshe rang bzhin gyis stong pas sdug bsngal la sogs pa med pa de'i tshe de dag gi mi mthun pa'i phyogs su gyur pa'i rtag pa dang bde ba dang gtsang ba dang bdag kyang phyin ci log tu lta ga la 'gyur /
de'i phyir phyin ci log rang bzhin gyis med do /
tadabhāve kuto bhaviṣyatyavidyā? hetvabhāvāt /
yathoktaṃ bhagavatā 		de med pa'i phyir na ma rig pa yod par ga la 'gyur te /
rgyu med pa'i phyir ro /
ji skad du bcom ldan 'das kyis /
avidyayā naiva kadāci vidyate avidyata pratyayasaṃbhavaśca ma rig pa dang ma rig rkyen byung gang /
nam yod yod par 'gyur ba ma yin te /
avidyamāneyamavidya loke tasmānmayā ukta avidya eṣā ma rig pa de 'jig rten yod min pa /
de yi phyir na ngas 'di ma rig gsungs /
tathā /
kathaṃ bhagavan moho dhāraṇīpadam? bhagavānāha 		zhes bya ba dang de bzhin du /
bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na gti mug gzungs kyi tshig lags /
atyantamukto hi mañjuśrīḥ mohaḥ, tenocyate mohaḥ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
'jam dpal gti mug ni rab tu grol ba ste /
ityādinā viparyaya iti vyavasthāpyate /
nanu evaṃ sati svabhāvena avidyamāne padārthe anityamityapi grāho na saṃbhavati iti asāvapi kasmānna viparyāsa iti vyavasthāpyate iti pratipādayannāha 		des na gti mug ces bya'o zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs so /
gzhan yang gal te yang dag pa ma yin pa nyid kyi phyir /
mi rtag pa la rtag go zhes bya ba de ltar 'dzin pa phyin ci log yin no zhes bya bar rnam par 'jog na /
de lta na dngos po rang bzhin gyis yod pa ma yin pa la mi rtag pa'o snyam du 'dzin pa yang yod pa ma yin pas 'di yang ci'i phyir phyin ci log ma yin par rnam par gzhag ces bstan pa'i phyir /
anitye nityamityevaṃ yadi grāho viparyayaḥ /
anityamityapi grāhaḥ śūnye kiṃ na viparyayaḥ 		gal te mi rtag rtag go zhes /
de ltar 'dzin pa log yin na /
stong la mi rtag pa'o zhes /
'dzin pa'ang ji ltar log ma yin /
zhes gsungs te /
yadā ca ubhayasyāpi vaiparītyaṃ nityasya anityasya ca, tadā tadvayatiriktaṃ tṛtīyamaparaṃ nāsti yanna viparyayaḥ syāt gang gi tshe rtag pa nyid dang mi rtag pa nyid gnyi ga yang phyin ci log yin pa de'i tshe /
gang gi tshe phyin ci ma log par 'gyur ba /
de dag las tha dad pa gsum las gzhan yod pa ma yin la /
yadā ca aviparyāso nāsti, tadā kimapekṣo viparyāsaḥ syāditi gang gi tshe phyin ci ma log pa yod pa ma yin pa de'i tshe ci la ltos nas phyin ci log tu 'gyur /
tasmādamunāpi nyāyena nāsti viparyayaḥ /
tasyābhāvācca nāstyavidyā svarūpataḥ 		de'i phyir rigs pa 'dis kyang phyin ci log yod pa ma yin no /
de med pa'i phyir ma rig pa med do /
yathā ca anitye nityamityevaṃ grāho viparyāso na saṃbhavati, evaṃ śeṣaviparyāsāsaṃbhave 'pi yojyam /
ata evoktaṃ bhagavatā āryadṛḍhāśayaparipṛcchāyām 		ji ltar mi rtag pa la rtag pa'o zhes bya bar 'dzin pa 'di phyin ci log tu mi 'gyur ba de bzhin du phyin ci log lhag ma yod pa ma yin pa la yang sbyar bar bya'o /
de nyid kyi phyir bcom ldan 'das kyis 'phags pa lhag pa'i bsam pa brtan pas zhus pa las /
bhagavānāha /
kimetat kulaputra tasya bhavati yo mārgeṇa niḥsaraṇaṃ paryeṣate? na kulaputra tathāgatena rañjanīyān dharmān parivarjya rāgaprahāṇaṃ prajñaptam, evaṃ na doṣaṇīyān mohanīyāna dharmān parivarjya tathāgatena doṣamohaprahāṇaṃ prajñaptam 		bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
rigs kyi bu gang lam gyi nges par 'byung ba yongs su tshol ba de ni de bzhin te /
rigs kyi bu de bzhin gshegs pas ni chags par 'gyur pa'i chos rnams spangs pas 'dod chags spangs par ma gsungs so /
de bzhin du zhe sdang bar 'gyur ba dang gti mug par 'gyur pa'i chos rnams spangs nas de bzhin gshegs pas zhe sdang dang gti mug spang bar ma gsungs so /
de ci'i phyir zhe na /
tat kasmāddhetoḥ? na kulaputra tathāgatāḥ kasyaciddharmasya utsargāya vā pratilambhāya vā dharmaṃ deśayanti na parijñāyai na prahāṇāya na sākṣātkriyāyai nābhisamayāya na saṃsāracaraṇatāyai na nirvāṇagamanatāyai notkṣepāya na prabhedāya rigs kyi bu de bzhin gshegs pas ni chos gang yang dor bar bya ba'am thob par bya ba'i phyir chos mi ston to /
yongs su shes par bya ba dang yongs su spang bar bya ba dang bsgom par bya ba dang mngon sum du bya ba dang mngon par rtogs par bya ba dang 'khor ba las bskyod par bya ba dang mya ngan las 'das par 'gro bar bya ba dang bsal bar bya ba dang gzhag par bya ba dang dbye bar bya ba'i phyir chos mi ston to /
na hi kulaputra dvayaprabhāvitā tathāgatadharmatā rigs kyi bu gnyis su dbye ba ni de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi chos nyid ma yin no /
tatra ye dvaye caranti, na te samyakprayuktāḥ gnyis la spyod pa gang yin pa de dag ni yang dag pa la zhugs pa ma yin no /
mithyāprayuktāste vaktavyāḥ rigs kyi bu gnyis gang zhe na /
katamacca kulaputra dvayam? ahaṃ rāgaṃ prahāsyāmīti dvayametat bdag gis 'dod chags spang bar bya'o snyam pa 'di ni gnyis so /
ahaṃ dveṣaṃ prahāsyāmīti dvayametat bdag gis zhe sdang spang par bya'o snyam pa 'di ni gnyis so /
ahaṃ mohaṃ prahāsyāmīti dvayametat bdag gis gti mug spang bar bya'o snyam pa 'di ni gnyis so /
ye evaṃprayuktāḥ, na te samyakprayuktā de ltar sbyor ba gang yin pa de dag ni yang dag pa la zhugs pa ma yin te /
mithyāprayuktāste veditavyāḥ /
tadyathāpi nāma kulaputra kaścideva puruṣo māyākāranāṭake pratyupasthite māyākāranirmitāṃ striyaṃ dṛṣṭvā rāgacittamutpādayet 		de dag ni log par zhugs pa rig par bya'o /
rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste /
dper na mi la la zhig gis sgyu ma mkhan gyi rol mo byung ba'i tshe /
sgyu ma mkhan gyis sprul pa'i bud med mthong nas 'dod chags kyi sems bskyed de /
sa rāgaparītacittaḥ parṣacchāradyabhayena utthāyāsanādapakramet /
so 'pakramya tāmeva striyamaśubhato manasi kuryādanityato duḥkhataḥ śūnyato 'nātmato manasi kuryāt 		de 'dod chags kyis sems dkris nas 'khor gyis 'jigs nas bag tsha ste /
stan las langs nas song ste de song nas bud med de nyid la mi sdug par yid la byed cing /
mi rtag pa dang sdug bsngal ba dang stong pa dang bdag med par yid la byed na /
rigs kyi bu de ji snyam du sems /
mi de yang dag par zhugs pa yin nam /
'on te log par zhugs pa yin /
bhagavānāha /
evameva kulaputra ihaike bhikṣubhikṣuṇyupāsakopāsikā draṣṭavyāḥ, ye 'nutpannān dharmānajātānaśubhato manasi kurvanti, anityato duḥkhato 'nātmato manasi kurvanti /
nāhaṃ teṣāṃ mohapuruṣāṇāṃ mārgabhāvanāṃ vadāmi /
mithyāprayuktāste veditavyāḥ /
tadyathāpi nāma kulaputra kaścideva puruṣaḥ suptaḥ svapnāntare svagṛhe rājabhāryāṃ paśyet /
sa tayā sārdhaṃ śayyāṃ kalpayet 		gsol pa /
bcom ldan 'das gang bud med ma mchis pa la mi sdug par yid la bgyid cing /
mi rtag pa dang sdug bsngal pa dang stong pa dang bdag med par yid la bgyid pa'i mi de'i mngon par brtson pa de ni log pa lags so /
bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
rigs kyi bu 'di na dge slong dang dge slong ma dang dge bsnyen dang dge bsnyen ma kha cig ma skyes shing ma byung ba'i chos rnams la mi sdug par yid la byed cing mi rtag pa dang sdug bsngal ba dang stong pa dang bdag med par yid la byed pa gang yin pa de dag kyang de dang 'dra bar blta bar bya'o /
nga ni mi blun po de dag lam sgom pa yin no zhes mi smra ste /
de dag ni log par zhugs pa zhes bya'o /
rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste /
dper na mi la la zhig gnyid log pa'i rmi lam du bdag gi khyim du rgyal po'i btsun mo 'ong ba mthong nas de dang lhan cig nyal bar byed de /
smṛtisaṃmoṣāccaivaṃ kalpayet /
viruddho 'smīti 		dran pa nyams pa'i phyir bdag nyid ni sad do snyam du de ltar sems nas /
rgyal pos ma tshor grang /
sa bhītasrastaḥ palāyet, mā māṃ rājā vidhyet, sa mā māṃ jīvitād vyavaropayet des bdag bsad du 'ong ngo snyam nas 'jigs shing skrag ste bros na /
'di ji snyam du sems /
tat kiṃ manyase kulaputra api nu sa puruṣo bhītasrastaḥ palāyamānastato rājabhāryānidānabhayātparimucyeta? āha ci mi de 'jigs shing skrag ste bros pas rgyal po'i btsun mo'i 'jigs pa de las thar bar 'gyur ram /
gsol pa bcom ldan 'das de ni de ltar ma lags so /
no bhagavan de ci'i slad du zhe na /
tatkasya hetoḥ? tathā hi bhagavaṃstena puruṣeṇa astriyāṃ strīsaṃjñā utpāditā, abhūtaṃ ca parikalpitam bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar mi des bud med ma mchis par bud med kyi 'du shes bskyed de yang dag pa ma lags par kun brtags pa'i slad du'o /
bhagavānāha /
evameva kulaputra ihaike bhikṣubhikṣuṇyupāsakopāsikā draṣṭavyāḥ, ye arāge rāgasaṃjñāmutpādya rāgabhayabhītā rāganiḥsaraṇaṃ paryeṣante /
evamadoṣe doṣasaṃjñāmutpādya doṣabhayabhītā doṣaniḥsaraṇaṃ paryeṣante 		bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
rigs kyi bu 'di na dge slong dang dge slong ma dang dge bsnyen dang dge bsnyen ma kha cig 'dod chags med pa la 'dod chags kyi 'du shes bskyed nas /
'dod chags kyi 'jigs pas skrag ste 'dod chags las nges par 'byung ba yongs su tshol ba dang de bzhin du zhe sdang med par zhe sdang gi 'du shes bskyed gti mug med par gti mug gi 'du shes bskyed nas gti mug gi 'jigs pas skrag ste /
amohe mohasaṃjñāmutpādya mohabhayabhītā mohaniḥsaraṇaṃ paryeṣante gti mug las nges par 'byung ba yongs su tshol ba rnams kyang de dang 'dra bar blta bar bya'o /
nāhaṃ teṣāṃ mohapuruṣāṇāṃ mārgabhāvanāṃ vadāmi da ni mi blun po de dag la lam sgom pa yin no zhes mi smra ste /
mithyāprayuktāste veditavyāḥ de dag ni log par zhugs pa zhes bya'o /
tadyathāpi nāma kulaputra sa puruṣaḥ abhaye bhayasaṃjñāmutpādayedasatsamāropeṇa rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na mi des med bzhin du sgro btags pas 'jigs pa med pa la 'jigs pa'i 'du shes bskyed pa de bzhin du /
evameva kulaputra sarvabālapṛthagjanā rāgakoṭiṃ virāgakoṭimaprajānanto rāgakoṭibhayabhītā virāgakoṭiṃ niḥsaraṇaṃ paryeṣante rigs kyi bu byis pa so so'i skye bo rnams ni 'dod chags kyi mtha' ma shes nas 'dod chags kyi yod pa'i mtha'i 'jigs pas skrag ste /
'dod chags kyi mtha' las nges par 'byung ba tshol lo /
doṣakoṭimakiṃcanakoṭimaprajānanto doṣakoṭibhayabhītā akiṃcanakoṭiṃ niḥsaraṇaṃ paryeṣante zhe sdang gi mtha' ci yang med pa'i mtha' ma shes nas zhe sdang gi mtha'i 'jigs pas skrag cing ci yang med pa'i mtha' la nges par 'byung bar yongs su tshol lo /
mohakoṭiṃ śūnyatākoṭimaprajānanto mohakoṭibhayabhītāḥ śūnyatākoṭiṃ niḥsaraṇaṃ paryeṣante gti mug gi mtha' stong pa nyid kyi mtha' ma shes nas gti mug gi mtha'i 'jigs pas skrag ste /
stong pa nyid kyi mtha' las nges par 'byung ba yongs su tshol bar byed do /
nāhaṃ teṣāṃ kulaputra mohapuruṣāṇāṃ mārgabhāvanāṃ vadāmi da ni mi blun po de dag la lam sgom pa yin no zhes mi smra ste /
mithyāprayuktāste veditavyāḥ /
iti vistaraḥ 		de dag ni log par zhugs pa zhes bya'o zhes rgya cher gsungs so /
atrāha /
yadyapi anitye nityamityevaṃ grāho viparyayo na saṃbhavati, tathāpi eṣa tāvat grāho 'sti 		'dir smras pa /
gal te yang rtag pa'o zhes bya ba de ltar 'dzin pa'i phyin ci log yod pa ma yin pa de ltar na yang re zhig 'dzin pa de ni yod pa ma yin no /
grāhaśca nāma saṃgrahaṇaṃ bhāvarūpaḥ /
tasya ca avaśyaṃ sādhanena karaṇena bhavitavyaṃ sādhakatamena nityatvādinā 		'dzin pa zhes bya ba ni 'dzin pa ste /
dngos po bya ba'i rang bzhin can yin no /
de la yang gdon mi za bar sgrub byed rtag pa nyid la sogs pa byed pa yod par 'gyur dgos la /
kartrā ca bhavitavyaṃ svatantreṇa nityātmanā cittena vā /
karmaṇā ca karturīpsitatamena viṣayeṇa rūpādinā /
satyāṃ ca bhāvakaraṇakartṛkarmaṇāṃ siddhau sarvasiddheriṣṭasiddhiḥ syādasmākamiti 		bdag gam sems can kyang rung ste byed pa po yang yod dgos shing /
gzugs la sogs pa'i yul las kyang yod dgos so /
dngos po bya ba dang byed pa dang byed pa po dang las rnams grub pa yin na ni thams cad grub pas kho bo cag gi 'dod pa grub bo /
ucyate /
alīkeyaṃ pratyāśā /
nanu ca yathopavarṇitena nyāyena /
yena gṛhṇāti yogrāho grahītā yacca gṛhyate 		brjod par bya ste /
khyod kyi reg pa 'di ni brdzun pa yin te /
ji skad bshad pa'i tshul gyis /
gang gis 'dzin dang 'dzin gang dang 'dzin pa po dang gang gzung ba /
upaśāntāni sarvāṇi tasmādgrāho na vidyate /
iha hi kaścid grahītā yena viśeṣeṇa nityatvādinā karaṇabhūtena kiṃcit karmabhūtaṃ rūpaśabdādikaṃ vastu gṛhṇāti, tadyathā na saṃbhavati tathā pūrvaṃ pratipāditam /
kathaṃ kṛtvā? 		thams cad nye bar zhi ba ste /
de phyir 'dzin pa yod ma yin /
'dir 'dzin pa po 'ga' zhig rtag pa nyid la sogs pa'i khyad par byed par 'gyur ba gang zhig gzugs dang sgra la sogs pa'i dngos po las su gyur pa cung zad cig 'dzin par byed pa de ji ltar yod pa ma yin pa de ltar ni sngar bstan zin to /
ji ltar zhe na /
anitye nityamityevaṃ yadi grāho viparyayaḥ /
ityādinā yathā nityatvādikaṃ karaṇaṃ na saṃbhavati, tathā pratipāditam /
grahītāpi yathā nāsti, tathā 		ji ltar rtag pa nyid la sogs pa'i byed pa po yod pa ma yin pa de ltar ni /
gal te mi rtag rtag pa zhes /
de ltar 'dzin pa log yin na /
zhes bya ba la sogs pas bstan la /
ji ltar 'dzin pa po med pa de ltar ni /
ātmano 'stitvanāstitve na kathaṃcicca sidhyataḥ /
ityanena pratipāditam 		bdag gi yod nyid med nyid ni /
ji lta bur yang grub pa med /
ces bya ba 'dis bstan pa yin zhing /
yacca gṛhyate tadapi nāsti tathā /
rūpaśabdarasasparśā gandhā dharmāśca kevalāḥ 		gang gzung bar bya ba de yang ji ltar med pa de ltar ni /
gzugs sgra ro dang reg pa dang /
dri dang chos dag 'ba' zhig ste /
ityanena pratipāditam zhes bya bas bstan pa yin no /
yadā caivaṃ kartṛkaraṇakarmāṇi na siddhāni, tadā kuto nirhetuko grāho bhaviṣyati? tataśca gang gi tshe de ltar byed pa po dang byed pa dang las dag ma grub pa de'i tshe go rgyu med pa'i 'dzin pa yod par ga la 'gyur /
de'i phyir /
yena gṛhṇāti yo grāho grahītā yacca gṛhyate gang gis 'dzin dang 'dzin gang dang /
'dzin pa po dang gang gzung ba /
upaśāntāni sarvāṇi thams cad nye bar zhi ba ste /
svabhāvena anutpannatvānirvṛtāni sarvāṇītyarthaḥ rang bzhin gyis ma skyes pa'i phyir thams cad mya ngan las 'das pa yin no zhes bya ba'i don to /
yataśca evamevam gang gi phyir 'di de ltar yin pa /
tasmād grāho na vidyate /
athavā 		de phyir 'dzin pa yod pa ma yin no /
pratyayaparīkṣādibhiḥ prakaraṇairyasmāt sarveṣāmeva karaṇakartṛkarmaṇāṃ sarvathānutpādaḥ pratipāditaḥ, tasmāt sarvāṇyetāni bhāvasvarūpavirahādupaśāntāni rnam pa gcig tu na gang gi phyir rkyen brtag pa la sogs pa'i rab tu byed pa rnams kyi byed pa dang dngos po dang byed pa po dang las thams cad rnam pa thams cad du ma skyes par bstan pa de'i phyir /
'di dag thams cad nye bar zhi ba yin te /
ataśca grāho na vidyate de'i phyir 'dzin pa yod pa ma yin no zhes bya ba'o /
atrāha /
vidyanta eva viparyayāḥ, viparītasadbhāvāt 		'dir smras pa /
phyin ci log dag ni yod pa nyid de /
phyin ci log dang ldan pa yod pa'i phyir ro /
iha hi viparyāsānugato devadatto nāma vidyate /
na ca vinā viparyāsaiḥ sa viparyāsānugataḥ saṃbhavati /
tasmāt santi viparyāsāḥ viparyastasadbhāvāditi 		'di na phyin ci log dang ldan pa'i lha sbyin yod pa ma yin la /
phyin ci log dag med par ni phyin ci log dang ldan pa srid pa ma yin no /
de'i phyir phyin ci log yod pa ma yin no /
ucyate /
iha asmābhiḥ karaṇakartṛkarmaṇāmabhāvāt sarvathā grāha eva nāstīti pratipāditam 		brjod par bya ste /
'dir byed pa dang byed pa po dang las rnams ni med pas 'dzin pa nyid rnam par thams cad du yod pa ma yin no zhes ni kho bo cag gis bshad zin to /
tataśca /
avidyamāne grāhe ca mithyā vā samyageva vā 		de'i phyir /
log pa'am yang dag nyid du ni /
'dzin pa yod pa ma yin na /
bhavedviparyayaḥ kasya bhavetkasyāviparyayaḥ /
samyagvā mithyā vā kasyacit kiṃcidapyagṛhṇataḥ kuto viparītatvamaviparītatvaṃ veti 		gang la phyin ci log yod cing; ;gang la phyin ci ma log yod /
'ga' zhig cung zad kyang log pa'am yang dag par mi 'dzin pa la phyin ci log nyid dang phyin ci ma log pa nyid ces bya ba ga la yod /
tasmānna santi viparyayāḥ /
api ca /
ime viparyayāḥ kasyacidiṣyamāṇāḥ viparītasya parikalpyeran, aviparītasya vā, viparyasyamānasya vā? sarvathā ca nopapadyante iti pratipādayannāha 		de'i phyir phyin ci log dag med do /
gzhan yang phyin ci log 'di dag 'ga' zhig la 'dod na ni /
phyin ci log tu gyur pa zhig la brtag gam /
phyin ci log tu ma gyur ba zhig gam /
phyin ci log tu 'gyur bzhin pa zhig la brtag grang na /
rnam pa thams cad du 'thad pa ma yin no zhes bstan pa'i phyir /
na cāpi viparītasya saṃbhavanti viparyayāḥ phyin ci log tu 'gyur pa la /
phyin ci log dag mi srid de /
phyin ci log tu ma gyur la /
na cāpyaviparītasya saṃbhavanti viparyayāḥ phyin ci log dag mi srid do /
phyin ci log tu 'gyur bzhin la'ang /
na viparyasyamānasya saṃbhavanti viparyayāḥ phyin ci log dag mi srid do /
gang la phyin ci log srid pa /
vimṛśasva svayaṃ kasya saṃbhavanti viparyayāḥ bdag nyid kyis ni rnam par dpyod /
ces bya ba gsungs so /
de la /
tatra tāvadviparītasya viparyayā na saṃbhavanti re zhig phyin ci log tu gyur pa la /
phyin ci log dag mi srid do /
ci'i phyir zhe na /
kiṃ kāraṇam? yasmāt, yo hi viparīta, sa viparīta eva 'di ltar /
gang zhig phyin ci log tu gyur pa de ni phyin ci log tu gyur zin pa nyid yin na /
kiṃ tasya punarapi viparyayasaṃbandhaḥ kuryāt? niṣprayojanatvāt de la yang phyin ci log dang 'brel pas ci zhig bya ste /
dgos pa med pa'i phyir ro /
aviparītasyāpi viparyayā na yujyante, vibuddhabuddhinayanānāmapi ajñānanidrātimiropaśamād buddhānāṃ viparyayaprasaṅgāt phyin ci log tu gyur pa la yang phyin ci log dag mi rigs te /
mi shes pa'i gnyid dang bral bas blo gros kyi spyan rgyas pa sangs rgyas rnams la yang phyin ci log yod par thal bar 'gyur pa'i phyir ro /
tathā viparyasyamānasyāpi na santi viparyayāḥ, viparyasyamānasya bhāvasya abhāvāt de bzhin du phyin ci log tu 'gyur bzhin pa la yang phyin ci log dag yod pa ma yin te /
phyin ci log par 'gyur bzhin pa med pa'i phyir te /
ko hi nāma asāvaparaḥ padārthaḥ, yo viparītāviparītavinirmukto viparyasyamāno nāma bhaviṣyati? ardhaviparīto viparyasyamāna iti cet, ardhaviparīto hi nāma yasya kiṃcidviparītaṃ kiṃcidaviparītam gang zhig phyin ci log tu gyur ba dang phyin ci log tu ma gyur pa las ma gtogs pa phyin ci log bzhin pa zhes bya ba'i dngos po gzhan po de gang zhig yod par 'gyur /
phyin ci log tu 'gyur bzhin pa ni phyed phyin ci log pa yin no zhe na /
phyed phyin ci log pa zhes bya ba ni gang zhig cung zad cig phyin ci log tu gyur cing /
cung zad cig phyin ci log tu ma gyur pa yin na /
tatra yadasya kiṃcidviparītaṃ tadviparyāso na viparyāsayati, viparyastatvāt de la 'di'i cung zad cig phyin ci log tu gyur pa gang yin pa de la ni phyin ci log gis phyin ci log tu byed pa ma yin te /
phyin ci log tu gyur zin pa'i phyir ro /
yadapyasya aviparītam, tadapi viparyāso na viparyāsayati, aviparyastatvāt 'di'i cung zad cig phyin ci log tu ma gyur pa gang yin pa de yang phyin ci log gis phyin ci log tu byed pa ma yin te /
phyin ci log tu ma gyur pa'i phyir ro /
tasmādviparyasyamānasyāpi kasyacidviparyāsā na saṃbhavanti de'i phyir phyin ci log tu gyur bzhin pa 'ga' zhig la yang phyin ci log dag srid pa ma yin no /
yadā caivaṃ viparītāviparītaviparyasyamānā na saṃbhavanti, bhavānidānīṃ vimṛśatu svayaṃ prajñayā madhyasthaḥ san kasya saṃbhavanti viparyāsā iti phyin ci log tu gyur pa dang phyin ci log tu ma gyur pa dang phyin ci log tu 'gyur bzhin pa gang dag la de lta mi srid la mi srid pas da gang dag la phyin ci log dag srid ces bdag nyid gzu por gyur pas shes rab kyis rnam par dpyod cig /
tadevamāśrayasyābhāvānna santi viparyayāḥ de'i phyir de ltar na rten med pas kyang phyin ci log dag yod pa ma yin no /
kiṃ cānyat gzhan yang /
anutpannāḥ kathaṃ nāma bhaviṣyanti viparyayāḥ phyin ci log rnams ma skyes na /
ji lta bur na yod par 'gyur /
viparyayeṣvajāteṣu viparyayagataḥ kutaḥ /
tatra 		phyin ci log rnams skye med na /
phyin ci log can ga la yod /
de la /
na svato jāyate bhāvaḥ parato naiva jāyate dngos po bdag las mi skye ste /
gzhan las skyes pa nyid ma yin /
na svataḥ parataśceti viparyayagataḥ kutaḥ bdag dang gzhan las kyang min na /
phyin ci log can ga la yod /
kuto viparīta ityarthaḥ /
tataśca yaduktam /
santi viparyayāḥ viparyayagatasadbhāvāditi, tanna yuktam 		phyin ci log dang ldan pa ga la yod ces bya ba'i tha tshig go /
de'i phyir phyin ci log dag ni yod pa nyid de /
phyin ci log dang ldan pa yod pa'i phyir ro zhes gang smras pa de mi rigs so /
yasyāpi kathaṃcidviparyāsacatuṣṭayamastyevetyabhyupagamyate, tathāpi tasya viparītatvamaśakyamāsthātum ci ste yang phyin ci log bzhi po cung zad cig yod pa nyid du khas len na /
de lta na yang /
phyin ci log nyid du gzhag par mi nus so /
kiṃ kāraṇam? yasmāt /
ātmā ca śuci nityaṃna sukhaṃ ca yadi vidyate 		ci'i phyir zhe na /
'di ltar /
gal te bdag dang gtsang ba dang /
rtag dang bde ba yod na ni /
ātmā ca śuci nityaṃ ca sukhaṃ ca na viparyayaḥ bdag dang gtsang dang rtag pa dang /
bde ba phyin ci log ma yin /
yadi etāni ātmaśucinityasukhāni viparyāsā iti vyavasthāpyante, kimetāni santi, atha na santi? yadi vidyante, na tarhi viparyāsāḥ, vidyamānatvādanātmādivat gal te bdag dang gtsang ba dang rtag pa dang bde ba de dag phyin ci log yin no zhes bya bar rnam par 'jog na ni /
ci de dag yod dam 'on te med /
gal te yod na ni 'o na phyin ci log ma yin te /
yod pa'i phyir bdag med pa la sogs pa bzhin no /
atha na vidyante, tadā eṣāmavidyamānatvānna kevalaṃ nāsti viparyāsatvam, viparyāsapratibandhyabhāvādanātmādīnāmapi aviparyāsādīnāṃ nāsti sadbhāva iti pratipādayannāha /
nātmā ca śuci nityaṃ ca sukhaṃ ca yadi vidyate 		ci ste med na ni de'i tshe de dag med pa'i phyir phyin ci log nyid yod pa ma yin pa 'ba' zhig tu ma zad kyi /
'gal zla phyin ci log med pa'i phyir bdag med pa la sogs pa phyin ci log pa rnams kyang yod pa ma yin no zhes bstan pa'i phyir /
gal te bdag dang gtsang ba dang /
rtag dang bde ba med na ni /
anātmāśucyanityaṃ ca naiva duḥkhaṃ ca vidyate bdag med mi gtsang mi rtag dang /
sdug bsngal yod pa ma yin no /
zhes gsungs te /
yadi ātmā ca śuci nityaṃ ca na vidyate iti manyase, viparyāsāsaṃbhavāt, evaṃ sati ātmādīnāmapyabhāvād yadi etadanātmādikamaviparyāsatvena gṛhītam, tadapi tarhi tyajyatām, pratiṣedhyābhāve pratiṣedhasyābhāvāt gal te yod pa ma yin pa phyin ci log nyid du mi srid pas bdag dang gtsang ba dang rtag pa dang bde ba med do snyam du sems na /
de lta yin na 'o na bdag la sogs pa rnams yod pa ma yin pa'i phyir gang bdag med pa la sogs pa phyin ci ma log pa nyid du gzung ba de yang dor bar bya ste /
dgag bya med na bkag pa med pa'i phyir ro /
yadā caivamanātmādikaṃ na saṃbhavati, tadā tadapi svarūpato 'vidyamānatvāt ātmādivat kathaṃ na viparyāsaḥ syāt? tasmāt jātijarāmaraṇasaṃsāracārakāgārabandhanānmumukṣubhiraṣṭāvapyete viparyāsāstyājyāḥ gang gi tshe de ltar bdag med pa la sogs pa yod pa ma yin pa de'i tshe de yang rang gi ngo bos grub pa med pa'i phyir bdag la sogs pa ltar ji ltar phyin ci log tu mi 'gyur /
de'i phyir thar pa 'dod pa rnams phyin ci log de dag brgyad char yang spang bar bya'o /
asya ca yathopavarṇitaviparyāsavicārasya avidyādiprahāṇahetutvena mahārthatāṃ pratipādayannāha phyin ci log rnam par dpyod pa 'di dag ji skad du bshad pa 'di ni ma rig pa la sogs pa spang ba'i rgyu nyid yin pas don chen po can nyid yin par bstan pa'i phyir /
evaṃ nirudhyate 'vidyā viparyayanirodhanāt de ltar phyin ci log 'gags pas /
ma rig pa ni 'gag par 'gyur /
avidyāyāṃ niruddhāyāṃ saṃskārādyaṃ nirudhyate ma rig 'gags par gyur na ni /
'du byed la sogs 'gag par 'gyur /
zhes gsungs te /
yadā ayaṃ yogī yathoditena nyāyena viparyāsān nopalabhate, tadā evaṃ viparyāsānupalambhanena taddhetukā avidyā nirudhyate /
tannirodhācca saṃskārādayaḥ avidyāhetukā jarāmaraṇaśokaparidevaduḥkhadaurmanasyopāyāsaparyantā dharmā nirudhyante /
avidyā hi sakalasyaiva saṃkleśagaṇasya jātyādiduḥkhasya ca hetubhūtā 		gang gi tshe rnal 'byor pa des ji skad bshad pa'i rigs pas phyin ci log ma dmigs pa de'i tshe /
de ltar phyin ci log ma dmigs pas de'i rgyu can gyi ma rig pa 'gag par 'gyur ro /
de 'gags pas ma rig pa'i rgyu can 'du byed la sogs pa rga shi'i mthar thug pa'i chos rnams 'gag par 'gyur te /
ma rig pa ni nyon mongs pa'i tshogs mtha' dag dang skye ba la sogs pa sdug bsngal gyi rgyur 'gyur ba'i phyir ro /
yathā hi kāyendriyahetukāni sarvāṇi rūpīndriyāṇi kāyendriye nirudhyamāne nirudhyante, evamavidyāhetukāni saṃskārādīni bhavāṅgāni pravartamānāni niyatamavidyāyāṃ niruddhāyāṃ nirudhyante iti pratipādayannāha ji ltar lus kyi dbang po'i rgyu can dbang po gzugs can thams cad ni lus kyi dbang po 'gags pa na 'gag par 'gyur ba de bzhin du /
'du byed la sogs pa ma rig pa'i rgyu can srid pa'i yan lag 'byung ba rnams ni nges par ma rig pa 'gags pa na 'gag par 'gyur ro zhes bstan pa'i phyir /
avidyāyāṃ niruddhāyāṃ saṃskārādyaṃ nirudhyate ma rig 'gags par gyur na ni /
'du byed la sogs 'gag par 'gyur /
iti /
atrāha /
yadi viparyāsanirodhādavidyā nirudhyate, asti tarhi avidyā yasyā evaṃ viparyāsanirodhānnirodho bhavati 		zhes gsungs pa yin no /
'dir smras pa /
gal te phyin ci log 'gags pas ma rig pa 'gag na /
'o na ni gang zhig de ltar phyin ci log 'gags pas 'gag par 'gyur ba /
na tarhi avidyamānāyā gaganacūtalatāyāḥ prahāṇopāyānveṣamasti /
tasmādvidyate eva avidyā, tannirodhopāyānveṣaṇasadbhāvāt 		ma rig pa yod pa yin te /
nam mkha'i aa mra'i lcug ma yod pa ma yin pa spang ba'i thabs tshol ba ni yod pa ma yin no /
de'i phyir ma rig pa yod pa yin te /
de 'gag pa'i thabs tshol ba yod pa'i phyir ro /
tataśca santi taddhetukā rāgādayaḥ kleśāḥ de'i phyir 'dod chags la sogs pa'i nyon mongs pa de'i rgyu can rnams yod pa yin la /
kleśāsadbhāvācca astyeva saṃsāre bhavasaṃtatiḥ nyon mongs pa yod pa'i phyir srid pa'i rgyun yang yod pa nyid do /
ucyate /
atra hi nāma atimahadanarthapāṇḍityaṃ parasya, yo hi nāma sarvātmanā atyantaduḥkhāyāsakleśāsamañjase saṃsāre nirantaraphullaphalapradasaṃkleśaviṣavṛkṣe parārthodayasaṃbaddhakakṣaiḥ sādhubhiḥ prajñopāyamahānilabalairniḥśeṣaṃ tadunmūlyamānairna kevalaṃ na sāhāyyenāvatiṣṭhante, api khalu tadunmūlakānāmatimahānilabalānāmiva bhāvasadbhāvavādamahāśailāyamāna ivātivirodhitayā avasthito bhavān āhopuruṣikayā tasyaiva kleśaviṣavṛkṣasya jātijarāmaraṇaśokāyāsavisaraduḥkhaikaphalasya sutarāṃ bhāvābhiniveśatoyāsravairāropaṇamādriyate /
api ca 		brjod par bya ste /
kye ma gang zhig dam pa gzhan gyi don 'byung ba la ci la yang rag ma las par ches pa rnams thabs dang shes rab kyi stobs kyis nyon mongs pa'i dug gi ljon shing chen po bdag nyid thams cad du sdug bsngal shin tu stobs pa ma lus pa drungs 'byin par mdzad pa la /
stobs 'debs par mi gnas pa 'ba' zhig tu ma zad kyi 'on kyang de drungs 'byin par mdzad pa rnams dang shin tu 'gal bar gnas shing gzu lums kyi nyon mongs pa'i dug gi ljon shing chen po de 'dzugs pa la ches shin tu gus pa ni /
pha rol po don ma yin pa la mkhas pa shin tu chen po nyid yin no /
yadi avidyādīnāṃ saṃkleśānāṃ prahāṇaṃ saṃbhavet, syāt tatprahāṇopāyānveṣaṇam gzhan yang gal te nyon mongs pa ma rig pa la sogs pa rnams spong ba yod na ni /
de spong ba'i thabs tshol bar 'gyur na /
na ca teṣāṃ prahāṇaṃ saṃbhavati /
yadi syāt, tadā tattvarūpato vidyamānānāṃ vā syāt, avidyamānānāṃ vā? kiṃ cātaḥ? tatra yadi svarūpataḥ sadbhatānāṃ kleśānāṃ prahāṇamiṣyate, tannopapadyate /
kiṃ kāraṇam? yasmāt 		de dag spong ba ni yod pa ma yin no /
ci'i phyir zhe na /
'di na gal te yod na ni /
de'i tshe rang gi ngo bos yod pa rnams la 'am /
yod pa ma yin pa rnams la yod par 'gyur ba zhig go /
de las cir 'gyur zhe na /
gal te nyon mongs pa rang bzhin ngo bos yod par gyur ba rnams spong bar 'dod na ni /
de mi 'thad do /
ci'i phyir zhe na /
yadi bhūtāḥ svabhāvena kleśāḥ keciddhi kasyacit /
kathaṃ nāma prahīyeran kaḥ svabhāvaṃ prahāsyati 		'di ltar /
gal te la la'i nyon mongs pa /
gang dag rang bzhin gyis yod na /
ji lta bur na spang bar 'gyur /
svabhāvato vidyamānānāṃ bhāvānāṃ na śakyaḥ svabhāvo vinivartayitum yod pa su zhig spong bar byed /
dngos po rang gi ngo bos yod pa rnams kyi rang bzhin ni bzlog par mi nus te /
na hi kṣityādīnāṃ kaṭhinatvādisvabhāvo nivartate sa la sogs pa rnams kyi rang bzhin sra ba la sogs pa rnams ni ldog pa ma yin no /
evaṃ yadi ime kleśāḥ svabhāvataḥ sadbhūtāḥ syuḥ /
kecidityavidyādayaḥ /
kasyaciditi pudgalasya /
kathaṃ nāma prahīyeran? naiva te kasyacit kathaṃcinnāma prahīyeran 		de bzhin du gal te la la ste gang zag gi gang dag ste ma rig pa la sogs pa'i nyon mongs pa 'di dag kyang rang bzhin gyis yod na ni ji lta bur na spong bar 'gyur te /
gang gis kyang spong bar mi 'gyur ba nyid do; ;yang ci'i phyir de dag ni spong zhe na /
kasmātpunaḥ na te prahīyante ityāha /
kaḥ svabhāvaṃ prahāsyatīti /
svabhāvasya vinivartayitumaśakyatvāt /
ākāśānāvaraṇavinivartanāsaṃbhavavadityabhiprāyaḥ 		yod pa su zhig spong bar byed /
ces gsungs te /
rang bzhin bzlog par mi nus pa'i phyir /
nam mkha'i mi sgrib pa nyid bzlog tu med pa bzhin no snyam du dgongs pa yin no /
atha svabhāvena asadbhūtā iti vikalpyate, evamapi prahāṇāsaṃbhava evetyāha ci ste rang bzhin gyis med pa zhig yin na zhes bya bar rtog na /
de ltar na yang spong ba yod pa ma yin pa nyid do zhes gsungs pa /
yadyabhūtāḥ svabhāvena kleśāḥ keciddhi kasyacit gal te la la'i nyon mongs pa /
gang dag rang bzhin gyis med pa /
kathaṃ nāma prahīyeran ko 'sadbhāvaṃ prahāsyati ji lta bur na spong bar 'gyur /
med pa su zhig spong bar byed /
abhūtā api kleśāḥ svabhāvena avidyamānāḥ aśakyā eva prahātum nyon mongs pa rang bzhin gyis med pa ste mi bdog pa rnams kyang spang bar mi nus pa nyid do /
na hi agneḥ śaityamasaṃvidyamānaṃ śakyamapākartum /
evamime 'pi kleśāḥ kecid yadi kasyacit svabhāvato na vidyante, kastān prahāsyati? naiva kaścit prahāsyati /
tadevamubhayapakṣe 'pi prahāṇāsaṃbhavānnāsti prahāṇaṃ kleśānām /
prahāṇābhāvācca kutaḥ kleśaprahāṇopāyānveṣaṇamiti /
ato yaduktam 		me'i grang ba yod pa ma yin pa ni bzlog par nus pa ma yin no /
de bzhin du nyon mongs pa 'di dag kyang su la yang gang dag kyang rang bzhin gyis med pas /
de dag sus spong bar byed de sus kyang spong bar byed pa ma yin no /
de'i phyir de ltar phyogs gnyi ga ltar yang spong ba yod pa ma yin pas nyon mongs pa rnams spong ba med do /
vidyanta eva avidyādayaḥ kleśāḥ, tatprahāṇopāyānveṣaṇāditi, tadayuktamiti /
yathoktamāryasamādhirāje 		spong ba med pa'i phyir na nyon mongs pa spong ba'i thabs tshol ba lta yod par ga la 'gyur /
de'i phyir ji skad du /
yo rajyeta, yatra vā rajyeta, yena vā rajyeta ma rig pa la sogs pa rnams ni yod pa nyid de /
yo duṣyeta, yatra vā duṣyeta, yena vā duṣyeta /
yo muhyeta yatra vā muhyeta, yena vā muhyeta 		de spong ba'i thabs tshol ba yod pa'i phyir ro zhes gang smras pa de mi 'thad do /
ji skad du /
sa taṃ dharma na samanupaśyati, taṃ dharmaṃ nopalabhate /
sa taṃ dharmamasamanupaśyan anupalabhamāno 'rakto 'duṣṭo 'mūḍho 'viparyastacittaḥ samāhita ityucyate /
tīrṇaḥ pāraga ityucyate /
kṣemaprāpta ityucyate /
iti vistaraḥ /
tathā 		'phags pa ting nge 'dzin gyi rgyal po las kyang /
gzugs kyis kyang ni byang chub bstan /
byang chub kyis kyang gzugs bstan te /
mi mtshungs pa yi sgra rnams kyis /
chos kyi bla ma rab tu bstan /
sgra yis gzugs kyi bla ma ste /
ādarśapṛṣṭhe tatha tailapātre nirīkṣate nārimukhaṃ svalaṃkṛtam /
so tatra rāgaṃ janayitva bālo pradhāvito kāmi gaveṣamāṇo /
mukhasya saṃkrānti yadā na vidyate bimbe mukhaṃ naiva kadāci labhyate /
mūḍho yathā so janayeta rāgaṃ tathopamān jānatha sarvadharmān /
ityādi /
tathā /
rūpeṇa darśitā bodhī bodhaye rūpa darśitam /
viṣabhāgena śabdena uttaro dharmu deśitaḥ /
śabdena uttaraṃ rūpaṃ gambhīraṃ ca svabhāvataḥ /
samaṃ rūpaṃ ca bodhiśca nānātvaṃ na sa labhyate /
yathā nirvāṇu gambhīraṃ śabdena saṃprakāśitam /
labhyate na ca nirvāṇaṃ sa ca śabdo na labhyate /
śabdaścāpi nirvāṇaṃ ca ubhayaṃ tanna labhyate /
evaṃ śūnyeṣu dharmeṣu nirvāṇaṃ saṃprakāśitam /
nirvāṇaṃ nivṛttireva nirvāṇaṃ ca na labhyate /
apravṛttirhi dharmāṇāṃ yathā paścāttathā purā /
sarvadharmāḥ svabhāvena nirvāṇasamasādṛśāḥ /
jñātā naiṣkramyasārehi ye yuktā buddhabodhaye /
tathā /
jñānena jānāmyahu skandhaśūnyatāṃ jñātvā ca kleśehi na saṃvasāmi /
vyāhāramātreṇa hi vyāharāmi parinirvṛto lokamimaṃ carāmi /
tathā /
parinirvṛta loki te śūrā yehi svabhāvata jñātibhi dharmāḥ /
kāmaguṇairhi caranti asaṅgāḥ saṅgu vivarjiya sattva vinenti /
iti /
ityācāryacandrakīrtipādoparacitāyāṃ prasannapadāyāṃ madhyamakavṛttau viparyāsaparīkṣā nāma trayoviṃśatitamaṃ prakaraṇam /
āryasatyaparīkṣā caturviṃśatitamaṃ prakaraṇam /
atrāha /
yadi śūnyamidaṃ sarvamudayo nāsti na vyayaḥ /
caturṇāmāryasatyānāmabhāvaste prasajyate /
yadi yuktyā nopapadyate iti kṛtvā sarvamidaṃ bāhyamādhyātmikaṃ bhāvajātaṃ śūnyamiti pratipāditam, nanu ca evaṃ sati bahavaśca mahāntaśca doṣā bhavata āpadyante /
kathaṃ kṛtvā? yadi sarvamidaṃ śūnyaṃ syāt, tadā yacchūnyaṃ tannāsti, yacca nāsti, tadavidyamānatvād vandhyāputravannaivotpadyate na cāpi nirudhyate, iti na kasyacitpadārthasya udayo vyayaśca /
tadabhāvācca caturṇāmāryasatyānāmabhāvaḥ te śūnyavādinaḥ prasajyate 		ngo bo nyid kyis zab pa dag /
gzugs dang byang chub mnyam pa ste /
tha dad bya ba de mi rnyed /
mya ngan 'das pa zab par yang /
sgra yis rab tu bstan pa ltar /
mya ngan 'das pa de mi rnyed /
de yi sgra yang mi rnyed do /
sgra dang mya ngan 'das pa ni /
gnyi ga'ang rnyed par mi 'gyur te /
de bzhin stong pa'i chos rnams la /
mya ngan 'das pa rab tu bstan /
mya ngan 'das dang 'da' ba ni /
mya ngan 'das pa mi rnyed de /
'di ni chos rnams 'jug pa med /
phyis ni ci 'dra de bzhin sngon /
chos rnams thams cad rang bzhin gyis /
mya ngan 'das dang mtshungs mnyam par /
sangs rgyas bstan la brtson pa yi /
'byung ba de dag rnams kyis rig /
ces gsungs pa dang de bzhin du /
ye shes kyis ni phung po stong nyid mkhyen /
mkhyen nas nyon mongs rnams dang mi 'grogs te; ;brjod pa tsam gyi sgo nas brjod bya zhing /
mya ngan 'das bzhin 'jig rten 'dir dpyad bya /
zhes bya ba gsungs so /
slob dpon zla ba grags pa'i zhal snga nas sbyar ba'i tshig gsal ba las /
phyin ci log brtag pa zhes bya ba rab tu byed pa nyi shu rtsa gsum pa'i 'grel pa'o /
'dir /
gal te 'di dag kun stong na /
'byung ba med cing 'jig pa med /
'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi po rnams /
khyed la med par thal bar 'gyur /
gal te rigs pas mi 'thad pa'i phyir phyi dang nang gi dngos po'i rnam pa 'di dag thams cad stong pa nyid do zhes sgrub na /
de lta na khyod la nyes pa chen po dang mang por 'gyur ba ma yin nam /
ji ltar zhe na /
gal te 'di dag thams cad stong pa nyid yin na de'i tshe gang stong pa de ni med pa yin la /
gang med pa de ni yod pa ma yin pa'i phyir mo gsham gyi bu bzhin du skye ba med cing 'gag pa med pas dngos po gang yang 'byung ba med cing 'jig pa med par 'gyur ro /
de med pas 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi po rnams stong par smra ba khyod la med par thal bar 'gyur ro /
ji ltar zhe na /
'di ltar /
kathaṃ kṛtvā? iha hi pūrvahetujanitāḥ pratītyasamutpannāḥ pañcopādānaskandhāḥ duḥkhaduḥkhatayā vipariṇāmaduḥkhatayā saṃskāraduḥkhatayā ca pratikūlavartitvācca pīḍātmakatvena duḥkhamityucyate 'di na nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga po sngar gyi rgyus bskyed cing rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba ni /
sdug bsngal gyi sdug bsngal nyid dang 'gyur ba'i sdug bsngal nyid dang 'du byed kyi sdug bsngal nyid kyis mi mthun par gyur pa'i phyir gnod pa'i bdag nyid can nyid kyis na sdug bsngal zhes bya'o /
etacca duḥkhamāryā eva viparyāsaprahāṇe sati duḥkhamiti saṃjānate, na anāryāḥ, viparyāsānugatatvāt, yathādarśanaṃ ca padārthasvabhāvavyavasthānāt /
yathā hi viparyastendriyāṇāṃ madhurasvabhāvamapi guḍaśarkarādikaṃ tiktatayā upalabhamānānāṃ jvarādirogāturāṇāṃ tiktataiva satyaṃ tajjñānāpekṣayā, mādhuryam, tenātmanā tasya vastuno 'nupalabhyamānatvāt, evamihāpi yadyapi pañcopādānaskandhā duḥkhasvabhāvā bhavanti, tathāpi ye etān duḥkhātmakān paśyanti, teṣāmeva duḥkhaṃ vyavasthāpyate, na viparyāsānugamādanyathopalabhamānānāmiti 		sdug bsngal de yang phyin ci log spangs pas 'phags pa rnams kho nas sdug bsngal lo snyam du shes kyi /
phyin ci log dang rjes su 'brel pa'i phyir dang ji ltar mthong ba bzhin dngos po'i rang bzhin rnam par 'jog pa'i phyir 'phags pa ma yin pa dag gis ni ma yin no /
de ltar dngos po de dag gis dngos po de dag nyid der dmigs pa'i phyir rims la sogs pa'i nad kyis btab pas dbang po phyin ci log tu gyur pa bu ram mngar ba'i rang bzhin yang kha ba nyid du dmigs pa rnams la de dag gi shes pa la ltos nas kha ba nyid du bden gyi /
mngar ba nyid du ni ma yin pa de bzhin du 'dir yang nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga sdug bsngal gyi rang bzhin yin mod kyi /
de lta na yang gang dag gis 'di dag sdug bsngal gyi bdag nyid du mthong ba de dag nyid la de dag sdug bsngal yin par bzhag gi /
phyin ci log dang rjes su 'brel bas rnam pa gzhan du dmigs pa rnams la ni ma yin no /
ataḥ āryāṇāmeva duḥkhātmatā satyamiti kṛtvā duḥkhamāryasatyamityucyate de'i phyir 'phags pa rnams kho na la de sdug bsngal gyi bdag nyid du bden pa de'i phyir sdug bsngal 'phags pa'i bden pa zhes bya'o /
nanu ca anāryairduḥkhā vedanā duḥkhamiti paricchidyate iti, evaṃ tatkathaṃ duḥkhamāryāṇāmeva satyam? satyam /
na hi duḥkhaiva vedanā kevalaṃ duḥkhasatyam, kiṃ tarhi pañcāpyupādānaskandhāḥ, ityataḥ āryāṇāmeva tat satyamiti kṛtvā āryasatyamiti vyavasthāpyate /
yathoktam 		gal te 'phags pa ma yin pa rnams kyis kyang tshor ba sdug bsngal la sdug bsngal lo zhes bya bar yongs su gcod pa nyid ma yin nam; de'i phyir ji ltar sdug bsngal 'phags pa rnams kho na la bden pa yin zhe na /
tshor ba sdug bsngal nyid 'ba' zhig sdug bsngal gyi bden pa ma yin te /
'o na ci zhe na /
nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga char yin no /
de'i phyir 'phags pa rnams kho na la de bden pa'i phyir 'phags pa'i bden pa'o zhes rnam par gzhag ste /
ji skad du /
ūrṇāpakṣma yathaiva hi karatalasaṃsthaṃ na vi(ve?)dyate puṃbhiḥ /
akṣigataṃ tu tadeva hi janayatyaratiṃ ca pīḍāṃ ca 		lag mthil spu nyag gcig 'dug pa /
mi rnams kyis ni mi rtogs la /
de nyid mig tu song na yang /
mi bde ba dang gnod bskyed ltar /
karatalasadṛśo bālo na vetti saṃskāraduḥkhatāpakṣma byis pa lag mthil 'dra ba yis /
'du byed sdug bsngal spu mi rtogs /
akṣisadṛśastu vidvān tenaivodvejate gāḍham 'phags pa mig dang 'dra bas ni /
de yis shin tu yid kyang 'byung /
iti /
tasmādāryāṇāmeva tadduḥkhasatyamiti duḥkhamāryasatyamiti vyavasthāpyate 		zhes bshad do /
de'i phyir sdug bsngal de ni 'phags pa rnams kho na la bden pas sdug bsngal 'phags pa'i bden pa'o zhes rnam par gzhag go /
kadā ca tadduḥkhamāryasatyaṃ yujyate? yadā saṃskārāṇāmudayavyayau saṃbhavataḥ nam zhig gi tshe na 'di sdug bsngal 'phags pa'i bden par rigs she na /
gang gi tshe 'dus byas rnams la 'byung ba dang 'jig pa yod pa yin na /
yadā tu śūnyatvānna kiṃcidutpadyate nāpi kiṃcinnirudhyate, tadā nāsti duḥkham gang gi tshe stong pa'i phyir cung zad kyang skye ba med cing cung zad kyang 'gag pa med pa de'i tshe ni sdug bsngal yod pa ma yin no /
asati ca duḥkhe kutaḥ samudayasatyam? yato hi hetorduḥkham, samudeti samutpadyate sa hetuḥ tṛṣṇākarmakleśalakṣaṇaḥ samudaya ityucyate sdug bsngal med pa na yang kun 'byung gi bden pa yod par ga la 'gyur /
'di ltar rgyu gang las sdug bsngal kun 'byung zhing skye ba sred pa dang las dang nyon mongs pa'i mtshan nyid can gyi rgyu de la ni kun 'byung zhes bya na /
yadā tu phalabhūtaṃ duḥkhasatyaṃ nāsti, tadā phalarahitasya hetukatvānupapatteḥ samudayo 'pi nāsti /
duḥkhasya ca vigamaḥ apunarutpādaḥ nirodha ityucyate 		gang gi tshe 'bras bur gyur pa sdug bsngal gyi bden pa yod pa ma yin pa de'i tshe 'bras bu dang bral ba rgyu nyid du mi 'thad pa'i phyir kun 'byung yang med do /
sdug bsngal dang bral zhing yid mi skye ba la ni 'gog pa zhes bya na /
yadā tu duḥkhameva nāsti, tadā kasya nirodhaḥ syāditi? ato duḥkhanirodho 'pi na saṃbhavati /
asati hi duḥkhe nirodhasatyasyāpyabhāvaḥ /
asati ca duḥkhanirodhe kuto duḥkhanirodhagāminī āryāṣṭāṅgamārgānugā pratipad bhaviṣyatīti mārgasatyamapi nāstīti 		gang gi tshe sdug bsngal nyid med pa de'i tshe gang gang gis 'gog par 'gyur /
de'i phyir sdug bsngal 'gog pa yang med do /
de'i phyir sdug bsngal med na 'gog pa'i bden pa yang med do /
sdug bsngal 'gog pa med na yang sdug bsngal 'gog par 'gro ba'i lam 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad kyang yod par ga la 'gyur /
de'i phyir lam gyi bden pa yang med do /
tadevaṃ śūnyatvaṃ bhāvānāṃ bruvataḥ caturṇāmāryasatyānāmabhāvaḥ prasajyate /
tataśca ko doṣa iti? ucyate /
parijñā ca prahāṇaṃ ca bhāvanā sākṣikarma ca 		de'i phyir de ltar dngos po rnams stong par smra bar khyod la 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi po dag med par thal bar 'gyur ro /
de las nyes pa cir 'gyur zhe na /
brjod par bya ste /
'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi med pas /
yongs su shes dang spang ba dang /
sgom dang mngon du bya ba dag /
caturṇāmāryasatyānāmabhāvānnopapadyate /
caturṇāmāryasatyānāmabhāvaprasaṅge sati yadetadanityādibhirākārairduḥkhasatyaparijñānaṃ duḥkhasamudayasya ca prahāṇaṃ duḥkhanirodhagāminyāśca pratipado bhāvanā duḥkhanirodhasya ca sākṣikarma sākṣātkaraṇam, tannopapadyate 		'thad par 'gyur ba ma yin no /
'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi po rnams med par thal ba yin dang mi rtag pa la sogs pa ni rnam pa dag gis sdug bsngal gyi bden pa yongs su shes pa de dang sdug bsngal kun 'byung gi bden pa spang ba dang sdug bsngal 'gog par 'gro ba'i lam sgom pa dang /
sdug bsngal 'gog pa mngon du bya ba ste mngon sum du bya ba mi 'thad do /
yadi duḥkhādīnāmāryasatyānāmabhāve sati parijñānādikaṃ nāsti, tadā ko doṣa iti? ucyate gal te sdug bsngal la sogs pa 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams med pas yongs su shes pa la sogs pa med pa de'i tshe /
nyes pa ci yod ce na /
brjod par bya ste /
tadabhāvānna vidyante catvāryāryaphalāni ca de dag yod pa ma yin pas /
'bras bu bzhi yang yod ma yin /
phalābhāve phalasthā no na santi pratipannakāḥ 'bras bu med na 'bras gnas med /
zhugs pa dag kyang yod ma yin /
saṃgho nāsti na cetsanti te 'ṣṭau puruṣapudgalāḥ gal te skyes bu gang zag brgyad /
de dag med na dge 'dun med /
abhāvāccāryasatyānāṃ saddharmo 'pi na vidyate 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams med phyir /
dam pa'i chos kyang yod ma yin /
dharme cāsati saṃghe ca kathaṃ buddho bhaviṣyati chos dang dge 'dun yod min na; ;sangs rgyas ji ltar yod par 'gyur /
yadā caivaṃ duḥkhaparijñānādikaṃ nāsti, tadā, asminnasati srotaāpattisakṛdāgāmyanāgāmyarhatphalākhyaṃ phalacatuṣṭayaṃ nopapadyate /
kathaṃ kṛtvā? iha kleśānāṃ prahāṇaṃ saṃpiṇḍitaṃ phalākhyaṃ pratilabhate 		gang gi tshe de ltar sdug bsngal yongs su shes pa la sogs pa med pa de'i tshe /
de med pas rgyun du zhugs pa dang lan cig phyir 'ong ba dang phyir mi 'ong ba dang dgra bcom pa'i 'bras bu dang bzhi yang 'thad pa ma yin no /
ji ltar zhe na /
'dir nyon mongs pa rnams kyi spangs pa bsdoms pas ni /
'bras bu'i ming 'thob ste /
tadyathā 'di lta ste /
saṃyojanatrayaprahāṇe sati ṣoḍaśe mārge anvayajñānakṣaṇe yat kleśaprahāṇaṃ tat srotaāpattiphalam /
kāmāvacarāṇāṃ bhāvanāprahātavyānāṃ kleśānāmadhimātramadhyamṛdūnāṃ prakārāṇāṃ punaradhimātramadhyamṛduprakārabhedena pratyekaṃ bhidyamānānāṃ nava prakārā bhavanti /
tatra kāmāvacaraṣaṣṭhakleśaprakāraparikṣaye vimuktimārge yat prahāṇaṃ tat sakṛdāgāmiphalam /
teṣāmeva kāmāvacarāṇāṃ navamaprakārakleśaparikṣaye vimuktimārge yat kleśaprahāṇaṃ tadanāgāmiphalam 		kun tu sbyor ba gsum spangs pas skad cig ma bcu drug pa lam la rjes su shes pa la sogs pa nyon mongs pa'i spangs pa gang yod pa de ni rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu'o /
'dod pa na spyod pa'i nyon mongs pa bsgom pas spang bar bya ba rnams kyi chen po dang 'bring dang chung ngu'i rnam pa rnams la yang re re zhing chen po dang 'bring dang chung ngu'i dbye bas phye ba na rnam pa dgur 'gyur ro /
de la 'dod pa na spyod pa'i rnam pa drug pa zad pas rnam par grol pa'i lam la spangs pa gang yod pa de ni lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'o /
'dod pa na spyod pa'i nyon mongs pa de dag gi nyon mongs pa rnam pa dgu pa zad pas rnam par grol ba'i lam la spangs ba gang zhig yod pa de ni phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'o /
rūpārūpyāvacarāṇāṃ kleśānāṃ bhāvanāprahātavyānāṃ bhūmau bhūmau navaprakārabhedabhinnānāṃ yāvannaivasaṃjñānāsaṃjñāyatanabhūmikanavamakleśaprakāraparikṣaye vimuktimārge yat prahāṇaṃ tadarhatphalam gzugs dang gzugs med pa na spyod pa'i nyon mongs pa bsgom pas spang par bya ba /
sa dang sa la rnam pa dgu'i dbye bas phye ba rnams las 'du shes med 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched kyis pa'i nyon mongs pa rnam pa dgu zad par zad pas rnam par grol ba'i lam la spangs pa gang zhig yod pa de ni dgra bcom pa'i 'bras bu zhes bya ste /
ityetāni catvāri phalāni /
tānyetāni kathaṃ yujyante? yadi duḥkhasya parijñānaṃ saṃbhavati, samudayasya prahāṇam, nirodhasya sākṣātkaraṇam, āryamārgasya ca bhāvanā bhavati 		'di dag ni 'bras bu bzhi'o /
'di dag ji ltar rigs she na /
gal te sdug bsngal yongs su shes pa yod cing kun 'byung spang ba dang 'gog pa mngon sum du bya ba dang lam sgom pa yod par 'gyur ba yin na /
yadā tu duḥkhādīnāmāryasatyānāmabhāve sati duḥkhaparijñānādikaṃ nāsti, tadā na santi tāni catvāri phalāni /
caturṇā ca phalānāmabhāve sati ye teṣu vyavasthitāḥ phalasthāścatvāra āryapudgalāḥ, te na santi 		gang gi tshe sdug bsngal la sogs pa 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams med pas sdug bsngal yongs su shes pa la sogs pa med pa de'i tshe ni 'bras bu bzhi po de dag yod pa ma yin no /
'bras bu bzhi po de dag med na de dag la gnas pa'i 'phags pa'i gang zag 'bras bu la gnas pa bzhi po gang dag yin pa de dag kyang yod pa ma yin no /
ata eva ca pratipannakā api catvāra āryapudgalā na saṃvidyante de nyid kyi phyir na 'phags pa'i gang zag zhugs pa bzhi po dag kyang yod pa ma yin no /
iha hi ṣoḍaśāt mārge 'nvayajñānakṣaṇāt pūrve ye pañcadaśa kṣāntijñānakṣaṇāḥ, tadyathā /
traidhātukaduḥkhābhisamaye duḥkhasatyālambanāścatvāraḥ kṣāntijñānakṣaṇāḥ 		'dir skad cig ma bcu drug pa lam la rjes su shes pa'i snga rol gyi shes pa dang bzod pa'i skad cig ma bcva lnga gang dag yin pa 'di lta ste /
khams gsum gyi sdug bsngal mngon par rtogs pa de'i tshe sdug bsngal la dmigs pa'i bzod pa dang shes pa'i skad cig ma bzhir 'gyur ro /
tatra katame traidhātukaduḥkhābhisamaye catvāraḥ kṣāntijñānakṣaṇāḥ? tadyathā de la khams gsum gyi sdug bsngal mngon par rtogs pa'i dus kyi bzod pa dang shes pa'i skad cig ma bzhi gang zhe na /
'di lta ste /
kāmāvacaraduḥkhadarśanaprahātavyasatkāyāntagrāhamithyādṛṣṭidṛṣṭiparāmarśaśīlavrataparāmarśavicikitsārāgapratighamānāvidyākhyadaśānuśayapratipakṣaḥ anityaduḥkhaśūnyānātmākārotpannaḥ kāmāvacaraduḥkhasatyālambanaḥ ānantaryamārgalakṣaṇaḥ duḥkhe dharmajñānakṣāntikṣaṇaḥ ekaḥ 'dod pa na spyod pa'i sdug bsngal mthong bas spang bar bya ba 'jig tshogs dang mthar 'dzin pa dang log par lta ba dang lta ba mchog tu 'dzin pa dang tshul khrims dang brtul zhugs mchog tu 'dzin pa dang the tshom dang 'dod chags dang khong khro ba dang nga rgyal dang ma rig pa zhes bya ba phra rgyas bcu'i gnyen por gyur cing /
mi rtag pa dang sdug bsngal ba dang stong pa dang bdag med pa'i rnam par skyes pa /
tadālambanākāra eva ca vimuktimārgalakṣaṇaḥ duḥkhe dharmajñānakṣaṇaḥ dvitīyaḥ 'dod pa na spyod pa'i sdug bsngal gyi bden pa la dmigs pa bar chad med pa'i lam gyi mtshan nyid can /
sdug bsngal la chos shes pa'i bzod pa'i skad cig ma ni gcig go /
evaṃ rūpārūpyāvacaraduḥkhasatyālambanaḥ pratighavarjitānantaroktāṣṭādaśānuśayapratipakṣaḥ duḥkhādyākārotpannaḥ ānantaryamārgalakṣaṇaḥ duḥkhe anvayajñānakṣāntikṣaṇastṛtīyaḥ /
tadālambanākāra eva ca vimuktimārgalakṣaṇaḥ duḥkhe 'nvayajñānakṣaṇaścaturthaḥ /
yathā caite traidhātukāvacaraduḥkhasatyābhisamaye kṣāntijñānakṣaṇāścatvāraḥ, evaṃ kāmāvacarasamudayadarśanaprahātavyamithyādṛṣṭidṛṣṭiparāmarśavicikitsārāgapratighamānāvidyākhyasaptānuśayapratipakṣaḥ hetusamudayaprabhavapratyayākārotpannaḥ kāmāvacarasamudayasatyālambanaḥ ānantaryamārgalakṣaṇaḥ samudaye dharmajñānakṣāntikṣaṇaḥ ekaḥ 		dmigs pa dang rnam pa de kho na dang ldan pa rnam par grol ba'i lam gyi mtshan nyid can sdug bsngal la chos shes pa'i skad cig ma ni gnyis pa'o /
de bzhin du gzugs dang gzugs med pa na spyod pa'i sdug bsngal la dmigs pa /
khong khro ma gtogs pa bshad ma thag pa'i phra rgyas bco brgyad kyi gnyen por gyur cing /
sdug bsngal la sogs pa'i rnam par skyes pa bar chad med pa'i lam gyi mtshan nyid can /
sdug bsngal la rjes su shes pa'i bzod pa'i skad cig ma ni gsum pa'o /
dmigs pa dang rnam pa de kho na dang ldan pa'i rnam par grol ba'i lam gyi mtshan nyid can /
sdug bsngal la rjes su shes pa'i bzod pa'i skad cig ma ni bzhi pa'o /
khams gsum na spyod pa'i sdug bsngal gyi bden pa mngon par rtogs pa dang bzod pa dang shes pa'i skad cig ma bzhi po de dag ji lta ba de bzhin du /
'dod pa na spyod pa'i kun 'byung mthong bas spang par bya ba log par lta ba dang lta ba mchog tu 'dzin pa dang the tshom dang 'dod chags dang khong khro dang nga rgyal dang ma rig pa zhes bya ba phra rgyas bdun gyi gnyen por gyur cing /
rgyu dang kun 'byung ba dang rab tu skyes ba dang rkyen gyis rnam par skyes pa dang 'dod pa na spyod pa'i kun 'byung gi bden pa la dmigs pa bar chad med pa'i lam gyi mtshan nyid can kun 'byung la chos shes pa'i bzod pa'i skad cig ma ni gcig go /
tadālambanākāra eva ca vimuktimārgalakṣaṇaḥ samudaye dharmajñānakṣayo dvitīyaḥ /
evaṃ rūpārūpyāvacarasamudayasatyālambanaḥ pratighavarjitānantaroktadvādaśānuśayapratipakṣaḥ samudayasatyākārotpannaḥ ānantaryamārgalakṣaṇaḥ samudaye 'nvayajñānakṣāntikṣaṇastṛtīyaḥ 		dmigs pa dang rnam pa de kho na dang ldan pa rnam par grol ba'i lam gyi mtshan nyid can kun 'byung la chos shes pa'i skad cig ma ni gnyis pa'o /
de bzhin du gzugs dang gzugs med pa na spyod pa'i kun 'byung gi bden pa la dmigs pa khong khro ba ma gtogs pa bshad ma thag pa'i phra rgyas bcu gnyis kyi gnyen por gyur cing /
kun 'byung gi bden pa'i rnam par skyes pa /
bar chad med pa'i lam gyi mtshan nyid can kun 'byung la rjes su shes pa'i bzod pa'i skad cig ma ni gsum pa'o /
tadālambanākāra eva ca vimuktimārgalakṣaṇaḥ samudaye 'nvayajñānakṣaṇaścaturthaḥ /
ityete traidhātukāvacaraduḥkhasamudayasatyābhisamaye catvāraḥ kṣaṇāḥ /
yathā caite catvāraḥ kṣaṇāḥ traidhātukaduḥkhasamudayasatyābhisamaye, evaṃ kāmāvacaraduḥkhanirodhadarśanaprahātavyasamudayoktasaptānuśayapratipakṣaḥ nirodhaśāntapraṇītaniḥsaraṇākārotpannaḥ kāmāvacaraduḥkha nirodhasatyālambanaḥ ānantaryamārgalakṣaṇaḥ nirodhe dharmajñānakṣāntikṣaṇaḥ ekaḥ 		dmigs pa dang rnam pa de kho na dang ldan pa rnam par grol ba'i lam gyi mtshan nyid can kun 'byung la rjes su shes pa'i skad cig ma ni bzhi pa ste /
de dag ni khams gsum na spyod pa'i sdug bsngal kun 'byung gi bden pa mngon par rtogs pa'i skad cig ma bzhi yin no /
khams gsum gyi sdug bsngal kun 'byung gi bden pa mngon par rtogs pa'i skad cig ma bzhi po 'di dag /
ji ltar yin pa de bzhin du 'dod pa na spyod pa'i sdug bsngal 'gog pa mthong bas spang bar bya ba kun 'byung la bshad pa phra rgyas bdun gyi gnyen por gyur zhing 'gog pa dang zhi ba dang gya nom pa dang nges par 'byung ba'i rnam par skyes pa /
'dod pa na spyod pa'i sdug bsngal 'gog pa la dmigs pa bar chad med pa'i lam gyi mtshan nyid can 'gog pa la chos shes pa'i bzod pa'i skad cig ma ni gcig go /
tadālambanākāra eva ca vimuktimārgalakṣaṇaḥ nirodhe dharmajñānakṣaṇaḥ dvitīyaḥ dmigs pa dang rnam pa de kho na dang ldan pa rnam par grol ba'i lam gyi mtshan nyid can /
sdug bsngal 'gog pa la chos shes pa'i skad cig ma ni gnyis pa'o /
etaireva ākāraiḥ rūpārūpyāvacaraduḥkhanirodhasatyālambanaḥ pratighavarjitadvādaśānuśayapratipakṣaḥ ānantaryamārgalakṣaṇaḥ nirodhe anvayajñānakṣāntikṣaṇastṛtīyaḥ /
tadālambanākāra eva ca vimuktimārgalakṣaṇaḥ nirodhe anvayajñānakṣaṇaścaturthaḥ /
ityete traidhātukāvacaraduḥkhanirodhasatyābhisamaye catvāraḥ kṣaṇāḥ 		rnam pa de dang de dag nyid kyis gzugs dang gzugs med pa na spyod pa'i sdug bsngal 'gog pa'i bden pa la dmigs pa khong khro ma gtogs pa phra rgyas bcu gnyis kyi gnyen por gyur ba bar chad med pa'i lam gyi mtshan nyid can /
gzugs dang gzugs med pa na spyod pa'i sdug bsngal 'gog pa la rjes su shes pa'i bzod pa'i skad cig ma ni gsum pa'o /
dmigs pa dang rnam pa de kho na dang ldan pa /
rnam par grol ba'i lam gyi mtshan nyid can /
gzugs dang gzugs med pa na spyod pa'i sdug bsngal 'gog pa la rjes su shes pa'i skad cig ma ni bzhi pa'o /
de dag ni khams gsum gyi sdug bsngal 'gog pa'i bden pa mngon par rtogs pa'i skad cig ma bzhi'o /
evaṃ kāmāvacaraduḥkhanirodhagāmimārgadarśanaprahātavyanirodhoktānuśayeṣu śīlavrataparāmarśamaṣṭamaṃ prakṣipya aṣṭānuśayapratipakṣaḥ mārganyāyapratiopannairyāṇikākārotpannaḥ kāmāvacaraduḥkhanirodhagāmimārgālambanaḥ ānantaryamārgalakṣaṇaḥ mārge dharmajñānakṣāntikṣaṇaḥ ekaḥ khams gsum na spyod pa'i sdug bsngal 'gog pa'i bden pa mngon par rtogs pa'i skad cig ma bzhi po 'di dag ji ltar yin pa de bzhin du 'dod pa na spyod pa'i sdug bsngal 'gog par 'gro ba'i lam mthong pas spang bar bya ba 'gog pa la bshad pa dag la /
brgyad pa tshul khrims dang brtul zhugs mchog tu 'dzin pa bsnan te /
phra rgyas brgyad kyi gnyen por gyur cing lam dang rigs pa dang sgrub pa dang nges par 'byin pa'i rnam par skyes pa /
'dod pa na spyod pa'i sdug bsngal 'gog par 'gro ba'i lam la dmigs pa /
bar chad med pa'i lam gyi mtshan nyid can /
tadālambanākāra eva ca vimuktimārgalakṣaṇaḥ mārge dharmajñānakṣaṇaḥ dvitīyaḥ /
etairevākāraiḥ rūpārūpyāvacaraduḥkhanirodhagāmimārgālambanaḥ pratighavarjitacaturdaśānuśayapratipakṣaḥ ānantaryamārgalakṣaṇo mārge 'nvayajñānakṣāntikṣaṇaḥ tṛtīyaḥ 		lam la chos shes pa'i bzod pa'i skad cig ma ni gcig go /
dmigs pa dang rnam pa de kho na dang ldan pa /
rnam par grol ba'i lam gyi mtshan nyid can /
lam la chos shes pa'i skad cig ma ni gnyis pa'o /
rnam pa de dag nyid kyis gzugs dang gzugs med pa na spyod pa'i sdug bsngal 'gog par 'gro ba'i lam la dmigs pa /
khong khro ma gtogs pa phra rgyas bcu bzhi'i gnyen por gyur pa /
bar chad med pa'i lam gyi mtshan nyid can /
ityete pañcadaśa kṣaṇāḥ darśanamārgābhidhānāḥ lam la rjes su shes pa'i bzod pa'i skad cig ma ni gsum pa ste /
skad cig ma bco lnga po de dag ni /
evaṃ vyavasthitaḥ āryaḥ srotaāpattiphalasākṣātkriyāyai pratipannakaḥ ityucyate mthong ba'i lam zhes bya bar gyur to /
de dag la rnam par gnas pa'i 'phags pa ni rgyun zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du bya ba'i phyir /
ṣoḍaśe tu mārge 'nvayajñānasthitaḥ sa srotaāpanna ityucyate /
ta ete aṣṭāśītiranuśayāḥ satyānāṃ darśanamātreṇa bhāvanāmanapekṣyaiva prahīyante iti kṛtvā darśanaprahātavyā ityucyante 		zhugs par zhes bya ba la /
bcu drug pa lam la rjes su shes pa la gnas pa de dag rgyun du zhugs pa zhes bya'o /
phra rgyas brgyad cu rtsa brgyad po de dag ni /
sgom pa la ltos pa med par bden pa rnams mthong ba tsam gyis spong ba'i phyir /
mthong bas spang ba zhes bya bar brjod do /
yathādṛṣṭasatyākārabhāvanayā tu ye paścātprahīyante te bhāvanāprahātavyāḥ gang dag bden pa'i rnam pa ji ltar mthong ba bzhin /
phyis bsgom pas spong bar 'gyur ba de dag ni bsgom pas spang bar bya ba ste /
te ca daśānuśayā bhavanti de dag ni phra rgyas bcur 'gyur te /
kāmāvacarā rāgapratighamānāvidyāḥ /
rūpāvacarā eva pratighavarjitāsrayaḥ /
ārūpyāvacarāśca trayaḥ ete eveti daśa bhavanti /
ete ca yathoktena nyāyena bhūmau bhūmau navadhā bhidyante, kāmadhātau caturṣu dhyāneṣu, caturṣvārūpyeṣu /
ekaikasya ca kleśaprakārasya prahāṇārthamānantaryavimuktimārgabhedena dvau dvau jñānakṣaṇau vyavasthāpyete kleśakṣaṇaviparyayeṇa 		'dod pa na spyod pa'i 'dod chags dang khong khro ba dang nga rgyal dang ma rig pa dag dang gzugs na spyod pa khong khro spangs pa gsum po de dag nyid dang gzugs med pa na spyod pa gsum po de dag nyid de bcur 'gyur ro /
de dag ni ji skad bshad pa'i tshul gyis sa dang sa las rnam pa dgur phye ba yin te /
'dod pa'i khams dang bsam gtan bzhi dang gzugs med pa bzhi de dag tu'o /
nyon mongs pa'i rnam pa re re spang bar bya ba'i phyir /
bar chad med pa dang rnam par grol ba'i dbye bas shes pa'i skad cig ma gnyis gnyis nyon mongs pa'i skad cig las bzlog nas rnam par gzhag go /
adhimātrādhimātro hi kleśaprakāraḥ mṛdumṛdubhyāmānantaryavimuktimārgābhyāṃ prahīyate /
yāvanmṛdumṛdukleśaprakāro 'dhimātrādhimātrābhyāṃ jñānakṣaṇābhyāṃ prahīyate 		'di ltar nyon mongs pa'i rnam pa chen po'i chen po ni /
bar chad med pa dang rnam par grol ba'i lam chung ngu'i chung ngu dag gis spong ba nas nyon mongs pa'i rnam pa chung ngu'i chung ngu ni shes pa'i skad cig ma chen po'i chen po'i bar dag gis spong ste /
sthūlaṃ hi malamalpaprayatnasādhyam, sūkṣmaṃ tu mahāyatnasādhyaṃ rajakavastradhāvanasādharmyeṇeti vijñeyam /
tatra darśanamārgādūrdhvaṃ kāmāvacarabhāvanāprahātavyaṣaṣṭhakleśaprakārapratipakṣavimuktimārgākhyajñānakṣaṇādarvāg jñānakṣaṇāvasthitaḥ āryaḥ sakṛdāgāmiphalapratipannaka ityucyate /
sakṛdimaṃ lokamāgatya parinirvāṇāt sakṛdāgāmītyucyate, tatphalārthaṃpratipannakaḥ prayogasthaḥ sakṛdāgāmiphalapratipannaka ityucyate 		dri ma rags pa ni 'bad pa chung dus bsgrub par bya la /
phra mo ni 'bad pa chen pos bsgrub par bya ba yin te /
khrus mkhan gos 'khru ba dang chos mtshungs par shes par bya'o /
de la mthong ba'i lam gyi 'og rol du /
'phags pa 'dod pa na spyod pa'i nyon mongs pa na bsgom pas spang bar bya ba rnam pa drug po'i gnyen po /
rnam par grol ba'i lam zhes bya ba'i ye shes kyi skad cig ma'i snga rol gyi shes pa'i skad cig la gnas pa ni /
lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la zhugs pa zhes bya ste /
'jig rten 'dir lan cig phyir 'ongs nas yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bas na /
lan cig phyir 'ong ba zhes brjod la /
de'i 'bras bu'i don du zhugs shing sbyor ba la gnas pa ni lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la zhugs pa zhes bya'o /
ṣaṣṭhe tu kṣaṇe sakṛdāgāmītyucyate skad cig ma drug pa la ni lan cig phyir 'ong ba'o /
ṣaṣṭhāt kṣaṇādūrdhva navamakleśaprakāraprahāṇavimuktimārgakṣaṇādarvāgjñānakṣaṇeṣu vartamānaḥ āryaḥ anāgāmiphalapratipannaka ityucyate skad cig ma drug pa'i 'og rol du 'phags pa nyon mongs pa dgu pa spong ba rnam par grol ba'i lam gyi ye shes kyi skad cig gi snga rol gyi ye shes kyi skad cig la gnas pa ni /
phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la zhugs pa zhes bya ste /
anāgatya imaṃ lokaṃ tatraiva parinirvāṇādanāgāmītyucyate /
tatphalārthaṃ pratipannakaḥ prayogasthaḥ anāgāmiphalapratipannaka ityucyate 		'jig rten 'dir phyir mi 'ong bar de nyid du yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bas phyir mi 'ong ba zhes brjod la de'i 'bras bu'i don du zhugs shing sbyor ba la gnas pa ni /
phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la zhugs pa zhes bya'o /
navame tu kṣaṇe anāgāmītyucyate skad cig ma dgu pa la ni phyir mi 'ong ba zhes bya'o /
kāmāvacaranavamavimuktimārgakṣaṇādūrdhvaṃ naivasaṃjñānāsaṃjñātayanabhūmikanavamakleśaprakāraprahāṇavimuktimārgakṣaṇādarvāgjñānakṣaṇeṣu vartamānaḥ āryaḥ arhatphalapratipannakaḥ ityucyate skad cig ma dgu pa'i 'og rol tu 'phags pa rnam par grol ba'i lam zhes bya ba'i ye shes kyi snga rol gyi skad cig srid pa'i rtse mo'i nyon mongs pa dgu'i gnyen po la gnas pa ni dgra bcom pa'i 'bras bu la zhugs pa zhes bya ste /
sadevamānuṣāsurāllokāt pūjārhatvādarhannityucyate lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyis mchod par 'os pas dgra bcom pa zhes brjod la /
tatphalārthaṃ pratipannakaḥ prayogasthaḥ arhatphalapratipannakaḥ ityucyate de'i 'bras bu'i don du zhugs shing sbyor ba la gnas pa ni /
dgra bcom pa'i 'bras bu la zhugs pa zhes bya'o /
bhavāgrikanavamakleśaprakāraprahāṇāttu navamavimuktimārge vyavasthitaḥ arhan bhavati srid pa'i rtse mo'i nyon mongs pa rnam pa dgu pa spangs pa las rnam par grol ba'i lam dgu pa la gnas pa ni /
dgra bcom pa zhes bya'o /
ta ete catvāraḥ pratipannakāḥ pudgalāḥ, catvāraśca phalasthāḥ ityete aṣṭau mahāpuruṣapudgalā bhavanti zhugs pa'i gang zag bzhi dang 'bras bu la gnas pa bzhi zhes bya ba gang zag skyes bu chen po brgyad po yon gnas su 'os pa dam pa de dag ni /
paramadakṣiṇārhā uktā bhagavatā /
yathoktaṃ sūtre 		bcom ldan 'das kyis dge 'dun yin no zhes gsungs te /
ji skad du /
pṛṣṭaḥ sa devarājena śakreṇa vaśavartinā de la brgya byin lha yi rgyal /
dbang bsgyur gyis ni zhus pa dang /
kṛṣatāṃ yajamānānāṃ prāṇināṃ puṇyakāṅkṣiṇām srog chags zhing pa rgyal 'gyur zhing /
dad ldan bsod nams dag 'dod pa /
kurvatāṃ śraddhaddadhānānāṃ puṇyamaupadhikaṃ sadā /
sukṣetraṃ te pravakṣyāmi yatra dattaṃ mahatphalam 		rdzas las byung ba'i bsod nams ni /
rtag tu byed pa rnams kyis zhing /
gang la phul na 'bras che ba /
pratipannakāścatvāraścatvāraśca phalasthitāḥ bzang po rab tu bshad bya ste /
rig dang zhabs su ldan pa yis /
eṣa saṃgho dakṣiṇīyo vidyācaraṇasaṃpadā /
iti /
yadi catvāri āryasatyāni na santi teṣāṃ ca parijñānāni, tadā satyadarśanabhāvanālabhyānāṃ phalānāmabhāvāt pratipannakaphalasthapudgalānāmabhāva eva 		sbyin gnas gyur zhing dge 'dun che; ;zhugs pa rnam pa bzhi dang ni /
'bras la gnas pa bzhi rnams so /
zhes gsungs so /
de'i phyir gal te 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang de dag yongs su shes pa la sogs pa med na de'i tshe bden pa mthong ba med pas 'bras bu rnams mthong ba'i phyir zhugs pa dang 'bras bu la gnas pa'i gang zag rnams med pas na /
ataśca saṃgho nāsti /
tatra adhigamadharmeṇa pratyakṣadharmatayā sarvamārairapi buddhe bhagavati abhedyatvādavetya prasādalābhena saṃghaḥ, sa na syāt /
na cet santi te 'ṣṭau puruṣapudgalāḥ 		dge 'dun yod pa ma yin no /
de la rtogs pa'i chos kyi chos mngon sum du gyur pa nyid kyis bdud thams cad kyis kyang /
bcom ldan 'das las mi phyed pas dge 'dun yin te /
de yod par mi 'gyur ro /
gal te 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams med pa'i phyir /
skyes bu gang zag brgyad po de dag nyid med na /
āryasatyānāṃ ca abhāvāt saddharmo 'pi na saṃbhavati 'phags pa dam pa rnams kyi chos su gyur pa dam pa'i chos kyang yod pa ma yin no /
satāmāryāṇāṃ dharmaḥ saddharmaḥ /
tatra nirodhasatyaṃ phaladharmaḥ, mārgasatyaṃ tu phalāvatāradharmaḥ 		de la 'gog pa'i bden pa ni 'bras bu'i chos so /
lam gyi bden pa ni 'bras bu la 'jug pa'i chos te 'di ni re zhig rtogs pa'i chos yin no /
eṣa tāvadadhigamadharmaḥ de la gsal bar byed pa bstan pa ni /
tatsaṃprakāśikā deśanā āgamadharmaḥ lung gi chos yin na 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams med na ni /
sarva eṣa āryasatyānāmabhāve sati nāstīti 'di dag thams cad yod pa ma yin no /
'phags pa'i bden rnams med pa'i phyir /
abhāvāccāryasatyānāṃ saddharmo 'pi na vidyate dam pa'i chos kyang yod ma yin /
chos dang dge 'dun yod min na /
dharme cāsati saṃghe ca kathaṃ buddhao bhaviṣyati sangs rgyas ji ltar yod par 'gyur /
gal te ji skad bshad pa'i chos yod na ni /
yadi hi yathokto dharmaḥ syāt, tadā taddharmapratipattyā sarvākārasarvadharmābhisaṃbodhād buddho bhavatīti yuktaṃ syāt /
yadi ca saṃghaḥ syāt, tadā tadupadeśairupacīyamānajñānasaṃbhāraḥ taddānamānaśaraṇagamanādibhiśca upacīyamānapuṇyasaṃbhāraḥ kramād buddho bhavet 		chos dang rjes su mthun pa'i chos kyi nan tan gyis chos thams cad rnam pa thams cad du mngon par rdzogs par thugs su chud pa'i phyir /
sangs rgyas yod do zhes bya bar rigs par 'gyur zhing /
gal te dge 'dun yod na ni de'i tshe de'i nye bar bstan pa de dag gis ye shes kyi tshogs bsags shing de la dbul ba dang rim gro dang skyabs su 'gro ba la sogs pa dag gis bsod nams kyi tshogs bsags pa na /
athavā /
asati saṃghe srotaāpattiphalapratipannakādīnāmabhāvaḥ syāt 		rim gyis sangs rgyas su 'gyur ro /
yang na dge 'dun med na rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la zhugs pa la sogs pa rnams med do /
na ca pratipannakāditvamaprāpya buddhatvamāpyate zhugs pa la sogs pa rnams ma thob par ni sangs rgyas nyid thob pa ma yin te /
avaśyaṃ hi pūrvaṃ bhagavatā kasmiṃścit phale vyavasthātavyam bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang sngon gdon mi za bar 'bras bu 'ga' zhig la zhugs par 'gyur ro /
tatra ca phale vyavasthitaḥ saṃghāntaḥpātyeva bhagavān bhavati 'bras bu de la zhugs pas /
bcom ldan 'das dge 'dun gyi khongs su gtogs pa yin no /
saṃghe cāsati niyataṃ nāsti bhagavān buddhaḥ dge 'dun med na ni nges par sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das yod pa ma yin no /
atha bhagavānapi aśaikṣāntarbhāvāt saṃghāntargata eva /
tathā ca buddhapramukho bhikṣusaṃghaḥ ityabhidhānāt saṃghāntargata eva bhagavān iti kecidvarṇayanti 		yang na bcom ldan 'das kyang mi slob pa'i khongs su gtogs pa'i dge 'dun gyi khongs su 'du ba nyid yin na /
de lta yin dang kha cig na re /
sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun zhes brjod pa'i phyir /
bcom ldan 'das dge 'dun gyi khongs su 'du ba nyid do zhes smras te /
teṣāṃ matena spaṣṭamevaitat /
dharme cāsati saṃghe ca kathaṃ buddho bhaviṣyati 		de dag gi lugs ltar na /
chos dang dge 'dun yod min na /
sangs rgyas ji ltar yod par 'gyur /
iti /
madhyoddeśikāśca mahāvastūpadiṣṭabhūmivyavasthayā prathamabhūmisthitaṃ bodhisattvamutpannadarśanamārgaṃ vyācakṣāṇāḥ saṃghāntaḥpātinaṃ vyācakṣate /
tadā saṃghe cāsati bodhisattvo 'pi nāstīti kathaṃ buddho bhaviṣyatīti spaṣṭamevaitat 		zhes bya ba de chos gsal ba yin no /
bar ma 'don par byed pa dag ni /
gzhi chen po las sa'i rnam par gzhag pa bstan pa las /
byang chub sems dpa' sa dang po la gnas pa mthong ba'i lam skyes pa yin par smras pa na /
dge 'dun gyi khongs su gtogs par rjod par byed do zhes bya'o /
de lta na ni /
dge 'dun yod pa ma yin na /
byang chub sems dpa' yang med pas /
sangs rgyas ji ltar yod par 'gyur /
zhes bya ba 'di gsal ba kho na yin no /
tad /
evaṃ trīṇyapi ratnāni bruvāṇaḥ pratibādhase /
śūnyatāmityevaṃ vadan buddhadharmasaṃghākhyāni trīṇyapi durlabhatvāt kadācideva utpattitaḥ alpapuṇyānāṃ ca tadaprāpteḥ mahārghamūlyatvād ratnāni pratibādhase 		de'i phyir /
de skad stong pa nyid smra na /
dkon mchog gsum la gnod pa ni /
byed cing ste /
stong pa nyid kyi don de skad smra na /
rnyed par dka' ba'i phyir dang res 'ga' zhig na 'byung ba'i phyir dang bsod nams chung ba rnams kyis de dang mi phrad pa'i phyir dang rin thang che ba'i phyir na /
dkon mchog gsum po sangs rgyas dang chos dang dge 'dun zhes bya ba dag la yang gnod pa byed pa yin no /
kiṃ cānyat /
śūnyatāṃ phalasadbhāvamadharmaṃ dharmameva ca 		gzhan yang 'bras bu yod pa dang /
chos ma yin pa chos nyid dang /
sarvasaṃvyavahārāṃśca laukikān pratibādhase 'jig rten pa yi tha snyad ni /
kun la gnod pa byed pa yin /
śūnyatāṃ bruvāṇa ityanena saṃbandhaḥ /
yadi sarvamidaṃ śūnyam, yadā sarvameva nāsti, tadā sarvāntaḥ pātitvāt dharmādharmau saha taddhetukena iṣṭāniṣṭaphalena na saṃbhavataḥ 		stong pa nyid smra na zhes bya ba de dang sbyar ro /
gal te 'di dag thams cad stong zhing gang gi tshe 'di dag thams cad med na /
de'i tshe thams cad kyi nang du 'dus pa'i phyir /
chos dang chos ma yin pa gnyis po de dag gi rgyu can 'bras bu 'dod pa dang mi 'dod pa dang bcas pa med par 'gyur la /
sarva eva cāmī laukikā vyavahārāḥ /
kuru, paca, khāda, tiṣṭha, gaccha, āgaccha ityevamādayo 'pi sarvāntargatatvāt sarvadharmāṇāṃ ca śūnyatvānnaiva yujyante iti 		'jig rten pa'i tha snyad kyis shig /
'chos shig /
zo shig /
'dug shig /
song shig /
shog shig ces bya ba de lta bu la sogs pa 'di dag thams cad kyang thams cad kyi khongs su 'dus pa'i phyir dang chos thams cad kyang stong pa nyid yin pa'i phyir mi rigs pa nyid do /
ato nāyaṃ yathopavarṇito nyāyo jyāyāniti de'i phyir de skad bstan pa'i tshul 'di ni mi legs so zhes 'dzer to /
atra brūmaḥ śūnyatāyāṃ na tvaṃ vetsi prayojanam de la bshad pa khyod kyis ni /
stong nyid dgongs dang stong nyid dang /
śūnyatāṃ śūnyatārthaṃ ca tata evaṃ vihanyase stong nyid don ni ma rtogs pas /
de phyir de ltar gnod pa yin /
sa bhavān svavikalpanayaiva nāstitvaṃ śūnyatārtha ityevaṃ viparītamadhyāropya "yadi sarvamidaṃ śūnyamudayo nāsti na vyayaḥ" ityādinopālambhaṃ bruvāṇo 'smāsu mahāntaṃ khedamāpanno 'tīva vihanyate vividhairbhūtaiḥ parikalpairhanyate ityarthaḥ khyod ni rang gi rnam par rtog pa kho nas med pa nyid ni stong pa nyid kyi don yin no zhes de ltar don phyin ci log tu sgro btags nas /
gal te 'di dag kun stong na /
'byung ba med cing 'jig pa med /
ces bya ba la sogs pas klan ka smra zhing /
kho bo cag la cher yid byung bar gyur pa ni /
shin tu gnod pa yin te /
yang dag pa ma yin pa'i kun du rtog pa rnam pa sna tshogs pa dag gis nyams pa yin no zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go /
na tvayamasmābhiratra śāstre śūnyatārthaṃ upavarṇito yastvayā parigṛhītaḥ, śūnyatārthaṃ cājānānaḥ śūnyatāmapi na jānāsi khyod kyis yongs su bzung ba gang yin pa 'di ni kho bo cag gis bstan bcos 'dir stong pa nyid kyi don du ma smras la /
khyod kyis ni stong pa nyid kyi don ma shes pas stong pa nyid kyang mi shes shing /
na cāpi śūnyatāyā yatprayojanaṃ tadvijānāsi stong pa nyid kyi dgos pa gang yin pa de yang mi shes pa yin no /
tataśca yathāvasthitavastusvarūpāparijñānena etat tvayā bahucāyuktamasmadvayākhyānāsaṃbaddhamevopavarṇitam de'i phyir dngos po'i rang gi ngo bo ji ltar gnas pa'i don ma shes pas khyod kyis kho bo cag gis bshad pa dang ma 'brel zhing mi rigs pa rnam pa mang po 'di smras pa yin no /
atha kiṃ punaḥ śūnyatāyāṃ prayojanam? uktameva tadātmaparīkṣāyām /
karmakleśakṣayānmokṣaḥ karmakleśā vikalpataḥ 		de nas stong pa nyid kyi dgos pa ci zhe na /
'di ni /
las dang nyon mongs zad pas thar /
las dang nyon mongs rnam rtog las /
te prapañcātprapañcastu śūnyatāyāṃ nirudhyate de dag spros las spros pa ni /
stong pa nyid kyis 'gag par 'gyur /
iti /
ato niravaśeṣaprapañcopaśamārthaṃ śūnyatopadiśyate, tasmātsarvaprapañcopaśamaḥ śūnyatāyāṃ prayojanam 		zhes bdag brtag par bshad zin to /
de'i phyir spros pa ma lus pa nye bar zhi bar bya ba'i phyir stong pa nyid nye bar ston pa yin te /
de'i phyir stong pa nyid kyi dgos pa ni spros pa thams cad nye bar zhi ba yin na /
bhavāṃstu nāstitvaṃ śūnyatārthaṃ parikalpayan prapañcajālameva saṃvardhayamāno na śūnyatāyāṃ prayojanaṃ vetti khyod kyis ni stong pa nyid kyi don med pa yin par rtog cing spros pa'i dra ba kho na spel bar byed pa na /
stong pa nyid kyi dgos pa ma rtogs pa yin no /
atha kā punaḥ śūnyatā? sāpi tatraivoktā de nas stong pa nyid gang yin zhe na /
de yang /
aparapratyayaṃ śāntaṃ prapañcairaprapañcitam gzhan las shes min zhi ba dang /
spros pa rnams kyis ma spros pa /
nirvikalpamanānārthametattatvasya lakṣaṇam rnam rtog med don tha dad min /
de ni de nyid mtshan nyid do /
iti /
ataḥ prapañcanivṛttisvabhāvāyāṃ śūnyatāyāṃ kuto nāstitvamiti śūnyatāmapina jānāti bhavān 		zhes de nyid du bshad zin to /
de'i phyir stong pa nyid spros pa thams cad log pa'i rang bzhin la med pa nyid du ga la yod /
yaṃ cārthamupādāya śūnyatāśabdaḥ pravartate, tamapīhaiva pratipādayiṣyāmaḥ de'i phyir khyod kyis stong pa nyid kyang mi shes pa yin no /
don gang nye bar bzung nas stong pa nyid kyi sgra 'jug pa de yang /
yaḥ pratītyasamutpādaḥ śūnyatāṃ tāṃ pracakṣmahe rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba gang /
de nyid stong pa nyid du bshad /
sā prajñaptirupādāya pratipatsaiva madhyamā de ni brten nas gdags pa ste /
de nyid dbu ma'i lam yin no /
iti /
yaḥ pratyayairjāyati sa hyajāto na tasya utpādu svabhāvato 'sti 		zhes 'di nyid du ston par 'gyur te /
bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang /
gang zhig rkyen las skyes pa de ma skyes /
de la skye ba'i rang bzhin yod ma yin /
yaḥ pratyayādhīnu sa śūnyu ukto yaḥ śūnyatāṃ jānati so 'pramattaḥ rkyen la rag las gang de stong par bshad /
gang zhig stong nyid shes de bag yod min /
iti bhagavato gāthāvacanāt /
evaṃ pratītyasamutpādaśabdasya yo 'rthaḥ, sa eva śūnyatāśabdasyārthaḥ, na punarabhāvaśabdasya yo 'rthaḥ sa śūnyatāśabdasyārthaḥ 		zhes tshigs su bcad de gsungs pa'i phyir ro /
de ltar na rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'i sgra'i don gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid kyi sgra'i don yin gyi dngos po med pa'i sgra'i don gang yin pa de ni stong pa nyid kyi sgra'i don ma yin no /
abhāvaśabdārthaṃ ca śūnyatārthamityadhyāropya bhavānasmānupālabhate /
tasmācchūnyatāśabdārthamapi na jānāti 		khyod ni dngos po med pa'i sgra'i don stong pa nyid kyi sgra'i don du sgro btags nas /
kho bo cag la klan ka tshol ba yin no /
de'i phyir stong pa nyid kyi sgra'i don yang mi shes pa yin no /
ajānānaśca tvamevamupālambhaṃ kurvan niyataṃ vihanyase /
kaścāsmākaṃ yathoktamupālambhaṃ karoti? yo bhagavatpravacanopadiṣṭāviparītasatyadvayavibhāgaṃ na jānāti, kevalaṃ granthamātrādhyayanapara eveti 		mi shes bzhin du klan ka tshol ba ni nges par khyod nyid la gnod pa yin no /
kho bo cag la ji skad smras pa'i klan ka tshol ba de su zhig ce na /
gang zhig bcom ldan 'das kyi gsung rab las /
bstan pa bden pa gnyis kyis rnam par dbye ba phyin ci ma log par ma shes par gzhung tsam 'ba' zhig 'don pa lhur len pa'o /
ata ācāryaḥ karuṇayā parasya mithyāpravacanārthāvabodhanirāsārthaṃ bhagavatpravacanopadiṣṭāviparītasatyadvayavyavasthāmeva tāvadadhikṛtyāha de'i phyir slob dpon gyis gzhan gyi gsung rab kyi don log par rtog pa bzlog par bya ba'i phyir /
re zhig bcom ldan 'das kyi gsung rab las bstan pa'i bden pa gnyis kyis phyin ci ma log par rnam par gzhag pa'i dbang du mdzad nas /
dve satye samupāśritya buddhānāṃ dharmadeśanā /
lokasaṃvṛtisatyaṃ ca satyaṃ ca paramārthataḥ 		sangs rgyas rnams kyis chos bstan pa /
bden pa gnyis la yang dag brten /
'jig rten kun rdzob bden pa dang /
dam pa'i don gyi bden pa'o /
zhes gsungs so /
iha hi bhagavatāṃ buddhānāṃ satyadvayamāśritya dharmadeśanā pravartate 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis chos bstan pa ni /
bden pa gnyis la brten nas 'jug go /
bden pa gnyis gang zhe na /
katamatsatyadvayam? lokasaṃvṛtisatyaṃ ca paramārthasatyaṃ ca /
tatra 		'jig rten kun rdzob kyi bden pa dang /
don dam pa'i bden pa'o /
de la /
skandhātmā loka ākhyātastatra loko hi niśritaḥ /
iti vacanātpañca skandhānupādāya prajñapyamānaḥ pudgalo loka ityucyate 		'jig rten phung por rab grags pa /
de la 'jig rten nges par brten /
zhes 'byung ba las na phung po la brten nas brtags pa'i gang zag la 'jig rten zhes brjod do /
samantādvaraṇaṃ saṃvṛtiḥ kun nas sgrib pas na kun rdzob ste /
ajñānaṃ hi samantātsarvapadārthatattvāvacchādanātsaṃvṛtirityucyate mi shes pa ni dngos po'i de kho na nyid la kun nas 'gegs par byed pa'i phyir kun rdzob ces bya'o /
parasparasaṃbhavanaṃ vā saṃvṛtiranyonyasamāśrayeṇetyarthaḥ yang na phan tshun brten pas na kun rdzob ste /
phan tshun brten pa nyid kyis na zhes bya ba'i don to /
athavā saṃvṛtiḥ saṃketo lokavyavahāra ityarthaḥ yang na kun rdzob ni brda ste /
'jig rten gyi tha snyad ces bya ba'i tha tshig go /
sa cābhidhānābhidheyajñānajñeyādilakṣaṇaḥ de yang brjod pa dang brjod bya dang shes pa dang shes bya la sogs pa'i mtshan nyid can no /
loke saṃvṛtirlokasaṃvṛtiḥ /
kiṃ punaralokasaṃvṛtirapyasti yata evaṃ viśiṣyate lokasaṃvṛtiriti? yathāvasthitapadārthānuvāda eṣaḥ, nātraiṣā cintāvatarati 		'jig rten gyi kun rdzob ni 'jig rten gyi kun rdzob bo zhes 'jig rten kun rdzob ces gang las de ltar khyad par du byed pa 'jig rten ma yin pa'i kun rdzob kyang yod dam zhe na /
'di ni dngos po ji ltar gnas pa rjes su brjod pa yin gyi /
'dir dpyad pa de mi 'jug go /
athavā /
timirakāmalādyupahatendriyaviparītadarśanāvasthānāste 'lokāḥ, teṣāṃ yā saṃvṛtirasāvalokasaṃvṛtiḥ 		rnam pa gcig tu na /
rab rib dang ling tog sngon po dang mig ser la sogs pas dbang po nyams pas mthong ba phyin ci log la gnas pa de dag ni 'jig rten ma yin te /
de dag gi kun rdzob gang yin pa de ni /
'jig rten kun rdzob bden pa ma yin pas /
ato viśiṣyate lokasaṃvṛtiriti /
etacca madhyamakāvatāre vistareṇoktaṃ tato veditavyam /
lokasaṃvṛtyā satyaṃ lokasaṃvṛtisatyam 		'jig rten kun rdzob bden pa dang /
zhes de las khyad par du byas so /
'di yang dbu ma la 'jug pa las rgyas par bshad pas de las khong du chud par bya'o /
'jig rten gyi kun rdzob tu bden pa ni /
sarva evāyamabhidhānābhidheyajñānajñeyādivyavahāro 'śeṣo lokasaṃvṛtisatyamityucyate 'jig rten kun rdzob bden pa ste /
brjod bya dang rjod byed dang shes pa dang shes bya la sogs pa'i tha snyad ma lus pa 'di dag thams cad ni /
na hi paramārthata ete vyavahārāḥ saṃbhavanti 'jig rten gyi kun rdzob kyi bden pa zhes bya'o /
tatra hi /
nivṛttamabhidhātavyaṃ nivṛtte cittagocare 		don dam pa la ni 'di dag yod pa ma yin te /
der ni brjod par bya ba bzlog pa ste /
anutpannāniruddhā hi nirvāṇamiva dharmatā sems kyi spyod yul bzlog pas so /
ma skyes pa dang ma 'gags pa /
iti kṛtvā kutastatra paramārthe vācāṃ pravṛttiḥ kuto vā jñānasya? sa hi paramārtho 'parapratyayaḥ śāntaḥ pratyātmavedya āryāṇāṃ sarvaprapañcātītaḥ chos nyid mya ngan 'das dang mtshungs pa yin pa de'i phyir don dam pa de la tshig gam shes pa 'jug pa ga la yod /
don dam pa de ni gzhan las shes pa ma yin zhing zhi ba dang 'phags pa rnams kyis so so rang gis rig par bya ba dang spros pa thams cad las 'das pa yin gyi /
sa nopadiśyate na cāpi jñāyate de ni bstan par bya ba ma yin zhing /
uktaṃ hi pūrvam shes pa yang ma yin te /
aparapratyayaṃ śāntaṃ prapañcairaprapañcitam gzhan las shes min zhi ba dang /
spros pa rnams kyis ma spros pa /
nirvikalpamanānārthametattattvasya lakṣaṇam rnam rtog med don tha dad min /
de ni de nyid mtshan nyid do /
iti /
paramaścāsāvarthaśceti paramārthaḥ 		zhes sngar bshad zin to /
don yang de yin la dam pa yang de yin pas na don dam pa'o /
tadeva satyaṃ paramārthasatyam de nyid bden pa yin pas don dam pa'i bden pa'o /
anayośca satyayorvibhāgo vistareṇa madhyamakāvatārādavaseyaḥ bden pa 'di gnyis kyi rnam par dbye ba ni /
rgyas par dbu ma la 'jug pa las shes par bya'o /
tadetatsatyadvayamāśritya buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ dharmadeśanā pravartate sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis chos bstan pa ni /
bden pa gnyis po 'di la brten nas 'jug pa yin no /
evaṃ vyavasthite deśanākrame /
ye 'nayorna vijānanti vibhāgaṃ satyayordvayoḥ 		bstan pa'i tshul de ltar rnam par gnas pa yin dang gang dag bden pa gnyis kyis ni /
rnam dbye rnam par mi shes pa /
de dag sangs rgyas bstan pa ni /
te tattvaṃ na vijānanti gambhīraṃ buddhaśāsane zab mo'i 'di nyid rnam mi shes /
zhes bya'o /
atrāha /
yadi tarhi paramārtho niṣprapañcasvabhāvaḥ sa evāstu, tatkimanayā aparayā skandhadhātvāyatanāryasatyapratītyasamutpādādideśanayā prayojanamaparamārthayā? atatvaṃ hi parityājyam 		'dir smras pa /
gal te don dam pa spros pa dang bral ba'i rang bzhin yin na /
'o na de nyid yin la rag mod /
phung po dang khams dang skye mched dang 'phags pa'i bden pa dang rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba la sogs pa ston pa don dam pa ma yin pa gzhan 'dis ci zhig dgos /
de nyid ma yin pa ni yongs su spang bar bya ba yin na /
yacca parityājyaṃ kiṃ tenopadiṣṭena? ucyate gang yongs su spang bar bya ba yin pa bstan pa des ci zhig bya /
brjod par bya ste /
satyametadevam /
kiṃ tu laukikaṃ vyavahāramanabhyupagamya abhidhānābhidheyajñānajñeyādilakṣaṇam, aśakya eva paramārtho deśayitum, adeśitaśca na śakyo 'dhigantum, anadhigamya ca paramārthaṃ na śakyaṃ nirvāṇamadhigantumiti pratipādayannāha 		de ni de ltar bden mod kyi /
'on kyang brjod par bya ba dang rjod par byed pa dang shes pa dang shes bya la sogs pa'i mtshan nyid can 'jig rten pa'i don dam pa khas ma blangs par don dam pa bstan par mi nus la /
ma bstan na yang rtogs par mi nus shing /
don dam pa ma rtogs par yang mya ngan las 'das pa'i grong khyer du phyin par mi nus so zhes bstan pa'i phyir /
vyavahāramanāśritya paramārtho na deśyate /
paramārthamanāgamya nirvāṇaṃ nādhigamyate 		tha snyad la ni ma brten par /
dam pa'i don ni bstan mi nus /
dam pa'i don ni ma rtogs par /
mya ngan 'das pa 'thob mi 'gyur /
zhes gsungs te /
tasmānnirvāṇādhigamopāyatvādavaśyameva yathāvasthitā saṃvṛtirādāvevābhyupeyā bhājanamiva salilārthineti de'i phyir mya ngan las 'das pa thob pa'i thabs yin pa'i phyir /
chu 'dod pas snod ltar thog mar gdon mi za bar kun rdzob ji ltar gnas pa khas blang bar bya'o /
de'i phyir de ltar /
