tadevaṃ yaḥ saṃvṛtiparamārthalakṣaṇasatyadvayasya vyavasthāmapākṛtya śūnyatāṃ varṇayati, taṃ tathāvidhaṃ pudgalam gang zhig kun rdzob dang don dam pa'i bden pa'i mtshan nyid can bden pa gnyis kyis rnam par gzhag pa ma byas par stong pa nyid smra bar byed pa'i gang zag rnam pa de lta bu ni /
vināśayati durdṛṣṭā śūnyatā mandamedhasam stong pa nyid la lta nyes na /
shes rab chung rnams phung bar byed /
sarpo yathā durgṛhīto vidyā vā duṣprasādhitā ji ltar sbrul la bzung nyes dang /
rig sngags nyes par bsgrub pa bzhin /
saṃvṛtisatyaṃ hi ajñānamātrasamutthāpitaṃ niḥsvabhāvaṃ buddhā tasya paramārthalakṣaṇāṃ śūnyatāṃ pratipadyamāno yogī nāntadvaye patati rnal 'byor pa kun rdzob kyi bden pa mi shes pa tsam gyis bskyed pa rang bzhin med par rtogs nas de'i stong pa nyid do /
don dam pa'i mtshan nyid rtogs pa ni mtha' gnyis su lhung bar mi 'gyur te /
kiṃ tadāsīdyadidānīṃ nāstītyevaṃ pūrvaṃ bhāvasvabhāvānupalambhāt paścādapi nāstitāṃ na pratipadyate gang zhig da lta med par gyur pa de'i tshe na /
ci zhig yod par 'gyur zhes de ltar sngar dngos po'i rang bzhin ma dmigs pas phyis kyang med pa nyid du mi rtogs la /
pratibimbākārāyāśca lokasaṃvṛterabādhanāt karmakarmaphaladharmādharmādikamapi na bādhate /
na cāpi paramārthaṃ bhāvasvabhāvatvena samāropayati /
niḥsvabhāvānāmeva padārthānāṃ karmaphalādidarśanāt sasvabhāvanāṃ cādarśanāt 		'jig rten gyi kun rdzob gzugs brnyan dang 'dra ba la gnod pa ma byas pas /
las dang las kyi 'bras bu dang chos dang chos ma yin pa la yang gnod pa la ma yin no /
don dam pa dngos po nyid du sgro 'dogs par byed pa yang ma yin te /
dngos po rang bzhin dang bcas pa ma yin pa rnams kho na la las kyi 'bras bu la sogs pa mthong ba'i phyir dang dngos po rang bzhin dang bcas pa yod pa ma yin pa'i phyir dang dngos po rang bzhin dang bcas par smra ba rnams kyi ltar yang /
yastu evaṃ satyadvayavibhāgamapaśyan śūnyatāṃ saṃskārāṇāṃ paśyati, sa śūnyatāṃ paśyan mumukṣurnāstitāṃ vā saṃskārāṇāṃ parikalpayed, yadi vā śūnyatāṃ kāṃcidbhāvataḥ satīm, tasyāścāśrayārthaṃ bhāvasvabhāvamapi parikalpayet las dang las kyi 'bras bu ma mthong ba dang rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba la sogs pa thams cad ma mthong ba'i phyir ro /
gang gis de ltar bden pa gnyis kyi rnam bar dbye ba ma mthong bar 'du byed rnams stong pa nyid du mthong ba des ni stong pa nyid mthong bas 'du byed rnams yod pa ma yin pa nyid du rtog par byed la /
yang na stong pa nyid 'ga' zhig dngos por brtags nas /
de'i rten gyi ched du dngos po'i rang bzhin yang rtog par byed de /
ubhayathā cāsya durdṛṣṭā śūnyatā niyataṃ vināśayet /
kathaṃ kṛtvā? yadi tāvatsarvamidaṃ śūnyaṃ sarvaṃ nāstīti parikalpayet, tadāsya mithyādṛṣṭirāpadyate /
yathoktam 		de ni gnyi ga ltar yang stong pa nyid la lta nyes pas nges par phung bar byed pa yin no /
ji ltar zhe na /
re zhig /
gal te thams cad stong pa ste /
thams cad yod pa ma yin no /
zhes rtog na ni de'i tshe /
'di log par lta bar 'gyur te /
ji skad du /
vināśayati durdṛṣṭo dharmo 'yamavipaścitam chos 'di log par bzung gyur na /
mi mkhas rnams ni chud kyang za /
nāstitādṛṣṭisamale yasmādasminnimajjati 'di ltar med par lta ba yi /
mi gtsang der ni bying bar 'gyur /
zhes bshad do /
atha sarvāpavādaṃ kartuṃ necchati, tadā niyatamasya śūnyatāyāḥ pratikṣepa āpadyate /
kathaṃ hi nāma amī bhāvāḥ sakalasurāsuranaralokairupalabhyamānā api śūnyā bhaviṣyanti? tasmānna niḥsvabhāvārthaḥ śūnyatārthaḥ, ityevaṃ pratikṣipya saddharmavyasanasaṃvartanīyena pāpakena karmaṇā niyatamapāyānvayāt 		ci ste yang thams cad la skur pa 'debs par mi 'dod na ni de'i tshe /
ji ltar dngos po 'di ngag dmigs su zin kyang stong pa nyid du ji ltar 'gyur te /
de'i phyir rang bzhin med pa'i don ni stong pa nyid kyi don ma yin no zhes 'di nges par stong pa nyid spong bar 'gyur te /
de ltar spangs nas chos kyis phongs par 'gyur ba'i las kyis nges par ngan 'gror 'gro bar 'gyur ro /
yathoktamāryaratnāvalyām ji skad du rin po che'i phreng ba las /
aparo 'pyasya durjñānānmūrkhaḥ paṇḍitamānikaḥ gzhan yang 'di ni log bzung na /
blun po mkhas pa'i nga rgyal can /
pratikṣepavinaṣṭātmā yātyavīcimadhomukhaḥ spong bas ma rung bdag nyid can /
mnar med par ni spyi tshugs 'gro /
iti /
evaṃ tāvadabhāvena gṛhyamāṇā śūnyatā grahītāraṃ vināśayati 		zhes bshad do /
de ltar na re zhig stong pa nyid la dngos po med par bzung bas na /
athāyaṃ bhāvena śūnyatāṃ parikalpayet, tadāśrayāṇāṃ ca saṃskārāṇāmastitvam, evamapi nirvāṇagāmini mārge vipratipannatvācchūnyatopadeśavihvalo jāyeta /
tadevaṃ bhāvarūpeṇāpi śūnyatā gṛhyamāṇā grahītāraṃ vināśayati /
nanu ca yadupakārakaṃ tadanyathā [kriyamāṇamakāloptamiva bījaṃ na phalāya kalpate, kāloptaṃ ca mahate phalalābhāya jāyate, evameva maṇimantrauṣadhādibhi] rgṛhyamāṇaḥ [sarpaḥ] mahāntaṃ dhanaskandhamāvahati śiromaṇigrahaṇāt, tena ca vyālagrāhakāṇāṃ jīvikākalpanāt 		'dzin pa po phung bar byed pa yin no; ;ci ste bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi stong pa nyid dang de'i rten 'du byed rnams yod pa nyid du rtog par byed pa de lta na yang mya ngan las 'das par 'gro ba'i lam la log par zhugs pa'i phyir /
stong pa nyid bstan pa 'bras bu med pa nyid du 'gyur ro; ;de'i phyir de ltar na stong pa nyid dngos po'i ngo bor gzung ba na yang 'dzin pa po phung bar byed do /
gal te phan 'dogs pa gang yin pa de rnam pa gzhan du gzung na /
phan 'dogs par ma gyur mod /
gnod par byed par ni ji ltar 'gyur te /
'bru dag go rims las nyams par btab pa na /
'debs pa po brlag par byed pa ni ma yin no zhe na /
de'i phyir slob dpon gyis brjod par bzhed pa'i don ston pa'i dpe gsungs pa ni /
ji ltar sbrul la bzung nyes dang /
rig sngags nyes par bsgrubs pa bzhin /
zhes bya ba ste /
ji ltar sbrul sman dang sngags kyi stobs kyis man ngag ji lta ba bzhin bzung na nor gyi phung po chen po 'gugs par byed la /
ji ltar nye bar bstan pa bor nas 'dzin na ni 'dzin pa po nyid phung bar byed pa yin no /
yathoddeśatiraskāreṇa tu gṛhyamāṇo grahītārameva vināśayati /
yathā ca yathopadeśaṃ prasādhitā vidyā sādhakamanugṛhṇāti, upadeśaparibhraṣṭā tu sādhyamānā sādhakameva vināśayati, evamihāpi yathopadeśaṃ śūnyatā mahatī vidyā sādhyamānā gṛhyamāṇā bhāvābhāvādigrāhatiraskāreṇa madhyamayā pratipadā grahītāraṃ parameṇa jātijarāmaraṇādiduḥkhahutāśanaśamanaikarasena nirupadhiśeṣanirvāṇajaladharadhārāvarṣamukhena yojayati /
yathopadeśaviśeṣavigamena tu gṛhyamāṇā niyataṃ yathoditena nyāyena grahītārameva vināśayati /
yataścaivaṃ śūnyatā durgṛhītā grahītāraṃ vināśayati, mandaprajñaiśca aśakyā samyaggrahītum 		yang ji ltar man ngag ji lta ba bzhin rab tu bsgrubs ba'i rig sngags kyis ni sgrub pa po la phan 'dogs par byed la /
man ngag las nyams par bsgrubs na ni sgrub pa po nyid brlag par byed pa yin no /
de bzhin du 'dir yang nye bar bstan pa ji lta ba bzhin du stong pa nyid bzung na ni /
'dzin pa po mya ngan las 'das pa'i bde ba mchog la sbyor bar byed la /
ji ltar nye bar bstan par spangs nas bzung na ni /
nges par ji skad bshad pa'i tshul gyis 'dzin pa po nyid phung bar byed pa yin no /
gang gi phyir de ltar stong pa nyid la bzung nyes pas 'dzin pa po phung bar byed la /
shes rab zhan pa dag gis kyang yang dag par 'dzin par mi nus pa /
de phyir zhan pas chos 'di yi /
gting rtogs dka' bar mkhyen gyur nas /
thub pa'i thugs ni chos bstan las /
ataśca pratyudāvṛttaṃ cittaṃ deśayituṃ muneḥ /
dharmaṃ matvāsya dharmasya mandairduravagāhatām /
yasmādayaṃ śūnyatālakṣaṇo dharmo mandamedhasamalpaprajñaṃ sattvaṃ viparyāsagrahaṇādvināśayati, ata eva asya dharmasya mandairduravagāhatāṃ matvā anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbudhya sarvasattvadhātuṃ cāvalokya dharmasya cātigāmbhīryam, saddharmaṃ deśayituṃ cittaṃ pratinivṛttaṃ munerbuddhasya bhagavato mahopāyajñānaviśeṣaśālinaḥ 		rab tu log par gyur pa yin /
gang gi phyir phyin ci log tu bzung bas /
stong pa nyid kyi mtshan nyid kyi chos 'dis shes rab chung ba ste /
sems can spobs pa chung ba phung bar byed pa de nyid kyi phyir /
bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas /
sems can thams cad kyi khams dang chos shin tu zab pa la gzigs te /
zhan pa dag gis chos 'di'i don rtogs par dka' bar mkhyen par gyur nas thub pa bcom ldan 'das kyi thugs chos ston pa las log par gyur pa yin no /
yathoktaṃ sūtre /
atha bhagavato 'cirābhisaṃbuddhasyaitadabhavat /
adhigato mayā dharmo gambhīro gambhīrāvabhāso 'tarko 'tarkāvacaraḥ sūkṣmaḥ paṇḍitavijñavedanīyaḥ 		ji skad du /
mdo las /
de nas bcom ldan 'das mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas ring por ma lon par 'di snyam du dgongs te /
ngas chos zab mo zab par snang ba brtag par bya ba ma yin zhing /
rtog ge'i spyod yul ma yin pa /
zhib mo mkhas shing mdzangs par rig par bya ba thugs su chud de /
de gal te ngas gzhan dag la bstan na /
gzhan gyis nga'i de rtogs par mi 'gyur /
sacettamahaṃ pareṣāmārocayeyam, pare ca me na vibhāvayeyuḥ, sa mama vighātaḥ syāt, klamathaḥ syāt, cetaso 'nudayaḥ syāt des nga la gnod par 'gyur zhing zhum par 'gyur /
thugs mi spro bar 'gyur bas gang bdag nyid gcig pu dgon pa rab tu dben pa mthong ba'i chos la /
yannvahamekākyaraṇye pravivikte dṛṣṭadharmasukhavihāramanuprāpto vihareyam bde ba la reg par gnas par rab tu thob pas gnas par bya'o zhes bya ba rgyas par gsungs pa lta bu'o /
iti vistaraḥ /
tadevaṃ satyadvayāviparītavyavasthāmavijñāya 		de'i phyir de ltar bden pa gnyis phyin ci ma log par rnam par gnas pa ma shes par /
śūnyatāyāmadhilayaṃ yaṃ punaḥ kurute bhavān skyon du thal bar 'gyur ba ni /
stong la 'thad pa ma yin pas /
doṣaprasaṅgo nāsmākaṃ sa śūnye nopapadyate khyed ni stong nyid spong byed pa /
gang de nga la mi 'thad do /
yo 'yaṃ bhavatā mahān doṣaprasaṅgo 'smāsu prakṣiptaḥ gang gi phyir khyod kyis kho bo cag la gal te 'di dag kun stong la /
yadi śūnyamidaṃ sarvamudayo nāsti na vyayaḥ /
ityādinā, sa yasmāt satyadvayavyavasthānabhijñena satā śūnyatāṃ śūnyatārthaṃ śūnyatāprayojanaṃ ca yathāvadabuddhā upakṣiptaḥ, so 'smākaṃ śūnye śūnyatāvāde nopapadyate 		'byung ba med cing 'jig pa med /
ces bya ba la sogs pas skyon chen por thal bar nye bar bkod pa gang yin pa de ni /
bden pa gnyis kyi rnam par gzhag pa mngon par ma shes pas /
stong pa nyid dang stong pa nyid kyi don dang stong pa nyid kyi dgos pa ji lta ba bzhin khong du ma chud pas bkod pa yin pas /
kho bo cag gi stong pa la ste /
yataśca nopapadyate, ato yaṃ bhavān doṣaprasaṅgaṃ śūnyatāyāmudbhāvayan śūnyatāyāmadhilayamadhikṣepaṃ nirākaraṇaṃ pratikṣepaṃ karoti, so 'dhilayo 'smākaṃ nopapadyate stong pa nyid du smra ba la de'i 'thad pa ma yin no /
gang gi phyir mi 'thad pa de'i phyir khyod stong pa nyid la nye bar thal bar brjod cing /
stong pa nyid spong bar byed pa ste /
'dor zhing sel la zlog par byed pa gang yin pa'i spong ba de nged cag la mi 'thad do /
abhāvārthaṃ hi śūnyatārthamadhyāropya prasaṅga udbhāvito bhavatā 'di ltar khyed kyis ni dngos po med pa'i don stong pa nyid kyi don du sgro btags nas thal ba brjod pa yin na /
na ca vayamabhāvārthaṃ śūnyatārthaṃ vyācakṣmahe, kiṃ tarhi pratītyasamutpādārtham kho bo cag ni stong pa nyid kyi don dngos po med pa'i don du mi 'chad cing /
'o na ci zhe na /
rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'i don to /
ityato na yuktametat śūnyatādarśanadūṣaṇam de'i phyir stong pa nyid du lta ba la sun 'byin pa 'di mi rigs so /
na ca kevalaṃ yathoktadoṣaprasaṅgo 'smatpakṣe nāvatarati, api khalu sarvameva satyādi vyavasthānaṃ sutarāmupapadyate iti pratipādayannāha /
sarvaṃ ca yujyate tasya śūnyatā yasya yujyate 		kho bo cag gi phyogs la ji skad smras pa'i skyon du thal ba mi 'jug pa 'ba' zhig tu ma zad kyi /
'on kyang bden pa la sogs pa rnam par gzhag pa thams cad ches shin tu 'thad pa yin no zhes bstan pa'i phyir gsungs pa /
sarvaṃna yujyate tasya śūnyaṃ yasya na yujyate /
yasya hi sarvabhāvasvabhāvaśūnyateyaṃ yujyate, tasya sarvametad yathopavarṇitaṃ yujyate /
kathaṃ kṛtvā? yasmāt pratītyasamutpādaṃ hi vayaṃ śūnyateti vyācakṣmahe /
yaḥ pratyayairjāyati sa hyajāto na tasya utpādu svabhāvato 'sti /
yaḥ pratyayādhīnu sa śūnya ukto yaḥ śūnyatāṃ jānati so 'pramattaḥ /
iti gāthāvacanāt /
"śūnyāḥ sarvadharmā niḥsvabhāvayogena" iti prajñāpāramitābhidhānāt /
tasmādyasyeyaṃ śūnyatā yujyate rocate kṣamate, tasya pratītyasamutpādo yujyate /
yasya pratītyasamutpādo yujyate, tasya catvāryāryasatyāni yujyante /
kathaṃ kṛtvā? yasmāt pratītyasamutpannaṃ hi duḥkhaṃ bhavati nāpratītyasamutpannam /
tacca niḥsvabhāvatvācchūnyam 		gang la stong pa nyid rung ba /
de la thams cad rung bar 'gyur /
gang la stong nyid mi rung ba /
de la thams cad mi rung 'gyur /
gang la dngos po thams cad rang bzhin gyis stong pa nyid 'di rung ba de la ji skad smras pa de dag thams cad rung bar 'gyur ro /
ji ltar zhe na /
gang gi phyir kho bo cag ni rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba la stong pa nyid ces smra ste /
de'i phyir /
gang la stong pa nyid 'di rung ba de la rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba rung la /
gang la rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba rung ba de la 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi rnams rung bar 'gyur ro /
ji ltar zhe na /
gang gi phyir rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba nyid sdug bsngal du 'gyur gyi /
rten cing 'brel par mi 'byung ba ni ma yin no /
sati ca duḥkhe duḥkha samudayo duḥkhanirodho duḥkhanirodhagāminī ca pratipad yujyate /
tataśca duḥkhaparijñānaṃ samudayaprahāṇaṃ nirodhasākṣātkaraṇaṃ mārgabhāvanā ca yujyate 		de ni rang bzhin med pas stong par 'gyur ro; ;sdug bsngal yod na ni sdug bsngal kun 'byung ba dang sdug bsngal 'gog pa dang sdug bsngal 'gog par 'gro ba'i lam rung bar 'gyur ro /
de'i phyir sdug bsngal yongs su shes pa dang kun 'byung spang ba dang 'gog pa mngon du bya ba dang lam bsgom par yang rung ngo /
sati ca duḥkhādisatyaparijñānādike phalāni yujyante sdug bsngal la sogs pa'i bden pa yongs su shes pa la sogs pa yod na ni 'bras bu rnams rung bar 'gyur ro /
satsu ca phaleṣu phalasthā yujyante 'bras bu rnams yod na 'bras bu la gnas pa dag rung ngo /
satsu ca phalastheṣu pratipannakā yujyante 'bras bu la gnas pa dag yod na ni zhugs pa dag kyang rung bar 'gyur ro /
satsu ca pratipannakaphalastheṣu saṃgho yujyate 'bras bu la gnas pa dang zhugs pa dag yod na ni dge 'dun rung ngo /
āryasatyānāṃ ca sadbhāve sati saddharmo 'pi yujyate 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams yod na /
dam pa'i chos kyang rung bar 'gyur ro /
sati ca saddharme saṃghe ca buddho 'pi yujyate dam pa'i chos dang dge 'dun yod na ni sangs rgyas kyang rung bar 'gyur ro /
tataśca trīṇyapi ratnāni yujyante de'i phyir dkon mchog gsum yang rung bar 'gyur ro /
laukikalokottarāśca padārthāḥ sarve viśeṣādhigamā yujyante 'jig rten pa dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos thams cad khyad par du rtogs pa thams cad kyang rung la /
dharmādharmaṃ tatphalaṃ sugatidurgatiḥ laukikāśca sarvasaṃvyavahārā yujyante /
tadevam 		chos dang chos ma yin pa dag dang de'i 'bras bu dang 'jig rten pa'i tha snyad dag kyang rung bar 'gyur ro; ;de'i phyir de ltar na /
sarvaṃ ca yujyate tasya śūnyatā yasya yujyate gang la stong pa nyid rung ba de la thams cad rung bar 'gyur ro /
yasya sarvabhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatā yujyate, tasya sarvametad yathoditaṃ yujyate, saṃpadyate ityarthaḥ gang la stong pa nyid mi rung ba de la ni rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba nyid med pas /
thams cad mi rung bar 'gyur ro /
yasya tu śūnyatā yathoditā na yujyate, tasya pratītyasamutpādābhāvāt sarvaṃ na yujyate ji ltar mi rung ba de ltar ni rgyas par ston par 'gyur ro; ;de'i phyir de ltar kho bo cag gi phyogs chos yongs su dag cing /
yathā ca na yujyate, tathā vistareṇa pratipādayiṣyati /
tadevamāsmākīne supariśuddhatare sarvavyavasthāsu aviruddhe vyavasthite, atisthūle atyāsanne tadviruddhe ca svakīye pakṣe doṣavati atimogho yathāvadavasthitau guṇadoṣāvapaśyan /
sa tvaṃ doṣānātmanīnānasmāsu paripātayan 		rnam par gzhag pa thams cad dang mi 'gal bar rnam par gnas pa yin pa dang rang gi phyogs rags pa shin tu nyes pa'i skyon dang bral bar de dag dang 'gal ba la shin tu blun pas /
yon tan dang skyon ji ltar gnas pa dag ma mthong ba /
khyod ni rang gi skyon rnams ni /
nga la yongs su sgyur byed pa /
aśvamevābhiruḍhaḥ sannaśvamevāsi vismṛtaḥ rta la mngon par zhon bzhin du /
rta nyid brjed par gyur pa bzhin /
yathā hi kaścid yamevāśvamārūḍhaḥ, tameva vismṛtaḥ san, tadapahāradoṣeṇa parānupālabhate, evameva bhavān pratītyasamutpādalakṣaṇaśūnyatādarśanāśvamārūḍha eva atyantavikṣepāttamanupalambhamāno 'smān parivadati ji ltar 'ga' zhig rta gang la zhon pa de nyid brjed nas de phrogs pa'i nyes pas gzhan la klan ka tshol ba de bzhin du /
khyod kyang stong pa nyid rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'i mtshan nyid can gyi rta la zhon pa kho na yin bzhin du /
ke punaste parasya doṣāḥ, yānanupalabhamānaḥ śūnyatāvādinameva upālabhate iti, tān pratipādayannāha shin tu rnam par g yengs pas de ma dmigs pas kho bo cag la yongs su rtsod pa yin no /
gang dag mi dmigs pas stong pa nyid du smras pa kho na la klan ka tshol ba /
gzhan gyi skyon de dag kyang gang zhe na /
svabhāvādyadi bhāvānāṃ sadbhāvamanupaśyasi /
ahetupratyayān bhāvāṃstvamevaṃ sati paśyasi 		de dag rgyas par bstan pa'i phyir /
gal te dngos rnams rang bzhin la /
yod par rjes su lta byed na /
de lta yod na dngos po rnams /
rgyu rkyen med par khyod lta'o /
zhes gsungs te /
yadi tvaṃ svabhāvena vidyamānān bhāvān paśyasi, tadā svabhāvasya hetupratyayanirapekṣatvāt ahetupratyayān avidyamānahetupratyayān padārthān bāhyādhyātmikabhedabhinnān nirhetukān tvamevaṃ sati paśyasi /
sati ca ahetukatvābhyupagame 		gal te khyod dngos po rnams rang bzhin gyis yod par lta bar byed na /
de'i tshe rang bzhin ni rgyu dang rkyen la mi ltos pa'i phyir /
dngos po rnams rgyu rkyen med pa ste /
rgyu dang rkyen yod pa ma yin zhing /
rgyu med par khyod lta ba ma yin no /
rgyu med par lta ba khas len pa ma yin na yang /
kāryaṃ ca kāraṇaṃ caiva kartāraṃ karaṇaṃ kriyām 'bras bu dang ni rgyu nyid dang /
byed pa po dang byed dang bya /
utpādaṃ ca nirodhaṃ ca phalaṃ ca pratibādhase /
kathaṃ kṛtvā? yadīha ghaṭaḥ svabhāvato 'stīti parikalpayasi, tadā asya svabhāvato vidyamānasya kiṃ mṛdādibhirhetupratyayaiḥ prayojanamiti teṣāmabhāvaḥ syāt 		skye ba dang ni 'gag pa dang /
'bras bu la yang gnod pa byed pa yin no /
ji ltar zhe na /
gal te bum pa rang bzhin gyis yod do zhes rtogs na ni /
de'i tshe rang bzhin gyis yod pa de la 'jim pa la sogs pa rgyu dang rkyen dag gis ci dgos te /
de'i phyir de dag med la /
nirhetukaṃ ca kāryaṃ ghaṭākhyaṃ nopapadyate bum pa zhes bya ba'i 'bras bu rgyu med pa yang 'thad pa ma yin no /
asati cāsmiṃścakrādikasya karaṇasya, kartuḥ kumbhakārasya ghaṭakaraṇakriyāyāścābhāvā dutpādanirodhayorabhāvaḥ de med na ni byed pa po rdza mkhan dang byed pa po 'khor lo la sogs pa dang bum pa byed pa'i bya ba yang med do /
de dag med pas skye ba dang 'gag pa dag kyang med la /
skye ba dang 'gag pa dag yod pa ma yin na /
'bras bu yang yod par ga la 'gyur /
asatoścotpādanirodhayoḥ kutaḥ phalam? iti sasvabhāvābhyupagame sati sarvametat kāryādikaṃ pratibādhase de'i phyir dngos po rang bzhin dang bcas par khas len na /
'bras bu la sogs pa de dag thams cad la gnod pa byed pa yin no /
tadevaṃ bhavataḥ sasvabhāvābhyupagame sati sarvameva na yujyate de'i phyir de ltar dngos po rang bzhin dang bcas par khas len na /
khyod la thams cad mi rung ba yin no /
asmākaṃ tu bhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatāvādināṃ sarvametadupapadyate kho bo cag stong pa nyid du smras pa rnams la 'di dag thams cad 'thad pa ma yin no /
kiṃ kāraṇam? yasmādvayam ci'i phyir zhe na /
'di ltar kho bo cag gis ni /
yaḥ pratītyasamutpādaḥ śūnyatāṃ tāṃ pracakṣmahe rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba gang /
de ni stong pa nyid du bshad /
sā prajñaptirupādāya pratipatsaiva madhyamā de ni brten nas gdags pa ste /
de nyid dbu ma'i lam yin no /
rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba ste /
yo 'yaṃ pratītyasamutpādo hetupratyayānapekṣya aṅkuravijñānādīnāṃ prādurbhāvaḥ, sa svabhāve nānutpādaḥ rgyu dang rkyen dag la ltos nas /
myu gu dang rnam par shes pa la sogs pa rnams 'byung ba gang yin pa de ni /
yaśca svabhāvenānutpādo bhāvānāṃ sā śūnyatā rang bzhin gyis ma skyes pa yin na; gang rang bzhin gyis ma skyes pa de ni stong pa nyid yin te /
yathā bhagavatoktam ji skad du /
bcom ldan 'das kyis /
yaḥ pratyatyairjāyati sa hyajāto na tasya utpādu svabhāvato 'sti gang zhig rkyen las skyes pa de ma skyes /
de las skye ba'i rang bzhin yod ma yin /
yaḥ pratyayādhīnu sa śūnya ukto yaḥ śūnyatāṃ jānati so 'pramattaḥ rkyen la rag las gang de stong par bshad /
gang zhig stong nyid shes de bag yod yin /
iti /
tathā āryalaṅkāvatāre /
"svabhāvānutpattiṃ saṃdhāya mahāmate sarvadharmāḥ śūnyā iti mayā deśitāḥ" 		zhes gsungs pa dang ji skad du 'phags pa lang kar gshegs pa las /
blo gros chen po rang bzhin gyis ma skyes pa la dgongs nas /
iti vistareṇoktam /
dvayardhaśatikāyām /
"śūnyāḥ sarvadharmā niḥsvabhāvayogena" /
iti /
yā ceyaṃ svabhāvaśūnyatā sā prajñaptirupādāya, saiva śūnyatā upādāya prajñaptiriti vyavasthāpyate 		ngas chos thams cad skye ba med par gsungs so zhes rgyas par gsungs pa dang de bzhin du 'phags pa brgya lnga bcu pa las kyang /
chos thams cad stong pa ste rang bzhin med pa'i tshul gyis so zhes gsungs pa lta bu'o /
stong pa nyid gang yin pa de ni brten nas gdags pa ste /
stong pa nyid de nyid ni brten nas gdags pa zhes bya bar rnam par gzhag go /
cakrādīnyupādāya rathāṅgāni rathaḥ prajñapyate /
tasya yā svāṅgānyupādāya prajñaptiḥ, sā svabhāvenānutpattiḥ, yā ca svabhāvenānutpattiḥ, sā śūnyatā 		'khor lo la sogs pa shing rta'i yan lag la brten nas shing rtar 'dogs la /
de'i rang gi yan lag la brten nas btags pa gang yin pa de ni /
rang bzhin gyis ma skyes pa yin la /
gang rang bzhin gyis ma skyes pa de ni stong pa nyid yin zhing /
saiva svabhāvānutpattilakṣaṇā śūnyatā madhyamā pratipaditi vyavasthāpyate /
yasya hi svabhāvenānutpattiḥ, tasya astitvābhāvaḥ, svabhāvena cānutpannasya vigamābhāvānnāstitvābhāva iti 		rang bzhin gyis ma skyes pa'i mtshan nyid can gyi stong pa nyid de nyid ni dbu ma'i lam yin zhes bya bar rnam par gzhag ste /
'di ltar gang zhig rang bzhin gyis ma skyes pa de la ni /
yod pa nyid med la /
rang bzhin gyis ma skyes pa la 'jig pa med pas med pa nyid med pa de'i phyir /
ato bhāvābhāvāntadvayarahitatvāt sarvasvabhāvānutpattilakṣaṇā śūnyatā madhyamā pratipat, madhyamo mārga ityucyate yod pa dang med pa'i mtha' gnyis dang bral ba de'i phyir /
rang bzhin gyis ma skyes pa'i mtshan nyid can gyi stong pa nyid de nyid ni dbu ma'i lam ste /
tadevaṃ pratītyasamutpādasyaivaitā viśeṣa saṃjñāḥ /
śūnyatā, upādāya prajñaptiḥ, madhyamā pratipad iti 		dbu ma'i shul zhes bya'o /
de'i phyir de ltar na stong pa nyid dang brten nas gdags pa dang dbu ma'i lam zhes bya ba 'di dag ni rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba nyid kyi ming gi bye brag yin no /
vicāryamāṇaśca sarvathā rnam par dpyad na ni rnam pa thams cad du /
apratītya samutpanno dharmaḥ kaścinna vidyate gang phyir rten 'byung ma yin pa'i /
chos 'ga' yod pa ma yin la /
yasmāttasmādaśūnyo hi dharmaḥ kaścinna vidyate de phyir stong pa ma yin pa'i /
chos 'ga' yod pa ma yin no /
yo hi apratītyasamutpanno dharmaḥ, sa na saṃvidyate gang zhig rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba ma yin pa'i chos de ni yod pa ma yin te /
yathoktaṃ śatake ji skad du brgya pa las /
apratītyāstitā nāsti kadācitkasyacitkvacit gang zhig gang na nam gyi tshe 'ang /
ma brten par ni yod nyid med /
na kadācitkvacitkaścidvidyate tena śāśvataḥ des na nam yang 'ga' zhig tu /
rtag pa 'ga' yang yod ma yin /
ākāśādīni kalpyante nityānīti pṛthagjanaiḥ nam mkha' la sogs rtag go zhes /
so so'i skye bo dag gis rtogs /
laukikenāpi teṣvarthānna paśyanti vicakṣaṇāḥ mkhas pa rnams kyis de dag la /
'jig rten pas kyang don ma mthong /
iti /
uktaṃ ca bhagavatā 		zhes bshad do /
bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang /
pratītya dharmānadhigacchate vidū na cāntadṛṣṭīya karoti niśrayam mkhas pas rten 'byung chos rnams rtogs 'gyur te /
mthar lta ba la brten par yod mi byed /
sahetu sapratyaya dharma jānati ahetu apratyaya nāsti dharmatā rgyu dang bcas shing rkyen bcas chos shes kyi /
rgyu med rkyen med chos nyid yod ma yin /
evam /
apratītya samutpanno dharmaḥ kaścinna vidyate /
apratīsamutpannaśca śūnyaḥ /
tasmādaśūnyo dharmo nāsti /
yata etadevam, ato 'smākaṃ sarvadharmāścaśūnyāḥ, na ca paroktadoṣaprasaṅgaḥ 		zhes gsungs so /
de ltar rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba ma yin pa'i chos 'ga' yang yod pa ma yin la rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba yang stong pa yin pa de'i phyir stong ba ma yin pa'i chos 'ga' yang yod pa ma yin no /
gang gi phyir 'di de ltar yin pa de'i phyir /
kho bo cag gi ltar na chos thams cad stong pa yin zhing /
gzhan gyis smras pa'i skyon du thal bar 'gyur ba yang ma yin no /
bhavatastu sasvabhāvavādinaḥ dngos po rang bzhin dang bcas par smra ba khyod kyi ltar na ni /
yadyaśūnyamidaṃ sarvamudayo nāsti na vyayaḥ gal te 'di kun mi stong na /
'byung ba med cing 'jig pa med pa yin no /
tadā niyatamudayavyayayorabhāve sati 'byung ba dang 'jig pa med na de'i tshe nges par /
caturṇāmāryasatyānāmabhāvaste prasajyate 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi po rnams /
khyod la med par thal bar 'gyur ro /
kiṃ kāraṇam? yasmāt ci'i phyir zhe na /
gang gi phyir /
apratītya samutpannaṃ kuto duḥkhaṃ bhaviṣyati rten cing 'brel 'byung ma yin na /
sdug bsngal yod par ga la 'gyur /
anityamuktaṃ duḥkhaṃ hi tatsvābhāvye na vidyate mi rtag sdug bsngal gsungs pa de /
rang bzhin nyid la yod ma yin /
yaddhi sasvabhāvam, na tatpratītyotpadyate gang zhig rang bzhin dang bcas pa de ni brten nas 'byung ba ma yin zhing /
yacca apratītya samutpannam, na tadanityaṃ bhavati /
na hi gaganakusumamavidyamānamanityam /
anityaṃ ca duḥkhamuktaṃ bhavagatā 		gang zhig rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba ma yin pa de ni mi rtag pa ma yin te nam mkha'i me tog ni mi rtag pa ma yin no /
sdug bsngal yang mi rtag pa yin par ni /
yadanityaṃ tadduḥkhamiti /
tathā ca śatakaśāstre 		gang mi rtag pa de ni sdug bsngal lo zhes bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs so /
de bzhin du brgya pa las kyang /
anityasya dhruvā pīḍā pīḍā yasya na tatsukham mi rtag pa la nges par gnod /
gang la gnod yod de bde min /
tasmādanityaṃ yatsarvaṃ duḥkhaṃ taditi jāyate de phyir gang zhig mi rtag pa /
de ni thams cad sdug bsngal 'gyur /
iti /
yacca anityaṃ svābhāvye sasvabhāvatve 'bhyupagamyamāne bhāvānām, tanna vidyata iti 		zhes bshad do /
mi rtag pa de yang rang bzhin nyid la ste /
rang bzhin dang bcas pa nyid du khas len na dngos po rnams la yod pa ma yin no /
evaṃ tāvat sasvabhāvatve sati bhāvānāṃ duḥkhaṃ na yujyate de ltar na re zhig dngos po rnams rang bzhin dang bcas pa nyid yin na /
sdug bsngal mi rung ba yin no /
na ca kevalaṃ duḥkhameva na yujyate, sati sasvabhāvābhyupagame samudayo 'pi na yujyate iti pratipādayannāha /
svabhāvato vidyamānaṃ kiṃ punaḥ samudeṣyate /
tasmātsamudayo nāsti śūnyatāṃ pratibādhataḥ 		sdug bsngal nyid mi rung ba 'ba' zhig tu ma zad kyi /
rang bzhin dang bcas par khas blangs na /
kun 'byung ba yang mi rung ngo zhes bstan pa'i phyir /
rang bzhin las ni yod yin na /
ci zhig kun du 'byung bar 'gyur /
de phyir stong nyid gnod byed la /
kun 'byung yod pa ma yin no /
iha samudetyasmādduḥkhamiti duḥkhasya hetu [taḥ] samudaya ityucyate zhes gsungs te /
'dir 'di las sdug bsngal kun 'byung bas na /
sdug bsngal gyi rgyu las kun 'byung zhes bya'o /
tadasya duḥkhasya śūnyatāṃ pratibādhamānasya sasvabhāvaṃ duḥkhamabhyupagacchataḥ tasya punarutpādavaiyarthyāt taddhetukalpanāvaiyarthyameva, ityevaṃ śūnyatāṃ pratibādhamānasya samudayo 'pi bhavato na yujyate de'i phyir sdug bsngal stong pa nyid la gnod pa byed cing /
sdug bsngal rang bzhin dang bcas par khas len pa de'i ltar na /
de yang skye ba don med pa'i phyir /
de'i rgyu rtog pa don med pa nyid do /
de ltar na stong pa nyid la gnod pa byed pa khyod la kun 'byung yang mi rung ngo /
svābhāvikameva duḥkhamabhyupagacchato duḥkhanirodho 'pi na yujyate iti pratipādayannāha sdug bsngal rang bzhin gyis yod pa nyid du khas len pa la /
sdug bsngal 'gog pa yang mi rung ngo zhes bstan pa'i phyir /
na nirodhaḥ svabhāvena sato duḥkhasya vidyate /
svabhāvaparyavasthānānnirodhaṃ pratibādhase /
yadi hi svabhāvato duḥkhaṃ syāt, tadā svabhāvasyānapāyitvāt kuto 'sya nirodhatvamiti? evaṃ svabhāvaparyavasthānāt svabhāvaṃ gṛhītvā pratyavatiṣṭhamāno duḥkhanirodhamapi pratibādhase 		sdug bsngal rang bzhin gyis yod la /
'gog pa yod pa ma yin no /
rang bzhin nyid ni yongs gnas phyir /
'gog la gnod pa byed pa yin /
zhes gsungs te /
gal te sdug bsngal rang bzhin gyis yod na /
de'i tshe rang bzhin la ldog pa med pa'i phyir 'gog pa ga la yod /
de ltar na rang bzhin yongs su gnas pa'i phyir /
rang bzhin yongs su bzung nas phyir ldog par byed pa ni /
sdug bsngal 'gog pa la yang gnod par byed pa yin no /
idānīmāryamārgo 'pi sasvabhāvavādino yathā nopapadyate tathā pratipādayannāha da ni dngos po rang bzhin dang bcas par smra ba la /
'phags pa'i lam yang ji ltar mi 'thad pa de ltar bstan pa'i phyir /
svābhāvye sati mārgasya bhāvanā nopapadyate lam la rang bzhin yod na ni /
sgom pa 'thad par mi 'gyur ro /
athāsau bhāvyate mārgaḥ svābhāvyaṃ te na vidyate ci ste lam de bsgom bya na /
khyed kyi rang bzhin yod ma yin /
yadi hi sasvabhāvā bhāvā bhaveyuḥ, tadā mārgo 'pi sasvabhāva eveti kṛtvā abhāvita evāsāvasti /
tasya kiṃ punarbhāvanayeti? evam 		gal te dngos po rnams rang bzhin yod par gyur na ni /
de'i tshe lam yang rang bzhin dang bcas pa nyid yin pa'i phyir ma bsgoms pa nyid du de yod pas /
de la yang bsgoms pas ci zhig bya /
svābhāvye sati mārgasya bhāvanā nopapadyate de ltar na rang bzhin yod na lam sgom pa mi 'thad do /
ci ste khyod lam de sgom par khas len na /
atha asya mārgasya bhāvanā abhyupagamyate bhavatā, evaṃ tarhi svabhāvatā āryamārgasya na syāt, kāryatvādityabhiprāyaḥ /
api ca /
duḥkhasya nirodhaprāptyarthaṃ samudayasya ca prahāṇārthaṃ bhāvanā mārgasyeṣyate 		de ltar na 'o na khyod kyi 'phags pa'i lam rang bzhin dang bcas pa nyid du mi 'gyur te /
bya ba yin pa nyid kyi phyir ro snyam du dgongs pa yin no /
gzhan yang sdug bsngal 'gog pa thob par bya ba'i phyir dang kun 'byung ba spang bar bya ba'i phyir lam sgom par 'dod pa zhig na /
pūrvoktena tu nyāyena sasvabhāvavādino bhavataḥ dngos po rang bzhin dang bcas par smra ba ltar na ni /
sngar bshad pa'i tshul gyis /
yadā duḥkhaṃ samudayo nirodhaśca na vidyate gang tshe sdug bsngal kun 'byung dang /
'gog pa yod pa ma yin na /
mārgo duḥkhanirodhatvāt katamaḥ prāpayiṣyati /
nāstyeva asau duḥkhanirodhaḥ, yannirodhānmārgo bhāvitaḥ san prāpayiṣyati 		lam gyi sdug bsngal 'gog pa ni /
gang zhig 'thob par 'gyur bar 'dod /
lam bsgoms pas 'gog pa gang zhig 'thob par 'gyur ba sdug bsngal 'gog pa de ni yod pa ma yin no /
tasmādāryamārgo 'pyevaṃ nopapadyata iti de'i phyir de ltar na /
'phags pa'i lam yang mi 'thad do /
evaṃ sasvabhāvavādinaḥ caturṇāmāryasatyānāmabhāvaḥ prāpnoti de ltar na dngos po rang bzhin dang bcas par smra ba la 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi po rnams med par 'gyur ro /
idānīṃ duḥkhādiparijñānādikamapi yathā parasya na saṃbhavati, tathā pratipādayannāha da ni gzhan la sdug bsngal la sogs pa shes pa la sogs pa yang ji skad mi srid pa de ltar bstan pa'i phyir /
gal te rang bzhin nyid kyis ni /
svabhāvenāparijñānaṃ yadi tasya punaḥ katham yongs su shes pa ma yin na /
de ni ji ltar yongs shes 'gyur /
parijñānaṃ nanu kila svabhāvaḥ samavasthitaḥ /
yadi pūrvaṃ duḥkhamaparijñātasvabhāvaṃ tat paścāt parijñāyata iti kalpyate, tadayuktam 		rang bzhin gnas pa ma yin nam /
zhes gsungs te /
gal te sdug bsngal sngar yongs su ma shes pa'i rang bzhin du gyur pa las /
de phyis yongs su shes pa yin no zhes rtogs na /
de ni mi rigs so /
kiṃ kāraṇam? yasmānnanu kila svabhāvaḥ samavasthitaḥ ci'i phyir zhe na /
'di ltar rang bzhin gnas pa ma yin nam ste /
rang bzhin gang yin pa de ni /
yo hi svabhāvaḥ, sa kila loke samavasthitaḥ, naivānyathātvamāpadyate, vahnerauṣṇyavat /
yadā ca svabhāvasyānyathātvaṃ nāsti, tadā pūrvamaparijñātasvabhāvasya duḥkhasya paścādapi parijñānaṃ nopapadyata iti /
ato duḥkhaparijñānamapi na saṃbhavati 		'jig rten na yang dag par gnas shing me'i tsha ba ltar gzhan du mi 'gyur ba yin no; ;gang gi tshe rang bzhin la gzhan du 'gyur ba nyid yod pa ma yin pa de'i tshe /
sdug bsngal sngar yongs su shes pa ma yin pa'i rang bzhin ni phyis kyang yongs su shes par mi 'thad do /
de'i phyir sdug bsngal yongs su shes pa yang mi srid do /
yadā caitadduḥkhaparijñānamapi na saṃbhavati, tadā gang gi tshe sdug bsngal yongs su shes pa yod pa ma yin pa de'i tshe /
prahāṇasākṣātkaraṇe bhāvanā caivameva te de bzhin du ni khyod nyid kyi /
spang dang mngon du bya ba dang /
parijñāvanna yujyante catvāryapi phalāni ca /
yadetat samudayasya prahāṇaṃ nirodhasya ca sākṣātkaraṇam, te ete dve prahāṇasākṣātkaraṇe yā ca mārgasya bhāvanā, eṣāpi /
evameva te duḥkhaparijñānāsaṃbhavānna yujyante /
samudayasya svabhāvenāprahīṇasya svabhāvasyānapāyitvāt paścādapi prahāṇaṃ nopapadyate 		sgom dang 'bras bu bzhi dag kyang /
yongs shes bzhin du mi rung ngo /
sdug bsngal yongs su shes pa mi srid pa de bzhin du gang kun 'byung ba spang ba dang 'gog pa mngon du bya ste spang ba dang mngon du bya ba ste gnyis dang gang yang lam sgom pa 'di dang de rnams mi rung ngo /
kun 'byung ba rang bzhin gyis ma spangs pa'i rang bzhin ni /
phyis kyang spang bar mi 'thad do /
ldog pa med pa'i phyir ro /
evaṃ bhāvanāsākṣātkaraṇe 'pi yojyam de bzhin du mngon du bya ba dang sgom pa gnyis la yang sbyar bar bya'o /
na ca kevalaṃ parijñānādikameva na saṃbhavati sasvabhāvavāde, api ca dngos po rang bzhin dang bcas par smra na /
yongs su shes pa la sogs pa mi rung ba 'ba' zhig tu ma zad kyi /
parijñāvanna yujyante catvāryapi phalāni ca /
yathā svabhāvenāparijñātasya duḥkhasya parijñānaṃ na yuktam, evaṃ svabhāvenāvidyamānasya pūrvaṃ srotaāpattiphalasya paścādastitvaṃ na saṃbhavati 		'on kyang 'bras bu bzhi dag kyang /
yongs su shes pa bzhin du mi rung ngo /
ji ltar sdug bsngal rang bzhin gyis yongs su shes pa ma yin pa yongs su shes par mi rung ba de bzhin du /
rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu sngar rang bzhin gyis yod pa ma yin pa yang phyis yod par mi srid do /
yathā srotaāpattiphalasya, evaṃ sakṛdāgāmyanāgāmyarhatphalānāmabhāvo veditavyaḥ /
na ca kevalametāni phalāni parijñāvanna yujyante, kiṃ tarhi adhigamo 'pyeṣāṃ na yujyata iti pratipādayannāha 		rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu ji lta ba de bzhin du /
lan cig phyir 'ong ba dang phyir mi 'ong ba dang dgra bcom pa'i 'bras bu rnams mi srid pa yang khong du chud par bya'o /
yongs su shes pa bzhin du 'bras bu de dag mi rung ba /
'ba' zhig tu ma zad de'o na ci zhe na /
de dag 'thob pa yang mi rung ngo zhes bstan pa'i phyir /
svabhāvenānadhigataṃ yatphalaṃ tatpunaḥ katham rang bzhin yongs su 'dzin pa yis /
'bras bu rang bzhin nyid kyi ni /
śakyaṃ samadhigantuṃ syātsvabhāvaṃ parigṛhṇataḥ /
svabhāvasyāvijahanaprakṛtikatvādbhāvasvabhāvavādamabhyupagacchataḥ pūrvamanadhigatasvabhāvānāṃ paścādapyadhigamo nopapadyate 		thob pa yin pa gang yin des /
ji ltar thob par nus par 'gyur /
zhes bya ba gsungs te /
rang bzhin du smra ba khas len pas /
sngar thob pa ma yin pa'i rang bzhin du gyur pa rnams phyis kyang thob pa mi 'thad de /
tataśca /
phalābhāve phalasthā no na santi pratipannakāḥ /
saṃgho nāsti na cetsanti te 'ṣṭau puruṣapudgalāḥ 		rang bzhin ldog pa med pa'i phyir ro /
de'i phyir /
'bras bu med na 'bras gnas med /
zhugs pa dag kyang yod ma yin /
abhāvāccāryasatyānāṃ saddharmo 'pi na vidyate gal te skyes bu gang zag brgyad /
de dag med na dge 'dun med /
dharme cāsati saṃghe ca kathaṃ buddho bhaviṣyati 'phags pa'i bden rnams med pa'i phyir /
dam pa'i chos kyang yod ma yin /
anayośca ślokayoḥ pūrvavadevārtho veditavyaḥ chos dang dge 'dun yod min na /
sangs rgyas ji ltar yod par 'gyur /
api ca /
sasvabhāvābhyupagame sati /
apratītyāpi bodhiṃ ca tava buddhaḥ prasajyate /
apratītyāpi buddhaṃ ca tava bodhiḥ prasajyate 		zhes bya ste /
tshigs su bcad pa 'di gnyis kyi don ni gong ma bzhin du rig par bya'o /
gzhan yang rang bzhin du smra ba khas len na /
khyed kyis sangs rgyas byang chub la /
ma brten par yang thal bar 'gyur /
khyed kyis byang chub sangs rgyas la /
ma brten par yang thal bar 'gyur /
yadi hi svabhāvato buddho nāma kaścid bhāvaḥ syāt, sa bodhiṃ sarvajñajñānamapratītyāpi anapekṣyāpi syāt /
akṛtrimaḥ svabhāvo hi nirapekṣaḥ paratra ca 		gal te sangs rgyas zhes bya ba dngos po 'ga' zhig rang bzhin gyis yod par gyur na ni byang chub ste /
thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes la ma brten par te /
ma ltos par yang 'gyur te; rang bzhin dag ni bcos min dang /
gzhan la ltos pa med pa yin /
iti vacanāt /
tathā vināpi buddhena bodhiḥ syāt, anapekṣyāpi buddhaṃ nirāśrayā bodhiḥ syāt 		zhes 'byung ba'i phyir ro /
de bzhin du byang chub kyang sangs rgyas med par 'gyur te /
sangs rgyas la ma ltos par yang rten med pa'i byang chub tu 'gyur te /
rang bzhin gyis grub pa'i phyir ro /
kiṃ cānyat gzhan yang /
yaścābuddhaḥ svabhāvena sa bodhāya ghaṭannapi khyod kyi rang bzhin nyid kyis ni /
sangs rgyas min pa gang yin des /
na bodhisattvacaryāyāṃ bodhiṃ te 'dhigamiṣyati /
iha hi buddhatvātpūrvamabuddhasvabhāvasya sataḥ pudgalasya satyāmapi bodhisattvacaryāyāṃ bodhyarthaṃ ghaṭamānasyāpi naiva bodhiḥ syāt, abuddhasvabhāvasya vyāvartayitumaśakyatvāt 		byang chub spyod la byang chub phyir /
btsal kyang byang chub 'thob mi 'gyur /
'dir sangs rgyas nyid kyang snga rol du sangs rgyas ma yin pa'i rang bzhin gyis gang zag gis byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa spyad cing byang chub kyi don du btsal kyang byang chub thob par mi 'gyur pa nyid de /
sangs rgyas ma yin pa'i rang bzhin bzlog par mi rung ba'i phyir ro /
kiṃ cānyat gzhan yang /
na ca dharmamadharmaṃ vā kaścijjātu kariṣyati 'ga' yang chos dang chos min pa /
nam yang byed par mi 'gyur te /
kimaśūnyasya kartavyaṃ svabhāvaḥ kriyate na hi mi stong pa la ci zhes bya /
rang bzhin la ni bya ba med /
sati hi svabhāvavādābhyupagame dharmādharmayoḥ karaṇaṃ nopapadyate rang bzhin du smra ba khas len na /
chos dang chos ma yin pa dag byed par mi 'thad do /
kiṃ hi aśūnyasya kartavyam? na hi svabhāvasyāśūnyasya kāraṇamupapadyate vidyamānatvāt stong pa ma yin pa la bya ba ci zhig yod de /
yod pa'i phyir stong pa ma yin pa'i rang bzhin la ni bya ba 'thad pa ma yin no /
kiṃ cānyat gzhan yang /
vinā dharmamadharmaṃ ca phalaṃ hi tava vidyate chos dang chos min med par yang /
'bras bu khyed la yod par 'gyur /
dharmādharmanimittaṃ ca phalaṃ tava na vidyate /
yadetaddharmādharmanimittakamiṣṭāniṣṭaphalam, yadi tat svabhāvato 'sti, tad vināpi dharmādharmābhyāṃ syāt 		chos dang chos min rgyus byung ba'i /
'bras bu khyod la yod ma yin /
yid du 'ong ba dang yid du mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu chos dang chos ma yin pa'i rgyu can gang yin pa de /
gal te rang bzhin gyis yod na ni /
chos dang chos ma yin pa dag med par yang de khyod la yod par 'gyur ro /
yadā ca vinā dharmādharmaṃ phalaṃ tavāsti, tadā dharmādharmajaṃ phalaṃ tava na saṃbhavati gang gi tshe chos dang chos ma yin pa dag med par khyod la 'bras bu yod na de'i tshe /
chos dang chos ma yin pa dag las skyes pa'i 'bras bu khyod la yod pa ma yin te /
dharmādharmopārjanavaiyarthyaṃ syāt, chos dang chos ma yin pa la sogs pa don med par 'gyur bas /
dharmādharmanimittaṃ ca phalaṃ tava na vidyate /
iti 		chos dang chos ma yin pa'i rgyus 'byung ba'i 'bras bu khyod la yod pa ma yin no zhes bshad pa yin no /
atha dharmādharmanimittakaṃ phalaṃ bhavatīti parikalpyate, na tarhi tatphalamaśūnyamiti pratipādayannāha ci ste chos dang chos ma yin pa'i rgyus 'byung ba'i 'bras bu yod pa ma yin no zhes rtog na /
'o na 'bras bu de mi stong pa ma yin no zhes bstan pa'i phyir /
dharmādharmanimittaṃ vā yadi te vidyate phalam chos dang chos min rgyus 'byung ba'i /
'bras bu gal te khyod la yod /
dharmādharmasamutpannamaśūnyaṃ te kathaṃ phalam chos dang chos min las byung ba'i /
'bras bu ci phyir stong ma yin /
śūnyamevaitat, pratītyasamutpannatvāt, pratibimbavat, ityabhiprāyaḥ /
api ca /
sarva eva hyete 'gaccha, kuru, paca, paṭha, tiṣṭha'; ityevamādayo laukikā vyavahārāḥ pratītyasamutpannāḥ 		zhes gsungs pa dang 'di ni stong pa yin te /
rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba'i phyir gzugs brnyan bzhin no snyam du dgongs pa yin no /
gzhan yang song shig /
byos shig tshos shig /
ltos shig 'dug shig /
ces bya ba la sogs pa 'jig rten pa'i tha snyad rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba de dag gal te khyod rang bzhin dang bcas par 'dod na /
tān yadi sasvabhāvānicchati bhavān, tadā bhavatā pratītyasamutpādo bādhito bhavati /
tadbādhanācca sarva eva laukikā vyavahārā bādhitā bhavantīti pratipādayannāha 		de'i tshe khyod kyis rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba la gnod pa byas pa yin la /
de la gnod pa byas pas 'jig rten pa'i tha snyad do cog la gnod pa yin no zhes bstan pa'i phyir /
rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba yi /
sarvasaṃvyavahārāṃśca laukikān pratibādhase stong pa nyid la gnod byed gang /
'jig rten pa yi tha snyad ni /
yatpratītyasamutpādaśūnyatāṃ pratibādhase kun la'ang gnod pa byed pa yin /
zhes gsungs pa la /
yacchabdaḥ kriyāviśeṣaṇam /
yadbādhase ityanena saṃbadhyate 		gang gi sgra ni bya ba'i khyad par te /
gnod byed ces bya ba 'di dang sbyar ro /
kiṃ cānyat gzhan yang /
na kartavyaṃ bhavetkiṃcidanārabdhā bhavetkriyā stong pa nyid la gnod byed na /
bya ba ci yang med 'gyur zhing /
kārakaḥ syādakurvāṇaḥ śūnyatāṃ pratibādhataḥ rtsom pa med pa'i bya bar 'gyur /
mi byed pa yang byed par 'gyur /
yadi hi svarūpaśūnyāḥ padārthā na bhaveyuḥ, sasvabhāvā eva bhaveyuḥ, tadā svabhāvasya vidyamānatvānna kenacit kasyacit kiṃcit kartavyaṃ syāt gal te dngos po rnams stong pa nyid ma yin zhing rang bzhin dang bcas pa nyid du gyur na /
de'i tshe rang bzhin ni yod pa ma yin pa'i phyir /
sus kyang bya ba ci yang med par 'gyur te /
na hi nabhaso 'nāvaraṇatvaṃ kenacit kriyate nam mkha'i mi sgrib pa ni sus kyang byed pa ma yin pa bzhin no /
akriyamāṇā ca kriyā syāt /
kriyāṃ cākurvāṇasya kārakatvaṃ syāt 		byed bzhin pa ma yin pa yang bya bar 'gyur la /
bya ba mi byed pa yang byed pa por 'gyur na /
na caitadevamiti de dag ni de ltar yang ma yin te /
tasmānnāśūnyāḥ padārthāḥ de'i phyir dngos po rnams mi stong pa ma yin no /
kiṃ cānyat gzhan yang /
ajātamaniruddhaṃ ca kūṭasthaṃ ca bhaviṣyati rang bzhin yod na 'gro ba rnams /
ma skyes pa dang ma 'gags dang /
vicitrābhiravasthābhiḥ svabhāve rahitaṃ jagat /
[vicitrābhiravasthāmiḥ svabhāvaracitaṃ svabhāvenaiva racitamapratītyasamutpannaṃ jagat svabhāvaśūnyavādinām /
] svabhāvenaiva yadi bhāvāḥ [sasvabhāvāḥ] syuḥ, tadā svabhāvasyākṛtrimatvādavyāvartanatvācca sarvamidaṃ jagadajātamaniruddhaṃ ca syāt 		ther zug tu ni gnas 'gyur zhing /
gnas skabs sna tshogs bral bar 'gyur /
gal te dngos po rnams rang bzhin dang bcas par gyur na /
de'i tshe /
rang bzhin bcos ma ma yin pa'i phyir dang ldog pa med pa'i phyir 'gro ba 'di dag thams cad skye ba med pa dang 'gag pa med par 'gyur ro /
skye ba med pa dang 'gag pa med pa nyid kyi phyir na /
ajātāniruddhatvājjagat kūṭasthaṃ syāt 'gro ba ther zug tu gnas par 'gyur ro /
rgyu dang rkyen la mi ltos pas na /
hetupratyayānapekṣaṃ vicitrābhiravasthābhī rahitamapratītyasamutpannaṃ jagadaśūnyavādināṃ syāt stong pa ma yin par smra ba rnams la /
'gro ba rten cing 'brel par mi 'byung zhing gnas skabs sna tshogs pa dang bral par 'gyur ro /
yathoktaṃ pitāputrasamāgame ji skad du /
bcom ldan 'das kyis /
syādyadi kiṃcidaśūnyaṃ na vadejjinu tasya vyākaraṇam mi stong cung zhig yod na rgyal ba yis /
'ga' yang lung ston mi gsung 'gyur med par /
tathāhi sthitaṃ tat svake svake bhāve /
kūṭasthamavikāraṃ na tasya vṛddhirna parihāṇiḥ /
iti /
tathā āryahastikakṣyasūtre 		rang rang dngos la ther zug gnas de la /
'phel ba med cing yongs su nyams pa med /
ces gsungs pa dang de bzhin du 'phags pa glang po rtsal las kyang /
yadi koci dharmāṇa bhavetsvabhāvaḥ tatraiva gaccheya jinaḥ saśrāvakaḥ gal te chos rnams rang bzhin 'ga' yod na /
rgyal ba nyan thos bcas pas de mkhyen 'gyur /
kūṭasthadharmāṇa siyā na nirvṛtī na niṣprapañco bhavi jātu paṇḍitaḥ ther zug chos rnams mya ngan 'da' mi 'gyur /
mkhas rnams nam yang spros pa med mi 'gyur /
iti /
na ca kevalaṃ sasvabhāvavādābhyupagame laukikā eva vyavahārā nopapadyante, api ca lokottarā eva [api?] nopapadyante iti pratipādayannāha /
asaṃprāptasya ca prāptirduḥkhaparyantakarma ca /
sarvakleśaprahāṇaṃ ca yadyaśūnyaṃ na vidyate 		zhes gsungs pa lta bu'o /
dngos po rang bzhin dang bcas par khas len na 'jig rten pa'i tha snyad dag mi 'thad pa 'ba' zhig tu ma zad kyi /
'o na ci zhe na /
'jig rten las 'das pa dag kyang yin no zhes bstan pa'i phyir /
gal te stong pa yod min na /
ma thob thob par bya ba dang /
sdug bsngal mthar byed las dang ni /
nyon mongs thams cad spong ba'ang med /
ces gsungs te /
gal te stong pa yod pa ma yin zhing /
yadi hi aśūnyaṃ sasvabhāvaṃ sarvametat syāt, tadā yadasaṃprāptaṃ tadasaṃprāptameva, iti asaṃprāptasya ca phalasya prāptirna syāt /
tadā duḥkhaparyantakāraṇaṃ ca pūrvaṃ nābhūditi sāṃpratamapi na syāt /
sarveṣāṃ ca kleśānāṃ pūrvaṃ prahāṇaṃ nābhūditi paścādapi prahāṇaṃ na syāt 		'di dag thams cad rang bzhin dang bcas par 'gyur na /
de'i tshe gang ma thob pa de ni mi thob pa kho na yin pas /
'bras bu ma thob pa 'thob par mi 'gyur ro /
de bzhin du sngar sdug bsngal mthar byad par ma gyur pas de ltar yang ma 'gyur ro /
sngar nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs par ma gyur pas phyis kyang spong par mi 'gyur ro /
tadevaṃ yasmāt sasvabhāvavādābhyupagame sati sarvametanna yujyate, ataḥ de ltar na gang ge phyir dngos po rang bzhin dang bcas par smra bar khas blangs par gyur na /
thams cad mi rung ba de'i phyir /
yaḥ pratītyasamutpādaṃ paśyatīdaṃ sa paśyati /
duḥkhaṃ samudayaṃ caiva nirodhaṃ mārgameva ca 		gang gis rten cing 'brel par 'byung /
mthong ba de ni sdug bsngal dang /
kun 'byung dang ni 'gog pa dang /
lam nyid de dag mthong ba yin /
yo hi sarvadharmapratītyasamutpādalakṣaṇāṃ svabhāvaśūnyatāṃ samyak paśyati, sa catvāri āryasatyāni paśyati yathābhūtāni tattvataḥ gang gis stong pa nyid rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba'i mtshan nyid can yang dag par 'byung ba des ni /
'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi po rnams de kho na nyid du yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin mthong ba yin no /
yathoktamāryamañjuśrīparipṛcchāyām ji skad du 'phags pa chos thams cad 'jug pa med par bstan pa'i mdo las /
yena mañjuśrīranutpādaḥ sarvadharmāṇāṃ dṛṣṭaḥ, tena duḥkhaṃ parijñātam 'jam dpal gang gis chos thams cad skye ba med par mthong ba des ni sdug bsngal yongs su shes pa yin no /
yena nāstitā sarvadharmāṇāṃ dṛṣṭā, tasya samudayaḥ prahīṇaḥ gang gis chos thams cad med pa nyid du mthong ba des ni kun 'byung ba spangs pa yin no /
yena atyantaparinirvṛtāḥ sarvadharmā dṛṣṭāḥ, tena nirodhaḥ sākṣātkṛtaḥ gang gis chos thams cad shin tu mya ngan las 'das bar mthong ba des ni 'gog pa mngon du byas pa yin no /
yena mañjuśrīrabhāvaḥ sarvadharmāṇāṃ dṛṣṭaḥ, tena mārgo bhāvitaḥ /
iti vistaraḥ /
uktaṃ ca āryadhyāyitamuṣṭisūtre 		'jam dpal gang gis chos thams cad dngos po med par mthong ba des ni lam bsgoms pa yin no zhes bya ba rgya cher gsungs pa lta bu'o /
'phags pa bsam gtan pa'i dpe mkhyud kyi mdo las kyang /
atha khalu bhagavān mañjuśriyaṃ kumārabhūtametadavocat /
caturṇā mañjuśrīrāryasatyānāṃ yathābhūtādarśanāccaturbhirviparyāsairviparyastacittāḥ sattvā evabhimamabhūtaṃ saṃsāraṃ nātikrāmanti 		de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to /
'jam dpal 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin ma mthong bas /
sems can phyin ci log pa zhes sems phyin ci log tu gyur pa rnams 'khor ba yang dag pa ma yin pa 'di las 'da' bar mi 'gyur ro /
evamukte mañjuśrīḥ kumārabhūto bhagavantametadavocat de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang bcom ldan 'das la 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas 'di skad ces gsol to /
deśayatu bhagavān kasyopalambhataḥ sattvāḥ saṃsāraṃ nātikrāmanti? bhagavānāha bcom ldan 'das gang la nye bar dmigs pas sems can rnams 'khor ba las 'das par mi 'gyur ba bstan du gsol /
ātmātmīyopalambhato mañjuśrīḥ sattvāḥ saṃsāraṃ nātikrāmanti bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa; 'jam dpal bdag dang bdag gi bar dmigs pas sems can rnams 'khor ba las mi 'da'o /
tat kasya hetoḥ? yo hi mañjuśrīrātmānaṃ paraṃ ca samanupaśyati, tasya karmābhisaṃskārā bhavanti de ci'i phyir zhe na /
'jam dpal bdag dang gzhan du yang dag par mthong ba gang yin pa de ni las mngon par 'du byed par 'gyur ro /
bālo mañjuśrīraśrutavān pṛthagjano 'tyantaparinirvṛtān sarvadharmānaprajānānaḥ ātmānaṃ paraṃ ca upalabhate, upalabhya abhiniviśate, abhiniviṣṭaḥ san rajyate duṣyate muhyate 'jam dpal byis pa so so'i skye bo thos pa dang mi ldan pa ni chos thams cad shin tu mya ngan las 'das par mi shes pas bdag dang gzhan du dmigs par byed do /
dmigs nas mngon par zhen par 'gyur ro /
mngon par zhen pas chags par 'gyur ro /
sdang bar 'gyur ro /
sa rakto duṣṭo mūḍhaḥ san trividhaṃ karma abhisaṃskaroti kāyena vācā manasā rmongs par 'gyur ro /
de chags pa dang sdang ba dang rmongs par gyur pas /
saḥ asatsamāropeṇa vikalpayati lus dang ngag dang yid kyi las rnam pa gsum mngon par 'du byed do /
ahaṃ raktaḥ, ahaṃ duṣṭaḥ, ahaṃ mūḍhaḥ iti de yod pa ma yin pa la sgro 'dogs pas bdag ni chags so /
bdag ni sdang ngo /
tasya tathāgataśāsane pravrajitasya evaṃ bhavati bdag ni rmongs so snyam du rnam par rtog par byed do /
ahaṃ śīlavān, ahaṃ brahmacārī, saṃsāraṃ samatikrāmiṣyāmi, ahaṃ nirvāṇamanuprāpsyāmi, ahaṃ duḥkhebhyo mokṣyāmi de de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstan pa la rab tu byung nas 'di snyam du sems te /
bdag ni tshul khrims dang ldan pa'o /
sa kalpayati /
ime dharmāḥ kuśalāḥ, ime dharmā akuśalā iti, ime dharmāḥ prahātavyāḥ, ime dharmāḥ sākṣātkartavyāḥ, duḥkhaṃ parijñātavyam, samudayaḥ prahātavyaḥ, nirodhaḥ sākṣātkartavyaḥ, mārgo bhāvayitavyaḥ 		bdag ni tshangs par spyod pa'o /
bdag ni 'khor ba las yang dag par 'da' bar 'gyur ro /
bdag gis mya ngan las 'das pa thob par 'gyur ro /
bdag ni sdug bsngal rnams las thar bar 'gyur ro snyam du rtog par byed cing /
de chos 'di dag ni dge ba'o /
chos 'di dag ni mi dge ba'o /
chos 'di dag ni spang bar bya ba'o /
chos 'di dag ni mngon du bya ba'o /
sdug bsngal yongs su shes par bya'o /
kun 'byung spang bar bya'o /
'gog pa mngon du bya'o /
sa kalpayati anityāḥ sarvasaṃskārāḥ, ādīptāḥ sarvasaṃskārāḥ lam bsgom par bya'o snyam du rtog go /
de nas de gang zhig 'du byed thams cad las 'byol par 'gyur ro /
yannvahaṃ sarvasaṃskārebhyaḥ palāyeyam /
tasyaiva mavekṣamāṇasya utpadyate nirvitsahagato manasikāraḥ animittapurogataḥ /
tasyaivaṃ bhavati 		'du byed thams cad ni mi rtag pa'o /
'du byed thams cad ni kun tu 'bar ba'o snyam du rtog par byed do /
de ltar rtog pa de la skyo ba dang lhan cig tu gyur pa yid la byed pa mtshan ma med pa sngon du 'gro ba skye bar 'gyur ro /
eṣā sā duḥkhaparijñā, yeyameṣāṃ dharmāṇāṃ parijñā /
tasyaivaṃ bhavati /
yannvahaṃ samudayaṃ prajaheyam /
sa sarvadharmebhya artīyate jehrīyate vitarati vijugupsate uttrasyati saṃtrasyati saṃtrāsamāpadyate 		de 'di snyam du chos 'di dag yongs su shes pa gang yin pa de ni sdug bsngal yongs su shes pa'o snyam du sems so /
de 'di snyam du gang bdag gis kun 'byung spang bar bya'o snyam du sems par 'gyur zhing /
chos 'di dag gis nyen par 'gyur /
ches ngo tsha bar 'gyur /
mi dga' bar 'gyur /
smod par 'gyur /
skrag cing dngang la kun tu dngang bar 'gyur ro /
tasyaivaṃ bhavati /
iyameṣāṃ dharmāṇāṃ sākṣātkriyā, idaṃ samudayaprahāṇam, yadidamebhyo dharmebhyo 'rtīyanā 		de 'di snyam du gang chos 'di dag gis nyen po de ni chos 'di dag mngon du byas pa yin zhing /
'di ni kun 'byung spang ba'o snyam du sems par 'gyur ro /
tasyaivaṃ bhavati /
nirodhaḥ sākṣātkartavyaḥ 		de 'di snyam du 'gog pa mngon du bya'o snyam du sems te /
samudayaṃ kalpayitvā nirodhaṃ saṃjānāti de gnyis su brtags nas 'gog pa mngon du shes pa yin no /
tasyaivaṃ bhavati /
eṣā sā nirodhasākṣātkriyā 		de 'di snyam du 'gog pa mngon du byas pa de ni 'di yin no snyam du sems so /
tasyaivaṃ bhavati /
yannūnamahaṃ mārgaṃ bhāvayeyam 		de 'di snyam du gang bdag gis lam sgom mo snyam du sems shing /
sa eko rahogatastān dharmān manasi kurvan śamathaṃ pratilabhate de gcig pu dben par song nas chos de dag yid la byed pa na zhi gnas 'thob par 'gyur ro /
tasya tena nirvitsahagatena manasikāreṇa śamatha utpadyate skyo ba dang lhan cig tu gyur pa'i yid la byed pa de de la zhi gnas skye bar 'gyur ro /
tasya sarvadharmeṣu cittaṃ na pralīyate prativahati pratyudāvartate de chos thams cad la sems phyir 'byung bar 'gyur te /
phyir 'dren zhing phyir ldog par 'gyur ro /
tebhyaścārtīyate jehrīyate, anabhinandanācittaṃ samutpadyate /
tasyaivaṃ bhavati 		de dag gis nyen par 'gyur /
ches ngo tsha bar 'gyur /
mngon par mi dga' ba'i sems skye bar 'gyur ro /
mukto 'smi sarvaduḥkhebhyaḥ, na mama bhūyaḥ uttariṃ kiṃcitkaraṇīyam, arhannasmītyātmānaṃ saṃjānāti de 'di snyam du bdag sdug bsngal thams cad las grol bar 'gyur te /
yang phyis bya ba ci yang med cing bdag ni dgra bcom par gyur to zhes bya bar bdag nyid shes so /
sa maraṇakālasamaye utpattimātmano deveṣu paśyati de 'chi ba'i dus byed pa'i tshe bdag nyid skye bar mthong bas /
tasya kāṅkṣā vicikitsā ca bhavati buddhabodhau de sangs rgyas kyi byang chub la the tshom dang som nyi za bar 'gyur ro /
sa vicikitsāmāpatitaḥ kālagato mahānirayeṣu prapatati de som nyir lhung ste 'chi ba'i dus byas nas dmyal ba chen po dag tu lhung bar 'gyur ro /
de ci'i phyir zhe na /
tatkasya hetoḥ? yathāpīdamanutpannān sarvadharmān vikalpayitvā tathāgate vicikitsāṃ vimatimutpādayati ji ltar skye ba med pa'i chos rnams la brtags nas /
de bzhin gshegs pa la som nyi dang yid gnyis skyed par byed pa'i phyir ro /
atha khalu mañjuśrīḥ kumārabhūto bhagavantametadavocat de nas bcom ldan 'das la 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas 'di skad ces gsol to /
kathaṃ punarbhagavan catvāri āryasatyāni draṣṭavyāni? bhagavānāha bcom ldan 'das 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi po rnams la ji ltar 'khums par bgyi /
bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
yena mañjuśrīranutpannāḥ sarvadharmā dṛṣṭāḥ, tena duḥkhaṃ parijñātam 'jam dpal gang gis chos thams cad ma skyes par mthong ba des ni /
sdug bsngal yongs su shes pa yin no /
yena asamutthitāḥ sarvadharmā dṛṣṭāḥ, tasya samudayaḥ prahīṇaḥ gang gis chos thams cad 'byung ba med par mthong ba des ni kun 'byung ba spangs pa yin no /
yena atyantaparinirvṛtāḥ sarvadharmā dṛṣṭāḥ, tena nirodhaḥ sākṣātkṛtaḥ gang gis chos thams cad gtan mya ngan las 'das par mthong ba des ni 'gog pa mngon du byas pa yin no /
yena atyantaśūnyāḥ sarvadharmā dṛṣṭāḥ, tena mārgo bhāvitaḥ gang gis chos thams cad shin tu ma skyes par mthong ba des ni lam bsgoms pa yin no /
yena mañjuśrīrevaṃ catvāri āryasatyāni dṛṣṭāni, sa na kalpayati /
ime dharmāḥ kuśalāḥ, ime dharmā akuśalāḥ, ime dharmāḥ prahātavyāḥ, ime dharmāḥ sākṣātkartavyāḥ, duḥkhaṃ parijñātavyam, samudayaḥ prahātavyaḥ, nirodhaḥ sākṣātkartavyaḥ, mārgo bhāvayitavyaḥ iti 		'jam dpal gang gis de ltar 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi po mthong ba des ni chos 'di dag ni dge ba'o /
chos 'di dag ni mi dge ba'o /
chos 'di dag ni spang bar bya'o /
chos 'di dag ni mngon du bya'o /
sdug bsngal yongs su shes par bya /
kun 'byung spang bar bya /
'gog pa mngon du bya /
lam bsgom par bya'o zhes mi rtog rnam par rtog par mi byed de /
tat kasya hetoḥ? tathāhi sa taṃ dharmaṃ na samanupaśyati nopalabhate yaṃ parikalpayet /
bālapṛthagjanāstvetān dharmān kalpayanto rajyanti ca dviṣyanti ca muhyanti ca /
sa na kaṃciddharmamāvyūhati nirvyūhati /
tasyaivamanāvyūhato 'nirvyūhatastraidhātuke cittaṃ na sajjati 		'di ltar gang brtag par bya ba'i chos de des ma mthong ba'i phyir ro /
byis pa so so'i skye bo rnams ni chos de dag la rtog pa na chags par 'gyur ro /
sdang bar 'gyur ro /
rmongs par 'gyur ro /
de chos 'ga' yang mi len mi 'dor de ltar mi len mi 'dor ba de ni /
khams gsum la sems chags par mi 'gyur ro /
ajātaṃ sarvatraidhātukaṃ samanupaśyati māyopamaṃ svapnopamaṃ pratiśrutkopamam khams gsum thams cad ma skyes pa dang sgyu ma lta bu dang rmi lam lta bu dang brag ca lta bur mthong ngo /
evaṃsvabhāvān sarvadharmān paśyan anunayapratidhāpagato bhavati sarvasattveṣu chos thams cad de lta bu'i rang bzhin can du mthong bas sems can thams cad la rjes su chags pa dang khong khro ba dang bral bar 'gyur ro /
tat kasya hetoḥ? tathāhi sa tān dharmān nopalabhate yatrānunīyeta vā pratihanyeta vā de ci'i phyir zhe na /
'di ltar des gang la rjes su chags pa dang khong khro bar 'gyur ba'i chos de ma dmigs pa'i phyir ro /
sa ākāśasamena cittena buddhamapi na samanupaśyati, dharmamapi na samanupaśyati, saṃdhamapi na samanupaśyati des sems nam mkha' dang mnyam pas sangs rgyas kyang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong /
chos kyang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong /
sarvadharmān śūnyāniti samanupaśyan na kvaciddharme vicikitsāmutpādayati /
avicikitsan nirupādāno bhavati 		dge 'dun yang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong zhing /
chos thams cad stong pa'o zhes bya bar mthong bas chos gang la yang som nyi skyed par mi byed do /
nirupādāno 'nupādāya parinirvātīti vistaraḥ som nyi med pas nye bar len pa med par 'gyur ro /
ityācāryacandrakīrtipādoparacitāyāṃ prasannapadāyāṃ madhyamakavṛttau āryasatyaparīkṣā nāma caturviṃśatitamaṃ prakaraṇam nye bar len pa med pas nye bar len pa med par yongs su mya ngan las 'da'o zhes rgya cher gsungs so /
slob dpon zla ba grags pa'i zhal snga nas sbyar ba'i tshigs gsal ba las /
nirvāṇaparīkṣā pañcaviṃśatitamaṃ prakaraṇam 'phags pa'i bden pa brtag pa zhes bya ba rab tu byed pa nyi shu bzhi pa'i 'grel pa'o /
atrāha /
yadi śūnyamidaṃ sarvamudayo nāsti na vyayaḥ 		'dir smras pa /
gal te 'di dag kun stong na /
'byung ba med cing 'jig pa med /
prahāṇādvā nirodhādvā kasya nirvāṇamiṣyate gang zhig spang dang 'gog pa las /
mya ngan 'da' bar 'gyur bar 'dod /
iha hi bhagavatā uṣitabrahmacaryāṇāṃ tathāgataśāsanapratipannānnāṃ dharmānudharmapratipattiyuktānāṃ pudgalānāṃ dvividhaṃ nirvāṇamupavarṇitaṃ sopadhiśeṣaṃ nirupadhiśeṣaṃ ca /
tatra niravaśeṣasya avidyārāgādikasya kleśagaṇasya prahāṇāt sopadhiśeṣaṃ nirvāṇamiṣyate 		'di na bcom ldan 'das kyis gang zag changs par spyod pa bsten zhing /
de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstan pa la zhugs pa chos rjes su mthun pa'i chos kyi nan tan dang ldan pa rnams la /
mya ngan las 'das pa rnam pa gnyis su gsungs te /
phung po lhag ma dang bcas pa dang phung po lhag ma med pa'o /
de la ma rig pa dang 'dod chags la sogs pa nyon mongs pa'i tshogs ma lus par spangs pa las phung po lhag ma dang bcas pa'i mya ngan las 'das par 'dod do /
tatra upadhīyate 'sminnātmasnehaḥ iti upadhiḥ /
upadhiśabdena ātmaprajñaptinimittāḥ pañcopādānaskandhā ucyante 		de la 'di la bdag la chags pa bsten pas na phung po ste /
bdag tu gdags pa'i rgyu nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga la phung po'i sgras brjod do /
lhag ma lus pas na lhag ma'o /
śiṣyata iti śeṣaḥ, upadhireva śeṣaḥ upadhiśeṣaḥ, saha upadhiśeṣeṇa vartate iti sopadhiśeṣam phung po nyid lhag ma yin pas na phung po lhag ma'o /
phung po lhag ma dang lhan cig gnas pas na phung po lhag ma dang bcas pa'o /
kiṃ tat? nirvāṇam /
tacca skandhamātrakameva kevalaṃ satkāyadṛṣṭayādikleśataskararahitamavaśiṣyate nihatāśeṣacauragaṇagrāmamātrāvasthānasādharmyeṇa 		de ci yin zhe na /
mya ngan las 'das pa'o /
de yang chom rkun gyi tshogs ma lus par bsad de grang tsam 'dug pa dang chos mthun par 'jig tshogs la lta ba la sogs pa nyon mongs pa'i chom rkun dang bral ba phung po tsam 'ba' zhig lus pa ste /
tat sopadhiśeṣaṃ nirvāṇam /
yatra tu nirvāṇe skandhapañcakamapi nāsti, tannirupadhiśeṣaṃ nirvāṇam /
nirgataḥ upadhiśeṣo 'sminniti kṛtvā 		de ni phung po lhag ma dang bcas pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'o /
chom rkun gyi tshogs ma lus par bsad de grong tsam po yang zhig pa dang chos mtshungs par mya ngan las 'das pa gang la phung po tsam yang yod pa ma yin pa de ni phung po lhag ma med pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa ste /
nihatāśeṣacauragaṇasya grāmamātrasyāpi vināśasādharmyeṇa /
tadeva ca adhikṛtya ucyate /
abhedi kāyo nirodhi saññā vedanā pi ti dahaṃsu sabbā 		'di phung po'i lhag ma dang bral ba'i phyir ro /
de nyid kyi dbang du mdzad nas /
gang na lus zhig 'du shes 'gags /
tshor ba thams cad bral gyur zhing /
vūpasamiṃsu saṃkhārā viññāṇamatthamagamā ti 'du byed nye bar zhi ba dang /
rnam par shes pa nub gyur pa /
tathā /
asaṃlīnena kāyena vedanāmadhyavāsayat 		zhes bya ba dang de bzhin du /
ma zhum ba yi lus kyis ni /
tshor ba dang du len pa na /
pradyotasyeva nirvāṇaṃ vimokṣastasya cetasaḥ de yi sems ni rnam par grol /
mar me shi bar gyur pa bzhin /
iti /
tadevaṃ nirupadhiśeṣaṃ nirvāṇaṃ skandhānāṃ nirodhāllabhyate /
etacca dvividhaṃ nirvāṇaṃ kathaṃ yujyate yadi kleśānāṃ skandhānāṃ ca nirodho bhavati? yadā tu sarvamidaṃ śūnyam, naiva kiṃcidutpadyate nāpi kiṃcinnirudhyate, tadā kutaḥ kleśāḥ, kuto vā skandhāḥ, yeṣāṃ nirodhe nirvāṇaṃ syāditi? tasmādvidyata eva bhāvānāṃ svabhāva iti 		zhes bshad do /
de'i phyir phung po lhag ma med pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa de ni phung po 'gags pa las 'thob bo /
mya ngan las 'das pa rnam pa gnyis po de ji ltar rung bar 'gyur zhe na /
gal te nyon mongs pa rnams dang phung po rnams 'gags par gyur pa yin na /
gang gi tshe 'di dag thams cad stong pa yin zhing /
cung zad kyang skye ba med la cung zad kyang 'gag pa yang med pa de'i tshe /
gang dag 'gags pa las mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gyur ba nyon mongs pa'ang phung po rnams yod par gal 'gyur /
de'i phyir dngos po rnams kyi rang bzhin yod pa nyid do zhes 'dzer to /
atrocyate /
nanu evamapi sasvabhāvābhyupagame 		brjod par bya ste /
de ltar rang bzhin khas len na yang /
yadyaśūnyamidaṃ sarvamudayo nāsti na vyayaḥ gal te 'di kun mi stong na /
'byung ba med cing 'jig pa med /
prahāṇādvā nirodhādvā kasya nirvāṇamiṣyate /
svabhāvena hi vyavasthitānāṃ kleśānāṃ skandhānāṃ ca svabhāvasyānapāyitvāt kuto nivṛttiḥ, yatastannivṛttyā nirvāṇaṃ syāditi? tasmāt svabhāvavādināṃ naiva nirvāṇamupapadyate 		gang zhig spong dang 'gags pa las /
mya ngan 'das par 'gyur bar 'dod /
gang las de dag log pas mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gyur ba /
nyon mongs pa rnams dang phung po rang bzhin gyis rnam par gnas pa ldog par ga la 'gyur te /
rang bzhin la ldog pa med pa'i phyir ro /
de'i phyir rang bzhin dang bcas par smra ba la mya ngan las 'das pa mi 'thad pa nyid do /
na ca śūnyatāvādinaḥ skandhanivṛttilakṣaṇaṃ kleśanivṛttilakṣaṇaṃ vā nirvāṇamicchanti yatasteṣāmayaṃ doṣaḥ syāditi gang las de dag la nyes pa 'dir 'gyur ba /
stong pa nyid du smra ba rnams kyis ni mya ngan las 'das pa nyon mongs pa ldog pa'i mtshan nyid can nam phung po ldog pa'i mtshan nyid can 'dod pa ma yin no /
ataḥ anupālambha evāyaṃ śūnyavādinām de'i phyir stong pa nyid du smra ba rnams la klan ka 'dir mi 'gyur ba nyid do /
yadi khalu śūnyatāvādinaḥ kleśānāṃ skandhānāṃ vā nivṛttilakṣaṇaṃ nirvāṇaṃ necchanti, kiṃlakṣaṇaṃ tarhi icchanti? ucyate gal te stong pa nyid du smra ba rnams mya ngan las 'das pa phung po rnams sam /
nyon mongs pa rnams log pa'i mtshan nyid can mi 'dod na /
mtshan nyid gang dang ldan pa zhig 'dod ce na /
brjod pa /
aprahīṇamasaṃprāptamanucchinnamaśāśvatam /
aniruddhamanutpannametannirvāṇamucyate /
yaddhi naiva prahīyate rāgādivat, nāpi prāpyate śrāmaṇyaphalavat, nāpyucchidyate skandhādivat, yaccāpi na nityamaśūnyavat, tat svabhāvato 'niruddhamanutpannaṃ ca sarvaprapañcopaśamalakṣaṇaṃ nirvāṇamuktam 		spangs pa med pa 'thob med pa /
chad pa med pa rtag med pa /
'gag pa med pa skye med pa; /
de ni mya ngan 'das par brjod /
gang zhig 'dod chags la sogs pa ltar spangs pa med cing /
dge sbyong gi 'bras bu ltar 'thob pa med pa /
phung po la sogs pa ltar chad pa yang med la /
gang yang mi stong pa ltar rtag pa ma yin pa /
rang bzhin gyi 'gag pa med pa skye ba med pa spros pa thams cad nye bar zhi ba'i mtshan nyid can de ni mya ngan las 'das par bshad do /
de'i phyir rnam pa de lta bu de la nyon mongs pa gang dag spangs pas de mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gyur ba /
nyon mongs par rtog pa ga la yod cing /
tat kutastasminnitthaṃvidhe niṣprapañce kleśakalpanā yeṣāṃ kleśānāṃ prahāṇānnirvāṇaṃ bhavet? kuto vā skandhakalpanā tatra, yeṣāṃ skandhānāṃ nirodhāt tadbhavet? yāvaddhi etāḥ kalpanāḥ pravartante, tāvannāsti nirvāṇādhigamaḥ, sarvaprapañcaparikṣayādeva tadadhigamāt /
atha syāt /
yadyapi nirvāṇe na santi kleśāḥ, na cāpi skandhāḥ, tathāpi nirvāṇādarvāgvidyante 		phung po gang dag 'gags pas de 'thob bar 'gyur ba phung por rtog pa yang ga la yod /
ji srid du rtog pa 'di dag 'byung ba de srid du mya ngan las 'das pa thob pa yod pa ma yin te /
spros pa thams cad zad pa nyid las de 'thob pa'i phyir ro /
ci ste mya ngan las 'das pa la nyon mongs pa rnams med cing phung po rnams kyang med mod kyi /
de lta na yang mya ngan las 'das pa'i snga rol na yod pa yin no /
tatasteṣāṃ parikṣayānnirvāṇaṃ bhaviṣyatīti de'i phyir de dag 'gags pa ni spros pa zad pa las mya ngan las 'das pa yin par 'gyur ro snyam na /
ucyate brjod pa /
tyajyatāmayaṃ grāhaḥ, yasmānnirvāṇādarvāk svabhāvato vidyamānānāṃ na punarabhāvaḥ śakyate kartum 'dzin pa 'di ni dor bar bya'o /
gang gi phyir mya ngan las 'das pa'i snga rol na rang bzhin gyis yod pa rnams ni yang dngos po med par bya bar mi nus te /
tasmānnirvāṇābhilāṣiṇā tyājyaiṣā kalpanā /
vakṣyati hi 		de'i phyir mya ngan las 'das pa 'dod pas rtog pa 'di dor bar bya'o /
nivāṇasya ca yā koṭiḥ koṭiḥ saṃsaraṇasya ca /
na tayorantaraṃ kiṃcitsusūkṣmamapi vidyate /
iti /
tadevaṃ nirvāṇe na kasyacit prahāṇaṃ nāpi kasyacinnirodha iti vijñeyam /
tataśca niravaśeṣakalpanākṣayarūpameva nirvāṇam /
uktaṃ ca bhagavatā /
nirvṛtti dharmāṇa ca asti dharmā ye neha astī na te jātu asti /
astīti nāstīti ca kalpanāvatāmevaṃ carantāna na duḥkha śāmyati 		mya ngan 'das mtha' gang yin pa /
de ni 'khor ba'i mtha' yin te /
de gnyis khyad par cung zad ni /
shin tu phra ba'ang yod ma yin /
zhes 'chad par 'gyur ro /
bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang /
mya ngan 'das la chos rnams yod nyid med /
chos gang der med de dag gzhar yang med /
yod dang med ces rtog pa dang ldan zhing /
de ltar spyod rnams sdug bsngal nyer mi zhi /
iti /
asyā gāthāyā ayamarthaḥ /
nivṛtau nirupadhiśeṣe nirvāṇadhātau dharmāṇāṃ kleśakarmajanmalakṣaṇānāṃ skandhānāṃ vā sarvathā astaṃgamādastitvaṃ nāsti, evaṃ ca sarvavādināmabhimatam 		zhes gsungs pa yin pas so /
tshigs su bcad pa 'di'i don ni 'di yin te /
mya ngan las 'das pa ste phung po lhag ma med pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings na'o /
chos rnams ni nyon mongs pa dang las dang skye ba'i mtshan nyid can rnams sam phung po rnams te /
rnam pa thams cad du bral pa'i phyir yod pa nyid med do /
'di ni rgol ba thams cad kyi 'dod pa yin no /
ye tarhi dharmā iha nirvṛtau na santi, pradīpodayādandhakāropalabdharajjusarpabhayādivat, na te jātu asti, na te dharmāḥ kleśakarmajanmādilakṣaṇāḥ kasmiṃścit kāle saṃsārāvasthāyāmapi tattvato vidyante /
na hi rajjuḥ andhakārāvasthāyāṃ svarūpataḥ sarpo 'sti, sadbhūtasarpavat andhakāre 'pi āloke 'pi kāyacakṣurbhyāmagrahaṇāt /
kathaṃ tarhi saṃsāraḥ iti cet, ucyate 		mar me gtang bas mun par thag pa la sbrul du dmigs pa ltar chos gang dag mya ngan las 'das pa 'di la yod pa ma yin pa de dag ni gzhar yang med do /
nyon mongs pa dang las dang skye ba'i mtshan nyid can gyi chos de dag ni 'khor ba'i gnas skabs kyi dus 'ga' zhig na yang de kho na nyid du yod pa ma yin no /
'di ltar mun pa'i gnas skabs na thag pa la sbrul rang gi ngo bos yod pa ni ma yin te /
yod par gyur pa'i sbrul ltar mun pa dang snang bar yang 'dzin par 'gyur ba'i phyir ro /
'o na ji ltar 'khor ba yin zhe na /
ātmātmīyāsadgrahagrastānāṃ bālapṛthagjanānāmasatsvarūpā api bhāvāḥ satyataḥ pratibhāsante taimirikāṇāmiva asatkeśamaśakādaya iveti /
āha /
astīti nāstīti ca kalpanāvatāmevaṃ carantāna na duḥkha śāmyati 		brjod pa /
rab rib can rnams la skra shad dang sbrang bu mchu rings la sogs pa snang ba ltar dngos po yod pa mi yin pa'i rang bzhin can dag kyang byis pa bdag dang bdag gi bar yang dag pa ma yin pa'i phyir ci log gi gdon gyis bzung ba rnams bden bar snang ba yin no zhes gsungs pa ni /
yod dang med ces rtog pa dang ldan zhing /
iti /
astīti bhāvasadbhāvakalpanāvatāṃ jaiminīyakāṇādakāpilādīnāṃ vaibhāṣikaparyantānām /
nāstīti ca kalpanāvatāṃ nāstikānāmapāyagatiniṣṭhānām /
tadanyeṣāṃ ca atītānāgatasaṃsthānāṃ vijñaptiviprayuktasaṃskārāṇāṃ nāstivādināṃ tadanyadastivādinām, parikalpitasvabhāvasya nāstivādinām, paratantrapariniṣpannasvabhāvayorastivādinām, evamastināstivādināmevaṃ caratāṃ na duḥkhaṃ saṃsāraḥ śāmyatīti 		de ltar spyod rnams sdug bsngal nyer mi zhi /
zhes bya'o /
yod do zhes dngos po yod par rtog pa dang ldan pa rgyal dpog pa dang gzegs zan dang ser skya la sogs pa bye brag tu smra ba rnams la thug pa rnams dang med ces rtog pa dang ldan pa med pa pa rnams dang de dag las gzhan 'du byed 'das pa dang ma 'ongs pa dang rnam par rig byed ma yin pa dang mi ldan pa'i 'du byed med par smra zhing de las gzhan yod par smra ba rnams dang kun du brtags pa'i ngo bo nyid med par smra zhing /
gzhan gyi dbang dang yongs su grub pa'i ngo bo nyid yod par smra ba rnams te /
de ltar yod pa dang med par smra ba rnams kyi sdug bsngal te 'khor ba zhi bar mi 'gyur ro zhes bya'o /
tathā /
yatha śaṅkitena viṣasaṃjña abhyupeti no cāpi koṣṭha gantu āviṣṭa papadyate /
evameva bālu 'pagato ..... jāyi mriyate sadā abhūto 		de bzhin du /
ji ltar dogs pa'i 'du shes kyis ni dug langs pa /
dug de khong du song ba med kyang brgyal bar 'gyur /
de bzhin byis pa bdag dang bdag gir khas len pa /
bdag der 'du shes yang dag min rtag skye zhing 'chi /
iti /
tadevaṃ na kasyacinnirvāṇe prahāṇaṃ nāpi kasyacinnirodha iti vijñeyam 		zhes kyang gsungs so /
de'i phyir de lta bas na /
mya ngan las 'das pa la 'ga' yang spangs pa med la /
tataśca sarvakalpanākṣayarūpameva nirvāṇam /
yathoktamāryaratnāvalyām /
na cābhāvo 'pi nirvāṇaṃ kuta evāsya bhāvanā 		'ga' yang 'gag pa med do zhes shes par bya'o /
de'i phyir rtog pa thams cad zad pa nyid mya ngan las 'das pa yin no /
ji skad du 'phags pa rin po che'i phreng ba las kyang /
mya ngan 'das pa dngos med pa'ang /
min na de dngos gal yin /
bhāvābhāvaparāmarśakṣayo nirvāṇamucyate dngos dang dngos po med 'dzin pa /
zad pa mya ngan 'das zhes bya /
iti /
ye tu sarvakalpanopaśamarūpaṃ nirvāṇamapratipadyamānāḥ bhāvābhāvatadubhayānubhayarūpaṃ nirvāṇaṃ parikalpayanti, tān prati ucyate 		zhes bshad do /
gang dag mya ngan las 'das pa kun du rtog pa thams cad nye bar zhi ba'i ngo bo ma rtogs shing /
mya ngan las 'das pa dngos po dang dngos po med pa dang de gnyi ga dang gnyi gam yin pa'i ngo bor yongs su rtog par byed pa /
de dag la brjod pa /
bhāvastāvanna nirvāṇaṃ jarāmaraṇalakṣaṇam re zhig mya ngan 'das dngos min /
rga shi'i mtshan nyid thal bar 'gyur /
prasajyetāsti bhāvo hi na jarāmaraṇaṃ vinā /
tatraike bhāvato nirvāṇamabhiniviṣṭā evamācakṣate 		rga dang 'chi ba med pa yi /
dngos po yod pa ma yin no /
de la mya ngan las 'das pa dngos por mngon par zhen pa kha cig ni 'di skad du /
iha kleśakarmajanmasaṃtānapravṛttiniyatarodhabhūto jalapravāharodhabhūtasetusthānīyo nirodhātmakaḥ padārthaḥ, tannirvāṇam 'dir mya ngan las 'das pa ni nyon mongs pa dang las dang skye ba'i rgyun 'jug pa nges par 'gog par 'gyur ba /
chu'i rgyun 'gog pa'i chu lon dang 'dra ba'i don dngos po'i bdag nyid can yin te /
na ca avidyamānasvabhāvo dharmaḥ evaṃ kāryakārī dṛśyate yod pa ma yin pa'i rang bzhin gyi chos ni de ltar 'bras bu byed par yang ma mthong ngo /
nanu ca yo 'syā nandīrāgasahagatāyāstṛṣṇāyāḥ kṣayo virāgo nirodho nirvāṇamityuktam, na ca kṣayamātraṃ bhāvo bhavitumarhati gal te 'di dga' ba'i 'dod chags dang lhan cig tu 'gyur pa'i srid pa zad cing 'dod chags dang bral ba 'gog pa gang yin pa de ni mya ngan las 'das pa'o zhes gsungs pa ma yin nam /
zad pa tsam ni dngos po yin par 'os pa yang ma yin no /
tathā /
pradyotasyeva nirvāṇaṃ vimokṣastasya cetasaḥ 		de bzhin du /
mar me shi bar gyur pa ltar /
de yi sems ni rnam par thar /
ityuktam zhes gsungs te /
na ca pradyotasya nivṛttirbhāva ityupapadyate mar me shi ba ni dngos po yin no zhes bya bar yang mi 'thad do zhe na /
ucyate smras pa /
naitadevaṃ vijñeyaṃ tṛṣṇāyāḥ kṣayaḥ tṛṣṇākṣayaḥ iti sred pa zad pa ni sred pa zad pa'o zhes de ltar ni shes par mi bya'o /
kiṃ tarhi tṛṣṇāyāḥ kṣayo 'sminniti nirvāṇākhye dharme sati bhavati, sa tṛṣṇākṣaya iti vaktavyam 'o na ci zhe na /
mya ngan las 'das pa zhes bya ba'i chos de yod na sred pa zad par 'gyur ba de ni sred pa zad pa'o zhes bya bar rig par bya'o /
pradīpaśca dṛṣṭāntamātram /
tatrāpi yasmin sati cetaso vimokṣo bhavatīti veditavyamiti 		mar me ni dpe tsam du zad do /
der yang gang yod na sems thar par 'gyur ba yin no zhes bya bar rig par bya'o zhes smra'o /
evaṃ bhāve nirvāṇa vyavasthāpite ācāryo nirūpayati /
bhāvastāvanna nirvāṇam /
kiṃ kāraṇam? yasmājjarāmaraṇalakṣaṇaṃ prasajyeta, bhāvasya jarāmaraṇalakṣaṇāvyabhicāritvāt /
tataśca nirvāṇameva tanna syāt, jarāmaraṇalakṣaṇatvādvijñānavat, ityabhiprāyaḥ 		de ltar mya ngan las 'das pa dngos po rnam par gnas pa yin dang re zhig mya ngan 'das dngos min /
zhes slob dpon nges par rtog par mdzad do /
de ci'i phyir zhe na /
gang gi phyir /
rga shi'i mtshan nyid thal bar 'gyur te /
dngos po ni rga shi'i mtshan nyid la mi 'khrul pa'i phyir ro /
de'i phyir de mya ngan las 'das pa nyid du yang mi 'gyur te /
rga shi'i mtshan nyid can yin pa'i phyir /
rnam par shes pa la sogs pa bzhin no zhes bya bar dgongs pa yin no /
tāmeva ca jarāmaraṇalakṣaṇavyabhicāritāṃ spaṣṭayannāha rga shi'i mtshan nyid la mi 'khrul ba de nyid bsal bar bya ba'i phyir /
rga dang 'chi ba med pa yi /
asti bhāvo hi na jarāmaraṇaṃ vineti dngos po yod pa ma yin no /
zhes bshad de /
yo hi jarāmaraṇarahitaḥ, sa bhāva eva na saṃbhavati, khapuṣpavat, jarāmaraṇarahitatvāt rga shi dang bral ba gang yin pa de ni dngos po nyid ma yin te /
rga shi dang bral ba'i phyir nam mkha'i me tog bzhin no /
kiṃ cānyat gzhan yang /
bhāvaśca yadi nirvāṇaṃ nirvāṇaṃ saṃskṛtaṃ bhavet gal te mya ngan 'das dngos na /
mya ngan 'das pa 'dus byas 'gyur /
nāsaṃskṛto hi vidyate bhāvaḥ kvacana kaścana dngos po 'dus byas ma yin pa /
'ga' yang gang na'ang yod ma yin /
yadi nirvāṇaṃ bhāvaḥ syāt, tadā tannirvāṇaṃ saṃskṛtaṃ bhavet, vijñānādivat bhāvatvāt gal te mya ngan las 'das pa dngos po yin na ni de'i tshe mya ngan las 'das pa de 'dus byas su 'gyur te /
dngos po yin pa'i phyir rnam par shes pa bzhin no /
yastu asaṃskṛtaḥ, nāsau bhāvaḥ, tadyathā kharaviṣāṇavaditi vyatirekamupadarśayannāha gang 'dus byas ma yin pa de ni dngos por mi 'gyur te /
dper na bong bu'i rva bzhin no /
nāsaṃskṛto hi vidyate bhāvaḥ kvacana kaścana ldog pa bshad pa'i phyir /
dngos po 'dus byas ma yin pa /
kvacanetyadhikaraṇe deśe kāle siddhānte vā 'ga' yang gang na'ang yod ma yin /
zhes bya ba gsungs te /
kaścanetyādheye /
ādhyātmiko bāhyātmiko vetyarthaḥ /
kiṃ cānyat /
bhāvaśca yadi nirvāṇamanupādāya tatkatham /
nirvāṇaṃ nānupādāya kaścid bhāvo hi vidyate /
yadi bhavanmatena nirvāṇaṃ bhāvaḥ syāt, tadupādāya bhavet, svakāraṇasāmagrīmāśritya bhavedityarthaḥ 		'ga' yang zhes bya ba ni brten pa ste /
nang ngam phyi'i bdag nyid do zhes bya ba'i don to /
gang na'ang zhes bya ba ni rten te /
yul lam dus sam grub pa'i mthar ro /
gzhan yang /
gal te mya ngan 'das dngos na /
ji ltar myang 'das de brten min /
dngos po brten nas ma yin pa /
'ga' yang yod pa ma yin no /
gal te khyod kyi lugs kyis mya ngan las 'das pa dngos po yin na ni /
de brten nas yin par 'gyur te /
rang gi rgyu'i tshogs pa la brten nas yin no zhes bya ba'i don to /
na caivamupādāya nirvāṇamiṣyate, kiṃ tarhi anupādāya /
tadyadi bhāvo nirvāṇamanupādāya, tat kathaṃ nirvāṇaṃ syāt? naiva anupādāya syāt, bhāvatvāt, vijñānādivat 		de ltar brten nas mya ngan las 'das pa 'dod pa yang ma yin te /
'o na ci zhe na de ni ma brten par ro /
gal te mya ngan las 'das pa dngos po yin na /
ji ltar mya ngan las 'das pa de brten nas ma yin par 'gyur te /
mi brten pa yin par mi 'gyur ba nyid de /
dngos po yin pa'i phyir rnam par shes pa la sogs pa bzhin no /
vyatirekakāraṇamāha /
nānupādāya kaścidbhāvo hi vidyate iti 		ldog pa bshad pa ni /
dngos po brten nas ma yin pa /
'ga' yang yod pa ma yin no /
zhes bya ba'o /
atrāha /
yadi bhāvo hi na nirvāṇam, yathoditadoṣaprasaṅgāt, kiṃ tarhi abhāva eva nirvāṇam, kleśajanmanivṛttimātratvāditi? ucyate 		'dir smras pa /
ji skad bshad ba'i nyes par thal bar 'gyur pa'i phyir /
mya ngan las 'das pa dngos po ma yin pa de ni bden te /
'o na ci zhe na /
nyon mongs pa dang skye ba log pa'i phyir /
mya ngan las 'das pa dngos po med pa kho na yin no /
brjod pa /
'di yang mi rigs te /
etadapyayuktam, yasmāt /
yadi bhāvo na nirvāṇamabhāvaḥ kiṃ bhaviṣyati /
nirvāṇaṃ yatra bhāvo na nābhāvastatra vidyate /
yadi bhāvo nirvāṇaṃ neṣyate, yadi nirvāṇaṃ bhāva iti neṣyate, tadā kimabhāvo bhaviṣyati nirvāṇam? abhāvo 'pi na bhaviṣyatītyarthaḥ /
kleśajanmanorabhāvo nirvāṇamiti cet, evaṃ tarhi kleśajanmanoranityatā nirvāṇamiti syāt /
anityataiva hi kleśajanmanorabhāvo nānyat, ityataḥ anityataiva nirvāṇaṃ syāt /
na caitadiṣṭam, ayatnenaiva mokṣaprasaṅgādityuktamevaitat /
kiṃ cānyat /
yadyabhāvaśca nirvāṇamanupādāya tatkatham /
nirvāṇaṃ na hyabhāvo 'sti yo 'nupādāya vidyate /
tatra abhāvaḥ anityatā vā bhāvamupādāya prajñapyate, kharaviṣāṇādīnāmanityatānupalambhāt /
lakṣaṇamāśritya lakṣyaṃ prajñapyate, lakṣyamāśritya ca lakṣaṇam /
ataḥ parasparāpekṣikyāṃ lakṣyalakṣaṇapravṛttau kuto lakṣyaṃ bhāvamapekṣya anityatā bhaviṣyati? tasmādabhāvo 'pyupādāya prajñapyate /
tato yadi abhāvaśca nirvāṇam, tat kathamanupādāya nirvāṇaṃ bhavet? upādāyaiva tadbhavet, abhāvatvādvināśavat 		gang gi phyir /
gal te mya ngan 'das dngos min /
dngos med ji ltar rung bar 'gyur /
gang la mya ngan 'das dngos min /
de la dngos med yod ma yin /
gal te mya ngan las 'das pa dngos por mi 'dod cing mya ngan las 'das pa dngos po'o snyam du mi 'dod na /
de'i tshe mya ngan las 'das pa dngos po med par ji ltar rung bar 'gyur te /
dngos po med par yang rung bar mi 'gyur ba nyid do snyam du dgongs pa yin no /
ci'i phyir zhe na /
gang gi phyir /
gang la mya ngan 'das dngos min /
de la dngos med yod ma yin /
zhes gsungs te /
'dir dngos po'i rang bzhin btang nas gzhan du gyur pa la dngos po med pa zhes bsnyad na /
bstan zin pa'i nyes pas phyogs gang la mya ngan las 'das pa dngos po ma yin pa'i phyogs de la mya ngan las 'das pa dngos po ma yin pa'i phyogs de la mya ngan las 'das pa dngos po med pa yang ma yin te /
dngos po'i rang bzhin du ma grub pa'i ngo bo la dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid mi 'thad pa'i phyir ro snyam du dgongs pa yin no /
gal te mya ngan las 'das pa ni nyon mongs pa dang skye ba med pa yin no zhe na /
de lta na 'o na nyon mongs pa dang skye ba'i mi rtag pa nyid mya ngan las 'das pa yin par 'gyur te /
gang gi phyir nyon mongs pa dang skye ba med pa ni mi rtag pa nyid yin gyi gzhan ni ma yin te /
de'i phyir mi rtag pa nyid mya ngan las 'das pa yin par 'gyur na /
de ni 'dod pa yang ma yin te /
sgrib pa med par thal bar 'gyur pa'i phyir ro /
de'i phyir 'di ni mi rigs so /
gzhan yang /
gal te mya ngan 'das dngos min /
ji ltar myang 'das de brten min /
gang zhig brten nas ma yin pa'i /
dngos med yod pa ma yin no /
de la mi rtag pa nyid dngos po med pa nyid yin zhing dngos po la brten nas 'dogs pa ma yin te /
bong bu'i rva la sogs pa rnams la mi rtag pa nyid ma dmigs pa'i phyir ro /
mtshan nyid la brten nas mtshan gzhi 'jug la /
mtshan gzhi la brten nas mtshan nyid 'jug pa de'i phyir mtshan nyid dang mtshan gzhi 'jug pa phan tshun ltos pas mtshan gzhi'i dngos po la ma ltos par mi rtag pa nyid yod pa rag la 'gyur /
de'i phyir dngos po med pa yang brten nas 'dogs pa yin no /
de'i phyir gal te mya ngan las 'das pa dngos po med pa 'ga' zhig yin na ni /
ji ltar mya ngan las 'das pa de brten nas ma yin par 'gyur /
etadeva spaṣṭayannāha /
na hyabhāvo 'sti yo 'nupādāya vidyate iti /
yadi tarhi abhāvaḥ anupādāya nāsti, kimidānīmupādāya bandhyāputrādayo 'bhāvā bhaviṣyanti? kenaitaduktaṃ vandhyāputrādayo 'bhāvā iti? uktaṃ hi pūrvam 		de ni brten nas kho na yin te /
dngos po med pa yin pa'i phyir 'jig pa bzhin no /
de nyid gsal bar bya ba'i phyir /
gang zhig brten nas ma yin pa'i /
dngos med yod pa ma yin no /
zhes bshad do /
gal te ma brten par dngos po med pa yod pa ma yin na /
'o na da ci la brten nas mo gsham gyi bu la sogs pa dag dngos po med par 'gyur zhe na /
mo gsham gyi bu la sogs pa dngos po med pa yin no zhes de skad sus smras /
bhāvasya cedaprasiddhirabhāvo naiva sidhyati 'di ltar /
gal te dngos po ma grub na /
dngos med 'grub par mi 'gyur ro /
bhāvasya hyanyathābhāvamabhāvaṃ bruvate janāḥ dngos po gzhan du gyur pa ni /
dngos med yin par skye bo smra /
iti /
tasmānna bandhyāputrādīnāmabhāvatvam /
yaccāpyucyate 		zhes sngar bshad zin to /
de'i phyir mo gsham gyi bu la sogs pa rnams dngos po med pa nyid ma yin no /
yang gang du /
ākāśaṃ śaśaśṛṅgaṃ ca vandhyāyāḥ putra eva ca nam mkha'i ri bong ra dag dang /
mo gsham gyi ni bu dag kyang /
asantaścābhilapyante tathā bhāveṣu kalpanā med bzhin tshig tu brjod pa ltar /
dngos la rtog pa'ang de bzhin no /
iti, /
tatrāpi bhāvakalpanāpratiṣedhamātram, na abhāvakalpanā, bhāvatvāsiddhereveti vijñeyam 		zhes gsungs pa der yang /
dngos por rtog pa bkag pa tsam zhig yin gyi /
dngos po med par rtog pa ni ma yin te /
dngos po nyid ma grub pa'i phyir ro zhes shes par bya'o /
vandhyāputra iti śabdamātramevaitat, na asya arthaḥ upalabhyate, yasyārthasya bhāvatvamabhāvatvaṃ vā syāditi mo gsham gyi bu zhes bya ba 'di ni sgra tsam zhig tu zad kyi /
don gang zhig dngos po 'am dngos po med pa nyid du 'gyur ba 'di'i don ma dmigs so /
kutaḥ anupalabhyamānasvabhāvasya bhāvābhāvakalpanā yokṣyate? tasmāt na bandhyāputro 'bhāva iti vijñeyam de'i phyir dmigs pa med pa'i rang bzhin la dngos po dang dngos po med par brtags par ga la rigs /
de'i phyir mo gsham gyi bu dngos po med pa ma yin no zhes shes par bya'o /
de'i phyir /
tataśca sthitameva na hyabhāvo 'sti yo 'nupādāya vidyate iti gang zhig brten nas ma yin pa'i /
dngos med yod pa ma yin no /
atrāha /
yadi bhāvo nirvāṇaṃ na bhavati, abhāvo 'pi, kiṃ tarhi nirvāṇamiti? ucyate 		zhes bya ba 'di ni gnas so /
'dir gal te mya ngan las 'das pa dngos po ma yin zhing dngos po med pa yang ma yin no /
