'o na mya ngan las 'das pa gang yin zhes zer na /
brjod pa /
iha hi bhagavadbhistathāgataiḥ 'dir bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis /
ya ājavaṃjavībhāva upādāya pratītya vā 'ong ba dang ni 'gro ba'i dngos /
brten tam rgyur byas gang yin pa /
so 'pratītyānupādāya nirvāṇamupadiśyate de ni brten min rgyur byas min /
mya ngan 'das pa yin par bstan /
tatra ājavaṃjavībhāvaḥ āgamanagamanabhāvajanmamaraṇaparaṃparetyarthaḥ de la 'ong ba dang 'gro ba'i dngos po ni 'ong ba dang 'gro ba'i dngos po ste /
skye ba dang 'chi ba gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go /
sa cāyamājavaṃjavībhāvaḥ kadāciddhetupratyayasāmagrīmāśritya astīti prajñapyate dīrghahrasvavat 'ong ba dang 'gro ba'i dngos po de yang res 'ga' rgyu dang rkyen gyi tshogs pa la brten nas yod do zhes bya bar 'dogs te ring po dang thung ngu bzhin no /
kadācidutpadyata iti prajñapyate pradīpaprabhāvad bījāṅkuravat res 'ga' ni rgyur byas nas 'dogs te mar me'i 'od bzhin no /
gal te 'dir rgyur byas nas 'dogs sam /
sarvathā yadyayamupādāya prajñapyate, yadi vā pratītya jāyata iti vyavasthāpyate, sarvathāsya janmamaraṇaparaṃparāprabandhasya apratītya vā anupādāya vā apravṛttistannirvāṇamiti vyavasthāpyate brten nas skye'o zhes rnam par 'jog kyang rung ste /
rnam pa thams cad du skye ba dang 'chi ba'i rgyun de ma brten pa'am rgyur byas pa ma yin par mi 'jug pa gang yin pa de mya ngan las 'das pa yin par rnam par gzhag go /
na ca apravṛttimātraṃ bhāvo 'bhāvo veti parikalpitu pāryata iti mi 'jug pa tsam ni dngos po 'am dngos po med pa yin no zhes bya bar brtag par yang mi nus te /
evaṃ na bhāvo nābhāvo nirvāṇam /
athavā 		de ltar na mya ngan las 'das pa ni dngos po dang dngos po med pa yang ma yin no /
yeṣāṃ saṃskārāḥ saṃsarantīti pakṣaḥ, teṣāṃ pratītya pratītya ya utpādaśca vināśaśca, so 'pratītyāpravartamāno nirvāṇamiti kathyate yang na 'du byed 'khor ba yin no zhes bya ba gang dag gi phyogs yin pa de dag gi ltar na rten cing brten nas skye ba dang 'jig pa gang yin pa de brten pa ma yin par mi 'jug pa la mya ngan las 'das pa zhes bya bar brjod pa 'am /
yeṣāṃ tu pudgalaḥ saṃsarati, teṣāṃ tasya nityānityatvenāvācyasya tattadupādānamāśritya ya ājavaṃjavībhāvaḥ sa upādāya pravartate, sa evopādāyopādāya pravartayamānaḥ sannidānīmanupādāyāpravartayamāno nirvāṇamiti vyapadiśyate /
na ca saṃskārāṇāṃ pudgalasya vā apravṛttimātrakaṃ bhāvo 'bhāvo veti śakyaṃ parikalpayitum 		gang dag gi ltar na gang zag 'khor ba yin pa de dag gi rtag pa dang mi rtag pa nyid du brjod du med pa de'i 'ong ba dang 'gro ba'i dngos po med par nye bar len pa de dang de la brten nas gang yin pa de ni rgyur byas nas 'jug pa yin la /
rgyur byas shing rgyur byas nas 'jug pa de nyid da ltar rgyur byas pa ma yin par mi 'jug pa ni mya ngan las 'das pa zhes bya bar bsnyad do /
'du byed rnams dang gang zag gi mi 'jug pa tsam ni dngos po 'am dngos po med pa yin no zhes bya bar brtag par nus pa yang ma yin no /
ityato 'pi na bhāvo nābhāvo nirvāṇamiti yujyate de'i phyir yang mya ngan las 'das pa dngos po dang dngos po med par mi rigs so zhes bya ba'o /
kiṃ cānyat gzhan yang /
prahāṇaṃ cābravīcchāstā bhavasya vibhavasya ca 'byung ba dang ni 'jig pa dag /
slang bar ston pas bka' stsal to /
tasmānna bhāvo nābhāvo nirvāṇamiti yujyate de phyir mya ngan 'das pa ni /
dngos min dngos med min par rigs /
tatra sūtra uktam /
ye kecidbhikṣavo bhavena bhavasya niḥsaraṇaṃ paryeṣante vibhavena vā, aparijñānaṃ [taṃ?] tatteṣāmiti 		de la mdo las dge slong dag gang dag 'byung ba'am 'jig pas srid pa las nges par 'byung ba tshol ba de ni de dag gi yongs su mi shes pa chen po yin no zhes gsungs so /
ubhayaṃ hyetat parityājyaṃ bhave tṛṣṇā vibhave tṛṣṇā ca 'byung ba'i sred pa dang 'jig pa'i sred pa de ni gnyi ga yang yongs su spang bar bya ba yin na /
na caitannirvāṇaṃ prahātavyamuktaṃ bhagavatā, kiṃ tarhi aprahātavyam mya ngan las 'das pa ni de ltar bcom ldan 'das kyis spang bar bya ba ma gsungs te /
'o na ci zhe na /
tadyadi nirvāṇaṃ bhāvarūpaṃ syādabhāvarūpaṃ vā, tadapi prahātavyaṃ bhavet /
na ca prahātavyam /
tasmānna bhāvo nābhāvo nirvāṇamiti yujyate /
yeṣāmapi kleśajanmanostatrābhāvādabhāvarūpaṃ nirvāṇaṃ svayaṃ ca bhāvarūpatvādbhāvarūpamityubhayarūpam, teṣāmubhayarūpamiti nirvāṇaṃ nopapadyate, iti pratipādayannāha 		spang bar bya ba ma yin par ro /
de'i phyir gal te mya ngan las 'das pa dngos po'i rang bzhin can nam /
dngos po med pa'i rang bzhin du gyur na ni /
de yang spang bar bya ba kho nar 'gyur na /
spang bar bya ba yang ma yin te /
de'i phyir mya ngan las 'das pa dngos po ma yin zhing dngos po med pa yang ma yin par mi rigs so /
gang dag gi ltar na nyon mongs pa dang skye ba gnyis de la med pas /
mya ngan las 'das pa dngos po med pa'i rang bzhin yin la /
rang nyid dngos po'i ngo bo yin pas dngos po'i rang bzhin yin no zhes gnyis ka'i rang bzhin yin pa de dag gi /
gnyi ga'i rang bzhin can gyi mya ngan las 'das pa yang mi 'thad do zhes bstan pa'i phyir gsungs pa /
bhavedabhāvo bhāvaśca nirvāṇamubhayaṃ yadi gal te mya ngan 'das pa ni /
dngos dang dngos med gnyis yin na /
bhavedabhāvo bhāvaśca mokṣastacca na yujyate dngos dang dngos po med pa dag /
thar par 'gyur na de mi rigs /
yadi bhāvābhāvobhayarūpaṃ nirvāṇaṃ syāt, tadā bhāvaśca abhāvaśca mokṣa iti syāt gal te mya ngan las 'das pa dngos po dang dngos po med pa gnyi ga'i rang bzhin du gyur na ni /
de'i tshe dngos po dang dngos po med par thar par 'gyur ro /
tataśca yaḥ saṃskārāṇāmātmalābhaḥ tasya ca vigamaḥ, sa eva mokṣaḥ syāt de'i phyir 'du byed rnams kyi bdag nyid 'thob pa dang de dang bral ba gang yin pa de nyid thar par 'gyur na /
na ca saṃskārā eva mokṣa iti yujyate 'du byed dag ni thar ba zhes bya bar rigs pa yang ma yin no /
ata evāha /
tacca na yujyate iti 		de nyid kyi phyir /
de mi rigs so zhes bshad do /
kiṃ cānyat gzhan yang /
bhavedabhāvo bhāvaśca nirvāṇamubhayaṃ yadi gal te mya ngan 'das pa ni /
dngos dang dngos med gnyis yin na /
nānupādāya nirvāṇamupādāyobhayaṃ hi tat mya ngan 'das pa ma brten min /
de gnyis brten nas yin phyir ro /
yadi bhāvābhāvarūpaṃ nirvāṇaṃ syāt, tadā hetupratyayasāmagrīmupādāya āśritya bhavet, na anupādāya gal te mya ngan las 'das pa dngos po dang dngos po med pa'i rang bzhin yin na ni /
de'i tshe rgyu dang rkyen gyi tshogs pa la brten cing ltos nas yin gyi /
ma brten par ni ma yin no /
ci'i phyir zhe na /
kiṃ kāraṇam? yasmādupādāyobhayaṃ hi tat /
bhāvamupādāya abhāvaḥ, abhāvaṃ copādāya bhāvaḥ, iti kṛtvā ubhayametad bhāvaṃ ca abhāvaṃ ca upādāyaiva bhavati, na anupādāya 		gang gi phyir /
de gnyis brten nas yin phyir ro ste /
dngos po la brten nas dngos po med pa yin zhing /
dngos po med pa la brten nas dngos po yod pa'i phyir /
dngos po dang dngos po med pa de gnyi ga brten nas yin gyi ma brten par ni ma yin no /
evaṃ nirvāṇaṃ bhaved bhāvābhāvarūpam /
na caitadevam, iti na yuktametat /
kiṃ cānyat 		mya ngan las 'das pa dngos po dang dngos po med pa'i rang bzhin yin pa'i phyir de ltar 'gyur ba zhig na /
de ni de ltar yang ma yin te /
de'i phyir 'di ni mi rigs so /
gzhan yang /
bhavedabhāvo bhāvaśca nirvāṇamubhayaṃ katham ji ltar mya ngan 'das pa ni /
dngos dang dngos med gnyis yin te /
asaṃskṛtaṃ ca nirvāṇaṃ bhāvābhāvau ca saṃskṛtau mya ngan 'das pa 'dus ma byas /
dngos dang dngos med 'dus byas yin /
bhāvo hi svahetupratyayasāmagrīsaṃbhūtatvāt saṃskṛtaḥ /
abhāvo 'pi [bhāvaṃ] pratītya saṃbhūtatvāt, jātipratyayajarāmaraṇavacanācca saṃskṛtaḥ /
tadyadi bhāvābhāvasvabhāvaṃ nirvāṇaṃ syāt, tadā na asaṃskṛtam, [kiṃ tu] saṃskṛtameva 		dngos po ni rang gi rgyu dang rkyen gyi tshogs pa las byung ba'i phyir 'dus byas yin la /
dngos po med pa yang dngos po la brten nas 'byung ba'i phyir dang skye ba'i rkyen gyis rga shi zhes 'byung ba'i phyir 'dus byas yin no /
de'i phyir gal te mya ngan las 'das pa dngos po dang dngos po med pa'i rang bzhin yin na ni /
de'i tshe de 'dus ma byas yin gyi /
'dus byas nyid du 'gyur na /
yasmānna ca saṃskṛtamiṣyate, tasmānna bhāvābhāvasvarūpaṃ nirvāṇaṃ yujyate /
athāpi syāt /
naiva hi nirvāṇaṃ bhāvābhāvasvarūpam, kiṃ tarhi nirvāṇe bhāvābhāvāviti 		'dus byas su ni 'dod pa yang ma yin no /
de'i phyir mya ngan las 'das pa dngos po dang dngos po med par mi rigs so /
ci ste yang mya ngan las 'das pa ni dngos po dang dngos po med pa'i rang bzhin ma yin te /
'o na ci zhe na /
mya ngan las 'das pa la dngos po dang dngos po med pa de dag yod pa ma yin no snyam na /
de yang mi rigs so; /
evamapi na yuktam /
kutaḥ? yasmāt 		gang las she na /
gang gi phyir /
bhavedabhāvo bhāvaśca nirvāṇe ubhayaṃ katham /
[tayorekatra nāstitvamālokatamasoryathā] /
bhāvābhāvayorapi parasparaviruddhayorekatra nirvāṇe nāsti saṃbhava iti, ataḥ, 		ji ltar mya ngan 'das pa la /
dngos dang dngos med gnyis yod de /
dngos dang dngos po med pa phan tshun 'gal ba dag kyang mya ngan las 'das pa gcig la yod pa ma yin te /
de'i phyir /
ji ltar mya ngan 'das pa la /
dngos dang dngos med gnyis yod de /
yod pa ma yin pa nyid de snyam du dgongs pa yin no /
ji lta bur zhe na /
de gnyis gcig la yod min te /
bhavedabhāvo bhāvaśca nirvāṇe ubhayaṃ katham snang ba dang ni mun pa bzhin /
ji ltar khyim gcig tu dus gcig gi tshe /
naiva bhavedityabhiprāyaḥ /
idānīṃ yathā naiva bhāvo naivābhāvo nirvāṇaṃ yujyate, tathā pratipādayannāha /
naivābhāvo naiva bhāvo nirvāṇamiti yāñjanā 		phan tshun 'gal bas /
snang ba dang mun pa dag yod pa ma yin pa de bzhin du de gnyis kyang mya ngan las 'das pa la yod pa ma yin no /
da ni mya ngan las 'das pa dngos po ma yin zhing dngos po med pa yang ma yin pa yang ji ltar mi rigs pa de ltar bstan pa'i phyir /
dngos min dngos po med min pa /
mya ngan 'das par gang ston pa /
abhāve caiva bhāve ca sā siddhe sati sidhyati /
yadi hi bhāvo nāma kaścit syāt, tadā tatpratiṣedhena naiva bhāvo nirvāṇamityeṣā kalpanā, yadi kaścidabhāvaḥ syāt, tadā tatpratiṣedhena naivābhāvo nirvāṇaṃ syāt 		dngos po med dang dngos po dag /
grub na de ni 'grub par 'gyur /
zhes gsungs te /
gal te dngos po zhes bya ba 'ba' zhig yod na ni /
de'i tshe de bkag pa'i sgo nas mya ngan las 'das pa dngos po ma yin pa zhes bya ba'i rtog pa 'dir 'gyur la /
gal te dngos po med pa 'ga' zhig yod na ni /
de'i tshe de bkag pas mya ngan las 'das pa dngos po med pa ma yin par 'gyur ba zhig na /
yadā ca bhāvābhāvāveva na staḥ, tadā tatpratiṣedho 'pi nāstīti gang gi tshe dngos po dang dngos po med pa dag nyid yod pa ma yin pa de'i tshe de dag bkag pa yang yod pa ma yin no /
tasmānnaiva bhāvo naivābhāvo nirvāṇamiti yā kalpanā, sāpi nopapadyata eva /
iti na yuktametat 		de'i phyir mya ngan las 'das pa dngos po ma yin zhing /
dngos po med pa yang ma yin no snyam du rtog pa gang yin pa de yang mi 'thad pas 'di ni rigs pa ma yin no /
kiṃ cānyat gzhan yang /
naivābhāvo naiva bhāvo nirvāṇaṃ yadi vidyate gal te mya ngan 'das pa ni /
dngos min dngos po med min na /
naivābhāvo naiva bhāva iti kena tadajyate /
yadi etannirvāṇaṃ naivābhāvarūpaṃ naiva bhāvarūpamastīti kalpyate, kena tadānīṃ taditthaṃvidhaṃ nobhayarūpaṃ nirvāṇamastīti ajyate gṛhyate prakāśate vā? kiṃ tatra nirvāṇe kaścidevaṃvidhaḥ pratipattāsti, atha nāsti? yadi asti, evaṃ sati nirvāṇe 'pi tavātmā syāt 		dngos min dngos po med min zhes /
gang zhig gis ni de mngon byed /
gal te mya ngan las 'das pa dngos po ma yin zhing dngos po med pa yang ma yin pa'i rang bzhin du yod do zhes rtog na /
da ni gang zhig gis rnam pa de lta bur gyur pa mya ngan las 'das pa gnyi ga'i ngo bo ma yin pa de yod do zhes bya bar mngon par byed de /
'dzin pa'am gsal bar byed /
ci mya ngan las 'das pa de la rnam pa de lta bu'i rtogs pa po 'ga' zhig yod dam 'on te med /
gal te yod na ni de ltar na mya ngan las 'das par yang bdag yod par 'gyur na /
na ceṣṭam, nirupādānasyātmano 'stitvābhāvāt 'dod pa ni ma yin te /
nye bar len pa med par bdag yod pa nyid ma yin pa'i phyir ro /
atha nāsti, kenaitaditthaṃvidhaṃ nirvāṇamastīti paricchidyate? saṃsārāvasthitaḥ paricchinattīti cet, yadi saṃsārāvasthitaḥ paricchinatti, sa kiṃ vijñānena paricchinatti, utta jñānena? yadi vijñāneneti parikalpyate, tanna yujyate ci ste med na ni de'i tshe rnam pa de lta bu'i mya ngan las 'das pa de yod par gang gis gcod par byed /
gal te 'khor ba na gnas pas yongs su gcod par byed do zhe na /
'khor ba na gnas pas yongs su gcod par byed na de ci rnam par shes pas gcod par byed dam /
'on te ye shes kyis yin grang na /
gal te rnam par shes pas yin par rtog na /
de ni mi rigs so /
ci'i phyir zhe na /
'di ltar rnam par shes pa 'di ni mtshan ma la dmigs pa yin no /
kiṃ kāraṇam? yasmānnimittālambanaṃ vijñānam, na ca nirvāṇe kiṃcinnimittamasti, tasmānna tattāvadvijñānenālambyate mya ngan las 'das pa la ni mtshan ma cung zad kyang yod pa ma yin te /
de'i phyir re zhig de ni rnam par shes pas dmigs par byed pa ma yin no /
jñānenāpi na jñāyate /
kiṃ kāraṇam? yasmād jñānena hi śūnyatālambanena bhavitavyam, tacca anutpādarūpameveti, kathaṃ tenāvidyamānasvarūpeṇa naivābhāvo naiva bhāvo nirvāṇamiti gṛhyate, sarvaprapañcātītarūpatvād jñānasyeti 		ye shes kyis kyang spyod par byed pa ma yin te /
ye shes kyis ni stong pa nyid la dmigs par 'gyur dgos la de yang ma skyes pa'i rang bzhin nyid yin pas /
ji ltar yod pa ma yin pa'i rang bzhin des mya ngan las 'das pa dngos po ma yin zhing /
dngos po med pa ma yin pa zhes bya bar 'dzin par byed /
ye shes ni spros pa thams cad las 'das pa'i rang bzhin yin pa'i phyir ro /
tasmānna kenacinnirvāṇaṃ naivābhāvo naiva bhāva ityajyate /
anajyamānamaprakāśyamānamagṛhyamāṇaṃ tadevamastīti na yujyate 		de'i phyir mya ngan las 'das pa ni gang gis kyang dngos po ma yin zhing /
dngos po med pa ma yin no zhes bya bar mngon par mi byed la /
mngon par ma byas shing gsal bar ma byas la /
ma bzung ba de ni de ltar yod do zhes bya bar mi rigs so /
sarvathā yathā ca nirvāṇe etāścatasraḥ kalpanā na saṃbhavanti, evaṃ nirvāṇādhigantaryapi tathāgate etāḥ kalpanā naiva saṃbhavantīti pratipādayannāha ji ltar mya ngan las 'das pa la rtog pa bzhi po 'di dag rnam pa thams cad du mi srid pa de bzhin du /
mya ngan las 'das pa thugs su chud pa po de bzhin gshegs pa la yang rtog pa 'di dag srid pa ma yin zhes bstan pa'i phyir /
paraṃ nirodhādbhagavān bhavatītyeva nohyate bcom ldan mya ngan 'das gyur nas /
yod par mi mngon de bzhin du /
med do zhe 'am gnyi ga 'am /
na bhavatyubhayaṃ ceti nobhayaṃ ceti nohyate gnyis min zhes kyang mi mngon no /
zhes gsungs te /
uktaṃ hi pūrvam /
ghanagrāhagṛhītastu yenāstīti tathāgataḥ 		'di ltar /
gang gis 'dzin stug bzung gyur pa /
de ni mya ngan 'das pa la /
nāstīti vā kalpayan sa nirvṛtasya vikalpayet de bzhin gshegs pa yod ce 'am /
med ces rnam rtog rtog par byed /
ces gong du bshad zin to /
evaṃ tāvat paraṃ nirodhādbhavati tathāgato na bhavati ceti nohyate de ltar na re zhig de bzhin gshegs pa mya ngan las 'das phan chad yod pa'am med do zhes bya bar mi mngon no /
etaddvayasyābhāvādubhayamityapi nohyate 'di gnyis med pas gnyi ga'o zhes bya bar yang mi mngon no /
ubhayasyābhāvādeva nobhayamiti nohyate na gṛhyate gnyi ga med pa nyid kyis na gnyi ga ma yin pa zhes bya bar yang mi mngon zhing mi 'dzin pa yin no /
na ca kevalaṃ paraṃ nirodhāccaturbhiḥ prakārairbhagavānnohyate, api ca bcom ldan 'das mya ngan las 'das nas /
rnam pa bzhir mi mngon pa 'ba' zhig tu ma zad kyi /
gzhan yang /
tiṣṭhamāno 'pi bhagavān bhavatītyeva nohyate bcom ldan bzhugs par gyur na yang /
yod par mi mngon de bzhin du /
na bhavatyubhayaṃceti nobhayaṃ ceti nohyate med do zhe 'am gnyi ga dang /
gnyis min zhes kyang mi mngon no /
yathā nājyaṃ na cohyaṃ tathā tathāgataparīkṣāyāṃ pratipāditam ji ltar mi mngon pa de ltar ni de bzhin gshegs pa brtag par bstan zin pa nyid do /
ata eva /
na saṃsārasya nirvāṇātkiṃcidasti viśeṣaṇam 		de nyid kyi phyir /
'khor ba mya ngan 'das pa las /
khyad par cung zad yod ma yin /
na nirvāṇasya saṃsārātkiṃcidasti viśeṣaṇam mya ngan 'das pa'ang 'khor ba las /
khyad par cung zad yod ma yin /
yasmāttiṣṭhannapi bhagavān bhavatītyevamādinā nohyate, parinirvṛto 'pi nohyate bhavatītyevamādinā, ata eva saṃsāranirvāṇayoḥ parasparato nāsti kaścidviśeṣaḥ, vicāryamāṇayostulyarūpatvāt gang gi phyir bcom ldan 'das zhugs pa na yang yod do zhes bya ba la sogs pa mi mngon la /
mya ngan las 'das pa na yang yod do zhes bya ba la sogs par mi mngon pa de nyid kyi phyir 'khor ba dang mya ngan las 'das pa gnyis la phan tshun khyad par 'ga' yang yod pa ma yin te /
rnam par dpyad na rang bzhin mtshungs pa'i phyir ro /
yaccāpīdamuktaṃ bhagavatā gang yang bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di skad du /
anavarāgro hi bhikṣavo jātijarāmaraṇasaṃsāra iti, tadapi ata evopapannam, saṃsāranirvāṇayorviśeṣasyābhāvāt dge slong dag skye ba dang rga shi'i 'khor ba ni thog ma dang tha ma med do zhes gsungs pa de yang 'di nyid kyi phyir 'thad pa yin to /
'khor ba dang mya ngan las 'das pa gnyis la khyad par med pa'i phyir ro /
tathāhi 'di ltar /
nirvāṇasya ca yā koṭiḥ koṭiḥ saṃsaraṇasya ca myang 'das mtha' dag gang yin pa /
de ni 'khor ba'i mtha' yin te /
na tayorantaraṃ kiṃcitsusūkṣmamapi vidyate de gnyis khyad par cung zad ni /
shin tu phra ba'ang yod ma yin /
na ca kevalaṃ saṃsārasya nirvāṇenāviśiṣṭatvāt pūrvāparakoṭikalpanā na saṃbhavati, yā apyetāḥ mya ngan las 'das pa dang 'khor ba la khyad par med pa'i phyir /
sngon dang phyi ma'i mthar rtog pa yod pa ma yin pa 'ba' zhig tu ma zad kyi /
paraṃ nirodhādantādyāḥ śāśvatādyāśca dṛṣṭayaḥ gang 'das phan chad mtha' sogs dang /
rtag la sogs par lta ba dag /
nirvāṇamaparāntaṃ ca pūrvāntaṃ ca samāśritāḥ /
tā api ata eva nopapadyante, saṃsāranirvāṇayorubhayorapi prakṛtiśāntatvenaikarasatvāt 		mya ngan 'das dang phyi mtha' dang /
sngon gyi mtha' la brten pa yin /
de dag kyang de nyid kyi phyir mi 'thad pa yin te /
'khor ba dang mya ngan las 'das pa de gnyis ka yang rang bzhin gyis zhi ba nyid du ro gcig pa'i phyir ro /
tatra paraṃ nirodhādityanenopalakṣaṇena catasro dṛṣṭayaḥ parigṛhyante de la 'das phan chad ces bya ba'i nye bar mtshon pa 'dis ni lta ba bzhin bzung ngo /
tadyathā 'di lta ste /
bhavati tathāgataḥ paraṃ maraṇāt, na bhavati tathāgataḥ paraṃ maraṇāta, bhavati ca na bhavati ca tathāgataḥ paraṃ maraṇāt, naiva bhavati na na bhavati tathāgataḥ paraṃ maraṇāditi de bzhin gshegs pa grongs phan chad pa yod pa dang de bzhin gshegs pa grongs phan chad med pa dang de bzhin gshegs pa grongs phan chad yod kyang yod la med kyang med pa dang de bzhin gshegs pa grongs phan chad yod pa yang ma yin med pa yang ma yin no zhes bya ba ste /
etāścatasro dṛṣṭayo nirvāṇaparāmarśena pravṛttāḥ lta ba bzhi po 'di dag ni mya ngan las 'das pa la mchog tu 'dzin par zhugs so /
antādyā api dṛṣṭayaḥ mtha' la sogs pa yang lta ba bzhi'o /
tadyathā /
antavān lokaḥ, anantavāṃśca, antavāṃścānantavāṃśca, naivāntavān nānantavān lokaḥ iti /
etāścatasro dṛṣṭayo 'parāntaṃ samāśritya pravṛttāḥ 		'di lta ste /
'jig rten mtha' dang ldan no /
'jig rten mtha' dang mi ldan no /
'jig rten mtha' dang ldan pa yang yin la mtha' dang mi ldan pa yang yin no /
mtha' dang ldan pa yang ma yin la mtha' dang mi ldan pa yang ma yin no zhes bya ba ste /
lta ba bzhi po 'di dag ni phyi ma'i mtha' la brten te 'jug pa yin no /
tatra ātmano lokasya vā anāgatamutpādamapaśyan antavān loka ityevaṃ kalpayan aparāntamālambya pravartate de la bdag dang 'jig rten la ma 'ongs pa'i skye ba ma mthong bas 'jig rten mtha' dang ldan no zhes de ltar na rtog pa na /
phyi ma'i mtha' la brten nas 'jug par 'gyur ro /
evamanāgatamutpādaṃ paśyan anantavān loka ioti pravartate de bzhin du ma 'ongs pa'i skye ba mthong bas 'jig rten mtha' dang mi ldan no zhes 'jug cing /
paśyaṃśca apaśyaṃśca ubhayathā prātipadyate mthong ba dang ma mthong bas ni gnyi gar rtogs par 'gyur la /
dvayapratiṣedhena naivāntavān nānantavāniti pratipadyate /
śāśvato lokaḥ, aśāśvato lokaḥ, śāśvataścāśāśvataśca, naivaśāśvato naivāśāśvāto lokaḥ, ityetāścatasro dṛṣṭayaḥ pūrvāntaṃ samāśritya pravartante /
tatra ātmano lokasya vā atītamutpādaṃ paśyan śāśvato loka iti pratipadyate, apaśyannaśāśvata iti pratipadyate, paśyaṃśca apaśyaṃśca śāśvataścāśāśvataśceti pratipadyate, naiva paśyannaivāpaśyan naivaśāśvato nāśāśvataśceti pratipadyate pūrvāntamāaśritya 		gnyi ga bkag pas ni mtha' dang ldan pa yang ma yin mtha' dang mi ldan pa yang ma yin no zhes bya bar rtogs par 'gyur ro /
'jig rten rtag go /
'jig rten mi rtag go /
'jig rten rtag kyang rtag la mi rtag kyang mi rtag go /
rtag pa yang ma yin mi rtag pa yang ma yin no zhes bya ba lta ba bzhi po 'di dag ni sngon gyi mtha' la brten nas 'byung ba yin no /
de la bdag dang 'jig rten las 'das par skyes pa mthong bas 'jig rten rtag go snyam du rtogs par 'gyur la /
ma mthong bas ni mi rtag go snyam du rtogs par 'gyur ro /
mthong ba dang ma mthong bas ni rtag kyang rtag la mi rtag kyang mi rtag go snyam du rtogs par 'gyur la /
mthong ba yang ma yin ma mthong ba yang ma yin pas ni rtag pa yang ma yin mi rtag pa yang ma yin no snyam du rtogs par 'gyur ro /
lta ba 'di dag ji ltar rung bar 'gyur zhe na /
tāścaitā dṛṣṭayaḥ kathaṃ yujyante? yadi kasyacitpadārthasya kaścit svabhāvo bhavet, tasya bhāvābhāvakalpanāt syuretā dṛṣṭayaḥ gal te dngos po gang zhig la rang bzhin 'ga' zhig yod na ni /
de la dngos po dang dngos po med par brtags pas lta ba 'di dag yod par 'gyur ba zhig na /
yadā tu saṃsāranirvāṇayoraviśeṣaḥ pratipāditaḥ, tadā gang gi tshe 'khor ba dang mya ngan las 'das pa gnyis la khyad par med par bstan pa de'i tshe /
śūnyeṣu sarvadharmeṣu kimanantaṃ kimantavat dngos po thams cad stong pa la /
mtha' yod ci zhig mtha' med ci /
kimanantamantavacca nānantaṃ nāntavacca kim /
kiṃ tadeva kimanyatkiṃ śāśvataṃ kimaśāśvatam 		mtha' dang mtha' med ci zhig yin /
mtha' dang mtha' med min pa ci /
de nyid ci zhig gzhan ci yin /
rtag pa ci zhig mi rtag ci /
aśāśvataṃ śāśvataṃ ca kiṃ vā nobhayamapyataḥ rtag dang mi rtag gnyi ga ci /
gnyi ga yin pa'ang ci zhig yin /
caturdaśāpyetāni avyākṛtavastūni asati bhāvasvarūpe naiva yujyante /
yastu bhāvasvarūpamadhyāropya tadvigamāvigamataḥ etā dṛṣṭīrutpādya abhiniviśate, tasyāyamabhiniveśo nirvāṇapuragāminaṃ panthānaṃ niruṇaddhi, sāṃsārikeṣu ca duḥkheṣu niyojayatīti vijñeyam 		lung du ma bstan pa'i dngos po bcu bzhi po 'di dag kyang dngos po'i rang gi ngo bo med na mi rigs pa nyid do /
gang zhig dngos po'i rang gi ngo bo sgro btags te /
de dang bral ba dang ma bral ba las lta ba 'di dag bskyed nas /
mngon par zhen pa de'i mngon par zhen pa 'dis mya ngan las 'das pa'i grong khyer du 'gro ba'i lam 'gog cing /
'khor ba'i sdug bsngal dag la sbyor bar byed pa yin no zhes shes par bya'o /
'dir smras pa /
gal te de ltar khyod kyis mya ngan las 'das pa yang bkag na /
atrāha /
yadi evaṃ bhavatā nirvāṇamapi pratiṣiddham, nanu ca ya eṣa bhavagatā anantacaritasattvarāśyanuvartakena viditāviparītasakalajagadāśayasvabhāvena mahākarūṇāparatantreṇa priyaikaputra kapremānugatāśeṣatribhuvanajanena caritapratipakṣānurūpo dharmo deśito lokasya nirvāṇādhigamārtham, sa evaṃ sati vyartha eva jāyate 		de ltar yin na /
bcom ldan 'das sems can gyi phung po spyod pa mtha' yas pa'i rjes su 'jug pa /
'gro ba'i bsam pa'i rang bzhin phyin ci ma log par thugs su chud pa /
thugs rje chen po'i gzhan dbang du gyur pas /
'jig rten gyi mya ngan las 'das pa thob par mdzad pa'i slad du /
spyod pa'i gnyen por rjes su mthun pa'i chos bstan pa gang yin pa de don med par 'gyur ro /
ucyate /
yadi kaściddharmo nāma svabhāvarūpataḥ syāt, kecicca sattvāstasya dharmasya śrotāraḥ syuḥ, kaścidvā deśitā buddho bhagavānnāma bhāvasvabhāvaḥ syāt, syādetadevam 		brjod par bya ste /
gal te chos zhes bya ba 'ga' zhig gam /
chos de'i nyan pa po'i sems can 'ga' zhig gam /
sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das zhes bya ba ston pa po 'ga' zhig yod na ni de'i tshe 'di de ltar 'gyur na /
yadā tu gang gi tshe /
sarvopalambhopaśamaḥ prapañcopaśamaḥ śivaḥ dmigs pa thams cad nyer zhi zhing /
spros pa nyer zhi zhi ba ste /
na kvacitkasyacitkaściddharmo buddhena deśitaḥ sangs rgyas kyis ni gang du yang /
su la'ang chos 'ga' ma bstan to /
tadā kuto 'smākaṃ yathoktadoṣaprasaṅgaḥ? iha hi sarveṣāṃ prapañcānāṃ nimittānāṃ ya upaśamo 'pravṛttistannirvāṇam ma gsungs pa de'i tshe kho bo cag la ji skad smras pa'i nyes par thal bar gal 'gyur /
'dir spros pa ste mtshan ma rnams gang nye bar zhi ba ste /
mi 'jug pa gang yin pa de mya ngan las 'das pa yin la /
sa eva copaśamaḥ prakṛtyaivopaśāntatvācchivaḥ nye bar zhi ba de nyid ni nye bar zhi ba ste rang bzhin gyis nye bar zhi ba'i phyir ro /
vācāmapravṛttervā prapañcopaśamaścittasyāpravṛtteḥ śivaḥ yang na tshig mi 'jug pas spros pa nyer zhi yin la /
sems mi 'jug pas zhi ba'o /
kleśānāmapravṛttyā vā janmano 'pravṛttyā śivaḥ yang na nyon mongs pa rnams mi 'byung bas spros pa nyer zhi yin la skye ba mi 'byung pas zhi ba'o /
kleśaprahāṇena vā prapañcopaśamo niravaśeṣavāsanāprahāṇe śivaḥ yang na nyon mongs pa spangs pas spros pa nyer zhi yin la /
bag chags ma lus par spangs pas zhi ba'o /
jñeyānupalabdhyā vā prapañcopaśamo jñānānupalabdhyā śivaḥ yang na shes bya ma dmigs pas spros pa nyer zhi yin la /
shes pa ma dmigs pas zhi ba'o /
yadā caivaṃ buddhā bhagavantaḥ sarvaprapañcopaśāntarūpe nirvāṇe śive 'sthānayogena nabhasīva haṃsarājāḥ sthitāḥ svapuṇyajñānasaṃbhārapakṣapātavāte vātagagane vā gaganasyākiṃcanatvāt, tadā sarvanimittānupalambhānna kvaciddeveṣu vā manuṣyeṣu vā na kasyaciddevasya vā manuṣyasya vā na kaściddharmaḥ sāṃkleśiko vā vaiyavadāniko vā deśita iti vijñeyam /
yathoktamāryatathāgataguhyasūtre /
"yāṃ ca rātriṃ śāntamate tathāgato 'nuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbuddhaḥ, yāṃ ca rātrimanupādāya parinirvāsyati, atrāntare tathāgatenaikamapyakṣaraṃ nodāhṛtaṃ na vyāhṛtaṃ nāpi pravyāharati nāpi pravyāhariṣyati /
atha ca yathādhimuktāḥ sarvasattvā nānādhātvāśayāstāṃ tāṃ vividhāṃ tathāgatavācaṃ niścarantīṃ saṃjānanti /
teṣāmevaṃ pṛthak pṛthagbhavati /
ayaṃ bhagavānasmabhyamimaṃ dharmaṃ deśayati, vayaṃ ca tathāgatasya dharmadeśanāṃ śṛṇumaḥ /
tatra tathāgato na kalpayati na vikalpayati /
sarvakalpavikalpajālavāsanāprapañcavigato hi śāntamate tathāgataḥ" /
iti vistaraḥ 		gang gi tshe de ltar sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams nam mkha' la dang pa'i rgyal po dag rang gi gshog pa brdabs pa'i rlung la gnas pa'am /
nam mkha' ci yang ma yin pa nyid kyi phyir rlung nam mkha' la gnas pa ltar /
mya ngan las 'das pa spros pa thams cad nye par zhi zhing /
zhi ba'i ngo bo la mi gnas pa'i tshul gyis gnas pa /
de'i tshe mtshan ma thams cad nye bar ma dmigs pa'i phyir /
gang du yang rung ste lha yul lam mi yul dag tu /
lha'am mi su la yang kun nas nyon mongs pa'am rnam par byang ba'i chos 'ga' yang ma bstan to zhes bya bar shes par bya'o /
ji skad du /
'phags pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsang ba'i mdo las /
zhi ba'i blo gros gang gi nub mo de bzhin gshegs pa bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa dang gang gi nub mo len pa mi mnga' bar yongs su mya ngan las 'das par 'gyur ba de'i bar du /
de bzhin gshegs pas tha na yi ge 'brug gcig kyang ma gsungs so /
gsung bar mi 'gyur ro zhes gsungs so /
tathā /
avāca 'nakṣarāḥ sarvaśūnyāḥ śāntādinirmalāḥ 		de bzhin du /
thams cad tshig med yi ge med /
gdod nas zhi zhing dri med stong /
ya evaṃ jānati dharmān kumāro buddha socyate chos rnams de ltar sus shes pa /
de ni gzhon nu sangs rgyas brjod /
ces gsungs so /
yadi tarhyevaṃ na kvacitkasyacitkaściddharmo buddhena deśitaḥ, tatkathamime ete vicitrāḥ pravacanavyavahārāḥ prajñāyante? ucyate gal te de ltar sangs rgyas kyis gang du yang su la yang chos 'ga' ma bstan na /
'o na ji ltar gsung rab kyi tha snyad shin tu sna tshogs pa de dag mngon par 'gyur zhe na /
brjod par bya ste /
avidyānidrānugatānāṃ dehināṃ svapnāyamānānāmiva svavikalpābhyudaya eṣaḥ /
ayaṃ bhagavān sakalatribhuvanasurāsuranaranāthaḥ imaṃ dharmamasmabhyaṃ deśayatīti 		bcom ldan 'das 'dis kho bo cag la chos 'di dag bstan to zhes bya ba 'di ni /
lus can ma rig pa'i gnyid dang ldan zhing rmi lam rmi bzhin pa rnams kyi rang gi rnam par rtog pa las byung ba yin no /
yathoktaṃ bhagavatā ji skad du /
bcom ldan 'das kyis /
tathāgato hi pratibimbabhūtaḥ kuśalasya dharmasya anāsravasya de bzhin gshegs pa zag pa med pa yin /
dge ba'i chos kyi gzugs brnyan lta bu yin /
naivātra tathatā na tathāgato 'sti bimbaṃ ca saṃdṛśyati sarvaloke de bzhin nyid dang de bzhin gshegs pa med /
'jig rten thams cad kyi ni gzugs brnyan mthong /
iti /
etacca tathāgatavāgguhyaparivarte vistareṇa vyākhyātam /
tataśca nirvāṇārthaṃ dharmadeśanāyā abhāvāt kuto dharmadeśanāyāḥ sadbhāvena nirvāṇasyāstitvaṃ bhaviṣyati? tasmānnirvāṇamapi nāstīti siddham /
uktaṃ ca bhagavatā 		zhes gsungs pa lta bu'o /
de bzhin du 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsang ba bstan pa'i le'u las rgya cher bstan pa yin te /
de'i phyir mya ngan las 'das pa'i slad du chos bstan pa med pas chos bstan pa yod pa'i phyir /
mya ngan las 'das pa yod pa nyid du ga la 'gyur /
de'i phyir mya ngan las 'das pa yang med do zhes bya ba grub po /
bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang /
anirvāṇaṃ hi nirvāṇaṃ lokanāthena deśitam mya ngan 'das med myang 'das su /
'jig rten mgon gyis bstan pa ste /
ākāśena kṛto granthirākāśenaiva mocitaḥ nam mkha' mdud pa bor ba ni /
nam mkha' nyid kyis bkrol ba yin /
iti /
tathā /
na teṣāṃ bhagavan saṃsārasamatikramo ye nirvāṇaṃ bhāvataḥ paryeṣante /
tatkasya hetoḥ? nirvāṇamiti bhagavan yaḥ praśamaḥ sarvanimittānāmuparatiḥ sarveñjitasamiñjitānām /
tadime bhagavan mohapuruṣā ye svākhyāte dharmavinaye pravrajya tīrthikadṛṣṭau nipatitā nirvāṇaṃ bhāvataḥ paryeṣante tadyathā tilebhyastailaṃ kṣīrātsarpiḥ 		zhes gsungs pa yin no /
de bzhin du /
bcom ldan 'das gang dag chos 'ga' zhig skye ba'am 'gag par 'tshal ba de dag la ni sangs rgyas 'byung ba ma lags so /
bcom ldan 'das gang dag 'khor ba dngos por 'tshal ba de dag ni /
'khor ba las 'da' ba ma lags so /
de ci'i slad du zhe na /
bcom ldan 'das mya ngan las 'das pa zhes bgyi ba ni /
gang mtshan ma thams cad rab tu zhi ba /
rnam par rtog pa thams cad 'gags pa lags na /
bcom ldan 'das skyes bu blun po legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab tu byung nas /
mu stegs kyi lta bar lhung ba de dag ni /
'di lta ste /
til las til mar dang 'o ma las mar gsar ltar mya ngan las 'das pa dngos po las tshol bar bgyid do /
bcom ldan 'das gang dag chos thams cad shin tu mya ngan las 'das pa la /
atyantaparinirvṛteṣu bhagavan sarvadharmeṣu ye nirvāṇaṃ mārganti tānahamābhimānikān tīrthikāniti vadāmi mya ngan las 'das pa 'tshol ba mngon pa'i nga rgyal can de dag ni /
mu stegs can yin no zhes kho bo gleng ste /
bcom ldan 'das rnal 'byor spyod pa yang dag par zhugs pa ni /
na bhagavan yogācāraḥ samyak pratipannaḥ kasyaciddharmasyotpādaṃ vā nirodhaṃ vā karoti, nāpi kasyaciddharmasya prāptimicchati nābhisamayamiti vistaraḥ /
ityācāryacandrakīrtipādoparacitāyāṃ prasannapadāyāṃ madhyamakavṛttau nirvāṇaparīkṣā nāma pañcaviṃśatitamaṃ prakaraṇam /
dvādaśāṅgaparīkṣā ṣaḍviṃśatitamaṃ prakaraṇam /
atrāha /
yaduktam /
yaḥ pratītyasamutpādaḥ śūnyatāṃ tāṃ pracakṣmahe /
sā prajñaptirupādāya pratipatsaiva madhyamā 		chos gang yang skye ba'am 'gag par mi bgyid la /
chos gang yang 'thob pa dang mngon par rtogs par mi 'tshal lo zhes rgya cher gsungs so /
slob dpon zla ba grags pa'i zhal snga nas sbyar ba'i tshig gsal ba las /
mya ngan las 'das pa brtag pa zhes bya ba rab tu byed pa nyi shu rtsa lnga pa'i 'grel ba'o /
'dir /
rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba gang /
de ni stong pa nyid du bshad /
de ni brten nas gdags pa ste /
de nyid dbu ma'i lam yin no /
iti, /
kaḥ punarasau pratītyasamutpādaḥ, yaḥ śūnyatetyucyate? 		zhes gang bshad na gang zhig stong pa nyid ces bya bar brjod pa rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba de gang yin zhes smra'o /
athavā /
yadetaduktam 		rnam pa gcig tu na /
gang 'di skad du /
yaḥ pratītyasamutpādaṃ paśyatīdaṃ sa paśyati /
duḥkhaṃ samudayaṃ caiva nirodhaṃ mārgameva ca 		gang gi rten cing 'brel bar 'byung /
mthong ba des ni sdug bsngal dang /
kun 'byung dang ni 'gog pa dang /
lam nyid de dag mthong ba yin /
iti, /
tatkatamo 'sau pratītyasamutpādaḥ iti? atastadaṅgaprabhedavivakṣayedamucyate 		zhes bshad pa /
rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba de go gang yin zhe'o /
de'i phyir de'i yan lag gi rab tu dbye ba brjod par bzhed nas 'di skad du /
ma rig bsgribs pas yang srid phyir /
punarbhavāya saṃskārānavidyānivṛtastridhā 'du byed rnam pa gsum po dag /
mngon par 'du byed gang yin pa'i /
abhisaṃskurute yāṃstairgatiṃ gacchati karmabhiḥ las de dag gis 'gro bar 'gro /
zhes gsungs so /
tatra avidyā ajñānaṃ tamo yathābhūtārthapracchādakaṃ stimitatā de la ma rig pa ni mi shes pa ste /
mun pa dang yang dag pa ji lta ba la sgrib par byed pa'o /
avidyayā nivṛtaḥ chāditaḥ pudgalaḥ punarbhavāya punarbhavārthaṃ punarbhavotpattyarthamabhisaṃskaroti utpādayati yān kuśalādicetanāviśeṣāṃste punarbhavābhisaṃskārāt saṃskārāḥ ma rig pa des bsgribs shing bkab pa'i gang zag gis yang srid pa'i phyir te yang srid pa'i don dang yang srid pa 'byung bar bya ba'i phyir gang dge ba la sogs pa'i sems pa dag mngon par 'du byed cing skyed par byed do /
'du byed de dag ni yang srid pa mngon par 'du byed pas 'du byed do /
te ca trividhāḥ /
kuśalā akuśalā ānejyāśca, yadi vā 		de dag kyang rnam pa gsum ste /
dge ba dang mi dge ba dang mi g yo ba'o /
kāyikā vācikā mānasāśceti yang na lus kyi dang ngag gi dang yid kyi'o /
tāṃstrividhān karmalakṣaṇān saṃskārānavidyānivṛtaḥ pudgalaḥ karoti gang zag ma rig pas bsgribs pas las kyi mtshan nyid can 'du byed rnam pa gsum byed la /
taiśca saṃskārairabhisaṃskṛtaiḥ karmabhiḥ karmasaṃjñitaiḥ taddhetukāṃ gatiṃ gacchati mngon par 'du byed pas 'du byed las te las kyi ming can de dag gis ni de'i rgyus byung ba 'gro bar 'gro bar 'gyur ro /
tato 'sya de nas de'i /
vijñānaṃ saṃniviśate saṃskārapratyayaṃ gatau /
kṛtopacitasaṃskārasyāsya pudgalasya saṃskārānurūpāyāṃ gatau devādikāyāṃ saṃskārahetukaṃ vijñānaṃ saṃniviśate praviśati upapadyate saṃsārānarthabījabhūtam 		'du byed rkyen can rnam par shes /
'gro ba rnams su 'jug par 'gyur /
gang zag 'du byed byas shing bsags pa de'i rnam par shes pa 'du byed kyi rgyu can 'khor ba don ma yin pa'i sa bon du gyur pa ni 'gro ba 'du byed dang mthun par lha la sogs pa rnams su 'jug pa ste rab tu 'jug cing skye bar 'gyur ro /
tata uttarakālam de nas dus phyis /
saṃniviṣṭe 'tha vijñāne nāmarūpaṃ niṣicyate rnam par shes pa zhugs gyur na /
ming dang gzugs ni chags par 'gyur /
tatra karmakleśāviddhaṃ tasmiṃstasminnupapattyāyatane nāmayatīti nāma, saṃjñāvaśena vā artheṣu nāmayatīti nāma de las dang nyon mongs pas bsgos pas skye ba'i gnas de dang der bkri bas na ming yin pa'am /
yang na don dag la ming gi dbang gis rgyug pas na ming ste /
catvāro 'rūpiṇaḥ skandhā nāmeti vyapadiśyate gzugs can ma yin pa'i phung po bzhi la ming zhes bsnyad do /
rūpyata iti rūpam /
bādhyata ityarthaḥ /
idaṃ ca rūpaṃ pūrvakaṃ ca nāma, ubhayametadabhisaṃkṣipya nāmarūpamiti vyavasthāpyate 		gzhig tu rung pas na gzugs te gnod par byar rung zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go /
gzugs 'di dang sngar gyi ming gnyis po 'di dag bsdoms te ming dang gzugs zhes rnam par gzhag go /
tatra bimbapratibimbanyāyena svādhyāyadīpamudrāpratimudrādinyāyena vā māraṇāntikeṣu skandheṣu nirudhyamāneṣu ekasminneva kṣaṇe tulādaṇḍanāmonnāmanyāyenaiva aupapattyāṃśikāḥ skandhā yathākarmākṣepata upajāyante de la gzugs dang gzugs brnyan gyi tshul gyis tha ma 'chi ba'i phung po rnams 'gags pa na skad cig ma gcig kho na la srang ma ba'i mthon dman gyi tshul du skye ba'i cha'i phung po rnams las kyis ji ltar 'phangs ba ltar skye bar 'gyur ro /
evaṃ ca bimbapratibimbamudrāpratimudrānyāyena pratītyasamutpādaḥ sidhyati /
tulādaṇḍanāmonnāmanyāyena tu yadvijñānaṃ saṃniviśate ityuktam, tad bālalokabodhānurodhena, samānakāla eva bhavapratisaṃdhiriti /
tathā samānena samānakālaṃ lokasya duḥkhaṃ ca sukhodayaṃ ca 		de'i phyir de ltar ma'i mngal du rnam par shes pa brgyal bar gyur na /
rnam par shes pa'i rkyen can gyi ming dang gzugs chags par 'gyur te /
red cing 'bru bar 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i don to /
gal te 'gro bar rnam par shes pa brgyal bar mi 'gyur na ni de'i tshe ming dang gzugs 'byung bar mi 'gyur te /
hartuṃ ca kartuṃ ca sadāstu śaktistamaḥ prakāśaṃ ca yathaiva bhānoḥ dga' bo rnam par shes pa de gal te ma'i mngal du zhugs par ma gyur na ni /
iti /
na tu punaḥ pratītyasamutpādasvarūpavicakṣaṇānāmevaṃ vaktuṃ yujyate sāhacaryāditvamekakṣaṇe tulādaṇḍanāmonnāmadṛṣṭānteneti /
janmonmukhaṃ na sadidaṃ yadi jāyamānaṃnāśonmukhaṃ sadapi nāma nirudhyamānam /
iṣṭaṃ tadā kathamidaṃ tulayā samānaṃ kartrā vinā janiriyaṃ na ca yuktarūpā /
ityādivacanāt /
yathā bimbapratibimbamudrāpratimudrādinyāyena kṣaṇikatvaṃ neṣyate bhavadbhiḥ, tathā anyasyāpi bhāvasya utpādasamanantaradhvaṃsinaḥ kṣaṇikatvaṃ na yuktam /
yataḥ jātijarāsthityanityatākhyāni catvāri saṃskṛtalakṣaṇāni utpadyamānasya bhāvasya bāhyasya ādhyātmikasya vā ekasminneva kṣaṇe bhavantītyabhidharmapāṭhaḥ /
tatra jātijarayoḥ parasparavirodhāt sthityanityatayośca ekasminneva bhāve na yugapatsaṃbhava iṣyate sadbhiḥ /
kṣaṇike sarvathābhāvātkutaḥ kācitpurāṇatā /
sthairyādakṣaṇike cāpi kutaḥ kācitpurāṇatā /
yathānto 'sti kṣaṇasyaivamādimadhyaṃ ca kalpyatām 		de'i tshe nur nur po de nur nur po nyid du 'grub par mi 'gyur ro zhes 'byung ba'i phyir ro /
de'i phyir de ltar na /
ming dang gzugs ni chags gyur na /
skye mched drug ni 'byung bar 'gyur /
sdug bsngal 'byung ba la skyed par byed pa nyid du gyur pa'i phyir /
skye ba'i sgo'i dngos po nyid kyis na mig dang rna ba dang sna dang lce dang lus dang yid ces bya ba skye mched drug po ming dang gzugs kyi rgyu can skye bar 'gyur ro /
des mig gis gzugs rnams mthong nas yid bde ba'i gnas su mngon par zhen par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba la sogs pas na /
skye mched drug ni sdug bsngal 'byung ba'i skye ba'i sgo nyid yin no de'i phyir de ltar skye mched drug 'byung ba yin dang dus phyis /
skye mched drug la brten nas ni /
reg pa yang dag 'byung bar 'gyur /
reg pa 'di yang gang zhig yin zhing /
ji ltar skye bar 'gyur zhe na /
bstan pa'i phyir /
mig dang gzugs dang dran byed la /
antakatvātkṣaṇasyaivaṃ na lokasya kṣaṇasthitiḥ brten nas skye ba kho na ste /
de ltar mig gzugs brten nas ni /
ādimadhyāvasānāni cintyāni kṣaṇavatpunaḥ rnam par shes pa skye bar 'gyur /
mig dang gzugs dang rnam par shes /
ādimadhyāvasānatvaṃ na svataḥ parato 'pi vā gsum po 'dus pa gang yin pa /
de ni reg pa'o /
iti madhyamakasiddhāntapāṭhāt kṣaṇikapadārthāsiddherasiddhiravaseyā /
na ca jātimaraṇayoḥ parasparabhinnalakṣaṇayoḥ ekasmin kṣaṇe saṃbhavo bhavet, saṃśayaniścayajñānayorālokāndhakārayorjñānājñānayorbījāṅkurayormaraṇabhavopapattibhavayorbhinnalakṣaṇayorityādivat 		zhes gsungs so /
de la mig dang gzugs dag dang dran byed de /
yid la byed pa yul la sogs pa dang mi mthun pa rnam par shes pa'i sa bon du gyur pa mtshungs pa de ma thag pa'i rkyen la brten nas mig gi rnam par shes pa skye ba yin no /
de la mig dang gzugs kyi skye mched ni gzugs so /
parasparanirapekṣayoreva svahetupratyayasiddhayoḥ sahabhāvo yujyate savyetaragoviṣāṇayoryuvatistanayornarakarṇayorityādivat, na tu punaḥ kadācidapi parasparaviruddhayorvināśotpādayoḥ /
yathoktaṃ rāgaraktaparīkṣāyām /
sahaiva punarudbhūtirna yuktā rāgaraktayoḥ 		dran byed phung po bzhi'i mtshan nyid can ni ming ste /
de'i phyir gsum po 'di la brten nas skye ba'i mig gi rnam par shes pa de ni ming dang gzugs la brten nas skye ba yin no /
de'i phyir dbang po dang yul dang rnam par shes pa gsum po 'di dag 'dus pa gang yin pa ste /
bhavetāṃ rāgaraktau hi nirapekṣau parasparam /
naikatve sahabhāvo 'sti na tenaiva hi tatsaha 		lhan cig skye zhing phan tshun phan 'dogs pas 'dra bar zhugs pa gang yin pa de ni reg pa'i mtshan nyid kyi reg pa'o /
pṛthaktve sahabhāvo 'tha kuta eva bhaviṣyati /
evaṃ raktena rāgasya siddhirna saha nāsaha /
rāgavatsarvadharmāṇāṃ siddhirna saha nāsaha /
iti pratiṣedhāt kutaḥ samānakālatā bhāvānāṃ maraṇabhavopapattibhavayoriti? ataḥ sahabhāvo vineyajanabodhānurodhapravṛtta eveti lakṣyate /
tena naikasminneva kṣaṇe nāmonnāmau tulāyāḥ saṃbhavataḥ nāmonnāmayoḥ kālabhedāt /
balavatpuruṣācchaṭāmātreṇa pañcaṣaṣṭiḥ kṣaṇā atikrāmantīti pāṭhāt, utpalapatraśatasahasravedhavat sūcyagreṇeti /
tathāpi atra utpalapatraśatasahasravedhaḥ sūcyagreṇa kramaśo vedho 'vaseyaḥ kṣaṇānāmatisūkṣmatvāt /
ekakṣaṇena ślokākṣarapadodāharaṇavat 		de nas dus phyis /
reg de las /
tshor ba kun du 'byung bar 'gyur /
yul yid du 'ong ba dang yid du mi 'ong ba dang gnyi ga las bzlog pa nyams su myong ba yul gyi myong ba rig pas na /
tshor ba yin pa ni tshor ba zhes bya ste /
bde ba dang sdug bsngal dang bde ba yang ma yin sdug bsngal ba yang ma yin pa'o /
gzugs dang rnam par shes pa dang mig dang gsum po 'di dag 'dus pa'i mtshan nyid can reg pa la brten nas tshor ba yin par ji skad du bshad pa de bzhin du /
dbang po dang yul dang rnam par shes pa lhag ma dag gsum 'dus pa'i mtshan nyid kyi reg pa'i rgyu can gyi tshor ba yang bshad par rig par bya'o /
kiṃ ca /
anirodhamanutpādamanucchedamaśāśvatam 		de nas dus phyis /
tshor ba'i rkyen gyis sred pa ste /
anekārthamanānārthamanāgamamanirgamam kun du 'byung bar 'gyur zhes bsnyegs so /
yaḥ pratītyasamutpādaṃ prapañcopaśamaṃ śivam sred pa gang la tshor ba'i rkyen yod pa de ni tsho ba'i rkyen gyis so /
iti pāṭhādutpādanirodhayorasaṃbhava eva pratipāditaḥ śāstre madhyamake sred pa de yang ci'i yul can zhig yin zhe na /
tshor ba'i yul can nyid do /
āgamasūtreṣu ci'i phyir zhe na /
avināśamanutpannaṃ dharmadhātusamaṃ jagat /
sattvadhātuṃ ca deśeti eṣā lokānuvartanā /
trīṣu adhvasu sattvānāṃ prakṛtiṃ nopalambhati /
sattvadhātuṃ ca deśeti eṣā lokānuvartanā /
ityādi /
tathā /
phenapiṇḍopamaṃ rūpaṃ vedanā budbudopamā /
marīcisadṛśī saṃjñā saṃskārāḥ kadalīnibhāḥ 		gang gi phyir sred pa can de /
tshor ba'i don du sred par 'gyur /
tshor ba'i ched du mngon par 'dod pa skyed do zhes bya ba'i don to /
ji ltar zhe na /
re zhig gal te de la tshor ba bde ba skyes na ni de yang dang yang du de dang mi 'bral bar bya ba'i phyir sred par 'gyur ro /
māyopamaṃ ca vijñānamuktamādityabandhunā ci ste sdug bsngal skyes na ni de'i tshe de dang bral bar bya ba'i phyir sred par 'gyur ro /
evaṃ dharmān vīkṣamāṇo bhikṣurārabdhavīryavān 'on te bde ba yang ma yin sdug bsngal ba yang ma yin pa skyes na ni /
divā vā yadi vā rātrau saṃprajānan pratismṛtaḥ de mi nyams par bya ba'i phyir srid par 'gyur te /
pratividhyetpadaṃ śāntaṃ saṃskāropaśamaṃ śivam de ltar na tshor ba'i don du sred par 'gyur ro /
iti /
etāśca gāthāḥ sarvanikāyaśāstrasūtreṣu paṭhayante 		de de ltar /
sred par 'gyur na nye bar len /
rnam pa bzhi bo nyer len 'gyur /
ataḥ phenapiṇḍādīnāṃ hetupratyayasāmagrīṃ prāpya pratītya samutpannānāṃ sāravastuvigatānāṃ kutaḥ kṣaṇikākṣaṇikacinteti? mahāyānasūtreṣu ca /
supinopamā bhavagatī sakalā na hi kaści jāyati na co mriyate 		de ltar tshor ba dag la mngon par zhe na zhing chags pa de ni sred pa'i rkyen can las 'phel ba'i rgyu 'dod pa dang lta ba dang tshul khrims dang brtul zhugs dang bdag tu smra ba zhes bya ba rnam pa bzhi po yongs su 'dzin par 'gyur te /
na ca karma naśyati kadāci kṛtaṃ phalu deti kṛṣṇaśubha saṃsarato /
na ca śāśvataṃ na ca uccheda puno na ca karmasaṃcayu na cāpi sthitiḥ /
na ca so 'pi kṛtva punarāspṛśatī na ca anyu kṛtva puna vedayate /
yathā kumārī supināntarasmiṃ svaputra jātaṃ ca mṛtaṃca paśyati /
jāte 'tituṣṭā mṛti daurmanasyitā tathopamān jānatha sarvadharmān /
yathaiva grāmāntari lekhadarśanāt kriyāḥ pravartanti pṛthak śubhāśubhāḥ /
na lekhasaṃkrānti girāya vidyate tathopamān jānatha sarvadharmān /
mudrātpratimudra dṛśyate mudrasaṃkrānti na copalabhyate /
na ca tatra na caiva sānyato evaṃ saṃskāra 'nucchedaśāśvatāḥ /
bījasya sato yathāṅkuro na ca yo bīju sa caiva aṅkuro /
na ca anyu tato na caiva tat evamanuccheda aśāśvata dharmatā /
yatha muñja pratītya balbajaṃ rajju vyāyāmabalena vartitā /
ghaṭiyantra sacakra vartate teṣu ekaikasu nāsti vartanā /
tatha sarvabhavāṅgavartinī anyamanyopacayena niśritā /
ekaikeṣu teṣu vartanī pūrvamaparāntatu nopalabhyate /
ata evoktamācāryanāgārjunapādaiḥ /
svādhyāyadīpamudrādarpaṇaghoṣārkakāntabījāmlaiḥ /
skandhapratisaṃdhirasaṃkramaśca vidvadbhirupadhāryau /
iti /
śatakaśāstre ca āryadevapādairmahābodhicaryāsthiraprasthānasthitaiḥ /
alātacakranirmāṇasvapnamāyāmbucandrakaiḥ /
dhūmikāntaḥ pratiśrutkāmarīcyabhraiḥ samo bhavaḥ /
iti /
tadevaṃ bimbapratibimbādinyāyena mātuḥ kukṣau vijñāne saṃmūrcchite vijñānapratyayaṃ nāmarūpaṃ niṣicyate, kṣarati prādurbhavatītyarthaḥ /
yadi iha gatau vijñānaṃ na saṃmūrchitaṃ syāt, tadā nāmarūpaprādurbhāvo na syāt /
sacedānanda vijñānaṃ mātuḥ kukṣiṃ nāvakrāmeta, na tat kalalaṃ kalalatvāya saṃvarteta /
iti vacanāt /
tadevam /
niṣikte nāmarūpe tu ṣaḍāyatanasaṃbhavaḥ /
duḥkhotpattyā āyadvārabhāvena darśanaśravaṇaghrāṇarasasparśamanaākhyaṃ ṣaḍāyatanaṃ nāmarūpahetukamupajāyate /
sa cakṣuṣā rūpāṇi dṛṣṭvā saumanasyasthānīyānyabhiniviśate, abhiniviṣṭaḥ san rāgajaṃ dvevajaṃ mohajaṃ karma karotītyādinā duḥkhotpattāvāyadvāratvaṃ ṣaṇṇāmāyatanānām /
tadevaṃ saṃbhūte ṣaḍāyatane uttarakālam /
ṣaḍāyatanamāgamya saṃsparśaḥ saṃpravartate /
kaḥ punarayaṃ saṃsparśaḥ, kathaṃ vā saṃpravartate iti pratipādayannāha /
cakṣuḥ pratītya rūpaṃ ca samanvāhārameva ca /
nāmarūpaṃ pratītyaivaṃ vijñānaṃ saṃpravartate /
saṃnipātasrayāṇāṃ yo rūpavijñānacakṣuṣām /
sparśaḥ saḥ /
cakṣurindriyaṃ pratītya rūpāṇi ca samanvāhāraṃ ca pratītya manaskāraṃ viṣayādivilakṣaṇaṃ samanantarapratyayaṃ vijñānabījabhūtaṃ cakṣurvijñānamutpadyate /
tatra cakṣuśca rūpāyatanaṃ ca rūpam /
samanvāhāraścatuḥskandhalakṣaṇaṃ nāma /
tadetattrayaṃ pratītyotpadyamānaṃ cakṣurvijñānaṃ nāmarūpaṃ pratītyotpadyate /
tadevameṣāmindriyaviṣayavijñānānāṃ trayāṇāṃ yaḥ saṃnipātaḥ sahotpādaḥ anyonyopakāreṇa tulyaṃ yā pravṛttiḥ, sa spṛṣṭilakṣaṇaḥ sparśaḥ /
tata uttarakālam /
tasmātsparśācca vedanā saṃpravartate /
iṣṭāniṣṭobhayaviparītaviṣayānubhūtirviṣayānubhavo vedanaṃ vittirvedanetyucyate /
duḥkhā sukhā aduḥkhāsukhā ca trividhā /
yathā caiṣāṃ rūpavijñānacakṣuṣāṃ trayāṇāṃ saṃnipātalakṣaṇaṃ sparśamāgamya vedanā uktā, evaṃ śeṣendriyaviṣayavijñānatrayasaṃnipātalakṣaṇasparśahetukā vedanā vyākhyeyā /
tata uttarakālam /
vedanāpratyayā tṛṣṇā /
saṃpravartate iti vartate /
vedanā pratyayo yasyāstṛṣṇāyāḥ sā vedanāpratyayā /
kiṃviṣayā punaḥ sā tṛṣṇā? vedanāviṣayaiva /
kiṃ kāraṇam? yasmādasau tṛṣṇāluḥ /
vedanārthaṃ hi tṛṣyate /
vedanānimittameva abhilāṣaṃ karotītyarthaḥ /
kathaṃ kṛtvā? yadi tāvat sukhā vedanā asyopajāyate, sa tasyāḥ punaḥ punaḥ saṃyogārthaṃ paritṛṣyate /
atha duḥkhā, tadā tasyā visaṃyogārthaṃ paritṛṣyate /
atha aduḥkhāsukhā, tasyā api nityamaparibhraṃśārthaṃ paritṛṣyate /
sa evam /
tṛṣyamāṇa upādānamupādatte caturvidham /
sa evaṃ vedanāsvabhiniviṣṭaḥ saktaḥ tṛṣṇāpratyayaṃ kāmadṛṣṭiśīlavratātmavādopādānākhyaṃ caturvidhaṃ karmākṣepakāraṇaṃ parigṛhṇāti /
tadevamasya tṛṣṇāpratyayamupādānaṃ bhavati /
tata uttarakālam /
upādāne sati bhava upādātuḥ pravartate /
syāddhi yadyanupādāno mucyeta na bhavedbhavaḥ /
pañca skandhāḥ sa ca bhavaḥ /
caturvidhasya yathoktasya upādānasya upādātā grahītā utpādayitā /
tasya upādātuḥ upādānapratyayo bhavaḥ upajāyate /
kiṃ kāraṇam? yasmāt, yo hi anutpāditavedanātṛṣṇaḥ pratisaṃkhyānabalena tṛṣṇāmasvīkurvan, caturvidhamupādānaṃ pravihāya upādātā amalādvayajñānasaṃmukhībhāvāt syāddhi yadyanupādāno mucyeta saḥ /
tadānīṃ tasya na bhavedbhavaḥ /
kaḥ punarayaṃ bhavaḥ? pañca skandhāḥ sa ca bhavaḥ /
yaḥ upādānāt pravartate, sa pañcaskandha svabhāvo veditavyaḥ /
trividhamapi kāyikaṃ vācikaṃ mānasikaṃ ca karma bhavatyasmādanāgataṃ skandha pañcakaṃ bhavaḥ iti vyapadiśyate /
tatra kāyikaṃ vācikaṃ karma rūpaskandhasvabhāvaṃ karmavijñaptitvāt /
mānasaṃ tu catuḥskandhasvabhāvamiti /
evaṃ sa bhavaḥ pañca skandhā iti vijñeyam /
tasmāt /
bhavājjātiḥ pravartate /
anāgataskandhotpādo jātiḥ /
sā ca bhavāt pravartate /
tata uttarakālam /
jarāmaraṇaduḥkhādi śokāḥ saparidevanāḥ /
daurmanasyamupāyāsā jāteretatpravartate /
jātihetukā ete jarāmaraṇādayaḥ pravartante /
eṣāṃ ca yathāsūtrameva vyākhyānaṃ veditavyam /
tatra skandhaparipāko jarā /
jīrṇasya skandhabhedo maraṇam /
mriyamāṇasya vigacchataḥ saṃmūḍhasya sāmiṣaṅgo hṛdayasaṃtāpaḥ śokaḥ /
śokasamutthito vākpralāpaḥ paridevaḥ /
pañcendriyāsātanipāto duḥkham /
manoniṣṭanipāto daurmanasyam /
duḥkhadaurmanasyabahutvasaṃbhūtā upāyāsāḥ /
iti /
tadevaṃ yathopavarṇitena nyāyena /
kevalasyaivametasya duḥkhaskandhasya saṃbhavaḥ /
kevalasyeti ātmātmīyasvabhāvavigatasya bālapṛthagjanaparikalpitamātrasya /
duḥkhātmakasya sukhāvyāmiśrasyaivetyarthaḥ /
evamiti hetupratyayamātrabalenaivetyarthaḥ /
duḥkhaskandhasyeti duḥkhasamudāyasya duḥkhasamūhasya duḥkharāśerityarthaḥ /
yataścaivaṃ yathopavarṇitādavidyādikādeva bhavāṅgānāṃ pravṛttiḥ, ataḥ /
saṃsāramūlānsaṃskārānavidvān saṃskarotyataḥ /
avidvān kārakastasmānna vidvāṃstattvadarśanāt /
tatra saṃsārasya vijñānādipravṛttilakṣaṇasya mūlaṃ pradhānaṃ kāraṇaṃ saṃskārāḥ /
tataśca saṃsāramūlān saṃskārānavidvān saṃskaroti /
avidyānugato yaḥ pudgalo bhikṣavaḥ puṇyānapi saṃskārānabhisaṃskaroti, apuṇyānapi saṃskārānabhisaṃskaroti, āneñjyānapi saṃskārānabhisaṃskaroti /
iti bhagavadvacanāt /
yataścaivamavidvān kārakaḥ, tasmādavidvāneva pudgalaḥ kārako bhavati saṃskārāṇām, na vidvāṃstattvadarśī prahīṇāvidyaḥ /
kiṃ kāraṇam? tattvadarśanāt tattvadarśane hi sarvapadārthanāmevānupalambhāt nāsti kiṃcid yadālambya karma kuryāditi /
yataścaivamavidyāyāmeva satyāṃ saṃskārāḥ pravartante, asatyāṃ na pravartante, ataḥ /
avidyāyāṃ niruddhāyāṃ saṃskārāṇāmasaṃbhavaḥ /
hetuvaiyarthyāt /
tasyāḥ punaravidyāyāḥ kuto nirodhaḥ ityāha /
avidyāyā nirodhastu jñānenāsyaiva bhāvanāt /
asyaiva pratītyasamutpādasya yathāvadaviparītabhāvanātaḥ avidyā prahīyate /
yo hi pratītyasamutpādaṃ samyak paśyati, sa sūkṣmasyāpi bhāvasya na svarūpamupalabhate /
pratibimbasvaprālātacakramudgādivattu svabhāvaśūnyatāṃ sarveṣāṃ bhāvānāmavatarati /
sa eva svabhāvaśūnyatāṃ sarveṣāṃ bhāvānāmavatīrṇo na kiṃcidvastu upalabhate bāhyamādhyātmikaṃ vā /
so 'nupalabhamāno na kvaciddharme muhyati, amūḍhaśca karma na karotīti /
evaṃ pratītyasamutpādabhāvanayā tattvamavatarati /
tattvadarśinoyogino niyatameva avidyā prahīyate /
prahīṇāvidyasya saṃskārā nirudhyante /
yathā caivamavidyānirodhāt saṃskārā nirudhyante, evam /
tasya tasya nirodhena tattannābhipravartate /
duḥkhaskandhaḥ kevalo 'yamevaṃ samyaṅ nirudhyate /
pūrvasya pūrvasya aṅgasya nirodhena utarasyottarasya aṅgasya nirodho bhavatīti vijñeyam /
anayā cānupūrvyā ayaṃ yogī ātmātmīyādyadarśanāyāsanirastaḥ kārakavedakavirahitaṃ bhāvasvabhāvaśūnyaṃ duḥkharāśiṃ punaranutpattyā samyaṅnirodhayati /
yathoktamāryaśālistambasūtre /
evamādhyātmiko 'pi pratītyasamutpādo dvābhyāmeva kāraṇābhyāmutpadyate /
katamābhyāṃ dvābhyām? hetūpanibandhataḥ pratyayopanibandhataśca /
tatrādhyātmikasya pratītyasamutpādasya hetūpanibandhaḥ katamaḥ? yadidamavidyāpratyayāḥ saṃskārāḥ, saṃskārapratyayaṃ vijñānam, vijñānapratyayaṃ nāmarūpam, nāmarūpapratyayaṃ ṣaḍāyatanam, ṣaḍāyatanapratyayaḥ sparśaḥ, sparśapratyayā vedanā, vedanāpratyayā tṛṣṇā, tṛṣṇāpratyayamupādānam, upādānapratyayo bhavaḥ, bhavapratyayā jātiḥ, jātipratyayā jarāmaraṇaśokaparidevaduḥkhadaurmanasyopāyāsāḥ saṃbhavanti /
evamasya kevalasya mahato duḥkhaskandhasya samudayo bhavati /
avidyā cennābhaviṣyannaiva saṃskārāḥ prajñāsyante /
evaṃ yāvajjātiścennābhaviṣyajjarāmaraṇaṃ na prajñāsyate /
athavā, satyāmavidyāyāṃ saṃskārāṇāmabhinirvṛttirbhavati /
evaṃ yāvajjātyāṃ satyāṃ jarāmaraṇasyābhinirvṛttirbhavati /
atrāvidyāyā naivaṃ bhavati ahaṃ saṃskārānabhinirvartayāmīti /
saṃskārāṇāmapi naivaṃ bhavati vayamavidyayābhinirvartitā iti /
evaṃ yāvajjāterapi naivaṃ bhavati ahaṃ jarāmaraṇamabhinirvartayāmīti /
jarāmaraṇasyāpi naivaṃ bhavatyahaṃ jātyābhinirvartitamiti /
atha ca satyāmavidyāyāṃ saṃskārāṇābhinirvṛtti rbhavati prādurbhāvaḥ /
evaṃ yāvajjātyāṃ satyāṃ jarāmaraṇasyābhinirvṛttirbhavati prādurbhāvaḥ /
evamādhyātmikasya pratītyasamutpādasya hetūpanibandho draṣṭavyaḥ /
kathamādhyātmikasya pratītyasamutpādasya pratyayopanibandho draṣṭavya iti? ṣaṇṇāṃ dhātūnāṃ samavāyāt /
katameṣāṃ ṣaṇṇāṃ dhātūnāṃ samavāyāt? yadidaṃ pṛthivyaptejovāyvākāśavijñānadhātūnāṃ samavāyādādhyātmikasya pratītyasamutpādasya pratyayopanibandho draṣṭavyaḥ /
tatrādhyātmikasya pratītyasamutpādasya pṛthivīdhātuḥ katamaḥ? yaḥ kāyasya saṃśleṣātkaṭhinabhāvamabhinirvartayati, ayamucyate pṛthivīdhātuḥ /
yaḥ kāyasyānuparigrahakṛtyaṃ karoti, ayamucyate 'bdhātuḥ /
yaḥ kāyasyāśitabhakṣitaṃ paripācayati, ayamucyate tejodhātuḥ /
yaḥ kāyasya āśvāsapraśvāsakṛtyaṃ karoti, ayamucyate vāyudhātuḥ /
yaḥ kāyasyāntaḥ śauṣīryamabhinirvartayati, ayamucyate ākāśadhātuḥ /
yo nāmarūpamabhinirvartayati naḍakalāpayogena pañcavijñānakāyasaṃyuktaṃ sāsravaṃ ca manovijñānam, ayamucyate bhikṣavo vijñānadhātuḥ /
tatra asatāmeṣāṃ pratyayānāṃ kāyasyotpattirna bhavati /
yadā tvādhyātmikaḥ pṛthivīdhāturavikalo bhavati, evamaptejovāyvākāśavijñānadhātavaścāvikalā bhavanti, tataḥ sarveṣāṃ samavāyātkāyasyotpattirbhavati /
tatra pṛthivīdhātornaivaṃ bhavati /
ahaṃ kāyasya kaṭhinabhāvamabhinirvartayāmīti /
abdhātornaivaṃ bhavati /
ahaṃ kāyasyānuparigrahakṛtyaṃ karomīti /
tejodhātornaivaṃ bhavati /
ahaṃ kāyasyāśitapītakhāditaṃ paripācayāmīti /
vāyudhātornaivaṃ bhavati /
ahaṃ kāyasyāśvāsapraśvāsakṛtyaṃ karomīti /
ākāśadhātornaivaṃ bhavati /
ahaṃ kāyasyāntaḥśauṣīryamabhinirvartayāmīti /
vijñānadhātornaivaṃ bhavati /
ahaṃ kāyasya nāmarūpamabhinirvartayāmīti /
kāyasyāpi naivaṃ bhavati ahamemiḥ pratyayairjanita iti /
atha ca punaḥ satāmeṣāṃ pratyayānāṃ samavāyātkāyasyotpatti rbhavati /
tatra pṛthivīdhāturnātmā na sattvo na jīvo na janturna manujo na mānavo na strī na pumān na napuṃsakaṃ na cāhaṃ na mama na cānyasya kasyacit /
evamabdhātustejodhāturvāyudhāturākāśadhāturvijñānadhāturnātmā na sattvo na jīvo na janturna manujo na mānavo na strī na pumān na napuṃsakaṃ na cāhaṃ na mama na cānyasya kasyacit /
tatra avidyā katamā? yā eṣāmevaṃ ṣaṇṇāṃ dhātūnāyamaiksaṃjñā piṇḍasaṃjñā nityasaṃjñā dhruvasaṃjñā śāśvatasaṃjñā sukhasaṃjñā ātmasaṃjñā sattvasaṃjñā jīvapudgalamanujamānavasaṃjñā ahaṃkārasaṃjñā mamakārasaṃjñā evamādi vividhamajñānam /
iyamucyate 'vidyeti /
evamavidyāyāṃ satyāṃ viṣayeṣu rāgadveṣamohāḥ pravartante /
tatra ye rāgadveṣamohā viṣayeṣu, amī saṃskārā ityucyante 		de ni de'i srid pa'i rkyen gyis len pa yin no /
de nas dus phyis /
nyer len yod na len pa po'i /
srid pa rab tu 'byung bar 'gyur /
gal te nye bar len med na /
grol bar 'gyur te srid mi 'gyur /
srid pa de yang phung po lnga /
nye bar len pa ji skad du bshad pa rnam pa bzhi'i len pa po ste /
'dzin pa po skyed par byed pa'o /
nye bar len pa po de'i nye bar len pa'i rkyen gyis srid pa skyes par 'gyur ro /
ci'i phyir zhe na /
gang gi phyir gal te nye bar len pa po gang gis tshor ba la sred pa ma skyed cing /
so sor rtog pa'i stobs kyis sred pa bdag gir ma byas par len pa rnam pa bzhi po spangs nas gnyis su med pa'i ye shes dri ma med pa mngon du byas pa las nye bar len pa med par gyur na ni /
de grol bar 'gyur zhing de'i tshe de'i srid pa yod par mi 'gyur ro /
sred pa de yang gang zhig ce na /
srid pa de yang phung po lnga ste /
gang zhig nye bar len pa las rab tu 'byung ba de ni phung po lnga'i rang bzhin du rig par bya'o /
lus dang ngag dang yid kyi las rnam pa gsum char yang 'di las ma 'ongs pa'i phung po lnga 'byung bas na srid pa zhes bya bar bsnyad do /
de la lus dang ngag gi las ni gzugs kyi phung po'i rang bzhin yin la /
yid kyi las ni phung po lnga'i rang bzhin yin te /
de ltar na srid pa de phung po lnga yin no zhes shes par bya'o /
srid pa de las skye ba 'byung ste /
ma 'ongs pa'i phung po 'byung ba ni skye ba yin la /
de yang srid pa las rab tu 'byung ngo /
de nas dus phyis /
rga shi dang ni mya ngan dang /
smre sngags 'don bcas sdug bsngal dang yid mi bde dang 'khrug pa rnams /
de dag skye las rab tu 'byung /
skye ba'i rgyu can rga shi la sogs pa de dag 'byung bar 'gyur ro /
de dag gi bshad pa ni mdo ji lta ba bzhin rig par bya ste /
de la rga ba ni phung po yongs su smin pa'o /
'chi ba ni rgas pa'i phung po 'jig pa'o /
mya ngan ni 'gro zhing 'chi bzhin pa'i kun du rmongs pa'i mngon par chags pa dang bcas pa'i snying gi gdung ba'o /
smre sngags 'don pa ni mya ngan gyis kun nas bslang pa'i ngag gi brjod pa'o /
sdug bsngal ni dbang po lnga la gnod ba'o /
yid mi bde ba ni yid du mi 'ong ba 'bab pa'o /
'khrug pa ni sdug bsngal ba dang yid mi bde ba mang po 'byung ba'o zhes bya'o /
de'i phyir de ltar ji skad bshad pa'i tshul gyis /
da ltar sdug bsngal phung po ni /
'ba' zhig po 'di 'byung bar 'gyur /
de ltar zhes bya ba ni rgyu dang rkyen tsam gyi stobs kyis zhes bya ba'i don to /
sdug bsngal phung po ni zhes bya ba ni sdug bsngal gyi tshogs dang khyu ste /
sdug bsngal spungs pa zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go /
'ba' zhig pa zhes bya ba ni bdag dang bdag gi ba'i rang bzhin dang bral ba zhes bya ba'i don dang byis pa'i skye bos brtags pa tsam sdug bsngal gyi bdag nyid bde ba dang ma 'dres bzhes bya ba'i tha tshig go /
gang gi phyir de ltar ma rig pa la sogs pa las srid pa'i yan lag rnams 'byung ba de'i phyir /
'khor ba'i rtsa ba 'du byed de /
de phyir mkhas rnams 'du mi byed /
de phyir mi mkhas byed po yin /
mkhas pas de nyid mthong phyir ro /
de la 'khor ba rnam par shes pa la sogs pa 'jug pa'i mtshan nyid can gyi rtsa ba ste /
rgyu'i gtso bo ni 'du byed rnams yin te /
de'i phyir mi mkhas pa ni 'khor ba'i rtsa ba 'du byed rnams 'du byed de /
dge slong dag ma rig pa dang rjes su 'brel bar skyes bu gang zag ni bsod rnams mngon par 'du bya ba yang mngon par 'du byed do /
bsod nams ma yin pa mngon par 'du bya ba yang mngon par 'du byed do /
mi g yo ba mngon par 'du bya ba yang mngon par 'du byed do zhes bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa'i phyir ro /
gang gi phyir de ltar na; mi mkhas pa byed pa po yin pa de'i phyir /
ma rig pa dang ldan pa'i gang zag kho na 'du byed rnams kyi byed pa por 'gyur gyi /
mkhas pa de nyid mthong ba ma rig pa spangs pa de ni ma yin no /
ci'i phyir zhe na /
de nyid mthong phyir ro ste de nyid mthong na ni dngos po thams cad mi dmigs pas gang la dmigs nas las byed par 'gyur ba de /
cung zad kyang yod pa ma yin no /
de'i phyir de nyid mthong ba'i phyir mkhas pa byed pa po ma yin no /
gang gi phyir de ltar ma rig pa yod na 'du byed rnams 'byung la med na mi 'byung ba de'i phyir /
ma rig 'gags par gyur na ni /
'du byed rnams kun 'byung mi 'gyur te /
rgyu ma tshang ba'i phyir ro /
ma rig pa de gang las 'gag par 'gyur zhe na /
ma rig 'gags par gyur na ni /
shes pas de nyid bsgoms pas so /
rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba de nyid phyin ci ma log pa ji lta ba bzhin bsgoms pas ma rig pa rab tu spong bar 'gyur ro /
'di ltar gang gis rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba yang dag par mthong ba des ni dngos po phra mo'i yang rang gi ngo bo dmigs pa ma yin te /
gzugs brnyan ltar dngos po rnams rang bzhin gyis stong pa nyid du 'jug par 'gyur ro /
de de ltar dngos po thams cad rang bzhin gyis stong pa nyid du zhugs pas chos cung zad kyang dmigs par mi 'gyur ro /
de ma dmigs pas 'gar yang mi rmongs so /
ma rmongs pas las mi byed do /
de ltar na rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba bsgoms pas de kho na nyid la 'jug par 'gyur la /
de nyid mthong ba'i rnal 'byor pa'i ma rig pa nges par spong bar 'gyur ro /
ma rig pa spangs pas 'du byed 'gag par 'gyur ro /
de ltar ma rig pa 'gags pas 'du byed rnams ji ltar 'gag pa de bzhin du /
de dang de ni 'gags gyur pas /
de dang de ni mngon mi 'byung /
sdug bsngal phung po 'ba' zhig po /
de ni de ltar yang dag 'gag /
yan lag snga ma snga ma 'gags pas yan lag phyi ma phyi ma 'gag par 'gyur ro zhes shes par bya'o /
rim pa 'dis ni rnal 'byor ba'i sdug bsngal gyi phung po sdug bsngal gyi tshogs bdag dang bdag gi ba la sogs pa yang dag pa ma yin par lta ba dang bral ba /
byed pa po dang tshor ba po dang bral ba rang bzhin gyis stong pa slar mi 'byung bas yang dag par 'gag par 'gyur ro /
ji skad du 'phags pa s'a lu ljang pa'i mdo las /
de bzhin du nang gi rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba gnyis kyi phyir 'byung ste /
gnyis gang zhe na /
'di lta ste /
rgyu dang 'brel ba dang rkyen dang 'brel pa'o /
de la nang gi rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba rgyu dang 'brel bar 'byung ba gang zhe na /
gang 'di ma rig pa'i rkyen gyis 'du byed rnams /
'du byed kyi rkyen gyis rnam par shes pa /
rnam par shes pa'i rkyen gyis ming dang gzugs /
ming dang gzugs kyi rkyen gyis skye mched drug /
skye mched drug gi rkyen gyis reg pa /
reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba /
tshor ba'i rkyen gyis sred pa /
sred pa'i rkyen gyis len pa /
len pa'i rkyen gyis srid pa /
srid pa'i rkyen gyis skye ba /
skye ba'i rkyen gyis rga shi dang mya ngan dang smre sngags 'don pa dang sdug bsngal ba dang yid mi bde ba dang 'khrug pa rnams 'byung ste /
de ltar na sdug bsngal gyi phung po chen po 'ba' zhig po 'byung bar 'gyur ro /
gal te ma rig pa ma byung na 'du byed rnams kyang mi mngon pa zhig go /
de bzhin du skye ba ma byung du zin na rga shi'i bar du mi mngon pa zhig na /
'on kyang ma rig pa yod pa las 'du byed rnams mngon par 'grub par 'gyur ba nas /
de bzhin du skye ba yod pa las rga shi'i bar du mngon par 'grub par 'gyur ro /
de la yang ma rig pa yang 'di snyam du bdag gis 'du byed rnams mngon par sgrub po snyam du mi sems so /
'du byed rnams kyang 'di snyam du bdag cag ni ma rig pas mngon par sgrub po snyam du mi sems pa nas de bzhin du skye ba yang 'di snyam du bdag gis rga shi mngon par sgrub po snyam du mi sems shing /
rga shi yang 'di snyam du bdag ni skye bas mngon par bsgrubs so snyam du mi sems pa'i bar du ste /
'on kyang ma rig pa yod pa las 'du byed rnams mngon par sgrub pa'i 'byung bar 'gyur ba nas /
de bzhin du skye ba yod pa las rga shi'i bar du mngon par sgrub cing 'byung bar 'gyur te /
de ltar na nang gi rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba rgyu dang 'brel bar blta'o /
nang gi rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba rkyen dang 'brel bar ji ltar ba lta zhe na /
khams drug 'dus pa'i phyir te /
khams drug po gang dag 'dus pa yin zhe na /
'di lta ste /
sa dang chu dang me dang rlung dang nam mkha' dang rnam par shes pa'i khams 'dus pa las nang gi rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba rkyen dang 'brel bar blta'o /
de la nang gi rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba'i sa'i khams gang zhe na /
gang 'di 'dus nas lus kyi sra ba'i dngos po mngon par grub par byed pa 'di ni sa'i khams zhes bya'o /
gang lus sdud pa'i bya ba byed pa 'di ni chu'i khams zhes bya'o /
gang lus kyi zos pa dang 'thungs pa dang 'chos pa dang myangs pa rnams 'ju bar byed pa 'di ni me'i khams zhes bya'o /
gang lus kyi dbugs phyi nang du rgyu ba'i bya ba byed pa de ni rlung gi khams zhes bya'o /
gang lus kyi nang sbubs yod par byed pa 'di ni nam mkha'i khams zhes bya'o /
gang mdung khyim gyi tshul du ming dang gzugs mngon par 'grub par byed pa rnam par shes pa'i tshogs lnga 'dus pa dang zag pa dang bcas pa'i yid kyi rnam par shes pa 'di ni rnam par shes pa'i khams zhes bya'o /
rkyen de dag med par lus skye bar mi 'gyur gyi /
nang gi sa'i khams tshang zhing /
de bzhin du sa dang chu dang me dang rlung dang nam mkha' dang rnam par shes pa'i khams rnams kyang tshang bar gyur la /
thams cad 'dus pa de las lus mngon par 'grub par 'gyur ro /
de la sa'i khams kyang 'di snyam du bdag gis 'dus nas lus kyi sra ba'i dngos po mngon par sgrub po snyam du mi sems so /
chu'i khams kyang 'di snyam du bdag gis lus kyi sdud pa'i bya ba bya'o snyam du mi dmigs so /
me'i khams kyang 'di snyam du bdag gis lus kyi zos pa dang 'thungs pa dang 'chos pa dang myangs ba rnams 'ju bar bya'o snyam du mi sems so /
rlung gi khams kyang 'di snyam du bdag gis lus kyi dbugs phyi nang du rgyu ba'i bya ba bya'o snyam du mi sems so /
nam mkha'i khams kyang 'di snyam du bdag gis lus kyi nang sbubs yod par bya'o snyam du mi sems so /
rnam par shes pa'i khams kyang 'di snyam du bdag gis lus kyi ming dang gzugs mngon par sgrub po snyam du mi sems so /
lus kyang 'di snyam du bdag ni rkyen 'di dag gis bskyed do snyam du mi sems mod kyi /
'on kyang rkyen 'di dag yod na lus skye bar 'gyur ro /
de la sa'i khams ni bdag ma yin sems can ma yin srog ma yin skye ba po ma yin shed las skyes pa ma yin /
shed bu ma yin /
bud med ma yin /
skyes pa ma yin /
ma ning ma yin /
nga'i ma yin /
bdag gi ma yin te /
gzhan su'i yang ma yin no /
de bzhin du chu'i khams dang me'i khams dang rlung gi khams dang nam mkha'i khams dang rnam par shes pa'i khams kyang bdag ma yin /
sems can ma yin /
srog ma yin /
skye ba po ma yin /
shed las skyes ma yin /
shed bu ma yin /
bud med ma yin /
skyes pa ma yin /
ma ning ma yin /
nga ma yin /
bdag gi ma yin /
gzhan su'i yang ma yin no /
de la ma rig pa gang zhe na /
khams drug po 'di dag nyid la gang gcig pur 'du shes pa dang ril por 'du shes pa dang rtag par 'du shes pa dang brtan par 'du shes pa dang ther zug tu 'du shes pa dang bde bar 'du shes pa dang bdag tu 'du shes pa dang sems can du 'du shes pa dang srog tu 'du shes pa dang skye ba po dang gso ba dang skyes bu dang gang zag tu 'du shes pa dang shed las skyes pa dang shed bur 'du shes pa dang nga zhes bya ba dang bdag go zhes bya bar 'du shes pa ste /
'di lta bu la sogs pa mi shes pa rnam pa sna tshogs pa 'di ni ma rig pa zhes bya'o /
de ltar ma rig pa yod pas yul rnams la 'dod chags dang zhe sdang dang gti mug 'jug ste /
de la yul rnams la 'dod chags dang zhe sdang dang gti mug gang yin pa 'di ni ma rig pa'i rkyen gyis 'du byed rnams zhes bya'o /
vastuprativijñaptirvijñānam dngos po so sor rnam par rig pa ni rnam par shes pa'o /
vijñānasahabhuvaścatvāraḥ skandhā arūpiṇaḥ upādānākhyāḥ, tannāmarūpaṃ catvāri mahābhūtāni, tāni copādāya rūpam rnam par shes pa dang lhan cig 'byung ba gzugs can ma yin pa nye bar len pa'i phung po bzhi po de dag ni ming yin la /
'byung ba chen po bzhi dang de dag rgyur byas pa ni gzugs te /
tacca nāma rūpam /
aikadhyamabhisaṃkṣipya tannāmarūpam 		ming de dang gzugs de gcig tu bsdus pa de ni ming dang gzugs so /
nāmarūpasaṃniśritānīndriyāṇi ṣaḍāyatanam ming dang gzugs la brten pa'i dbang po rnams ni skye mched drug go /
trayāṇāṃ dharmāṇāṃ saṃnipātaḥ sparśaḥ /
sparśānubhavo vedanā /
vedanādhyavasānaṃ tṛṣṇā 		gsum 'dus pa ni reg pa'o /
reg pa myong ba ni tshor ba'o /
tshor ba la zhen pa ni sred pa'o /
tṛṣṇāvaipulyamuipādānam /
upādānanirjātaṃ punarbhavajanakaṃ karma bhavaḥ 		sred pa'i 'phel ba ni len pa'o /
len pa las skyes pa yang srid pa skyed pa'i las ni srid pa'o /
bhavahetukaḥ skandhaprādurbhāvo jātiḥ rgyu de las phung po byung ba ni skye ba'o /
jātasya skandhasya paripāko jarā /
jīrṇasya skandhasya vināśo maraṇam 		skyes nas phung po smin pa ni rga ba'o /
rgas nas phung po 'jig pa ni 'chi ba'o /
mriyamāṇasya saṃmūḍhasya sābhiṣvaṅgasyāntardāhaḥ śokaḥ 'chi zhing myos te mngon par chags pa dang bcas pa'i nang gi yongs su gdung ba ni mya ngan no /
śokotthamālapanaṃ paridevaḥ /
pañcavijñānakāyasaṃyuktamasātamanubhavanaṃ duḥkham 		mya ngan las byung ba'i tshig tu smra ba ni smre sngags 'don pa'o /
rnam par shes pa'i tshogs lnga dang mtshungs par ldan pa'i yid mi bde ba myong ba ni sdug bsngal lo /
manasā saṃyuktaṃ mānasaṃ duḥkhaṃ dārmanasyam yid dang mtshungs par ldan pa'i yid kyi sdug bsngal ni yid mi bde ba'o /
ye cāpyanye evamādaya upakleśāste upāyāsā iti /
tatra mohāndhakārārthenāvidyā /
abhisaṃskārārthena saṃskārāḥ /
vijñāpanārthena vijñānam 		gzhan yang 'di lta bu la sogs pa nye ba'i nyon mongs pa gang yin pa de dag ni 'khrug pa zhes bya'o /
de la mun pa chen po'i phyir ma rig pa'o /
mngon par 'du byed pa'i phyir 'du byed rnams so /
rnam par rig pa'i phyir rnam par shes pa'o /
anyonyopastambhanārthena nāmarūpam phan tshun brten pa'i phyir ming dang gzugs so /
āyadvārārthena ṣaḍāyatanam /
sparśanārthena sparśaḥ /
anubhavanārthena vedanā /
paritarṣaṇārthena tṛṣṇā /
upādānārthenopādānam 		skye ba'i sgo'i phyir skye mched drug go /
reg pa'i phyir reg pa'o /
myong ba'i phyir tshor ba'o /
skom pa'i phyir sred pa'o /
nye bar len pa'i phyir len pa'o /
punarbhavārthena bhavaḥ yang srid pa skyed pa'i phyir srid pa'o /
janmārthena jātiḥ /
paripākārthena jarā /
vināśārthena maraṇam 		phung po 'byung ba'i phyir skye ba'o /
phung po smin pa'i phyir rga ba'o /
'jig pa'i phyir 'chi ba'o /
śocanārthena śokaḥ mya ngan byed pa'i phyir mya ngan no /
paridevanārthena paridevaḥ kāyaparipīḍanārthena duḥkham /
cittasaṃpīḍanārthena daurmanasyam /
upakleśārthenopāyāsāḥ 		tshig gis smra ba'i phyir smre sngags 'don pa'o /
lus la gnod pa'i phyir sdug bsngal lo /
sems la gnod pa'i phyir yid mi bde ba'o /
nyon mongs pa'i phyir 'khrug pa'o /
athavā tattve 'pratipattirmithyāpratipattirajñānamavidyā yang na de kho na nyid mi rtogs shing log par shes te mi shes pa ni ma rig pa'o /
evamavidyāyāṃ satyāṃ trividhāḥ saṃskārā abhinirvartante puṇyopagā apuṇyopagā āneñjyopagāḥ /
tatra puṇyopagānāṃ saṃskārāṇāṃ puṇyopagameva vijñānaṃ bhavati 		de ltar ma rig pa yod na 'du byed rnam pa gsum mngon par 'grub ste /
bsod nams su nye bar 'gro ba dang bsod nams ma yin par nye bar 'gro ba dang mi g yo bar nye bar 'gro ba'o /
apuṇyopagānāṃ saṃskārāṇāmapuṇyopagameva vijñānaṃ bhavati /
āneñjyopagānāṃ saṃskārāṇāmāneñjyopagameva vijñānaṃ bhavati /
idamucyate vijñānam /
vijñānapratyayaṃ nāmarūpamiti vedanādayo 'rūpiṇaścatvāraḥ skandhāstatra tatra bhave nāmayantīti nāma /
saharūpaskandhena ca nāma rūpaṃ ceti nāmarūpamucyate 		de la bsod nams su nye bar 'gro ba'i 'du byed rnams las bsod nams su nye bar 'gro ba'i rnam par shes pa nyid du 'gyur ba dang bsod nams ma yin par nye bar 'gro ba'i 'du byed rnams las bsod nams ma yin par nye bar 'gro ba'i rnam par shes pa nyid du 'gyur ba dang mi g yo bar nye bar 'gro ba'i 'du byed rnams las mi g yo bar nye bar 'gro ba'i rnam par shes pa nyid du 'gyur ba 'di ni rnam par shes pa zhes bya'o /
rnam par shes pa'i rkyen gyis ming dang gzugs zhes bya ba la /
tshor ba la sogs pa gzugs can ma yin pa'i phung po bzhi ni srid pa de dang de ra gzhol bas na ming yin no /
gzugs kyi phung po dang lhan cig tu ming dang gzugs zhes bya ba yin pas na ming dang gzugs zhes bya ba yin no /
nāmarūpavivṛddhayā ṣaḍbhirāyatanadvāraiḥ kṛtyakriyāḥ pravartante prajñāyante, tannāmarūpapratyayaṃ ṣaḍāyatanamityucyate ming dang gzugs rnam par 'phel bas skye mched drug gi sgo nas bya ba byed pa rnams 'byung ste /
de ni ming dang gzugs kyi rkyen gyis skye mched drug ces bya'o /
ṣaḍbhyaścāyataṃebhyaḥ ṣaṭ sparśakāyāḥ pravartante, ayaṃ ṣaḍāyatanapratyayaḥ sparśa ityucyate skye mched drug po dag las reg pa'i tshogs drug 'byung ste /
de ni skye mched drug gi rkyen gyis reg pa'i zhes bya'o /
yajjātīyaḥ sparśo bhavati tajjātīyā vedanā pravartate /
iyamucyate bhikṣavaḥ sparśapratyayā vedaneti 		ji lta bur reg pa 'byung ba de lta bur tshor ba 'byung ste /
de ni reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba zhes bya'o /
yastāṃ vedanāṃ viśeṣeṇāsvādayati abhinandati adhyavasyati adhyavasāya tiṣṭhati, sā vedanāpratyayā tṛṣṇetyucyate tshor ba'i bye brag de dag myang ba dang mngon par dga' ba dang lhag par zhen pa dang lhag par zhen nas 'jug pa de ni tshor ba'i rkyen gyis sred pa zhes bya'o /
āsvādanābhinandanādhyavasānasthānādātmapriyarūpasātarūpairviyogo mā bhūnnityamaparityāgo bhavediti yaivaṃ prārthanā idamucyate bhikṣavastṛṣṇāpratyayamupādānam /
yatra vastuni satṛṣṇastasya vastuno 'rjanāya viṭhapanāyopādānamupādatte, tatra tatra prārthayate, evaṃ prārthayamānaḥ punarbhavajanakaṃ karma samutthāpayati kāyena vācā manasā ca, sa upādānapratyayo bhava ityucyate 		myong ba dang mngon par dga' ba dang lhag par zhen pa dang lhag par zhen nas 'dug pa las bdag sdug pa'i ngo bo dang bde ba'i ngo bo dang bral bar ma gyur cig snyam du mi gtong bar phyir zhing smon pa 'di ni sred pa'i rkyen gyis len pa zhes bya ste /
dngos po gang la sred pa dang bcas pa'i dngos po de bsag cing sgrub pa'i phyir nye bar len pa len zhing /
de dang de la smon pa'o /
de ltar smon zhing yang srid pa bskyed pa'i las lus dang ngag dang yid kyis kun nas slong ba de ni len pa'i rkyen gyis srid pa zhes bya'o /
las de las skyes pa'i phung po rnams mngon par 'grub pa gang yin pa de ni srid pa'i rkyen gyis skye ba zhes bya'o /
skye ba mngon par 'grub pa'i phung po rnams kyi 'phel ba yongs su smin pa dang 'jig par 'gyur ba de ni skye ba'i rkyen gyis rga shi zhes bya'o /
tatkarmanirjātānāṃ skandhānāmabhinirvṛtiryā sā bhavapratyayā jātirityucyate de ltar rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba'i yan lag bcu gnyis po 'di dag ni /
rgyu gzhan dang gzhan las byung ba /
jātyābhinirvṛttānāṃ skandhānāmupacayanaparipākādvināśo bhavati rkyen gzhan dang gzhan las byung ba /
rtag pa ma yin mi rtag pa ma yin /
'dus byas ma yin 'dus ma byas ma yin /
tadidaṃ jātipratyayaṃ jarāmaraṇamityucyate /
evamayaṃ dvādaśāṅgaḥ pratītyasamutpādo 'nyonyahetuko 'nyonyapratyayo naivānityo naiva nityo na saṃskṛto nāsaṃskṛto nāhetuko nāpratyayo na vedayitā nāvedayitā na pratītyasamutpanno nāpratītyasamutpanno na kṣayadharmo nākṣayadharmo na vināśadharmo nāvināśadharmo na nirodhadharmo nānirodhadharmo 'nādikālapravṛtto 'nucchinno 'nupravartate nadīsrotavat 		rgyu med pa ma yin rkyen med pa ma yin /
myong ba po yod pa ma yin /
zad pa'i chos ma yin /
'jig pa'i chos ma yin /
'gog pa'i chos ma yin te /
thog ma med pa'i dus nas zhugs pa rgyun ma chad par klung gi rgyun bzhin du rjes su zhugs pa'o /
rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba'i yan lag bcu gnyis po de dag ni rgyu gzhan dang gzhan las byung ba /
rkyen gzhan dang gzhan las byung ba /
rtag pa ma yin mi rtag pa ma yin /
'dus byas ma yin 'dus ma byas ma yin /
rgyu med pa ma yin rkyen med pa ma yin /
myong ba yod pa ma yin zad pa'i chos ma yin /
'jig pa'i chos ma yin /
'gog pa'i chos ma yin te /
thog ma med pa'i dus nas zhugs pa /
yadyapyayaṃ dvādaśāṅgaḥ pratītyasamutpādo 'nucchinno 'nupravartate nadīsrotavat, atha cemānyasya dvādaśāṅgasya pratītyasamutpādasya catvāryaṅgāni saṃghātakriyāyai hetutvena pravartante /
katamāni catvāri? yaduta avidyā tṛṣṇā karma vijñānaṃ ca /
tatra vijñānaṃ bījasvabhāvatvena hetuḥ /
karma kṣetrasvabhāvatvena hetuḥ /
avidyā tṛṣṇā ca kleśasvabhāvatvena hetuḥ 		rgyun ma chad par klung gi rgyun bzhin du rjes su zhugs mod kyi /
'on kyang yan lag bzhi po 'di dag ni rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba'i yan lag bcu gnyis po de dag bsdu bar bya ba'i phyir rgyur 'gyur ro /
bzhi po gang zhe na /
'di lta ste /
ma rig pa dang sred pa dang /
las dang rnam par shes pa'o /
de la rnam par shes pa ni sa bon gyi rang bzhin nyid kyi rgyu byed do /
las ni zhing gi rang bzhin gyi rgyu byed do /
ma rig pa dang sred pa ni nyon mongs pa'i rang bzhin gyi rgyu byed do /
karmakleśā vijñānabījaṃ janayanti /
tatra karma vijñānabījasya kṣetrakāryaṃ karoti 		las dang nyon mongs pa dag gis ni sa bon rnam par shes pa bskyed do /
de la las ni sa bon rnam par shes pa'i zhing gi bya ba byed do /
tṛṣṇā vijñānabījaṃ snehayati srid pas ni sa bon rnam par shes pa brlan pa'i bya ba byed do /
avidyā vijñānabījamavakirati ma rig pas ni sa bon rnam par shes pa 'debs te /
asatāṃ teṣāṃ pratyayānāṃ vijñānabījasyabhinirvṛttirna bhavati rkyen 'di dag med na sa bon rnam par shes pa mngon par 'grub par mi 'gyur ro /
tatra karmaṇo naivaṃ bhavati /
ahaṃ vijñānabījasya kṣetrakāryaṃ karomīti 		de la las kyang 'di snyam du bdag gis sa bon rnam par shes pa'i zhing gi bya ba bya'o snyam du mi sems so /
tṛṣṇāyā api naivaṃ bhavati /
ahaṃ vijñānasya snehakāryaṃ karomiti 		sred pa yang 'di snyam du bdag gis sa bon rnam par shes pa brlan par bya'o snyam du mi sems so /
avidyāyā api naivaṃ bhavati /
ahaṃ vijñānabījamavakirāmīti 		ma rig pa yang 'di snyam du bdag gis sa bon rnam par shes pa gdab po snyam du mi sems so /
vijñānabījasyāpi naivaṃ bhavati /
ahamebhiḥ pratyayairjanitamiti 		sa bon rnam par shes pa yang 'di snyam du bdag ni rkyen 'di dag gis bskyed do snyam du mi sems so /
atha ca vijñānabījaṃ karmakṣetrapratiṣṭhitaṃ tṛṣṇāsnehābhiṣyanditamavidyayā svavakīrṇaṃ vibhajyamānaṃ virohati 'on kyang sa bon rnam par shes pa las kyi zhing la brten pa /
sred ba'i rlan gyis brlan pa ma rig pas legs par btab pa las skye ba na /
tatratatropapattyāṃyatanapratisaṃdhau mātuḥ kukṣau nāmarūpāṅkuramabhinirvartayati /
sa ca nāmarūpāṅkuro na svayaṃ kṛtoa na parakṛto nobhayakṛto neśvarakṛto na kālapariṇāmito na prakṛtisaṃbhūto na caikakāraṇādhīno nāpyahetusamutpannaḥ 		skye ba'i gnas de dang der nying mtshams sbyor ba ni ma'i mngal du ming dang gzugs kyi myu gu mngon par 'grub ste /
ming dang gzugs kyi myu gu de yang bdag gis ma byas gzhan gyis ma byas /
gnyi gas ma byas /
dbang phyug gis ma byas /
dus kyis ma bsgyur /
rang bzhin las ma byung /
rgyu gcig la rag las pa ma yin /
rgyu med pa las kyang ma skyes te /
'on kyang pha dang ma phrad pa dang zla mtshan dang ldan pa dang rkyen gzhan yang 'tshogs na bdag po med pa'i chos bdag gi med pa 'dzin pa med pa nam mkha' dang mtshungs pa /
atha ca mātāpitṛsaṃyogād, ṛtusamavāyād, anyeṣāṃ pratyayānāṃ samavāyād āsvādānuviddhaṃ vijñānabījaṃ mātuḥ kukṣau nāmarūpāṅkuramabhinirvartayati asvāmikeṣu dharmeṣvaparigraheṣvamameṣvākāśasameṣu māyālakṣaṇasvabhāveṣu hetupratyayānāmavaikalyāt sgyu ma'i mtshan nyid kyi rang bzhin dag la rgyu dang rkyen rnams ma tshang ba med pa'i phyir /
skye ba'i gnas de dang der nying mtshams sbyor ba na ma'i mngal du ro myang ba dang ldan pa'i sa bon rnam par shes pa ming dang gzugs kyi myu gu mngon par sgrub po /
tadyathā pañcabhiḥ kāraṇaiścakṣurvijñānamutpadyate /
katamaiḥ pañcabhiḥ? yaduta cakṣuḥ pratītya rūpaṃ cālokaṃ cākāśaṃ ca tajjamanasikāraṃ ca pratītyotpadyate cakṣurvijñānam /
tatra cakṣurvijñānasya cakṣurāśrayakṛtyaṃ karoti 		'di lta ste /
mig gi rnam par shes pa ni rgyu lnga las 'byung ste /
lnga gang zhe na /
'di lta ste /
mig la brten pa dang gzugs dang snang ba dang nam mkha' dang de bskyed pa'i yid la byed pa la yang brten nas mig gi rnam par shes pa 'byung ngo /
de la mig ni mig gi rnam par shes pa'i rten gyi bya ba byed do /
rūpamālambanakṛtyaṃ karoti /
āloko 'vabhāsakṛtyaṃ karoti 		gzugs ni mig gi rnam par shes pa'i dmigs pa'i bya ba byed do /
snang ba ni mngon pa'i bya ba byed do /
ākāśamanāvaraṇakṛtyaṃ karoti nam mkha' ni mi sgrib pa'i bya ba byed do /
tajjamanasikāraḥ samanvāharaṇakṛtyaṃ karoti /
asatāmeṣāṃ pratyayānāṃ cakṣurvijñānaṃ notpadyate /
yadā tu cakṣurādhyātmikamāyatanamavikalaṃ bhavati, evaṃ rūpālokākāśatajjamanasikārāścāvikalā bhavanti, tataḥ sarveṣāṃ samavāyāccakṣurvijñānamutpadyate 		de skyed pa'i yid la byed pa ni bsam pa'i bya ba byed do /
rkyen de dag med na mig gi rnam par shes pa 'byung bar mi 'gyur gyi /
gang gi tshe mig gi nang gi skye mched mig ma tshang bar ma gyur la /
de bzhin du gzugs dang snang ba dang nam mkha' dang de skyed pa'i yid la byed pa dag ma tshang bar mi 'gyur te /
tatra cakṣuṣo naivaṃ bhavati /
ahaṃ cakṣurvijñānasyāśrayakṛtyaṃ karomīti /
ālokasyāpi naivaṃ bhavati /
ahaṃ cakṣurvijñānasyāvabhāsakṛtyaṃ karomīti /
ākāśasyāpi naivaṃ bhavati 		thams cad 'dus pa de las mig gi rnam par shes pa 'byung bar 'gyur ro /
de la mig ni 'di snyam du bdag gis mig gi rnam par shes pa'i rten gyi bya ba bya'o snyam du mi sems so /
gzugs kyang 'di snyam du bdag gis mig gi rnam par shes pa'i dmigs pa'i bya ba bya'o snyam du mi sems so /
snang ba yang 'di snyam du bdag gis mig gi rnam par shes pa'i mngon pa'i bya ba bya'o snyam du mi sems so /
ahaṃ cakṣurvijñānasyānāvaraṇakṛtyaṃ karomiti /
tajjamanasikārasyāpi naivaṃ bhavati /
ahaṃ cakṣurvijñānasya samanvāharaṇakṛtyaṃ karomīti /
cakṣurvijñānasyāpi naivaṃ bhavati 		nam mkha' yang 'di snyam du bdag gis mig gi rnam par shes pa'i mi sgrib pa'i bya ba bya'o snyam du mi sems so /
de skyed pa'i yid la byed pa yang 'di snyam du bdag gis mig gi rnam par shes pa'i sems pa'i bya ba bya'o snyam du mi sems so /
mig gi rnam par shes pa yang 'di snyam du /
ahamebhiḥ pratyayairjanitamiti bdag ni rkyen 'di dag gis skyed do snyam du mi sems te /
atha ca satāmeṣāṃ pratyayānāṃ samavāyāccakṣurvijñānasyotpattirbhavati 'on kyang rkyen 'di dag yod pa las mig gis rnam par shes pa skye bar 'gyur ro /
evaṃ śeṣāṇāmindriyāṇāṃ yathāyogaṃ karaṇīyam de bzhin du dbang po lhag ma dang bcas pa rnams la yang ci rigs su sbyar ro /
tatra na kaściddharmo 'smāllokātparalokaṃ saṃkrāmati /
asti ca karmaphalaprativijñaptirhetupratyayānāmavaikalyāt 		de la chos gang yang 'jig rten 'di nas 'jig rten pha rol du mi 'pho mod kyi rgyu dang rkyen rnams ma tshang ba med pa'i phyir las kyi 'bras bur mngon pa yang yod do /
'di lta ste /
tadyathā bhikṣavaḥ supariśuddhe ādarśamaṇḍale mukhapratibimbakaṃ dṛśyate, na ca tatrādarśamaṇḍale mukhaṃ saṃkrāmati, asti ca mukhaprativijñaptirhetupratyayānāmavaikalyāt, evamasmāllokānna kaściccyuto nāpyanyatropapannaḥ, asti ca karmaphalaprativijñaptirhetupratyayānāmavaikalyāt dper na rab tu phyis pa'i me long gi dkyil 'khor la bzhin gyi gzugs brnyan snang ba yang bzhin me long gi dkyil 'khor du ma 'phos mod kyi /
rgyu dang rkyen ma tshang ba med pa'i phyir bzhin du mngon pa yang yod do /
de bzhin du 'di nas kyang su yang shi 'phos pa med la /
gzhan du yang ma skyes te /
rgyu dang rkyen rnams ma tshang ba med pa'i phyir las kyi 'bras bur mngon pa yang med do /
'di lta ste /
tadyathā bhikṣavaścandramaṇḍalaṃ catvāriṃśadyojanaśatamūrdhvaṃ vrajati, atha ca punaḥ parītte 'pyudakabhājane candrasya pratibimbaṃ dṛśyate, na ca tasmātsthānādūrdhvaṃ nabhasaścyutaṃ parītte udakasya bhājane saṃkrāntaṃ bhavati asti ca candramaṇḍalaprativijñaptirhetupratyayānāmavaikalyāt dper na zla ba'i dkyil 'khor ni dpag tshad bzhi khri'i steng nas 'gro ste /
'on kyang snod chung ngu chus gang bar zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi gzugs brnyan snang ba yang /
zla ba'i dkyil 'khor ni gnas de nas ma 'phos te /
snod chung ngu chus gang ba'i nang du son pa yang med mod kyi /
rgyu dang rkyen rnams ma tshang ba med pa'i phyir /
zla ba'i dkyil 'khor du mngon pa yang yod do /
de bzhin du 'di nas kyang su yang shi 'phos pa med la /
evamasmāllokānna kaściccyuto nānyatropapannaḥ, asti ca karmaphalaprativijñaptirhetupratyayānāmavaikalyāt gzhan du ma skyes mod kyi /
