rgyu dang rkyen rnams ma tshang ba med pa'i phyir las kyi 'bras bur mngon par yang yod do /
tadyathā /
agnirupādānapratyaye sati jvalati, upādānavaikalyānna jvalati, evameva bhikṣavaḥ karmakleśajanitaṃ vijñānabījaṃ tatratatropapattyāyatanapratisaṃdhau mātuḥ kukṣau nāmarūpāṅkuramabhinirvartayati asvāmikeṣu dharmeṣvaparigraheṣu māyālakṣaṇasvabhāveṣu amameṣu kṛtrimeṣu hetupratyayānāmavaikalyāt 		'di lta ste /
dper na me de rgyu dang rkyen ma tshang na mi 'bar gyi /
rgyu dang rkyen tshogs pa las 'bar ro /
de bzhin du chos rnams ni bdag po med pa'i chos bdag gi med pa 'dzin pa med pa nam mkha' dang mtshungs pa /
sgyu ba'i mtshan nyid kyi rang bzhin dag la rgyu dang rkyen rnams ma tshang ba med pa'i phyir ro /
skye ba'i gnas de dang der nyid mtshams sbyor ba na ma'i mngal du sa bon rnam par shes pa las dang nyon mongs pa rnams kyis bskyed pa'i ming dang gzugs kyi myu gu mngon par grub ste /
tatrādhyātmikaḥ pratītyasamutpādaḥ pañcabhiḥ kāraṇairdraṣṭavyaḥ de la nang gi rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba lngar blta bar bya ste /
lnga gang zhe na /
katamaiḥ pañcabhiḥ? na śāśvatato nocchedato na saṃkrāntitaḥ parīttahetuvipulaphalābhinirvṛttitastatsadṛśānuprabandhataśceti rtag par ma yin pa dang chad par ma yin pa dang 'pho bar ma yin pa dang rgyu chung ngu las 'bras bu chen po 'byung ba dang de dang 'dra ba'i rgyud du'o /
ji ltar rtag par ma yin zhe na /
kathaṃ na śāśvatataḥ? yasmādanye māraṇāntikāḥ skandhāḥ, anye aupapattyaṃśikāḥ skandhāḥ gang gi phyir tha ma 'chi ba'i phung po rnams kyang gzhan la /
skye ba'i char gtogs pa'i phung po rnams kyang gzhan te /
na tu ya eva māraṇāntikāḥ skandhāsta evaupapattyaṃśikāḥ tha ma 'chi ba'i phung po gang yin pa de nyid skye ba'i char gtogs pa rnams ma yin gyis /
api tu māraṇāntikāḥ skandhā nirudhyante, tasminneva ca samaye aupapattyaṃśikāḥ skandhāḥ prādurbhavanti tha ma 'chi ba'i phung po rnams kyang 'gags la de nyid kyi tshe skye ba'i char gtogs pa'i phung po rnams 'byung bas de'i phyir rtag par ma yin no /
ato na śāśvatataḥ ji ltar chad par ma yin zhe na /
kathaṃ nocchedataḥ? na ca pūrvaniruddheṣu māraṇāntikeṣu skandheṣu aupapattyaṃśikāḥ skandhāḥ prādurbhavanti nāpyaniruddheṣu tha ma 'chi ba'i dus kyi phung po rnams sngon 'gags pa las skye ba'i char gtogs pa'i phung po rnams 'byung ba ma yin la /
ma 'gags pa las kyang ma yin gyi /
api tu māraṇāntikāḥ skandhā nirudhyante, tasminneva ca samaye aupapattyaṃśikāḥ skandhāḥ prādurbhavanti tulādaṇḍonnābhāvanāmavat candrabimbapratibimbavat tha ma 'chi ba'i phung po rnams kyang 'gags la /
de nyid kyi tshe skye ba'i char gtogs pa'i phung po rnams srang mda'i mthon dman bzhin 'byung bar 'gyur te /
ato nocchedataḥ /
kathaṃ na saṃkrāntitaḥ? visadṛśāḥ sattvanikāyāḥ sabhāgāyāṃ jātyāṃ jātimabhinirvartayanti 		de'i phyir chad par yang ma yin no /
ji ltar 'pho ba ma yin zhe na /
sems can rigs mi 'dra ba rnams skal ba mnyam pa'i skye bar skye ba mngon par 'grub par mi byed pa'o /
ato na saṃkrāntitaḥ /
kathaṃ parīttahetuto vipulaphalābhinirvṛttitaḥ /
parīttaṃ karma kriyate, vipulaḥ phalavipāko 'nubhūyate /
ataḥ parīttahetuto vipulaphalābhinirvṛttitaḥ /
kathaṃ tatsadṛśānuprabandhataḥ? yathāvedanīyaṃ karma kriyate, tathāvedanīyo vipāko 'nubhūyate 		de'i phyir 'pho bar yang ma yin no /
ji ltar rgyu chung ngu las 'bras bu chen po 'byung zhe na /
las chung ngu byas pa las 'bras bu chen po rnam par smin pa myong ste /
de'i phyir rgyu chung ngu las 'bras bu chen por 'byung ba yin no /
ji ltar myong bar 'gyur pa'i las byas pa de ltar myong par 'gyur ba'i rnam par smin pa myong ba de'i phyir /
atastatsadṛśānuprabandhataśca /
iti vistaraḥ 		de dang 'dra ba'i rgyud du'o zhes bya bar rgya cher gsungs pa lta bu'o /
ityācāryacandrakīrtipādoparacitāyāṃ prasannapadāyāṃ madhyamakavṛttau dvādaśāṅgaparīkṣā nāma ṣaḍviṃśatitamaṃ prakaraṇam /
dṛṣṭiparīkṣā saptaviṃśatitamaṃ prakaraṇam 		slob dpon zla ba grags pa'i zhal snga nas sbyar ba'i tshig gsal ba las /
srid pa'i yan lag bcu gnyis brtag pa zhes bya ba rab tu byed pa nyi shu drug pa'i 'grel pa'o /
gang gis de lta bu'i rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba ji lta bur gyur pa yang dag par mthong ba de ni sngon gyi mtha' la rten par mi byed /
phyi ma'i mtha' la rten par mi byed do zhes mdo las 'don pa yin na /
yaścaivaṃ pratītyasamutpādaṃ yathābhūtaṃ samyak paśyati, sa na pūrvāntaṃ pratisarati, nāparāntaṃ pratisarati, /
ityādi sūtre paṭhayate, tatra katamaḥ pūrvāntaḥ, katamo 'parāntaḥ, kathaṃ na pratisaratīti? tadvayutpatyarthamidamārabhyate /
tatra vartamānamātmabhāvamapekṣya atītā ātmabhāvāḥ pūrvānta ityucyate /
pūrvo hi janmaparaṃparāṃśaḥ pūrvāntaḥ 		de la sngon gyi mtha' la rten pa ni gang zhig yin zhing /
phyi ma'i mtha' yang gang zhig yin la /
ji ltar na rten par mi byed pa yin zhe na /
de dag bstan pa'i phyir 'di brjod do /
de la da ltar gyi bdag gi dngos po la ltos te 'das pa'i dus dag la sngon gyi mtha' zhes bya ste /
skye ba gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa'i cha snga ma ni sngon gyi mtha'o /
taṃ na pratisarati, dṛṣṭiprakārairnālambate /
pratītyasamutpādasya yathāvadavasthitatattvadarśanāt nānyathāvasthitaṃ vastu anyathā abhiniviśate 		de la rten par mi byed pa ni lta ba'i rnam pa dag gis dmigs par mi byed pa rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'i de nyid ji ltar gnas pa bzhin mthong ba'i phyir rnam pa gzhan du gnas pa'i dngos po la rnam pa gzhan du mngon par zhen par mi byed pa'o /
tatra aṣṭau dṛṣṭayaḥ pūrvāntamālambya anyathā pravṛttāḥ de la lta ba brgyad ni sngon gyi mtha' la dmigs nas rnam pa gzhan du 'jug ste /
tadyathā /
abhūmatītamadhvānaṃ nābhūmiti ca dṛṣṭayaḥ /
yāstāḥ śāśvatalokādyāḥ pūrvāntaṃ samupāśritāḥ /
tatra itiśabdaḥ ādyarthaḥ 		'di lta ste /
'das dus byung ma byung zhes dang /
'jig rten rtag pa la sogs par /
lta ba gang yin de dag ni /
sngon gyi mtha' la brten pa yin /
de la zhes kyi sgra ni sogs pa'i don la'o /
athavā dṛṣṭidvayopādānamupalakṣaṇārtham yang na lta ba gnyis nye bar bkod pa ni nye bar mtshon pa'i don du yin no /
catastrastvetā dṛṣṭayaḥ lta ba 'di dag ni bzhi ste /
tadyathā /
kiṃ nvahamabhūvamatītamadhvānam, nābhūvamatītamadhvānam, abhūvaṃ ca nābhūvaṃ ca, naivābhūvaṃ na nābhūvam, iti /
etāścatasro dṛṣṭayaḥ pūrvāntaṃ samāśritāḥ 		'di lta ste /
ci bdag 'das pa'i dus na byung ba zhig gam /
ma byung ba zhig gam /
byung yang byung la ma byung yang ma byung ba zhig gam /
byung ba yang ma yin la ma byung ba yang ma yin pa zhig ces bya ba lta ba bzhi po 'di dag ni sngon gyi mtha' la brten pa yin no /
aparā api catasra ityāha /
yāstāḥ śāśvatalokādyāḥ 		gzhan yang bzhi ste zhes sngar zhar la bshad la /
'jig rten rtag pa la sogs par /
pūrvaṃ prasaṅgena upavarṇitāḥ, tā api /
pūrvāntaṃ samupāśritāḥ 		lta ba gang yin de dag kyang /
sngon gyi mtha' la brten pa ma yin no /
tatra yadyapi pūrvāntād dṛṣṭicatuṣṭayāduttaraṃ dṛṣṭicatuṣṭayaṃ nātibhidyate, tathāpi tāvanmātraviśeṣamāśritya pṛthagupādīyate de la lta ba bzhi tshan gong ma la mjug thogs kyi lta ba bzhi tshan la tha dad pa cher med mod kyi /
de lta na yang khyad par cung zad tsam la brten nas logs shig tu nye bar bkod de /
tacca uttaratra vyākhyāsyāmaḥ de yang phyi nas bshad par bya'o /
tatra śāśvato lokaḥ ityetat, abhūvamatītamadhvānam, ityetasmānnātibhidyate de la 'jig rten rtag go zhes bya ba 'di ni 'das pa'i dus na byung ba zhig gam zhes bya ba 'di las tha dad pa cher med do /
athavā ayaṃ viśeṣaḥ /
yacchāśvato lokaḥ ityeṣāṃ dṛṣṭiḥ sāmānyena pūrvāntamāśritā 		rnam pa gcig tu na khyad par ni 'di yin te /
'jig rten rtag go zhes bya ba'i lta ba bzhi po gang yin pa de ni spyir sngon gyi mtha' la brten pa yin la /
abhūvamatītamadhvānam, ityeṣā tu ātmana eva pūrvāntaparāmarśena pravṛttā, na sāmānyeneti 'das pa'i dus na byung ba zhig gam zhes bya ba 'di ni bdag kho na la sngon gyi mtha' bzung nas zhugs pa yin gyi /
phyir ni ma yin no zhes bya ba'o /
evamanyāsvapi dṛṣṭiṣu viśeṣo vaktavyaḥ de bzhin du lta ba gzhan dag la yang khyad par brjod par bya'o /
ityevaṃ tāvat aṣṭāvetā dṛṣṭayaḥ pūrvāntaṃ samupāśritāḥ de ltar na re zhig lta ba brgyad po de dag ni sngon gyi mtha' la brten pa yin no /
uktaḥ pūrvāntastadālambikābhirdṛṣṭibhiḥ sārdham sngon gyi mtha' de ni de la dmigs par byed pa'i lta ba dag dang lhan cig bshad zin to /
idānīmaparānta ucyate da ni phyi ma'i mtha' brjod par bya ste /
tatra vartamānamātmabhāvamapekṣya bhāvinaḥ ātmabhāvāḥ aparānta ityucyate de la da ltar ba'i bdag gi dngos po la ltos nas 'byung bar 'gyur ba'i lus la phyi ma'i mtha' zhes bya ste /
aparo hi janmaparaṃparāṃśo 'parāntaḥ, taṃ na pratisarati, dṛṣṭiprakārairnālambate skye ba gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa'i cha phyi ma ni phyi ma'i mtha'o /
de la rten par mi byed pa ni lta ba'i rnam pa dag gi dmigs par mi byed pa ste /
pratītyasamutpādasya yathāvadavasthitatattvadarśanāt, nānyathāvasthitaṃ vastu anyathābhiniviśate /
tatra aṣṭau dṛṣṭayaḥ aparāntamālambya anyathā pravṛttāḥ 		rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'i de nyid ji ltar gnas pa ltar mthong ba'i phyir rnam pa gzhan du gnas pa'i dngos po la rnam pa gzhan du mngon par zhen par mi byed pa'o /
de la lta ba brgyad ni phyi ma'i mtha' la dmigs pa nas rnam pa gzhan du 'jug ste /
tadyathā 'di lta ste /
dṛṣṭayo na bhaviṣyāmi kimanyo 'nāgate 'dhvani ma 'ongs dus gzhan 'byung 'gyur dang /
mi 'byung 'jig rten mtha' sogs par /
bhaviṣyāmīti cāntādyā aparāntaṃ samāśritāḥ /
ihāpi dṛṣṭidvayopādānamupalakṣaṇārtham 		lta ba gang yin de dag ni /
phyi ma'i mtha' la brten pa yin /
'dir yang lta ba gnyis nye bar bkod pa ni nye bar mtshon pa'i don du yin no /
catastrastvetā dṛṣṭayaḥ lta ba 'di dag ni bzhi ste /
tadyathā /
kiṃ nu bhaviṣyāmyanāgatamadhvānam, na bhaviṣyāmi, bhaviṣyāmi ca na bhaviṣyāmi ca, naiva bhaviṣyāmi na ca na bhaviṣyāmyanāgatamadhvānam, ityetāścatasro dṛṣṭayaḥ aparāntaṃ samāśritāḥ 		'di lta ste /
ci bdag ma 'ongs pa'i dus na 'byung bar 'gyur ba zhig gam mi 'byung bar 'gyur ba zhig gam /
'byung yang 'byung la mi 'byung yang mi 'byung bar 'gyur ba zhig gam /
ma 'ongs pa'i dus na 'byung ba yang ma yin mi 'byung ba yang ma yin pa zhig ces bya ba lta ba bzhi po 'di dag ni phyi ma'i mtha' la brten pa yin no /
kimetā eva catasro dṛṣṭayaḥ aparāntaṃ samāśritāḥ? netyāha ci lta ba bzhi po de dag kho na zhig phyi ma'i mtha' la brten tam zhe na /
bshad pa /
ma yin no /
kiṃ tarhi aparā api catasro vidyante antādyā aparāntaṃ samāśritāḥ /
tatra antādyāścatasro dṛṣṭayaḥ sāmānyena aparāntamāaśritya pravṛttāḥ, kiṃ tu bhaviṣyāmyanāgatamadhvānamityetāstu ātmana evāparāntamāśritya pravṛttāḥ, ityevaṃ dṛṣṭicatuṣṭayasya viśeṣa iti boddhavyam 		'o na ci zhe na /
'jig rten mtha' la sogs par lta ba phyi ma'i mtha' la brten pa gzhan bzhi yang yod pa yin no /
de la mtha' yod pa la sogs pa lta ba bzhi ni spyir phyi ma'i mtha' la brten nas 'jug pa yin la /
ci bdag ma 'ongs pa'i dus na 'byung bar 'gyur ba zhig gam zhes bya ba de dag ni bdag kho na la phyi ma'i mtha' la brten nas zhugs pa yin te /
de ni lnga ba bzhi tshan gnyis kyi khyad par yin par khong du chud par bya'o /
tatra ādyasya tāvat pūrvāntālambikasya dṛṣṭicatuṣṭayasya yathā na saṃbhavaḥ, tathā pratipādayannāha de la re zhig sngon gyi mtha' la dmigs pa'i lta ba bzhi tshan dang po ji ltar mi srid pa de ltar bstan pa'i phyir /
'das pa'i dus na byung gyur zhe /
abhūmatītamadhvānamityetannopapadyate bya ba de ni mi 'thad do /
sngon tshe rnams su gang byung ba /
yo hi janmasu pūrveṣu sa eva na bhavatyayam de nyid 'di ni ma yin no /
zhes bya ba gsungs so /
tatra ya eva atīteṣu janmasu babhūva, yadi sa evāyamadhunā syāt, tadā yuktamasya grahītum /
abhūvamahamatītamadhvānamiti 		de la gal te 'das pa'i tshe rabs rnams su gang byung ba de nyid da ltar yod par gyur na ni de'i tshe 'di 'das pa'i dus na bdag byung ba zhig gam zhes bya bar bzung bar rigs pa zhig na /
de ni de ltar srid pa yang ma yin te /
rtag par thal bar 'gyur ba'i phyir ro /
na caitadevaṃ saṃbhavati nityatvaprasaṅgāt, nityasya ca saṃsaraṇānupapatteḥ, ekagatisthasyāpi nānāgatisaṃgṛhītatvaprasaṅgāt /
iha hi pūrvaṃ yadi narakādigatiko bhūtvā idānīṃ karmavaicitryāt manuṣyeṣu upapannaḥ evaṃkalpayet /
ahamevāsau nāraka āsam iti, tadasya na yuktam 		rtag pa ni 'khor bar mi rigs pa'i phyir te /
'gro ba gcig la gnas pa yang 'gro ba sna tshogs kyis bzung ba nyid du thal bar 'gyur ba'i phyir ro /
'dir gal te sngar dmyal ba la sogs pa'i 'gro bar gyur nas da lta mi dag tu skyes pas bdag kho na dmyal ba la sogs par gyur to zhes de ltar rtog par byed na de ni de ltar mi rigs te /
ji ltar na /
kathaṃ hi nāma manuṣyaḥ san nārakādikaḥ syāt? mi yin bzhin du dmyal ba la sogs pa yang yin par 'gyur /
yattarhi idaṃ paṭhayate sūtre /
ahameva sa tena kālena tena samayena māndhātā nāma rājā cakravartī abhūvam iti, tat kathaṃ veditavyamiti? anyatvapratiṣedhaparaṃ tadvacanaṃ naikatvapratipādakamiti vijñeyam 		'o na gang mdo las 'di skad du nga nyid de'i tshe de'i dus na 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po mang pos bkur ba zhes bya bar gyur to zhes 'don pa de ji ltar rig par bya zhe na /
bka' 'di ni gzhan nyid yin pa 'gog pa lhur byed pa yin gyi gcig nyid du ston par byed pa ni ma yin no zhes shes par bya'o /
ata eva hi nānyaḥ sa tena kālena tena samayeneti paṭhayate de nyid kyi phyir de'i tshe de'i dus na de gzhan na ma yin no zhes 'don pa yin no /
yadi punaḥ sa evāyamiti pūrvakasya cādhunātanasya ca ekatvaṃ syāt, ko doṣaḥ syāt? uktastāvadatra doṣaḥ gal te de nyid 'di yin no /
zhes sngar gyi dang da ltar ba gcig nyid du 'gyur na nyes pa cir 'gyur zhe na /
nityatvaṃ syāditi /
tathāpi bhūya ucyate /
sa evātmeti tu bhavedupādānaṃ viśiṣyate 		rtag pa nyid du 'gyur ro zhes de la nyes pa bshad zin to /
de lta mod kyi gzhan yang brjod par bya ste /
de nyid bdag tu 'gyur snyam na /
nye bar len pa tha dad 'gyur /
yadi sa eva pūrvaka ātmāyamidānīṃ syāt, tadā upādānasya pañcaskandhalakṣaṇasya viśeṣo na syāt upādāturaviśeṣātpūrvāvasthāyāmiva /
na caivamupādānāviśeṣo 'syātmanaḥ, kiṃ tarhi viśiṣyata eva upādānamupādātuḥ karmabhedāt kārakabhedācca /
tataśca upādānaviśeṣāt sa evāyamātmeti na yujyate /
atha manyase /
viśiṣyatāmupādānam, ātmā tu eka eveti 		gal te sngon gyi de nyid da ltar gyi bdag 'dir 'byung na ni de'i tshe sngar gyi gnas skabs ltar nye bar len pa po tha dad pa med pa'i phyir phung po lnga'i mtshan nyid kyi nye bar len pa tha dad par mi 'gyur ba zhig na /
bdag gi nye bar len pa ni de ltar tha dad pa med pa ma yin te /
'o na ci zhe na /
nye bar len pa ni tha dad pa kho na ste /
nye bar len pa'i rgyu tha dad pa'i phyir dang dus tha dad pa'i phyir ro /
de'i phyir nye bar len pa tha dad pa'i phyir de nyid bdag 'di yin no zhes mi rigs so /
ci ste nye bar len pa la tha dad pa yod mod bdag ni gcig nyid yin te /
ataḥ ātmano 'viśiṣṭatvādabhūmatītamadhvānamityetad bhaviṣyatyeva de'i phyir bdag la tha dad pa med pa'i phyir 'das pa'i dus na byung ba zhig gam zhes bya ba der yang 'byung ba nyid do snyam na /
ucyate brjod pa /
upādānavinirmukta ātmā te katamaḥ punaḥ nye bar len pa ma gtogs par /
khyod kyi bdag ni gang zhig yin /
yadi hi anyadupādānam, anyaścātmā syāt, tadā upādānaviśeṣe 'pi ātmano 'viśeṣāt syādetadevam gal te nye bar len pa gzhan la bdag kyang gzhan yin na ni de'i tshe nye bar len pa tha dad kyang bdag la tha dad pa med pas de de ltar 'gyur na /
'di ni bdag go /
na caitad bhedena darśayituṃ śakyam /
ayamasāvātmā, idamasyopādānamiti, upādānaviśiṣṭasvabhāvatvādātmano 'hetukatvaprasaṅgāt, pṛthaggrahaṇaprasaṅgācca 		'di ni bdag gi nye bar len pa'o zhes de dag ni tha dad par bstan par mi nus te /
nye bar len pa las tha dad pa'i rang bzhin yin pa nyid kyis bdag rgyu med par thal pa'i phyir dang so sor gzung du yod par thal bar 'gyur ba'i phyir ro /
yadā caivamupādānavinirmukta ātmā darśayituṃ na śakyate, tadā upādānaviśeṣe 'pi ātmāviśeṣa iti na śakyate kalpayitum gang gi tshe de ltar nye bar len pa ma gtogs par bdag bstan par mi nus pa de'i tshe /
nye bar len pa tha dad kyang bdag la tha dad med do zhes brtag par mi nus so /
athāpi kaścit parikalpayet /
satyam, upādānavinirmukta iti evaṃ na saṃbhavati, kimupādānameva ātmatvena parikalpyate iti? etadapi na yuktamiti pratipādayannāha 		ci ste yang nye bar len pa ma gtogs par bdag yod pa ma yin pa bden mod kyi; 'on kyang nye bar len pa nyid bdag tu brtag go zhes kha cig rtog par byed na /
de yang rigs pa ma yin no zhes bstan pa'i phyir /
upādānavinirmukto nāstyātmeti kṛte sati nye bar len pa ma gtogs pa'i /
bdag yod ma yin byas pa'i tshe /
syādupādānamevātmā nāsti cātmeti vaḥ punaḥ nye bar len nyid bdag yin na /
khyod kyi bdag ni med pa yin /
yathā tāvadupādānamevātmā na saṃbhavati tathā pratipādayannāha zhes gsungs so /
re zhig nye bar len pa nyid bdag ji ltar ma yin pa de ltar bstan pa'i phyir gsungs pa /
na copādānamevātmā vyeti tatsamudeti ca nye bar len nyid bdag ma yin /
de 'byung ba dang 'jig pa yin /
kathaṃ hi nāmopādānamupādātā bhaviṣyati /
tatra yadetat pañcopādānaskandhākhyamupādānam, tat pratikṣaṇamutpadyate ca vinaśyati ca /
na caivamātmā pratikṣaṇamutpadyate ca vinaśyati ca 		nye bar blang ba ji lta bur /
nye bar len po yin par 'gyur /
de la nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga zhes bya ba nye bar len pa gang yin pa de ni skad cig re re la 'byung ba dang 'jig pa yin la /
bdag ni de ltar skad cig re re la 'byung ba dang 'jig pa ma yin no /
ātmā skandhebhyastattvānyatvādinā ca nityānityatvenāpyaśakya eva vaktum, anekadoṣaprasaṅgāt bdag ni phung po dag las de nyid dang gzhan nyid la sogs pa dang rtag pa dang mi rtag pa nyid du yang brjod par mi nus te /
nyes pa du mar thal bar 'gyur ba'i phyir ro /
nityatve hi ātmanaḥ śāśvatavādaḥ syāt, anityatve ca ucchedavādaprasaṅgaḥ bdag rtag pa nyid yin pas ni rtag par smra bar 'gyur la /
mi rtag pa nyid yin pas ni chad par smra bar thal bar 'gyur te /
tataśca tadubhayaṃ śāśvatocchedākhyaṃ mahānarthakaramiti nopagantavyam /
ataḥ upādānamevātmeti tāvanna yujyate 		rtag pa dang chad pa zhes bya ba 'di ni gnyi ga yang don ma yi pa chen po byed pa yin pas khas blang bar mi bya'o /
de'i phyir re zhig nye bar len pa de nyid bdag yin no zhes bya bar mi rigs so /
api ca /
kathaṃ hi nāmopādānamupādātā bhaviṣyati 		gzhan yang nye bar blang ba ji lta bur /
nye bar len pa yin par 'gyur te /
iha upādīyate ityupādānaṃ karma /
tasya ca avaśyamupādātrā upārjakena bhavitavyam 		'dir nye bar blang bar bya ba yin pas ni nye bar blang ba ste las yin la /
de la ni gdon mi za bar nye bar len pa po nye bar sogs pa po yod par 'gyur dgos so /
tasya copādānasya yadi ātmatvamiṣyate, tatra upādānameva upādātā ityapi vidyate nye bar len pa de gal te bdag nyid yin par 'dod na ni /
de'i tshe nye bar blang ba nyid nye bar len pa po yin par 'gyur ro /
tataśca kartṛkarmaṇoraikye sati chetṛcchettavyaghaṭakumbhakārāgnīndhanādīnāmapi aikyaṃ syāt de'i phyir las dang byed pa po dag gcig yin pas gcod pa po dang gcad par bya ba dang bum pa dang rdza mkhan dang me dang bud shing la sogs pa rnams kyang gcig nyid du 'gyur na /
na caitad dṛṣṭaṃ yuktaṃ vā iti pratipādayannāha de ni mthong ba'am rigs pa'ang ma yin no zhes bstan pa'i phyir /
kathaṃ hi nāmopādānamupādātā bhaviṣyati nye bar blang ba ji lta bur /
nye bar len po yin par 'gyur /
iti /
api tu atyantāsaṃbhava evāsya pakṣasyetyabhiprāyaḥ 		zhes bshad de /
phyogs de ni gtan mi srid pa nyid do /
zhes bya bar dgongs pa yin no /
atrāha /
satyamupādānamātramātmā na yujyate, kiṃ tarhi upādānavyatirikta eva ātmā bhaviṣyati 		'dir nye bar len pa tsam yang bdag yin par mi rigs pa ni bden mod kyi 'on kyang nye bar len pa po nye bar len pa las tha dad pa nyid yin par 'gyur ro zhes zer ro /
etadapi na yuktam /
kiṃ kāraṇam? yasmāt 		'di yang mi rung ste /
gang gi phyir /
anyaḥ punarupādānādātmā naivopapadyate bdag ni nye bar len pa las /
gzhan du 'thad pa nyid ma yin /
gṛhyate hyanupādāno yadyanyo na ca gṛhyate gal te gzhan na len med par /
gzung yod rigs na gzung du med /
yadi upādānādātmā vyatiriktaḥ syāt, gṛhyeta sa upādānavyatiriktaḥ, ghaṭādiva paṭaḥ gal te nye bar len pa las bdag tha dad pa yin na ni bum pa las snam bu ltar de nye bar len pa las tha dad par gzung du yod par 'gyur na /
na caivaṃ gṛhyate de ltar gzung du ni med do /
tasmādupādānavyatirikto 'pi nāsti /
anupādānaḥ upādānavyatirekeṇa agṛhyamāṇatvāt khapuṣpavat, ityabhiprāyaḥ 		de'i phyir nye bar len pa las tha dad par nye bar len pa po yang yod pa ma yin te /
nam mkha'i me tog ltar nye bar len pa las tha dad par gzung du med pa'i phyir ro snyam du dgongs pa yin no /
idānīṃ yathopapāditamarthaṃ nigamayannāha da ni ji skad bstan pa'i don gyi mjug bsdu ba'i phyir /
evaṃ nānya upādānānna copādānameva saḥ /
ātmā nāstyanupādānaḥ 		de ltar len las gzhan ma yin /
de ni nyer len nyid kyang min /
bdag ni nye bar len med min /
atha syāt /
yadi ātmā upādānasvarūpo na bhavati, upādānopādātrorekatvaprasaṅgāt /
udayavyayaprasaṅgācca 		zhes bya ba gsungs so /
ci ste nye bar blang ba dang nye bar len pa po gcig tu thal bar 'gyur ba'i phyir dang 'byung ba dang 'jig pa nyid du thal bar 'gyur ba'i phyir bdag nye bar len pa'i rang bzhin can ma yin la /
sa hi anyo 'pi na bhavati upādānamanapekṣya bhedena grahaṇaprasaṅgāt nye bar len pa la ma ltos par tha dad par gzung du yod par thal bar 'gyur ba'i phyir gzhan pa yang ma yin zhing /
na cāpyanupādānaḥ, upādānanirapekṣasya grahaṇaprasaṅgāt nye bar len pa la ma ltos par gzung du yod par thal bar 'gyur pa'i phyir nye bar len pa med pa yang ma yin na /
evaṃ tarhi nāsti ātmetyastu /
ucyate 		de lta na 'o na bdag med do zhes bya ba yin la rag go snyam na /
brjod pa /
nāpi nāstyeṣa niścayaḥ med pa nyid du 'ang de ma nges /
yo hi nāma skandhānupādāya prajñapyate, sa kathaṃ nāstīti syāt? na hi avidyamāno vandhyātanayaḥ skandhānupādāya prajñapyate gang zhig phung po la brten nas gdags pa med do zhes bya bar ji ltar 'gyur /
yod pa ma yin pa'i mo gsham gyi bu ni phung po dag la brten nas 'dogs pa ma yin no /
kathaṃ sati upādāne upādātā nāstīti yujyate nye bar len pa yod pa bzhin du nye bar len pa po med do zhes bya bar ji ltar rigs par 'gyur te /
tasmānnāstitvamapyasya na yujyate /
tasmānnāsti ātmeti niścayo 'pyeṣa nopapadyate /
asya tvātmano vyavasthānaṃ vistareṇa madhyamakāvatārādavaseyam /
ihāpi ca pūrvameva sthānasthāneṣu kṛtā vyavastheti na punariha tadvayavasthāne yatna āsthīyate 		de'i phyir de ni med pa nyid du yang mi rigs so /
de'i phyir bdag med do snyam pa'i nges pa 'di yang mi 'thad do /
bdag de'i rnam par gzhag pa ni rgyas par dbu ma la 'jug pa las nges par bya'o /
'dir yang sngar skabs skabs dag tu rnam par gzhag pa byas zin pa'i phyir yang 'dir de rnam par gzhag pa'i 'bad pa mi bya'o /
evaṃ tāvadabhūvamatītamadhvānamityeṣā kalpanā nopapadyate de ltar na re zhig 'das pa'i dus na byung bar gyur ba zhig gam zhes bya ba de mi 'thad do /
idānīṃ nābhūvamatītamadhvānamityedapi yathā nopapadyate tathā pratipādayannāha da ni 'das pa'i dus na ma byung ba zhig gam zhes bya ba de yang ji ltar mi 'thad pa de ltar bstan pa'i phyir gsungs pa /
nābhūmatītamadhvānamityetannopapadyate 'das pa'i dus na ma byung zhes /
bya ba de yang mi 'thad do /
yo hi janmasu pūrveṣu tato 'nyo na bhavatyayam sngon tshe rnams su gang byung la /
de las 'di gzhan ma yin no /
yadi pūrvakādātmanaḥ asya adhunātanasya ātmano 'nyatvaṃ syāt, tadānīṃ nābhūmatītamadhvānamiti syāt gal te da ltar gyi 'di sngon gyi bdag las gzhan nyid yin na ni de'i tshe 'das pa'i dus na ma byung ba zhig gam zhes bya bar 'gyur ba zhig na /
na caitadevaṃ saṃbhavati de ni de ltar srid pa yang ma yin no /
tasmānnābhūvamatītamadhvānamityetannopapadyate de'i phyir 'das pa'i dus na ma byung zhes bya ba de yang mi 'thad do /
yadi punaḥ pūrvakādātmanaḥ asya anyatvaṃ syāt, ko doṣa iti? ucyate gal te 'di sngon gyi bdag las gzhan nyid du gyur na nyes pa ci yod ce na /
brjod pa /
yadi hyayaṃ bhavedanyaḥ pratyākhyāyāpi taṃ bhavet gal te 'di ni gzhan 'gyur na /
de med par yang 'byung bar 'gyur /
tathaiva ca sa saṃtiṣṭhettatra jāyeta vāmṛtaḥ de bzhin de ni gnas 'gyur zhing /
der ma shi bar skye bar 'gyur /
yadi hi ayamadhunātana ātmā pūrvakādātmanaḥ anyaḥ syāt, tadā taṃ pūrvakamātmānaṃ pratyākhyāya parityajya tannirapekṣaḥ ataddhetuka eva syāt gal te da ltar gyi bdag 'di sngar gyi bdag las gzhan yin na ni de'i tshe sngar gyi bdag de med par de spangs nas kyang de la ltos pa med cing de'i rgyu can ma yin par 'byung bar 'gyur ro /
kiṃ cānyat /
tathaiva ca sa saṃtiṣṭhettatra yadi pūrvakādātmanaḥ asya anyatvaṃ syāt, tadā anyatvād ghaṭotpāde paṭāvināśavat pūrvasyātmanā uttarasminnapi ātmani samutpadyamāne 'pi anirodhaḥ syāt /
aniruddhatvācca yatra pūrvaṃ devamanuṣyādijanmasu upapannaḥ, yena varṇasaṃsthānādinā pūrvamupalabhyamānaḥ, tenaiva prakāreṇa tathaiva sa tatrāvatiṣṭheta tathaivāvatiṣṭheteti 		gzhan yang /
de bzhin de ni gnas 'gyur zhing ste /
de la gal te 'di sngar gyi bdag las gzhan nyid yin na ni /
de'i tshe gzhan nyid yin pa'i phyir bum pa byas pa'i tshe snam bu mi 'jig pa ltar bdag phyi ma skyes pa na yang sngar gyi bdag mi 'gag par 'gyur ro /
ma 'gags pa nyid kyi phyir na sngar lha dang mi la sogs par skye ba gang dang gang du skyes pa de sngar gyi kha dog dang dbyibs la sogs pa gang du dmigs pa'i rnam pa de nyid kyis de bzhin du de der gnas par 'gyur zhing /
sngar ma shi ba kho nar 'dir skye bar 'gyur na /
mir 'gyur ba 'di'i sngar gyi lha la sogs pa'i bdag de bzhin du gnas par 'gyur ba zhes bya ba gang yin pa 'di ni yod pa ma yin no /
tasmānnābhūvamatītamadhvānamityetannopapadyate de'i phyir 'das pa'i dus na ma byung ba zhig gam zhes bya ba 'di ni 'thad pa ma yin no /
atrāha /
tatra yaduktam 		'dir smras pa /
gal te 'di ni gzhan 'gyur na /
yadi hyayaṃ bhavedanyaḥ pratyākhyāyāpi taṃ bhavet /
iti, /
yadi puna pūrvakamātmānaṃ pratyākhyāya [ayamiha bhavet, ko doṣaḥ syāt? tatra doṣā bahavaḥ syuḥ /
kathamiti cet, yasmādevaṃ sati 		de med par yang 'byung bar 'gyur /
zhes brjod na /
gal te sngar gyi bdag med pa 'di 'dir 'byung bar 'gyur na nyes pa cir 'gyur /
de la nyes pa mang por 'gyur ro /
ji ltar zhe na /
gang gi phyir de ltar yin na; /
chad dang las rnams chud za dang /
ucchedaḥ karmaṇāṃ nāśastathānyakṛtakarmaṇām gzhan gyis byas pa'i las rnams kyi /
gzhan gyis so sor myong ba dang /
anyena paribhogaḥ syādevamādi prasajyate /
yadi pūrvakamātmānaṃ pratyākhyāya ayamātmā bhavet, tadā] pūrvakasya ātmanaḥ tatra naṣṭatvād, iha ca anyasyaiva cotpādanātpūrvakasyātmana ucchedaḥ syāt 		de la sogs par thal bar 'gyur /
gal te bdag 'di sngar gyi bdag med par 'byung bar 'gyur na ni /
de'i tshe sngar gyi bdag de der zhig pa'i phyir dang 'dir gzhan zhig kho na skyes pa'i phyir sngar gyi bdag chad par 'gyur ro /
tasmiṃśca ātmani ucchinne karmaṇāmadattaphalānāmevāśrayavicchedena vicchedāt, bhoktaścābhāvānnāśa eva syāt bdag de chad na ni las kyi 'bras bu mjug thogs pa rnams rten chad pas rnam par chad pa'i phyir dang zab po yang med pa'i phyir 'bras bu chud za ba kho nar 'gyur ro /
atha pūrvakenātmanā kṛtasya karmaṇaḥ uttareṇātmanā phalaparibhogaḥ parikalpyate, tathāpi anyena kṛtasya karmaṇaḥ phalasya anyenopabhogaḥ syāt ci ste sngar gyi bdag gis byas pa'i las kyi 'bras bu bdag phyi mas yongs su longs spyod par rtog na /
de lta na yang gzhan gyis byas pa'i las kyi 'bras bu gzhan gyis longs spyod par 'gyur ro /
tataśca de'i phyir /
akṛtābhyāgamabhayaṃ syātkarmākṛtakaṃ yadi ci ste las ni ma byas na /
ma byas pa dang phrad 'jigs 'gyur /
ityevamādi aniṣṭamāpadyate /
api ca 		zhes bya ba de lta bu la sogs pa'i mi 'dod par 'gyur ro /
yadi ayamātmā pūrvakādātmanaḥ anya eva atropapannaḥ syāt, tadā pūrvamabhūtvā paścādutpanna iti syāt gzhan yang gal te bdag 'di ni sngar gyi bdag las gzhan du gyur pa 'dir skyes pa yin na ni /
de'i tshe sngar ma byung ba las phyis 'byung ba zhes bya bar 'gyur na /
na caitadyuktamiti pratipādayannāha de ni rigs pa yang ma yin no zhes bstan pa'i phyir /
nāpyabhūtvā samudbhūto doṣo hyatra prasajyate ma byung ba las byung min te /
'di la skyon du thal bar 'gyur /
kṛtako vā bhavedātmā saṃbhūto vāpyahetukaḥ bdag ni byas par 'gyur ba dang /
'byung ba'ang rgyu med can du 'gyur /
iti /
yadi hi ātmā pūrvamabhūtvā paścādutpannaḥ syāt, tadā kṛtaka eva ātmā syāt 		zhes gsungs te /
gal te bdag sngar ma byung ba las phyis 'byung bar 'gyur na ni de'i tshe bdag ni byas par 'gyur na /
na ca kṛtaka ātmeṣyate, anityatvaprasaṅgāt bdag ni byas par 'dod pa yang ma yin te /
mi rtag pa nyid du thal bar 'gyur ba'i phyir ro /
vyatiriktasya ca tanniṣpādakasya karturabhāvāt kutaḥ kṛtakatvamātmano yojyeta? kṛtake cātmani parikalpyamāne ādimān saṃsāraḥ syādeva, apūrvasattvasya prādurbhāvaśca de sgrub par byed pa de las tha dad pa'i byed pa po med pa'i phyir bdag gi byas pa nyid du rigs par ga la 'gyur /
bdag byas par rtog na ni 'khor ba thog ma dang ldan pa dang snga na med pa'i sems can 'byung bar yang 'gyur na /
na caitadevam /
tasmānna kṛtaka ātmā 		de ni de ltar yang ma yin te /
de'i phyir bdag byas pa yang ma yin no /
api ca gzhan yang /
saṃbhūto vāpyahetukaḥ /
abhūtvā prāgātmā samutpadyamāno nirhetuka evopapadyate 		'byung ba'ang rgyu med can du 'gyur /
bdag ma byung ba las byung na rgyu med can kho nar 'gyur te /
pūrvaṃ hi ātmā nāstīti akṛtako nirhetukaḥ syāt sngar bdag med pas byed pa po med pa ni rgyu med pa can du 'gyur ro /
vāśabdo vikalpe /
kṛtako vā bhavedātmā yadi vā nābhūvamatītamadhvānamityetannābhyupeyam /
saṃbhūto vāpyahetukaḥ, yadi vā 		'ang gi sgra ni rnam par rtog pa ste /
bdag ni byas par 'gyur ba'am /
yang na 'das pa'i dus na ma byung ba zhig gam zhes bya ba 'di ni khas mi blang ngo zhes bya ba dang bdag 'byung ba rgyu med pa can du 'gyur ba'am /
nābhūmatītamadhvānamityetannopapadyate /
ityabhyupagamyatām 		yang na 'das pa'i dus na ma byung ba zhig gam zhes bya ba de mi 'thad do zhes bya ba 'di khas blang bar bya'o zhes bya ba'o /
idānīṃ yathopavarṇitamevārthaṃ nigamayannāha da ni ji skad bstan pa'i don de nyid mjug bsdu ba'i phyir /
de ltar bdag byung bdag ma byung /
evaṃ dṛṣṭiratīte yā nābhūmahamabhūmaham gnyi ga gnyi ga ma yin par /
'das la lta ba gang yin pa /
ubhayaṃ nobhayaṃ ceti naiṣā samupapadyate de ni 'thad pa ma yin no /
zhes gsungs te /
evaṃ yathopavarṇitena nyāyena abhūmatītamadhvānamiti yā dṛṣṭiḥ, eṣāpi naivopapadyate /
etaddvayasyābhāvācca ubhayamapi nopapadyate 		de ltar ji skad bstan pa'i tshul du 'das pa'i dus na byung ba zhig gam zhes bya bar lta ba gang yin pa dang 'das pa'i dus na ma byung ba zhig gam zhes bya ba lta ba gang yin pa de 'thad pa ma yin pa nyid do /
de gnyis med pa'i phyir na gnyi ga yang mi 'thad do /
ci'i phyir zhe na /
kiṃ kāraṇam? yasmād dvayaṃ hyetatsamāhatamubhayamiti kalpyate 'di ltar /
de gnyis 'dus pa la gnyi ga zhes bya bar brtag par bya na /
ekaikasya ca pṛthakpṛthagabhāvāt kutastatsamāhāra iti ubhayamapi na saṃbhavati re re so so so sor med pas de dag 'dus pa ga la yod de /
de'i phyir gnyi ga yang yod pa ma yin no /
ubhayasyābhāvāt kutastatpratiṣedhena nobhayaṃ bhaviṣyatīti? tasmānnaivābhūvaṃ na nābhūvamityetadapi nopapadyate gnyi ga med pa'i phyir na de dag bkag pa'i sgo nas gnyis ka ma yin pa yang yod par ga la 'gyur /
de'i phyir byung ba yang ma yin ma byung ba yang ma yin pa zhig gam zhes bya ba de yang 'thad pa ma yin no /
tadevaṃ pūrvāntaṃ samāśritasya dṛṣṭicatuṣṭayasya asaṃbhavamudbhāvya idānīmaparāntasamāśritasya pratiṣedhamāha de'i phyir de ltar sngon gyi mtha' la brten pa'i lta ba bzhi mi srid par bstan nas /
da ni phyi ma'i mtha' la brten pa dgag pa gsungs pa /
adhvanyanāgate kiṃ nu bhaviṣyāmīti darśanam ma 'ongs dus gzhan 'byung 'gyur dang /
'byung bar mi 'gyur zhes bya bar /
na bhaviṣyāmi cetyetadatītenādhvanā samam lta ba gang yin de dag ni /
'das pa'i dus dang mtshungs pa yin /
yathaiva hi atīte 'dhvani dṛṣṭicatuṣṭayaṃ niṣiddham, evamanāgate 'pyadhvani dṛṣṭicatuṣṭayaṃ niṣedhanīyamuktapāṭhaparivartanena ji ltar 'das pa'i dus la lta ba bzhi bkag pa de ltar ma 'ongs pa'i dus la bkag pa bzhi yang bshad zin pa'i 'don pa go bsnor bas dgag par bya'o /
tadyathā 'di lta ste /
adhvanyanāgate kiṃ nu bhaviṣyāmītyasaṃgatam ma 'ongs dus na 'byung 'gyur zhes /
bya ba de ni mi 'thad do /
aiṣyajanmani yo bhāvo sa eva na bhavatyayam ma 'ongs tshe la gang 'byung la /
de nyid 'di ni ma yin no /
ityevamādinā sarvaṃ samaṃ yojyamekatvapratiṣedhe zhes bya ba la sogs pas gcig nyid dgag pa'i sgo nas thams cad mtshungs par sbyar bar bya'o /
evamanyatvapratiṣedhe 'pi samaṃ yojyam de bzhin du; ma 'ongs dus na mi 'byung zhes /
na syāmanāgate kāle ityetannopapadyate /
aiṣya janmani yo bhāvo tato 'nyo na bhavatyayam 		bya ba de yang mi 'thad do /
ma 'ongs tshe la gang 'byung ba /
de las 'di gzhan ma yin no /
ityevamādinā pūrvaślokapāṭhaparivartanena /
idānīṃ pūrvāntaṃ samāśritasya śāśvatādidṛṣṭicatuṣṭayasya pratiṣedhārthamāha 		zhes bya ba la sogs pas tshigs su bcad pa snga ma'i 'don pa bsnor te gzhan nyid dgag pa la yang mtshungs par sbyar bar bya'o /
da ni rtag pa la sogs par lta ba sngon gyi mtha' la brten pa bzhi yang dgag pa'i phyir /
sa devaḥ sa manuṣyaścedevaṃ bhavati śāśvatam gal te lha de mi de na /
de lta na ni rtag par 'gyur /
anutpannaśca devaḥ syājjāyate na hi śāśvatam lha ni ma skyes nyid 'gyur te /
rtag la skye ba med phyir ro /
iha hi kaścinmanuṣyagatisthaḥ kuśalaṃ karma kṛtvā devagatiṃ gacchati zhes gsungs te /
'di na mi'i 'gro bar gnas pa kha cig dge ba'i las byas nas lha'i 'gro bar 'gro bar 'gyur ro /
tatra yadi sa eva devaḥ sa eva manuṣya iti evamubhayoraikyaṃ syāt, tadā śāśvataṃ syāt /
na caitadevaṃ yadeva eva manuṣyo bhavediti /
ato nāsti kiṃcicchāśvatam 		de la gal te lha de nyid mi de nyid yin no zhes de ltar gnyi ga gcig nyid du 'gyur na ni /
de'i tshe rtag par 'gyur na /
gang lha nyid mi yin pa zhes bya ba 'di ni de ltar yang ma yin no /
de'i phyir rtag pa med do /
api ca /
śāśvatavāde sati asamutpannaśca devaḥ syāt 		gzhan yang rtag par smra ba yin na /
lha ni ma skyes nyid 'gyur te /
ci'i phyir zhe na /
kiṃ kāraṇam? yasmājjāyate na hi śāśvatam gang gi phyir /
rtag pa skye ba med phyir ro /
yaddhi vastu śāśvatam, tadvidyamānatvānnaiva jāyate zhes gsungs te /
rtag pa gang yin pa de ni yod pa yin pa'i phyir skye ba med pa nyid do /
tataśca anutpanno devaḥ syāt, anutpanno devo na yujyate iti de'i phyir lha ni ma skyes pa nyid du 'gyur na /
lha ma skyes par ni rigs pa yang ma yin no /
evaṃ tāvacchāśvataṃ na yujyate /
idānīmaśāśvatamapi yathā na saṃbhavati tathā pratipādayannāha 		de ltar re zhig rtag pa mi rigs so /
da ni mi rtag pa yang ji ltar mi srid pa de ltar bstan pa'i phyir gsungs pa /
devādanyo manuṣyaścedaśāśvatamato bhavet gal te lha las mi gzhan na /
de ltar na ni mi rtag 'gyur /
devādanyo manuṣyaścetsaṃtatirnopapadyate /
yadi hi anyo devo 'nyaśca manuṣyaḥ syāt, tadā pūrvakasya manuṣyātmanastatra naṣṭatvādiha ca anyasyaivotpādāt sa pūrvako manuṣyātmā tatra vinaṣṭa ityaśāśvataṃ syāt /
tatsaṃtānānuvṛttyā nāśāśvatamiti cet, ucyate 		gal te lha mi gzhan yin na /
rgyud ni 'thad par mi 'gyur ro /
gal te lha las mi gzhan yin na ni de'i tshe aa mra'i shing nim pa'i rgyur ma yin pa de bzhin du lha yang mi'i rgyud gcig tu gtogs par mi 'gyur ro /
de'i phyir sngar gyi 'jig pas mi rtag pa nyid du 'gyur ba zhig go /
devādanyo manuṣyaścetsaṃtatirnopapadyate /
yadi devādanyo manuṣyo bhavet, tadā yathā nimbasya na āmratarusaṃtāno bhavati, evaṃ manuṣyasya devaḥ ekasaṃtānapatito na syāt 		ci ste lha las mi gzhan yin na ni de'i tshe rgyud rjes su 'jug par mi 'gyur ba zhig na /
lha ni mi dang rgyud gcig tu gtogs pa yin no zhes rgyud rjes su 'jug pa 'di ni yod pa yin no /
tataśca pūrvakasya vināśādaśāśvatameva bhavet de'i phyir rgyu med par thal bar 'gyur ba'i phyir na /
athavā /
yadi devādanyo manuṣyo bhavet, tadā saṃtānānuvṛttirna syāt 		lha las mi gzhan ma yin no /
gang gi phyir de ltar yin pa de'i phyir mi rtag pa yang yod pa ma yin no /
asti ceyaṃ saṃtānānuvṛttiḥ devasya manuṣyaḥ ekasaṃtānapatita iti da ni rtag pa yang yin la mi rtag pa yang yin pa dgag par bya ba'i phyir /
tasmāt saṃtānābhāvaprasaṅgāt devādanyo manuṣyo na bhavati gal te phyogs gcig lha yin la /
phyogs gcig mi ni yin gyur na /
yataścaivam, ato 'śāśvatamapi nāsti /
idānīṃ śāśvatāśāśvatapratiṣedhārthamāha 		rtag dang mi rtag 'gyur ba yin /
de yang rigs pa ma yin no /
zhes gsungs te /
divyo yadyekadeśaḥ syādekadeśaśca mānuṣaḥ gal te mi 'di cha shas kyis mi nyid btang la /
aśāśvataṃ śāśvataṃ ca bhavettacca na yujyate mi btang nas cha shas kyis lha'i lus len na ni /
yadi ayaṃ manuṣyaḥ aṃśena manuṣyatāṃ vijahyāt, aṃśena vihāya manuṣyatāṃ devātmabhāvamupādadyāt, tadā ekadeśasya nāśādaśāśvataṃ syāt, ekadeśasya ca avasthānācchāśvataṃ syāt /
etacca ayuktaṃ yadekasya divyagatisaṃgṛhītaḥ ekadeśaḥ syāt, ekadeśaśca manuṣyaḥ syāt /
tasmācchāśvataṃ ca aśāśvataṃ ca etadubhayaṃ nopapadyate /
idānīṃ naśāśvatanaivāśāśvatadṛṣṭipratiṣedhārthamāha 		de'i tshe phyogs gcig zhig pas mi rtag par 'gyur la /
phyogs gcig gnas pas rtag par 'gyur ba zhig na /
gang gi phyir /
phyogs gcig lha'i 'gro bas yang dag par bsdus shing /
phyogs gcig mi yin par 'gyur ba de ni rigs pa ma yin no /
de'i phyir rtag pa dang mi rtag pa gnyi ga yin pa 'di ni 'thad pa ma yin no /
da ni rtag pa yang ma yin mi rtag pa yang ma yin par lta ba dgag pa gsungs pa /
aśāśvataṃ śāśvataṃ ca prasiddhamubhayaṃ yadi gal te rtag dang mi rtag pa /
gnyi ga grub par 'gyur na ni /
siddhe na śāśvataṃ kāmaṃ naivāśāśvatamityapi rtag pa ma yin mi rtag min /
grub par 'gyur bar 'dod la rag /
yadi śāśvataṃ kiṃcidvastu syāt, tadā paścādaśāśvatadarśanānnaiva śāśvatamiti syāt gal te rtag pa cung zad cig yod na ni de phyis mi rtag par mthong ba las rtag pa ma yin pa zhes bya bar 'gyur la /
evaṃ yadi kiṃcidaśāśvataṃ syāt, tadā tasya paścācchāśvatopapattito nāśāśvatamiti syāt de bzhin du gal te mi rtag pa cung zad cig yod na ni de'i tshe de phyis rtag par 'gyur ba las mi rtag pa ma yin par 'gyur ba zhig na /
yadā tu śāśvatāśāśvatamevāprasiddham, tadā kutastatpratiṣedhena naivaśāśvataṃ nāśāśvatam syāditi? tasmādetadapyayuktam gang gi tshe rtag pa dang mi rtag pa nyid ma grub pa de'i tshe /
de dag bkag pa'i sgo nas rtag pa yang ma yin mi rtag pa yang ma yin pa ga la yod /
atha syāt /
anādijanmamaraṇaparaṃparāpravṛttamavicchinnakamaṃ saṃsāraprabandhamupalabhya śāśvata mātmānaṃ parikalpayāmaḥ /
astyasau śāśvataḥ kaścit padārthaḥ, yo hi nāma evamanādimati saṃsāre paribhramannadyāpyupalabhyate iti 		de'i phyir de yang mi rigs so /
ci ste 'khor ba'i rgyun thog ma med pa nas skye ba dang 'chi ba gcig nas gcig tu brgyud par 'jug pa'i rim pa rnam par chad pa med par dmigs nas /
gang zhig de ltar thog ma dang mi ldan pa'i 'khor bar yongs su 'khyams shing da rung du yang dmigs pa dngos po rtag pa de ni 'ga' zhig yod pa yin no zhes bdag rtag pa gzhan brtag par bya'o snyam na /
ucyate /
etadapi nopapadyate 		de yang mi 'thad do /
de ci'i phyir zhe na /
'di ltar /
kiṃ kāraṇam? yo hi nāma gal te gang zhig gang nas gar /
kutaścidāgataḥ kaścitkiṃcidgacchetpunaḥ kvacit /
yadi tasmādanādistu saṃsāraḥ syānna cāsti saḥ 		'ongs shing gang du'ang 'gro 'gyur na /
de phyir 'khor ba thog med pa /
'gyur na de ni yod ma yin /
yadi hi saṃskārāṇāmātmano va kutaścidgatyantarād gamanaṃ gatyantaramāgamanaṃ syāt, tataśca gantyantarāt punaḥ kvacid gamanaṃ syāt, tadānīmanādiḥ saṃsāraḥ syāt gal te bdag gam 'du byed rnams 'gyur ba gzhan gang nas gar 'gro ste 'gro ba gzhan du 'ong bar 'gyur zhing /
'gro ba gzhan de nas slar yang gang du 'gro bar 'gyur na ni de'i tshe 'khor ba thog ma med par 'gyur ba zhig na /
na ca kutaścit kasyacidāgamanaṃ saṃbhavati, nityasya vā anityasya vā āgamanānupapatteḥ gang zhig gang nas gar 'ong ba ni yod pa ma yin te /
rtag pa dang mi rtag pa 'ong bar 'ang mi 'thad pa'i phyir ro /
na cāpi itaḥ punaḥ kasyacit kvacid gamanaṃ saṃbhavati, nityasya vā anityasya gamanānupapatteḥ /
yadā caivaṃ na saṃbhavati, tadā kuto janmamaraṇaparaṃparāyā atidīrghatvena ādyanupalambhādanādimān saṃsāraḥ syāt? saṃsarturabhāvāt kutaḥ anādimattvamādimatvaṃ vā saṃsārasya saṃbhavet? yadā ca na saṃbhavati, tadā yaduktam 		gang zhig 'di nas yang gang zhig tu 'gro ba yang yod pa ma yin te /
rtag pa'am mi rtag pa 'gro bar mi 'thad pa'i phyir ro /
gang gi tshe de yod pa ma yin pa de'i tshe /
skye ba dang 'chi ba gcig nas gcig tu brgyud nas yun shin tu ring ba nyid kyis thog ma ma dmigs pa las 'khor ba thog ma med par ga la 'gyur /
'khor ba po med pa'i phyir na 'khor ba thog ma dang mi ldan pa'am /
thog ma dang ldan par ga la 'gyur /
astyasau śāśvataḥ kaścitpadārthaḥ, yo hi nāma evamanādimati saṃsāre paribhramannadyāpyupalabhyate iti, tanna yuktam gang gi tshe mi 'gyur ba de'i tshe gang zhig de ltar thog ma dang mi ldan pa'i 'khor bar yongs su 'khyams zhing da dung du yang dmigs pa'i dngos po rtag pa de ni 'ga' zhig yod pa yin no zhes gang smras pa de rigs pa ma yin no /
ataśca, evaṃ yathoditanyāyena gang gi phyir de ltar ji skad bshad pa'i tshul gyis /
nāsti cecchāśvataḥ kaścit ko bhaviṣyatyaśāśvataḥ gal te rtag pa 'ga' med na /
mi rtag gang zhig yin par 'gyur /
śāśvato 'śāśvataścāpi dvābhyāmābhyāṃ tiraskṛtaḥ rtag pa dang ni mi rtag dang /
de gnyis bsal bar 'gyur ba'o /
yadā caivaṃ śāśvata eva padārtho na saṃbhavati, tadā kasya vigamanādaśāśvataḥ syāt /
śāśvatāśāśvatānupalambhācca kutaḥ ubhayaṃ kuto nobhayamiti? tasmādevaṃ śāśvatādidṛṣṭicatuṣṭayaṃ pūrvānte saṃsārasya na saṃbhavati 		gang gi tshe de ltar dngos po rtag pa nyid yod pa ma yin pa de'i tshe gang zhig rtag pas mi rtag par 'gyur /
rtag pa dang mi rtag pa ma dmigs pas na gnyis ka dang gnyis ka ma yin pa de yang ga la yod /
de'i phyir de ltar na rtag pa la sogs par lta ba bzhi sngon gyi mtha' la srid pa ma yin no /
idānīmantānantādicatuṣṭayamaparānte yathā na saṃbhavati, tathā pratipādayannāha da ni mtha' dang ldan pa dang mtha' dang mi ldan pa la sogs pa bzhi yang phyi ma'i mtha' la ji ltar mi srid pa de ltar bstan pa'i phyir gsungs pa /
antavān yadi lokaḥ syātparalokaḥ kathaṃ bhavet gal te 'jig rten mtha' yod na /
'jig rten pha rol ji ltar 'gyur /
athāpyanantavāṃllokaḥ paralokaḥ kathaṃ bhavet /
yadi hi antavān, vināśādūrdhvaṃ pūrvaloko na syāt, tadā paraloko na syāt asti ca paraloka iti antavāṃlloka iti nopapadyate 		gal te 'jig rten mtha' med na /
'jig rten pha rol ji ltar 'gyur /
gal te 'jig rten mtha' yod pa ste zhig nas phyis med par 'gyur na ni de'i tshe 'jig rten pha rol med par 'gyur na /
'jig rten pha rol ni yod pa yang yin te /
de'i phyir 'jig rten mtha' yod ces bya ba 'thad pa ma yin no /
ci ste yang 'jig rten mtha' med par 'gyur na ni /
athāpi anantavāṃllokaḥ syāt, tadānīmapi paralokaḥ kathaṃ bhavet? naiva paralokaḥ syādityabhiprāyaḥ de'i tshe yang 'jig rten pha rol ji ltar 'gyur te; 'jig rten pha rol med par 'gyur ro snyam du dgongs so /
na ca paraloko nāsti 'jig rten pha rol ni med pa yang ma yin te /
ataḥ paralokasadbhāvādantavānapi loko na bhavati /
idānīmantavattvamanantavatvaṃ ca ubhayametallokasya yathā na saṃbhavati, tathā pratipādayannāha 		de'i phyir 'jig rten pha rol yod pas 'jig rten mtha' med par yang mi 'gyur ro /
da ni 'jig rten mtha' yod pa nyid dang mtha' med pa nyid 'di gnyi ga yang ji ltar 'jig rten la mi srid pa de ltar bstan pa'i phyir /
skandhānāmeṣa saṃtāno yasmāddīpārciṣāmiva gang phyir phung po rnams kyi rgyun /
'di ni mar me'i 'od dang mtshungs /
pravartate tasmānnāntānantavattvaṃ ca yujyate /
pūrvottarahetuphalabhāvasaṃbandhanairantaryāvicchinnakamavartī yasmādayaṃ pradīpavat pratikṣaṇavināśī skandhasaṃtānaḥ pravartate, tasmāddhetuphalapravṛttidarśanānnāntavattvaṃ nānantavattvaṃ ca yujyate /
kathaṃ kṛtvā? 		de phyir mtha' yod nyid dang ni /
mtha' med nyid kyang mi rigs so /
zhes gsungs te /
gang gi phyir phung po rnams kyi rgyun rgyu dang 'bras bu'i dngos po snga phyi 'brel zhing bar mtshams med pas /
rim pa rnam par chad pa med par 'jug pa skad cig re re la 'jig pa 'di ni mar me dang 'dra bar 'jug pa yin te /
de'i phyir rgyu dang 'bras bu'i 'jug pa mthong bas mtha' yod pa nyid dang mtha' med pa nyid kyang mi rigs so /
ji ltar zhe na /
pūrve yadi ca bhajyerannutpadyeranna cāpyamī gal te snga ma 'jig 'gyur zhing /
phung po 'di la brten byas nas /
phung po de ni mi 'byung na /
skandhāḥ skandhān pratītyemānatha loko 'ntavān bhavet /
yadi pūrve manuṣyaskandhā naśyeyuḥ, tāṃśca pratītya uttare devagatyupapattisaṃgṛhītā nopapadyeran, tadā antavān loko bhavet tailavartikṣayaniruddhapradīpavat 		des na 'jig rten mtha' yod 'gyur /
gal te snga ma mi'i phung po 'jig cing /
de la brten nas lta'i 'gro bar skye bas bsdus pa phyi ma mi 'byung na /
de'i tshe til mar dang snying po zad pas 'gags pa'i mar me ltar 'jig rten mtha' yod par 'gyur na /
uttarātmabhāvotpādānnāsti antavattvam lus phyi ma mi 'byung ba'i phyir na mtha' yod pa nyid ma yin no /
pūrve yadi na bhajyerannutpadyeranna cāpyamī gal te snga ma mi 'jig cing /
phung po 'di la brten byas nas /
phung po de ni mi 'byung na /
skandhāḥ skandhān pratītyemāṃlloko 'nanto bhavedatha des na 'jig rten mtha' med 'gyur /
ci ste phung po snga ma 'jig par mi 'gyur zhing /
atha yadi pūrvakāḥ skandhā na naśyeṣuḥ, tān pratītya uttare phalabhūtāḥ skandhā notpadyeran tadā ananto 'vināśī lokaḥ syāt svarūpādapracyutatvāt de la brten nas phung po 'bras bur 'gyur ba phyi ma mi 'byung na /
de'i tshe rang gi ngo bo las ma nyams pa'i phyir 'jig rten mtha' med pa ste /
yadā tu pūrvakāḥ skandhā nirudhyante taddhetukāścāpare skandhā uttarakālaṃ jāyante, tadā pūrvakānāmanavasthānāt kuto 'nantavattvaṃ saṃsārasya syāt? /
idānīṃ tṛtīyamubhayapakṣabhāvaṃ pratipādayannāha 		mi 'jig par 'gyur bzhig na /
gang gi tshe phung po snga ma rnams 'gag cing de'i rgyu can phung po phyi ma rnams skyes pa de'i tshe snga ma rnams mi gnas pas 'khor ba mtha' med pa nyid du ga la 'gyur /
da ni gsum pa gnyis ka'i phyogs med par bstan pa'i phyir /
antavānekadeśaścedekadeśastvanantavān gal te phyogs gcig mtha' yod la /
phyogs gcig mtha' ni med gyur na /
syādantavānanantaśca lokastacca na yujyate 'jig rten mtha' yod mtha' med 'gyur /
de yang rigs pa ma yin no /
zhes gsungs te /
yadi hi kasyacidekadeśasya vināśaḥ syāt, ekadeśasya ca gatyantaragamanaṃ syāt, yāttadānīmantavāṃśca loko 'nantavāṃśca gal te 'ga' zhig gi phyogs gcig 'jig par 'gyur la /
phyogs gcig 'gro ba gzhan du 'gro bar 'gyur na ni /
de'i tshe 'jig rten 'di'i mtha' yod pa yang yin la /
mtha' med pa yang yin par 'gyur na /
na caitadevaṃ saṃbhavati yadekadeśo naśyati, ekadeśo na naśyatīti gang zhig phyogs gcig 'jig cing phyogs gcig mi 'jig pa zhes bya ba 'di ni de ltar yod pa yang ma yin no /
ataḥ antavāṃśca anantavāṃśca loka iti na yujyate de'i phyir 'jig rten mtha' yod pa yang yin la /
mtha' med pa yang yin zhes bya ba 'di ni mi rigs so /
kasmāt punarekadeśasya vināśaḥ ekadeśasya cāvasthānaṃ na yujyate iti pratipādayannāha yang ci'i phyir phyogs gcig 'jig la phyogs gcig gnas par ma rigs she na /
de bstan pa'i phyir /
kathaṃ tāvadupādāturekadeśo vinaṅkṣyate ji lta bur na nyer len po /
phyogs gcig rnam par 'jig 'gyur la /
na naṅkṣyate caikadeśa evaṃ caitanna yujyate phyogs gcig rnam par mi 'jig 'gyur /
de ltar de ni mi rigs so /
zhes gsungs te /
iha ekadeśasya vināśe ekadeśasya cāvasthāne parikalpyamāne yadi vā upādāturekadeśasya vināśaḥ avasthānaṃ vā parikalpyeta, yadi vā upādānasya? tatra yadi tāvadupādāturekadeśasya vināśaḥ ekadeśasya cāvasthānaṃ parikalpyate, tanna yujyate /
kiṃ kāraṇam? yasmāt 		'dir phyogs gcig 'jig cing phyogs gcig gnas par rtog pa na /
gal te nye bar len pa po la phyogs gcig 'jig cing phyogs gcig gnas par rtog gam /
yang na nye bar len pa la yin grang /
de la re zhig nye bar len pa po la phyogs gcig 'jig cing phyogs gcig gnas par rtog na ni de ni mi rigs so /
kathaṃ tāvadupādāturekadeśo vinaṅkṣyate de ci'i phyir zhe na /
gang gi phyir de /
na naṅkṣyate caikadeśaḥ /
naiva hi atra kācidupapattirasti yayā ekadeśasya vināśamekadeśasya cāvināśaṃ parikalpayiṣyāmaḥ 		ji lta bur na nyer len po /
phyogs gcig rnam par 'jig 'gyur la /
phyogs gcig rnam par 'jig mi 'gyur /
'dir gang gi phyogs gcig rnam par 'jig la /
phyogs gcig rnam par 'jig par mi 'gyur bar rtog par 'gyur ba 'thad pa ni 'ga' yang yod pa ma yin no /
ata eva upapattimapaśyannācārya āha de nyid kyi phyir na 'thad pa 'ga' yang ma gzigs shing /
evaṃ caitanna yujyate /
iti 		slob dpon gyis de ltar de ni mi rigs so zhes gsungs so /
athavā /
upādātā hi nāma ātmā 		yang na nye bar len pa po zhes bya ba ni bdag yin la /
sa ca skandheṣu pañcadhā mṛgyamāṇo na saṃbhavati de la phung po dag la rnam pa lngas btsal ba ni yod pa ma yin la /
yaśca na saṃbhavati, tasya kathamekadeśo vinaṅkṣyate, ekadeśaśca na naṅkṣyate? ata evāha gang zhig yod pa ma yin pa de ji ltar phyogs gcig 'jig cing /
phyogs gcig mi 'jig par 'gyur /
de nyid kyi phyir /
evaṃ caitanna yujyate iti /
athavā yadi upādāturekadeśo naśyedekadeśaśca na naśyet, tadā ekasyaiva upādāturdevatvamaṃśenānyena manuṣyatvaṃ syāt 		de ltar de ni mi rigs so zhes gsungs so /
rnam pa gcig tu na /
gal te nye bar len pa po phyogs gcig 'jig la /
phyogs gcig mi 'jig na de'i tshe nye bar len pa po gcig /
cha gcig gis lha nyid du 'gyur zhing /
na caitadiṣyate ityāha cha gcig gis mir 'gyur na /
evaṃ caitanna yujyate iti de ni 'dod pa yang ma yin no zhes gsungs pa /
evaṃ tāvadupādāturantavattvamanantavattvaṃ ca na yuktamiti de ltar de ni mi rigs so zhes bya ba'o /
de ltar na re zhig nye bar len pa po mtha' yod pa yang yin la /
idānīmupādānasyāpi yathā na saṃbhavati tathā pratipādayannāha mtha' med pa yang yin pa ni mi rigs so /
da ni nye bar blang ba la yang ji ltar yod pa ma yin pa de ltar bstan pa'i phyir /
upādānaikadeśaśca kathaṃ nāma vinaṅkṣyate ji lta bur na nyer blang ba /
phyogs gcig rnam par 'jig 'gyur la /
na naṅkṣyate caikadeśo naitadapyupapadyate phyogs gcig rnam par 'jig mi 'gyur /
de ltar de yang mi rigs so /
zhes gsungs te /
upādātṛvadetadapi vyākhyeyam 'di yang nye bar len pa po ltar rnam par bshad par bya'o /
tadevamubhayadarśanāsaṃbhavaṃ pratipādya idānīṃ yathā nobhayamapi na saṃbhavati tathā pratipādayannāha de'i phyir de ltar gnyis ka ltar yod pa ma yin par bstan nas /
da ni gnyis ka ma yin pa yang ji ltar yod pa ma yin pa de ltar bstan pa'i phyir /
antavaccāpyanantaṃ ca prasiddhamubhayaṃ yadi gal te mtha' yod mtha' med pa /
gnyi ga grub par gyur na ni /
siddhe naivāntavatkāmaṃ naivānantavadityapi mtha' yod ma yin mtha' med min /
grub par 'gyur bar 'dod la rag /
pratiṣedhyasya vastuno 'saṃbhavāt pratiṣedhasyāpyasaṃbhava iti ces gsungs te /
dgag par bya bar yod pa ma yin pas bkag pa yang med de /
ataḥ antavattve ca anantavattve ca ubhayasminnapratīte kasya pratiṣedhena naivāntavān nānantavān lokaḥ iti dṛṣṭisaṃbhavaḥ syāditi /
evaṃ tāvat sāṃvṛtaṃ pratibimbākāramupādātāramupādānaṃ cābhyupetyāpi śāśvatādidṛṣṭayasaṃbhavaṃ pratipādya idānīṃ sarvathā bhāvasvabhāvānupalambhena bandhyāputraśyāmagauratādivat śāśvatādidṛṣṭīnāmasaṃbhavaṃ pratipipādayiṣurāha 		de'i phyir mtha' yod pa dang mtha' med pa gnyis ka yang ma grub par /
gang zhig bkag nas 'jig rten mtha' yod pa yang ma yin /
mtha' med pa yang ma yin zhes bya bar lta yod par ga la 'gyur /
de ltar na re zhig nye bar len pa po dang nye bar len pa kun rdzob pa gzugs brnyan lta bu'i rnam pa can zhal gyis bzhes nas kyang /
rtag pa la sogs par lta ba mi srid par bstan nas /
da ni rnam pa thams cad du dngos po'i rang bzhin ma dmigs pas mo gsham gyi bu'i sngo bsangs dang dkar sham nyid ltar rtag pa la sogs par lta ba rnams mi srid par bstan par bzhed nas /
athavā sarvabhāvānāṃ śūnyatvācchāśvatādayaḥ yang na dngos po thams cad dag /
stong phyir rtag la sogs lta ba /
kva kasya katamāḥ kasmātsaṃbhaviṣyanti dṛṣṭayaḥ gang dag gang du gang las ni /
ci las kun du 'byung bar 'gyur /
zhes gsungs te /
iha sarvabhāvānāṃ pratītyasamutpannatvāt śūnyatvaṃ sakalena śāstreṇa pratipāditam /
tataśca sarvabhāvānāṃ śūnyatvāt katamāstāḥ sarvabhāvabāhyāḥ śāśvatādyā dṛṣṭayo bhaviṣyanti, yāḥ kaścid grahīṣyati yatastannirākaraṇamārapsyāmahe? tathā kiṃ vā ālambanaṃ yat sarvabhāvānantargataṃ yatraitā dṛṣṭaya utpatsyante yatraitā dṛṣṭīrnivārayiṣyāmaḥ? katamaścāsau bhāvaḥ pudgalo vā sarvabhāvabāhyāḥ yasyaitā dṛṣṭayaḥ utpatsyante yaṃ dṛṣṭibhyo nivārayiṣyāmaḥ? kiṃ vā dṛṣṭīnāmutpattikāraṇamālambananimittaṃ sarvabhāvabāhyaṃ yasmānnimittādutpadyamānāḥ śāśvatādikāḥ dṛṣṭīḥ vārayiṣyāmaḥ? sarveṣāmeva hi padārthānāṃ sarvabhāvāntargatatvāt śūnyatvam, śūnyatvācca sarve eva hi te padārthā nopalabhyanta iti, /
kva kasya katamāḥ kasmātsaṃbhaviṣyanti dṛṣṭayaḥ /
naiva kāścit, naiva kvacit, naiva kasyacit, nāpi kenacidākāreṇa saṃbhaviṣyantītyabhiprāyaḥ /
asaṃbhave ca sati āsāṃ parikalpanaiva notpadyate ityayuktā evaitā dṛṣṭayaḥ /
tadevam /
sarvadṛṣṭiprahāṇāya yaḥ saddharmamadeśayat /
anukampāmupādāya taṃ namasyāmi gautamam /
tatra saṃsāranirvāṇaprahāṇādhigamopalambhaprapātapatanasaṃdhāraṇāt dharmaḥ /
satāmāryāṇāṃ kṛtakāryāṇāṃ dharmaḥ saddharmaḥ /
yadi vā śobhano dharmaḥ saddharmaḥ, sakalasaṃsāraduḥkhakṣayakaratvena praśaṃsanīyatvāt /
yaḥ saddharmam /
anirodhamanutpādamanucchedamaśāśvatam /
anekārthamanānārthamanāgamamanirgamam /
prapañcopaśamaṃ śivaṃ pratītyasamutpādasaṃjñayā hi deśitavān sarvadṛṣṭiprahāṇārthaṃ jagatāmanukampāmupādāya mahākaruṇāmevāśritya priyaikaputrādhikatarapremapātrasakalatribhuvanajanaḥ na lābhasatkārapratyupakārādilipsayā, taṃ namasyāmi niruttaramadvitīyaṃ śāstāram /
kiṃnāmadheyam? gautamam /
paramarṣigotrasaṃbhūtamityarthaḥ /
yathoktamāryaśālistambasūtre āryamaitreyeṇa mahābodhisattvena /
ya imaṃ pratītyasamutpādamevaṃ yathābhūtaṃ samyakprajñayā satatasamitamajīvaṃ nirjīvaṃ yathāvadaviparītamajātamabhūtamakṛtamasaṃskṛtamapratighamanāvaraṇaṃ śivamabhayamanāhāryamavyayamavyupaśamasvabhāvaṃ paśyati asatastucchataḥ riktato 'sārato rogato gaṇḍataḥ śalyato 'ghato 'nityato duḥkhataḥ śūnyato 'nātmataḥ, na sa pūrvāntaṃ pratisarati 		'dir dngos po thams cad ni rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba'i phyir /
stong pa nyid yin par bstan bcos mtha' dag gis bstan to /
de'i phyir dngos po thams cad stong pa nyid yin pa gang dag su zhig gis 'dzin par 'gyur zhing /
gang las kho bo cag de dag dgag pa rtsom par 'gyur ba /
rtag pa la sogs par lta ba /
dngos po thams cad las phyi rol du gyur pa de dag gang zhig yod par 'gyur /
de bzhin du gang du lta ba de dag 'byung zhing lta ba de dag gang du bzlog par bya ba gang zhig dmigs pa rtag pa la sogs pa dngos po thams cad kyi khongs su ma chud pa de dag gang zhig yod /
gang la lta ba de dag skye bar 'gyur zhing /
gang zhig kho bo cag gis lta ba de dag las bzlog par bya ba dngos po 'am gang zag gi dngos po thams cad la phyi rol du gyur pa de yang gang zhig yod /
rgyu mtshan gang las rtag pa la sogs par lta ba skyes pas na /
bzlog par bya ba lta ba rnams skye pa'i rgyu dmigs pa'i rgyu mtshan dngos po thams cad las phyi rol du gyur pa /
de yang gang zhig yod de /
don thams cad dngos po thams cad kyi khongs su gtogs pa'i phyir /
stong pa nyid yin la stong pa nyid yin pa'i phyir don de dag thams cad mi dmigs pas /
lta ba /
gang dag gang du gang la ni /
ci las kun du 'byung bar 'gyur te /
gang dag kyang ma yin la /
gang du yang ma yin zhing /
gang la yang ma yin la /
rgyu gang las kyang 'byung ba ma yin no zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go /
de dag yod pa ma yin na ni rtag pa nyid 'thad pa ma yin te /
de'i phyir lta ba de dag ni mi rigs pa nyid do /
ji skad du mdo las gang la la zhig gis yang dag pa'i shes rab kyis /
de ltar rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rtag par rgyun du srog med pa dang ji lta bu nyid dang ma nor ba nyid dang ma skyes pa dang ma byung ba dang ma byas pa dang 'dus ma byas pa dang thogs pa med pa dang sgrib pa med pa dang zhi ba dang 'jig pa med pa dang mi 'phrogs pa dang zad pa med pa dang rnam par zhi ba ma yin pa'i rang bzhin du mthong ba dang med pa dang gsog dang gsog dang snying po med pa dang nad dang 'bras dang zug rngu dang sdig pa dang mi rtag pa dang sdug bsngal ba dang stong pa dang bdag med par yang dag par rjes su mthong ba de ni ci bdag 'das pa'i dus na byung ba zhig gam /
'on te 'das pa'i dus na ma byung ba zhig gam /
bdag 'das pa'i dus na cir gyur pa zhig /
kiṃ nvahamabhūvamatīte 'dhvani, āhosvinnābhūvamatīte 'dhvani, ko nvahamabhūvamatīte 'dhvani, kathaṃ nvahamabhūvamatīte 'dhvani bdag 'das pa'i dus na ji lta bur gyur pa zhig snyam du sngon gyi mtha' la rten par mi byed do /
ci bdag ma 'ongs pa'i dus na 'byung bar 'gyur ram /
'on te ma 'ongs pa'i dus na 'byung bar mi 'gyur /
aparāntaṃ vā punarna pratisarati kiṃ nvahaṃ bhaviṣyāmyanāgate 'dhvani, āhosvinna bhaviṣyāmyanāgate 'dhvani, ko nu bhaviṣyāmyanāgate 'dhvani, kathaṃ nu bhaviṣyāmyanāgate 'dhvani ma 'ongs pa'i dus na cir 'gyur /
ma 'ongs pa'i dus na ji lta bu zhig tu 'gyur snyam du phyi ma'i mtha' la rten par mi byed do /
'di ci zhig /
'di ji lta bu zhig /
ci zhig /
cir 'gyur /
sems can 'di dag gang nas 'ongs /
sangs rgyas rnams kyi thugs yin de ni rigs pa chen po yin no zhes kyang bsgrags /
gang phyir yon tan kun gyi 'byung gnas 'di ni sangs rgyas rnams kyis bstan gyur pa /
de phyir de'i gtam shin tu rgyas par thugs rjes brlan pa'i thugs mnga' zhing /
sangs rgyas rnams kyi sras po blo bzang klu sgrub de yi gsung rab ji lta bar /
gnas pa bzhin du mkhyen nas gus pas bstan bcos dbu mar gtso bo'i ngo bor bstan /
skye bo gang gis rgyal pa'i bstan pa zab mo ma rtogs pa des rtogs phyir dang /
gang dag thub pa'i dbang po'i gsung las gzhan du de nyid bstan par 'dod pa dang /
blo gros ngan pa gzhan gang gsung rab rnam pa gzhan du 'chad par byed gyur pa /
de dag kyang ni bzlog par bya phyir mtha' gnyis sel ba'i bstan bcos 'di mdzad do /
klu sgrub sgra gcan 'dzin ni bzang po'i zhal snga nas bcos lhas kyang gsung rjes su /
'brangs pa sa de yi tshul lugs dus ni yun ring zhig tu gsal bar bstan par mdzad /
de yi slob ma bstan bcos de la rnam par 'byed pas rnam nges blo ldan pa /
rnams kyis kyang ni mu stegs ma lus pham byas thub mchog bstan pa yun ring bshad /
dbu ni don du gnyer ba 'ongs la thugs rjes dbu ni bcad de stsal mdzad nas /
bde ba can du rgyal ba'i sras po klu sgrub gshegs par gyur pa des mdzad pa'i /
gzhung rnams dang ni de yi slob ma'i tshogs de dag kyang dus mang zhig na nyams par gyur /
de nyid nyi ma nub pas deng sang gzhung lugs gsal po de ni gang na'ang med /
de ltar 'jig rten phal cher rtog pas sbyar ba'i don tsam la ni mkhas gyur la /
dam pa'i lam las ring zhing rtog ge'i chang 'thungs pa yis myos pa dang /
sangs rgyas gzhung lugs thams cad mkhyen pas gsungs pa'i de nyid bral zhing 'khrugs pa'i tshe /
gang zhig skad cig tsam yang yid gnyis bsal nas stong nyid rtogs de skal bar ldan /
dngos po'i 'ching bas nyer sbyar bstan bcos zhags pas dkris shing 'jigs pas bcad byas nas /
dngos po'i ra bar mchongs te 'gro ba'i ri dags mkhas gang de ni chen po ste /
de ltos brtsams pas bdag la yon tan 'di med deng sang mi mkhas gang yin pa /
de ched kho nar de las gzhan pa'i bstan bcos 'joms pa'i 'grel 'di bdag gis byas /
mdo sde kun las btus dang gtam bya rin chen phreng dang yang dag bstod pa dang /
'bad pas shin tu yun ring 'phags pa'i bstan bcos las bstan tshig ler byas de dang /
rigs pa drug cu zhes bya rnam par 'thag bcas stong nyid bdun cu pa de dang /
gang yang rtsod pa rnam par bzlog pa bkod pa de dag kyang ni mthong gyur zhing /
brgya pa la sogs de dag dang ni de bzhin mdo sde zab mo rnam mang dang /
sangs rgyas bskyangs kyis mdzad pa'i 'grel pa mthong nas legs ldan byed kyis legs bshad gang /
gcig nas gcig tu brgyud las 'ongs dang bdag gis rnam par phye las rnyed pa gang /
de dag bsdams te blo chen ldan rnams mgu bar bya phyir yang dag bstan pa yin /
dpyod pa'i dkyil 'khor dang ldan rtog ge 'joms byed blo gsal rnams la tshig gi ni /
'od zer dag gis 'di na gnas don yang dag ma dkrugs dngos su gsal byed cing /
'grel pa cha gsal 'di yang byed pa'i zla ba grags ldan 'di deng shar ba yis /
'jig rten rnams kyi yid gnyis mun pa stug po dag dang lhan cig sel ba yin /
lung dang rigs pa la brten 'grel pa bsdebs legs ma dkrugs tshig dang ldan pa 'di /
blo bzang dad ldan rnams la nges par bsgrub par bya phyir gus par byas nas na /
bdag gis bsod nams stong pa nyid ltar yangs par gyur pa gang zhig bsags pa des /
'jig rten ma lus lha tshogs spangs nas spros kun chad pa'i go 'phang bgrod par shog /
ston pa goo ta ma dang ni de'i chos la zhugs rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mtha' dag dang rgyal ba'i sras po'i tshogs dang de dag gis gsungs chos la phyag 'tshal nas /
sangs rgyas gsung mtha' yas la blta phyir lus can rnams kyi mig gyur dbu ma ni /
gang gi thugs rje'i sgo nas mdzad pa'i klu sgrub de la bdag ni phyag 'tshal lo /
bstan bcos dbu ma rtsa ba'i 'grel pa tshig gsal ba zhes bya ba /
slob dpon zla ba grags pa theg pa mchog la thugs gzhol ba /
mi 'phrogs pa'i mkhyen rab dang thugs rje mnga' ba /
ri mor bris pa'i ba drus las 'o ma bzhos pas bden par zhen pa bzlog par mdzad pas sbyar ba yongs su rdzogs so /
gsung rab rgya mtsho bsrubs byung de nyid bdud rtsi'i snod /
shes rab ces bya snang byed tshig gsal rin chen sgron /
bsgyur las dge ba gang bsags de yis nyi ma grags /
lta thibs spangs te spros bral mkha' la 'gro bar shog /
kha che'i grong khyer dpe med kyi dbus /
rin chen sbas pa'i gtsug lag khang gi 'debs su /
rgya gar gyi mkhan po rtog ge ba chen po /
ma h'a su ma ti'i zhal snga nas dang bod kyi lo ts'a ba pa tsha ba nyi ma grags kyis kha che'i dpe dang mthun pa ltar bsgyur /
phyis ra sa ra mo che'i gtsug lag khang du kha che'i mkhan po ka na ka ba ra ma dang bod kyi lo ts'a ba de nyid kyis nyi 'og shar phyogs kyi dpe dang gtugs shing legs par bcos te gtan la phab pa'o /
khungs rnams ji ltar grags bzhin phris /
phyin chang skad gnyis 'byung srid na /
'grel pa sgra don bzhin bsgyur la /
gzu bor byos la dpyad par rigs /
